tika-vin08t0:13_0: Yena viddhaṃsitā pāpā, yena nibbāpitā darā;
tika-vin08t0:14_0: Yena lokā nissarisuṃ, yena cāhaṃ namāmi taṃ.
tika-vin08t0:19_0: Vinayaṃ vinayaṃ sāraṃ, saṅgahaṃ saṅgahaṃ karaṃ;
tika-vin08t0:20_0: Cariyaṃ cariyaṃ vande, paramaṃ paramaṃ sutaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:30_0: Porāṇehi katā ṭīkā, kiñcāpi atthi sā pana;
tika-vin08t0:35_0: Imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ sabbe, sammā dhārentu sādhavoti.
tika-vin08t0:37_4: Ettha hi vatthuttayaṃ namassitvāti iminā ratanattayapaṇāmo vutto paṇāmetabbapaṇāmaatthadassanato.
tika-vin08t0:37_10: Pakaraṇābhidhānaṃ pana samāharitasaddassa sāmatthiyato dassitaṃ samāharitvā dassaneneva imassa pakaraṇassa vinayasaṅgahaiti nāmassa labhanato.
tika-vin08t0:38_2: taṃ dassanakiriyāya sāmatthiyato dassitaṃ tasmiṃ asati dassanakiriyāya abhāvato.
tika-vin08t0:38_7: taṃ saraṇaṃ sabbapāṇinanti imassa sāmatthiyato dassitaṃ hetumhi sati phalassa avinābhāvato.
tika-vin08t0:38_9: paṇāmārahe ca kato paṇāmo vuttappayojanasiddhikarova hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:38_11: Tesu mukhyapayojanaṃ nāma byañjanānurūpaṃ atthassa paṭivijjhanaṃ pakāsanañca atthānurūpaṃ byañjanassa uddisanaṃ uddesāpanañca,
tika-vin08t0:38_14: taṃ samāharitvā ekattha dassayissanti imassa sāmatthiyena dassitaṃ ekattha samāharitvā dassane sati taduggahaparipucchādinā
tika-vin08t0:39_2: ettha ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ tabbihatantarāyo hutvā anāyāsena ganthaparisamāpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:39_7: Abhidheyyakathanaṃ viditābhidheyyassa ganthassa viññūnaṃ uggahadhāraṇādivasena paṭipajjanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:39_8: Karaṇahetukathanaṃ akāraṇe katassa vāyāmassa nipphalabhāvato tappaṭikkhepanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:39_9: Karaṇappakārakathanaṃ viditappakārassa ganthassa sotūnaṃ uggahaṇādīsu rucijananatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:40_0: Ratanattayapaṇāmapayojanaṃ pana bahūhi pakārehi vitthārayanti ācariyā,
tika-vin08t0:40_2: Idha pana ganthagarubhāvamocanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyehi adhippetapayojanameva kathayimha.
tika-vin08t0:45_2: ahaṃ sabbapāṇīnaṃ saraṇaṃ saraṇībhūtaṃ vatthuttayaṃ namassāmi,
tika-vin08t0:45_3: namassitvā yogāvacarabhikkhūnaṃ vinaye pāṭavatthāya anekatthavippakiṇṇaṃ pāḷimuttavinicchayaṃ ekattha
tika-vin08t0:45_4: samāharitvā anākulaṃ katvā dassayissaṃ dassayissāmīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:46_0: Tattha vasanti etthāti vatthu. Kiṃ taṃ?
tika-vin08t0:46_2: Tañhi yasmā saraṇagatā sappurisā saraṇagamanasamaṅgino hutvā buddhādiratanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā tasmiṃ ārammaṇe vasanti āvasanti nivasanti,
tika-vin08t0:46_6: Ito parānipi vatthusaddassa vacanatthādīni ācariyehi vuttāni,
tika-vin08t0:46_8: Idha pana ganthavitthārapariharaṇatthaṃ ettakameva vuttanti veditabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:46_10: tayo aṃsā avayavā assāti vā tayaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Samudāyo.
tika-vin08t0:46_15: Buddhādiratanañhi ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittassa uppajjanakāle tvā-
tika-vin08t0:46_20: Teneva ca kāraṇena atthayojanāyapi paccuppannakālaatītakālavasena yojanā katā.
tika-vin08t0:47_2: Tañhi saraṇagatānaṃ sappurisānaṃ bhayaṃ santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggativinipātaṃ saṃkilesaṃ sarati hiṃsati vināseti,
tika-vin08t0:48_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hotī”tiādi,
tika-vin08t0:53_0: Yasmā pana “saraṇa”nti idaṃ padaṃ “nātha”nti padassa vevacanabhūtaṃ kitasuddhanāmapadaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:53_3: “Sara hiṃsāya”nti hi vuttaṃ hiṃsatthaṃ gahetvā sabbapāṇīnaṃ saraṇaṃ hiṃsakaṃ vatthuttayaṃ namassitvā
tika-vin08t0:53_4: viññāyamāne aniṭṭhappasaṅgato sabbapāṇīnaṃ saraṇaṃ saraṇībhūtaṃ nāthabhūtaṃ vatthuttayaṃ namassitvāti
tika-vin08t0:53_6: teneva ca kāraṇena atthayojanāyampi tathā yojanā katā. Sabba-
tika-vin08t0:53_8: Saha avena yo vattatīti sabboti kate pana sakala-
tika-vin08t0:54_0: Evaṃ sahetukaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmaṃ dassetvā idāni pakaraṇārambhassa sanimittaṃ mukhyapayojanaṃ dassetumāha “vinaye pāṭavatthāya,
tika-vin08t0:54_3: taṃdassanena ca anusaṅgikapayojanampi vibhāvitameva hoti kāraṇe siddhe kāriyassa sijjhanato.
tika-vin08t0:54_5: tasmiṃ dassite ajjhattikanimittampi dīpitameva hoti ārammaṇe ñāte ārammaṇikassa ñātabbato.
tika-vin08t0:54_7: duvidhapātimokkhaduvidhavibhaṅgapañcavidhapātimokkhuddesapañcaāpattikkhandhasattaāpattikkhandhādayo vividhā anekappakārā nayā ettha santīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:54_8: Atha vā visesā nayā etthāti vinayo,
tika-vin08t0:54_9: daḷhīkammasithilakaraṇapayojanā anupaññattinayādayo visesā nayā ettha santīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:59_3: Paṭati viyattabhāvaṃ gacchatīti paṭu. Ko so? Paṇḍito.
tika-vin08t0:59_4: Paṭuno bhāvo pāṭavaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Ñāṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:59_5: Asati kāraṇānurūpaṃ bhavatīti attho. Ko so?
tika-vin08t0:59_16: yogāvacarā ca te bhikkhū cāti yogāvacarabhikkhū,
tika-vin08t0:59_18: Etena vinaye paṭubhāvo nāma bhikkhūnaṃyeva attho hoti,
tika-vin08t0:60_0: Evaṃ pakaraṇārambhassa sanimittaṃ payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni sahetukaṃ abhidheyyaṃ dassetuṃ “vippakiṇṇamanekattha,
tika-vin08t0:60_2: Tattha vippakiṇṇaṃ anekatthāti iminā pakaraṇārambhassa hetuṃ dasseti hetumantavisesanattā,
tika-vin08t0:61_0: Anekatthāti ettha saṅkhyāvācako sabbanāmiko eka- saddo,
tika-vin08t0:61_7: Porāṇaṭīkāyaṃ pana anekatthāti anekesu sikkhāpadapadesesūti attho dassito,
tika-vin08t0:61_8: evañca sati upari “samāharitvā ekatthā”ti vakkhamānattā “anekatthavippakiṇṇaṃ ekattha samāharitvā”ti
tika-vin08t0:61_9: imesaṃ padānaṃ sahayogībhūtattā anekesu sikkhāpadapadesesu vippakiṇṇaṃ ekasmiṃ sikkhāpadapadese samāharitvāti
tika-vin08t0:61_12: Anekesu pakaraṇesu vippakiṇṇaṃ ekasmiṃ pakaraṇe samāharitvāti attho amhehi vutto.
tika-vin08t0:61_13: Atha pana “ekatthā”ti imassa “ekato”ti atthaṃ vikappetvā anekesu sikkhāpadapadesesu vippakiṇṇaṃ ekato samāharitvāti atthaṃ gaṇheyya,
tika-vin08t0:62_2: Atha vā attatthaparatthādibhedaṃ atthaṃ pāleti rakkhatīti pāḷi,
tika-vin08t0:62_11: Pāḷimutto ca so vinicchayo cāti pāḷimuttavinicchayo,
tika-vin08t0:62_13: Idañca “ānagarā khadiravana”ntiādīsu viya yebhuyyanayavasena vuttaṃ katthaci pāḷivinicchayassapi dissanato.
tika-vin08t0:62_14: Porāṇaṭīkāyaṃ pana pāḷivinicchayo ca pāḷimuttavinicchayo ca pāḷimuttavinicchayoti evaṃ ekadesasarūpekasesavasena
tika-vin08t0:62_15: vā etaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbanti dutiyanayopi vutto,
tika-vin08t0:62_16: evañca sati pāḷivinicchayapāḷimuttavinicchayehi aññassa vinicchayassa abhāvā kimetena ganthagarukarena pāḷimuttaggahaṇena.
tika-vin08t0:62_17: Visesanañhi sambhavabyabhicāre ca sati sātthakaṃ siyāti paṭhamanayova ārādhanīyo hoti.
tika-vin08t0:63_0: Evaṃ sahetukaṃ abhidheyyaṃ dassetvā idāni karaṇappakāraṃ dasseti “samāharitvā”tiādinā.
tika-vin08t0:63_2: So duvidhopi tena pakārena pakaraṇassa katattā “karaṇappakāro”ti vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:63_6: Anāgatakālikavasena paccamānena “dassayissa”nti padena samānakālattā anāgatakāliko idha tvā-
tika-vin08t0:63_16: tasmā karadhātumayena katvāsaddena yojetvā dassanakiriyāya sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:64_0: Evaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmādikaṃ pubbakaraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni ye pāḷimuttavinicchaye dassetukāmo,
tika-vin08t0:64_2: Mātikāya hi asati dassitavinicchayā vikiranti vidhaṃsenti yathā taṃ suttena asaṅgahitāni pupphāni.
tika-vin08t0:64_3: Santiyā pana mātikāya dassitavinicchayā na vikiranti na vidhaṃsenti yathā taṃ suttena saṅgahitāni pupphāni.
tika-vin08t0:64_4: Taṃ taṃ atthaṃ jānitukāmehi mātikānusārena gantvā icchiticchitavinicchayaṃ patvā so so attho jānitabbo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:65_4: saddo idamattho vā nidassanattho vā parisamāpanattho vā.
tika-vin08t0:65_14: Imesaṃ pana divāseyyādipadānaṃ vākyaviggahaṃ katvā atthe idha vuccamāne atipapañco bhavissati,
tika-vin08t0:65_16: tasmā tassa tassa niddesassa ādimhiyeva yathānurūpaṃ vakkhāma.
tika-vin08t0:68_1: Evaṃ pāḷimuttavinicchayakathānaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā idāni yathāṭhapitamātikānukkamena niddisanto “tattha divāseyyāti divānipajjana”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:68_2: Tattha tatthāti tesu mātikāpadesu samabhiniviṭṭhassa “divāseyyā”ti padassa “divānipajjana”nti attho daṭṭhabboti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:68_8: karajakāyagatarūpānaṃ uddhaṃ anuggantvā dīghavasena vitthārato pavattanasaṅkhāto iriyāpathaviseso.
tika-vin08t0:69_0: Tatrāti tasmiṃ divāsayane ayaṃ vakkhamāno vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:69_2: vacanato”ti ayaṃ paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadassa vinītavatthūsu āgato bhagavatā āhaccabhāsito ñāpakapāṭho.
tika-vin08t0:69_4: Dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā paṭisallīyitunti dvāraṃ pidahitvā nipajjituṃ. “Divā…pe…
tika-vin08t0:69_6: Nanu pāḷiyaṃ “ayaṃ nāma āpattī”ti na vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:69_7: atha kathamettha āpatti viññāyatīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “ettha ca kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:69_12: Pāḷiyaṃ ayaṃ nāma āpattīti kiñcāpi na vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:69_13: pana tathāpi asaṃvaritvā nipajjantassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ yasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:69_15: Evaṃ santepi asati bhagavato vacane kathaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ siyāti āha “vivaritvā…pe…
tika-vin08t0:69_17: Etena bhagavato anujānanampi taṃ akarontassa āpattikāraṇaṃ hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:70_0: Tattha “uppanne vatthumhīti itthiyā kataajjhācāravatthusmi”nti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:70_5: atha kasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ vuttanti āha “bhagavato”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:70_6: Na kevalaṃ upālittherādīhi eva aṭṭhakathā ṭhapitā,
tika-vin08t0:70_7: atha kho pāḷito ca atthato ca buddhena bhagavatā vutto.
tika-vin08t0:70_8: Na hi bhagavatā abyākataṃ tantipadaṃ nāma atthi,
tika-vin08t0:70_10: tasmā sambuddheneva tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ atthavaṇṇanakkamopi bhāsitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:70_11: Tattha tattha hi bhagavatā pavattitā pakiṇṇakadesanāyeva aṭṭhakathāti.
tika-vin08t0:71_0: Kiṃ panettha etaṃ divā dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā nipajjantassa dukkaṭāpattiāpajjanaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā eva siddhaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:71_2: Etaṃ dukkaṭāpattiāpajjanaṃ na kevalaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā eva siddhaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:71_4: no ratti”nti iminā parivārapāṭhenapi siddhaṃ hotīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:71_5: Katarasmiṃ pana vatthusmiṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vuttanti?
tika-vin08t0:71_6: “Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu vesāliyaṃ mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ divā vihāragato dvāraṃ vivaritvā nipanno ahosi.
tika-vin08t0:71_8: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā itthiyo gandhañca mālañca ādāya vihāraṃ āgamiṃsu vihārapekkhikāyo.
tika-vin08t0:71_9: Atha kho tā itthiyo taṃ bhikkhuṃ passitvā aṅgajāte abhinisīditvā yāvadatthaṃ katvā ‘purisusabho vatāya’nti
tika-vin08t0:71_11: Bhikkhū kilinnaṃ passitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Pañcahi,
tika-vin08t0:71_13: ākārehi aṅgajātaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti rāgena, vaccena,
tika-vin08t0:71_22: yaṃ tassa bhikkhuno rāgena aṅgajātaṃ kammaniyaṃ assa,
tika-vin08t0:71_26: Anujānāmi bhikkhave divā paṭisallīyantena dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā paṭisallīyitu”nti etasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ idaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:72_2: Tattha parivattakadvāramevāti saṃvaraṇavivaraṇavasena ito cito ca parivattanayoggadvārameva.
tika-vin08t0:72_5: Yaṃ ubhosu passesu rukkhatthambhe nikhanitvā tattha vijjhitvā majjhe dve tisso rukkhasūciyo pavesetvā karonti,
tika-vin08t0:72_8: bahūhi vā kaṇṭakasākhāhi kataṃ kaṇṭakadvāraṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:72_9: Gāmadvārassa pidhānatthaṃ padarena vā kaṇṭakasākhādīhi vā katassa kavāṭassa udukkhalapāsakarahitatāya
tika-vin08t0:72_10: ekena saṃvarituṃ vivarituñca asakkuṇeyyassa heṭṭhā ekaṃ cakkaṃ yojenti,
tika-vin08t0:72_13: Cakkameva hi lātabbatthena saṃvaraṇavivaraṇatthāya gahetabbatthena cakkalakaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:73_0: Mahādvāresu pana dve tīṇi cakkalakāni yojetīti āha “phalakesū”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:73_5: Ekaṃ dussasāṇidvāramevāti ettha kilañjasāṇidvārampi saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin08t0:73_7: Dussasāṇi kilañjasāṇītiādinā vuttaṃ sabbampi dussasāṇiyameva saṅgahetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:74_1: Evaṃ dvāravisesaṃ dassetvā idāni yattakena dvāraṃ saṃvutaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:74_3: Tattha sūcīti majjhe chiddaṃ katvā pavesitā.
tika-vin08t0:74_5: Idāni yattha dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā nipajjituṃ na sakkā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:74_6: tattha kātabbavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “sace bahūnaṃ vaḷañjanaṭṭhānaṃ hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:74_7: Bahūnaṃ avaḷañjanaṭṭhānepi ekaṃ āpucchitvā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:74_9: nisinnā hontīti idaṃ tattha bhikkhūnaṃ sannihitabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:74_12: Nipajjitvā niddāyante pana ābhogaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:74_13: Asantapakkhe ṭhitattā raho nisajjāya viya dvārasaṃvaraṇaṃ nāma mātugāmānaṃ pavesanivāraṇatthaṃ anuññātanti āha “kevalaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:75_1: evaṃ sabbatthapi yo yo theravādo vā aṭṭhakathāvādo vā pacchā vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:75_2: so sova pamāṇanti gahetabbanti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanato atirekaṃ ācariyassa vacanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:75_5: na vattatī”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyehi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:75_7: gahetabbanti yathā cettha kurundiyaṃ vuttavacanaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:75_8: evaṃ sabbatthapi vinicchaye yo yo theravādo vā aṭṭhakathāvādo vā pacchā vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:75_10: pure vutto theravādo vā aṭṭhakathāvādo vā pamāṇanti na gahetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:75_11: Idaṃ vacanaṃ aṭṭhāne vuttaṃ viya dissati. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:75_14: Taṃ imasmiṃ āpucchanaābhogakaraṇavinicchaye aññassa ayuttassa aṭṭhakathāvādassa vā theravādassa vā abhāvā vattuṃ na sakkā.
tika-vin08t0:75_15: Na hi pubbavākye “bhikkhū evā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:75_16: atha kho āsannavasena vā paṭṭhānavasena vā “bhikkhū cīvarakammaṃ”iccādikaṃyeva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:75_19: Imasmiṃ vinicchaye aññassa aṭṭhakathāvādassa vā ācariyavādassa vā avacanato pure pacchābhāvo ca na dissati,
tika-vin08t0:76_1: ko na muccatī”ti imassa pañhassa vissajjane mahāpaccarivādo ca kurundivādo ca mahāaṭṭhakathāvādo cāti tayo aṭṭhakathāvādā āgatā,
tika-vin08t0:76_3: tasmā tattheva yuttāyuttabhāvo ca pamāṇāpamāṇabhāvo ca gahetabbāgahetabbabhāvo ca dissati,
tika-vin08t0:76_5: suvimalavipulapaññāveyyattiyasamannāgatena pana ācariyāsabhena avattabbaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ na siyā,
tika-vin08t0:76_6: tasmā upari aṭṭhakathāvādasaṃsandanāvasāne mahāpadumattherena vuttanti imassa vacanassa pacchato vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-vin08t0:76_7: taṃ pacchā lekhakehi parivattetvā likhitaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:76_12: yo ca bandhitvā nipajjāpito”ti imassa aṭṭhakathāvādassa pacchimattā soyeva pamāṇato gahetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:76_13: Tathā ca vakkhati “sabbattha yo yo aṭṭhakathāvādo vā theravādo vā pacchā vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:77_1: Idāni dvāraṃ saṃvaraṇassa antarāye sati asaṃvaritvāpi nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dassetuṃ “atha dvārassa”tyādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:77_2: Nisseṇiṃ āropetvāti uparimatalaṃ āropetvā visaṅkharitvā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā,
tika-vin08t0:77_5: Dvepi dvārāni jaggitabbānīti ettha sace ekasmiṃ dvāre kavāṭaṃ vā natthi,
tika-vin08t0:77_6: heṭṭhā vuttanayena saṃvarituṃ vā na sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:77_10: Pacchimānaṃ bhāroti ekābaddhavasena āgacchante sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:77_14: vaṭṭatiyevāti ettha dvārajagganakassa tadadhīnattā tadā tassa tattha sannihitāsannihitabhāvaṃ anupadhāretvāpi ābhogaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyevāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:78_0: Yena kenaci parikkhitteti ettha parikkhepassa ubbedhato pamāṇaṃ sahaseyyappahonake vuttasadisameva.
tika-vin08t0:78_1: Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “yañhi senāsanaṃ upari pañcahi chadanehi aññena vā kenaci sabbameva paṭicchannaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:78_3: yaṃ pana senāsanaṃ bhūmito paṭṭhāya yāva chadanaṃ āhacca pākārena vā aññena vā kenaci antamaso vatthenapi parikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:78_5: Chadanaṃ anāhacca sabbantimena pariyāyena diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā parikkhittāpi sabbaparicchannāyevāti kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:79_3: āpattīti aruṇe uggate pabujjhitvā aruṇuggamanaṃ ñatvā vā añatvā vā anuṭṭhahitvā sayitasantānena supati,
tika-vin08t0:79_4: uṭṭhahitvā kattabbassa dvārasaṃvaraṇādino akatattā akiriyasamuṭṭhānā āpatti hoti anāpattikhette katanipajjanakiriyāya anaṅgattā.
tika-vin08t0:79_6: divā dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā nipajjanakkhaṇe kiriyākiriyā ca acittakā cāti veditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:79_7: Purāruṇā pabujjhitvāpi yāva aruṇuggamanā sayantassapi purimanayena āpattiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:80_1: āpattiyevāti ettha kadā assa āpattīti? Vuccate –
tika-vin08t0:80_4: no ratti”nti vuttattā anādariyadukkaṭā na muccatīti vuttadukkaṭaṃ pana divāsayanadukkaṭameva na hoti anādariyadukkaṭattā eva.
tika-vin08t0:80_5: “Aruṇuggamane pana acittakaṃ akiriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjatīti veditabba”nti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:80_7: Tassa āpattīti asuddhacitteneva nipannattā niddāyantassapi aruṇe uggate divāpaṭisallānamūlikā āpatti.
tika-vin08t0:80_8: ‘Evaṃ nipajjanto anādariyadukkaṭāpi na muccatī’ti vuttattā asuddhacittena nipajjanto aruṇuggamanato puretaraṃ
tika-vin08t0:80_10: divāpaṭisallānamūlikaṃ pana dukkaṭaṃ aruṇeyeva āpajjatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:80_11: tasmā evaṃ nipajjantassa dve dukkaṭāni āpajjantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:81_0: Sace dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā aruṇe uggate uṭṭhahissāmīti nipajjati,
tika-vin08t0:81_1: dvāre ca aññehi aruṇuggamanakāle vivaṭepi tassa anāpattiyeva dvārapidahanassa rattidivābhāgesu visesābhāvā.
tika-vin08t0:81_5: Divā saṃvaritvā nipannassa kenaci vivaṭepi dvāre anāpattiyeva,
tika-vin08t0:81_6: attanāpi anuṭṭhahitvāva sati paccaye vivaṭepi anāpattīti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:82_2: Anādariyaāpatti pana purāruṇā uṭṭhitassapi tassa hoteva “dukkaṭā na muccatī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:82_3: Dukkaṭā na muccatīti ca purāruṇā uṭṭhahitvā mūlāpattiyā muttopi anādariyadukkaṭā na muccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:83_3: pādānaṃ pana bhūmito amocitattā ayaṃ nipanno nāma hotīti teneva anāpatti vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:83_4: Apassāya supantassāti kaṭiṭṭhito uddhaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭake appamattakaṃ padesaṃ bhūmiṃ aphusāpetvā supantassa.
tika-vin08t0:83_5: Kaṭiṭṭhiṃ pana bhūmiṃ phusāpentassa sayanaṃ nāma na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:83_7: vandanādīsupi tiriyaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakānaṃ pasāritattā nipajjanamevāti āpatti pariharitabbāva.
tika-vin08t0:83_8: Vandanāpi hi pādamūle nipajjatītiādīsu nipajjanameva vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:83_9: Sahasā vuṭṭhātīti pakkhalitā patito viya sahasā vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin08t0:83_12: Yassa pana visaññitāya pacchāpi avisayo eva,
tika-vin08t0:83_15: na vuṭṭhātīti iminā visayepi akaraṇaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin08t0:84_3: tasmiṃ nisīditvā katattā tameva nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:84_6: Mahāaṭṭhakathā nāma saṅgītittayamāruḷhā tepiṭakassa buddhavacanassa aṭṭhakathā.
tika-vin08t0:84_8: tambapaṇṇiyehi therehi pacchā sīhaḷabhāsāya abhisaṅkhatā ca hoti.
tika-vin08t0:84_9: Ekabhaṅgenāti ekapassabhañjanena pāde bhūmito amocetvā ekapassena sarīraṃ bhañjitvā nipannoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:84_12: “Mucchitvā patitattā avisayattā āpatti na dissatī”ti therena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:84_13: Ācariyā pana yathā yakkhagahitako bandhitvā nipajjāpito ca paravaso hoti,
tika-vin08t0:84_14: evaṃ aparavasattā mucchitvā patito kañcikālaṃ jānitvā nipajjatīti anāpattiṃ na vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:85_3: ekabhaṅgena nipanno pana anipannattā āpattito muccatiyevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:85_5: yo ca bandhitvā nipajjāpito”ti imassa aṭṭhakathāvādassa pacchimattā soyeva pamāṇato gahetabbo,
tika-vin08t0:85_6: tathā ca vakkhati “sabbattha yo yo aṭṭhakathāvādo vā pacchā vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:85_8: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne imassa aṭṭhakathāpāṭhassa ānītattā imasmiṃ vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇepi imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne so pāṭho vattabboti no khanti.
tika-vin08t0:85_9: Ettha ca “rattiṃ dvāraṃ vivaritvā nipanno aruṇe uggate uṭṭhāti,
tika-vin08t0:90_0: “Kismiṃ kāle ca dese ca, aruṇo samugacchati;
tika-vin08t0:92_0: Tattha ko esa aruṇo nāmāti ettha esa aruṇo nāma sūriyassa pabhāviseso.
tika-vin08t0:94_0: Taṭṭīkāyañca “sūrassa udayato pubbe uṭṭhitaraṃsi aruṇo nāma siyā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:94_1: Vimativinodanīnāmikāyaṃ vinayaṭīkāyañca “aruṇoti cettha sūriyuggamanassa purecaro vaḍḍhanaghanaratto pabhāvisesoti daṭṭhabbo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:94_4: Kena so aruṇo bhaveti ettha aruṇo vaṇṇo assāti aruṇo,
tika-vin08t0:94_6: Atha vā arati gacchati rattavaṇṇabhāvena pavattatīti aruṇo.
tika-vin08t0:94_8: Kīdiso tassa vaṇṇoti ettha abyattarattavaṇṇo tassa vaṇṇo bhave.
tika-vin08t0:94_10: Taṭṭīkāyañca “kiñciratto abyattarattavaṇṇo aruṇo nāma yathā macchassa akkhī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:94_14: Yadi evaṃ pātimokkhaṭṭhapanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāya vimativinodaniyaṃ “pāḷiyaṃ pana nandimukhiyāti odātadisāmukhatāya tuṭṭhamukhiyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:94_17: Tattha hi aruṇuggatakāle aruṇobhāsena odātadisāmukhabhāvo vutto,
tika-vin08t0:94_19: Vuttañhetaṃ udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nandimukhiyāti aruṇassa uggatattā eva aruṇobhāya sūriyālokūpajīvino satte
tika-vin08t0:100_3: Yāti yā puratthimā disā rattavaṇṇatāya uttamarūpadharā hutvā dissatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:100_5: tasmā tasmiṃ samaye aruṇassa uṭṭhitattā puratthimāya disāya rattabhāgo sūriyālokassa patthaṭattā sesadisānaṃ odātabhāvo viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:101_0: Saṇṭhānaṃ kīdisaṃ bhaveti ettha aruṇassa pāṭekkaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ nāma natthi rasmimattattā.
tika-vin08t0:101_4: Vuttañhi jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “puratthimadisā rattavaṇṇatāya uttamarūpadharā hutvā dissatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:102_1: aruṇo samugacchatīti ettha esa aruṇo sūriyuggamanassa pure kāle puratthimadisāyaṃ uggacchati.
tika-vin08t0:102_3: aruṇo nāma puratthimadisāyaṃ sūriyodayato puretarameva uṭṭhitobhāso”ti.
tika-vin08t0:103_1: udāhu anumānatoti ettha ayaṃ aruṇo nāma paccakkhasiddho eva,
tika-vin08t0:103_7: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti,
tika-vin08t0:103_8: tasmā ayaṃ aruṇavaṇṇo cakkhunā disvā jānitabbato paccakkhasiddhoyeva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:103_9: na evaṃ sati evaṃ bhaveyyāti anumānena punappunaṃ cintanena siddhoti.
tika-vin08t0:103_10: Imaṃ pañhavissajjanaṃ sādhukaṃ manasi karitvā paṇḍitehi rattobhāsoyeva aruṇoti paccetabbo sallakkhetabboti.
tika-vin08t0:104_0: Kasmā pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne aruṇakathā vuttāti?
tika-vin08t0:104_2: Uposathikā upāsakā ca upāsikāyo ca aruṇuggamanaṃ tathato ajānantā anuggateyeva aruṇe uggatasaññāya khādanīyaṃ vā khādanti,
tika-vin08t0:104_6: Sāmaṇerā tatheva vikālabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā sīlavināsaṃ pāpuṇanti.
tika-vin08t0:104_7: Nissayapaṭipannakā bhikkhū ācariyupajjhāyehi vinā bahisīme carantā nissayappassambhanaṃ pāpuṇanti,
tika-vin08t0:104_9: tecīvarikā bhikkhū abaddhasīmāyaṃ cīvarena vippavasantā nissaggiyapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:104_14: Evamādianekādīnavasambhavato lajjipesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tathato aruṇuggamanassa jānanatthaṃ vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin08t0:105_0: Keci pana bhikkhū aḍḍharattisamaye ghaṭisuññattā aḍḍharattikālaṃ atikkamma aññadivaso hoti,
tika-vin08t0:105_1: tasmā tasmiṃ kāle aruṇaṃ uṭṭhitaṃ nāma hotīti maññamānā aḍḍharattiṃ atikkamma khādanīyabhojanīyādīni bhuñjanti,
tika-vin08t0:105_2: te pana buddhasamayaṃ ajānantā vedasamayameva manasi karontā evaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:105_3: tasmā tesaṃ taṃkaraṇaṃ pamāṇaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:105_4: Bahavo pana bhikkhū aruṇassa paccakkhabhāvaṃ ajānantā anumānavasena cintituñca asakkontā anussavavaseneva
tika-vin08t0:105_5: paravacanaṃ saddahantā amhākaṃ ācariyā aruṇuggamanavelāyaṃ uṭṭhāya gacchantā sūriyuggamanavelāyaṃ dvisahassadaṇḍappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin08t0:105_8: Imamhā vihārā asukaṃ nāma vihāraṃ asukaṃ nāma cetiyaṃ asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ pāpuṇantītiādīni ca vadantīti evaṃ anussavavacanaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:105_10: Addhānaṃ nāma balavantassa javasampannassa ca rassaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:108_0: Tasmā addhānaṃ nāma sabbesaṃ ekasadisaṃ na hotīti aruṇuggamanassa lakkhaṇaṃ bhavituṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:108_1: na ca te āyasmanto piṭakattayato kiñci sādhakabhūtaṃ vacanaṃ āharanti,
tika-vin08t0:108_2: asakkhikaṃ aḍḍaṃ karonti viya yathājjhāsayameva vadantīti pamāṇaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:114_0: Kaccāyanasārappakaraṇāgataṃ gāthaṃ vatvā atītarattiyā pacchimo yāmo ajja pariyāpanno,
tika-vin08t0:114_1: tasmā pacchimayāmassa ādito paṭṭhāya aruṇaṃ uggacchatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:114_2: Ayaṃ vādo sakāraṇasaññāpakattā purimehi balavā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:114_4: Ayañhi gāthā bāhirasaddasatthe jaṅgadāsappakaraṇe vuttanayena ajja bhavā ajjatanīti vuttaajjavohārassa pavattanakālaṃ dassetuṃ vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:114_5: na piṭakattaye vuttassa aruṇuggamanassa kālaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:115_0: Apare pana “pahāro yāmasaññito”ti abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ vuttattā pahārayāmasaddānaṃ ekatthattā tattheva
tika-vin08t0:115_1: “tiyāmā saṃvarī bhave”ti vuttattā rattiyā ca tiyāmabhāvato pāḷiyañca “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti,
tika-vin08t0:115_3: uddhasto aruṇo”ti āgatattā idāni rattiyā catūsu pahāresu tatiyappahārassa avasāne aruṇo uggato,
tika-vin08t0:115_4: tasmā avasesaekappahāramatto kālo divasabhāgaṃ bhajatīti vadeyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:115_7: Tathā hi “pahāro yāmasaññito”ti ayaṃ ñāpako pahārayāmānaṃ ekatthabhāvassa anurūpo,
tika-vin08t0:115_12: Majjhimadese hi dasaghaṭikāpamāṇassa kālassa ekappahārattā sabbā ratti tiyāmāva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:115_14: idāni pana paccantavisayesu sattaṭṭhaghaṭikāmattassa kālassa ekappahārakatattā catuppahārā bhavati,
tika-vin08t0:115_15: tasmā majjhimadesavohāraṃ gahetvā abhidhānappadīpikāyañca “tiyāmā saṃvarī bhave”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:115_19: Tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “tathā pārivāsikādīnampi aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā vattaṃ nikkhipantānaṃ ratticchedo vutto,
tika-vin08t0:116_0: Sahaseyyasikkhāpadepi “anupasampannehi saha nivutthabhāvaparimocanatthaṃ purāruṇā nikkhamitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:116_1: Evaṃ cīvaravippavāsādīsu ca sabbattha rattipariyosāne āgamanavasena aruṇuggamanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:116_4: Na kevalaṃ majjhimadesesu rattiyāyeva tippahārabhāvo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:116_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “sammāsambuddhassa abhidhammadesanāpariyosānañca tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sattappakaraṇauggahaṇañca ekappahāreneva hotī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:116_7: mūlaṭīkāyañca “ekappahārenāti ettha pahāroti divasassa tatiyabhāgo vuccatī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:116_8: tasmā eko rattidivo chappahāro hotīti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:116_9: Evaṃ majjhimadesavohārena tiyāmasaṅkhātassa tippahārassa avasāne sabbarattipariyosāne uṭṭhitaṃ aruṇaṃ
tika-vin08t0:116_10: paccantadesavohārena tippahārassa avasāneti gahetvā ekappahārāvasesakāle aruṇo uggatoti vuttattā ayampi
tika-vin08t0:120_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ nissāya ekarattiyaṃ aruṇo catukkhattuṃ uṭṭhahati,
tika-vin08t0:120_4: catutthaṃ gadrabhamukhavaṇṇaṃ hotī”ti vatvā rattobhāsato puretaraṃ atītarattikāleyeva vattanikkhipanādikammaṃ karonti.
tika-vin08t0:120_14: na ca liṅganiyamoti na nissayakārācariyena ṭhapitā bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:120_15: atha kho pacchā aññehi lekhakehi vā attano icchānurūpaṃ likhitā bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:120_16: tasmā ayaṃ gāthā kuto ābhatā pāḷito vā aṭṭhakathāto vā ṭīkāto vā vinayato vā suttantato vā abhidhammato
tika-vin08t0:120_17: vāti pabhavaṃ apariyesitvā nissaye diṭṭhamattameva sārato gahetvā pāḷiyaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu vuttavacanaṃ
tika-vin08t0:121_0: Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi “tena kho pana samayena buddho bhagavā sītāsu hemantikāsu rattīsu antaraṭṭhakāsu himapātasamaye rattiṃ ajjhokāse ekacīvaro nisīdi,
tika-vin08t0:121_2: Nikkhante paṭhame yāme sītaṃ bhagavantaṃ ahosi,
tika-vin08t0:121_5: Nikkhante majjhime yāme sītaṃ bhagavantaṃ ahosi,
tika-vin08t0:121_8: Nikkhante pacchime yāme uddhaste aruṇe nandimukhiyā rattiyā sītaṃ bhagavantaṃ ahosi,
tika-vin08t0:122_0: “Tena kho pana samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
tika-vin08t0:122_1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
tika-vin08t0:122_2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā nikkhante paṭhame yāme uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā
tika-vin08t0:122_3: yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
tika-vin08t0:122_10: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā nikkhante majjhime yāme uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ
tika-vin08t0:122_11: karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
tika-vin08t0:122_17: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā nikkhante pacchime yāme uddhaste aruṇe nandimukhiyā
tika-vin08t0:122_18: rattiyā uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
tika-vin08t0:123_0: Nandimukhiyā rattiyāti aruṇuṭṭhitakāle pītimukhā viya ratti khāyati.
tika-vin08t0:124_0: “Tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāyarattiyā nikkhante pacchime yāme uddhaste aruṇe nandimukhiyā
tika-vin08t0:124_1: rattiyā uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
tika-vin08t0:124_11: Aruṇo nāma puratthimadisāyaṃ sūriyodayato puretarameva uṭṭhitobhāso.
tika-vin08t0:124_12: Nandimukhiyā rattiyāti aruṇassa uggatattā eva aruṇobhāya sūriyālokūpajīvino satte nandāpanamukhiyā rattiyā jātāya,
tika-vin08t0:125_0: Iti ettakāsu vinayasuttantāgatāsu pāḷiyaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ekasmimpiṭhāne aruṇo catukkhattuṃ uggatoti natthi,
tika-vin08t0:125_6: Nandimukhīti ca satte nandāpanadisāmukhī ratti eva vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:125_9: Evaṃ abhidhānappadīpikāpakaraṇavacanena viruddhattā pāḷiyaṭṭhakathādīhi asaṃsandanato dubbalasādhakattā ca ayampi vādo ayuttoyevāti daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin08t0:125_10: tasmā sammāsambuddhassa āṇaṃ anatikkantena lajjibhikkhunā yadi kenaci appaṭicchanne vivaṭokāse hoti,
tika-vin08t0:126_2: sūriyamaṇḍalassa dissanakālato ekaghaṭikāmattena vā dvighaṭikāmattena vā tattakaṃ kālaṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-vin08t0:126_3: imasmiṃ kāle aruṇo uggato bhaveyyāti takketvā kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:126_4: saṃsayaṃ anicchantena tatopi kañcikālaṃ adhivāsetvā nissaṃsayakāle kattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:126_6: Ayaṃ pana vādo yathāvuttappakaraṇavacanehi suṭṭhu saṃsandati yathā gaṅgodakena yamunodakaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:126_7: tasmā paṇḍitehi punappunaṃ pubbāparaṃ āloḷentena manasi kātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:126_8: Evaṃ manasi karitvā aruṇapaṭisaṃyuttesu ṭhānesu saṃsayo chinditabbo,
tika-vin08t0:126_9: saṃsayaṃ chinditvā visāradena hutvā taṃ taṃ kammaṃ kātabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:135_1: Evaṃ divāseyyavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni parikkhāravinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “parikkhāroti samaṇaparikkhāro”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:135_2: Tattha divāseyyavinicchayakathāya ādimhi vuttaṃ “tatthā”ti padaṃ ānetvā tattha tesu mātikāpadesu samabhiniviṭṭhassa
tika-vin08t0:135_14: Kappiyākappiyo ca so parikkhāro ceti tathā,
tika-vin08t0:136_1: Sabbampi hi chattaṃ tathākariyamānaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:136_2: Tenevāha vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “sabbaparikkhāresu vaṇṇamaṭṭhavikāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭanti dīpentena na vaṭṭatīti vuttanti veditabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:136_3: Na vaṇṇamaṭṭhatthāyāti iminā thirakaraṇatthaṃ ekavaṇṇasuttena vinandhiyamānaṃ yadi vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:136_7: tādisaṃ chattadaṇḍaṃ labhitvā kiṃ kātabbanti āha “ghaṭakaṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:136_8: Suttakena vā daṇḍo veṭhetabboti yathā lekhā na paññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:136_16: Sā vaṭṭatīti sā lekhā rajjukehi bandhantu vā mā vā,
tika-vin08t0:137_0: “Chattaṃ paṇṇamayaṃ kiñci, bahi anto ca sabbaso;
tika-vin08t0:138_0: Pañcavaṇṇena suttena, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:140_0: Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā daṇḍe na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:143_0: “Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā vā pana kevalā;
tika-vin08t0:144_0: Chinditvā vāpi ghaṃsitvā, dhāretuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:147_0: Tassa vaṇṇanāyampi chattaṃ paṇṇamayaṃ kiñcīti tālapaṇṇādipaṇṇacchadanaṃ yaṃ kiñci chattaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:147_9: Mukhavaṭṭiyā nāmetvā baddhapaṇṇakoṭiyā vā matthakamaṇḍalakoṭiyā vā girikūṭādiṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:147_14: Lekhāti ukkiritvā vā chinditvā vā cittakammavasena vā katarāji.
tika-vin08t0:147_15: Pañcavaṇṇānaṃ suttānaṃ antare nīlādiekavaṇṇena suttena thiratthaṃ chattaṃ anto ca bahi ca sibbituṃ vā
tika-vin08t0:147_16: chattadaṇḍaggāhakasalākapañjaraṃ thiratthaṃ vinandhituṃ vā vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:147_17: Pañcavaṇṇānaṃ ekavaṇṇena thiratthanti iminā anekavaṇṇehi suttehi vaṇṇamaṭṭhatthāya sibbituñca vinandhituñca na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:147_19: tassa ekavaṇṇena pañcavaṇṇena vā suttena thiratthaṃ sibbituṃ vinandhituṃ vā vaṭṭatīti yojanā kātabbā hoti.
tika-vin08t0:148_0: Ettha ca heṭṭhā vuttena “pañcavaṇṇena suttena sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭatī”ti pāṭhena ca “keci tālapaṇṇacchattaṃ
tika-vin08t0:148_1: anto vā bahi vā pañcavaṇṇena suttena sibbetvā vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:148_3: ekavaṇṇe pana nīlena vā pītakena vā yena kenaci suttena anto vā bahi vā sibbituṃ,
tika-vin08t0:149_0: Lekhā vā pana kevalāti yathāvuttappakārā sakalā lekhā vā.
tika-vin08t0:149_9: tasmiṃ bandhanaṭṭhāne valayamiva ukkiritvāti valayaṃ viya upaṭṭhāpetvā.
tika-vin08t0:149_13: Yathā vātappahārena acalanatthaṃ chattamaṇḍalikaṃ rajjukehi gāhāpetvā daṇḍe bandhanti,
tika-vin08t0:149_14: tasmiṃ bandhanaṭṭhāne valayamiva ukkiritvā lekhaṃ ṭhapenti,
tika-vin08t0:149_17: bandhanārahaṭṭhānattā valayaṃ ukkiritvā vaṭṭatīti gaṇṭhipade vattantīti āgataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:150_5: Paṭṭamukheti dvinnaṃ paṭṭānaṃ saṅghaṭitaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:150_11: Veṇiṃ vā saṅkhalikaṃ vā karontīti karaṇakiriyāya sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:150_14: Gayā nāma mūle tanukaṃ agge mahantaṃ katvā gadākārena sibbanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:150_15: Muggaro nāma mūle ca agge ca ekasadisaṃ katvā muggarākārena sibbanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:150_16: Kakkaṭakkhīni ukkirantīti gaṇṭhikapaṭṭapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ ante pāḷibaddhaṃ katvā kakkaṭakānaṃ akkhisaṇṭhānaṃ paṭṭhapenti,
tika-vin08t0:150_18: “Koṇasuttapiḷakāti gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇehi nīhaṭasuttānaṃ koṭiyo”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:150_19: Kathaṃ pana tā piḷakā duviññeyyarūpā kātabbāti?
tika-vin08t0:150_20: Koṇehi nīhaṭasuttānaṃ antesu ekavāraṃ gaṇṭhikakaraṇena vā puna nivattetvā sibbanena vā duviññeyyasabhāvaṃ katvā suttakoṭiyo rassaṃ katvā chinditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:150_25: tasmā tesaṃ matena koṇasuttā ca piḷakā ca koṇasuttapiḷakāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:151_0: Vimativinodaniyampi koṇasuttapiḷakāti gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇehi bahi niggatasuttānaṃ piḷakākārena ṭhapitakoṭiyoti keci vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:151_1: te piḷake chinditvā duviññeyyā kātabbāti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:151_2: Keci pana “koṇasuttā ca piḷakā cāti dveyevā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:151_3: tesaṃ matena gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇato koṇaṃ nīhaṭasuttā koṇasuttā nāma.
tika-vin08t0:151_4: Samantato pana pariyantena gatā caturassasuttā piḷakā nāma.
tika-vin08t0:151_5: Taṃ duvidhampi keci cīvarato visuṃ paññānatthāya vikārayuttaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:151_7: na pana sabbathā acakkhugocarabhāvena sibbanatthāya tathāsibbanassa asakkuṇeyyattā,
tika-vin08t0:151_10: Rajanakammato pubbe paññāyamānopi viseso cīvare ratte ekavaṇṇato na paññāyatīti āha “cīvare ratte”ti.
tika-vin08t0:152_2: aṃsabaddhakakāyabandhanādikaṃ acīvarattā saṅkhādīhi ghaṃsituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:152_3: Kaṇṇasuttakanti cīvarassa dīghato tiriyañca sibbitānaṃ catūsu kaṇṇesu koṇesu ca nikkhantānaṃ suttasīsānametaṃ nāmaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:152_7: taṃ pana nāmena sadisampi ito aññamevāti dassetuṃ “yaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:153_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “pāsakaṃ katvā bandhitabbanti rajanakāle bandhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:153_13: kaṇṇasuttaka”nti evaṃ anuññātacīvararajjuyaṃ rajitvā pasāritacīvarassa olambakasuttaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:154_0: Gaṇṭhiketi cīvarapārupanakāle pāsake laggāpanatthaṃ kate dantādimaye gaṇṭhike.
tika-vin08t0:156_0: Samaṃ satapadādīnaṃ, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:158_0: Veṇiṃ saṅkhalikaṃ vāpi, karoto hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:162_0: Suttā ca piḷakā tattha, duviññeyyāva dīpitā.
tika-vin08t0:166_0: Cīvare bhikkhunā kātuṃ, kārāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:172_0: Tathā kiliṭṭhakāle ca, dhovanatthaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:173_0: “Rajane pana gandhaṃ vā, telaṃ vā lākhameva vā;
tika-vin08t0:174_0: Kiñci pakkhipituṃ tattha, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:176_0: Cīvaraṃ na ca ghaṭṭeyya, ghaṃsitabbaṃ na doṇiyā.
tika-vin08t0:178_0: Rattaṃ paharituṃ kiñci, hattheheva ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:179_0: “Gaṇṭhike pana lekhā vā, piḷakā vā na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin08t0:181_2: Paṭṭassa pariyante vāti anuvātassa ubhayapariyante vā.
tika-vin08t0:181_4: kaṇṇepi vā ekasseva vā paṭṭassa ūnapūraṇatthaṃ ghaṭitaṭṭhānepi vā.
tika-vin08t0:182_1: Aṭṭhakoṇādiko vidhi pakāro etassāti aṭṭhakoṇādikavidhi, taṃ.
tika-vin08t0:182_6: Atha vā paṭṭanti ettha bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:183_4: Suttāti koṇato koṇaṃ sibbitasuttā ceva caturasse sibbitasuttā ca.
tika-vin08t0:183_5: Piḷakāti tesameva suttānaṃ nivattetvā sibbitakoṭiyo ca.
tika-vin08t0:183_6: Duviññeyyāvāti rajanakāle duviññeyyarūpā anoḷārikā dīpitā vaṭṭantīti.
tika-vin08t0:183_7: Yathāha “koṇasuttapiḷakā ca cīvare ratte duviññeyyarūpā vaṭṭantī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:184_1: Kaṇṇakoṇesu suttānīti cīvarakaṇṇe suttā ceva pāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇesu suttāni ca acchindati.
tika-vin08t0:184_2: Ettha ca cīvare āyāmato vitthārato ca sibbitvā anuvātato bahi nikkhamitasuttaṃ cīvaraṃ rajitvā sukkhāpanakāle
tika-vin08t0:184_3: rajjuyā vā cīvaravaṃse vā bandhitvā olambituṃ anuvāte bandhasuttāni ca kaṇṇasuttāni nāma.
tika-vin08t0:184_6: yaṃ pana ‘anujānāmi bhikkhave kaṇṇasuttaka’nti evaṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:184_7: taṃ anuvāte pāsakaṃ katvā bandhitabbaṃ rajanakāle lagganatthāyā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:185_0: Sūcikammavikāraṃ vāti cīvaramaṇḍanatthāya nānāsuttakehi satapadisadisaṃ sibbantā āgantukapaṭṭaṃ ṭhapenti,
tika-vin08t0:185_2: Aññaṃ vā pana kiñcipīti aññampi yaṃ kiñci mālākammamigapakkhipadādikaṃ sibbanavikāraṃ.
tika-vin08t0:186_0: Yo bhikkhu paraṃ uttamaṃ vaṇṇamaṭṭhamabhipatthayanto kañjikapiṭṭhakhaliallikādīsu cīvaraṃ pakkhipati,
tika-vin08t0:186_1: tassa pana bhikkhuno dukkaṭā mokkho na vijjatīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:186_7: Cīvarassa karaṇe karaṇakāle samuṭṭhitānaṃ sūcihatthamalādīnaṃ kiliṭṭhakāle dhovanatthañca kañjikapiṭṭhakhaliallikādīsu pakkhipati,
tika-vin08t0:187_1: tasmiṃ rajane cīvarassa sugandhabhāvatthāya gandhaṃ vā ujjalabhāvatthāya telaṃ vā vaṇṇatthāya lākhaṃ vā.
tika-vin08t0:187_4: Aññenapi ca kenacīti yena ujjalaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:187_6: Doṇiyāti rajanambaṇe na ghaṃsitabbaṃ hatthena gāhāpetvā na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:187_7: Rattaṃ cīvaraṃ hatthehi kiñci thokaṃ paharituṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:187_10: Tattha aṃsabaddhakakāyabandhanādiṃ ghaṭṭetuṃ vaṭṭatīti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:189_1: Patte vā thālake vātiādīsu thālaketi tambādimaye puggalike tividhepi kappiyathālake.
tika-vin08t0:189_5: maṇivaṇṇaṃ pana pattaṃ aññena kataṃ labhitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:189_7: “Na bhikkhave vicitrāni pattamaṇḍalāni dhāretabbāni rūpakākiṇṇāni bhittikammakatānī”ti vuttattā “bhittikammaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:189_10: makaradantakaṃ chinditu”nti vuttattā “makaradantakaṃ pana vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:190_0: “Thālakassa ca pattassa, bahi antopi vā pana;
tika-vin08t0:191_0: Āraggena katā lekhā, na ca vaṭṭati kācipi.
tika-vin08t0:192_0: “Āropetvā bhamaṃ pattaṃ, majjitvā ce pacanti ca;
tika-vin08t0:198_2: Kācipi lekhāti vaṭṭakagomuttādisaṇṭhānā yā kācipi rāji.
tika-vin08t0:198_4: Pattamaṇḍalaketi patte chavirakkhaṇatthāya tipusīsādīhi kate pattassa heṭṭhā ādhārādīnaṃ upari kātabbe pattamaṇḍalake.
tika-vin08t0:199_1: lekhā na vaṭṭatīti āraggena dinnalekhā na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:199_3: Chattamukhavaṭṭiyanti dhamakaraṇassa hatthena gahaṇatthaṃ katassa chattākārassa mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:201_0: Kucchiyaṃ vā ṭhapetvā taṃ, lekhaṃ tu mukhavaṭṭiya”nti. –
tika-vin08t0:202_1: Taṭṭīkāyaṃ pana “mukhavaṭṭiyā yā lekhā parissāvanabandhanatthāya anuññātā,
tika-vin08t0:202_2: taṃ lekhaṃ ṭhapetvā dhamakaraṇacchatte vā kucchiyaṃ vā kāci lekhā na vaṭṭatīti yojanā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:203_5: Ekameva vaṭṭatīti ettha ekarajjukaṃ dviguṇatiguṇaṃ katvā bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:203_6: ekameva pana satavārampi sarīraṃ parikkhipitvā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:203_7: “Bahurajjuke ekato katvā ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ bahurajjukanti na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:203_8: taṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā taṃ murajasaṅkhaṃ na gacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:203_9: Murajañhi nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ veṭhetvā karonti.
tika-vin08t0:203_10: Idaṃ pana murajaṃ maddavīṇasaṅkhātaṃ pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānañca dasāsu vaṭṭati “kāyabandhanassa dasā jīranti.
tika-vin08t0:204_0: Vidheti dasāpariyosāne thirabhāvāya dantavisāṇasuttādīhi kate vidhe.
tika-vin08t0:204_1: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “kāyabandhanassa pāsante dasāmūle tassa thirabhāvatthaṃ kattabbe dantavisāṇādimaye vidhe”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:204_7: Paricchedalekhāmattanti dantādīhi katassa vidhassa ubhosu koṭīsu kātabbaparicchedarājimattaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:205_0: “Suttaṃ vā diguṇaṃ katvā, koṭṭenti ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
tika-vin08t0:214_0: Vikārarūpaṃ yaṃ kiñci, na vaṭṭati dasāmukhe.
tika-vin08t0:215_0: “Ujukaṃ macchakaṇṭaṃ vā, maṭṭhaṃ vā pana paṭṭikaṃ;
tika-vin08t0:220_0: Rajjuyo ca na vaṭṭanti, purimā dvedasā siyuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:222_0: Ekā dviticatasso vā, vaṭṭanti na tato paraṃ.
tika-vin08t0:224_0: Tañca pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ, ekampi ca na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:232_0: Vinayasāratthasandīpaniyampi tahiṃ tahinti paṭṭikāya tattha tattha.
tika-vin08t0:232_2: Antesu daḷhatthāya dasāmukhe diguṇaṃ katvā koṭṭenti,
tika-vin08t0:232_6: Tatthāti kāyabandhane na vaṭṭatīti kā kathā.
tika-vin08t0:233_2: Yaṃ kiñci vikārarūpaṃ dasāmukhe na vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:233_3: Ettha ca ubhayapassesu macchakaṇṭakayuttaṃ macchassa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ viya yassā paṭṭikāya vāyanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:234_9: Muddikakāyabandhanaṃ nāma caturassaṃ akatvā sajjitanti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:235_2: Sikkhābhājanavinicchaye pana “bahukā rajjuyo ekato katvā ekāya rajjuyā veṭhita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:235_8: Na vaṭṭantīti murajādīni imāni sabbāni kāyabandhanāni na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t0:235_10: “Dasāsu siyu”nti vattabbe gāthābandhavasena vaṇṇalopena “dasā siyu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:236_1: Ekarajjumayanti nānāvaṭṭe ekato vaṭṭetvā kataṃ rajjumayaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti “rajjukā dussapaṭṭādī”ti ettha ekavaṭṭarajjukā gahitā.
tika-vin08t0:236_2: Idha pana nānāvaṭṭe ekato vaṭṭetvā katā ekāva rajju gahitā.
tika-vin08t0:236_3: Tañcāti taṃ vā nayampi ekarajjukakāyabandhanaṃ pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānena ganthitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:236_4: Ekampi ca na vaṭṭatīti kevalampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:237_1: Vaṭṭati bandhitunti murajaṃ kalābukañca na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:237_3: Ayaṃ pana vinicchayo “bahurajjuke ekato katvā ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ bahurajjukanti na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:237_5: Sikkhābhājanavinicchaye “bahurajjuyo ekato katvā ekāya veṭhitaṃ murajaṃ nāmā”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:238_6: Kāyabandhanavidheti kāyabandhanassa dasāya thirabhāvatthaṃ kaṭṭhadantādīhi kate vidhe.
tika-vin08t0:238_8: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne. Tu-
tika-vin08t0:238_9: saddena ghaṭākāropi vaṭṭatīti dīpetīti attho pakāsito,
tika-vin08t0:239_1: Añjaniyaṃ “ujukamevā”ti vuttattā caturassādisaṇṭhānāpi vaṅkagatikā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:241_0: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhūnaṃ, añjanī janarañjanī.
tika-vin08t0:243_0: Vaḷañjantassa bhikkhussa, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin08t0:244_0: “Vaṭṭā vā caturassā vā, aṭṭhaṃsā vāpi añjanī;
tika-vin08t0:249_0: Yaṃ kiñci pana sibbetvā, vaḷañjantassa vaṭṭatī”ti. –
tika-vin08t0:251_1: cittitāti mālākammalatākammehi ca migapakkhirūpādinānārūpehi ca vicittitā.
tika-vin08t0:251_6: Añjanīsalākāpi tathā vaṇṇamaṭṭhā na vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:251_7: Añjanīthavikāya ca nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi cittakammaṃ na vaṭṭatīti pāṭho yujjati,
tika-vin08t0:251_10: “Pītādinā yena kenaci ekavaṇṇena suttena pilotikādimayaṃ kiñcipi sipāṭikaṃ sibbetvā vaḷañjantassa vaṭṭatīti yojanā”ti āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:252_8: Imasmiṃ adhikāre avuttattā lekhaniyaṃ yaṃ kiñci vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:252_9: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “kuñcikāya senāsanaparikkhārattā suvaṇṇarūpiyamayāpi vaṭṭatīti chāyā dissati.
tika-vin08t0:252_10: ‘Kuñcikāya vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammaṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti vacanato aññe kappiyalohādimayāva kuñcikā kappanti pariharaṇīyaparikkhārattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:253_1: Tasmā taṃ vaṭṭatīti iminā aññampi vikāraṃ daḷhīkammādiatthāya karonti,
tika-vin08t0:253_4: tena ca kattaradaṇḍakoṭiyaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭanena saddaniccharaṇatthāya katavalayādikaṃ avuttampi yato upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:253_7: tena kattarayaṭṭhikoṭiyaṃ katavalayānaṃ aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanena saddaniccharaṇaṃ dīghajātikādiparissayavinodanatthaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:255_0: Ṭhapetuṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin08t0:257_0: Valitvā ca nakhacchedaṃ, karontīti hi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:258_7: Yathāha “pipphalikepi maṇikaṃ vā piḷakaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:258_9: Paricchedalekhāmattanti āṇibandhanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā paricchindanatthaṃ ekāva lekhā vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin08t0:258_10: Valitvāti ubhayakoṭimukhaṃ katvā majjhe valiyo gāhetvā nakhacchedaṃ yasmā karonti,
tika-vin08t0:259_0: Uttarāraṇiyaṃ maṇḍalanti uttarāraṇiyā pavesanatthaṃ āvāṭamaṇḍalaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:259_2: Ettha ca ujukamevāti iminā vaṅkaṃ katvā bandhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti,
tika-vin08t0:259_5: vāsidaṇḍassa ubhosu passesu daṇḍakoṭīnaṃ acalanatthaṃ bandhitunti attho.
tika-vin08t0:259_6: Kappiyalohena caturassaṃ vā aṭṭhaṃsaṃ vā kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:260_1: Āmaṇḍasāraketi āmalakaphalāni pisitvā tena kakkena katatelabhājane.
tika-vin08t0:260_2: Tattha kira pakkhittaṃ telaṃ sītaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:262_0: Mālākammādi yaṃ kiñci, vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:264_0: Dvīsu passesu lohena, bandhituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:266_0: Vaṭṭalekhāva vaṭṭanti, ekā vā dvepi heṭṭhato.
tika-vin08t0:269_0: Ṭīkāyampi araṇisahite bhantakiccakaro daṇḍo uttarāraṇī nāma.
tika-vin08t0:269_7: Dantakaṭṭhānaṃ chedanavāsiyā tathā yaṃ kiñci vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭatīti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:269_10: Bandhituṃ vaṭṭatīti ujukameva vā caturassaṃ vā aṭṭhaṃsaṃ vā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:269_20: Sabbaṃ vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭatīti pumitthirūparahitaṃ mālākammādi sabbaṃ vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭatīti āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:270_4: Telabhājanesuyeva itthipurisarūpānaṃ paṭikkhipitattā telabhājanena saha agaṇetvā visuṃ mañcādīnaṃ gahitattā cāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:270_6: etesaṃ pana mañcādīnaṃ hatthena āmasitabbabhaṇḍattā itthirūpamettha na vaṭṭatīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:270_9: atha kho uccāvacāni na dhāretabbānīti paṭikkhepābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:270_10: Kevalañhi tāni “anujānāmi bhikkhave vidhūpanañca tālavaṇṭañcā”tiādinā vuttāni.
tika-vin08t0:277_1: Evaṃ samaṇaparikkhāresu kappiyākappiyaṃ kathetvā idāni senāsane kathetuṃ “senāsane panā”tyādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:277_6: Yadi evaṃ kismiñci paṭisedhetabbe santepi tathā vattabbaṃ siyāti āha “senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:284_2: Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammavinayavaṇṇanaṭṭhāne ratanamaṇḍape karonti phalikatthambhe ratanadāmapaṭimaṇḍite.
tika-vin08t0:284_3: Tattha sabbupakaraṇāni bhikkhūnaṃ paṭijaggituṃ vaṭṭantī”ti āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:284_4: Tassā vaṇṇanāyaṃ pana vimativinodaniyaṃ “sabbakappiyoti yathāvuttasuvaṇṇādimayānaṃ senāsanaparikkhārānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:284_7: ‘Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammavinayavaṇṇanaṭṭhāne’ti vuttattā saṅghikameva suvaṇṇamayaṃ senāsanaṃ senāsanaparikkhārā ca vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin08t0:285_1: kavāṭāni mañcapīṭhāni tālavaṇṭāni suvaṇṇarajatamayapānīyaghaṭapānīyasarāvāni yaṃ kiñci cittakammakataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:285_3: Pāsādassa dāsidāsaṃ khettaṃ vatthuṃ gomahiṃsaṃ demāti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:285_6: Gonakādīni saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vā mañcapīṭhesu attharitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin08t0:285_9: Tassā vaṇṇanāyaṃ pana vimativinodaniyaṃ “suvaṇṇarajatādivicitrānīti saṅghikasenāsanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:285_10: puggalikaṃ pana suvaṇṇādivicitraṃ bhikkhussa sampaṭicchitumeva na vaṭṭati ‘na tvevāhaṃ bhikkhave kenaci
tika-vin08t0:285_12: tenevettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vā’ti na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:286_0: Tasmiṃyeva khandhake aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sacepi rājarājamahāmattādayo ekappahāreneva mañcasataṃ vā mañcasahassaṃ vā denti,
tika-vin08t0:286_4: Tassā vaṇṇanāyaṃyeva vimativinodaniyaṃ “kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbāti iminā suvaṇṇādivicittaṃ akappiyamañcaṃ
tika-vin08t0:286_7: na puggalassa khettādi viyāti daṭṭhabba”nti vaṇṇitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:286_8: tasmā bhagavato āṇaṃ sampaṭicchantehi lajjipesalabahussutasikkhākāmabhūtehi bhikkhūhi suṭṭhu manasikātabbamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:287_0: Nanu ca senāsane viruddhasenāsanaṃ nāma paṭisedhetabbaṃ atthi,
tika-vin08t0:287_1: atha kasmā “senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthī”ti vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “aññatra viruddhasenāsanā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:287_3: viruddhasenāsanā viruddhasenāsanaṃ aññatra ṭhapetvā aññaṃ vaṇṇamaṭṭhakammādikammaṃ sandhāya senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:287_5: Yadi evaṃ taṃ viruddhasenāsanaṃ ācariyena vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:287_9: Rājavallabhehīti lajjipesalānaṃ uposathādiantarāyakarā alajjino bhinnaladdhikā ca bhikkhū adhippetā tehi saha uposathādikaraṇāyogato.
tika-vin08t0:287_11: Tesaṃ lajjiparisāti tesaṃ sīmassāmikānaṃ anubalaṃ dātuṃ samatthā lajjiparisā.
tika-vin08t0:287_12: Bhikkhūhi katanti yaṃ alajjīnaṃ senāsanabhedanādikaṃ lajjibhikkhūhi kataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:288_14: baddhasīmāyeva bhikkhūnaṃ kiriyāya siddhattā tāsaṃyeva te sāmikā.
tika-vin08t0:288_19: Apica gāmasīmāya aññesaṃ senāsanakaraṇassa paṭisedhitumayuttattā sattabbhantaraudakukkhepasīmānañca sabbadā
tika-vin08t0:289_1: anupavajjoti idaṃ sabbamattikāmayakuṭī viya sabbathā anupayogārahaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:294_1: Evaṃ parikkhāravinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni bhesajjakaraṇaparittapaṭisanthārānaṃ vinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “bhesajjā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:294_2: Tattha bhisakkassa idaṃ kammaṃ bhesajjaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
tika-vin08t0:294_11: Tattha yo vinicchayo mātikāyaṃ “bhesajjakaraṇampi ca parittaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:294_16: Atha vā sahadhamme niyuttā sahadhammikā, tesaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:294_19: Etena dussīlānaṃ bhinnaladdhikānañca akātumpi labbhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:295_0: Ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato vāti attano vā tesaṃ vā ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato.
tika-vin08t0:295_4: Sā hi ananuññātattā katāpi akatā viyāti akataviññatti,
tika-vin08t0:295_5: ‘vadeyyātha bhante yenattho’ti evaṃ akataṭṭhāne viññatti akataviññattīti likhita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:295_6: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “gilānassa atthāya appavāritaṭṭhānato viññattiyā anuññātattā katāpi akatā viyāti akataviññatti,
tika-vin08t0:295_7: ‘vada bhante paccayenā’ti evaṃ akatapavāraṇaṭṭhāne ca viññatti akataviññattī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:296_2: Akātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha dukkaṭanti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:296_5: Sabbaṃ parikammaṃ anāmasantenāti mātugāmasarīrādīnaṃ anāmāsattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:296_6: Yāva ñātakā na passantīti yāva tassa ñātakā na passanti.
tika-vin08t0:296_7: “Titthiyabhūtānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ sahatthā dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:297_3: Nappahontīti kātuṃ na sakkontīti ṭīkāsu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:297_4: “Tesaṃyeva santakaṃ bhesajjaṃ gahetvā kevalaṃ yojetvā dātabba”nti vatvā “sace pana nappahonti yācanti ca,
tika-vin08t0:297_6: tumhākaṃ paṭidassāmā”ti vuttattā pana tesaṃ bhesajjassa appahonakattā bhesajjameva yācantīti aṭṭhakathādhippāyo dissati,
tika-vin08t0:297_11: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “ābhogaṃ katvāti idaṃ kattabbakaraṇadassanavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:297_12: ābhogaṃ pana akatvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti tīsu gaṇṭhipadesu likhita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:297_15: Vuttañhi tattha keci pana “ābhogaṃ akatvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:297_18: āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti evaṃ antarāpattidassanavasena sāmaññato paṭikkhittattā,
tika-vin08t0:297_19: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avuttappakārena karontassa sutteneva āpattisiddhāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin08t0:298_0: Ete dasa ñātake ṭhapetvāti tesaṃ puttanattādayopi tappaṭibaddhattā ñātakā evāti tepi ettheva saṅgahitā.
tika-vin08t0:298_1: Tena aññesanti iminā aññātakānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:298_6: “tāvakālikaṃ dassāmī”ti ābhogaṃ akatvā dentassapi pana antarāpattidukkaṭaṃ vinā micchājīvanaṃ vā kuladūsanaṃ vā na hotiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:298_7: Tenāha “vejjakammaṃ vā kuladūsakāpatti vā na hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:298_10: Sāratthadīpaniyampi “mayhaṃ dassanti karissantīti paccāsāya karontassapi yācitvā gahetabbaṭṭhānatāya
tika-vin08t0:298_11: ñātakesu vejjakammaṃ vā kuladūsakāpatti vā na hotīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:298_12: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “vejjakammaṃ vā kuladūsakāpatti vā na hotīti vacanato yāva sattamo kulaparivaṭṭo,
tika-vin08t0:298_13: tāva bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:298_14: Sabbapadesu vinicchayo veditabboti “cūḷamātuyā”tiādīsu sabbapadesu cūḷamātuyā sāmikotiādinā yojetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:299_0: Upajjhāyassa āharāmāti idaṃ upajjhāyena mama ñātakānaṃ bhesajjaṃ āharathāti āṇattehi kattabbavidhidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:299_1: Iminā ca sāmaṇerādīnaṃ apaccāsāyapi parajanassa bhesajjakaraṇaṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:299_4: Apaccāsīsantenāti āgantukacorādīnaṃ karontenapi manussā nāma upakārakā hontīti attano tehi lābhaṃ apatthayantena,
tika-vin08t0:299_5: paccāsāya karontassa pana vejjakammakuladūsanādinā doso hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:299_6: Evañhi upakāre kate sāsanassa guṇaṃ ñatvā pasīdanti,
tika-vin08t0:299_7: saṅghassa vā upakārakā hontīti karaṇe pana doso natthi.
tika-vin08t0:299_8: Keci pana “apaccāsīsantena āgantukādīnaṃ paṭikkhittapuggalānampi dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:299_9: taṃ na yuttaṃ kattabbākattabbaṭṭhānavibhāgassa niratthakattappasaṅgato apaccāsīsantena “sabbesampi dātuṃ
tika-vin08t0:299_12: antarāpattiyā muccanatthaṃ āgantukacorādīnaṃ anuññātānaṃ dāneneva tāya āpattiyā muccanatoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:300_1: Teneva apaccāsīsantenapi akātabbaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “saddhaṃ kula”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:300_2: “Bhesajjaṃ ācikkhathā”ti vuttepi “aññamaññaṃ pana kathā kātabbā”ti idaṃ pariyāyattā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:300_3: Evaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena idañcidañca gahetvā karontīti iminā pariyāyena kathentassapi nevatthi dosoti ācariyā.
tika-vin08t0:300_4: Pucchantīti iminā diṭṭhadiṭṭharogīnaṃ pariyāyenapi vatvā vicaraṇaṃ ayuttanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:300_5: Pucchitassapi pana paccāsīsantassa pariyāyakathāpi na vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:300_6: Samullapesīti apaccāsīsanto eva aññamaññaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
tika-vin08t0:300_7: Ācariyabhāgoti vinayācāraṃ akopetvā bhesajjācikkhaṇena vejjācariyabhāgo ayanti atthoti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:301_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “vinayalakkhaṇaṃ ajānantassa anācariyassa tadanurūpavohārāsambhavato īdisassa
tika-vin08t0:301_1: lābhassa uppatti nāma natthīti ‘ācariyabhāgo nāma aya’nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:301_2: Vinaye pakataññunā ācariyena labhitabbabhāgo ayanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:301_5: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “pupphapūjanatthāyapi sampaṭicchiyamānaṃ rūpiyaṃ attano santakattabhajanena nissaggiyamevāti āha ‘kappiyavasena gāhāpetvā’ti.
tika-vin08t0:301_7: pupphapūjanatthaṃ pupphaṃ vaṭṭatī’tiādinā paṭikkhipitvā kappiyena kammena gāhāpetvāti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:301_9: ‘Pūjaṃ akāsī’ti vuttattā sayaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:302_1: Evaṃ bhesajjakaraṇavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni parittakaraṇavinicchayaṃ kathetumāha “paritte panā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:302_3: bhesajjakaraṇaṃ viya gihikammaṃ viya ca hotīti “na kātabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:302_4: “Parittaṃ bhaṇathā”ti vutte pana dhammajjhesanattā anajjhiṭṭhenapi bhaṇitabbo dhammo,
tika-vin08t0:302_6: cāletvā suttaṃ parimajjitvāti parittaṃ karontena kātabbavidhiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:302_7: Cāletvā suttaṃ parimajjitvāti idaṃ vā “parittāṇaṃ ettha pavesemī”ti cittena evaṃ kate parittāṇā ettha pavesitā nāma hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:302_9: dukkaṭanti idaṃ aññātake gahaṭṭhe sandhāya vuttanti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:302_10: Pādesu udakaṃ ākiritvāti idaṃ tasmiṃ dese cārittavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:302_11: Tattha hi pāḷiyā nisinnānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pādesu rogavūpasamanādiatthāya udakaṃ siñcitvā parittaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin08t0:303_0: Matasarīradassane viya kevale susānadassanepi idaṃ jātānaṃ sattānaṃ vayagamanaṭṭhānanti maraṇasaññā uppajjatīti āha “sīvathikadassane…pe…
tika-vin08t0:303_2: Lesakappaṃ akatvā samuppannasuddhacittena “parivāratthāya āgacchantū”ti vuttepi gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:303_3: Etena asubhadassananti vacanamattena lesakappaṃ katvā evaṃ gate matassa ñātakā pasīdissanti,
tika-vin08t0:303_6: upaṭṭhākaṃ labhissāmāti asuddhacittena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:303_7: Kammaṭṭhānasīsena pana “maraṇassatiṃ labhissāmā”tiādinā suddhacittena pakkositepi apakkositepi gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:303_8: Tālapaṇṇassa parittalekhanaṭṭhānattā parittasuttassa parittakaraṇasaññāṇattā tāni disvā amanussā parittasaññāya
tika-vin08t0:303_9: apakkamantīti āha “tālapaṇṇaṃ pana parittasuttaṃ vā hatthe vā pāde vā bandhitabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:304_0: Ettha ca ādito paṭṭhāya yāva “āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ vā bhaṇitabba”nti ettakoyeva vinayaṭṭhakathābhato pāḷimuttaparittakaraṇavinicchayo,
tika-vin08t0:304_4: tathāpi so suttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatovāti taṃ dassetuṃ “idha pana āṭānāṭiyasuttassa parikammaṃ veditabba”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:304_7: Dīghanikāye pāthikavagge āgatassa āṭānāṭiyaparittassa parikammaṃ evaṃ veditabbanti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:305_7: nisīditabbanti iminā parittakārakassa bhikkhuno mettākaruṇāvasena cittavisuddhipi icchitabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:305_8: Evañhi sati upari vakkhamānaubhayato rakkhāsaṃvidhānena sameti.
tika-vin08t0:305_11: Na hi “kāyasuddhimattena amanussānaṃ piyo hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:306_5: Evañhi amanussā parittakārakassa antarāyaṃ kātuṃ na visahanti.
tika-vin08t0:306_6: Maṅgalakathā vattabbāti amanussānaṃ tosanatthāya paṇṇākāraṃ katvā mahāmaṅgalakathā kathetabbā.
tika-vin08t0:306_7: Evaṃ upari vakkhamānena “tuyhaṃ paṇṇākāratthāya mahāmaṅgalakathā vuttā”ti vacanena sameti.
tika-vin08t0:306_9: Sabbasannipātoti tasmiṃ vihāre tasmiṃ gāmakkhette sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannipāto ghosetabbo “cetiyaṅgaṇe sabbehi sannipatitabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:306_10: Anāgantuṃnāma na labhatīti amanusso buddhāṇābhayena rājāṇābhayena anāgantuṃ na labhati catunnaṃ mahārājūnaṃ āṇāṭṭhāniyattā.
tika-vin08t0:306_11: Gahitakāpadesena amanussova pucchito hotīti “amanussagahitako ‘tvaṃ ko nāmo’ti pucchitabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:307_1: Vuttañhi āṭānāṭiyasutte “imesaṃ yakkhānaṃ mahāyakkhānaṃ senāpatīnaṃ mahāsenāpatīnaṃ ujjhāpetabba”ntiādi.
tika-vin08t0:307_6: Ṭīkāyaṃ “parittaṃ bhaṇitabbanti etthāpi ‘mettacittaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā’ti ca ‘maṅgalakathā vattabbā’ti
tika-vin08t0:307_7: ca ‘vihārassa upavane’ti ca evamādi sabbaṃ gihīnaṃ parittakaraṇe vuttaṃ parikammaṃ kātabbamevā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:307_8: evaṃ sati aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “etaṃ tāva gihīnaṃ parikamma”nti vatvā “sace pana bhikkhū”tiādinā visesatthajotakena pana-
tika-vin08t0:307_9: saddena saha vuccamānaṃ “idaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ parikamma”nti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ viya hoti.
tika-vin08t0:307_10: Avisese hi sati bhedo kātabbo na siyā.
tika-vin08t0:307_12: tasmā gihīnaṃ parittakaraṇe vuttaparikamme asampajjamānepi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti no mati.
tika-vin08t0:308_0: Idaṃ pana idha āgataṃ āṭānāṭiyasuttaparikammaṃ sutvā “idaṃ suttaṃ amanussānaṃ amanāpaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:308_1: sajjhāyantassa parittaṃ karontassa amanussā antarāyaṃ kareyyu”nti maññamānā porāṇā catūhi mahārājehi
tika-vin08t0:308_2: ārocitaṃ sabbaññubuddhena desitaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ dīghanikāye āgataṃ āṭānāṭiyasuttaṃ pahāya mūlasuttato gāthāchakkameva
tika-vin08t0:308_3: gahetvā avasesaṃ sabbaṃ suttaṃ ṭhapetvā aññagāthāyo pakkhipitvā “āṭānāṭiyaparitta”nti ṭhapesuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:308_4: tampi parittaṃ amūlabhūtattā ekenākārena dhāretuṃ asakkontā keci saṃkhittena dhārenti,
tika-vin08t0:308_8: keci bhikkhū taṃmissakaparittampi maṅgalakaraṇakālādīsu vattumavisahantā taṃ ṭhapetvā aññasuttāniyeva bhaṇanti,
tika-vin08t0:308_10: Cattāropi mahārājāno imaṃ āṭānāṭiyaṃ rakkhaṃ saṃvidahamānā buddhasāsane amanussānaṃ pasādāya,
tika-vin08t0:308_15: tesaṃ pasādāya uggaṇhātu bhante bhagavā āṭānāṭiyaṃ rakkhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ guttiyā rakkhāya avihiṃsāya phāsuvihārāyā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:309_0: Sammāsambuddhenapi imassa suttassa nigamane “uggaṇhātha bhikkhave āṭānāṭiyaṃ rakkhaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:309_3: atthasaṃhitā bhikkhave āṭānāṭiyā rakkhā bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ guttiyā rakkhāya
tika-vin08t0:309_4: avihiṃsāya phāsuvihārāyā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ dhāraṇaṃ uyyojitaṃ ānisaṃsañca pakāsitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:309_5: Aṭṭhakathācariyehi ca “buddhabhāsite ekakkharampi ekapadampi apanetabbaṃ nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:309_6: tasmā catūhi mahārājehi saṃvidahitaṃ sammāsambuddhena āhaccabhāsitaṃ tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhaṃ pakatiāṭānāṭiyasuttameva dhāretuṃ sajjhāyituñca yuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:309_7: na bhagavatā abhāsitaṃ tisso saṅgītiyo anāruḷhaṃ missakasuttanti.
tika-vin08t0:309_8: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ idaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaparikammaṃ pana pakatisajjhāyanavācanādiṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathācariyehi na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:309_9: atha kho gahaṭṭhaṃ vā pabbajitaṃ vā amanussehi gahitakāle mocāpanatthāya lokiyehi mantaṃ viya bhaṇanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:309_10: Vuttañhi tattha “amanussagahitako tvaṃ ko nāmosīti pucchitabbo”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:310_0: Āṭānāṭiyā rakkhā ca nāma na sakalasuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:310_1: atha kho “vipassissa ca namatthū”ti padaṃ ādiṃ katvā catunnaṃ mahārājūnaṃ vasena catukkhattuṃ āgataṃ
tika-vin08t0:310_2: “jinaṃ vandāma gotama”nti padaṃ pariyosānaṃ katvā vuttasuttekadesoyeva.
tika-vin08t0:310_4: “Atha kho vessavaṇo mahārājā bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā imaṃ āṭānāṭiyaṃ rakkhaṃ abhāsī”ti ārabhitvā
tika-vin08t0:310_5: yathāvuttasuttekadesassa avasāne “ayaṃ kho mārisā āṭānāṭiyā rakkhā”ti niyyātitattā.
tika-vin08t0:310_6: Tasmā yathā nāma byagghādayo attano bhakkhaṃ vilumpantānaṃ balavaduṭṭhacittā bhavanti,
tika-vin08t0:310_7: evaṃ attanā gahitamanussaṃ mocāpentānaṃ amanussā paduṭṭhacittā honti.
tika-vin08t0:310_8: Iti tathā mocāpetuṃ āraddhakāle bhikkhūnaṃ parissayavinodanatthaṃ imaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaparikammaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyehi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:311_4: Anāmaṭṭho ca so piṇḍapāto cāti tathā,
tika-vin08t0:311_7: Sacepi kahāpaṇagghanako hotīti iminā dāyakehi bahubyañjanena sampādetvā sakkaccaṃ dinnabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:311_9: evaṃ sakkaccaṃ saddhāya dinnaṃ mahagghabhojanampi mātāpitūnaṃ datvā saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:311_11: Mātādipañcakaṃyeva vatvā bhesajjakaraṇe viya aparesampi dasannaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti avuttattā aññesaṃ ñātakānampi pesetvā dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:311_12: “vihāraṃ sampattassa pana yassa kassaci āgantukassa vā”iccādivakkhamānattā vihāraṃ sampattānaṃ ñātakānampi āgantukasāmaññena dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ca.
tika-vin08t0:312_0: Āmisassa dhammassa ca alābhena attano parassa ca antare sambhavantassa chiddassa vivarassa paṭisantharaṇaṃ pidahanaṃ paṭisanthāro.
tika-vin08t0:312_7: Tena ca tabbidhurānaṃ samiddhānaṃ āgantukattepi dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:312_9: Ananuññātānaṃ pana apaccāsīsantenapi dātuṃ na vaṭṭati saddhādeyyavinipātattā,
tika-vin08t0:312_11: Ubbāsetvāti samantato tiyojanaṃ vilumpante manusse palāpetvā.
tika-vin08t0:317_1: Evaṃ bhesajjādivinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni viññattivinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “viññattīti yācanā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:317_6: Tatra viññattiyaṃ ayaṃ mayā vakkhamāno vinicchayo veditabboti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:317_7: Mūlacchejjāyāti parasantakabhāvato mocetvā attano eva santakakaraṇavasena.
tika-vin08t0:317_8: Evaṃ yācato aññātakaviññattidukkaṭañceva dāsapaṭiggahadukkaṭañca hoti “dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato
tika-vin08t0:317_10: Ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato pana dāsaṃ mūlacchejjāya yācantassa sādiyanavaseneva dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:317_15: suddhacittena pana hatthakammaṃ yācantassa āpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin08t0:317_18: sakiccapasutampi evaṃ kārāpentassa viññatti natthi eva,
tika-vin08t0:318_1: Mūlaṃ dethāti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti “mūlaṃ dassāmā”ti paṭhamaṃ vuttattā viññatti vā “mūla”nti vacanassa kappiyākappiyavatthusāmaññavacanattā
tika-vin08t0:318_2: akappiyavacanaṃ vā niṭṭhitabhatikiccānaṃ dāpanato akappiyavatthusādiyanaṃ vā na hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:318_3: Mūlacchejjāya vāti idaṃ idha thambhādīnaṃ dāsidāsādibhāvābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:319_2: cīvarādīni kārāpetukāmenātiādīsu cīvaraṃ kārāpetukāmassa aññātakaappavāritatantavāyehi hatthakammayācanavasena
tika-vin08t0:319_3: vāyāpane viññattipaccayā dukkaṭābhāvepi cīvaravāyāpanasikkhāpadena yathārahaṃ pācittiyadukkaṭāni hontīti
tika-vin08t0:319_5: Akappiyakahāpaṇādi na dātabbanti kappiyamukhena laddhampi tattha kammakaraṇatthāya imassa kahāpaṇaṃ dehīti vatvā “dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:319_6: Pubbe katakammassa dāpane kiñcāpi doso na dissati,
tika-vin08t0:319_8: Katakammatthāyapi kappiyavohārena pariyāyato bhatiṃ dāpentassa natthi doso,
tika-vin08t0:319_9: sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “akappiyakahāpaṇādi na dātabbanti kiñcāpi akappiyakahāpaṇādiṃ asādiyantena kappiyavohārato dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:319_11: manussā ca etassa santakaṃ kiñci atthīti viheṭhetabbaṃ maññantīti akappiyakahāpaṇādidānaṃ paṭikkhitta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:320_3: Kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paṭiggahetabbānīti sākhāya makkhikabījanena paṇṇādichede bījagāmakopanassa ceva tattha
tika-vin08t0:320_5: tadubhayāsaṅkāya asati tathā akaraṇe doso natthi.
tika-vin08t0:320_6: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paṭiggahetabbānīti sākhāya laggarajasmiṃ patte patitepi sākhaṃ
tika-vin08t0:320_7: chinditvā khāditukāmatāyapi sati sukhaparibhogatthaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:320_8: Nadiyādīsu udakassa apariggahitattā “āharāti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:320_10: neva vaṭṭatīti pariggahitudakattā viññattiyā dukkaṭaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:320_11: “Na āhaṭaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato viññattiyā āpannaṃ dukkaṭaṃ desetvāpi taṃ vatthuṃ paribhuñjantassa paribhoge paribhoge dukkaṭameva,
tika-vin08t0:321_0: “Alajjīhi pana bhikkhūhi vā sāmaṇerehi vā hatthakammaṃ na kāretabba”nti sāmaññato vuttattā attano atthāya yaṃ kiñci hatthakammaṃ kāretuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:321_1: Yaṃ pana alajjī nivāriyamānopi bījanādiṃ karoti,
tika-vin08t0:321_3: cetiyakammādīni pana tehi kārāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:321_5: na kāretabbanti idaṃ uttaribhaṅgādhikārattā ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:321_6: bāhiraparibhogesu pana alajjīhipi hatthakammaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:321_7: Ettha ca “alajjīhi sāmaṇerehī”ti vuttattā “sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti alajjilakkhaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena
tika-vin08t0:321_8: upasampanne paṭicca upalakkhaṇato vuttanti taṃlakkhaṇavirahitānaṃ sāmaṇerādīnaṃ liṅgatthenagotrabhupariyosānānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:321_9: bhikkhupaṭiññānaṃ dussīlānampi sādhāraṇavasena alajjilakkhaṇaṃ yathāṭhapitapaṭipattiyā atiṭṭhanamevāti
tika-vin08t0:322_4: Goṇañhi attano atthāya aviññattiyā laddhampi sādituṃ na vaṭṭati “hatthigavāssavaḷavapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:322_6: Ettha ca viññattidukkaṭābhāvepi akappiyavatthuyācanepi paṭiggahaṇepi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin08t0:322_9: Na sampaṭicchitabbanti attano atthāya gosādiyanassa paṭikkhittattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:323_1: Ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne pana vaṭṭatīti sakaṭassa sampaṭicchitabbattā mūlacchejjavasena yācituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:323_2: Tāvakālikaṃ vaṭṭatīti ubhayatthāpi vaṭṭatīti atthoti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:323_4: na vaṭṭatīti mūlacchejjavasena sakaṭaṃ dethāti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:323_5: Tāvakālikaṃ vaṭṭatīti tāvakālikaṃ katvā sabbattha yācituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:323_6: Vāsiādīni puggalikānipi vaṭṭantīti āha “esa nayo vāsī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:323_7: Valliādīsu ca parapariggahitesu esa nayoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:323_9: adinnādāne pana tiṇasalākaṃ upādāya parapariggahitaṃ theyyacittena gaṇhato avahāro eva,
tika-vin08t0:323_13: Tattha ca yasmiṃ padese haritālajātihiṅgulikādi appakampi mahagghaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:324_2: Parikathādīsu “senāsanaṃ sambādha”ntiādinā pariyāyena kathanaṃ parikathā nāma.
tika-vin08t0:324_3: Ujukameva akathetvā “bhikkhūnaṃ kiṃ pāsādo na vaṭṭatī”tiādinā adhippāyo yathā vibhūto hoti,
tika-vin08t0:324_5: Senāsanādiatthaṃ bhūmiparikammādikaraṇavasena paccayuppādāya nimittakaraṇaṃ nimittakammaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:324_8: Tathā uppannaṃ pana bhesajjaṃ roge vūpasante bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:324_10: Tattha vinayadharā “bhagavatā rogasīsena paribhogassa dvāraṃ dinnaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:329_1: Evaṃ viññattivinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni kulasaṅgahavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “kulasaṅgaho”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:330_3: Āḷiyā bandhananti yathā gacchamūle udakaṃ santiṭṭhati,
tika-vin08t0:330_6: tañca ārāmādiatthaṃ ropane akappiyavohāresupi kappiyavohāresupi kappiyaudakasiñcanādi vaṭṭatīti vakkhamānattā
tika-vin08t0:330_7: idhāpi vibhāgaṃ katvā kappiyaudakasiñcanādi visuṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:330_13: “yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā pācittiya”nti vacanato.
tika-vin08t0:330_17: Akappiyavohāre koṭṭanakhaṇanādivasena sayaṃ karaṇassapi kathaṃ saṅgahoti?
tika-vin08t0:330_18: Akappiyanti vohariyatīti akappiyavohāroti akappiyabhūtaṃ karaṇakārāpanādi sabbameva saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:330_21: Sukkhamātikāya ujukaraṇanti iminā purāṇapaṇṇādīnaṃ haraṇampi saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:330_22: Kudālādīni bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā ṭhānato hatthena gahetvā ṭhānameva pākaṭataranti “obhāso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:331_6: ye narā setukārakā”ti vacanato pana taṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:331_7: Akappiyavohārepi ekaccaṃ vaṭṭatīti dassetuṃ “na kevalañca sesa”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:331_8: Yaṃ kiñci mātikanti sukkhamātikaṃ vā asukkhamātikaṃ vā.
tika-vin08t0:331_9: Kappiyaudakaṃ siñcitunti iminā “kappiyaudakaṃ siñcathā”ti vattumpi vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:331_10: Sayaṃ ropetumpi vaṭṭatīti iminā “ropehī”ti vattumpi vaṭṭatītipi siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:333_5: kappiyavohārena vā akappiyavohārena vā siñcāpane dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:333_10: Āpattibahulatā veditabbāti ettha sayaṃ siñcane dhārāpacchedagaṇanāya āpattigaṇanā veditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:333_11: Siñcāpane pana punappunaṃ āṇāpentassa vācāya vācāya āpatti,
tika-vin08t0:335_4: vatthupūjādiatthāya vā vuttanayena karontassa kārāpentassa ca dukkaṭanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:335_8: Dhammāsanavitāne baddhakaṇṭakesu pupphāni vinivijjhitvā ṭhapentīti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:335_9: Uparūpari vijjhitvā chattasadisaṃ katvā āvuṇanato “chattādhichattaṃ viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:335_13: Pupphavijjhanatthaṃ kaṇṭakampi bandhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti imassa upalakkhaṇattā pupphadāmolambakādiatthāya rajjubandhanādipi na vaṭṭatīti keci vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:335_14: Aññe pana “pupphavijjhanatthaṃ kaṇṭakanti visesitattā tadatthaṃ kaṇṭakameva bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:335_22: Dhammarajju nāma cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā pupphappavesanatthaṃ āvijjhitvā bandharajju.
tika-vin08t0:335_23: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “dhammarajju nāma cetiyādīni parikkhipitvā tesañca rajjuyā ca antarā pupphappavesanatthāya bandharajju.
tika-vin08t0:335_24: Sithilavaṭṭitāya vā vaṭṭiyā abbhantare pupphappavesanatthāya evaṃ bandhātipi vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:336_2: Vākena vāti pupphanāḷaṃ phāletvā pupphena ekābaddhaṭṭhitavākena daṇḍena ca ekābaddheneva.
tika-vin08t0:336_3: Etena pupphaṃ bījagāmasaṅgahaṃ na gacchati pañcasu bījesu apaviṭṭhattā paṇṇaṃ viya,
tika-vin08t0:336_4: tasmā kappiyaṃ akārāpetvāpi vikopane doso natthi.
tika-vin08t0:336_6: tampi atitaruṇassa abhāvā vuḍḍhilakkhaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:336_7: pariṇatassa pana makuḷassa pattānaṃ sinehe pariyādānaṃ gate visuṃbhāvo eva vikāso,
tika-vin08t0:336_11: tampi tambulapaṇṇādīsu samānaṃ vuḍḍhilakkhaṇaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:336_12: Pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu ca na katthaci pupphānaṃ kappiyakaraṇaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:337_0: “Pasibbake viyā”ti vuttattā pupphaṃ pasibbake vā pasibbakasadisaṃ bandhe yattha katthaci cīvare vā pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:337_1: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “khandhe ṭhapitakāsāvassāti khandhe ṭhapitasaṅghāṭiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:337_3: Iminā ca aññampi tādisaṃ kāsāvaṃ vā vatthaṃ vā vuttanayena bandhitvā tattha pupphāni pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:337_4: Aṃsabhaṇḍikapasibbake pakkhittasadisattā veṭhimaṃ nāma na jātaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:337_5: tasmā sithilabandhassa antarantarā pakkhipitumpi vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:337_6: Heṭṭhā daṇḍakaṃ pana bandhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti rajjuādīhi bandhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:337_7: pupphasseva pana acchinnadaṇḍakehi bandhituṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t0:338_0: Pupphapaṭe ca daṭṭhabbanti pupphapaṭaṃ karontassa dīghato pupphadāmassa haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena pūraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:338_1: tiriyato haraṇaṃ pana vāyimaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:338_3: “Purimaṭṭhānaṃ atikkāmetī”ti sāmaññato vuttattā purimaṃ pupphakoṭiṃ phusāpetvā vā aphusāpetvā vā parikkhipanavasena atikkāmentassa āpattiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:338_4: Bandhituṃ vaṭṭatīti puppharahitāya suttavākakoṭiyā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:338_5: Ekavāraṃ haritvā parikkhipitvāti idaṃ pubbe vuttacetiyādiparikkhepaṃ pupphapaṭakaraṇañca sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:338_6: tasmā cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā parikkhipantena ekavāraṃ parikkhipitvā purimaṭṭhānaṃ sampatte aññassa dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:338_8: Pupphapaṭaṃ karontena ca haritvā aññassa dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:338_10: Sacepi dveyeva bhikkhū ubhosu passesu ṭhatvā pariyāyena haranti,
tika-vin08t0:339_3: Pupphāni ṭhapentenāti aganthitāni pākatikapupphāni aññamaññaṃ phusāpetvāpi ṭhapentena.
tika-vin08t0:339_4: Pupphadāmaṃ pana pūjanatthāya bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapentena phusāpetvā vā aphusāpetvā vā diguṇaṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:340_3: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “ghaṭikadāmaolambakoti ante ghaṭikākārayutto yamakadāmaolambako”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:340_5: ekekaṃ pana dāmaṃ nikkhantasuttakoṭiyāva bandhitvā olambituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:340_6: pupphadāmadvayaṃ saṅghaṭitukāmenapi nikkhantasuttakoṭiyāva suttakoṭiṃ saṅghaṭituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:340_7: Aḍḍhacandākārena mālāguṇaparikkhepoti aḍḍhacandākārena mālāguṇassa punappunaṃ haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena pūretvā parikkhipanaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:340_9: tasmā etampi aḍḍhacandākāraṃ punappunaṃ haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena pūretuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:340_10: Ekavāraṃ pana aḍḍhacandākārakaraṇe mālāguṇaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:340_11: Pupphadāmakaraṇanti ettha suttakoṭiyaṃ gahetvāpi ekato kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:340_13: geṇḍukakharapattadāmānaṃ paṭikkhittattā celādīhi katadāmampi na vaṭṭati akappiyānulomattāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:340_15: dukkaṭamevāti vissāsaggāhena parasantakaṃ gahetvā dentaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:341_1: Tañca kho vatthupūjanatthāyāti mātāpitūnampi pupphaṃ dentena vatthupūjanatthāyeva dātabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:341_2: “Maṇḍanatthāya pana sivaliṅgādipūjanatthāyā”ti ettakameva vuttattā “imaṃ vikkiṇitvā jīvissantī”ti mātāpitūnaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:341_4: Kassacipīti ñātakassa vā aññātakassa vā kassacipi.
tika-vin08t0:341_8: Sampattānaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti saṅghikassa lābhassa upacārasīmaṭṭhasāmaṇerānampi
tika-vin08t0:341_9: santakattā tesampi upaḍḍhabhāgo labbhatevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:341_14: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “vassaggena abhājanīyaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:341_15: Tattha tatthāti magge vā cetiyaṅgaṇe vā.
tika-vin08t0:342_1: Sāmaṇerehi dāpetuṃ na labhantīti idaṃ sāmaṇerehi gihikammaṃ kāritaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:342_2: na pana pupphadānaṃ hotīti sāmaṇerānampi na vaṭṭanato.
tika-vin08t0:342_4: Na hi taṃ pupphadānaṃ nāma siyā.
tika-vin08t0:342_5: Yadi hi tathā āgatānaṃ tesaṃ dānaṃ pupphadānaṃ nāma bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:342_8: Yāgubhattādīni ādāyāti idaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya yāgubhattādisampādanaṃ sandhāya vuttattā “na vaṭṭatī”ti avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:342_9: Avisesena vuttanti iminā sabbesampi na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:343_1: Vuttanayenevāti “mātāpitūnaṃ tāva haritvāpi harāpetvāpi pakkositvāpi pakkosāpetvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:343_5: vaṭṭatī”ti imaṃ pupphadāne vuttanayaṃ phaladānepi atidisati,
tika-vin08t0:343_6: tasmā phalampi mātāpitūnaṃ haraṇaharāpanādinā dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:343_9: issaravatāya dadato thullaccaya”nti imaṃ pupphadāne vuttanayaṃ phaladāne saṅkhipitvā dassento “kulasaṅgahatthāya panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:343_11: Phalaparicchedenāti “ettakāni phalāni dātabbānī”ti evaṃ phalaparicchedena vā.
tika-vin08t0:343_12: Rukkhaparicchedena vāti “imehi rukkhehi dātabbānī”ti evaṃ rukkhaparicchedena vā.
tika-vin08t0:343_14: ito gaṇhathā”ti vadantena kulasaṅgaho kato nāma hotīti āha “evaṃ pana na vattabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:343_17: Vuttanayenāti pupphaphalādīsu vuttanayena kulasaṅgaho hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:344_1: Tesaṃ tesaṃ gihīnaṃ gāmantaradesantarādīsu sāsanapaṭisāsanaharaṇaṃ jaṅghapesaniyaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:344_5: pade pade dukkaṭanti idaṃ “tassa sāsanaṃ ārocessāmī”ti iminā adhippāyena gamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:344_6: Tassa pana sāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sayameva kāruññe ṭhito gantvā attano patirūpaṃ sāsanaṃ āroceti, anāpatti.
tika-vin08t0:344_8: Imehi pana aṭṭhahi kuladūsakakammehīti pupphadānaṃ phaladānaṃ cuṇṇadānaṃ mattikadānaṃ dantakaṭṭhadānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:345_4: Bhutvā āgacchantassapi puna vuttanayeneva paṇidhāya cīvarasaṇṭhāpanādīni karontassa dukkaṭamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:350_1: Evaṃ kulasaṅgahavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni macchamaṃsavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “macchamaṃsesu panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:350_7: Macchamaṃsesu pana vinicchayo evaṃ veditabboti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:350_8: Macchaggahaṇenāti ettha niddhāraṇaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Pana-
tika-vin08t0:350_10: divāseyyādīsu vinicchayato aparo macchamaṃsesu vinicchayo veditabboti attho.
tika-vin08t0:350_11: Gayhate anenāti gahaṇaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Saddo,
tika-vin08t0:350_19: sesānaṃ vāḷamigattā bhikkhūnaṃ paribandhavimocanatthaṃ paṭikkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:351_0: Tikoṭiparisuddhanti diṭṭhasutaparisaṅkitasaṅkhātāhi tīhi koṭīhi tīhi ākārehi tīhi kāraṇehi parisuddhaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:351_3: Aparisaṅkitaṃ pana kathaṃ jānitabbanti āha “aparisaṅkitaṃ panā”tiādi,
tika-vin08t0:351_4: tīṇi parisaṅkitāni ñatvā tesaṃ paṭipakkhavasena aparisaṅkitaṃ jānitabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:351_5: Idāni tāni tīṇi parisaṅkitāni ca evaṃ parisaṅkite sati bhikkhūhi kattabbavidhiñca tena vidhinā aparisaṅkite
tika-vin08t0:351_9: Adisvā asutvā takkena anumānena parisaṅkitaṃ tadubhayavinimuttaparisaṅkitaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:351_10: Taṃ tividhampi parisaṅkitasāmaññena ekā koṭi hoti,
tika-vin08t0:351_12: Evaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ asutaṃ aparisaṅkitaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:352_2: Kappatīti yadi tesaṃ vacanena saṅkā nivattati, vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:352_3: na taṃ vacanaṃ lesakappaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:352_6: Pavattamaṃsanti āpaṇādīsu pavattaṃ vikkāyikaṃ vā matamaṃsaṃ vā.
tika-vin08t0:352_9: Bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāya akatanti ettha aṭṭhānappayutto eva- saddo,
tika-vin08t0:352_11: tasmā bhikkhūnañca maṅgalādīnañcāti missetvā katampi na vattatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:352_12: Keci pana “yathāṭhitavasena avadhāraṇaṃ gahetvā vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:352_14: Yattha ca nibbematiko hotīti bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya katepi sabbena sabbaṃ parisaṅkitābhāvamāha.
tika-vin08t0:353_5: Uddissa katamaṃsaparibhogato akappiyamaṃsaparibhoge visesaṃ dassetuṃ “akappiyamaṃsaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:353_9: “Paribhogakāle pucchitvā paribhuñjissāmīti vā gahetvā pucchitvāva paribhuñjitabba”nti vacanato akappiyamaṃsaṃ
tika-vin08t0:353_12: Vattanti vadantīti iminā āpatti natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:358_1: Evaṃ macchamaṃsavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni anāmāsavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “anāmāsa”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:358_7: Nadīsotena vuyhamānaṃ mātaranti etaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:358_8: Aññāsu pana itthīsu kāruññādhippāyena mātari vuttanayena paṭipajjantassa nevatthi dosoti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:358_9: “Mātara”nti vuttattā aññāsu na vaṭṭatīti vadantāpi atthi.
tika-vin08t0:358_10: Ettha gaṇhāhīti na vattabbāti gehassitapemena kāyappaṭibaddhena phusane dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:358_11: Kāruññena pana vatthādiṃ gahetuṃ asakkontiṃ “gaṇhāhī”ti vadantassapi avasabhāvappattito udake nimujjantiṃ
tika-vin08t0:358_12: kāruññena sahasā anāmāsanti acintetvā kesādīsu gahetvā mokkhādhippāyena ākaḍḍhatopi anāpattiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:358_13: Na hi mīyamānaṃ mātaraṃ upekkhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:358_15: Ukkaṭṭhāya mātuyāpi āmāso na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ “mātara”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:358_16: Tassa kātabbaṃ pana aññāsampi itthīnaṃ karontassapi anāpattiyeva anāmāsatte visesābhāvā.
tika-vin08t0:359_2: Tena tālapaṇṇādimayaṃ kaṭisuttakaṇṇapiḷandhanādi sabbaṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:359_8: Sīsapasādhanadantasūcīti idaṃ sīsālaṅkāratthāya paṭapilotikāhi katasīsapasādhanakañceva dantasūciādi cāti dve tayo.
tika-vin08t0:359_9: Sīsapasādhanaṃ sipāṭikopakaraṇatthāya ceva dantasūciṃ sūciupakaraṇatthāya ca gahetabbanti yathākkamaṃ atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:359_10: Kesakalāpaṃ bandhitvā tattha tiriyaṃ pavesanatthāya katā sūci eva sīsapasādhanakadantasūcīti ekameva
tika-vin08t0:359_11: katvā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharitabbasūciyeva tassa tassa kiccassa upakaraṇanti sipāṭikasūciupakaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:360_0: Potthakarūpanti sudhādīhi kataṃ pārājikavatthubhūtānaṃ tiracchānagatitthīnaṃ saṇṭhānena katampi anāmāsameva.
tika-vin08t0:360_1: Itthirūpāni dassetvā kataṃ vatthubhittiādiñca itthirūpaṃ anāmasitvā vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:360_2: Evarūpe hi anāmāse kāyasaṃsaggarāge asati kāyappaṭibaddhena āmasato doso natthi.
tika-vin08t0:360_3: Bhinditvāti ettha hatthena aggahetvāva kenaci daṇḍādinā bhinditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:360_4: Ettha ca anāmāsampi daṇḍapāsāṇādīhi bhedanassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā,
