tika-vin08t0:360_5: pāḷiyampi āpadāsu mokkhādhippāyassa āmasanepi anāpattiyā vuttattā ca sappiniādivāḷamigīhi gahitapāṇakānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:360_6: mocanatthāya taṃ taṃ sappiniādivatthuṃ daṇḍādīhi paṭikkhipitvā gahetuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:360_8: asakkontiṃ kesādīsu gahetvā kāruññena ukkhipituñca vaṭṭatīti ayamattho gahetabbova.
tika-vin08t0:360_9: “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘na tveva āmasitabbā’ti idaṃ pana vacanaṃ amīyamānaṃ vatthuṃ sandhāya vuttanti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khantī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:361_1: Maggaṃ adhiṭṭhāyāti “maggo aya”nti maggasaññaṃ uppādetvāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:361_3: tehi pana “āsanaṃ paññapetvāva nisīdathā”ti vutte sayameva paññapetvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:361_7: bhikkhusantakaṃ pana paribhogārahaṃ sabbathā āmasituṃ na vaṭṭati durūpaciṇṇattā.
tika-vin08t0:361_10: “Yathāvuttaphalānaṃyeva cettha kīḷādhippāyena āmasanaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā pāsāṇasakkharādīni kīḷādhippāyenapi āmasituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:361_11: Anupasampannānaṃ dassāmīti idaṃ apaṭiggahetvā gahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:361_12: Attanopi atthāya paṭiggahetvā gahaṇe doso natthi anāmāsattābhāvā.
tika-vin08t0:362_11: Valāhakajā bhāsurā dubbibhāgā rattibhāge andhakāraṃ vidhamentiyo tiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin08t0:362_14: te ca veḷū amanussagocareyeva padese jāyanti.
tika-vin08t0:362_15: Macchasirajā pāṭhīnapiṭṭhisamānavaṇṇā vaṭṭalā laghavo ca tejavantā honti pabhāvihīnā ca,
tika-vin08t0:362_19: Evaṃ jātito aṭṭhavidhāsu muttāsu yā macchasaṅkhasippijā,
tika-vin08t0:362_23: Yasmā bahulaṃ sāmuddikāva muttā loke dissanti,
tika-vin08t0:363_0: Maṇīti veḷuriyādito añño jotirasādibhedo sabbo maṇi.
tika-vin08t0:363_5: Maṇivohāraṃ agatā rattasetādivaṇṇā sumaṭṭhāpi silā anāmāsā evāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:363_9: Rajatanti kahāpaṇamāsādibhedaṃ jatumāsādiṃ upādāya sabbaṃ vuttāvasesarūpiyaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:364_2: Tāya vūpasametabbassa yassa kassaci rogassa atthāya vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:364_3: “Bhesajjatthañca aviddhāyeva muttā vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:364_4: Bhesajjatthāya pisitvā yojitānaṃ muttānaṃ ratanabhāvavijahanato gahaṇakkhaṇepi ratanākārena apekkhābhāvā “bhesajjatthāya pana vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:364_5: Yāva pana tā muttā ratanarūpena tiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin08t0:364_7: Evaṃ aññampi ratanapāsāṇaṃ pisitvā bhesajje yojanatthāya gahetuṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t0:364_8: Jātarūparajataṃ pana missetvā yojanabhesajjatthāyapi sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:364_9: Gahaṭṭhehi yojetvā dinnampi yadi bhesajje suvaṇṇādirūpena tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin08t0:364_13: “Jātiphalikaṃ upādāyā”ti vuttattā sūriyakantacandakantādikaṃ jātipāsāṇaṃ maṇimhi eva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:364_15: Bhaṇḍamūlatthaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭatīti imināva āmasitumpi vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:365_0: Dhamanasaṅkho ca dhotaviddho ca ratanamisso cāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:365_3: Etena dhamanasaṅkhato añño ratanasammisso anāmāsoti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:365_5: Pānīyasaṅkhoti iminā thālakādiākārena katasaṅkhamayabhājanāni bhikkhūnaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭantīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:365_9: muggavaṇṇā ratanasammissāva na vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:366_2: Paṭikkhipīti “dhātuṭṭhapanatthāya gaṇhathā”ti avatvā “tumhākaṃ gaṇhathā”ti pesitattā paṭikkhipi.
tika-vin08t0:366_3: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “paṭikkhipīti suvaṇṇamayassa dhātukaraṇḍakassa buddhādirūpassa ca attano santakakaraṇe nissaggiyattā vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:366_5: “Rūpiyachaḍḍakaṭṭhāne”ti vuttattā rūpiyachaḍḍakassa jātarūparajataṃ āmasitvā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:366_6: Keḷāpayitunti āmasitvā ito cito ca sañcāretuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:366_8: Kacavarameva harituṃ vaṭṭatīti gopakā vā hontu aññe vā,
tika-vin08t0:366_11: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “kacavarameva harituṃ vaṭṭatīti gopakā vā hontu aññe vā,
tika-vin08t0:366_14: taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti keḷāyanasadisattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:366_16: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ cetiyagharagopakā rūpiyachaḍḍakaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti tesaṃyeva keḷāyanaṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:366_18: tasmā “gopakā vā hontu aññe vā”ti vacanaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
tika-vin08t0:367_1: suvaṇṇacetiye kacavarameva harituṃ vaṭṭatīti ettakameva anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:367_2: tasmā sāvadhāraṇaṃ katvā vuttattā “hatthenapi puñchitvā”ti ca “malampi pamajjituṃ vaṭṭati evā”ti ca vacanaṃ kurundaṭṭhakathāya na sameti,
tika-vin08t0:367_7: Tattha tiputambe missetvā kataṃ kaṃsalohaṃ nāma,
tika-vin08t0:367_10: “Pakatirasatambe missetvā kataṃ ārakūṭa”nti ca sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:367_11: Taṃ pana “jātarūpagatika”nti vuttattā uggaṇhato nissaggiyampi hotīti keci vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:367_12: rūpiyesu pana agaṇitattā nissaggiyaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:367_14: Sabbopi kappiyoti yathāvuttasuvaṇṇādimayānaṃ senāsanaparikkhārānaṃ āmasanagopanādivasena paribhogo sabbathā kappiyoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:367_16: “Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammavinayavaṇṇanaṭṭhāne”ti vuttattā saṅghikameva suvaṇṇādimayaṃ senāsanaṃ senāsanaparikkhārā ca vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin08t0:368_2: Bhinditvāti paṭhamameva anāmasitvā pāsāṇādinā kiñcimattaṃ bhedaṃ katvā pacchā kappiyabhaṇḍatthāya adhiṭṭhahitvā hatthena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:368_6: Kiṭikāphalakaṃ akkhirakkhaṇatthāya ayalohādīhi jālākārena katvā sīsādīsu paṭimuñcitabbaṃ jālikaṃ nāma. Ādi-
tika-vin08t0:369_3: tato visesassa vattumāraddhattā ca bheriādīnaṃ vinaddhopakaraṇasamūho bherivīṇāsaṅghāṭoti veditabbo “saṅghaṭitabboti
tika-vin08t0:369_6: Āropitacammanti pubbe āropitaṃ hutvā pacchā tato apanetvā visuṃ ṭhapitamukhacammamattaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:369_9: Onahitunti bheripokkharādīni cammaṃ āropetvā cammavaddhiādīhi sabbehi upakaraṇehi vinandhituṃ.
tika-vin08t0:374_1: Evaṃ anāmāsavinicchayakathaṃ kathetvā idāni adhiṭṭhānavikappanavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “adhiṭṭhānavikappanesu panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:374_7: Na vikappetunti nāmaṃ vatvā na vikappetuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:374_9: Tasmā ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhahantena ‘imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī’tiādinā nāmaṃ vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:374_10: Vikappentena pana ‘imaṃ saṅghāṭi’ntiādinā tassa tassa cīvarassa nāmaṃ aggahetvāva ‘imaṃ cīvaraṃ tuyhaṃ vikappemī’ti vikappetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:374_12: yadi taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā vikappeti,
tika-vin08t0:375_1: Na vikappetunti iminā nāmena na vikappetuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:375_3: tassa tasmiṃ adhiṭṭhitaticīvare viya avippavāsādinā kātabbavidhi na kātabboti dasseti,
tika-vin08t0:375_5: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātunti ettha ticīvaraṃ ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhātabbayuttakaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:375_6: yaṃ vā ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t0:375_7: tassa adhiṭṭhānakālaparicchedābhāvato sabbakālaṃ icchantassa adhiṭṭhātuṃyeva anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t0:375_9: sati pana paccaye yadā tadā vā paccuddharitvā vikappetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ‘anāpatti antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vikappetī’ti vacanato siddhaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:376_0: Imesu pana tīsu ṭīkāvādesu tatiyavādo yuttataro viya dissati. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:376_2: Pāḷiyañhi kataparicchedāsuyeva dvīsu vassikasāṭikakaṇḍupaṭicchādīsu tato paraṃ vikappetunti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:376_4: tasmā tesu asati paccaye niccaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbameva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:376_5: na vikappetabbanti ayaṃ pāḷiyā adhippāyo dissati,
tika-vin08t0:376_8: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ticīvaraṃ ticīvarasaṅkhepena pariharato adhiṭṭhātumeva anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t0:376_12: evañca sati yo ticīvare ekena cīvarena vippavasitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:376_13: tassa cīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ paccuddharitvā vippavāsasukhatthaṃ vikappanāya okāso dinno hotīti.
tika-vin08t0:377_0: Paṭhamavāde “na vikappetu”nti nāmaṃ vatvā “na vikappetu”nti attho vutto,
tika-vin08t0:377_1: evaṃ sante “tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti ettha tato paraṃ nāmaṃ vatvā vikappetunti attho bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:377_3: “nāmaṃ vatvā”ti ca visesane kattabbe sati “na vikappetu”nti ca “tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti ca bhedavacanaṃ na siyā,
tika-vin08t0:377_5: dutiyavāde ca “na vikappetu”nti iminā nāmena na vikappetunti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:377_7: Paṭhame ca “ticīvaraṃ vā hotu aññaṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:377_8: yadi taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā vikappeti,
tika-vin08t0:378_0: Tato paraṃ vikappetunti cātumāsato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhuñjitunti tīsu gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:378_1: Keci pana “tato paraṃ vikappetvā yāva āgāmisaṃvacchare vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:378_3: “Tato paraṃ vikappetuṃ anujānāmīti ettāvatā vassikasāṭikaṃ kaṇḍupaṭicchādiñca taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā vikappetuṃ anuññātanti evamattho na gahetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:378_5: kasmā tato paraṃ vikappentenapi nāmaṃ gahetvā na vikappetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:378_6: Ubhinnampi tato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhogassa anuññātattā tathāvikappitaṃ aññanāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbanti
tika-vin08t0:378_8: Vimativinodaniyampi “tato paranti cātumāsato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhuñjituṃ anuññātanti keci vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:378_9: Aññe pana ‘vikappetvā yāva āgāmivassānaṃ tāva ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:378_11: tathā vikappitaṃ parikkhārādināmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabba’nti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:379_2: Vatthañhi katapariyositaṃ antocātumāse vassānadivasaṃ ādiṃ katvā antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātuṃ anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t0:379_3: cātumāsato uddhaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā ṭhapetukāmena vikappetuṃ anujānāmīti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:379_6: purimesu pana ācariyānaṃ adhippāyoyeva duviññeyyo hoti nānāvādasseva kathitattā.
tika-vin08t0:379_8: catuhatthe minitvā pañcamaṃ hatthamuṭṭhiṃ katvā minitabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:379_10: Pañcapi hatthā muṭṭhī katvāva minitabbā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:379_12: Dvihatthena antaravāsakena timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ sakkāti āha “pārupanenapī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:379_15: Tena ca tesu ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:380_0: Imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmīti imaṃ saṅghāṭiadhiṭṭhānaṃ ukkhipāmi,
tika-vin08t0:380_6: Vācāya adhiṭṭhātabbāti ettha kāyenapi cāletvā vācampi bhinditvā kāyavācāhi adhiṭṭhānampi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:380_10: taṃ idha na sametī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:380_11: “Idāni sammukhāparammukhābhedena duvidhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “sace hatthapāsetiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:380_12: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “hatthapāseti ca idaṃ dvādasahatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:380_14: tato paraṃ ‘eta’nti vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti keci vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:380_17: tasmā idha visesavikappanāya kāraṇaṃ gavesitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:381_1: tato dūre ṭhitampi ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhentena adhiṭṭhātabbameva.
tika-vin08t0:381_3: Na hi sakkā niccassa ṭhānaṃ sallakkhetuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:381_4: ekasmiṃ vihāre ṭhapetvā tato aññasmiṃ ṭhapitanti adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:381_5: Keci pana ‘tathāpi adhiṭṭhite na doso’ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:381_8: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “sāmantavihāro nāma yattha tadaheva gantvā nivattetuṃ sakkā.
tika-vin08t0:381_10: tasmā ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātabbanti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:381_11: Ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvāti ca idaṃ ṭhapitaṭṭhānasallakkhaṇaṃ anucchavikanti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:381_13: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyañca “saṅghāṭi uttarāsaṅgo antaravāsakanti adhiṭṭhitānadhiṭṭhitānaṃ samānameva nāmaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:381_19: tasmā ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātabba’nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:381_20: Sāmantavihāro nāma yattha tadaheva gantvā nivattituṃ sakkā.
tika-vin08t0:381_21: Rattivippavāsaṃ rakkhantena tato dūre ṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:381_23: Keci ‘cīvaravaṃse ṭhapitaṃ añño parivattetvā nāgadante ṭhapeti,
tika-vin08t0:381_24: taṃ ajānitvā adhiṭṭhahantassapi ruhati cīvarassa sallakkhitattā’ti vadantī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:382_2: etena ca tecīvarikadhutaṅgaṃ pariharantena paṃsukūlādivasena laddhaṃ vatthaṃ dasāhabbhantare katvā rajitvā
tika-vin08t0:382_5: teneva “rajitakālato pana paṭṭhāya nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:382_7: Puna adhiṭṭhātabbānīti idañca saṅghāṭiāditicīvaranāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitukāmassa vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:382_9: Puna adhiṭṭhātabbanti iminā kappabindupi dātabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:382_10: Adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthīti iminā kappabindudānakiccampi natthīti dasseti,
tika-vin08t0:382_12: Tattha puna adhiṭṭhātabbanti anadhiṭṭhitacīvarassa ekadesabhūtattā anadhiṭṭhitañce,
tika-vin08t0:383_10: tasmā tīṇipi cīvarāni paccuddharitvā imāni cīvarāni parikkhāracoḷāni adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:383_14: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti ticīvaraṃ,
tika-vin08t0:383_20: na dve vā tīṇi vāti paṭikkhepābhāvato vikappanūpagapacchimappamāṇāni,
tika-vin08t0:383_21: atirekappamāṇāni vā parissāvanādīni parikkhārāni kappantīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:383_23: puna pariharituṃ asakkontena paccuddharitvā parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:383_25: Baddhasīmāya avippavāsasīmāsammutisambhavato cīvaravippavāse nevatthi dosoti na tattha dupparihāroti āha “abaddhasīmāya dupparihāra”nti.
tika-vin08t0:384_2: Tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbāti vassikamāsato paraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā,
tika-vin08t0:384_3: iminā catunnaṃ vassikamāsānaṃ upari adhiṭṭhānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti viññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:384_5: yañca mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vassikasāṭikā vassānamāsātikkamenāpi kaṇḍupaṭicchādi ābādhavūpasamenāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:384_8: no gimhe”ti ettha na taṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:384_9: kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchime pāṭipadadivase vikappetvā ṭhapitaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsento hemante āpajjati.
tika-vin08t0:384_10: Kurundiyaṃ pana “kattikapuṇṇamadivase apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:384_16: tasmā kurundiyaṃ vuttanayenapi vassikasāṭikā vassānātikkamepi adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti paññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:384_17: Adhiṭṭhānavijahanesu ca vassānamāsaābādhānaṃ vigame vijahanaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi na uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:384_18: tasmā samantapāsādikāyaṃ āgatanayena yāva paccuddhārā adhiṭṭhānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:385_1: Dve pana na vaṭṭantīti iminā saṅghāṭiādīsupi dutiyaadhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhati,
tika-vin08t0:385_3: Mahāpaccariyaṃ cīvaravasena paribhogakiccassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya “anāpattī”ti vuttā senāsanaparibhogatthāya dinnapaccattharaṇe viya.
tika-vin08t0:385_5: taṃ senāsanatthāyevāti niyamitaṃ na hoti navasu cīvaresu gahitattā,
tika-vin08t0:385_6: tasmā attano nāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā nidahitvā parikkhāracoḷaṃ viya yathā tathā viniyujjitamevāti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:385_7: pāvārokojavoti imesampi paccattharaṇādinā lokepi voharaṇato senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇato visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:386_3: taṃ pana majjhimapurisahatthasaṅkhātena vaḍḍhakīhatthena dīghato tihatthaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:386_6: idāni manussānaṃ pakatihatthena dīghato vidatthādhikacatuhatthaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:386_10: na adhikaṃ “taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiya”nti vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:386_12: tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo”ti vuttattā evaṃ vuttappamāṇayuttā,
tika-vin08t0:386_13: sā pana vaḍḍhakīhatthena dīghato chahatthā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:386_15: idāni pakatihatthena pana dīghato navahatthā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:386_17: Vikappanūpagapacchimacīvarappamāṇaṃ parikkhāracoḷanti ettha pana vikappanūpagapacchimacīvarappamāṇaṃ nāma sugataṅgulena dīghato aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:386_21: idāni pakatihatthena pana dīghato vidatthādhikahatthaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:387_0: Bhesajjatthāyātiādīsu attano santakabhāvato mocetvā ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya “anadhiṭṭhitepi natthi āpattī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:387_2: idaṃ mātuyā”ti vibhajitvā sakasantakabhāvato mocetvā ṭhapentena adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:387_4: idaṃ mātuyā dassāmī”ti ṭhapentena pana adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:387_5: Senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇeti ettha anivāsetvā apārupitvā kevalaṃ mañcapīṭhesuyeva attharitvā
tika-vin08t0:387_6: paribhuñjiyamānaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ attano santakampi anadhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:387_7: heṭṭhā pana paccattharaṇampi adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti avisesena vuttattā attano santakaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin08t0:387_9: Tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbanti ettha pacchā vītaṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhitameva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:387_11: Sace pana paricchedaṃ dassetvā antarantarā vītaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:387_13: Eseva nayoti vikappanūpagappamāṇamatte vīte tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:388_2: taṃ yuttaṃ aññassa dāne viya cīvare nirālayabhāveneva pariccattattā.
tika-vin08t0:388_3: Keci pana ‘hīnāyāvattanenāti bhikkhuniyā gihibhāvūpagamanenevāti etamatthaṃ gahetvā bhikkhu pana vibbhamantopi yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti,
tika-vin08t0:388_4: tāva bhikkhuyevāti adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatī’ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:388_5: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ ‘bhikkhuniyā hīnāyāvattanenā’ti visesetvā avuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:388_6: Bhikkhuniyā hi gihibhāvūpagamanena adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ visuṃ vattabbaṃ natthi tassā vibbhamaneneva assamaṇībhāvato.
tika-vin08t0:388_7: Sikkhāpaccakkhānenāti pana idaṃ sace bhikkhuliṅge ṭhitova sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti,
tika-vin08t0:388_8: tassa kāyalaggampi cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti dassanatthaṃ vutta”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:388_9: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “hīnāyāvattanenāti idaṃ antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpajjitvā bhikkhupaṭiññāya ṭhitassa
tika-vin08t0:388_10: ceva titthiyapakkantassa ca bhikkhuniyā ca bhikkhunibhāve nirapekkhatāya gihiliṅgatitthiyaliṅgaggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t0:388_12: Sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya gihibhāvūpagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti keci vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:388_14: tadāpi tassa upasampannattā cīvarassa ca tassa santakattā vijahanato”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:388_15: iti imāni dve vacanāni aññamaññaviruddhāni hutvā dissanti.
tika-vin08t0:389_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “hīnāyāvattanena sikkhāpaccakkhānenā”ti visuṃ vuttattā hīnāyāvattante sati sikkhaṃ appaccakkhantepi cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati,
tika-vin08t0:389_1: sikkhaṃ paccakkhante sati hīnāya anāvattantepīti adhippāyo dissati,
tika-vin08t0:389_2: tasmā sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya kevalaṃ gihibhāvaṃ upagacchantassa kiñcāpi bhikkhubhāvo atthi,
tika-vin08t0:389_4: tathāpi “hīnāyāvattanenā”ti vuttattā gihibhāvūpagamaneneva adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ siyā yathā taṃ liṅgaparivattanena.
tika-vin08t0:389_5: Gihibhāvaṃ anupagantvā ca kevalaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ karontassa kiñcāpi bhikkhuliṅgaṃ atthi,
tika-vin08t0:389_7: tathāpi “sikkhāpaccakkhānenā”ti vuttattā sikkhāpaccakkhāneneva adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ siyā yathā taṃ paccuddharaṇe,
tika-vin08t0:389_8: tasmā bhikkhu vā hotu bhikkhunī vā,
tika-vin08t0:389_9: hīnāyāvattissāmīti cittena gihiliṅgaggahaṇena cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati.
tika-vin08t0:389_10: Sikkhāpaccakkhānena pana bhikkhusseva cīvaraṃ bhikkhuniyā sikkhāpaccakkhānābhāvāti ayamamhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin08t0:390_1: Orato paratoti ettha ca “orato chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhindati,
tika-vin08t0:390_4: Yathā nadīparicchinne padese manussānaṃ vasanadisābhāge tīraṃ orimaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:390_6: tathā bhikkhūnaṃ nivāsanapārupanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ cīvarassa majjhaṭṭhānaṃ yathāvuttavidatthiādippamāṇassa padesassa oraṃ nāma,
tika-vin08t0:390_8: iti lokato vā yathā ca orato bhogaṃ parato antaṃ katvā cīvaraṃ ṭhapetabbanti vutte bhikkhuno abhimukhaṭṭhānaṃ oraṃ nāma,
tika-vin08t0:390_13: Teneva yo pana dubbalaṭṭhāne paṭhamaṃ aggaḷaṃ datvā pacchā dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ chinditvā apaneti,
tika-vin08t0:390_15: Maṇḍalaparivattanepi eseva nayoti sakalasmiṃ cīvare adhiṭṭhānabhijjanābhijjanabhāvo dassito.
tika-vin08t0:390_16: Tena vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “esa nayoti iminā pamāṇayuttesu yattha katthaci chidde adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatītiādiatthaṃ saṅgaṇhātī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:391_1: Mahantaṃ vā khuddakaṃ karotīti ettha tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ catūsu passesu yasmiṃ padese chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati,
tika-vin08t0:391_2: tasmiṃ padese samantato chinditvā khuddakaṃ karontassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:391_3: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “mahantaṃ vā khuddakaṃ vā karotīti ettha atimahantaṃ cīvaraṃ muṭṭhipañcakādipacchimappamāṇayuttaṃ
tika-vin08t0:391_4: katvā samantato chindanenapi vicchindanakāle chijjamānaṭṭhānaṃ chiddasaṅkhaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:391_6: ‘ghaṭetvā chindati na bhijjatī’ti vacanena ca sameti.
tika-vin08t0:391_7: Parikkhāracoḷaṃ pana vikappanūpagapacchimappamāṇato ūnaṃ katvā chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati adhiṭṭhānassa anissayattā,
tika-vin08t0:391_8: tāni puna baddhāni ghaṭitāni puna adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:391_9: Keci pana ‘vassikasāṭikacīvare dvidhā chinne yadipi ekekaṃ khaṇḍaṃ pacchimappamāṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:391_12: dve pana na vaṭṭantī’ti vuttattā nisīdanakaṇḍupaṭicchādīsupi eseva nayoti vadantī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:392_3: tasmā “sammukhe”ti bhummatthe nissakkavacanaṃ katvāpi atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:392_5: Atha vā sammukhena attano vācāya eva vikappanā sammukhāvikappanā.
tika-vin08t0:392_6: Parammukhena vikappanā parammukhāvikappanāti karaṇatthenapi attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:392_9: Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettakeneva vikappanākiccassa niṭṭhitattā atirekacīvaraṃ na hotīti dasāhātikkame nissaggiyaṃ na janetīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:392_12: adhiṭṭhahane paresaṃ vissajjane ca dukkaṭañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:392_15: Etena paccuddhārepi kate cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātukāmena vikappitacīvarameva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:393_2: paribhogakāle pana sampatte paccuddharāpetvā adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:393_4: paccuddhāreneva vikappanāya vigatattā atirekacīvaraṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:393_9: Yañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘tato paraṃ paribhogādi vaṭṭatī’tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:393_12: Pāḷiyañhi “antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti vikappetī”ti ca “sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā apaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjeyya pācittiya”nti ca “anāpatti so vā deti,
tika-vin08t0:393_13: tassa vā vissāsanto paribhuñjatī”ti ca sāmaññato vuttattā,
tika-vin08t0:393_14: aṭṭhakathāyañca “imaṃ cīvaraṃ vā vikappanaṃ vā paccuddharāmī”tiādinā paccuddhāraṃ adassetvā “mayhaṃ santakaṃ
tika-vin08t0:393_15: paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ karohī”ti evaṃ attano santakattaṃ amocetvāva paribhogādivasena
tika-vin08t0:393_17: “tato pabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭantī”ti adhiṭṭhānaṃ vināpi visuṃ paribhogassa nidhānassa ca vuttattā
tika-vin08t0:393_18: vikappanānantarameva paccuddharāpetvā anadhiṭṭhahitvā eva ca ticīvararahitaṃ vikappanārahaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjituñca
tika-vin08t0:393_20: Apica bahūnaṃ pattānaṃ vikappetuṃ paccuddharetuñca vuttattā paccuddhāre tesaṃ atirekapattatā dassitāti sijjhati tesu ekasseva adhiṭṭhātabbato,
tika-vin08t0:394_3: Paññattikovido na hotīti evaṃ vikappite anantarameva evaṃ paccuddharitabbanti vinayakammaṃ na jānāti.
tika-vin08t0:394_6: Vikappitavikappanā nāmesā vaṭṭatīti adhiṭṭhitaadhiṭṭhānaṃ viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:395_1: Evaṃ cīvare adhiṭṭhānavikappanānayaṃ dassetvā idāni patte adhiṭṭhānavikappanānayaṃ dassento “patte panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:395_9: Cīvare vuttaadhiṭṭhānavikappanānayato aññabhūto ayaṃ vakkhamāno patte adhiṭṭhānavikappanānayo veditabboti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:395_12: Tena pamāṇato ūnādhike patte adhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhati,
tika-vin08t0:395_13: tasmā tādisaṃ pattaṃ bhājanaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:396_0: Dve magadhanāḷiyoti ettha magadhanāḷi nāma yā māgadhikāya tulāya aḍḍhaterasapalaparimitaṃ udakaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:396_3: Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “magadhanāḷi nāma aḍḍhaterasapalā hotīti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:396_7: tāya magadhanāḷiyā diyaḍḍhanāḷi ekā sīhaḷanāḷi hotīti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:396_8: Atha vā magadhanāḷi nāma yā pañca kuḍuvāni ekañca muṭṭhiṃ ekāya ca muṭṭhiyā tatiyabhāgaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:396_9: Vuttañhetaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “magadhanāḷi nāma chapasatā nāḷīti keci.
tika-vin08t0:396_11: Tattha purimānaṃ matena tipasatāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo ekā magadhanāḷi hoti.
tika-vin08t0:396_12: Pacchimānaṃ catupasatāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo ekā magadhanāḷi.
tika-vin08t0:396_16: taṃ pana magadhanāḷiyā dvādasa nāḷiyo hontīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:396_17: tasmā tena nayena magadhanāḷi nāma pañca kuḍuvāni ekañca muṭṭhiṃ ekāya muṭṭhiyā tatiyabhāgañca gaṇhātīti veditabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:401_0: Atha vā magadhanāḷi nāma yā catukuḍuvāya nāḷiyā catasso nāḷiyo gaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:401_3: tāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo magadhanāḷi gaṇhāti,
tika-vin08t0:401_4: purāṇā pana sīhaḷanāḷi tisso nāḷiyo gaṇhātīti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:401_5: tesaṃ matena magadhanāḷi idāni vattamānāya catukuḍuvāya damiḷanāḷiyā catunāḷikā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:401_6: tato magadhanāḷito upaḍḍhañca purāṇadamiḷanāḷisaṅkhātaṃ patthaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:401_7: etena ca omako nāma patto patthodanaṃ gaṇhātīti pāḷivacanaṃ sameti.
tika-vin08t0:404_0: Evaṃ loke nāḷiyā magadhanāḷi diguṇāti dassitā.
tika-vin08t0:404_1: Evañca gayhamāne omakapattassa ca yāpanamattodanagāhikā ca siddhā hoti.
tika-vin08t0:404_2: Na hi sakkā aṭṭhakuḍuvato ūnodanagāhinā pattena athūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariyesitvā yāpetuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:404_3: Teneva vuttaṃ verañjakaṇḍaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘pattho nāma nāḷimattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:404_9: Vuttañhetaṃ majjhimanikāye brahmāyusuttasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “byañjanassa mattā nāma odanacatutthabhāgo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:404_10: Odanagatikānīti odanassa gati gati yesaṃ tāni odanagatikāni.
tika-vin08t0:404_11: Gatīti ca okāso odanassa antopavisanasīlattā odanassa okāsoyeva tesaṃ okāso hoti,
tika-vin08t0:404_12: na aññaṃ attano okāsaṃ gavesantīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:405_0: Evaṃ pamāṇato adhiṭṭhānūpagavikappanūpagapattaṃ dassetvā idāni pākato mūlato ca taṃ dassetuṃ “pamāṇayuttānampī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:405_1: Tattha ayopatto pañcahi pākehi pattoti kammārapakkaṃyeva anadhiṭṭhahitvā samaṇasāruppanīlavaṇṇakaraṇatthāya punappunaṃ nānāsambhārehi pacitabbo,
tika-vin08t0:405_2: ayopattassa atikakkhaḷattā kammārapākena saddhiṃ pañcavārapakkoyeva samaṇasāruppanīlavaṇṇo hoti.
tika-vin08t0:405_3: Mattikāpatto dvīhi pākehi pakkoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t0:405_4: Tassa pana mudukattā kumbhakārakapākena saddhiṃ dvivārapakkopi samaṇasāruppanīlavaṇṇo hoti.
tika-vin08t0:405_5: Evaṃ katoyeva hi patto adhiṭṭhānūpago vikappanūpago ca hoti, nākato.
tika-vin08t0:405_6: Tena vakkhati “pāke ca mūle ca suniṭṭhiteyeva adhiṭṭhānūpago hoti.
tika-vin08t0:405_9: So hatthaṃ āgatopi anāgatopi adhiṭṭhātabbo vikappetabboti etena dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ vikappetuñca labhati,
tika-vin08t0:405_13: Tattha pacitvā ṭhapessāmīti kāḷavaṇṇapākaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:406_0: Idāni pattādhiṭṭhānaṃ dassetumāha “tattha dve pattassa adhiṭṭhānā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:407_1: Tattha patte vā chiddaṃ hotīti mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulamattokāsato paṭṭhāya yattha katthaci chiddaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:414_1: Evaṃ pattādhiṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni pattavikappanaṃ dassetuṃ “vikappane panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:415_1: Evaṃ vikappanānayaṃ dassetvā idāni patte bhinne kattabbavidhiṃ dassetumāha “evaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā”iccādi.
tika-vin08t0:415_3: Pañcabandhanepi patte aparipuṇṇapāke patte viya adhiṭṭhānaṃ na ruhati.
tika-vin08t0:415_4: “Tipupaṭṭena vā”ti vuttattā tambalohādikappiyalohehi ayopattassa chiddaṃ chādetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:415_7: na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ uṇhabhojane pakkhitte vilīyamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:415_8: Phāṇitaṃ jhāpetvā pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭatīti pāsāṇacuṇṇena saddhiṃ phāṇitaṃ pacitvā tathāpakkena pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:415_10: “Anujānāmi bhikkhave ādhāraka”nti vuttattā mañcapīṭhādīsu yattha katthaci ādhārakaṃ ṭhapetvā tattha pattaṃ
tika-vin08t0:420_1: Evaṃ adhiṭṭhānavikappanavinicchayakathaṃ dassetvā idāni cīvarena vināvāsavinicchayakaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “cīvarenavināvāso”tyādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:420_5: Idha pana ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhahitvā dhāritaṃ cīvarattayameva.
tika-vin08t0:420_11: gāthāpādapūraṇatthāya vā aluttasamāsaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:420_16: imaṃ antaravāsakaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti evaṃ nāmena adhiṭṭhitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ ekekena vippavāsoti attho,
tika-vin08t0:420_18: vasantassa bhikkhuno saha aruṇuggamanā cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:420_21: tasmā kāyalaggaṃ vā hotu alaggaṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:420_22: aḍḍhateyyaratanassa padesassa anto katvā tiṭṭhantopi carantopi nisinnopi nipannopi hatthapāse katvā vasanto nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:421_0: Evaṃ sāmaññato avippavāsalakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā idāni gāmādipannarasokāsavasena visesato dassetumāha “gāmi”ccādi.
tika-vin08t0:421_3: Aṭṭo nāma paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ iṭṭhakāhi kato bahalabhittiko catupañcabhūmiko patissayaviseso.
tika-vin08t0:421_8: Sattho nāma jaṅghasattho vā sakaṭasattho vā.
tika-vin08t0:421_13: Tattha nivesanādīni gāmato bahi sanniviṭṭhāni gahitānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:422_0: Parikhāya vā parikkhittoti iminā samantā nadītaḷākādiudakena parikkhittopi parikkhittoyevāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:422_1: Taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvāti gharassa upari ākāse aḍḍhateyyaratanappamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā.
tika-vin08t0:422_2: Sabhāye vā vatthabbanti iminā sabhāsaddassa pariyāyo sabhāyasaddo napuṃsakaliṅgo atthīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:422_7: Tassā vīthiyā sabhāyadvārānaṃ gahaṇeneva tattha sabbānipi gehāni,
tika-vin08t0:422_9: Ettha ca dvāravīthigharesu vasantena gāmappavesanasahaseyyādidosaṃ pariharitvā suppaṭicchannatādiyutteneva bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:422_10: Sabhā pana yadi sabbesaṃ vasanatthāya papāsadisā katā,
tika-vin08t0:422_11: antarārāme viya yathāsukhaṃ vasituṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:422_12: Atiharitvā ghare nikkhipatīti vīthiṃ muñcitvā ṭhite aññasmiṃ ghare nikkhipati.
tika-vin08t0:422_14: Purato vā pacchato vā hatthapāseti gharassa hatthapāsaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin08t0:423_0: Evaṃ gāmavasena vippavāsāvippavāsaṃ dassetvā idāni nivesanavasena dassento “sace ekakulassa santakaṃ nivesanaṃ hotī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:423_1: Tattha ovarako nāma gabbhassa abbhantare añño gabbhoti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:423_4: Tattha vuttanayenevāti “ekakulassa santako udosito hoti parikkhitto cā”tiādinā nivesane vuttanayena. Eva-
tika-vin08t0:424_8: Nadīparihāro labbhatīti ettha “visuṃ nadīparihārassa avuttattā gāmādīhi aññattha viya cīvarahatthapāsoyeva nadīparihāro”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:424_9: Aññe pana “iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena nadīparihāropi visuṃ siddhoti nadīhatthapāso na vijahitabbo”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:424_10: Yathā pana ajjhokāse sattabbhantaravasena araññaparihāro labbhati,
tika-vin08t0:424_11: evaṃ nadiyaṃ udakukkhepavasena nadīparihāro labbhatīti katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nadīparihāro visuṃ avutto
tika-vin08t0:424_13: Evañca sati samuddajātassaresupi parihāro avuttasiddho hoti nadiyā samānalakkhaṇattā,
tika-vin08t0:424_14: nadīhatthapāso na vijahitabboti pana atthe sati nadiyā ativitthārattā bahusādhāraṇattā ca antonadiyaṃ
tika-vin08t0:424_15: cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā nadīhatthapāse ṭhitena cīvarassa pavattiṃ jānituṃ na sakkā bhaveyya.
tika-vin08t0:424_17: Antoudakukkhepe vā tassa hatthapāse vā ṭhitena pana sakkāti ayaṃ amhākaṃ attanomati,
tika-vin08t0:424_20: Ettha ca vihārassa nānākulasantakabhāvepi avippavāsasīmāparicchedabbhantare sabbattha cīvaraavippavāsasambhavato
tika-vin08t0:424_21: padhānattā tattha satthaparihāro na labbhatīti “vihāraṃ gantvā vasitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:425_0: Yasmā “nānākulassa parikkhitte khette cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā khettadvāramūle vā tassa hatthapāse vā vatthabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:425_1: tasmā dvāramūlato aññattha khettepi vasantena cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā hatthapāse katvāyeva vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:426_0: Vihāro nāma saparikkhitto vā aparikkhitto vā sakalo āvāsoti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:426_1: Yasmiṃ vihāreti ettha pana ekagehameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:426_3: Yasmiṃ vihāreti tassa antopariveṇādiṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:427_0: Yaṃ majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharatīti yadā mahāvīthiyaṃ ujukameva gacchantaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ majjhanhikaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:427_3: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsassāti ujukaṃ avikkhittaleḍḍupātabbhantaraṃ sandhāya vadatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:427_4: Agamanapatheti tadaheva gantvā nivattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyake samuddamajjhe ye dīpakā,
tika-vin08t0:428_4: Aparibhogārahattāti iminā nissaggiyacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ acittakanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:428_5: Ekaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ aṃsakūṭe ṭhapetvā gantabbanti idaṃ bahūnaṃ sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne evaṃ akatvā gamanaṃ na sāruppanti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:428_8: Atha vā vihāre sabhāgaṃ bhikkhuṃ na passati,
tika-vin08t0:428_9: evaṃ sati āsanasālaṃ gantvā vinayakammaṃ kātabbanti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:428_10: Āsanasālaṃ gacchantena kiṃ tīhi cīvarehi gantabbanti āha “santaruttarenā”ti naṭṭhacīvarassa santaruttarasādiyanato.
tika-vin08t0:428_11: Saṅghāṭi pana kiṃ kātabbāti āha “saṅghāṭiṃ bahigāme ṭhapetvā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:428_12: Uttarāsaṅge ca bahigāme ṭhapitasaṅghāṭiyañca paṭhamaṃ vinayakammaṃ katvā pacchā uttarāsaṅgaṃ nivāsetvā antaravāsake kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:428_13: Ettha ca bahigāme ṭhapitassapi vinayakammavacanato parammukhāpi ṭhitaṃ nissajjituṃ,
tika-vin08t0:429_0: Daharānaṃ gamane saussāhattā “nissayo pana na paṭippassambhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:429_3: tesaṃ pana purāruṇā uṭṭhahitvā saussāhena gacchantānaṃ aruṇe antarā uṭṭhitepi na paṭippassambhati “yāva aruṇuggamanā sayantī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:429_6: Aññamaññassa vacanaṃ aggahetvātiādimhi saussāhattā gamanakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhi na vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:429_8: Nissayo ca paṭippassambhatīti ettha dhenubhayādīhi ṭhitānaṃ yāva bhayavūpasamā ṭhātabbato “antoaruṇeyeva gamissāmī”ti niyametuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:429_10: tattha antarā aruṇe uggatepi nissayo na paṭippassambhati bhesajjatthāya gāmaṃ paviṭṭhadaharānaṃ viya.
tika-vin08t0:430_0: Antosīmāyaṃ gāmanti avippavāsasīmāsammutito pacchā patiṭṭhāpitagāmaṃ sandhāya vadati gāmañca gāmūpacārañca ṭhapetvā sammannitabbato.
tika-vin08t0:430_1: Paviṭṭhānanti ācariyantevāsikānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ gatānaṃ avippavāsasīmattā neva cīvarāni nissaggiyāni honti,
tika-vin08t0:435_1: Evaṃ cīvaravippavāsavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni bhaṇḍapaṭisāmanavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “bhaṇḍassa paṭisāmana”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:435_4: bhaṇḍanti paribhaṇḍanti sattā etenāti vā bhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:437_7: Gihisantakanti iminā pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ santakaṃ paṭisāmetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:437_8: Bhaṇḍāgārikasīsenāti etena vissāsaggāhādinā gahetvā paṭisāmentassa anāpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:437_11: rājavallabhādīsu bhayena balakkārena pātetvā gatesu ca paṭisāmetuṃ vaṭṭatīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:438_0: Saṅgopanatthāya attano hatthe nikkhittassa bhaṇḍassa guttaṭṭhāne paṭisāmanapayogaṃ vinā “nāhaṃ gaṇhāmī”tiādinā
tika-vin08t0:438_1: aññasmiṃ payoge akate rajjasaṅkhobhādikāle “na dāni tassa dassāmi,
tika-vin08t0:438_2: na mayhaṃ dāni dassatī”ti ubhohipi sakasakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā dhuranikkhepe katepi avahāro natthi.
tika-vin08t0:438_7: “na dāni tassa dassāmī”ti theyyacittuppattikkhaṇe ca sāmino dhuranikkhepacittappavattiyā hetubhūto kāyavacīpayogo natthi,
tika-vin08t0:438_11: rakkhati tāvāti avahāraṃ sandhāya avuttattā “nāhaṃ gaṇhāmī”tiādinā musāvādakaraṇe pācittiyameva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:438_12: na dukkaṭaṃ theyyacittābhāvena sahapayogassapi abhāvatoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:439_2: na tāva paṭhamena bhaṇḍapaṭisāmanapayogena tadā theyyacittabhāvā,
tika-vin08t0:439_3: nāpi “dassāmī”ti kathanapayogena tadā theyyacitte vijjamānepi payogassa kappiyattāti? Vuccate –
tika-vin08t0:439_4: sāminā “dehī”ti bahuso yāciyamānopi adatvā yena payogena attano adātukāmataṃ sāmikassa ñāpesi,
tika-vin08t0:439_5: yena ca so adātukāmo ayaṃ vikkhipatīti ñatvā dhuraṃ nikkhipati,
tika-vin08t0:439_7: Na hettha upanikkhittabhaṇḍe pariyāyena mutti atthi.
tika-vin08t0:439_9: kattha te dinna”ntiādipariyāyavacanenapi sāmikassa dhurenikkhipāpite āpattiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:439_12: Parasantakassa parehi gaṇhāpane eva hi pariyāyato mutti,
tika-vin08t0:439_14: Attano hatthe nikkhittattāti ettha attano hatthe sāminā dinnatāya bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā ca ṭhānācāvanepi natthi avahāro,
tika-vin08t0:439_15: theyyacittena pana gahaṇe dukkaṭato na muccatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:440_3: atha kho tāpasaparibbājakādīnampi santakaṃ paṭisāmetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:440_6: Dutiye eseva nayoti gīvā na hoti, kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:440_8: Tatiye ca eseva nayoti gīvā na hoti, kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:440_10: Ettha ca kāyena vā vācāya vā cittena vā paṭikkhittopi paṭikkhittoyeva nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:441_3: Bhaṇḍāgārikassa gīvā na hoti alasajātikasseva pamādena haritattā.
tika-vin08t0:441_4: Dutiye bhaṇḍāgārikassa gīvā na hoti tassa anārocitattā.
tika-vin08t0:441_7: na aññesaṃ tena bhaṇḍāgārikena sampaṭicchitattā ṭhapitattā ca.
tika-vin08t0:441_11: Sabbaṃ tassa gīvā tassa bhaṇḍāgārikassa pamādena haraṇato.
tika-vin08t0:441_12: Tattheva upacāre vijjamāneti bhaṇḍāgārikassa samīpeyeva uccārapassāvaṭṭhāne vijjamāne.
tika-vin08t0:442_1: Mayi ca mate saṅghassa ca senāsane vinaṭṭheti ettha kevalaṃ saṅghassa senāsanaṃ mā vinassīti iminā adhippāyena vivaritumpi vaṭṭatiyevāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:442_2: “Taṃ māressāmī”ti ettake vuttepi vivarituṃ vaṭṭati “gilānapakkhe ṭhitattā avisayo”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:442_3: Maraṇato hi paraṃ gelaññaṃ avisayattañca natthi.
tika-vin08t0:442_4: “Dvāraṃ chinditvā harissāmā”ti ettake vuttepi vivarituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:442_5: Sahāyehi bhavitabbanti tehipi bhikkhācārādīhi pariyesitvā attano santakampi kiñci kiñci dātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:442_6: Ayañhi sāmīcīti bhaṇḍāgāre vasantānaṃ idaṃ vattaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:442_7: Lolamahātheroti mando momūho ākiṇṇavihārī sadā kīḷāpasuto vā mahāthero.
tika-vin08t0:443_5: Corānaṃ paṭipathaṃ gatesūti corānaṃ āgamanaṃ ñatvā “paṭhamataraṃyeva gantvā saddaṃ karissāmā”ti corānaṃ abhimukhaṃ gatesu.
tika-vin08t0:443_6: “Corehi haṭabhaṇḍaṃ āharissāmā”ti tesaṃ anupathaṃ gatesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t0:443_7: Nibaddhaṃ katvāti “asukakule yāgubhattaṃ vihāravārikānaṃyevā”ti evaṃ niyamanaṃ katvā.
tika-vin08t0:443_8: Dve tisso yāgusalākā ca cattāri pañca salākabhattāni ca labhamānovāti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:443_9: tato ūnaṃ vā hotu adhikaṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:443_10: attano ca veyyāvaccakarassa ca yāpanamattaṃ labhanameva pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:443_11: Nissitake jaggāpentīti attano attano nissitake bhikkhācariyāya posentā nissitakehi vihāraṃ jaggāpenti.
tika-vin08t0:443_15: Asahāyassa vā attadutiyassa vāti imasmiṃ pana pāṭhe ekena ānītaṃ dvinnaṃ nappahotīti attadutiyassapi vāro nivāritoti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:443_16: taṃ “yassa sabhāgo bhikkhu bhattaṃ ānetvā dātā natthī”ti iminā na sameti,
tika-vin08t0:443_22: Etena sabbena ekekassa vāro na pāpetabboti dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:444_2: Taṃ gahetvāti taṃ ārāmikādīhi dīyamānaṃ bhāgaṃ gahetvā.
tika-vin08t0:444_3: Upajīvantena ṭhātabbanti abbhokāsikarukkhamūlikenapi pākavattaṃ upanissāya jīvantena attano pattacīvararakkhaṇatthāya vihāravāre sampatte ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:444_4: Na gāhāpetabboti ettha yassa abbhokāsikassapi attano adhikaparikkhāro ce ṭhapito atthi,
tika-vin08t0:449_1: Evaṃ bhaṇḍapaṭisāmanavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni kayavikkayavinicchayaṃ kathento “kayavikkayasamāpattī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:450_0: Sesañātakesu saddhādeyyavinipātasambhavato tadabhāvaṭṭhānampi dassetuṃ “mātaraṃ vā pana pitaraṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:450_1: Tena viññattisaddhādeyyavinipātanañca na hoti “iminā idaṃ dehī”ti vadantoti dasseti,
tika-vin08t0:450_2: kayavikkayaṃ pana āpajjati “iminā idaṃ dehī”ti vadantoti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:450_3: Iminā ca upari aññātakantyādinā ca sesañātakaṃ “imaṃ dehī”ti vadato viññatti na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:450_5: “iminā imaṃ dehī”ti kayavikkayaṃ āpajjato nissaggiyanti ayampi attho dassito hoti migapadavalañjananyāyena.
tika-vin08t0:450_8: aññātakehi saddhiṃ tisso āpattiyo”ti vattabbe teneva nyāyena ñātuṃ sakkāti katvā na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:451_0: “Idaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā idaṃ karothā”ti vutte pubbāparasambandhāya kiriyāya vuttattā “iminā idaṃ dehī”ti vuttasadisaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:451_6: idaṃ nāma karohī”ti pana vutte asambandhāya kiriyāya vuttattā kayavikkayo na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:451_7: Vighāsādānaṃ bhattadāne ca anapekkhattā saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:451_10: “Ettha cā”tiādinā asatipi nissaggiyavatthumhi pācittiyaṃ desetabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:452_2: Gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti “iminā idaṃ dehī”ti avuttattā kayavikkayo na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:452_5: Evaṃ sati kathaṃ kātabboti āha “mama vatthu appagghanti ācikkhitabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:452_8: Māsakato paṭṭhāya yāva ūnapañcamāsakaṃ ce agghati,
tika-vin08t0:452_15: Ekato ubhato vā ce akappiyabhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:453_3: tasmā tato paraṃ ṭhapitukāmassa appaṭiggahitatelena attho hoti.
tika-vin08t0:453_5: aniyamitakālaṃ appaṭiggahitatelaṃ nāḷiyaṃ avasiṭṭhapaṭiggahitatelaṃ attano kālaṃ vattāpeyya.
tika-vin08t0:454_3: Tena vakkhati “ayaṃ patto sabbakappiyo buddhānampi paribhogāraho”ti.
tika-vin08t0:454_5: Rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā ayabījaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā tena lohena pattassa kāritattā,
tika-vin08t0:454_7: Yathā ca tatiyapārājikavisaye thāvarapayogesu pāsasūlādīsu mūlato paṭṭhāya kāritesu kismiñci daṇḍamatte vā vākamatte vā avasiṭṭhe sati na muccati,
tika-vin08t0:454_9: evamidhāpi bījato paṭṭhāya katattā tasmiṃ patte kismiñci patte avasiṭṭhepi kappiyo bhavituṃ na sakkā.
tika-vin08t0:454_10: Tathā ca vakkhati “sacepi taṃ vināsetvā thālakaṃ kāreti,
tika-vin08t0:454_12: Evaṃ santepi dutiyapatte viya mūle ca mūlassāmikānaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:454_13: patte ca pattassāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo kātuṃ sakkā bhaveyya nu khoti āsaṅkāyamāha “na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātu”nti.
tika-vin08t0:454_15: dutiyapattaṃ rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhitvā gihīhi pariniṭṭhāpitameva kiṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:454_18: idha pana bījato paṭṭhāya dūsitattā tena bhikkhunā taṃ pattaṃ puna ayapāsāṇabījaṃ kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā,
tika-vin08t0:454_19: paṭiggahitarūpiyassa ca vaḷañjitattā puna sāmikānaṃ dātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātunti.
tika-vin08t0:455_0: Idāni taṃ asakkuṇeyyattaṃ aññena pakārena vitthāretuṃ “sacepī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:455_1: Iminā kiñcipi ayavatthumhi avasiṭṭhe sati akappiyova hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:455_2: Tena vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvāti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:455_3: muttādidukkaṭavatthumpi uggaṇhitvā kāritampi pañcannaṃ na vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t0:455_4: Samuṭṭhāpetīti sayaṃ gantvā vā ‘imaṃ kahāpaṇādiṃ kammakārānaṃ datvā bījaṃ samuṭṭhāpehī’ti aññaṃ āṇāpetvā vā samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-vin08t0:455_5: Mahāakappiyoti attanāva bījato paṭṭhāya dūsitattā aññassa mūlassāmikassa abhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:455_6: So hi corehi acchinnopi puna laddho jānantassa kassacīpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:455_9: Na sakkā kenaci upāyenāti saṅghassa vissajjanena corādiacchindanenapi kappiyo kātuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:455_10: idañca tena rūpena ṭhitaṃ tammūlakena vatthamuttādirūpena ṭhitañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:455_11: Dukkaṭavatthumpi hi tammūlakakappiyavatthu ca na sakkā kenaci tena rūpena kappiyaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:455_12: Yadi pana so bhikkhu tena kappiyavatthunā,
tika-vin08t0:455_14: taṃ rūpiyaṃ nissajjāpetvā aññesaṃ kappiyaṃ kātumpi sakkā bhaveyyāti daṭṭhabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:455_20: atthikehi pana tesu tesu pakaraṇesu oloketvā gahetabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:456_0: Dutiyapatte pañcannampi sahadhammikānaṃ na kappatīti rūpiyassa paṭiggahitattā,
tika-vin08t0:456_2: Sakkā pana kappiyo kātunti gihīhi pariniṭṭhāpitapattasseva kiṇitattā,
tika-vin08t0:457_1: sakkā pana kappiyo kātu”nti imaṃ nayaṃ niddisati.
tika-vin08t0:457_3: atha kasmā akappiyoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “kappiyavohārena gahitopi dutiyapattasadisoyeva,
tika-vin08t0:457_6: Ettha ca “dutiyapattasadisoyevā”ti vuttattā mūle ca mūlassāmikānaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:457_7: patte ca pattassāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:457_8: kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ datvā gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:457_9: Mūlassa anissaṭṭhattāti yena uggahitamūlena patto kīto,
tika-vin08t0:457_13: Yadi hi tena sampaṭicchitamūlaṃ saṅghamajjhe nissaṭṭhaṃ siyā,
tika-vin08t0:457_14: tena kappiyena kammena ārāmikādīhi gahetvā dinnapatto rūpiyapaṭiggāhakaṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ vaṭṭeyya.
tika-vin08t0:458_0: Catutthapatte dubbicāritattāti “ime kahāpaṇe datvā idaṃ dehī”ti gahitattā gihisantakānaṃ kahāpaṇānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:458_1: duṭṭhuvicāritattā etassa vicāraṇakassa bhikkhuno eva na vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:458_2: Mūlassa asampaṭicchitattāti etena mūlassa gihisantakattaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin08t0:459_0: Pañcamapatte sabbakappiyoti attano ca pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānañca buddhapaccekabuddhānañca kappiyo.
tika-vin08t0:464_1: Evaṃ kayavikkayasamāpattivinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni rūpiyādipaṭiggahaṇavinicchayaṃ kathento “rūpiyādipaṭiggaho”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:464_2: Tattha saññāṇatthāya kataṃ rūpaṃ ettha atthīti rūpiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:464_4: Tena vuttaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “idha pana yaṃ kiñci vohāragamanīyaṃ kahāpaṇādi adhippeta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:464_11: Jātasamaye uppannaṃ rūpameva rūpaṃ assa bhavati,
tika-vin08t0:464_15: Rajatena kato māsako rajatamāsakoti idaṃ catubbidhameva nissaggiyavatthu hoti,
tika-vin08t0:464_23: Imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vatthūnaṃ ko visesoti āha “tattha nissaggiyavatthuṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t0:464_25: Tattha nissaggiyavatthu attano atthāya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:465_0: Idāni tesu vatthūsu kappiyākappiyavinicchayaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ āha “tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:465_4: Saṅghassa hatthe adatvā vaḍḍhakīādīnaṃ hatthe dinnattā.
tika-vin08t0:465_8: Paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpattīti “saṅghassa dammī”ti vuttattā paṭiggahaṇe pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:465_10: Sveva sāpattikoti dukkaṭāpattiṃ sandhāya vadati. Vadati,
tika-vin08t0:465_17: Evaṃ santepi āpadāsu kattabbavidhiṃ dassento “sace panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:466_1: Evaṃ nissaggiyavatthūsu kattabbavidhiṃ dassetvā idāni dukkaṭavatthūsu kattabbavidhiṃ dassento “sace koci mayha”ntyādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:466_2: Ettha pana paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpattīti dukkaṭameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:466_3: Taḷākassapi khettasaṅgahitattā tassa paṭiggahaṇepi āpatti vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:466_4: “Cattāro paccaye paribhuñjathāti detīti ettha ‘bhikkhusaṅghassa cattāro paccaye paribhuñjituṃ taḷākaṃ
tika-vin08t0:466_5: dammī’ti vā ‘catupaccayaparibhogatthaṃ taḷākaṃ dammī’ti vā vadati,
tika-vin08t0:466_7: ‘Ito taḷākato uppanne paccaye dammī’ti vutte pana vattabbameva natthī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:466_8: Vimativinodaniyampi tatheva vatvā “idañca saṅghassa dīyamānaññeva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:466_9: puggalassa pana evampi dinnaṃ taḷākakhettādi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:466_12: taṃ katha’nti hi ādinā sabbattha saṅghavaseneva vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:467_3: Yasmā parasantakaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nāsetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:467_7: Janapadassa sāmikoti imināva yo taṃ janapadaṃ vicāreti,
tika-vin08t0:467_11: Iminā yena kenaci issarena “pariccattamidaṃ bhikkhūhi assāmika”nti saññāya attano gahetvā dinnaṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:467_16: Idaṃ sahatthena ca akappiyavohārena ca karonte sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:467_17: “Sassasampādanattha”nti evaṃ asuddhacittānampi pana sayaṃ akatvā kappiyavohārena āṇāpetuṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t0:467_18: Kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ sahatthādinā katataḷākattā assāruppanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:467_19: Ṭhapentassa pana taṃ paccayaṃ paribhuñjantassa vā saṅghassa āpatti na paññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:468_2: Kahāpaṇeti iminā dhaññuṭṭhāpane tasseva akappiyanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:468_3: Aparicchinnabhāgeti “ettake bhūmibhāge ettako bhāgo dātabbo”ti evaṃ aparicchinnabhāge.
tika-vin08t0:468_7: “Kasatha vapathā”ti vacanena sabbesampi akappiyaṃ siyāti āha “avatvā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:468_8: Ettako nāma bhāgoti ettha ettako kahāpaṇoti idampi sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin08t0:468_9: Tathāvuttepi hi tadā kahāpaṇānaṃ avijjamānattā āyatiṃ uppajjamānaṃ aññesaṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t0:468_11: Tassa pana sabbapayogesu paribhoge ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:468_15: yena minanarakkhaṇādinā payogena pacchā dhaññaparibhoge āpatti hoti tassa payogassa karaṇe anāpattiyā ayuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:468_17: Teneva “ettakehi vīhīhi idañcidañca āharathā”ti niyamavacane akappiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:468_21: Rajjuyā vā daṇḍena vāti ettha “pādehipi minituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:468_22: Khale vā ṭhatvā rakkhatīti ettha pana thenetvā gaṇhante disvā “mā gaṇhathā”ti nivārento rakkhati nāma,
tika-vin08t0:468_23: sace pana avicāretvā kevalaṃ tuṇhībhūtova rakkhaṇatthāya olokento tiṭṭhati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:468_25: ‘mayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocessāmā’ti evaṃ vattumpi vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:468_28: Apubbassa anuppāditattā aññesaṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “tassevetaṃ akappiya”nti.
tika-vin08t0:469_1: Kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattāti ettha sāratthadīpaniyaṃ evaṃ vicāraṇā katā –
tika-vin08t0:469_4: Vuttañhi tattha “yo pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā ‘therassa pattaṃ kiṇitvā dehī’ti pahitakappiyakārakena
tika-vin08t0:469_5: saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā ‘ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā imaṃ dehī’ti kahāpaṇe dāpetvā gahito,
tika-vin08t0:469_6: ayaṃ patto etasseva bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati dubbicāritattā,
tika-vin08t0:469_11: Ettha keci vadanti “kahāpaṇe sādiyitvā vicāritaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vutta”nti,
tika-vin08t0:469_13: tasmā sabbesaṃ na kappatīti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:469_14: Keci pana “asādiyitvāpi kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā rūpiyasaṃvohāro kato hoti,
tika-vin08t0:469_17: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi idaṃ vuttaṃ “catutthapatto gihisantakānaṃyeva kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā aññesaṃ kappati,
tika-vin08t0:469_18: idha pana saṅghikānaṃ vicāritattā sabbesaṃ na kappatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:469_19: Sabbesampi vādo tena tena pariyāyena yuttoyevāti.
tika-vin08t0:471_2: araññaṃ dammī”ti vutte pana vaṭṭatīti ettha nivāsaṭṭhānattā puggalassapi suddhacittena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:471_4: Pariyāyena kathitattāti “gaṇhāhī”ti avatvā “sīmā gatā”ti pariyāyena kathitattā.
tika-vin08t0:471_6: Dāsaṃ dammīti ettha “manussaṃ dammīti vutte vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:471_7: Veyyāvaccakarantiādinā vutte puggalassapi dāsaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati “anujānāmi bhikkhave ārāmika”nti visesetvā anuññātattā.
tika-vin08t0:471_10: Khettādayo pana sabbe saṅghasseva vaṭṭanti pāḷiyaṃ puggalikavasena gahetuṃ ananuññātattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:471_12: vaṭṭatīti ettha kukkuṭasūkaresu dīyamānesu “imehi amhākaṃ attho natthi,
tika-vin08t0:471_16: “Khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”tiādinā suttantesu āgatapaṭikkhepo bhagavatā āpattiyāpi hetubhāvena
tika-vin08t0:471_17: katoti bhagavato adhippāyaṃ jānantehi saṅgītikārakamahātherehi khettapaṭiggahaṇādinissito ayaṃ sabbopi
tika-vin08t0:472_5: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehīti ayaṃ panettha attho.
tika-vin08t0:473_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne sāratthadīpaniyaṃ evaṃ vicāraṇā katā –
tika-vin08t0:473_1: ettha ca yaṃ vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin08t0:473_2: cīvarena acchādehīti idaṃ āgamanasuddhiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:473_3: Sace hi ‘idaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī’ti peseyya,
tika-vin08t0:473_4: āgamanassa asuddhattā akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbha bhikkhunā kappiyakārakopi niddisitabbo na bhaveyyā”ti,
tika-vin08t0:473_5: tattha āgamanassa suddhiyā vā asuddhiyā vā visesappayojanaṃ na dissati.
tika-vin08t0:473_6: Satipi hi āgamanassa asuddhabhāve dūto attano kusalatāya kappiyavohārena vadati,
tika-vin08t0:473_8: na ca dūtena kappiyavohāravasena vutte dāyakena “idaṃ kathaṃ pesita”nti īdisī vicāraṇā upalabbhati,
tika-vin08t0:473_9: avicāretvā ca taṃ na sakkā jānituṃ.
tika-vin08t0:473_10: Yadi pana āgamanassa asuddhattā kappiyakārako niddisitabbo na bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:473_11: cīvarānaṃ atthāya dūtassa hatthe akappiyavatthumhi pesite sabbattha dāyakena kathaṃ pesitanti pucchitvāva kappiyakārako niddisitabbo bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:473_12: tasmā asatipi āgamanasuddhiyaṃ sace so dūto attano kusalatāya kappiyavohāravasena vadati,
tika-vin08t0:473_15: mūlassāmikena kappiyavohāravasena pesitassa dūtassa akappiyavohāravasena vadatopi kappiyakārako niddisitabbo bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:473_17: Iminā cīvaracetāpannenātiādinā pana imamatthaṃ dasseti “kappiyavasena ābhatampi cīvaramūlaṃ īdisena dūtavacanena akappiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:473_19: Tenevāha “tena bhikkhunā so dūto evamassa vacanīyotiādī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:474_1: yaṃ vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena
tika-vin08t0:474_3: Sace hi ‘idaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī’ti peseyya,
tika-vin08t0:474_4: āgamanassa asuddhattā akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbha bhikkhunā kappiyakārakopi niddisitabbo na bhaveyyā”ti,
tika-vin08t0:474_5: taṃ nissaggiyavatthudukkaṭavatthubhūtaṃ akappiyacīvaracetāpannaṃ “asukassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti evaṃ āgamanasuddhiyā asati,
tika-vin08t0:474_6: sikkhāpade āgatanayena dūtavacane ca asuddhe sabbathā paṭikkhepoyeva kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:474_7: na pana “cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti vattuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:474_8: tadanusārena veyyāvaccakarañca niddisituṃ āgamanadūtavacanānaṃ ubhinnaṃ asuddhattā,
tika-vin08t0:474_9: pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena pana āgamanasuddhiyā sati dūtavacane asuddhepi sikkhāpade āgatanayena sabbaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:474_10: Tena ca yathā dūtavacanāsuddhiyampi āgamane suddhe veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:474_11: evaṃ āgamanāsuddhiyampi dūtavacane suddhe vaṭṭati evāti ayamattho atthato siddhova hoti.
tika-vin08t0:474_12: Ubhayasuddhiyaṃ vattabbameva natthīti ubhayāsuddhipakkhameva sandhāya mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kappiyakārakopi
tika-vin08t0:475_0: Yaṃ panettha sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “āgamanassa suddhiyā vā asuddhiyā vā visesappayojanaṃ na dissatī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:475_1: taṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāvacanassa adhippāyaṃ asallakkhetvā vuttaṃ yathāvuttanayena āgamanasuddhiādinā sappayojanattā.
tika-vin08t0:475_3: pesitadūtassa akappiyavohārena vadatopi kappiyakārako niddisitabbo bhaveyyā”ti aniṭṭhappasaṅgo vutto,
tika-vin08t0:475_4: so aniṭṭhappasaṅgo eva na hoti abhimatattā.
tika-vin08t0:475_5: Tathā hi sikkhāpade eva “paṭiggaṇhatu āyasmā cīvaracetāpanna”nti akappiyavohārena vadato dūtassa kappiyena
tika-vin08t0:475_6: kammena veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo vutto āgamanassa suddhattā,
tika-vin08t0:475_7: āgamanassapi asuddhiyaṃ pana kappiyenapi kammena veyyāvaccakaro na niddisitabbovāti attheva āgamanassa suddhiasuddhiyā payojanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:475_10: Dūtena hi akappiyavohārena vutte eva āgamanasuddhi gavesitabbā,
tika-vin08t0:475_12: Tattha ca tassa vacanakkamena pucchitvā ca yuttiādīhi ca sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:475_13: Idhāpi hi sikkhāpade “cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhata”nti dūtavacaneneva cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dātuṃ pesitabhāvo viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:475_14: Yadi hi sabbathā āgamanasuddhi na viññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:476_0: Suvaṇṇaṃ rajataṃ kahāpaṇo māsakoti imāni hi cattāri nissaggiyavatthūni,
tika-vin08t0:476_1: muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ lohitaṅko masāragallaṃ satta dhaññāni dāsidāsaṃ khettaṃ vatthu
tika-vin08t0:476_2: pupphārāmaphalārāmādayoti imāni dukkaṭavatthūni ca attano vā cetiyasaṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ
tika-vin08t0:476_4: tasmā taṃ sādituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ “na kho mayaṃ āvuso cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:476_5: Cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”tiādi dūtavacanassa akappiyattepi āgamanasuddhiyā paṭipajjanavidhidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:476_6: Kālena kappiyanti yuttapattakālena yadā no attho hoti,
tika-vin08t0:476_10: “Veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo”ti idaṃ “atthi panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti kappiyavacanena vuttattā anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:476_14: Ārāmiko vā upāsako vāti idaṃ sāruppatāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:476_15: ṭhapetvā pana pañca sahadhammike yo koci kappiyakārako vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:476_16: Eso kho āvuso bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaroti idaṃ dūtena “atthi panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti pucchitattā
tika-vin08t0:476_22: na vattabbo tassa dehītiādi akappiyavatthusādiyanaparimocanatthaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:477_0: Āṇatto so mayāti yathā tumhākaṃ cīvarena atthe sati cīvaraṃ dassati,
tika-vin08t0:477_2: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “saññattotiādi evaṃ dūtena puna vutte eva codetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:477_4: Ettha pana pāḷiyaṃ “saññatto so mayā”ti āgatattā evaṃ vutto,
tika-vin08t0:477_5: purimavākye pana vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇe “āṇatto so mayā”ti pariyāyavacanena parivattitvā ṭhapitattā tathā vutto,
tika-vin08t0:477_6: tena ca kappiyakārakassa saññāpitabhāve dūtena bhikkhussa puna ārocite eva bhikkhunā kappiyakārako codetabbo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:478_2: tassa vā attho yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vattabbo.
tika-vin08t0:478_3: Dehi me cīvarantiādīni pana na vattabbākāradassanatthaṃ vuttāni.
tika-vin08t0:478_5: etesaṃ vā attho yāya kāyaci bhāsāya na vattabbo.
tika-vin08t0:478_6: “Evaṃ vadanto ca paṭikkhittattā vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin08t0:478_7: codanā pana hotiyevā”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:478_9: cetāpehi me cīvara’nti idaṃ dūtenābhatarūpiyaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ attanā niddiṭṭhakappiyakārakattāva ‘dehi me cīvaraṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t0:478_10: cetāpehi me cīvara’nti vadanto rūpiyassa pakatattā tena rūpiyena parivattetvā ‘dehi cetāpehī’ti rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ
tika-vin08t0:478_11: samāpajjanto nāma hotīti taṃ dosaṃ dūrato parivajjetuṃ vuttaṃ rūpiyapaṭiggāhakena saṅghamajjhe nissaṭṭharūpiye viya.
tika-vin08t0:478_12: Vuttañhi tattha ‘na vattabbo imaṃ vā imaṃ vā āharā’ti,
tika-vin08t0:478_13: tasmā na idaṃ viññattidose parivajjetuṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ ‘attho me āvuso cīvarenā’tipi avattabbatāppasaṅgato.
tika-vin08t0:478_14: Teneva dūtaniddiṭṭhesu rūpiyasaṃvohārasaṅkābhāvato aññaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetvāpi āharāpetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:478_15: Tatthāpi “dūtena ṭhapitarūpiyena cetāpetvā cīvaraṃ āharāpehī”ti avatvā kevalaṃ “cīvaraṃ āharāpehī”ti
tika-vin08t0:479_0: Iccetaṃ kusalanti evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ codento taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādetuṃ sakkoti attano paṭilābhavasena,
tika-vin08t0:479_2: Catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbanti ṭhānalakkhaṇanidassanametaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:479_4: Chakkhattuparamanti etena cīvaraṃ uddissa tuṇhībhūteneva ṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:479_5: na aññaṃ kiñci kātabbanti idaṃ ṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:482_0: Vacanato kiriyāvisesanameva sāsanavohārena bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ nāma jātaṃ;
tika-vin08t0:485_0: Vacanato kiriyāvisesanapadena tulyādhikaraṇabhūtaṃ kiriyāvisesyapadaṃ akammakampi sakammakampi bhūdhātukaradhātūhi
tika-vin08t0:485_1: sambandhitabbaṃ hotīti iminā ñāyena chakkhattuparamaṃ ṭhānaṃ bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:485_7: Na āsane nisīditabbanti “idha bhante nisīdathā”ti vuttepi na nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:485_8: Na āmisaṃ paṭiggahetabbanti “yāgukhajjakādibhedaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ gaṇhatha bhante”ti yāciyamānenapi na gaṇhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:485_9: Na dhammo bhāsitabboti “maṅgalaṃ vā anumodanaṃ vā bhāsathā”ti yāciyamānenapi kiñci na bhāsitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:486_1: Ṭhānanti ṭhitiyā ca kāraṇassa ca nāmaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:486_10: taṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanena asaṃsandanato ganthagarubhayena na vadimha.
tika-vin08t0:486_14: Yasmā ca ekacodanāvuddhiyā dvinnaṃ ṭhānānaṃ hāni vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:486_15: tasmā codanā dviguṇaṃ ṭhānanti lakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:486_16: Iti iminā lakkhaṇena tikkhattuṃ codetvā chakkhattuṃ ṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:487_0: Tatra tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti idaṃ codakassa ṭhitaṭṭhānato apakkamma tatra tatra uddissa ṭhānaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:487_1: Ko pana vādo nānādivasesūti nānādivasesu evaṃ karontassa ko pana vādo,
tika-vin08t0:487_4: dūto vā pāhetabboti idaṃ sabhāvato codetuṃ anicchantenapi kātabbamevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:487_5: Na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhotīti taṃ cīvaracetāpannaṃ assa bhikkhuno kiñci appamattakampi kammaṃ na nipphādeti.
tika-vin08t0:487_6: Yuñjantāyasmanto sakanti āyasmanto attano santakaṃ dhanaṃ pāpuṇantu.
tika-vin08t0:487_7: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “yatassa cīvaracetāpannantiādi yena attanā veyyāvaccakaro niddiṭṭho,
tika-vin08t0:487_10: Evaṃ bhikkhunā vatthusāmikānaṃ vutte codetvā denti,
tika-vin08t0:487_12: Teneva so sayaṃ acodetvā upāsakādīhi pariyāyena vatvā codāpeti,
tika-vin08t0:487_13: tesu satakkhattumpi codetvā cīvaraṃ dāpentesu tassa anāpatti siddhā hoti sikkhāpadassa anāṇattikattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:488_1: Kenaci aniddiṭṭho attano mukheneva byāvaṭabhāvaṃ veyyāvaccakarattaṃ patto mukhavevaṭiko,
tika-vin08t0:488_2: avicāretukāmatāyāti iminā vijjamānampi dātuṃ anicchantā ariyāpi vañcanādhippāyaṃ vinā vohārato natthīti vadantīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:488_3: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “avicāretukāmatāyāti imasmiṃ pakkhe ‘natthamhākaṃ kappiyakārako’ti idaṃ tādisaṃ
tika-vin08t0:488_4: karonto kappiyakārako natthīti iminā adhippāyena vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:488_5: Bhesajjakkhandhake meṇḍakaseṭṭhivatthumhi vuttaṃ “santi bhikkhave”tiādivacanameva meṇḍakasikkhāpadaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:488_6: Tattha hi meṇḍakena nāma seṭṭhinā “santi hi bhante maggā kantārā appodakā appabhakkhā na sukarā apātheyyena gantuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:488_7: sādhu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātheyyaṃ anujānātū”ti yācitena bhagavatā “anujānāmi bhikkhave pātheyyaṃ pariyesituṃ.
tika-vin08t0:488_17: te kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe hiraññaṃ upanikkhipanti ‘iminā yaṃ ayyassa kappiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:488_25: kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ pariyesitabbanti vadāmī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:488_26: “Kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe hiraññaṃ nikkhipantī”ti etthāpi bhikkhussa ārocanaṃ atthiyeva,
tika-vin08t0:488_27: aññathā aniddiṭṭhakappiyakārakapakkhaṃ bhajatīti na codetabbo siyā,
tika-vin08t0:488_28: idaṃ pana dūtena niddiṭṭhakappiyakārake sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:488_29: na pana bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhe vā aniddiṭṭhe vā.
tika-vin08t0:489_0: Aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabbanti idaṃ attanā codanāṭṭhānañca na kātabbanti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:489_1: Piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāyāti iminā cīvaratthāyeva na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:489_2: Eseva nayoti iminā vatthusāminā niddiṭṭhakappiyakārakesupi piṇḍapātādīnampi atthāya dinne ca ṭhānacodanādisabbaṃ
tika-vin08t0:490_1: Upanikkhittasādiyane panātiādīsu “idaṃ ayyassa hotū”ti evaṃ sammukhā vā “amukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne mama hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ atthi,
tika-vin08t0:490_2: taṃ tuyhaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ parammukhā vā ṭhitassa kevalaṃ vācāya vā hatthamuddāya vā “tuyha”nti vatvā pariccattassa
tika-vin08t0:490_3: kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā cittena sādiyanaṃ upanikkhittasādiyanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:491_0: Idaṃ guttaṭṭhānanti ācikkhitabbanti paccayaparibhogaṃyeva sandhāya ācikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:491_1: “Idha nikkhipā”ti vutte “uggaṇhāpeyya vā”ti vuttalakkhaṇena nissaggiyaṃ hotīti āha “idha nikkhipāhīti na vattabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:491_2: Atha vā “idaṃ guttaṭṭhāna”nti ācikkhanto ṭhānassa guttabhāvameva dasseti,
tika-vin08t0:491_5: “Idha nikkhipāhī”ti pana vadanto nikkhipitabbaṃ vatthuṃ nikkhipāhīti vatthuṃ parāmasati nāma,
tika-vin08t0:491_7: Parato idaṃ gaṇhāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t0:491_8: Kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitaṃ hotīti yasmā tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo kappati,
tika-vin08t0:491_10: yasmā pana dubbicāraṇāya tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo na kappati,
tika-vin08t0:491_12: Atha vā idaṃ dhanaṃ yasmā “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:491_16: Atha vā taṃ dhanaṃ yasmā pacchā suṭṭhuvicāraṇāya satiyā kappiyaṃ bhavissati,
tika-vin08t0:491_18: tasmā kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitaṃ hotīti.
tika-vin08t0:491_19: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “eko sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vātiādi rūpiye heṭṭhimakoṭiyā pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ vutta”nti
tika-vin08t0:491_21: ‘idha nikkhipāhī’ti vutte uggaṇhāpanaṃ hotīti āha ‘idha nikkhipāhī’ti na vattabba”nti ca “kappiyañca…pe…
tika-vin08t0:491_22: hotīti yasmā asāditattā tato uppannapaccayā vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin08t0:491_24: yasmā pana dubbicāraṇāya sati tato uppannaṃ na kappati,
tika-vin08t0:491_25: tasmā akappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitanti veditabba”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:492_1: Saṅghamajjhe nissajjitabbanti yasmā rūpiyaṃ nāma akappiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:492_2: tasmā saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā nissajjitabbanti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:492_6: Na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpitanti iminā cetāpitañce,
tika-vin08t0:492_8: Īdisañhi saṅghamajjhe nissajjanaṃ katvāva chaḍḍetvā pācittiyaṃ desāpetabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:492_9: Keci pana “yasmā nissaggiyavatthuṃ paṭiggahetvāpi cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghe nissaṭṭhaṃ kappiyakārakehi
tika-vin08t0:492_11: tasmā vināva upāyaṃ bhājetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:492_13: Tattha hi rūpiyena parivattitapattassa aparibhogova dassito,
tika-vin08t0:492_15: Kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbanti pabbajitānaṃ sappi vā telaṃ vā vaṭṭati upāsakāti evaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:493_0: Ārāmikānaṃ vā pattabhāganti idaṃ gihīnaṃ hatthagatopi soyeva bhāgoti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:493_1: Sace pana tena aññaṃ parivattetvā ārāmikā denti,
tika-vin08t0:493_2: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti majjhimagaṇṭhipade cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:493_5: Mañcapīṭhādīni vāti ettha tato gahitamañcapīṭhādīni parivattetvā aññaṃ ce gahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:493_9: chāyāya gatagataṭṭhānaṃ gehaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:493_10: Maggenapīti ettha sace añño maggo natthi,
tika-vin08t0:493_13: Upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjatīti sace upāsako “atibahu etaṃ hiraññaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:493_14: idaṃ bhante ajjeva na vināsetabba”nti vatvā sayaṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapeti,
tika-vin08t0:493_16: evaṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā tato uppannapaccayaṃ paribhuñjanto saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjati,
tika-vin08t0:493_18: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvāti kappiyakārakehi vaḍḍhiyā payojanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:493_19: Akappiyanti tena vatthunā gahitattā vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:494_0: Sace so chaḍḍetīti yattha katthaci khipati,
tika-vin08t0:494_4: No ce chaḍḍetīti atha neva gahetvā gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:494_8: Yo na chandāgatintiādīsu lobhavasena taṃ vatthuṃ attano vā karonto attānaṃ vā ukkaṃsento chandāgatiṃ nāma gacchati.
tika-vin08t0:494_10: na vinaya”nti paraṃ apasādento dosāgatiṃ nāma gacchati.
tika-vin08t0:494_11: Mohavasena pamuṭṭho pamuṭṭhassatibhāvaṃ āpajjanto mohāgatiṃ nāma gacchati.
tika-vin08t0:494_12: Rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa bhayena chaḍḍetuṃ avisahanto bhayāgatiṃ nāma gacchati.
tika-vin08t0:495_1: Patitokāsaṃ asamannārahantena chaḍḍetabbanti idaṃ nirapekkhabhāvadassanaparanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:495_2: tasmā patitaṭṭhāne ñātepi tassa gūthaṃ chaḍḍentassa viya nirapekkhabhāvoyevettha pamāṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:495_5: Bhagavatā hi attano sāsane sīlavato paccayā anuññātā,
tika-vin08t0:495_8: na dussīlassa attano kārānaṃ mahapphalabhāvassa paccāsīsanato.
tika-vin08t0:495_9: Iti satthārā ananuññātattā dāyakehi ca apariccattattā dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo.
tika-vin08t0:495_11: paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṃ gahetvā paribhogo viyāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:495_13: Cīvaraṃ paribhoge paribhogeti kāyato mocetvā paribhoge paribhoge.
tika-vin08t0:495_16: Tathā asakkontena yathāvuttakālavisesavasena ekasmiṃ divase catukkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃyeva vā paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:496_1: iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti ettha hiyyo yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:496_5: so neva davāyātiādinā sace atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇaṃ na kareyya,
tika-vin08t0:496_10: taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sakkā viññātunti idha visuṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:496_12: Paṭiggahaṇassa paribhogassa ca paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayabhāvo yujjati,
tika-vin08t0:496_15: Evaṃ santepīti yadipi dvīsupi ṭhānesu paccavekkhaṇā yuttā,
tika-vin08t0:497_0: Nanu ca “paribhoge karontassa anāpattī”ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:497_1: tasmā paccayasannissitasīlassa pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassa ca ko visesoti? Vuccate –
tika-vin08t0:497_2: purimesu tāva tīsu paccayesu viseso pākaṭoyeva,
tika-vin08t0:497_3: gilānapaccaye pana yathā vatiṃ katvā rukkhamūle gopite tassa phalānipi rakkhitāneva honti,
tika-vin08t0:497_4: evameva paccavekkhaṇāya paccayasannissitasīle rakkhite tappaṭibaddhaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlampi nipphannaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:497_5: Gilānapaccayaṃ appaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantassa sīlaṃ bhijjamānaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlameva bhijjati,
tika-vin08t0:497_6: paccayasannissitasīlaṃ pana pacchābhattapurimayāmādīsu yāva aruṇuggamanā appaccavekkhantasseva bhijjati.
tika-vin08t0:498_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “theyyaparibhogoti paccayassāminā bhagavatā ananuññātattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:498_1: Iṇaparibhogoti bhagavatā anuññātampi kattabbaṃ akatvā paribhuñjanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:498_3: Paribhoge paribhogeti kāyato mocetvā mocetvā paribhoge.
tika-vin08t0:498_5: Iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti ettha ‘hiyyo yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhutta’ntiādināpi atītapaccavekkhaṇā vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:498_6: Paribhoge paribhogeti udakapatanaṭṭhānato antopavesanesu nisīdanasayanesu ca.
tika-vin08t0:498_7: Satipaccayatā vaṭṭatīti paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayattaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:498_8: Paṭiggahaṇe ca paribhoge ca paccavekkhaṇāsati avassaṃ laddhabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:498_10: Keci pana ‘satipaccayatā paccaye sati bhesajjaparibhogassa kāraṇe satī’ti evampi atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:498_11: tesampi paccaye satīti paccayasabbhāvasallakkhaṇe satīti evamattho gahetabbo paccayasabbhāvamattena sīlassa asujjhanato.
tika-vin08t0:498_12: Paribhoge akarontasseva āpattīti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassa bhedo dassito,
tika-vin08t0:498_14: Etasmiṃ pana sesapaccayesu ca iṇaparibhogādivacanena paccayasannissitasīlasseva bhedoti evamimesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditabba”nti āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:499_0: Etesu dvīsu pakaraṇesu “iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatī”ti ettha hiyyo yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhuttanti…pe…
tika-vin08t0:499_2: Imaṃ pana nayaṃ nissāya idāni ekacce paṇḍitā “ajjapāto paribhuttaṃ sāyaṃ paccavekkhantena ajja yaṃ mayā
tika-vin08t0:499_3: cīvaraṃ paribhuttantiādinā atītavasena paccavekkhaṇā kātabbā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:499_7: Tattha mūlavacane evaṃ vicāraṇā kātabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:499_8: Idaṃ hiyyotyādivacanaṃ suttaṃ vā suttānulomaṃ vā ācariyavādo vā attanomati vāti.
tika-vin08t0:499_9: Tattha na tāva suttaṃ hoti “suttaṃ nāma sakale vinayapiṭake pāḷī”ti vuttattā imassa ca vacanassa na pāḷibhūtattā.
tika-vin08t0:499_10: Na ca suttānulomaṃ “suttānulomaṃ nāma cattāro mahāpadesā”ti vuttattā imassa ca mahāpadesabhāvābhāvato.
tika-vin08t0:499_11: Na ca ācariyavādo “ācariyavādo nāma dhammasaṅgāhakehi pañcahi arahantasatehi ṭhapitā pāḷivinimuttā okkantavinicchayappavattā
tika-vin08t0:499_13: Na ca attanomati “attanomati nāma suttasuttānulomaācariyavāde muñcitvā anumānena attano buddhiyā nayaggāhena upaṭṭhitākārakathanaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:499_14: apica suttantābhidhammavinayaṭṭhakathāsu āgato sabbopi theravādo attanomati nāmā”ti vuttattā imassa ca aṭṭhakathāsu āgatattheravādabhāvābhāvato.
tika-vin08t0:503_0: Vuttesu catubbidhavinayesu anantogadhattā idaṃ vacanaṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:503_2: Atha vā “nayaggāhena upaṭṭhitākārakathana”nti iminā lakkhaṇena tesaṃ tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ upaṭṭhitākāravasena kathanaṃ attanomati siyā,
tika-vin08t0:503_5: Sace tattha otarati ceva sameti ca,
tika-vin08t0:503_9: Ayañhi attanomati nāma sabbadubbalā”ti vacanato imassa ca vacanassa aṭṭhakathāvacane anotaraṇato appavisanato.
tika-vin08t0:504_1: kiṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ pāḷivacanaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ vā ṭīkāvacanaṃ vā ganthantaravacanaṃ vāti.
tika-vin08t0:504_7: sakavacanaṃ vā paravacanaṃ vā adhippetavacanaṃ vā anadhippetavacanaṃ vāti.
tika-vin08t0:504_14: Tehi pana ācariyehi atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇāti idaṃ atītapaabhogavasena paccavekkhaṇā atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇāti
tika-vin08t0:504_15: parikappetvā atītavācakena saddena yojetvā kataṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin08t0:504_17: atītaparibhogassa paccavekkhaṇā atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇāti evaṃ pana kate atītaparibhogassa paccuppannasamīpattā
tika-vin08t0:504_18: paccuppannavācakena saddena kathanaṃ hoti yathā taṃ nagarato āgantvā nisinnaṃ purisaṃ “kuto āgacchasī”ti
tika-vin08t0:505_0: Vinayasuttantavisuddhimaggādīsu ca “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevatī”ti vattamānavacaneneva pāṭho hoti,
tika-vin08t0:505_2: atītaparibhogoti ca imasmiṃyeva divase pacchābhattādikālaṃ upādāya purebhattādīsu paribhogo icchitabbo,
tika-vin08t0:505_10: Etena piṇḍapātaṃ ālope ālope paccavekkhanto bhojanakiriyāya apariniṭṭhitattā mukhyato paccuppannapaccavekkhaṇā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:505_11: purebhattādīsu catūsu koṭṭhāsesu paccavekkhanto bhojanakiriyāya pariniṭṭhitattā atītapaccavekkhaṇā hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:505_13: Yadi hi hiyyo paribhuttāni atītapaccavekkhaṇena paccavekkhitabbāni siyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:514_0: Yasmā ca sabbāsavasuttādīsu bhagavatā desitakāle bhikkhukattukattā nāmayogattā vattamānapaṭhamapurisavasena
tika-vin08t0:514_2: tadanukaraṇena bhikkhūnaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle attakattukattā amhayogattā vattamānauttamapurisavasena “paṭisaṅkhā
tika-vin08t0:514_6: tāni ca kiriyāpadāni paccuppannavasena vā paccuppannasamīpaatītavasena vā vattamānavibhattiyuttāni honti,
tika-vin08t0:514_7: tasmā paccuppannaparibhuttānaṃ vā atītaparibhuttānaṃ vā paccayānaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle “paṭisevāmī”ti vacanaṃ
tika-vin08t0:515_1: “ajja pāto paribhuttaṃ sāyaṃ paccavekkhantena ajja yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhuttantiādinā atītavasena paccavekkhaṇā kātabbā”ti ye vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:515_3: kiṃ bhavanto bhagavatā atītaparibhuttesu atītavasena paccavekkhaṇā desitāti?
tika-vin08t0:515_7: Kiṃ bhonto bhagavato kāle atītaparibhuttesu paccavekkhaṇā natthīti? Atthi.
tika-vin08t0:515_8: Atha kasmā bhagavatā paccuppannavaseneva paccavekkhaṇā desitāti?
tika-vin08t0:515_10: Evaṃ sante bhagavato anukaraṇena idānipi atītaparibhuttānaṃ paccayānaṃ paccuppannavasena paccavekkhaṇā kātabbāti.
tika-vin08t0:515_11: Ye pana evaṃ vadanti “hiyyo paribhuttānameva atītapaccavekkhaṇā kātabbā,
tika-vin08t0:515_18: Evaṃ sante sāṭṭhakathesu tepiṭakesu buddhavacanesu asaṃvijjamānaṃ tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ kathaṃ paccetabbanti?
tika-vin08t0:515_21: kālo nāma tividho atīto anāgato paccuppannoti.
tika-vin08t0:518_0: Tattha ajja vā hotu hiyyo vā tato pubbe vā,
tika-vin08t0:518_2: Tattha hiyyo vā tato pubbe vā paribhuttapaccayo atikkantaaruṇuggamanattā na paccavekkhaṇāraho,
tika-vin08t0:518_7: Ajjeva pana cīvarañca senāsanañca paribhoge paribhoge,
tika-vin08t0:518_9: bhesajjaṃ paṭiggahaṇe paribhoge ca paccavekkhato apariniṭṭhitabhuñjanakiriyattā paccuppannaparibhuttapaccavekkhaṇā nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:518_10: Pure paribhuttaṃ tato pacchā catūsu koṭṭhāsesu paccavekkhato supariniṭṭhitabhuñjanakiriyattā atītaparibhuttapaccavekkhaṇā nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:518_16: tasmā hiyyo paribhuttassa iṇaparibhogattā taṃ anāmasitvā ajja paribhuttesu atītapaccuppannesu bhagavato
tika-vin08t0:518_17: vacanassa anukaraṇena vattamānavibhattiyuttena “paṭisevāmī”ti kiriyāpadena paccavekkhaṇā sūpapannā hotīti
tika-vin08t0:518_19: Īdisapaccavekkhaṇameva sandhāya vimativinodaniyādīsu “paccayasannissitasīlassa atītapaccavekkhaṇāya visujjhanato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:519_0: Evaṃ paccayasannissitasīlassa suddhiṃ dassetvā idāni teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi suddhiyo dassetuṃ “catubbidhā hi suddhī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:519_3: Vuṭṭhānassapi cettha desanāya eva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:519_6: Dhammena samena paccayānaṃ pariyeṭṭhi eva suddhi pariyeṭṭhisuddhi.
tika-vin08t0:519_7: Catūsu paccayesu vuttavidhinā paccavekkhaṇāva suddhi paccavekkhaṇasuddhi.
tika-vin08t0:519_9: Suddhimantesu sīlesu pana desanā suddhi etassāti desanāsuddhi.
tika-vin08t0:519_11: Na punevaṃ karissāmīti ettha evanti saṃvarabhedaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin08t0:519_18: Ettha desanāggahaṇena vuṭṭhānampi chinnamūlānaṃ abhikkhutāpaṭiññāpi saṅgahitā.
tika-vin08t0:519_19: Chinnamūlāpattīnampi hi pārājikāpattivuṭṭhānena heṭṭhāparirakkhitaṃ bhikkhusīlaṃ visuddhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:520_11: Paṭi punappunaṃ ogāhetvā ikkhanā paccavekkhaṇā, paṭi-
tika-vin08t0:520_15: Tesu desanāya vacībhedasaddabhāvato vacībhedaṃ kātuṃ asakkontassa ca dutiyakaṃ alabhantassa ca na sampajjati,
tika-vin08t0:520_16: sesā pana cittuppādamattabhāvato vacībhedaṃ kātuṃ asakkontassapi dutiyakaṃ alabhantassapi sampajjanti eva,
tika-vin08t0:520_17: tasmā gilānādikālesu paccavekkhaṇāpāṭhaṃ paṭhitumasakkontenapi atthaṃ manasi katvā citteneva paccavekkhaṇā kātabbāti.
tika-vin08t0:521_2: ananuññātesu sabbena sabbaṃ paribhogābhāvato anuññātesuyeva ca paribhogasabbhāvabhāvato bhikkhūhi paribhuñjitabbapaccayā bhagavato santakā.
tika-vin08t0:521_8: no āmisadāyādā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ dhammadāyādasuttañca ettha etasmiṃ atthe sādhakaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:521_10: tadabhāvena vītarāgānaṃ tattha sāmibhāvo yathāruci paribhogasabbhāvato.
tika-vin08t0:521_11: Tathā hi te paṭikūlampi appaṭikūlākārena appaṭikūlampi paṭikūlākārena tadubhayampi vajjetvā ajjhupekkhaṇākārena paccaye paribhuñjanti,
tika-vin08t0:521_13: Tenāha “te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjantī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:521_15: so iṇaparibhogassa paccanīkattā ānaṇyaparibhogo nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:521_16: Yathā pana iṇāyiko attano ruciyā icchitaṃ desaṃ gantuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin08t0:521_17: evaṃ iṇaparibhogayutto lokato nissarituṃ na labhatīti tappaṭipakkhattā sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo ānaṇyaparibhogoti vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:521_18: tasmā nippariyāyato catuparibhogavinimutto visuṃyevāyaṃ paribhogoti veditabbo,
tika-vin08t0:521_21: Sīlavāpi hi imāya sikkhāya samannāgatattā sekkhotveva vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:522_3: Yo hi puthujjanassapi sallekhapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa paccayagedhaṃ pahāya tattha anupalittena cittena paribhogo,
tika-vin08t0:522_5: Sīlavato pana paccavekkhitaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo viya hoti dāyakānaṃ manorathassāvirādhanato.
tika-vin08t0:522_7: Kalyāṇaputhujjanassa paribhoge vattabbameva natthi tassa sekkhasaṅgahato.
tika-vin08t0:523_2: Sattannaṃ sekkhānanti ettha kalyāṇaputhujjanāpi saṅgahitā tesaṃ ānaṇyaparibhogassa dāyajjaparibhoge saṅgahitattāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:523_9: Tattha me mama āmisadāyādā catupaccayabhuñjakāti bhagavato sambandhabhūtassa sambandhībhūtā paccayā vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:523_10: tasmā dāyakehi dinnāpi paccayā bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato paccayāyeva hontīti etassa atthassa dhammadāyādasuttaṃ sādhakaṃ hotīti atthoti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:524_0: Lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo nāma lajjissa santakaṃ gahetvā paribhogo.
tika-vin08t0:524_2: Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthīti iminā diṭṭhadiṭṭhesuyeva āsaṅkā na kātabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:524_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “yopi attano bhārabhūtena alajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ karoti,
tika-vin08t0:524_10: Alajjīhi saddhivihārikādīhi ekasambhogaṃ karontā aññepi nivāretabbāva.
tika-vin08t0:524_12: ayampi alajjīyeva hotīti ettha evaṃ nivārito so puggalo alajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogato oramati viramati,
tika-vin08t0:524_16: tena saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ karonto sopi alajjīyeva hotīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:524_17: Tena vuttaṃ “evaṃ eko alajjī alajjisatampi karotī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:524_20: Saṅghasseva detīti bhattaṃ aggahetvā attanā laddhasalākaṃyeva deti.
tika-vin08t0:525_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogoti dhammāmisavasena missībhāvo.
tika-vin08t0:525_2: Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthīti iminā diṭṭhadiṭṭhesu āsaṅkā nāma na kātabbā,
tika-vin08t0:525_5: Sace na oramatīti agatigamanavasena dhammāmisaparibhogato na oramati.
tika-vin08t0:525_6: Āpatti nāma natthīti idaṃ alajjīnaṃ dhammenuppannapaccayaṃ dhammakammañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:525_7: Tesampi hi kuladūsanādisamuppannaṃ paccayaṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ vaggakammādīni karontānañca āpatti eva.
tika-vin08t0:525_9: paccayavasena ekakammādivasena ca vuttā evāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:525_10: Teneva duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ codakacuditakabhāve ṭhitā dve alajjino dhammaparibhogampi sandhāya
tika-vin08t0:525_11: ‘ekasambhogaparibhogā hutvā jīvathā’ti vuttā tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ dhammāmisāparibhoge virodhābhāvā.
tika-vin08t0:525_12: Lajjīnameva hi alajjinā saha tadubhayaparibhogo na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:526_1: antaradhāpetīti ettha kevalaṃ paggaṇhitukāmatāya evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:526_2: dhammassa pana sāsanassa sotūnañca anuggahatthāya vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:526_3: Purimanayena “so āpattiyā kāretabbo”ti vuttattā imassa āpattiyevāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:526_5: Dhammānuggahena gaṇhantassa āpattiyā abhāvepi thero tassa alajjibhāvaṃyeva sandhāya “pāpo kirāya”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:527_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne vitthārato vinicchitaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:527_1: Dhammaparibhogoti “ekakammaṃ ekuddeso”tiādinā vuttasaṃvāso ceva nissayaggahaṇādiko sabbo nirāmisaparibhogo ca veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:527_2: “Na so āpattiyā kāretabbo”ti vuttattā lajjino alajjipaggahe āpattīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:527_5: iminā ca lajjino vaṇṇabhaṇanādilābhaṃ paṭicca āmisagarukatāya vā gehassitapemena vā taṃ alajjiṃ paggaṇhanto
tika-vin08t0:527_7: Evaṃ gahaṭṭhādīsu upatthambhito alajjī balaṃ labhitvā pesale abhibhavitvā na cirasseva sāsanaṃ uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ karotīti.
tika-vin08t0:528_0: Dhammaparibhogopi tattha vaṭṭatīti iminā āmisaparibhogato dhammaparibhogova garuko,
tika-vin08t0:528_3: lajjīsu ca appahontesu alajjiṃ pakatattaṃ gaṇapūrakaṃ gahetvā upasampadādikaraṇena ceva keci alajjino
tika-vin08t0:528_4: dhammāmisaparibhogena saṅgahetvā sesālajjigaṇassa niggahena ca sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitumpi vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t0:529_0: Keci pana “koṭiyaṃ ṭhito ganthoti vuttattā ganthapariyāpuṇanameva dhammaparibhogo,
tika-vin08t0:529_2: tasmā alajjīhi saddhiṃ uposathādikaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
