tika-vin08t0:529_5: ekakammādīsu bahūsu dhammaparibhogesu alajjināpi saddhiṃ kattabbāvatthāyattaṃ dhammaparibhogaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t0:529_7: Na hi ekakammādiko vidhi dhammaparibhogo na hotīti sakkā vattuṃ anāmisattā dhammāmisesu apariyāpannassa ca kassaci abhāvā.
tika-vin08t0:529_13: ayaṃ dhammapaṭisanthāro nāmā”ti evaṃ saṅghakammādipi dhammakoṭṭhāse dassitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:529_14: Tesu pana dhammakoṭṭhāsesu yaṃ gaṇapūrakādivasena alajjino apekkhitvā uposathādi vā tesaṃ santikā dhammuggahaṇanissayaggahaṇādi vā karīyati,
tika-vin08t0:529_15: taṃ dhammo ceva paribhogo cāti dhammaparibhogoti vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:529_16: etaṃ tathārūpapaccayaṃ vinā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:529_18: Yaṃ pana alajjisataṃ anapekkhitvā tajjanīyādiniggahakammaṃ vā parivāsādiupakārakammaṃ vā uggahaparipucchādānādi vā karīyati,
tika-vin08t0:529_23: Nissayadānampi terasasammutidānādi ca vattapaṭipattisādiyanādiparibhogassapi hetuttā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:530_0: Yo pana mahāalajjī uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ karoti,
tika-vin08t0:530_1: tassa saddhivihārikādīnaṃ upasampadādi upakārakammampi uggahaparipucchādānādi ca kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:530_5: Dhammāmisaparibhogavivajjanenapi hi dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahova adhippeto,
tika-vin08t0:530_10: taṃ sabbampi paribhogo vā hotu aparibhogo vā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:530_13: dhammāmisaparibhogesu cettha alajjīhi ekakammādidhammaparibhogo eva pesalānaṃ aphāsuvihārāya saddhammaparihānādiatthāya hoti,
tika-vin08t0:530_15: Na hi alajjīnaṃ paccayaparibhogamattena pesalānaṃ aphāsuvihārādi hoti,
tika-vin08t0:530_18: Tathā hi katasikkhāpadavītikkamā alajjipuggalā uposathādīsu paviṭṭhā “tumhe kāyadvāre ceva vacīdvāre
tika-vin08t0:530_19: ca vītikkamaṃ karothā”tiādinā bhikkhūhi vattabbā honti.
tika-vin08t0:530_20: Yathā vinayañca atiṭṭhantā saṅghato bahikaraṇādivasena suṭṭhu niggahetabbā,
tika-vin08t0:530_21: tathā akatvā tehi saha saṃvasantāpi alajjinova honti “ekopi alajjī alajjisatampi karotī”tiādivacanato.
tika-vin08t0:530_22: Yadi hi te evaṃ aniggahitā siyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:530_23: saṅghe kalahādiṃ vaḍḍhetvā uposathādisāmaggikammapaṭibāhanādinā pesalānaṃ aphāsuṃ katvā kamena te devadattavajjiputtakādayo
tika-vin08t0:530_24: viya parisaṃ vaḍḍhetvā attano vippaṭipattiṃ dhammato vinayato dīpentā saṅghabhedādimpi katvā na cirasseva
tika-vin08t0:530_26: Tesu pana saṅghato bahikaraṇādivasena niggahitesu sabbopi ayaṃ upaddavo na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:530_31: dussīlesu pana niggahitesu sabbopi ayaṃ upaddavo na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:530_33: tasmā ekakammādidhammaparibhogova āmisaparibhogatopi ativiya alajjīvivekena kātabbo,
tika-vin08t0:531_2: saṅghakammāni na pavattantī”ti evaṃ alajjīhi saddhiṃ saṅghakammākaraṇassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsitattāpi cetaṃ sijjhati.
tika-vin08t0:531_3: Tathā parivattaliṅgassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunupassayaṃ gacchantassa paṭipattikathāyaṃ “ārādhikā ca honti saṅgāhikā lajjiniyo,
tika-vin08t0:531_9: tāpi pariccajitvā aññattha gantuṃ labhatī”ti evaṃ alajjinīsu dutiyikāgahaṇādīsu saṃvāsāpattiparihārāya
tika-vin08t0:531_10: nadīpārāgamanādigarukāpattiṭṭhānānaṃ anuññātattā tatopi alajjisaṃvāsāpatti eva saddhammaparihāniyā hetubhūto
tika-vin08t0:531_12: Na hi lahukāpattiṭṭhānaṃ vā anāpattiṭṭhānaṃ vā pariharituṃ garukāpattiṭṭhānavītikkamaṃ ācariyā anujānanti.
tika-vin08t0:531_13: Tathā asaṃvāsapadassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbehipi lajjipuggalehi samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato samasikkhātā nāma.
tika-vin08t0:531_14: Ettha yasmā sabbepi lajjino etesu kammādīsu saha vasanti,
tika-vin08t0:531_16: tasmā tāni sabbānipi gahetvā eso saṃvāso nāmā”ti evaṃ lajjīheva ekakammādisaṃvāso vaṭṭatīti pakāsito.
tika-vin08t0:532_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā asaṃvāsikesu alajjī na gahitoti?
tika-vin08t0:532_2: ye gaṇapūrake katvā kataṃ kammaṃ kuppati,
tika-vin08t0:532_5: te ce gaṇapūrakā hutvā kammaṃ sādhenti,
tika-vin08t0:532_6: kevalaṃ katvā agatigamanena karontānaṃ āpattikarā honti sabhāgāpattiāpannā viya aññamaññaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:532_9: Sañcicca hi vītikkamacitte uppanne alajjino “na puna īdisaṃ karissāmī”ti cittena lajjino honti.
tika-vin08t0:533_0: Tesu ca ye pesalehi ovadiyamānāpi na oramanti,
tika-vin08t0:533_4: tasmāpi alajjino asaṃvāsikesu agaṇetvā tapparivajjanatthaṃ sodhetvāva uposathādikaraṇaṃ anaññātaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:533_6: pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”tiādinā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathakaraṇassa ayuttatā pakāsitā,
tika-vin08t0:533_9: phāsu hotī”ti evaṃ alajjimpi lajjidhamme patiṭṭhāpetvā uposathakaraṇappakāro ca vutto,
tika-vin08t0:533_12: parisuddhoti maṃ dhārethā”ti ca evaṃ uposathaṃ karontānaṃ parisuddhatā ca pakāsitā,
tika-vin08t0:533_14: sabbathā lajjidhammaṃ anokkamantehi saṃvāsassa ayuttatāya nissayadānaggahaṇapaṭikkhepo,
tika-vin08t0:533_17: aṭṭhakathāvacanehi ca pakatattehipi apakatattehipi sabbehi alajjīhi ekakammādisaṃvāso na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:533_18: karontānaṃ āpatti eva dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahatthāyeva sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ paññattattāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:533_19: Teneva dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ pakatattāpi alajjino vajjiputtakā yasattherādīhi mahantena vāyāmena saṅghato viyojitā.
tika-vin08t0:533_21: tehi dīpitānaṃ dasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ lahukāpattivisayattāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:539_3: cīvarādivatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto alobhappadhāno kāmāvacarakusalakiriyacittuppādo.
tika-vin08t0:539_20: Dānavissāsaggāhehi lābhassa pariṇāmananti ettha uddese samabhiniviṭṭhassa “dāna”nti padassa atthavinicchayo tāva paṭhamaṃ evaṃ veditabboti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:540_2: “Idaṃ tuyhaṃ demī”ti vadatīti idaṃ tivaṅgasampannaṃ dānalakkhaṇaṃ hotīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:540_10: kiṃ evaṃ dīyamānaṃ sammukhāyeva dinnaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:540_11: udāhu parammukhāpīti āha “sammukhāpi parammukhāpi dinnaṃyeva hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:540_18: Tava santakaṃ karohītiādīni pana pariyāyato dānaggahaṇāni,
tika-vin08t0:540_20: Loke hi apariccajitukāmāpi puna gaṇhitukāmāpi “tava santakaṃ hotū”ti niyyātenti yathā taṃ kusarañño mātu rajjaniyyātanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:540_23: Sace panātiādīsu pana dāyakena paññattiyaṃ akovidatāya pariyāyavacane vuttepi paṭiggāhako attano paññattiyaṃ kovidatāya mukhyavacanena gaṇhāti,
tika-vin08t0:541_0: Sace pana ekotiādīsu pana dāyako mukhyavacanena deti,
tika-vin08t0:541_2: tasmā dāyakassa pubbe adhiṭṭhitampi cīvaraṃ dānavasena adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati,
tika-vin08t0:541_3: pariccattattā attano asantakattā atirekacīvarampi na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:541_5: Paṭiggāhakassapi na paṭikkhipitattā attano santakaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:541_6: tasmā atirekacīvaraṃ na hotīti dasāhātikkamepi āpatti natthi.
tika-vin08t0:541_7: Yassa pana ruccatīti ettha pana imassa cīvarassa assāmikattā paṃsukūlaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā yassa ruccati,
tika-vin08t0:541_9: paribhuñjantena pana dāyakena pubbaadhiṭṭhitampi dānavasena adhiṭṭhānassa vijahitattā puna adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin08t0:542_0: Itthannāmassa dehītiādīsu pana āṇatyatthe pavattāya pañcamīvibhattiyā vuttattā āṇattena paṭiggāhakassa dinnakāleyeva paṭiggāhakassa santakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:542_5: Itthannāmassa dammīti pana paccuppannatthe pavattāya vattamānavibhattiyā vuttattā tato paṭṭhāya paṭiggāhakasseva santakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:542_8: Tasmāti iminā āyasmatā revatattherena āyasmato sāriputtassa cīvarapesanavatthusmiṃ bhagavatā desitesu
tika-vin08t0:542_9: adhiṭṭhānesu idha vuttalakkhaṇena asammohato jānitabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:543_1: svādhiṭṭhitanti ca na ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:543_2: atha kho sāmike jīvante vissāsaggāhacīvarabhāvena ca sāmike mate matakacīvarabhāvena ca gahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:543_3: tato pana dasāhe anatikkanteyeva ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ vā parikkhāracoḷādhiṭṭhānaṃ vā vikappanaṃ vā kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:544_4: nissaggiyanti iminā parasantakabhūtattaṃ jānanto theyyapasayhavasena acchindanto pārājiko hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:544_5: Porāṇaṭīkāyaṃ pana “sakasaññāya vinā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā āpattiyā kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:544_6: Sakasaññāya vināpi tāvakālikapaṃsukūlasaññādivasena gaṇhanto āpattiyā na kāretabbo.
tika-vin08t0:545_1: evaṃ pana dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā dānassa evaṃ dadanto apariccajitvā dinnattā dānaṃ na hotīti na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:545_3: Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatīti pubbe “akarontassa na demī”ti vuttattā yathāvuttaupajjhāyaggahaṇādīni akaronte ācariyasseva santakaṃ hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:545_4: Karonte pana antevāsikassa santakaṃ bhaveyya sabbaso apariccajitvā dinnattā.
tika-vin08t0:545_6: Ṭīkāyaṃ pana “evaṃ dinnaṃ bhatisadisattā āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:545_7: Bhatisadise satipi kamme kate bhati laddhabbā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:545_9: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti kamme akate bhatisadisattā vutta”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:545_10: tena kamme kate āharāpetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:545_12: tena ca sāmaṇerakāle datvā upasampannakāle acchindatopi pācittiyaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:545_13: Ayaṃ tāva dāne vinicchayoti iminā dānavinicchayādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vinicchayānaṃ ekaparicchedakatabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:547_1: Anuṭṭhānaseyyā nāma yāya seyyāya sayito yāva jīvitindriyupacchedaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:547_3: Dadamānena ca matakadhanaṃ tāva ye tassa dhane issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā,
tika-vin08t0:547_4: tesaṃ dātabbanti ettha ke gahaṭṭhā ke pabbajitā kena kāraṇena tassa dhane issarāti?
tika-vin08t0:547_5: Gahaṭṭhā tāva gilānupaṭṭhākabhūtā tena kāraṇena gilānupaṭṭhākabhāgabhūte tassa dhane issarā,
tika-vin08t0:547_6: yesañca vāṇijānaṃ hatthato kappiyakārakena pattādiparikkhāro gāhāpito,
tika-vin08t0:547_9: yesañca mātāpitūnaṃ atthāya paricchinditvā vatthāni ṭhapitāni,
tika-vin08t0:547_11: Evamādinā yena yena kāraṇena yaṃ yaṃ parikkhāradhanaṃ yehi yehi gahaṭṭhehi labhitabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:547_12: tena tena kāraṇena te te gahaṭṭhā tassa tassa dhanassa issarā.
tika-vin08t0:548_0: Pabbajitā pana bāhirakā tatheva sati kāraṇe issarā.
tika-vin08t0:548_1: Pañcasu pana sahadhammikesu bhikkhū sāmaṇerā ca matānaṃ bhikkhusāmaṇerānaṃ dhanaṃ vināpi kāraṇena dāyādabhāvena labhanti, na itarā.
tika-vin08t0:548_2: Bhikkhunīsikkhamānasāmaṇerīnampi dhanaṃ tāyeva labhanti, na itare.
tika-vin08t0:548_3: Taṃ pana matakadhanabhājanaṃ catupaccayabhājanavinicchaye āvi bhavissati,
tika-vin08t0:548_4: bahū pana vinayadharattherā “ye tassa dhanassa issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā”ti pāṭhaṃ nissāya “matabhikkhussa
tika-vin08t0:548_6: tampi vinicchayaṃ tassa ca yuttāyuttabhāvaṃ tattheva vakkhāma.
tika-vin08t0:549_0: Anattamanassa santakanti “duṭṭhu kataṃ tayā mayā adinnaṃ mama santakaṃ gaṇhantenā”ti vacībhedena vā cittuppādamattena vā domanassappattassa santakaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:549_1: Yo pana paṭhamaṃyeva “suṭṭhu kataṃ tayā mama santakaṃ gaṇhantenā”ti vacībhedena vā cittuppādamattena vā anumoditvā pacchā kenaci kāraṇena kupito,
tika-vin08t0:549_5: na kiñci vadatīti ettha tu porāṇaṭīkāyaṃ “cittena pana adhivāsetīti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ‘na kiñci vadatī’ti vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:549_6: Evaṃ sati “cittenā”ti idaṃ adhivāsanakiriyāya karaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:549_10: Taṃ ṭhapetvā “adātukāmo”ti ettha kāyenāti vā vācāyāti vā aññaṃ karaṇampi na sambhavati,
tika-vin08t0:549_13: Na kiñci vadatīti ettha tu vadanakiriyāya karaṇaṃ “vācāyā”ti padaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:549_14: tathā ca sati aññaṃ adhivāsanakiriyāya karaṇaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:549_21: na kiñci vadatīti yojanaṃ katvā pana “adhivāsetīti vuttamevatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ na kiñci vadatīti vutta”nti vattumarahati.
tika-vin08t0:549_27: “Adhivāsetī”ti vutte avadanakiriyāya apākaṭabhāvato taṃ pakāsetuṃ “na kiñci vadatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:551_1: Lābhapariṇāmanavinicchaye tumhākaṃ sappiādīni ābhatānīti tumhākaṃ atthāya ābhatāni sappiādīni.
tika-vin08t0:551_2: Pariṇatabhāvaṃ jānitvāpi vuttavidhinā viññāpentena tesaṃ santakameva viññāpitaṃ nāma hotīti āha “mayhampi dethāti vadati,
tika-vin08t0:552_0: “Pupphampi āropetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ pariṇataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:552_1: sace pana ekasmiṃ cetiye pūjitaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā aññasmiṃ cetiye pūjeti,
tika-vin08t0:552_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana niyametvā “aññassa cetiyassa atthāya ropitamālāvacchato”ti vuttattā na kevalaṃ pariṇatabhāvoyeva kathito,
tika-vin08t0:552_7: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “ropitamālāvacchatoti kenaci niyametvā ropitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:552_8: anocitaṃ milāyamānaṃ ocinitvā yattha katthaci pūjetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:552_9: Ṭhitaṃ disvāti sesakaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā.
tika-vin08t0:552_12: tiracchānagatassa pariccajitvā dinne pana taṃ palāpetvā aññaṃ bhuñjāpetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:552_14: Evaṃ pana apucchitepi ‘apariṇataṃ ida’nti jānantena attano ruciyā yattha icchati,
tika-vin08t0:552_15: tattha dāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:552_17: tattha dethāti etthāpi “tumhākaṃ ruciyā”ti vuttattā yattha icchati,
tika-vin08t0:553_0: Parivāre pana nava adhammikāni dānānīti saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin08t0:553_1: cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin08t0:553_2: puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmetīti evaṃ vuttāni.
tika-vin08t0:553_3: Nava paṭiggahā paribhogā cāti etesaṃyeva dānānaṃ paṭiggahā ca paribhogā ca.
tika-vin08t0:553_4: Tīṇi dhammikāni dānānīti saṅghassa ninnaṃ saṅghasseva deti,
tika-vin08t0:553_6: puggalassa ninnaṃ puggalasseva detīti imāni tīṇi.
tika-vin08t0:553_7: Paṭiggahapaṭibhogāpi tesaṃyeva paṭiggahā ca paribhogā cāti āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:558_7: jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:558_8: Tāsaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha jātā nāma pathavī”tyādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:559_0: Tattha suddhā paṃsukāyeva ettha pathaviyā atthi,
tika-vin08t0:559_13: Yebhuyyenapaṃsukāti ettha tīsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāsā paṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:559_19: Hatthikucchiyaṃ kira ekaṃ pacchipūraṃ āharāpetvā doṇiyaṃ dhovitvā pathaviyā yebhuyyenasakkharabhāvaṃ ñatvā sayaṃ bhikkhū pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇiṃsūti.
tika-vin08t0:560_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi yebhuyyenapaṃsuṃ appapaṃsuñca pathaviṃ vatvā upaḍḍhapaṃsukāpathavī na vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:560_1: tathāpi paṇṇattivajjasikkhāpadesu sāvasesapaññattiyāpi sambhavato upaḍḍhapaṃsukāyapi pathaviyā pācittiyamevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:560_2: Keci pana “sabbacchannādīsu upaḍḍhacchanne dukkaṭassa vuttattā idhāpi dukkaṭaṃ yujjatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:560_3: taṃ na yuttaṃ pācittiyavatthukañca anāpattivatthukañca duvidhaṃ pathaviṃ ṭhapetvā aññissā dukkaṭavatthukāya tatiyāya pathaviyā abhāvato.
tika-vin08t0:560_4: Dveyeva hi pathaviyo vuttā “jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:560_6: Vinayavinicchaye ca sampatte garukalahukesu garukeyeva ṭhātabbattā na sakkā ettha anāpattiyā bhavituṃ.
tika-vin08t0:560_7: Sabbacchannādīsu pana upaḍḍhe dukkaṭaṃ yuttaṃ tattha tādisassa dukkaṭavatthuno sambhavato.
tika-vin08t0:560_8: Vimativinodaniyampi “appapaṃsumattikāya pathaviyā anāpattivatthubhāvena vuttattā upaḍḍhapaṃsumattikāyapi pācittiyamevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:560_9: Na hetaṃ dukkaṭavatthūti sakkā vattuṃ jātājātavinimuttāya tatiyāya pathaviyā abhāvato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:561_0: Khaṇantassa khaṇāpentassa vāti antamaso pādaṅguṭṭhakenapi sammajjanisalākāyapi sayaṃ vā khaṇantassa aññena vā khaṇāpentassa.
tika-vin08t0:561_3: “Imaṃ valliṃ khaṇā”ti vuttepi pathavikhaṇanaṃ sandhāya pavattavohārattā imināva sikkhāpadena pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:561_5: ubhayampi sandhāya vutte pana dvepi pācittiyāni honti.
tika-vin08t0:562_4: Udakapappaṭakoti udake antobhūmiyaṃ paviṭṭhe tassa uparibhāgaṃ chādetvā tanukapaṃsu vā mattikā vā paṭalaṃ hutvā palavamānā uṭṭhāti,
tika-vin08t0:562_5: tasmiṃ udake sukkhepi taṃ paṭalaṃ vātena calamānaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin08t0:562_11: Mūsikukkuraṃ nāma mūsikāhi khaṇitvā bahi katapaṃsurāsi.
tika-vin08t0:563_0: Eseva nayoti omakacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhoyeva vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:563_1: Ekadivasampi na vaṭṭatīti ovaṭṭhacātumāsato ekadivasātikkantopi vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:563_2: Heṭṭhabhūmisambandhepi ca gokaṇṭake bhūmito chinditvā chinditvā uggatattā accuggataṃ matthakato chindituṃ gahetuñca vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:563_3: Sakaṭṭhāne atiṭṭhamānaṃ katvā pādehi madditvā āloḷitakaddamampi gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:564_0: Acchadanantiādinā vuttattā ujukaṃ ākāsato patitavassodakena ovaṭṭhameva jātapathavī hoti,
tika-vin08t0:564_1: na chadanādīsu patitvā tato pavattaudakena tintanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:564_5: Sace pana aññattha paharitvā patitena udakena temitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:565_3: Avisayattā anāpattīti ettha sacepi nibbāpetuṃ sakkā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:565_4: paṭhamaṃ suddhacittena dinnattā dahatūti sallakkhetvāpi tiṭṭhati, anāpatti.
tika-vin08t0:570_1: Evaṃ pathavivinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni bhūtagāmavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “bhūtagāmo”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:570_3: jāyanti vaḍḍhanti jātā vaḍḍhitā cāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:570_14: Idāni taṃ bhūtagāmaṃ dassento “bhūtagāmoti pañcahi bījehi jātānaṃ rukkhalatādīnametaṃ adhivacana”nti āha.
tika-vin08t0:571_0: Idāni tāni bījāni sarūpato dassento “tatrimāni pañca bījānī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:571_3: Atha vā mūlaṃ bījaṃ etassāti mūlabījaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:571_6: Tattha paṭhamena viggahena bījagāmo eva labbhati,
tika-vin08t0:571_8: Idāni te bhūtagāme sarūpato dassento “tattha mūlabījaṃ nāmā”tyādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:571_12: atha kho ito aññānipi yāni vā pana bhūtagāmajātāni atthi santi,
tika-vin08t0:571_15: etaṃ bhūtagāmajātaṃ mūlabījaṃ nāma hotīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:571_17: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “idāni taṃ bhūtagāmaṃ vibhajitvā dassento ‘bhūtagāmo nāma pañca bījajātānī’tiādimāhā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:571_18: Tattha bhūtagāmo nāmāti bhūtagāmaṃ uddharitvā yasmiṃ sati bhūtagāmo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:571_19: taṃ dassetuṃ “pañca bījajātānīti āhā”ti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:571_30: Yathā “sālīnaṃ cepi odanaṃ bhuñjatī”tiādīsu sālitaṇḍulānaṃ odano sāliodanoti vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:571_31: evaṃ bījato sambhūto bhūtagāmo “bīja”nti vuttoti veditabboti ca.
tika-vin08t0:572_1: Paccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhaṇasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bīja-
tika-vin08t0:572_2: saddo tadatthasaṃsiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti mūlādito nivattanatthaṃ ekena bījasaddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “bīja”nti “rūparūpaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:572_5: mūle jāyanti mūle sañjāyantī”ti ettha bījato nibbattena bījaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:572_9: yamhi mūle jāyanti ceva sañjāyanti ca,
tika-vin08t0:572_18: Bhūtagāme bhūtagāmasaññī chindati vā chedāpeti vāti satthakāni gahetvā sayaṃ vā chindati,
tika-vin08t0:572_20: Bhindati vā bhedāpeti vāti pāsāṇādīni gahetvā sayaṃ vā bhindati,
tika-vin08t0:572_22: Pacati vā pacāpeti vāti aggiṃ upasaṃharitvā sayaṃ vā pacati,
tika-vin08t0:573_1: Sañcicca ukkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha “sañciccā”ti vuttattā sarīre laggabhāvaṃ ñatvāpi uṭṭhahati,
tika-vin08t0:573_6: Abhūtagāmamūlattāti ettha bhūtagāmo mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ etassāti bhūtagāmamūlo,
tika-vin08t0:573_10: Ayaṃ pana tādiso na hotīti “abhūtagāmamūlattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:574_0: Kiñcāpi hi tālanāḷikerādīnaṃ khāṇu uddhaṃ avaḍḍhanato bhūtagāmassa kāraṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:574_1: tathāpi bhūtagāmasaṅkhyūpagatanibbattapaṇṇamūlabījato sambhūtattā bhūtagāmato uppanno nāma hotīti bījagāmena saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin08t0:574_2: So bījagāmena saṅgahitoti avaḍḍhamānepi bhūtagāmamūlattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:575_3: Amūlakabhūtagāme saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti idaṃ nāḷikerassa āveṇikaṃ katvā vadati.
tika-vin08t0:575_4: “Pānīyaghaṭādīnaṃ bahi sevālo udake aṭṭhitattā bījagāmānulomattā ca dukkaṭavatthū”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:576_1: Seleyyakaṃ nāma silāya sambhūtā ekā gandhajāti.
tika-vin08t0:576_4: Makuḷaṃ pana rukkhattacaṃ akopentenapi gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:576_5: “Rukkhattacaṃ vikopetīti vuttattā rukkhe jātaṃ yaṃ kiñci ahicchattakaṃ rukkhattacaṃ avikopetvā matthakato chinditvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:576_8: Rukkhato muccitvāti ettha “yadipi kiñcimattaṃ rukkhe allīnā hutvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin08t0:576_9: rukkhato gayhamānā pana rukkhacchaviṃ na vikopeti,
tika-vin08t0:576_11: Allarukkhato na vaṭṭatīti etthāpi rukkhattacaṃ avikopetvā matthakato tacchetvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:576_13: Pānīyaṃ na vāsetabbanti idaṃ attano atthāya nāmitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:576_14: Kevalaṃ anupasampannassa atthāya nāmite pana pacchā tato labhitvā na vāsetabbanti natthi.
tika-vin08t0:576_15: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “pānīyaṃ na vāsetabbanti idaṃ attano pivanapānīyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:576_18: “Yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ sākhā ruhatīti vuttattā yesaṃ sākhā na ruhati,
tika-vin08t0:576_20: Vimativinodaniyampi “yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ sākhā ruhatīti mūlaṃ anotāretvā paṇṇamattaniggamanamattenāpi vaḍḍhati,
tika-vin08t0:576_21: tattha kappiyampi akaronto chinnanāḷikeraveḷudaṇḍādayo kopetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:576_22: “Caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṃ dassessāmī”ti vuttattā kevalaṃ caṅkamanādhippāyena vā maggagamanādhippāyena vā akkamantassa,
tika-vin08t0:576_23: tiṇānaṃ upari nisīdanādhippāyena nisīdantassa ca doso natthi.
tika-vin08t0:577_3: nakhādīhi vilikhanamattena ca aviruḷhidhammatā na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:577_4: tathāpi evaṃ kateyeva samaṇānaṃ kappatīti aggiparijitādayo samaṇavohārā nāma jātā,
tika-vin08t0:577_5: tasmā tehi samaṇavohārehi karaṇabhūtehi phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:577_6: Abījanibbaṭṭabījānipi samaṇānaṃ kappantīti paññattapaṇṇattibhāvato samaṇavohārāicceva saṅkhaṃ gatāni.
tika-vin08t0:577_7: Atha vā aggiparijitādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ kappiyabhāvatoyeva pañcahi samaṇakappiyabhāvasaṅkhātehi kāraṇehi
tika-vin08t0:577_8: phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmīti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:577_12: yaṃ bījaṃ nibbaṭṭetvā visuṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ sakkā hoti.
tika-vin08t0:577_16: tena kattabbapakārasseva vuttattā bhikkhunā avuttepi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:577_17: Puna “kappiyaṃ kāretabba”nti kārāpanassa paṭhamameva kathitattā bhikkhunā “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti vutteyeva
tika-vin08t0:577_19: “Kappiyanti vacanaṃ pana yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:577_20: “Kappiyanti vatvāva kātabba”nti vacanato paṭhamaṃ “kappiya”nti vatvā pacchā aggiādinā phusanādi kātabbanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:577_22: nakhādinā vā vijjhitvā taṃ anuddharitvāva kappiyanti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:578_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “kappiyanti vatvāvāti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vuttepi vacanakkhaṇeva aggisatthādinā
tika-vin08t0:578_1: bījagāme vaṇaṃ kātabbanti vacanato pana pubbe kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:578_3: Karontena ca bhikkhunā ‘kappiyaṃ karohī’ti yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vutteyeva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:578_4: Bījagāmaparimocanatthaṃ puna kappiyaṃ kāretabbanti kārāpanassa paṭhamameva adhikatattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:579_0: Ekasmiṃ bīje vātiādīsu “ekaṃyeva kāremīti adhippāye satipi ekābaddhattā sabbaṃ katameva hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:579_1: Dāruṃ vijjhatīti ettha “jānitvāpi vijjhati vā vijjhāpeti vā,
tika-vin08t0:579_6: Marīcapakkādīhi ca missetvāti ettha bhattasitthasambandhavasena ekābaddhatā veditabbā,
tika-vin08t0:579_8: “Kaṭāhepi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā kaṭāhato nīhaṭāya miñjāya vā bīje vā yattha katthaci vijjhituṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t0:579_9: Bhindāpetvā kappiyaṃ kārāpetabbanti bījato muttassa kaṭāhassa bhājanagatikattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:584_1: Evaṃ bhūtagāmavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni sahaseyyavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “duvidhaṃ sahaseyyaka”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:584_2: Tattha dve vidhā pakārā yassa sahaseyyakassa taṃ duvidhaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:584_9: Dirattatirattanti ettha vacanasiliṭṭhatāmattena dirattaggahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:584_10: Tirattañhi sahavāse labbhamāne diratte vattabbameva natthīti dirattaggahaṇaṃ visuṃ na payojeti.
tika-vin08t0:584_11: Tenevāha “uttaridirattatirattanti bhagavā sāmaṇerānaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthāya tirattaparihāraṃ adāsī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:584_13: Kevalañhi “tiratta”nti vutte aññattha vāsena antarikampi tirattaṃ gaṇheyya.
tika-vin08t0:584_14: Dirattavisiṭṭhaṃ pana tirattaṃ vuccamānaṃ tena anantarikameva tirattaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:584_16: Nirantaraṃ tissova rattiyo sayitvā catutthadivasādīsu sayantasseva āpatti,
tika-vin08t0:584_17: na ekantarikādivasena sayantassāti dassanatthampīti daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:584_21: tasmā seyyaṃ kappeyyāti ettha senāsanasaṅkhātaṃ seyyaṃ pavisitvā kāyappasāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ seyyaṃ kappeyya sampādeyyāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:585_1: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “ekūpacāro ekena maggena pavisitvā abbhokāsaṃ anokkamitvā sabbattha anuparigamanayoggo,
tika-vin08t0:585_3: Yattha pana kuṭṭādīhi rundhitvā visuṃ dvāraṃ yojenti,
tika-vin08t0:585_7: etampi ekūpacārameva mattikādīhi pihitadvāro viya gabbhoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:585_8: Aññathā gabbhe pavisitvā pamukhādīsu nipannānupasampannehi sahaseyyāparimuttiyā gabbhadvāraṃ mattikādīhi
tika-vin08t0:585_9: pidahāpetvā uṭṭhite aruṇe vivarāpentassapi anāpatti bhaveyyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:585_11: Tesaṃ payoge payoge bhikkhussa āpattīti ettha keci “anuṭṭhahanena akiriyasamuṭṭhānā āpatti vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:585_15: Kiriyāya samuṭṭhānatā cassa tabbahulavasena vuttā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:585_19: hi dvārāsaṃvaraṇena cetaṃ akiriyasamuṭṭhānampi hotī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:586_1: Uparimatalena saddhiṃ asambaddhabhittikassāti idaṃ sambaddhabhittike vattabbameva natthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:586_2: Uparimatale sayitassa saṅkā eva natthīti “heṭṭhāpāsāde”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:586_3: Nānūpacāreti yattha bahi nisseṇiṃ katvā uparimatalaṃ ārohanti,
tika-vin08t0:586_7: Aḍḍhakuṭṭake senāsaneti ettha “aḍḍhakuṭṭakaṃ nāma yattha upaḍḍhaṃ muñcitvā tīsu passesu bhittiyo baddhā honti,
tika-vin08t0:586_8: yattha vā ekasmiṃ passe bhittiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā ubhosu passesu upaḍḍhaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ katvā bhittiyo uṭṭhāpenti,
tika-vin08t0:586_10: gaṇṭhipade pana “aḍḍhakuṭṭaketi chadanaṃ aḍḍhena asampattakuṭṭake”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:586_12: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “sabhāsaṅkhepenāti vuttasseva aḍḍhakuṭṭaketi iminā saṇṭhānaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:586_17: Vāḷasaṅghāṭo nāma parikkhepassa anto thambhādīnaṃ upari vāḷarūpehi katasaṅghāṭo.
tika-vin08t0:587_0: Parikkhepassa bahi gateti ettha yattha yasmiṃ passe parikkhepo natthi,
tika-vin08t0:587_1: tatthāpi parikkhepārahapadesato bahi gate anāpattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:587_2: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “parikkhepassa bahi gateti ettha yasmiṃ passe parikkhepo natthi,
tika-vin08t0:587_3: tattha sace bhūmito vatthu uccaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:587_4: ubhato uccavatthuto heṭṭhā bhūmiyaṃ nibbakosabbhantarepi anāpatti eva tattha senāsanavohārābhāvato.
tika-vin08t0:587_5: Atha vatthu nīcaṃ bhūmisamameva senāsanassa heṭṭhimatale tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin08t0:587_6: tattha parikkheparahitadisāya nibbakosabbhantare sabbattha āpatti hoti,
tika-vin08t0:587_7: paricchedābhāvato parikkhepassa bahi eva anāpattīti daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:587_8: Aparicchinnagabbhūpacāreti ettha majjhe vivaṭaṅgaṇavantāsu mahācatusālāsu yathā ākāsaṅgaṇaṃ anotaritvā
tika-vin08t0:587_9: pamukheneva gantvā sabbagabbhe pavisituṃ na sakkā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:587_10: evaṃ ekekagabbhassa dvīsu passesu kuṭṭaṃ nīharitvā kataṃ paricchinnagabbhūpacāraṃ nāma,
tika-vin08t0:587_11: idaṃ pana tādisaṃ na hotīti “aparicchinnagabbhūpacāre”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:587_12: Sabbagabbhepi pavisantīti gabbhūpacārassa aparicchinnattā ākāsaṅgaṇaṃ anotaritvāpi pamukheneva gantvā taṃ taṃ gabbhaṃ pavisanti.
tika-vin08t0:587_13: Atha kuto tassa parikkhepoyeva sabbaparicchinnattāti vuttanti āha “gabbhaparikkhepoyeva hissa parikkhepo”ti,
tika-vin08t0:587_15: Catusālavasena hi sanniviṭṭhe senāsane gabbhapamukhaṃ visuṃ aparikkhittampi samantā ṭhitaṃ gabbhabhittīnaṃ vasena parikkhittaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:588_1: Ekadisāya ujukameva dīghaṃ katvā sannivesito pāsādo ekasālasanniveso.
tika-vin08t0:588_2: Dvīsu tīsu catūsu vā disāsu siṅghāṭakasaṇṭhānādivasena katā dvisālādisannivesā veditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:588_4: Aṭṭha pācittiyānīti upaḍḍhacchannaṃ upaḍḍhaparicchannaṃ senāsanaṃ dukkaṭavatthussa ādiṃ katvā pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin08t0:588_5: dassitattā tato adhikaṃ sabbacchannaupaḍḍhaparicchannādikampi sabbaṃ pāḷiyaṃ avuttampi pācittiyasseva
tika-vin08t0:588_8: “Satta pācittiyānī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttapācittiyadvayaṃ sāmaññato ekattena gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:588_9: Pāḷiyaṃ “tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna sayatī”ti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:588_10: anikkhamitvā purāruṇā uṭṭhahitvā antochadane nisinnassāpi puna divase sahaseyyena anāpatti eva.
tika-vin08t0:588_13: tīsu bhāgesu dve bhāgā yebhuyyanti iminā lakkhaṇena cūḷakacchannaparicchannādīni veditabbāni.
tika-vin08t0:588_16: “Matitthiyā pārājikavatthubhūtāyapi anupādinnapakkhe ṭhitattā sahaseyyāpattiṃ na janetī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:588_18: āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vacanato divā tassa sayantassa sahaseyyāpatti na hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:593_1: Evaṃ sahaseyyavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni saṅghike vihāre seyyāsu kattabbavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “vihāre saṅghike seyya”ntyādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:593_11: santharitvāna pakkamo”ti imassa uddesapāṭhassa saṅghike vihāre…pe…
tika-vin08t0:593_13: Tatrāti tasmiṃ pakkamane ayaṃ īdiso mayā vuccamāno vinicchayo veditabboti attho.
tika-vin08t0:593_16: Aparikkhittassa upacāro nāma senāsanato dve leḍḍupātā.
tika-vin08t0:594_10: Bhūmiyaṃ attharitabbāti cimilikāya sati tassā upari,
tika-vin08t0:594_12: Sīhadhammādīnaṃ pariharaṇe eva paṭikkhepoti iminā mañcapīṭhādīsu attharitvā puna saṃharitvā ṭhapanādivasena attano atthāya pariharaṇameva na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:594_13: bhūmattharaṇādivasena paribhogo pana attano pariharaṇaṃ na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:594_15: bahipi mañce paññattāni hontī”ti evaṃ attano atthāya mañcādīsu paññapetvā pariharaṇavatthusmiṃ “na,
tika-vin08t0:594_21: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “yadi evaṃ ‘pariharaṇeyeva paṭikkhepo’ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti codanaṃ katvā ‘anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t0:594_23: sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga’nti vacanato puggalikepi senāsane senāsanaparibhogavasena niyamitaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭādikaṃ
tika-vin08t0:594_24: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭamānampi kevalaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:594_25: Evamidaṃ bhūmattharaṇavasena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭamānampi attano santakaṃ katvā taṃ taṃ vihāraṃ haritvā
tika-vin08t0:594_26: paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ pariharaṇeyeva paṭikkhepo veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:595_0: Pāvāro kojavoti paccattharaṇatthāyeva ṭhapitā uggatalomā attharaṇavisesā.
tika-vin08t0:595_3: aññampi tādisaṃ mañcapīṭhesu attharitabbaṃ attharaṇamevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:595_4: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “paccattharaṇaṃ nāma pāvāro kojavo”ti niyametvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:595_5: tasmā gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ iminā na sameti,
tika-vin08t0:595_9: tasmā mahāaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttanayena “pāvāro kojavo”ti niyametvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:595_10: evaṃ niyamane satipi yathā “laddhātapatto rājakumāro”ti ātapattassa laddhabhāveyeva niyametvā vuttepi
tika-vin08t0:595_11: nidassananayavasena rājakakudhabhaṇḍasāmaññena samānā vālabījanādayopi vuttāyeva honti,
tika-vin08t0:595_12: evaṃ “pāvāro kojavo”ti niyametvā vuttepi nidassananayavasena tehi mañcapīṭhesu attharitabbabhāvasāmaññena samānā aññe attharaṇāpi vuttāyeva honti,
tika-vin08t0:595_13: tasmā gaṇṭhipadesu vuttavacanaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanassa paṭilomaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:596_1: so vihārassāmiko”ti pāṭhaṃ nissāya ekacce vinayadharā “saṅghikavihārassa vā puggalikavihārassa vā vihāradāyakoyeva sāmiko,
tika-vin08t0:596_6: kathaṃ ayaṃ pāṭho kimatthaṃ sādheti issaratthaṃ vā āpucchitabbatthaṃ vāti?
tika-vin08t0:596_7: Evaṃ vīmaṃsite “bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu āpucchitabbo”tiādivacanato āpucchitabbatthameva sādheti,
tika-vin08t0:597_0: Atha siyā “āpucchitabbatthe siddhe issarattho siddhoyeva hoti.
tika-vin08t0:597_5: tasmiṃ asati ārāmiko”tiādivacanato āyasmantānaṃ matena bhikkhupi sāmaṇeropi ārāmikopi vihārakārakopi tassa kule yo koci puggalopi issaroti āpajjeyya,
tika-vin08t0:597_6: evaṃ viññāyamānepi bhikkhumhi vā sāmaṇere vā ārāmike vā sati teyeva issarā,
tika-vin08t0:597_8: Tesu ekasmimpi asatiyeva vihārakārako issaro siyāti.
tika-vin08t0:597_9: Imasmiṃ pana adhikāre saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ rakkhaṇatthāya āpucchitabbaṃyeva vadati,
tika-vin08t0:597_11: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyyāti ettha bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu āpucchitabbo”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:598_0: Athāpi evaṃ vadeyya “na sakalassa vākyapāṭhassa adhippāyatthaṃ sandhāya amhehi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:598_1: atha kho ‘vihārassāmiko’ti etassa padatthaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:598_6: tasmā vihārakārako dāyako vihārassāmiko nāmāti viññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:598_7: evaṃ viññāyamāne sati sāmiko nāma sassa dhanassa issaro,
tika-vin08t0:598_9: tasmā vihārassāmikabhūtassa dāyakassa ruciyā eva bhikkhū vasituṃ labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:598_10: na saṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ ruciyāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:598_13: yathā nāma “ghaṭikāro brahmā”ti vutto so brahmā idāni ghaṭaṃ na karoti,
tika-vin08t0:598_16: Iti pubbe laddhanāmattā pubbavohāravasena brahmabhūtopi “ghaṭikāro”icceva vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:598_17: evaṃ so vihārakārako bhikkhūnaṃ pariccattakālato paṭṭhāya vihārassāmiko na hoti vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā dānassa,
tika-vin08t0:598_18: pubbe pana apariccattakāle vihārassa kārakattā vihārassāmiko nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:598_19: so evaṃ pubbe laddhanāmattā pubbavohāravasena “vihārassāmiko”ti vuccati, na,
tika-vin08t0:598_21: Teneva sammāsambuddhena “vihāradāyakānaṃ ruciyā bhikkhū vasantū”ti avatvā senāsanapaññāpako anuññātoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:598_22: Tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “tesaṃ gehānīti ettha bhikkhūnaṃ vāsatthāya katampi yāva na denti,
tika-vin08t0:598_24: tena dinnakālato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ santakāni na hontīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:598_25: Ayaṃ pana kathā pāṭhassa sammukhībhūtattā imasmiṃ ṭhāne kathitā.
tika-vin08t0:598_27: Yo kocīti ñātako vā aññātako vā yo koci.
tika-vin08t0:599_3: “Senāsanaṃ upacikāhi khāyita”nti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattattā vatthuanurūpavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upacikāsaṅkāya abhāvena anāpatti vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:599_4: Vattakkhandhake gamikavattaṃ paññāpentena “senāsanaṃ āpucchitabba”nti vuttattā kevalaṃ itikattabbatāmattadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t0:599_7: teneva andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “senāsanaṃ āpucchitabba”nti ettha “yaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu vā katasenāsanaṃ yattha upacikā nārohanti,
tika-vin08t0:599_9: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ gaṇṭhipade “tādise senāsane anāpucchā gacchantassa pācittiyaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t0:599_10: gamikavatte senāsanaṃ anāpucchā gacchanto vattabhedo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:600_0: Pacchimassa ābhogena mutti natthīti tassa pacchato gacchantassa aññassa abhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:600_1: Ekaṃ vā pesetvā āpucchitabbanti ettha gamanacittassa uppannaṭṭhānato anāpucchitvā gacchante dutiyapāduddhāre pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:600_2: Maṇḍape vāti sākhāmaṇḍape vā padaramaṇḍape vā.
tika-vin08t0:601_1: Majjhe saṃkhittaṃ paṇavasaṇṭhānaṃ katvā baddhanti erakapattādīhi veṇiṃ katvā tāya veṇiyā ubhosu passesu
tika-vin08t0:601_2: vitthataṭṭhāne bahuṃ veṭhetvā tato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:601_3: tāva antoākaḍḍhanavasena veṭhetvā majjhe saṃkhipitvā tattha tattha bandhitvā kataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:601_4: Yattha kākā vā kulalā vā na ūhadantīti yattha dhuvanivāsena kulāvake katvā vasamānā ete kākakulalā,
tika-vin08t0:601_5: aññe vā sakuṇā taṃ senāsanaṃ na ūhadanti,
tika-vin08t0:602_5: Tena hi vassena sīghaṃ na nassati.
tika-vin08t0:602_9: tena ca vassabhayena sayaṃ aññattha gacchantassa āpattiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:602_10: Abbhokāsikānaṃ atemanatthāya niyametvā dāyakehi dinnampi attānaṃ rakkhantena rakkhitabbameva.
tika-vin08t0:602_11: “Yasmā pana dāyakehi dānakāleyeva satasahassagghanakampi kambalaṃ ‘pādapuñchaniṃ katvā paribhuñjathā’ti dinnaṃ tatheva paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:602_12: tasmā idampi mañcapīṭhādisenāsanaṃ ‘ajjhokāsepi yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjathā’ti dāyakehi dinnaṃ ce,
tika-vin08t0:602_13: sabbasmimpi kāle ajjhokāse nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:602_14: Pesetvā gantabbanti ettha “yo bhikkhu imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā vasati,
tika-vin08t0:603_0: Valāhakānaṃ anuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāti iminā gimhānepi meghe uṭṭhite abbhokāse nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:603_1: Tatra tatrāti cetiyaṅgaṇādike tasmiṃ tasmiṃ abbhokāse niyametvā nikkhittā.
tika-vin08t0:603_2: Majjhato paṭṭhāya pādaṭṭhānābhimukhāti yattha samantato sammajjitvā aṅgaṇamajjhe sabbadā kacavarassa saṅkaḍḍhanena majjhe vālikā sañcitā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:603_7: tattha tato paṭṭhāya aparadisābhimukhā haritabbā”ti keci atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:603_8: Keci pana “sammaṭṭhaṭṭhānassa padavalañjena avikopanatthāya sayaṃ asammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano pādābhimukhaṃ vālikā haritabbāti vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:603_9: Tattha “majjhato paṭṭhāyā”ti vacanassa payojanaṃ na dissati.
tika-vin08t0:603_12: bahivālikāya agamananimittaṃ pādaṭṭhānābhimukhā haritabbāti vuttanti eke”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:603_13: Kacavaraṃ hatthehi gahetvā bahi chaḍḍetabbanti iminā “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍessāmī”ti vālikā na chaḍḍetabbāti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:605_0: Aññattha gacchatīti taṃ maggaṃ atikkamitvā aññattha gacchati.
tika-vin08t0:606_1: Āvāsikānaṃyeva palibodhoti ettha āgantukesu āgantvā kiñci avatvā tattha nisinnesupi nisīditvā “āvāsikāyeva
tika-vin08t0:606_3: Mahāpaccarivāde pana “idaṃ amhāka”nti vatvāpi avatvāpi nisinnānamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:606_5: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana santharāpane pācittiyena bhavitabbanti anāṇattiyā paññattattā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:606_7: So hi uddhaṃuddhaṃ pāḷipāṭhaṃ sāreti pavattetīti “ussārako”ti vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:606_9: idaṃ dhammakathikassā”ti visuṃ paññattattā anāṇattiyā paññattepi pācittiyeneva bhavitabbanti adhippāyena
tika-vin08t0:606_11: Keci pana vadanti “anāṇattiyā paññattepi dhammakathikassa anuṭṭhāpanīyattā pācittiyena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:606_12: āgantukassa pana pacchā āgatehi vuḍḍhatarehi uṭṭhāpanīyattā dukkaṭaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:607_1: Pādapuñchanī nāma rajjukehi vā pilotikāya vā pādapuñchanatthaṃ katā.
tika-vin08t0:607_7: paṭisāmetabbanti ettha theve asati rajanakamme niṭṭhite paṭisāmetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:607_8: “Bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā lajjī hotīti vuttattā alajjiṃ āpucchitvā gantuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:607_10: gacchatīti ettha “kiñcāpi ‘ettakaṃ dūraṃ gantabba’nti paricchedo natthi,
tika-vin08t0:607_11: tathāpi leḍḍupātaṃ atikkamma nātidūraṃ gantabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:613_1: Evaṃ saṅghikasenāsanesu kattabbavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni catukālikavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “kālikānipi cattārī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:616_0: Ettha pana tassa tassa kiriyāsaṅkhātassa kālassa pabhedabhūto purebhattaekaahorattasattāhajīvikapariyantasaṅkhāto kālaviseso adhippeto.
tika-vin08t0:616_1: Kāle tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kālavisese paribhuñjitabbānīti kālikāni. Pi-
tika-vin08t0:616_5: tena kālikāni nāma cattāri eva honti,
tika-vin08t0:616_8: Tattha uddese yaṃ mātikāyaṃ “kālikānipi cattārī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:616_9: ettha etasmiṃ mātikāpade cattāri kālikāni veditabbānīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:616_12: yāvajīvikaṃ iti imāni vatthūni cattāri kālikāni nāmāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:617_0: Idāni tesaṃ vatthuñca visesanañca nāmalābhahetuñca dassento “tattha purebhatta”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:617_1: Tattha tesu catūsu kālikesu yaṃ kiñci khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ yāvakālikaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:617_4: sabbampi paṭiggahitaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ iti vuccatīti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:617_5: Yaṃ kiñci khādanīyabhojanīyanti ettha atibyāpitaṃ pariharituṃ visesanamāha “purebhatta”ntyādi.
tika-vin08t0:617_9: etena yāva kālo assāti yāvakālikanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:617_10: Aṭṭhavidhaṃ pānanti ettha abyāpitaṃ pariharitumāha “saddhiṃ anulomapānehī”ti. Yāva…pe…
tika-vin08t0:617_12: etena yāmo kālo assāti yāmakālikanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:617_14: etena sattāho kālo assāti sattāhakālikanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:617_15: Sabbampi paṭiggahitanti ettha atibyāpitaṃ pariharituṃ “ṭhapetvā udaka”ntyāha. Yāva…pe…
tika-vin08t0:617_17: tena yāvajīvaṃ kālo assāti yāvajīvikanti vacanatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:618_1: “yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhareyya aññatra udakadantaponā,
tika-vin08t0:618_3: atha kasmā “ṭhapetvā udakaṃ avasesaṃ sabbampi paṭiggahita”nti vuttanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:618_7: Evamapi “sabbampi paṭiggahita”nti imināva siddhaṃ paṭiggahetabbassa udakassapi gahaṇatoti? Saccaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:618_8: tathāpi udakabhāvena sāmaññato “sabbampi paṭiggahita”nti ettake vutte ekaccassa udakassa paṭiggahetabbabhāvato udakampi yāvajīvikaṃ nāmāti ñāyeyya,
tika-vin08t0:618_9: na pana udakaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ suddhassa paṭiggahetabbābhāvato,
tika-vin08t0:618_11: ekaccassa udakassa paṭiggahetabbabhāve satipi suddhassa appaṭiggahitabbattā taṃ udakaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbampi paṭiggahitaṃ yāvajīvikanti vuccatīti.
tika-vin08t0:619_2: tāni pariyāyato vuccamānānipi na sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:619_3: Pariyāyantarena hi vuccamāne taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ ajānantānaṃ sammohoyeva siyā,
tika-vin08t0:619_5: Khādanīye khādanīyatthanti pūvādikhādanīye vijjamānaṃ khādanīyakiccaṃ khādanīyehi kātabbaṃ jighacchāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin08t0:619_6: atthaṃ payojanaṃ neva pharanti na nipphādenti.
tika-vin08t0:619_7: Ekasmiṃ dese āhārakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ vā asādhentaṃ vā aparasmiṃ dese uṭṭhitabhūmirasādibhedena āhārajighacchāharaṇakiccaṃ
tika-vin08t0:619_8: asādhentampi vā sambhaveyyāti āha “tesu tesu janapadesū”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:619_9: Keci pana “ekasmiṃ janapade āhārakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ sesajanapadesupi vikāle na kappati evāti dassanatthaṃ idaṃ vutta”ntipi vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:619_10: Pakatiāhāravasenāti aññehi yāvakālikehi ayojitaṃ attano pakatiyāva āhārakiccakaraṇavasena.
tika-vin08t0:619_11: Sammohoyeva hotīti anekatthānaṃ nāmānaṃ appasiddhānañca sambhavato sammoho eva siyā.
tika-vin08t0:619_12: Tenevettha mayampi mūlakamūlādīnaṃ pariyāyantaradassane ādaraṃ na karimha upadesatova gahetabbato.
tika-vin08t0:624_1: tesampi nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetunti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:625_0: Acchivādīnaṃ aparipakkāneva phalāni yāvajīvikānīti dassetuṃ “aparipakkānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:626_0: Harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīnīti ettha miñjaṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni kapālāni yāvajīvikānīti ācariyā.
tika-vin08t0:626_2: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīnīti ettha ‘miñjaṃ yāvakālika’nti keci vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:626_3: taṃ na yuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avuttattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:627_2: Tattha hiṅgujatu nāma hiṅgurukkhassa daṇḍapattāni pacitvā kataniyyāso.
tika-vin08t0:628_1: Yāmakālikesu panāti ettha kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyapadehi yāvakālikameva saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:628_3: tathāpi “anāpatti yāmakālikaṃ yāme nidahitvā bhuñjatī”ti idha ceva “yāmakālikena bhikkhave sattāhakālikaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t0:628_5: yāmātikkante na kappatī”ti aññattha ca vuttattā “yāmakālika”ntivacanasāmatthiyato ca bhagavato adhippāyaññūhi
tika-vin08t0:628_6: aṭṭhakathācariyehi yāmakālikaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ pācittiyavatthumeva vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:630_1: Sattāhakālike pañca bhesajjānīti bhesajjakiccaṃ karontu vā mā vā,
tika-vin08t0:630_3: “Gosappī”tiādinā loke pākaṭaṃ dassetvā “yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti iminā aññesampi rohitamigādīnaṃ sappiṃ gahetvā dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:630_6: taṃ pana sulabhaṃ vā dullabhaṃ vā asammohatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:630_8: “Yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti ca idaṃ nissaggiyavatthudassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:630_9: na pana yesaṃ maṃsaṃ na kappati,
tika-vin08t0:631_2: tāva paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha kāloti bhikkhūnaṃ bhojanakālo adhippeto,
tika-vin08t0:631_5: tato paṭṭhāya pana khādituṃ vā bhuñjituṃ vā na sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:631_12: sannihitaṃ na kappatīti puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t0:632_2: Telavaṇṇe patte satipi nisnehabhāve aṅguliyā ghaṃsantassa vaṇṇavaseneva lekhā paññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:632_3: tasmā tattha anāpattīti dassanatthaṃ “sā abbohārikā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:632_4: Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattameva hi dutiyadivase na vaṭṭatīti ettha paṭiggahaṇe anapekkhavissajjanena,
tika-vin08t0:632_5: anupasampannassa nirapekkhadānena vā vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ pariccattameva hotīti “apariccatta”nti iminā ubhayathāpi avijahitapaṭiggahaṇameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:632_6: tasmā yaṃ parassa pariccajitvā adinnampi sace paṭiggahaṇe nirapekkhavissajjanena vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:632_8: Yadi evaṃ “patto duddhoto hotī”tiādīsu kasmā āpatti vuttāti?
tika-vin08t0:632_9: “Paṭiggahaṇaṃ avissajjetvāva sayaṃ vā aññena vā tucchaṃ katvā na sammā dhovitvā niṭṭhāpite patte laggampi
tika-vin08t0:632_10: avijahitapaṭiggahaṇameva hotīti tattha āpattī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:632_11: Keci pana “sāmaṇerānaṃ pariccajantīti imasmiṃ adhikāre ṭhatvā ‘apariccattamevā’ti vuttattā anupasampannassa pariccattameva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:632_13: tasmā nirālayabhāvena paṭiggahaṇe vijahitepi anupasampannassa apariccattaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:632_16: tadaggena sannidhimpi na karoti vijahitapaṭiggahaṇassa appaṭiggahitasadisattā.
tika-vin08t0:632_17: Paṭiggahetvā nidahiteyeva ca sannidhipaccayā āpatti vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:633_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “apariccattamevāti nirapekkhatāya anupasampannassa adinnaṃ apariccattañca yāvakālikādivatthumeva sandhāya vadati,
tika-vin08t0:633_2: Na hi vatthuṃ apariccajitvā tatthagatapaṭiggahaṇaṃ pariccajituṃ sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:633_7: Na hi dhovanena āmisaṃ apanetuṃ vāyamantassa paṭiggahaṇe apekkhā vattati.
tika-vin08t0:633_9: patte pana vattamānā apekkhā taggatike āmisepi vattati eva nāmāti āmise anapekkhatā ettha na labbhati,
tika-vin08t0:633_10: tato āmise avijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ punadivase pācittiyaṃ janetīti idaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:633_15: evañca paṭiggahaṇe anapekkhavissajjanaṃ visuṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin08t0:633_17: Idaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ katvā visuṃ vattabbaṃ cīvarāpekkhāya vattamānāyapi paccuddhārena adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ viya.
tika-vin08t0:633_18: Etasmiñca upāye sati gaṇṭhikāhatapattesu avaṭṭanatā nāma na siyāti vuttovāyamattho,
tika-vin08t0:633_19: tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃ ‘yaṃ parassa pariccajitvā adinnampi sace paṭiggahaṇe nirapekkhavissajjanena vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:634_1: āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādinā sannihitesu sattāhakālikayāvajīvikesu purebhattampi āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇepi
tika-vin08t0:634_2: dukkaṭassa vuttattā yāmakālikepi ajjhohāre visuṃ dukkaṭena bhavitabbanti āha “āhāratthāya ajjhoharato
tika-vin08t0:634_5: Dveti purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ yāmakālikaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisena mukhena bhuñjato sannidhipaccayā ekaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:634_6: yāvakālikasaṃsaṭṭhatāya yāvakālikattabhajanena anatirittapaccayā ekanti dve pācittiyāni.
tika-vin08t0:635_0: Paṭiggahaṇapaccayā tāva dukkaṭanti ettha sannihitattā purebhattampi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin08t0:635_1: Sati paccaye pana sannihitampi sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikañca bhesajjatthāya gaṇhantassa paribhuñjantassa ca anāpattiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:636_1: Uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittanti apaṭiggahitaṃ sayameva gahetvā nikkhittaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:637_1: Ajja sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva bhuñjantassa kasmā sāmaṃpāko na hotīti āha “navanītaṃ tāpentassā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:637_4: Ubhayesampīti pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīradadhīhi ca purebhattaṃ uggahitakehi ca katānaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:637_5: Esa nayoti nissaggiyaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:637_8: Sappinayena veditabbanti nirāmisameva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:637_12: tasmā dhotaṃ paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti therānaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:638_0: Mahāsīvattherassa pana vatthuno viyojitattā dadhiguḷikādīhi yuttatāmattena savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:638_2: pacitvā vā nirāmisameva katvā bhuñjiṃsūti adhippāyo,
tika-vin08t0:638_3: na pana dadhiguḷikādīhi saha vikāle bhuñjiṃsūti.
tika-vin08t0:638_6: Tattha adhotaṃ paṭiggahetvāpi taṃ navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena dadhiādīni apanetvā paribhuñjitabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:638_7: Keci pana “takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsū”ti vacanassa adhippāyaṃ ajānantā “takkato uddhaṭamattaṃ
tika-vin08t0:638_8: adhotampi dadhiguḷikādisahitaṃ vikāle paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:638_10: Na hi dadhiguḷikādiāmisena saṃsaṭṭharasaṃ navanītaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:638_13: “Khayaṃ gamissatī”ti vacanato khīraṃ pakkhipitvā pakkasappiādipi vikāle kappatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:638_16: Ettāvatāti navanīte laggamattena visuṃ dadhiādivohāraṃ aladdhena appamattena dadhiādināti attho,
tika-vin08t0:638_17: etena visuṃ paṭiggahitadadhiādīhi saha pakkaṃ savatthukapaṭiggahitasaṅkhameva gacchatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:638_20: paṭiggahaṇe tāva dadhiādīhi asambhinnarasattā bhattena sahitaguḷapiṇḍādi viya savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:638_22: Itarathā pacanakkhaṇe paccamānadadhiguḷikādīhi sambhinnarasatāya sāmaṃpakkaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:639_1: savatthukapaṭiggahitattābhāve āmisena saha bhikkhunā pakkassa sayaṃpākadoso vā parisaṅkīyati,
tika-vin08t0:639_3: Tattha na tāva sayaṃpākadoso ettha sambhavati sattāhakālikattā.
tika-vin08t0:639_6: Atha paṭiggahitadadhiguḷikādinā saha attanā pakkattā savatthukapakkaṃ viya bhaveyyāti parisaṅkīyati,
tika-vin08t0:639_9: tathā ca upaḍḍhattherānaṃ matameva aṅgīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin08t0:639_10: Tattha ca sāmaṇerādīhi pakkampi yāvakālikameva siyā paṭiggahitakhīrādiṃ pacitvā anupasampannehi katasappiādi viya,
tika-vin08t0:639_11: na ca taṃ yuttaṃ bhikkhācārena laddhanavanītādīnaṃ takkādiāmisasaṃsaṭṭhasambhavena aparibhuñjitabbattāppasaṅgato.
tika-vin08t0:639_13: sodhetvā vā patte ākirantīti niyamo atthi.
tika-vin08t0:640_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañca “yathā tattha patitataṇḍulakaṇādayo na paccanti, evaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t0:640_2: purimanayeneva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā vacanenapetaṃ virujjhati,
tika-vin08t0:640_3: tasmā idha kukkuccakānaṃ kukkuccuppattiyā nimittameva na dissati.
tika-vin08t0:640_5: evaṃ “lajjī sāmaṇero yathā tattha taṇḍulakaṇādayo na paccanti,
tika-vin08t0:640_8: Yadi hi etaṃ yāvakālikasaṃsaggaparihārāya vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-vin08t0:640_10: Gahaṭṭhehi dinnasappiādīsu ca āmisasaṃsaggasaṅkā na vigaccheyya.
tika-vin08t0:640_11: Na hi gahaṭṭhā evaṃ vilīyāpetvā parissāvetvā kaṇataṇḍulādiṃ apanetvā puna pacanti.
tika-vin08t0:640_12: Apica bhesajjehi saddhiṃ khīrādiṃ pakkhipitvā yathā khīrādi khayaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:640_14: na ca tampi yuttaṃ dadhiādikhayakaraṇatthaṃ “puna pacitvā detī”ti vuttattā,
tika-vin08t0:640_15: tasmā mahāsīvattheravāde kukkuccaṃ akatvā adhotampi navanītaṃ tadahupi punadivasādīsupi pacituṃ,
tika-vin08t0:640_16: taṇḍulādimissaṃ sappiādiṃ attanāpi aggimhi vilīyāpetvā puna takkādikhayatthaṃ pacituñca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:641_0: Tattha vijjamānassāpi paccamānakkhaṇe sambhinnarasassa yāvakālikassa abbohārikattena savatthukapaṭiggahitapurepaṭiggahitakānampi
tika-vin08t0:641_2: Teneva “ettāvatā hi savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:641_3: Visuṃ paṭiggahitena pana khīrādinā āmisena navanītādiṃ missetvā bhikkhunā vā aññehi vā pakkatelādibhesajjaṃ
tika-vin08t0:641_5: Yaṃ pana purepaṭiggahitabhesajjehi saddhiṃ appaṭiggahitaṃ khīrādiṃ pakkhipitvā pakkatelādikaṃ anupasampanneheva
tika-vin08t0:641_6: pakkampi savatthukapaṭiggahitampi sannidhipi na hoti tattha pakkhittakhīrādimissāpi tasmiṃ khaṇe sambhinnarasatāya
tika-vin08t0:641_12: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “kukkuccāyanti kukkuccakāti iminā attanopi tattha kukkuccasabbhāvampi dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:641_13: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘nibbaṭṭitasappi vā navanītaṃ vā pacituṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vutta”nti ettakameva āgato.
tika-vin08t0:642_2: Gahitanti taṇḍulādivigamatthaṃ puna pacitvā gahitanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:642_4: etena tehi yuttampi sappiādi atirekasattāhapaṭiggahitaṃ na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:642_9: Apica alajjinā ajjhoharitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci abhisaṅkharāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:643_1: Tile paṭiggahetvā katatelanti attanā bhajjādīni akatvā katatelaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:644_1: nissaggiyanti sattame divase katatelaṃ sace yāva aruṇuggamanā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin08t0:645_0: Acchavasanti dukkaṭavatthuno vasāya anuññātattā taṃsadisānaṃ dukkaṭavatthūnaṃyeva akappiyamaṃsasattānaṃ vasā anuññātā,
tika-vin08t0:645_1: na thullaccayavatthu manussānaṃ vasāti āha “ṭhapetvā manussavasa”nti.
tika-vin08t0:645_3: Tiṇṇaṃ dukkaṭānanti ajjhohāre ajjhohāre tīṇi dukkaṭāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:645_4: Kiñcāpi paribhogatthāya vikāle paṭiggahaṇapacanaparissāvanādīsu pubbapayogesu pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:645_6: tathāpi ettha āpattiyā eva bhavitabbaṃ paṭikkhittassa karaṇato āhāratthāya vikāle yāmakālikādīnaṃ paṭiggahaṇe viya.
tika-vin08t0:645_7: “Kāle paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle anupasampannenāpi nipakkaṃ saṃsaṭṭhañca paribhuñjantassa dvepi dukkaṭāni hontiyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:646_0: Yasmā khīrādīni pakkhipitvā pakkabhesajjatele kasaṭaṃ āmisagatikaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:646_7: thero atikukkuccakatāya “etampi āvuso na vaṭṭatī”ti āha,
tika-vin08t0:646_8: roganiggahatthāya eva vasāya anuññātattaṃ sallakkhetvā pacchā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi.
tika-vin08t0:647_1: “Madhukarīhi madhumakkhikāhīti idaṃ khuddakabhamarānaṃ dvinnaṃ eva visesana”nti keci vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:647_5: Silesasadisanti sukkhatāya vā pakkatāya vā ghanībhūtaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:647_9: Paṭalassa bhājanaṭṭhāniyattā madhuno vasena sattāhātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:648_1: “Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbatta”nti pāḷiyaṃ avisesena vuttattā,
tika-vin08t0:648_3: avatthukā ucchuvikati ‘phāṇita’nti veditabbā”ti vacanato ucchurasopi nikkasaṭo sattāhakālikoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:648_4: Kenaci pana “madhumhi cattāro kālikā yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbā,
tika-vin08t0:648_5: ucchumhi cā”ti vatvā “samakkhikaṇḍaṃ selakaṃ madhu yāvakālikaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:648_12: suddhakasaṭaṃ yāvajīvika”nti ca vatvā uttaripi bahudhā papañcitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:648_13: Tattha “udakasambhinnaṃ madhu vā ucchuraso vā sakasaṭo yāvakāliko,
tika-vin08t0:648_14: nikkasaṭo udakasambhinno yāmakāliko”ti idaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:648_16: “yāvakālikaṃ samānaṃ garutarampi muddikājātirasaṃ attanā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ lahukaṃ yāmakālikabhāvaṃ upanentaṃ
tika-vin08t0:648_17: udakaṃ lahutaraṃ sattāhakālikaṃ attanā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ garutaraṃ yāmakālikabhāvaṃ upanetī”ti ettha kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t0:648_19: Sabbattha pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca udakasambhinnena garutarassāpi lahubhāvopagamanaṃyeva dassitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:648_23: agilānassa guḷodaka”nti vadantena agilānena paribhuñjituṃ ayuttopi guḷo udakasambhinno agilānassapi vaṭṭatīti anuññāto.
tika-vin08t0:649_6: yāvajīviko”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā “ucchuraso udakasambhinno yāmakāliko”ti aññena kenaci vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:649_7: tampi tathāvidhassa aṭṭhakathāvacanassa samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya abhāvato na sārato paccetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:649_8: tatoyeva ca “ucchuraso udakasambhinnopi asambhinnopi sattāhakālikoyevā”ti keci ācariyā vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:649_11: ucchurasa”nti ettha tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu avisesena vuttaṃ “ucchuraso sattāhakāliko”ti.
tika-vin08t0:649_12: Sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭatīti ettha aparissāvitaṃ paṭiggahitampi karaṇasamaye parissāvetvā,
tika-vin08t0:649_13: kasaṭaṃ apanetvā ca attanā katanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:650_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana ucchurasaṃ upādāyāti nikkasaṭarasassāpi sattāhakālikattaṃ dasseti “ucchumhā nibbatta”nti pāḷiyaṃ sāmaññato vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:650_8: taṃ ambaphalarasādimissatāya yāmakālikattaṃ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:650_11: Nirāmisameva vaṭṭati tattha paviṭṭhayāvakālikassa abbohārikattāti idaṃ guḷe kate tattha vijjamānampi
tika-vin08t0:650_12: kasaṭaṃ pākena sukkhatāya yāvajīvikattaṃ bhajatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:650_13: Tassa yāvakālikatte hi sāmaṃpākena purebhattepi anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ siyāti.
tika-vin08t0:650_14: “Savatthukapaṭiggahitattā”ti idaṃ ucchurase cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hutvā ṭhitakasaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:650_15: tena ca “aparissāvitena appaṭiggahitena anupasampannehi kataṃ sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:651_1: Koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitanti khuddānukhuddakaṃ chinditvā koṭṭetvā nippīḷetvā pakkaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:651_2: Taṃ tattha vijjamānampi kasaṭaṃ pakkakāle yāvakālikattaṃ vijahatīti āha “taṃ yutta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:651_3: Sītodakena katanti madhukapupphāni sītodakena madditvā parissāvetvā pacitvā kataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:651_6: Khīraṃ pakkhipitvā kataṃ madhukaphāṇitaṃ yāvakālikanti ettha khīraṃ pakkhipitvā pakkatelaṃ kasmā vikāle vaṭṭatīti ce?
tika-vin08t0:651_8: aññaṃ pana khīraṃ pakkhipitvā kataṃ khīrabhāvaṃ gaṇhātīti idamettha kāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:651_9: Yadi evaṃ khaṇḍasakkharampi khīraṃ pakkhipitvā karonti,
tika-vin08t0:652_1: “Madhukapupphaṃ panā”tiādi yāvakālikarūpena ṭhitassāpi avaṭṭanakaṃ merayabījavatthuṃ dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:652_2: Āhārakiccaṃ karontāni etāni kasmā evaṃ paribhuñjitabbānīti codanāparihārāya bhesajjodissaṃ dassentena
tika-vin08t0:652_3: tappasaṅgena sabbānipi odissakāni ekato dassetuṃ “sattavidhañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:652_5: “pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sati paccayeti vuttattā paṭiggahitabhesajjāni dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya purebhattampi sati paccayeva paribhuñjitabbāni,
tika-vin08t0:652_8: Kasāve pakkhittāni tāni attano sabhāvaṃ pariccajantīti “kasāve…pe…
tika-vin08t0:652_13: Tenevāha “sappiñca telañca vasañca muddhani telaṃ vā abbhañjanaṃ vā”tiādi,
tika-vin08t0:652_14: evaṃ paribhoge anapekkhatāya paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:652_15: Evaṃ aññesupi kālikesu anajjhoharitukāmatāya suddhacittena bāhiraparibhogatthāya niyamepi paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t0:652_16: vijahatīti idampi visuṃ ekaṃ paṭiggahaṇavijahananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:653_0: Aññena bhikkhunā vattabboti ettha suddhacittena dinnattā sayampi āharāpetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:653_1: Dvinnampi anāpattīti yathā aññassa santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhātikkamepi nissaggiyaṃ na hoti parasantakabhāvato,
tika-vin08t0:653_2: evamidampi avibhattattā ubhayasādhāraṇampi vinibbhogābhāvato nissaggiyaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:653_3: Paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti bhikkhunā paṭiggahitattā sattāhātikkame yassa kassaci bhikkhuno paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin08t0:653_4: na vaṭṭati paṭiggahitasappiādīnaṃ paribhogassa sattāheneva paricchinnattā.
tika-vin08t0:653_5: “Tāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbānī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:654_0: “Āvuso imaṃ telaṃ sattāhamattaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti iminā yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:654_2: Kassa āpattīti “paṭhamaṃ tāva ubhinnaṃ sādhāraṇattā anāpatti vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:654_3: idāni pana ekena itarassa vissaṭṭhabhāvato ubhayasādhāraṇatā natthīti vibhattasadisaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:654_4: tasmā ettha paṭiggahitassa sattāhātikkame ekassa āpattiyā bhavitabba”nti maññamāno “kiṃ paṭiggahaṇapaccayā paṭiggāhakassa āpatti,
tika-vin08t0:654_7: Nissaṭṭhabhāvatoyeva ca idha “avibhattabhāvato”ti kāraṇaṃ avatvā “yena pariggahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:654_9: idañca vissaṭṭhābhāvato ubhayasādhāraṇataṃ pahāya ekassa santakaṃ hontampi yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:654_11: tasmā parasantakapaṭiggahaṇe viya paṭiggāhakassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā natthi āpattīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:654_13: tena vissajjitattā”ti vacanato avissajjite sati avibhattepi sattāhātikkame āpattīti dassanatthaṃ avissajjite
tika-vin08t0:654_19: “Itarassa appaṭiggahitattā”ti iminā tassa santakabhāvepi aññehi paṭiggahitasakasantake viya tena appaṭiggahitabhāvato anāpattīti dīpeti,
tika-vin08t0:654_20: imaṃ pana adhippāyaṃ ajānitvā ito aññathā gaṇṭhipadakārādīhi papañcitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:655_4: sace dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:655_7: Aññathā pana saddappayogopi na saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:655_8: “gaṇṭhipadepi ca ayameva pāṭho dassito”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:655_10: “Paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ “sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabba”nti vacanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:655_12: tena vissajjitattā”ti iminā upasampannassa dānampi sandhāya “vissajjetī”ti idaṃ vuttanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:655_13: Upasampannassa nirapekkhadinnavatthumhi paṭiggahaṇassa avigatattepi sakasantakatā vigatāva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:655_15: “Attanāva paṭiggahitattaṃ sakasantakattañcā”ti imehi dvīhi kāraṇeheva nissaggiyaṃ hoti, na ekena.
tika-vin08t0:655_19: “Vissajjatī”ti etasmiñca pāḷipade kassaci adatvā anapekkhatāya chaḍḍanampi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:655_21: Paṭiggahaṇe hi vijahite puna paṭiggahetvā paribhogo sayameva vaṭṭissati,
tika-vin08t0:655_23: Etena ca vatthumhi ajjhoharaṇāpekkhāya sati paṭiggahaṇavissajjanaṃ nāma visuṃ na labbhatīti sijjhati.
tika-vin08t0:655_24: Itarathā hi “paṭiggahaṇe anapekkhova paṭiggahaṇaṃ vissajjetvā puna paṭiggahetvā bhuñjatī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin08t0:655_25: “appaṭiggahitattā”ti iminā ekassa santakaṃ aññena paṭiggahitampi nissaggiyaṃ hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:655_26: Evanti “puna gahessāmī”ti apekkhaṃ akatvā suddhacittena paricattataṃ parāmasati.
tika-vin08t0:655_27: Paribhuñjantassa anāpattidassanatthanti nissaggiyamūlikāhi pācittiyādiāpattīhi anāpattidassanatthanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:655_28: Paribhoge anāpattidassanatthanti ettha pana nissaṭṭhapaṭilābhassa kāyikaparibhogādīsu yā dukkaṭāpatti vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:656_1: Evaṃ catukālikapaccayaṃ dassetvā idāni tesu visesalakkhaṇaṃ dassento “imesu panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:656_2: Tattha akappiyabhūmiyaṃ sahaseyyāpahonake gehe vuttaṃ saṅghikaṃ vā puggalikaṃ vā bhikkhussa,
tika-vin08t0:656_3: bhikkhuniyā vā santakaṃ yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikañca ekarattampi ṭhapitaṃ antovutthaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:656_6: Paṭiggahetvā ekarattaṃ vītināmitaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā ajjhoharitukāmatāya gaṇhantassa pariggahaṇe tāva dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:656_7: ajjhoharato pana ekamekasmiṃ ajjhohāre sannidhipaccayā pācittiyaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:656_10: Dīghakālāni vatthūni rassakālena saṃsaṭṭhāni rassakālameva anuvattantīti āha “yāvakālikaṃ pana…pe…
tika-vin08t0:657_2: Ettha ca “yāvakālikena saṃsaṭṭhattā”ti ettakameva avatvā “tadahupaṭiggahitenā”ti visesanassa vuttattā
tika-vin08t0:657_3: purepaṭiggahitayāvakālikena saṃsaṭṭhe sati tadahupurebhattampi na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:657_6: asambhinnarasaṃ sesakālikattayaṃ attano attano kāle vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:658_0: Potthakesu pana “yāmakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ pana itaradvayaṃ tadahupaṭiggahita”nti dissati,
tika-vin08t0:658_5: Tato tadahupaṭiggahitameva sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikañca yāmakālikena saṃsaṭṭhe sati yāva aruṇuggamanā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:658_9: “dīghakālikāni rassakālikaṃ anuvattantī”ti iminā lakkhaṇena viruddhattā ca,
tika-vin08t0:658_10: tasmā tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā hotu purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:658_11: sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikañca tadahupaṭiggahitena yāmakālikena saṃsaṭṭhattā yāva aruṇuggamanā vaṭṭatīti attho yutto,
tika-vin08t0:658_12: evañca upari vakkhamānena “sattāhakālikena pana tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin08t0:658_13: vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ sattāhaṃ kappatī”ti vacanena samaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin08t0:659_0: Apica “yāmakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ pana itaradvayaṃ tadahu yāva aruṇuggamanā vaṭṭatī”ti pubbapāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:659_1: taṃ lekhakehi aññesu pāṭhesu “tadahupaṭiggahita”nti vijjamānaṃ disvā,
tika-vin08t0:659_2: idha tadahupadato paṭiggahitapadaṃ gaḷitanti maññamānehi pakkhipitvā likhitaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:659_6: Teneva uparipāṭhepi “sattāhakālikena pana tadahupaṭiggahitenā”ti rassakālikatthapadena tulyādhikaraṇaṃ visesanapadaṃ tameva viseseti,
tika-vin08t0:659_8: tasmā “tadahupaṭiggahitena sattāhakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ sattāhaṃ kappatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:660_0: Dvīhapaṭiggahitenātiādīsupi “dvīhapaṭiggahitena sattāhakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ chāhaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:660_1: tīhapaṭiggahitena sattāhakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ pañcāhaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:660_2: catūhapaṭiggahitena sattāhakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ caturāhaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:660_3: pañcāhapaṭiggahitena sattāhakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ tīhaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:660_4: chāhapaṭiggahitena sattāhakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ dvīhaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:660_5: sattāhapaṭiggahitena sattāhakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ
tika-vin08t0:660_6: tadaheva vaṭṭatī”ti evaṃ sattāhakālikasseva atītadivasaṃ parihāpetvā sesadivasavasena yojetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:660_8: Na hi yāvajīvikassa hāpetabbo atītadivaso nāma atthi sati paccaye yāvajīvaṃ paribhuñjitabbato.
tika-vin08t0:660_9: Tenāha “sattāhakālikampi attanā saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ attano sabhāvaññeva upanetī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:660_10: Kesuci potthakesu “yāmakālikena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ pana itaradvayaṃ tadahupaṭiggahita”nti likhitaṃ pāṭhaṃ nissāya
tika-vin08t0:660_11: imasmimpi pāṭhe “tadahupaṭiggahitanti idameva icchitabba’nti maññamānā “purepaṭiggahita”nti pāṭhaṃ paṭikkhipanti.
tika-vin08t0:660_13: taṃ sabbaṃ yathāvuttanayaṃ amanasikarontā vibbhantacittā evaṃ karontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:661_5: yāvakālikaṃ kālātikkame paribhuñjantassa “yo pana bhikkhu vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin08t0:661_7: Yāmakālikaṃ yāmātikkame paribhuñjantassa “yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin08t0:661_9: Sattāhakālikaṃ sattāhātikkame paribhuñjantassa “yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjāni,
tika-vin08t0:661_13: taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti iminā bhesajjasikkhāpadena āpatti hotīti.
tika-vin08t0:662_0: Imāni cattāri kālikāni ekato saṃsaṭṭhāni sambhinnarasāni purimapurimakālikassa kālavasena paribhuñjitabbānīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:667_1: Evaṃ catukālikavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni kappiyakuṭivinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “kappiyā catubhūmiyo”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:667_19: Kammavācāya sammannitabbāti sammutīti evamimāsaṃ viggaho kātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:667_21: Taṃ pana avatvāpīti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayaṃ avatvāpi. Pi-
tika-vin08t0:667_23: Aṭṭhakathāsu vuttanayena vutteti sesaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttanayena “kappiyakuṭiṃ karomā”ti vā “kappiyakuṭī”ti vā vutte.
tika-vin08t0:667_26: Yato paṭṭhāyāti yato iṭṭhakato silato mattikāpiṇḍato vā paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin08t0:667_27: Paṭhamiṭṭhakādīnaṃ heṭṭhā na vaṭṭantīti paṭhamiṭṭhakādīnaṃ heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpiyamānā iṭṭhakādayo
tika-vin08t0:667_28: bhūmigatikattā “kappiyakuṭiṃ karomā”ti vatvā patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t0:667_29: Yadi evaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇitvā ṭhapiyamānā thambhā kasmā tathā vatvā patiṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭantīti āha “thambhā pana…pe…
tika-vin08t0:668_0: Saṅghasantakamevāti vāsatthāya kataṃ saṅghikasenāsanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin08t0:668_1: Bhikkhusantakanti vāsatthāya eva kataṃ bhikkhussa puggalikasenāsanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:670_6: Yato paṭṭhāyāti yato iṭṭhakādito paṭṭhāya cayaṃ ādiṃ katvā bhittiṃ uṭṭhāpetukāmāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:670_8: tasmā vaṭṭantī”ti etena iṭṭhakapāsāṇā heṭṭhā patiṭṭhāpiyamānāpi yadi cayato,
tika-vin08t0:671_1: Senāsanānīti vihārassa anto tiṇakuṭiādikāni saṅghassa nivāsagehāni.
tika-vin08t0:671_3: Senāsanāni hi sayaṃ parikkhittānipi ārāmaparikkhepābhāvena “gonisādikā”ti vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:671_4: “Upaḍḍhaparikkhittopī”ti iminā tato ūnaparikkhitto yebhuyyena aparikkhitto nāma,
tika-vin08t0:671_7: Kappiyakuṭi laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti gonisādikāya abhāvena sesakappiyakuṭīsu tīsu yā kāci kappiyakuṭi kātabbāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:672_0: Tesaṃ gehānīti ettha bhikkhūnaṃ vāsatthāya katampi yāva na denti,
tika-vin08t0:672_2: Vihāraṃ ṭhapetvāti upasampannānaṃ vāsatthāya kataṃ gehaṃ ṭhapetvāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:672_4: Tadaññaṃ pana uposathāgārādi sabbaṃ anivāsagehaṃ catukappiyabhūmivimuttā pañcamī kappiyabhūmi.
tika-vin08t0:672_5: Saṅghasantakepi hi etādise gehe suṭṭhu parikkhittārāmaṭṭhepi abbhokāse viya antovutthādidoso natthi.
tika-vin08t0:672_6: Yena kenaci channe paricchanne ca sahaseyyappahonake bhikkhussa,
tika-vin08t0:672_10: Tattha “saṅghikaṃ vā puggalikaṃ vā”ti idaṃ kiñcāpi bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ sāmaññato vuttaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pana saṅghikaṃ puggalikañca bhikkhunīnaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:672_11: tāsaṃ saṅghikaṃ puggalikañca bhikkhūnaṃ gihisantakaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:673_0: Mukhasannidhīti antosannihitadoso hi mukhappavesananimittaṃ āpattiṃ karoti, nāññathā,
tika-vin08t0:674_0: Tattha tattha khaṇḍā hontīti upaḍḍhato adhikaṃ khaṇḍā honti.
tika-vin08t0:674_1: Sabbasmiṃ chadane vinaṭṭheti tiṇapaṇṇādivassaparittāyake chadane vinaṭṭhe.
tika-vin08t0:674_2: Gopānasīnaṃ pana upari vallīhi baddhadaṇḍesu ṭhitesupi jahitavatthukā honti eva.
tika-vin08t0:674_3: Pakkhapāsakamaṇḍalanti ekasmiṃ passe tiṇṇaṃ gopānasīnaṃ upari ṭhitatiṇapaṇṇādichadanaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:675_1: “Anupasampannassa datvā tassā”tiādinā akappiyakuṭiyaṃ vutthampi anupasampannassa dinne kappiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:675_46: Sāmaṃpakkanti yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ bhikkhussa pacituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:680_1: Evaṃ kappiyabhūmivinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni paṭiggahaṇavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “khādanīyādipaṭiggāho”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:680_3: ṭhapetvā pañca bhojanāni sabbassa ajjhoharitabbassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:680_7: Tenāha “ajjhoharitabbassa yassa kassaci khādanīyassa vā bhojanīyassa vā paṭiggahaṇa”nti.
tika-vin08t0:680_10: Teneva tādisena purisena anukkhipanīyavatthusmiṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:680_12: Teneva ca dūre ṭhatvā abhiharantassa paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:680_14: tena ca tatraṭṭhakādīsu na ruhatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:681_0: Idāni tesu pañcasu aṅgesu hatthapāsassa durājānatāya taṃ dassetumāha “tatthi”ccādi.
tika-vin08t0:681_2: “Tassa orimantenā”ti iminā ākāse ujuṃ ṭhatvā parena ukkhittaṃ gaṇhantassāpi āsannaṅgabhūtapādatalato paṭṭhāya hatthapāso paricchinditabbo,
tika-vin08t0:682_0: Ettha ca pavāraṇasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace pana bhikkhu nisinno hoti,
tika-vin08t0:682_1: āsannassa pacchimantato paṭṭhāyā”tiādinā paṭiggāhakānaṃ āsannaṅgassa pārimantato paṭṭhāya paricchedassa
tika-vin08t0:682_2: dassitattā idhāpi ākāse ṭhitassa paṭiggāhakassa āsannaṅgabhūtapādatalassa pārimantabhūtato paṇhipariyantassa
tika-vin08t0:682_4: dāyakassa pana orimantabhūtato pādaṅgulassa heṭṭhimapariyantato paṭṭhāya hatthapāso paricchinditabboti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:682_5: Imināva nayena bhūmiyaṃ nipajjitvā ussīsake nisinnassa hatthato paṭiggaṇhantassāpi āsannasīsaṅgassa pārimantabhūtato
tika-vin08t0:682_10: Akallakoti gilāno sahatthā paribhuñjituṃ asakkonto mukhena paṭiggaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:682_11: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “akallakoti gilāno gahetuṃ vā”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:682_12: etena akallakoti gilāno vā atha vā gahetuṃ akallako asamatthoti attho dassito.
tika-vin08t0:682_13: Tenāha “sacepi natthukaraṇiyaṃ dīyamānaṃ nāsāpuṭena akallako vā mukhena paṭiggaṇhātī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:684_2: Sace bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitameva ghaṭaṃ dāyakena hatthapāse ṭhatvā “ghaṭaṃ dassāmī”ti dinnaṃ veṇukoṭiyā gahaṇavasena paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin08t0:684_4: Bhikkhussa hatthe apīḷetvā pakatiyā pīḷiyamānaṃ ucchurasaṃ sandhāya “gaṇhathā”ti vuttattā “abhihāro na paññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:684_5: hatthapāse ṭhitassa pana bhikkhussa atthāya pīḷiyamānaṃ ucchuto paggharantaṃ rasaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:684_6: Doṇikāya sayaṃ paggharantaṃ ucchurasaṃ majjhe āvaritvā vissajjitampi gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:685_3: “Tintiṇikādipaṇṇesūti vacanato sākhāsu paṭiggahaṇaṃ ruhatīti daṭṭhabba”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:685_6: Aṭṭhakathāyañhi “bhūmiyaṃ atthatesu sukhumesu tintiṇikādipaṇṇesu paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:685_7: Taṃ tintiṇikādipaṇṇānaṃ sukhumattā tattha ṭhapitaāmisassa asaṇṭhahanato bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitasadisattā “na ruhatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:685_9: tasmā “sākhāsu paṭiggahaṇaṃ ruhatī”ti vacanaṃ ayuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin08t0:685_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “na ruhatī”ti kiriyāpadassa “kasmā”ti hetupariyesane sati na aññaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:685_12: tasmā tintiṇikapaṇṇādīsu paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhati, kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:685_17: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “na hi tāni sandhāretuṃ samatthānīti mahantesu pana paduminīpaṇṇādīsu ruhatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:686_1: Puñchitvā paṭiggahetvāti puñchitepi rajanacuṇṇāsaṅkāya sati paṭiggahaṇatthāya vuttaṃ, nāsati.
tika-vin08t0:686_2: Taṃ panāti patitarajaṃ appaṭiggahetvā upari gahitapiṇḍapātaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:686_6: Yasmā pana taṃ “aññassa dassāmī”ti cittuppādamattena parasantakaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:686_7: tasmā tassa adatvāpi paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:686_9: tathā akatvā gahitepi paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjato anāpattiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:686_11: Kañjikanti khīrarasādiṃ yaṃ kiñci dravaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:686_16: Āharitvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitattā abhihāro natthīti āha “patto paṭiggahetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:687_1: Paṭhamataraṃ uḷuṅkato thevā patte patantīti ettha “yathā paṭhamataraṃ patitatheve doso natthi,
tika-vin08t0:687_2: tathā ākiritvā apanentānaṃ pacchā patitathevepi abhihaṭattā nevatthi doso”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:687_5: Datvā apanayanakāle pana chārikā vā bindūni vā patanti,
tika-vin08t0:687_12: Mukhavaṭṭiyāpi gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti abhihariyamānassa pattassa mukhavaṭṭiyā uparibhāge hatthaṃ pasāretvā phusituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:687_17: tasmā tesaṃ vacanaṃ na gahetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:687_19: Tathā ca tattha kāyapaṭibaddhe tappaṭibaddhe ca thullaccayameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:688_0: Tena āharāpetunti yassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:688_1: taṃ “idha naṃ ānehī”ti āṇāpetvā tena āharāpetuṃ itarassa vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:688_2: Tasmāti yasmā mūlaṭṭhasseva paribhogo anuññāto, tasmā.
tika-vin08t0:688_3: Taṃ divasaṃ hatthena gahetvā dutiyadivase paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa uggahitakapaṭiggahitaṃ hotīti āha “anāmasitvā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:688_5: Appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa adinnamukhadvārāpatti hotīti āha “paṭiggahetvā pana paribhuñjitabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:688_6: “Na tato paranti tadaheva sāmaṃ appaṭiggahitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:688_7: tadaheva paṭiggahitaṃ pana punadivasādīsu appaṭiggahetvāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:689_2: tesaṃ cuṇṇehi thullaccayaappaṭiggahaṇāpattiyo na hontīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:689_4: Navasamuṭṭhitanti eteneva ucchuādīsu abhinavalaggattā abbohārikaṃ na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:689_8: sannidhipaccayā vā doso na siyāti āha “na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:689_9: Iminā ca bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ sāmaṃ gahetvā vā anupasampannena dinnaṃ vā pariharituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti,
tika-vin08t0:689_10: tasmā pattasammakkhanādiatthaṃ sāmaṃ gahetvā pariharitatelādiṃ sace paribhuñjitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:689_12: Abbhantaraparibhogatthaṃ pana sāmaṃ gahitaṃ paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa uggahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:689_14: Abbhantaraparibhogatthameva anupasampannena dinnaṃ gahetvā pariharantassa siṅgīloṇakappo viya sannidhipaccayā āpatti hoti.
tika-vin08t0:689_15: Keci pana “thāmamajjhimassa purisassa uccāraṇamattaṃ hotītiādinā vuttapañcaṅgasampattiyā paṭiggahaṇassa
tika-vin08t0:689_16: ruhaṇato bāhiraparibhogatthampi sace anupasampannehi dinnaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin08t0:689_18: Evaṃ sati idha bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ anupasampannena dinnaṃ gahetvā pariharantassa sannidhipaccayā āpatti vattabbā siyā.
tika-vin08t0:689_19: “Na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī”ti ca na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:689_20: tasmā bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ gahitaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:690_0: Yadi evaṃ pañcasu paṭiggahaṇaṅgesu “paribhogatthāyā”ti visesanaṃ vattabbanti?
tika-vin08t0:690_2: Paṭiggahaṇañhi paribhogatthameva hotīti “paribhogatthāyā”ti visuṃ avatvā “tañce bhikkhu kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena
tika-vin08t0:690_4: Apare pana “satipi paṭiggahaṇe ‘na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī’ti idha aparibhogatthāya pariharaṇe anāpatti vuttā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:690_5: Tena ca paṭiggahaṇaṅgesu pañcasu samiddhesu ajjhoharitukāmatāya gahitameva paṭiggahitaṃ nāma hoti ajjhoharitabbesuyeva
tika-vin08t0:690_7: Tathā bāhiraparibhogatthāya gahetvā ṭhapitatelādiṃ ajjhoharitukāmatāya sati paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:690_8: Udukkhalamusalādīni khīyantīti ettha udukkhalamusalānaṃ khayena pisitakoṭṭitabhesajjesu sace āgantukavaṇṇo paññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:690_10: Suddhaṃ udakaṃ hotīti rukkhasākhādīhi gaḷitvā patanaudakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:691_1: Patto vāssa paṭiggahetabboti etthāpi pattagataṃ chupitvā dentassa hatthe laggena āmisena dosābhāvatthaṃ
tika-vin08t0:691_4: paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahatīti ettha punappunaṃ gaṇhantassa attano patte pakkhittameva attano santakanti
tika-vin08t0:691_6: Paricchinditvā dinnaṃ pana gaṇhantassa gahaṇasamayeyeva attano santakanti sanniṭṭhānassa katattā hatthagataṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati.
tika-vin08t0:691_7: Kesañci atthāya bhattaṃ pakkhipatīti ettha anupasampannassa atthāya pakkhipantepi āgantvā gaṇhissatīti
tika-vin08t0:691_8: sayameva pakkhipitvā ṭhapanato paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati.
tika-vin08t0:691_9: Anupasampannassa hatthe pakkhittaṃ pana anupasampanneneva ṭhapitaṃ nāma hotīti paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati pariccattabhāvato.
tika-vin08t0:691_12: Kesañcītiādīsu anupasampannānaṃ atthāya katthaci ṭhapiyamānampi hatthato muttamatte eva paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati,
tika-vin08t0:691_13: atha kho bhājane patitameva paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati.
tika-vin08t0:691_14: Bhājanañca bhikkhunā punadivasatthāya apekkhitamevāti taggatampi āmisaṃ duddhotapattagataṃ viya paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t0:691_15: vijahatīti saṅkāya “sāmaṇerassa hatthe pakkhipitabba”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:692_1: Pattagatā yāgūti iminā pattamukhavaṭṭiyā phuṭṭhepi kuṭe yāgu paṭiggahitā,
tika-vin08t0:692_2: uggahitā vā na hoti bhikkhuno anicchāya phuṭṭhattāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:692_4: Paṭiggahaṇūpagaṃ bhāraṃ nāma thāmamajjhimassa purisassa ukkhepārahaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:692_5: Kiñcāpi avissajjetvāva aññena hatthena pidahantassa doso natthi,
tika-vin08t0:692_7: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “na pidahitabbanti hatthato muttaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:692_9: hatthato muttampi vā aphusitvā upari pidhānaṃ pātentassa na doso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:693_1: Paṭiggaṇhātīti chāyatthāya upari dhāriyamānā mahāsākhā yena kenaci chijjeyya,
tika-vin08t0:693_2: tattha laggarajaṃ mukhe pāteyya vāti kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paṭiggaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:694_0: Macchikavāraṇatthanti ettha “sacepi sākhāya laggarajaṃ patte patati,
tika-vin08t0:694_1: sukhena paribhuñjituṃ sakkāti sākhāya paṭiggahitattā abbhantaraparibhogatthamevidha paṭiggahaṇanti mūlapaṭiggahaṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:694_2: Apare pana “macchikavāraṇatthanti vacanamattaṃ gahetvā bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ gahita”nti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:694_5: Anupasampannaṃ gāhāpetvāti tameva ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ anupasampannena gāhāpetvā.
tika-vin08t0:695_0: Therassa pattaṃ dutiyattherassāti “therassa pattaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”ti tena attano pariccajāpetvā dutiyattherassa deti.
tika-vin08t0:695_1: Tuyhaṃ yāguṃ mayhaṃ dehīti ettha evaṃ vatvā sāmaṇerassa pattaṃ gahetvā attanopi pattaṃ tassa deti.
tika-vin08t0:695_3: Kāraṇaṃ upaparikkhitabbanti yathā mātuādīnaṃ telādīni haranto tathārūpe kicce anupasampannena aparivattetvāva paribhuñjituṃ labhati,
tika-vin08t0:695_4: evamidha pattaparivattanaṃ akatvā paribhuñjituṃ kasmā na labhatīti kāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsitabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:695_5: Ettha pana “sāmaṇerehi gahitataṇḍulesu parikkhīṇesu avassaṃ amhākaṃ sāmaṇerā saṅgahaṃ karontīti cittuppatti sambhavati,
tika-vin08t0:695_7: Mātāpitūnaṃ atthāya pana chāyatthāya vā gahaṇe paribhogāsā natthi,
tika-vin08t0:700_1: Na hi sakkā ettha vitakkaṃ sodhetunti.
tika-vin08t0:700_2: Mātādīnaṃ atthāya haraṇe pana nāvassaṃ tathāvidhavitakkuppattīti sakkā vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:700_5: Teneva vakkhati “sace pana sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:700_8: Kāraṇanti ettha yathā sāmaṇerā ito amhākampi dentīti vitakko uppajjati,
tika-vin08t0:701_2: Uddhanaṃ āropetabbanti anaggikaṃ uddhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:701_3: Uddhane paccamānassa āluḷane upari apakkataṇḍulā heṭṭhā pavisitvā paccantīti āha “sāmaṃpākañceva hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:702_1: Ādhārake patto ṭhapitoti appaṭiggahitāmiso patto puna paṭiggahaṇatthāya ṭhapito.
tika-vin08t0:702_3: satipi kāraṇe bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogārahaṃ cāletuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:702_6: amanussikābādhe āmakamaṃsaṃ āmakalohita”nti tādise ābādhe attano atthāya āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇaṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:702_11: Sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetunti “mayhampi detī”ti vitakkassa anuppannabhāvaṃ sallakkhetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin08t0:702_12: “sāmaṇerassa dassāmī”ti suddhacittena mayā gahitanti vā sallakkhetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-vin08t0:702_13: Sace pana mūlepi paṭiggahitaṃ hotīti ettha “gahetvā gate mayhampi dadeyyunti saññāya sace paṭiggahitaṃ hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:703_1: Koṭṭhāse karotīti “bhikkhū sāmaṇerā ca attano attano abhirucitaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gaṇhantū”ti sabbesaṃ samake koṭṭhāse karoti.
tika-vin08t0:703_4: Idha gahitāvasesaṃ nāma tena gaṇhitvā puna ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:704_2: Sace pana purimadivase paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitā hoti,
