tika-vin08t0:986_9: Vihārasīmā ca jambuṃ anto katvā ambaṃ kittetvā baddhā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:986_10: atha pacchā tassa vihārassa puratthimadisāyaṃ vihāre kate sīmaṃ bandhantā bhikkhū ambaṃ anto katvā jambuṃ kittetvā bandhanti,
tika-vin08t0:986_12: Porāṇasīmāya ca ekadesaṃ vā sakalaporāṇasīmaṃ vā anto karitvā navaṃ sīmaṃ bandheyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:986_14: Vuttañhetaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā nāma attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā.
tika-vin08t0:986_15: Sace hi paresaṃ baddhasīmaṃ sakalaṃ vā tassā padesaṃ vā anto katvā attano sīmaṃ sammannanti,
tika-vin08t0:987_0: Yasmiṃ padese cattāro bhikkhū nisīditvā kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-vin08t0:987_1: tattha tato paṭṭhāya yāva kesaggamattampi aññesaṃ porāṇabaddhasīmappadesaṃ attano sīmāya anto karonto sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindati nāma.
tika-vin08t0:987_2: Catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nisīdituṃ pahonakaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva sakalampi aññesaṃ porāṇabaddhasīmāpadesaṃ
tika-vin08t0:987_3: attano sīmāya anto karonto sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharati nāma.
tika-vin08t0:987_4: Vuttañhetaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyā līnatthapakāsaniyaṃ “tassā padesanti tassā ekadesaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:987_5: yattha ṭhatvā catūhi bhikkhūhi kammaṃ kātuṃ sakkā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:987_7: Yattha pana ṭhitehi kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:987_8: tādisaṃ padesaṃ anto karitvā sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindanti nāma,
tika-vin08t0:987_10: Vimativinodaniyampi “yattha catūhi bhikkhūhi nisīdituṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:987_11: tattakato paṭṭhāya yāva kesaggamattampi attano sīmāya karontā sambhindanti,
tika-vin08t0:987_12: catunnampi bhikkhūnaṃ pahonakato paṭṭhāya yāva sakalampi anto karontā ajjhottharantīti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:988_1: tasmiṃ gāmasīmaparicchede porāṇakasīmāya vijjamānāya vipattidvayamocanatthaṃ sīmāsamūhananakammaṃ sātthakaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:988_2: avijjamānāya kathaṃ sātthakaṃ bhaveyyāti saṅkānivattanatthaṃ sīmāsamūhananakammaṃ akatvā abhinavasīmāya bajjhamānāya saṅkā uppajjeyya,
tika-vin08t0:988_3: bhagavato dharamānakālato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā gaṇanapathaṃ vītikkantā bhikkhū upasampadādikammakaraṇatthaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ padese sīmaṃ bandhanti.
tika-vin08t0:988_6: tasmā “amhākaṃ sīmābandhanaṭṭhāne porāṇakasīmā bhaveyya nu kho”ti saṅkā bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:988_7: evaṃ sati sā abhinavasīmā ca āsaṅkanīyā hotīti sīmāyaṃ kataṃ upasampadādikammampi āsaṅkanīyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:988_8: tasmā saṅkānivattanatthaṃ abhinavasīmaṃ bandhitukāmehi yatipuṅgavehi avassaṃ sīmāsamūhananakammaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:988_12: pacchā sīmā samūhantabbā”ti vacanato paṭhamaṃ avippavāsasīmā samūhanitabbā,
tika-vin08t0:988_14: Tasmiṃ samūhananakāle ca “khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā avippavāsasīmā na samūhantabbā,
tika-vin08t0:988_17: tathā itarāya ṭhitena itarā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvāva khaṇḍasīmā samūhanitabbā,
tika-vin08t0:988_19: aññissā sīmāya ṭhatvā aññā sīmā na samūhanitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:988_20: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avippavāsasīmāti mahāsīmaṃ vadati tattheva yebhuyyena cīvarena vippavasanato.
tika-vin08t0:989_2: Khaṇḍasīmaṃ pana jānantā avippavāsaṃ ajānantāpi samūhanituñceva bandhituñca sakkhissanti.
tika-vin08t0:989_3: Khaṇḍasīmaṃ pana ajānantā avippavāsaṃyeva jānantā cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇauposathāgārādīsu nirāsaṅkaṭṭhānesu
tika-vin08t0:989_11: Ayañhi sīmā nāma kammavācāya vā asīmā hoti sāsanantaradhānena vā,
tika-vin08t0:989_12: na ca sakkā sīmaṃ ajānantehi kammavācā kātuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:989_14: sādhukaṃ pana ñatvāyeva samūhanitabbā ca bandhitabbā cā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato “idāni sīmaṃ samūhanissāmā”ti
tika-vin08t0:989_15: paricchinnāya gāmasīmāya anto khaṇḍasīmamahāsīmānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ vā natthibhāvaṃ vā tāsaṃ sīmānaṃ paricchedañca
tika-vin08t0:989_17: evaṃ ajānantā bhikkhū tā porāṇasīmāyo samūhanituṃ na sakkuṇeyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:989_18: porāṇasīmaṃ samūhanituṃ asakkontā ca kathaṃ abhinavasīmaṃ bandhituṃ sakkuṇissantīti paramparehi ācariyehi
tika-vin08t0:989_19: sammā vinicchitaṃ anulomanayaṃ nissāya mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ karitvā aṅgaṃ aparihāpetvā sammā vihitanayena
tika-vin08t0:990_4: taṃ visuṃgāmaparicchedaṃ aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ appavisanatthāya samantato susaṃvihitārakkhaṃ kārāpetvā kammavācaṃ
tika-vin08t0:990_5: sāvetuṃ samatthena byattibalasampannena vinayadharena saha samānasaṃvāsake lajjipesale imassa kammassa
tika-vin08t0:990_6: catuvaggakaraṇīyattā cattāro bhikkhū kammappatte bhikkhūnaṃ pakatattabhāvassa dubbiññeyyattā vā tato
tika-vin08t0:990_7: adhikappamāṇe bhikkhū gahetvā idāni bandhitabbāya sīmāya nimittānaṃ vihāraparikkhepassa ca anto ca sabbattha
tika-vin08t0:990_8: bahi ca samantā leḍḍupātamatte padese sabbattha mañcappamāṇe mañcappamāṇe ṭhāne hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā
tika-vin08t0:990_11: tato samānasaṃvāsakasīmāsamūhananakammavācaṃ sāvetvā sīmāya samugghāte kate porāṇasīmāsu vijjamānāsupi
tika-vin08t0:990_12: pacchimantena ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ nisīdanārahattā sīmāya mañcappamāṇe mañcappamāṇe ṭhāne tiṭṭhantā
tika-vin08t0:990_13: bhikkhū avassaṃ tāsu sīmāsu tiṭṭhantā bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:990_14: tasmā sīmaṭṭhā hutvā sīmāsamūhananakammavācaṃ vatvā tā sīmā samūhaneyyuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:990_15: Tato porāṇabaddhasīmānaṃ samūhatattā gāmasīmāyeva avasiṭṭhā bhaveyyāti.
tika-vin08t0:990_16: Vuttañhetaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “keci pana īdisesu vihāresu chapañcamatte bhikkhū gahetvā vihārakoṭito
tika-vin08t0:990_17: paṭṭhāya vihāraparikkhepassa anto ca bahi ca samantā leḍḍupāte sabbattha mañcappamāṇe mañcappamāṇe okāse
tika-vin08t0:990_19: tato samānasaṃvāsakasīmañca samūhananavasena sīmāya samugghāte kate tasmiṃ vihāre khaṇḍasīmāya mahāsīmāya
tika-vin08t0:990_20: ca vijjamānatte satipi avassaṃ ekasmiṃ mañcaṭṭhāne tāsaṃ majjhagatā te bhikkhū tā samūhaneyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:991_0: “Sādhukaṃ pana ñatvāyeva samūhanitabbā ceva bandhitabbā cā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato sīmaṃ jānantāyeva samūhanituṃ sakkhissanti,
tika-vin08t0:991_2: Imasmiṃ sīmāsamūhananādhikāre sīmaṃ vā sīmāparicchedaṃ vā jānanabhāvo aṅgaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:991_4: “sīmaṃ samūhanissāmā”ti kammavācākaraṇanti idameva dvayaṃ aṅgaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:991_5: tasmā iminā aṅgadvayena sampanne sati imaṃ ajānantāpi samūhanituṃ sakkontīti.
tika-vin08t0:991_6: Iminā aṅgadvayena sampanne sati sīmaṃ ajānantānaṃ samūhanituṃ samatthabhāvo kathaṃ viññātabboti?
tika-vin08t0:991_7: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “khaṇḍasīmaṃ pana jānantā avippavāsaṃ ajānantāpi samūhanituñceva bandhituñca sakkhissantī”ti
tika-vin08t0:991_8: evaṃ mahāsīmāya paricchedaṃ ajānanaṭṭhānepi samūhananassa vuttattā vimativinodaniyampi “na hettha sīmāya,
tika-vin08t0:991_12: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘khaṇḍasīmaṃ pana jānantā avippavāsaṃ ajānantāpi samūhanituñceva bandhituñca sakkhissantī’ti
tika-vin08t0:991_13: evaṃ mahāsīmāya paricchedassa ajānanepi samūhananassa vuttattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:991_14: Tato porāṇabaddhasīmānaṃ samūhatattā gāmasīmāyeva avasiṭṭhā bhaveyyāti tasmiṃ avasiṭṭhāya tato paraṃ kiṃ kātabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:991_15: Gāmasīmāya avasiṭṭhāya sati taṃ gāmasīmaṃ pubbe vuttanayena sodhanaṃ rakkhaṇañca katvā tissaṃ gāmasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t0:991_17: sīmaṃ abandhitvāva kevalāya gāmasīmāya upasampadādisaṅghakammañca kātumpi labhati.
tika-vin08t0:992_1: “gāmasīmāya eva ca avasiṭṭhāya tattha yathāruci duvidhampi sīmaṃ bandhituñceva upasampadādikammaṃ kātuñca vaṭṭatīti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:992_4: Tasmā yadi saṭṭhihatthāyāmaṃ cattālīsahatthavitthāraṃ khaṇḍasīmameva kattukāmā honti,
tika-vin08t0:992_5: ettake padese mañcaṭṭhānaṃ gaṇhanto pamāṇayuttako mañcoti sabbapacchimappamāṇayutto mañco.
tika-vin08t0:992_8: Tato khuddako mañco sīsupadhānaṃ ṭhapetvā pādaṃ pasāretvā nipajjituṃ nappahotīti sabbapacchimamañcassa
tika-vin08t0:992_9: āyāmappamāṇassa samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttattā tato adhikāyāmopi hotiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:992_10: Mañcassa vitthāro pana āyāmassa upaḍḍho hoti,
tika-vin08t0:992_12: vitthārato pañcavidatthikanti gahetvā tena pamāṇena gaṇhanto saṭṭhihatthāyāmaṃ sīmaṭṭhānaṃ catuvīsatimañcakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:992_18: Duvidhepi āyāmaṃ vitthārena guṇitaṃ karonto sakalaṃ antosīmaṭṭhānaṃ dvānahuttarasatamañcakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:992_19: bahisīmaṭṭhānampi samantato ekamañcakaṃ vā dvitimañcakaṃ vā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:992_22: taṃ pana mahāsīmābandhanakāle vihāraparikkhepassa bahiupacāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-vin08t0:992_25: Kalyāṇiyaṃ nāma sīmāyaṃ pana āyāmato ca vitthārato ca pañcahatthappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ ekakoṭṭhāsaṃ katvā samūhanati.
tika-vin08t0:992_27: Idāni amheti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ pana pakaraṇanayena saṃsandanattā yuttataranti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:993_1: idāni bandhitabbāya sīmāya nimittānaṃ anto ca bahi ca yathāvuttanayena samūhanitabbasīmaṭṭhānaṃ ādāsatalaṃ
tika-vin08t0:993_2: viya samaṃ suddhaṃ vimalaṃ katvā yathāvuttamañcappamāṇaṃ mañcappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ aṭṭhapadakalekhaṃ viya
tika-vin08t0:993_3: rajjunā vā daṇḍena vā lekhaṃ kārāpetvā lekhānusārena tambamattikacuṇṇena vā setamattikacuṇṇena vā vaṇṇavisesaṃ
tika-vin08t0:993_4: kārāpetvā panti panti koṭṭhāsaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ kārāpetvā pubbe vuttanayena ārakkhaṃ sodhanañca kārāpetvā “idāni
tika-vin08t0:993_5: sīmaṃ samūhanissāmā”ti cattāro vā taduttari vā samānasaṃvāsakabhikkhū gahetvā paṭhamapantiyaṃ paṭhamakoṭṭhāse
tika-vin08t0:993_7: tato samānasaṃvāsakasīmāsamūhananakammavācaṃ sāvetvā tasmiṃ koṭṭhāseyeva aññamaññassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ parivattetvā
tika-vin08t0:993_8: parivattetvā tikkhattuṃ vā sattakkhattuṃ vā samūhanitvā tato nikkhamitvā paṭhamapantiyaṃyeva dutiyakoṭṭhāse
tika-vin08t0:993_9: ṭhatvā tatheva katvā tato paṭhamapantiyaṃyeva anulomanayena yāva antimakoṭṭhāsā ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse tatheva
tika-vin08t0:993_10: katvā paṭhamapantiyā parikkhīṇāya dutiyapantiyā antimakoṭṭhāse ṭhatvā tatheva katvā tato paṭṭhāya dutiyapantiyaṃyeva
tika-vin08t0:993_11: paṭilomanayena yāva ādikoṭṭhāsā tatheva katvā evaṃ tatiyapantiādīsupi ekadā anulomato ekadā paṭilomato
tika-vin08t0:993_12: gantvā sabbāsu pantīsu sabbasmiṃ koṭṭhāse parikkhīṇe idaṃ sīmāsamūhananakammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:993_13: “Cattāro taduttari vā”ti idaṃ pana imassa kammassa catuvaggakaraṇīyattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:993_14: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ pakatattabhāvassa duviññeyyattā lajjīpesalabhikkhūnañca dullabhattā “chapañcamatte”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:994_0: Kalyāṇīsīmāyaṃ pana sīhaḷadīpato abhinavasikkhaṃ gahetvā nivattantehi garahavivādamattampi alabhantehi
tika-vin08t0:994_1: dhammacetiyaraññā vicinitvā gahitehi cuddasahi bhikkhūhi katanti pāsāṇalekhāyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:994_2: Ratanapūranagare pana sirīsudhammarājādhipatināmakassa cūḷaaggarājino kāle mahāsīhaḷappattoti vissuto
tika-vin08t0:994_3: sirīsaddhammakittināmako mahātheravaro attano vasanaṭṭhānassa avidūre pabbatamatthake sīmaṃ bandhanto
tika-vin08t0:994_4: attano nissitake aggahetvā attanā abhirucite lajjipesalabahussutasikkhākāmabhūte aññe mahāthere gahetvā
tika-vin08t0:994_6: Taṃ imassa kammassa catuvaggakaraṇīyattā tesañca therānaṃ pakatattabhāve nirāsaṅkattā kataṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:994_7: evaṃ santepi bhikkhūnaṃ pakatattabhāvassa dubbiññeyyattā catuvaggakaraṇīyakammassa atirekacatuvaggena
tika-vin08t0:994_8: karaṇe dosābhāvato atirekabhikkhūhi katabhāvo pasatthataro hoti.
tika-vin08t0:994_9: Teneva ca kāraṇena vimativinodanīnāmikāyaṃ vinayaṭīkāyaṃ “chapañcamatte bhikkhū gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:994_11: Evaṃ niṭṭhitepi pana sīmāsamūhananakamme nānāvādānaṃ nānācariyānaṃ nānānikāyānaṃ nānādesavāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t0:994_12: cittārādhanatthaṃ garahavivādamocanatthañca punappunaṃ tehipi bhikkhūhi tatheva kārāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:994_14: Tañhi kuppassa kammassa kammaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin08t0:994_16: Teneva ca kāraṇena haṃsāvatīnagare anekapaṇḍarahatthisāmimahādhammarājā sahapuññakammabhūtato mahācetiyato
tika-vin08t0:994_17: catūsu disāsu sīmāsamūhananakāle rāmaññadesavāsīhi mahātherehi ca marammadesavāsīhi mahātherehi ca visuṃ
tika-vin08t0:995_1: tadā usabhamattaṃ vā dviusabhamattaṃ vā taduttari vā padesaṃ sallakkhetvā “ettake ṭhāne vihāraṃ karissāmā”ti
tika-vin08t0:995_2: parikkhepaṃ kārāpetvā tassa vihāraparikkhepassa anto ca sabbattha bahi ca samantā leḍḍupātaṭṭhāne mañcappamāṇe
tika-vin08t0:995_3: mañcappamāṇe okāse heṭṭhā vuttanayena pantikoṭṭhāse katvā kammappattehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nirantaraṃ
tika-vin08t0:995_4: ṭhatvā paṭhamaṃ avippavāsasīmā tato samānasaṃvāsakasīmā ca samūhanitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:995_5: Evaṃ sīmāya samugghāte kate tasmiṃ vihāre khaṇḍasīmāya mahāsīmāya ca vijjamānatte sati avassaṃ ekasmiṃ
tika-vin08t0:995_6: mañcaṭṭhāne tāsaṃ majjhagatā te bhikkhū tā samūhaneyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:995_8: tassaṃ gāmasīmāyaṃ khaṇḍasīmāmahāsīmāvasena duvidhā sīmā yathāruci bandhitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:996_0: Kasmā pana nimittānaṃ bahipi sīmāsamūhananaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:996_1: nanu nimittānaṃ antoyeva abhinavasīmā icchitabbāti tattheva sambhedajjhottharaṇavimocanatthaṃ porāṇakasīmāya samūhananaṃ kātabbanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:996_4: tasmā yadi nimittānaṃ antoyeva sīmāsamūhananaṃ kareyya,
tika-vin08t0:996_7: taṃ ṭhānaṃ kammavācāpāṭhakena saha sīmāsamūhananakārakasaṅghassa patiṭṭhahanappahonakaṃ na bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:996_8: evaṃ sante sā porāṇakasīmā asamūhatāva bhaveyya.
tika-vin08t0:996_11: yadi pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ catunnaṃ nisinnappahonakaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:996_15: evampi sīmāsaṅkaradosoti imasmā dosattayā vimocanatthaṃ nimittānaṃ bahipi sīmāsamūhananaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:996_16: Teneva vimativinodaniyaṃ “bahi ca samantā leḍḍupāte”tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:997_0: Keci pana ācariyā samantā nimittānaṃ anto rajjupasāraṇaṃ katvā anto ṭhatvā rajjuyā heṭṭhā pāde pavesetvā
tika-vin08t0:997_1: rajjuto bahi kiñcimattaṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā sīmāsamūhananaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:997_4: atha kho kammavācāpāṭhakena saha kammapattasaṅghassa patiṭṭhānena kammavācāya pāṭhanena ca samugghāto hoti.
tika-vin08t0:997_7: tasmā ekadesena antopaviṭṭhāya ca ekasambandhena ṭhitāya porāṇakabaddhasīmāya samugghāte akate vuttanayena dosattayato na mucceyya,
tika-vin08t0:997_8: tasmā nimittato bahipi ṭhatvā samūhananakaraṇabhāvova pāsaṃsataro hoti.
tika-vin08t0:997_9: Aññe pana ācariyā kammakārakabhikkhūnaṃ padavalañjasambandhaṃ katvā samūhananti,
tika-vin08t0:997_10: taṃ garukaraṇavasena katanti gayhamāne doso natthi.
tika-vin08t0:997_11: Ekacce pana therā “kārakasaṅghassa akkantaṭṭhāneyeva sīmā samūhatā,
tika-vin08t0:997_12: na anakkantaṭṭhāneti saññāya paṭhamataraṃ sālaṃ karitvā pacchā sīmāya samūhatāya thambhaṭṭhāne akkamituṃ na labhati,
tika-vin08t0:998_0: Pubbepi sirīkhettanagare mahāsattadhammarājassa kāle tena raññā katassa nandanavihārassa purato tassa
tika-vin08t0:998_1: rañño aggamahesiyā sīmāya patiṭṭhāpitāya paṭhamaṃ jetavanasālaṃ katvā pacchā sīmaṃ samūhaniṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:998_2: tadā tasmiṃ nagare mahārukkhamūliko nāma eko gaṇapāmokkhatthero “sace thambhaṃ vijjhitvā pāde ṭhapetuṃ sakkhissāmi,
tika-vin08t0:998_3: evaṃ sante ahaṃ āgacchissāmī”ti vatvā nāgacchati.
tika-vin08t0:998_5: thambhassa samantato ṭhatvā kammavācāya katāya sīmā samūhatā hotī”ti vatvā tassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā samūhaniṃsu ceva bandhiṃsu ca.
tika-vin08t0:998_6: Haṃsāvatīnagare dhammacetiyarañño kalyāṇiyasīmābandhanakālepi paṭhamaṃ sālaṃ karitvāva pacchā samūhaniṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:998_7: na ca pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkādīsu “padavalañjasambandhaṃ katvā sīmā samūhanitabbā”ti pāṭho atthi,
tika-vin08t0:998_9: Porāṇasīmāya anto ṭhatvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sīmāsamūhananakammavācāya katāya sakalāpi sīmā samūhatāva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:998_10: tasmā “padavalañjasambandhaṃ katvā samūhanitabba”nti vacanaṃ paṇḍitā na sampaṭicchanti.
tika-vin08t0:998_11: Īdisaṃ pana vacanaṃ garukaraṇavasena vuttanti gayhamāne kiñcāpi doso natthi,
tika-vin08t0:998_14: evaṃ karontī”ti daḷhīkammavasena gahetvā tathā akate sīmā samūhatā na hotīti maññanti,
tika-vin08t0:998_15: tasmā pakaraṇāgatanayavaseneva karaṇaṃ varaṃ pasatthaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:999_0: Aparampi imasmiṃ sīmāsamūhananādhikāre dhammagāravehi vinayadharehi cintetabbaṃ gambhīraṃ duddasaṃ ṭhānaṃ atthi,
tika-vin08t0:999_4: tiyojanaparamaṃ sīmaṃ sammannitu”nti vacanato nānāgāmakkhettāni avattharitvā sammatā tiyojanikādikāyo mahāsīmāyo bhagavatā anuññātā atthi,
tika-vin08t0:999_5: atha ekaṃ gāmakkhettaṃ sodhetvā ārakkhaṃ datvā sīmāya samūhatāya yadi tato aññesu gāmakkhettesu bhikkhū santi,
tika-vin08t0:999_7: tasmā te bhikkhū tasmiṃ kamme vaggaṃ kareyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:999_8: evaṃ sati sīmā samūhatā na bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:999_9: tāya asamūhatāya sati abhinavasīmā sammannitabbā na bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:999_11: tasmā pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya bhagavato āṇaṃ garuṃ karontehi lajjipesalabahussutasikkhākāmabhūtehi vinayavidūhi suṭṭhu cintetabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:1000_0: Imasmiṃ adhikāre cintento gavesanto vicinanto idaṃ kāraṇaṃ dissati –
tika-vin08t0:1000_1: tiyojanikādimahāsīmāyo iddhimantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dharamānakāle sannipatituṃ vā visodhetuṃ vā sakkuṇeyyabhāvato
tika-vin08t0:1000_3: Sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbasmiṃ padese sabbe bhikkhū tādisaṃ mahāsīmaṃ sodhetuṃ vā sannipatituṃ vā na sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:1000_4: na ca bhagavā asakkuṇeyyaṃ alabbhaneyyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vadeyya.
tika-vin08t0:1000_5: Bhagavato dharamānakāle rājagahanagare aṭṭhārasa mahāvihārā ekasīmāva dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherena sammatāti.
tika-vin08t0:1000_6: Sīhaḷadīpe mahāvihārasīmā anurādhapuraṃ antokatvā pavattā mahāmahindattherena sammatāti ca pakaraṇesu dissati,
tika-vin08t0:1000_7: na tathā imasmiṃ nāma dese dviyojanikā vā tiyojanikā vā sīmā asukena bhikkhunā sammatāti dissati.
tika-vin08t0:1000_8: Imasmiñca marammadese tādisānaṃ sīmānaṃ natthibhāvo upaparikkhitvā jānitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1000_9: Tathā hi anekasataanekasahassavassakālato uppannā baddhasīmā pāsāṇathambhanimittena saha tasmiṃ tasmiṃ padese dissanti.
tika-vin08t0:1000_10: Arimaddanapure ca anuruddhamahārājena sammannāpitā dvāsaṭṭhayādhikasatahatthāyāmā sattacattālīsādhikasatahatthavitthārā
tika-vin08t0:1000_12: Ratanapūranagare ca narapatijeyyasūramahārājakāle aṭṭhasattatādhikacatusatakaliyuge sammannitā sīmā pāsāṇalekhāya saddhiṃ dissati.
tika-vin08t0:1000_14: porāṇācariyā navaṃ navaṃ baddhasīmaṃ na bandheyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1000_17: tato eva ca gaṇanapathamatikkantā bhikkhū paramparato vaḍḍhentā yāvajjatanā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhapenti.
tika-vin08t0:1000_18: Iminā ca kāraṇena imasmiṃ padese tiyojanā sīmāyo natthīti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1001_0: Atha vā “vihāraparikkhepassa anto ca bahi ca samantā leḍḍupāte”ti vihāraparikkhepassa anto ca vihārūpacārabhūte
tika-vin08t0:1001_1: bahi leḍḍupāte ca ṭhāneyeva sīmāsamūhananassa vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttattāpi tādisā mahāsīmāyo natthīti
tika-vin08t0:1001_5: Kathentāpi samantā tiyojanaṃ ṭhānaṃ sodhetvā sīmāsamūhananaṃ kareyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1001_6: tathā pana akathetvā vihāravihārūpacāresuyeva sīmāsamūhananassa kathitattā tiyojanikādayo mahāsīmāyo natthīti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1002_0: Atha vā “khaṇḍasīmaṃ pana jānantā avippavāsaṃ ajānantāpi samūhanituñceva bandhituñca sakkhissantī”ti
tika-vin08t0:1002_1: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanatopi tesu tesu janapadesu tiyojanikādikāyo mahāsīmāyo natthīti viññāyati. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1002_3: sakalampi taṃ sīmaṃ asodhetvā sīmāsamūhananaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyā na katheyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1002_4: atha ca pana khaṇḍasīmaṃ jānantā avippavāsaṃ ajānantāpi sīmaṃ samūhanituṃ bandhituñca samatthabhāvaṃ kathenti,
tika-vin08t0:1002_5: sā kathā khandhasīmāya sīmantarikantaritamattā hutvā tasmiṃ gāmakkhette avippavāsasīmā bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1002_6: tasmā tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā samūhanituṃ samatthabhāvena aṭṭhakathācariyehi kathīyati,
tika-vin08t0:1002_7: na nānāgāmakkhettāni avattharitvā sammatāya tiyojanikādibhedāya sīmāya aññesu gāmakkhettesu aññesu bhikkhūsu santesupi samūhanituṃ samatthabhāvena,
tika-vin08t0:1002_8: tena ñāyati “na sabbesu ṭhānesu tiyojanikādibhedāyo mahāsīmāyo na santī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1002_9: Īdisāni kāraṇāni bhagavato āṇaṃ garuṃ karontehi vinayatthavidūhi vinayadharehi punappunaṃ cintetabbāni upaparikkhitabbāni,
tika-vin08t0:1003_2: tehipi āgantabba”ntiādivacanato ekasmiṃyeva gāmakkhette sīmaṃ na bandhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1003_3: atha kho aññānipi gāmakkhettāni antokaritvāpi bandhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1003_4: tasmā idāni sammannitabbāya sīmāya nissayabhūtaṃ pakatigāmakkhettaṃ vā visuṃgāmakkhettaṃ vā sodhitanti manasi na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1003_5: Kaṅkhacchedanatthaṃ sīmāsamūhananakammavācābhaṇanasamaye tena gāmakkhettena sambandhesu aññesu gāmakkhettesu
tika-vin08t0:1003_6: vasante bhikkhūpi yācitvā tato gāmakkhettato bahi dūre vāsāpetabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1003_7: Evañhi karonte aññāni gāmakkhettāni antokaritvā porāṇasīmāya vijjamānāyapi te vaggaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti.
tika-vin08t0:1003_9: tasmā evarūpo sukhumo nipuṇo attho vinayadharehi cintetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1003_10: Evaṃ sīmāsamūhananavidhānena sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindantena sammatā,
tika-vin08t0:1003_11: sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatāti vuttehi dvīhi vipattidosehi muttā hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1004_0: Tato “atikhuddikā atimahantī”ti vuttehi vipattidosehi vimuccanatthaṃ sīmāya pamāṇaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1004_1: Sīmā nāma ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ nisīdituṃ appahonte sati atikhuddikā nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1004_3: Tiyojanato paraṃ kesaggamattampi ṭhānaṃ anto karonte sati atimahatī nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1004_5: tasmā ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ nisīdanappahonakato paṭṭhāya tiyojanaṃ anatikkamitvā yattha yaṃ pamāṇaṃ saṅgho icchati,
tika-vin08t0:1004_6: tattha taṃ pamāṇaṃ katvā sīmā sammannitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1004_8: “Tattha atikhuddikā nāma yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkonti.
tika-vin08t0:1004_9: Atimahantī nāma antamaso kesaggamattenapi tiyojanaṃ atikkamitvā sammatā”ti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ vacanato viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1004_10: Evaṃ sīmāya pamāṇaggahaṇena “atikhuddikā atimahantī”ti vuttehi dvīhi dosehi muttā hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1005_0: Tato “khaṇḍanimittā chāyānimittā animittā”ti vuttehi tīhi vipattidosehi vimuccanatthaṃ nimittakittanaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1005_1: tattha asambandhakittanena nimittā sīmā khaṇḍanimittā nāma. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1005_2: Sīmāya catūsu disāsu ṭhapitanimittesu puratthimadisāya nimittaṃ kittetvā anukkamena dakkhiṇapacchimauttaradisāsu
tika-vin08t0:1005_3: nimittāni kittetvā puna puratthimadisāya nimittaṃ kittetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1005_5: Yadi pana puratthimadisāya nimittaṃ kittetvā anukkamena dakkhiṇapacchimauttaradisāsu nimittāni kittetvā ṭhapeti,
tika-vin08t0:1005_8: Aparāpi khaṇḍanimittā nāma yā animittupagapāsāṇaṃ vā bahisārarukkhaṃ vā khāṇukaṃ vā paṃsupuñjaṃ vā antarā ekaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā.
tika-vin08t0:1005_9: Pabbatacchāyādīsu yaṃ kiñci chāyaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā chāyānimittā nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1005_10: Sabbaso nimittaṃ akittetvā sammatā animittā nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1005_11: Imehi tīhi dosehi vimuccanatthāya nimittakittanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1006_1: Kammavācāya porāṇasīmāsamūhananaṃ katvā parisuddhāya kevalāya gāmasīmāya saṅghena yathājjhāsayaṃ gahitappamāṇassa
tika-vin08t0:1006_2: sīmamaṇḍalassa catūsu vā disāsu aṭṭhasu vā disāsu nimittupage heṭṭhimaparicchedena dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇe,
tika-vin08t0:1006_3: ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena hatthippamāṇato ūnappamāṇe pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā nimittānaṃ anto ṭhitena kammavācāpāṭhakena
tika-vin08t0:1006_7: Puna vinayadharena “eso pāsāṇo nimitta”nti vatvā kittetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1006_8: Iminā nayena sīmamaṇḍalaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karontena “puratthimāya anudisāya,
tika-vin08t0:1006_14: uttarāya anudisāya kiṃ nimittaṃ? Pāsāṇo, bhante.
tika-vin08t0:1006_15: Eso pāsāṇo nimitta”nti kittetvā puna “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ? Pāsāṇo, bhante.
tika-vin08t0:1006_18: Evaṃ nimittakittanena “khaṇḍanimittā chāyānimittā animittā”ti vuttehi tīhi vipattidosehi vimuttā hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1007_0: Tato paraṃ “bahisīme ṭhitasammatā”ti vuttavipattidosato vimuccanatthaṃ sīmāsammutikammavācāpāṭhakāle saṅghassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1007_1: Yadi nimittāni kittetvā saṅgho nimittānaṃ bahi ṭhatvā kammavācāya sīmaṃ sammannati,
tika-vin08t0:1007_4: tasmā nimittāni kittetvā saṅghena nimittānaṃ anto ṭhatvā kammavācāya sīmā sammannitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1007_5: Vuttañhetaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “bahisīme ṭhitasammatā nāma nimittāni kittetvā nimittānaṃ bahi ṭhitena sammatā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1007_6: Evaṃ sīmāsammannanaṭṭhānaniyamena “bahisīme ṭhitasammatā”ti vuttavipattidosato muttā hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1008_2: jātassare sammatā”ti vuttehi tīhi vipattidosehi ca vimuccanatthaṃ evaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ – “sabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1008_6: sabbo jātassaro asīmo”ti bhagavatā vacanato nadīsamuddajātassaresu sammatā sīmā na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1008_7: porāṇasīmavigatāya suddhāya gāmasīmāya sammatā eva sīmā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1008_10: Vuttañhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “nadiyā samudde jātassare sammatā nāma etesu nadīādīsu sammatā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1008_20: sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā”ti vuttehi ekādasahi dosehi vimuttā hutvā “abbhā mahikā dhūmo rajo
tika-vin08t0:1008_21: rāhū”ti vuttehi pañcahi upakkilesehi muttaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ viya,
tika-vin08t0:1009_1: Tāsu “pabbatanimittaṃ pāsāṇanimittaṃ vananimittaṃ rukkhanimittaṃ magganimittaṃ vammikanimittaṃ nadīnimittaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1009_2: udakanimitta”nti vuttesu aṭṭhasu nimittesu tassaṃ tassaṃ disāyaṃ yathāladdhāni nimittāni kittetvā sammannitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1009_3: Vuttañhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “puratthimāya disāya kiṃnimittaṃ? Pāsāṇo, bhante.
tika-vin08t0:1009_4: Eso pāsāṇo nimittantiādinā nayena kittetvā sammatā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1009_5: Tesu ca aṭṭhasu nimittesu rukkhanimittādīnaṃ yathājjhāsayaṭṭhānesu dullabhabhāvato vaḍḍhitvā dvinnaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1009_6: baddhasīmānaṃ saṅkarakaraṇato ca pāsāṇanimittassa pana tathā saṅkarakaraṇābhāvato yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1009_7: āharitvā ṭhapetuṃ sukarabhāvato ca sīmaṃ bandhantehi bhikkhūhi sīmamaṇḍalassa samantā nimittūpagā pāsāṇā
tika-vin08t0:1009_9: Tena vuttaṃ mahāvaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “taṃ bandhantehi samantā nimittūpagā pāsāṇā ṭhapetabbā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1009_10: Vimativinodaniyañca “nimittūpagā pāsāṇā ṭhapetabbāti idaṃ yathārucitaṭṭhāne rukkhanimittādīnaṃ dullabhatāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1010_0: Tato sīmāsammutikaraṇatthaṃ sabbantimena paricchedena cattāro bhikkhū sannipatitvā yāvatā tasmiṃ gāme
tika-vin08t0:1010_1: baddhasīmaṃ vā nadīsamuddajātassare vā anokkamitvā ṭhitā bhikkhū santi,
tika-vin08t0:1010_2: sabbe te hatthapāse vā katvā chandaṃ vā āharitvā yā sīmā sammatā,
tika-vin08t0:1010_4: Tena vuttaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “parisasampattiyuttā nāma sabbantimena paricchedena catūhi bhikkhūhi sannipatitvā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1010_5: Atha taṃ sīmaṃ bandhantā bhikkhū sāmantavihāresu vasante bhikkhū tassa tassa vihārassa sīmāparicchedaṃ pucchitvā ye baddhasīmavihārā,
tika-vin08t0:1010_8: tesaṃ sīmāya upacāraṃ ṭhapetvā disācārikabhikkhūnaṃ nissañcārasamaye yadi ekasmiṃyeva gāmakkhette sīmaṃ bandhitukāmā,
tika-vin08t0:1011_1: tattha nivāsino bhikkhū samānasaṃvāsakasīmāsammannanakāle āgantumpi anāgantumpi vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t0:1011_5: Evaṃ bhikkhūsu sannipatitesu chandārahānaṃ chande āhaṭe tesu tesu maggesu nadītitthagāmadvārādīsu ca
tika-vin08t0:1011_6: āgantukabhikkhūnaṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ hatthapāsānayanatthañca bahisīmakaraṇatthañca ārāmikasāmaṇere ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t0:1011_7: bherisaññaṃ vā saṅkhasaññaṃ vā kārāpetvā nimittakittanānantaraṃ vuttāya “suṇātu me,
tika-vin08t0:1012_3: pacchā ticīvarena avippavāso sammannitabbo”ti vacanato paṭhamaṃ samānasaṃvāsakasīmā sammannitabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1012_5: samānasaṃvāsakakammavācāpariyosāneyeva nimittāni bahi katvā nimittānaṃ antopamāṇeneva samānasaṃvāsakasīmā
tika-vin08t0:1012_10: Avippavāsakammavācāpariyosāne avippavāsasīmā yadi antosīmāya gāmo atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1012_11: gāmañca gāmūpacārañca muñcitvā samānasaṃvāsakasīmāya gataparicchedeneva gatā.
tika-vin08t0:1012_12: Iti ticīvarena avippavāsasīmā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca na avattharati,
tika-vin08t0:1013_4: saṅgho etehi nimittehi sīmaṃ sammanneyya samānasaṃvāsaṃ ekūposathaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1014_3: saṅgho etehi nimittehi sīmaṃ sammannati samānasaṃvāsaṃ ekūposathaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1014_4: Yassāyasmato khamati etehi nimittehi sīmāya sammuti samānasaṃvāsāya ekūposathāya,
tika-vin08t0:1014_8: Sammatā sā sīmā saṅghena etehi nimittehi samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā,
tika-vin08t0:1016_2: yā sā saṅghena sīmā sammatā samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā.
tika-vin08t0:1016_4: saṅgho taṃ sīmaṃ ticīvarena avippavāsaṃ sammanneyya ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca,
tika-vin08t0:1017_2: yā sā saṅghena sīmā sammatā samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā.
tika-vin08t0:1017_3: Saṅgho taṃ sīmaṃ ticīvarena avippavāsaṃ sammannati ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca.
tika-vin08t0:1017_4: Yassāyasmato khamati etissā sīmāya ticīvarena avippavāsasammuti ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca,
tika-vin08t0:1017_8: Sammatā sā sīmā saṅghena ticīvarena avippavāsā ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca,
tika-vin08t0:1018_0: Esā avippavāsakammavācā ñattidosaanussāvanādose anuṭṭhapetvā suṭṭhu bhaṇitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1019_0: Evamayaṃ sīmā anto maṇivimānaṃ bahi rajataparikkhittaṃ vimānasāmikadevaputtoti imehi tīhi aṅgehi sampannaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ viya,
tika-vin08t0:1019_1: anto kanakavimānaṃ bahi phalikaparikkhittaṃ vimānasāmikadevaputtoti imehi tīhi aṅgehi sampannaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1019_2: viya ca nimittasampattiparisasampattikammavācāsampattisaṅkhātehi tīhi aṅgehi sampannā hutvā ativiya sobhati virocati,
tika-vin08t0:1020_0: “Nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā”ti ettha pana pubbe vuttanayeneva puratthimadisato paṭṭhāya padakkhiṇaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1020_1: katvā sabbanimittāni kittetvā uttarānudisaṃ patvā tattheva aṭṭhapetvā pubbe kittitaṃ puratthimadisāya
tika-vin08t0:1020_3: Evaṃ sammatā ayaṃ sīmā ekādasahi vipattīhi muttā,
tika-vin08t0:1020_4: tīhi sampattīhi samannāgatā hutvā sabbākārasampannā pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālaṃ aparimāṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1021_1: pubbe vuttanayena suṭṭhu sodhetvā samūhanitaporāṇasīmāya kevalāya pakatigāmasīmāya vā visuṃgāmasīmāya vā bandhitabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1021_2: tāsu ca dvīsu sīmāsupabbajjupasampadādīnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ sukhakaraṇatthaṃ sīmā paṭhamaṃ bandhitabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1021_4: Sace hi bodhicetiyabhattasālādīni sabbavatthūni patiṭṭhāpetvā katavihāre bandhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1021_5: vihāramajjhe bahūnaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhāne abandhitvā vihārapaccante vivittokāse bandhitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1021_6: Akatavihāre bandhantehi bodhicetiyādīnaṃ sabbavatthūnaṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā yathā patiṭṭhitesu vatthūsu vihārapaccante vivittokāse hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1021_8: Tathā hi vuttaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “imaṃ pana samānasaṃvāsakasīmaṃ sammannantehī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1022_1: Heṭṭhimaparicchedena sace ekavīsati bhikkhū gaṇhāti, vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1022_5: Ekavīsati bhikkhūti ca nisinne sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1022_6: idañca abbhānakaraṇakāle kammārahabhikkhunā saddhiṃ vīsatigaṇassa saṅghassa nisīdanappahonakatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1022_8: Taṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ bandhantehi bhikkhūhi sīmamāḷakassa samantā nimittūpagā pāsāṇā ṭhapetabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1022_10: “Eso pāsāṇo nimitta”nti evaṃ nimittāni kittetvā kammavācāya sīmā bandhitabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1022_13: Evaṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ sammannitvā bahi sīmantarikapāsāṇā ṭhapetabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1023_0: Evaṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ sammannitvā mahāsīmāsammutikāle khaṇḍasīmato nikkhamitvā mahāsīmāya ṭhatvā samantā anupariyāyantehi sīmantarikapāsāṇā kittetabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1023_1: tato avasesanimittāni kittetvā hatthapāsaṃ avijahantehi kammavācāya samānasaṃvāsakasīmaṃ sammannitvā
tika-vin08t0:1023_3: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “evaṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ sammannitvā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1024_3: Tathā hi khaṇḍasīmato pacchimāya disāya puratthābhimukhena ṭhatvā “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimitta”nti
tika-vin08t0:1024_4: tattha sabbāni nimittāni anukkamena kittetvā tathā uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇābhimukhena ṭhatvā “dakkhiṇāya
tika-vin08t0:1024_5: disāya kiṃ nimitta”nti anukkamena kittetvā tathā puratthimāya disāya pacchimābhimukhena ṭhatvā “pacchimāya
tika-vin08t0:1024_6: disāya kiṃ nimitta”nti anukkamena kittetvā tathā dakkhiṇāya disāya uttarābhimukhena ṭhatvā “uttarāya
tika-vin08t0:1024_7: disāya kiṃ nimitta”nti tattha sabbāni nimittāni anukkamena kittetvā puna pacchimāya disāya puratthābhimukhena
tika-vin08t0:1024_8: ṭhatvā purimaṃ kittitaṃ vuttanayeneva puna kittetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1024_9: Evaṃ bahūnampi khaṇḍasīmānaṃ sīmantarikapāsāṇā paccekaṃ kittetabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1024_10: tato pacchā avasesanimittānīti mahāsīmāya bāhirabandhanesu nimittāni.
tika-vin08t0:1024_11: Evaṃ sīmantarikapāsāṇā mahāsīmāya anto nimittāni honti dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ saṅkaradosāpagamanatthaṃ sīmantarikapāsāṇānaṃ ṭhapetabbattā.
tika-vin08t0:1024_14: te pana kittentena padakkhiṇato anupariyāyanteneva kittetabbā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1025_2: Sace pana khaṇḍasīmāya nimittāni kittetvā tato sīmantarikāya nimittāni kittetvā mahāsīmāya nimittāni kittenti,
tika-vin08t0:1025_3: evaṃ tīsu ṭhānesu nimittāni kittetvā yaṃ sīmaṃ icchanti,
tika-vin08t0:1025_5: Evaṃ santepi yathāvuttanayena khaṇḍasīmatova paṭṭhāya bandhitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1025_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace pana khaṇḍasīmāya nimittānī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1025_7: Evaṃ khaṇḍasīmamahāsīmabandhanena bhikkhūnaṃ ko guṇoti ce?
tika-vin08t0:1025_8: Evaṃ baddhāsu pana sīmāsu khaṇḍasīmāya ṭhitā bhikkhū mahāsīmāyaṃ kammaṃ karontānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṃ na kopenti,
tika-vin08t0:1025_9: mahāsīmāya vā ṭhitā khaṇḍasīmāya kammaṃ karontānaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1025_10: sīmantarikāya pana ṭhitā ubhinnampi na kopenti.
tika-vin08t0:1025_11: Gāmakkhette ṭhatvā kammaṃ karontānaṃ pana sīmantarikāya ṭhitā kopenti.
tika-vin08t0:1025_13: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “evaṃ baddhāsu pana sīmāsū”tiādi,
tika-vin08t0:1025_14: evaṃ baddhasīmavihāresu vasantā bhikkhū ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitehi ticīvarehi vinā yathāruci vasituṃ labhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1029_1: Evaṃ sīmāvinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni uposathapavāraṇāvinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “uposathapavāraṇāti ettha”tyādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1032_0: Vacanato pātimokkhuddese paṇṇattiyaṃ upavāse aṭṭhaṅgasīle uposathadine ca vattati.
tika-vin08t0:1032_1: Tathā hesa “āyāmāvuso kappina uposathaṃ gamissāmā”tiādīsu pātimokkhuddese āgato,
tika-vin08t0:1032_8: uposathe sabhikkhukāāvāsā abhikkhuko āvāso”tiādīsu uposathadine vattati.
tika-vin08t0:1032_10: Te pana pātimokkhuddese antogadhāti katvā visuṃ na vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:1032_11: Idha pana pātimokkhuddese uposathadine ca vattati.
tika-vin08t0:1032_15: etasmiṃ divase sīlena upetā hutvā vasantītyattho.
tika-vin08t0:1033_2: kathitājjhesanāya cā”ti abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ vacanato paṭikkhepe ajjhesane ca vattati.
tika-vin08t0:1033_3: Tattha “yo pana bhikkhu bhuttāvī pavārito anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin08t0:1033_7: So pana ajjhesanadivasoyevāti visuṃ na vutto.
tika-vin08t0:1034_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ uposathakkhandhakānantaraṃ vassūpanāyikakkhandhako,
tika-vin08t0:1034_2: tathāpi uposathapavāraṇakammānaṃ yebhuyyena samānattā yamakamiva bhūtattā missetvā kathento suviññeyyo
tika-vin08t0:1034_3: hoti sallahukagantho cāti mantvā khandhakadvayasaṅgahitaṃ atthaṃ ekeneva paricchedena dasseti ācariyo.
tika-vin08t0:1034_4: Tattha cātuddasiko pannarasiko sāmaggīuposathoti divasavasena tayo uposathā hontīti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:1034_8: Hemantagimhavassānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ utūnanti ettha hemantautu nāma aparakattikakāḷapakkhassa pāṭipadato paṭṭhāya phaggunapuṇṇamapariyosānā cattāro māsā.
tika-vin08t0:1034_9: Gimhautu nāma phaggunassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya āsāḷhipuṇṇamapariyosānā cattāro māsā.
tika-vin08t0:1034_10: Vassānautu nāma āsāḷhassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya aparakattikapuṇṇamapariyosānā cattāro māsā.
tika-vin08t0:1034_11: Tatiyasattamapakkhesu dve dve katvā cha cātuddasikāti hemantassa utuno tatiye ca sattame ca pakkhe dve cātuddasikā,
tika-vin08t0:1034_14: Evaṃ gimhassa utuno tatiye cittamāsassa kāḷapakkhe sattame jeṭṭhamāsassa kāḷapakkhe ca,
tika-vin08t0:1034_15: vassānassa utuno tatiye sāvaṇassa kāḷapakkhe ca sattame assayujamāsassa kāḷapakkhe cāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1050_0: Evaṃ ekasaṃvacchare catuvīsati uposathāti evaṃ iminā vuttanayena hemantādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ ekekasmiṃ
tika-vin08t0:1050_1: utumhi paccekaṃ aṭṭhaaṭṭhauposathattā ututtayasamodhānabhūte ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare catuvīsati uposathā
tika-vin08t0:1050_3: Idaṃ tāva pakaticārittanti idaṃ ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare chacātuddasikaaṭṭhārasapannarasikauposathakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1050_4: tāva paṭhamaṃ pakatiyā sabhāvena cārittaṃ kātabbaṃ kammaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1051_0: Tathārūpapaccaye sati aññasmimpi cātuddase uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti “sakiṃ pakkhassa cātuddase vā pannarase
tika-vin08t0:1051_1: vā pātimokkhaṃ uddisitu”nti vacanato “yo pana āgantukehi āvāsikānaṃ anuvattitabba”ntiādivacanato ca tathārūpapaccaye
tika-vin08t0:1051_2: sati aññasmimpi cātuddase uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1051_4: Āvāsikānaṃ anuvattitabbanti āvāsikehi “ajjuposatho cātuddaso”ti pubbakicce kariyamāne anuvattitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1051_9: tehi bhikkhūhi dve tayo uposathe cātuddasike kātuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1051_10: kathaṃ mayaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi paṭhamataraṃ pavāreyyāmā”ti vacanañca saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:1051_11: Ettha ca paṭhamasuttassa ekekassa utuno tatiyasattamapakkhassa cātuddase vā avasesassa pannarase vā sakiṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:1051_13: Tathārūpapaccaye satīti aññasmimpi cātuddase uposathaṃ kātuṃ anurūpe āvāsikā bahutarā hontīti evamādike paccaye sati.
tika-vin08t0:1051_14: Aññasmimpi cātuddaseti tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ tatiyasattamapakkhacātuddasato aññasmiṃ cātuddase.
tika-vin08t0:1058_3: atītaṃ vā uposathaṃ cātuddasikaṃ akaṃsūti veditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1058_4: Āvāsikānaṃ anuvattitabbanti āvāsikehi “ajjuposatho cātuddaso”ti pubbakicce kariyamāne anuvattitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1059_3: sambahulā sandiṭṭhā sambhattā bhikkhū aññatarasmiṃ āvāse vassaṃ upagacchanti,
tika-vin08t0:1059_4: tesaṃ sāmantā aññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā
tika-vin08t0:1059_5: vassaṃ upagacchanti “mayaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vassaṃvutthānaṃ pavāraṇāya pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapessāmā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1059_8: tehi bhikkhūhi dve tayo uposathe cātuddasike kātuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1059_9: kathaṃ mayaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi paṭhamataraṃ pavāreyyāmāti.
tika-vin08t0:1060_1: dve tayo uposathe cātuddasike kātunti ettha catutthapañcamā dve,
tika-vin08t0:1060_3: tasmā tatiyacatutthā vā tatiyacatutthapañcamā vā dve tayo cātuddasikā kātabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1060_7: Evaṃ karontā bhaṇḍanakārakānaṃ terase vā cātuddase vā ime pannarasīpavāraṇaṃ pavāressantīti.
tika-vin08t0:1061_1: catutthe kate suṇantīti catutthe pannarasikuposathe kate amhākaṃ pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapessantīti suṇanti.
tika-vin08t0:1061_2: Evampi dve cātuddasikā hontīti tatiyena saddhiṃ dve cātuddasikā hontīti.
tika-vin08t0:1062_1: dve cātuddasikā hontīti tatiyapakkhe cātuddasiyā saddhiṃ dve cātuddasikā honti.
tika-vin08t0:1062_2: Bhaṇḍanakārakānaṃ terase vā cātuddase vā ime pannarasīpavāraṇaṃ pavāressantīti iminā yathāsakaṃ uposathakaraṇadivasato
tika-vin08t0:1062_7: rājūnaṃ anuvattitu”nti vacanato panettha lokiyānaṃ tithiṃ anuvattantehipi attano uposathakkamena cātuddasiṃ
tika-vin08t0:1062_8: pannarasiṃ vā pannarasiṃ cātuddasiṃ vā karonteheva anuvattitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1062_9: na pana soḷasamadivasaṃ vā terasamadivasaṃ vā uposathadivasaṃ karontehi.
tika-vin08t0:1062_10: Teneva pāḷiyampi “dve tayo uposathe cātuddasike kātu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1062_13: “Sakiṃ pakkhassa cātuddase vā pannarase vā”tiādivacanampi upavuttakkameneva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1063_2: Māiti cando vuccati tassa gatiyā divasassa minitabbato,
tika-vin08t0:1063_6: Sā hi pacchimakattikaṃ nivattetuṃ evaṃ vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:1063_10: bhaṇḍanakārake anuvādavasena assayujapuṇṇamādiṃ pariccajantā pavāraṇaṃ kāḷapakkhaṃ juṇhapakkhanti uddhaṃ kaḍḍhantīti attho,
tika-vin08t0:1063_22: āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā”ti ca evaṃ ñattiyā pavāraṇaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1064_2: Yaṃ sandhāya “āgame kāḷe pavāreyyāmā”ti ñattiṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
tika-vin08t0:1064_4: Yaṃ sandhāya “āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā”ti ñattiṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
tika-vin08t0:1064_5: Tasmiṃ pana āgame juṇhe komudiyā cātumāsiniyā avassaṃ pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1064_6: Na hi taṃ atikkamitvā pavāretuṃ labbhati.
tika-vin08t0:1064_9: bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā tampi juṇhaṃ anuvaseyyuṃ. Tehi,
tika-vin08t0:1064_11: bhikkhūhi sabbeheva āgame juṇhe komudiyā cātumāsiniyā akāmā pavāretabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1064_20: atha kho tadaññe uposathadivasāpi hontīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1065_2: Tattha osārite tasmiṃ bhikkhusminti ukkhittake bhikkhusmiṃ osārite,
tika-vin08t0:1065_3: taṃ gahetvā sīmaṃ gantvā āpattiṃ desāpetvā kammavācāya kammapaṭippassaddhivasena pavesiteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1065_5: Tadā ṭhapetvā cuddasapannarase añño yo koci divaso uposathadivaso nāma hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:1065_10: Yatra pana pattacīvarādīnaṃ atthāya appamattakena kāraṇena vivadantā uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapenti,
tika-vin08t0:1065_11: tattha tasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchite “samaggā jātamhā”ti antarā sāmaggiuposathaṃ kātuṃ na labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1065_12: karontehi anuposathe uposatho kato nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1066_0: Kattikamāsabbhantareti ettha kattikamāso nāma pubbakattikamāsassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva aparakattikapuṇṇamā,
tika-vin08t0:1066_3: Tato pure vā pana pacchā vā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1066_5: Idhāpi kosambakakkhandhake sāmaggiyā sadisāva sāmaggī veditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1066_6: Ye pana kismiñcideva appamattake pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā samaggā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1066_9: karontehi apavāraṇāya pavāraṇā katā nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1067_1: Saṅghe uposatho nāma ekasīmāyaṃ sannipatitena catuvaggādisaṅghena kattabbo uposatho,
tika-vin08t0:1067_3: Gaṇe uposatho nāma ekasīmāyaṃ sannipatitehi dvīhi,
tika-vin08t0:1067_6: Puggale uposatho nāma ekasīmāyaṃ nisinnena ekena bhikkhunā kattabbo uposatho,
tika-vin08t0:1067_9: Kattabbākāravasena vuttesu tīsu uposathesu suttuddeso nāma pātimokkhuddeso.
tika-vin08t0:1067_10: So duvidho ovādapātimokkhuddeso ca āṇāpātimokkhuddeso ca.
tika-vin08t0:1067_13: “Imasmiṃ vītikkame ayaṃ nāma āpattī”ti evaṃ āpattivasena āṇāpanaṃ paññāpanaṃ āṇā.
tika-vin08t0:1077_0: Adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti. –
tika-vin08t0:1079_0: Tattha khanti paramaṃ tapoti adhivāsanakhanti nāma paramaṃ tapo.
tika-vin08t0:1079_3: Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadantīti sabbākārena pana nibbānaṃ paramanti vadanti buddhā.
tika-vin08t0:1079_4: Na hi pabbajito parūpaghātīti yo adhivāsanakhantivirahitattā paraṃ upaghāteti bādhati vihiṃsati,
tika-vin08t0:1079_7: “Na hi pabbajito”ti etassa hi na samaṇo hotīti vevacanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1079_11: Yo ca samaṇo paraṃ yaṃ kañci sattaṃ viheṭhayanto parūpaghātī hoti attano sīlavināsako,
tika-vin08t0:1079_12: so pabbajito nāma na hotīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1079_13: Atha vā yo adhivāsanakhantiyā abhāvā parūpaghātī hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1079_14: paraṃ antamaso ḍaṃsamakasampi sañcicca jīvitā voropeti,
tika-vin08t0:1079_20: Yopi na heva kho upaghāteti na māreti,
tika-vin08t0:1079_22: sopi paraṃ viheṭhayanto na samaṇo hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1080_4: Sacittapariyodapananti attano cittassa vodāpanaṃ pabhassarabhāvakaraṇaṃ sabbaso parisodhanaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1080_6: iti sīlasaṃvarena sabbapāpaṃ pahāya lokiyalokuttarāhi samathavipassanāhi kusalaṃ sampādetvā arahattaphalena
tika-vin08t0:1080_7: cittaṃ pariyodapetabbanti etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhi.
tika-vin08t0:1081_2: Pātimokkheti yaṃ taṃ pātimokkhaṃ paatimokkhaṃ atipamokkhaṃ uttamasīlaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1081_9: Pantañca sayanāsananti janasaṅghaṭṭanavirahitaṃ nijjanasambādhaṃ vivittaṃ senāsanañca.
tika-vin08t0:1081_10: Ettha ca dvīhiyeva paccayehi catupaccayasantoso dīpitoti veditabbo paccayasantosasāmaññena itaradvayassapi lakkhaṇahāranayena jotitattā.
tika-vin08t0:1081_11: Adhicitte ca āyogoti vipassanāpādakaṃ aṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ adhicittaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1081_13: tasmiṃ yathāvutte adhicitte āyogo ca anuyogo cāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1081_14: Etaṃ buddhāna sāsananti etaṃ parassa anupavadanaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1081_18: aṭṭhasamāpattivasibhāvāya vivittasenāsanasevanañca buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhīti.
tika-vin08t0:1081_19: Imā pana tisso gāthāyo sabbabuddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddesagāthā hontīti veditabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1081_22: “Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ āṇāpātimokkhaṃ nāma,
tika-vin08t0:1081_25: Idameva ca imasmiṃ atthe pātimokkhanti adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1082_3: Sā hi catunnaṃ māsānaṃ pāripūribhūtāti cātumāsī,
tika-vin08t0:1083_1: sace purimikāya pañca bhikkhū vassaṃ upagatā pacchimikāyapi pañca,
tika-vin08t0:1083_2: purimehi ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā pavārite pacchimehi tesaṃ santike pārisuddhiuposatho kātabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1083_3: na ekasmiṃ uposathagge dve ñattiyo ṭhapetabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1083_4: Sace pacchimikāya upagatā cattāro tayo dve eko vā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1083_7: pacchimikāyapi cattāro tayo dve eko vā,
tika-vin08t0:1083_13: sace purimikāya upagatehi pacchimikāya upagatā thokatarā ceva honti samasamā ca,
tika-vin08t0:1083_18: catunnaṃ saṅghañattiṃ ṭhapetvā pavāretuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1083_20: tasmā gaṇavasena ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā purimehi pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1083_29: Sace purimehi vassūpagatehi pacchā vassūpagatā ekenapi adhikatarā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1083_30: paṭhamaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisitvā pacchā thokatarehi tesaṃ santike pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1083_31: Kattikacātumāsinipavāraṇāya pana sace paṭhamavassūpagatehi mahāpavāraṇāya pavāritehi pacchā upagatā adhikatarā vā samasamā vā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1083_33: tehi pavārite pacchā itarehi pārisuddhiuposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1083_35: pacchā vassūpagatā thokā vā eko vā,
tika-vin08t0:1083_36: pātimokkhe uddiṭṭhe pacchā tesaṃ santike tena pavāretabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:1084_0: Ṭhapetvā pana pavāraṇādivasaṃ aññasmiṃ kāleti aññasmiṃ uposathadivase.
tika-vin08t0:1084_1: Uddiṭṭhamatte pātimokkheti “pariyositamatte uddissamāne”ti apariyosite āgate sati avasesassa pātimokkhassa
tika-vin08t0:1084_3: Avuṭṭhitāyātiādīnipi pātimokkhassa niṭṭhitakālameva parisāya visesetvā vadati.
tika-vin08t0:1084_6: Etena bahutaresu āgatesu puna pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1085_0: Ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvāti ekasmiṃ aṃse sādhukaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1085_1: Suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvāti ettha pana puna saṇṭhāpanena evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1085_2: Ekaṃsanti ca vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā ṭhitassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1085_3: Yato yathā vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1085_4: tathā cīvaraṃ katvāti evamassa attho veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1085_7: saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā tattheva nisinnena attano pāḷiyā pārisuddhiuposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1085_8: Pātimokkhe pana uddisiyamāne pāḷiyā anisīditvā pāḷiṃ vihāya hatthapāsaṃ amuñcantena nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1086_1: Iminā bahūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāneyeva uposathadivase pubbakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1086_2: atha kho ekassa vasanaṭṭhānepi kātabbaṃyevāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1086_3: Yathā ca sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāpattiṃ āpajjitvā “suṇātu me,
tika-vin08t0:1086_5: paṭikarissatī”ti ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1086_9: yadā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ suddhaṃ anāpattikaṃ passissanti,
tika-vin08t0:1086_10: tadā tassa santike taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissantī”ti gaṇañattiṃ ṭhapetvā,
tika-vin08t0:1086_11: dvīhipi “aññaṃ suddhaṃ passitvā paṭikarissāmā”ti vatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1086_12: Ekenapi “parisuddhaṃ labhitvā paṭikarissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1087_3: Anāvāso nāma navakammasālādiko yo koci padeso.
tika-vin08t0:1087_5: Aññatra antarāyāti pubbe vuttaṃ dasavidhamantarāyaṃ vinā.
tika-vin08t0:1087_6: Sabbantimena pana paricchedena attacatutthe vā antarāye vā sati gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1087_14: Āraññakenapi bhikkhunā uposathadivase gāme piṇḍāya caritvā attano vihārameva āgantabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1087_18: yaṃ jaññā “ajjeva tattha gantuṃ sakkomī”ti evarūpo pana āvāso gantabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1087_19: Tattha bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karontenapi hi iminā neva uposathantarāyo kato bhavissatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1088_1: Bahi uposathaṃ katvā āgatenāti nadiyā vā sīmāya vā yattha katthaci uposathaṃ katvā āgatena chando dātabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1088_2: “kato mayā uposatho”ti acchituṃ na labhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1088_4: Saṅgho nappahotīti dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ antarā hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhātuṃ nappahoti.
tika-vin08t0:1089_0: “Adhammena vagga”nti ettha ekasīmāya catūsu bhikkhūsu vijjamānesu pātimokkhuddesova anuññāto,
tika-vin08t0:1089_3: Yasmā pana chandapārisuddhi saṅghe eva āgacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1089_6: Sace pana dve saṅghā ekasīmāyaṃ aññamaññaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā ekasmiṃ khaṇe visuṃ saṅghakammaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1089_10: Vaggakammaṃ karontānañhi chandapārisuddhi aññattha na gacchati tathā vacanābhāvā,
tika-vin08t0:1089_11: visuṃ visuṃ kammakaraṇatthameva sīmāya anuññātattā cāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1089_12: Vihārasīmāya pana saṅghe vijjamānepi kenaci paccayena khaṇḍasīmāya tīsu,
tika-vin08t0:1089_13: dvīsu vā pārisuddhiuposathaṃ karontesu kammaṃ dhammena samaggameva bhinnasīmaṭṭhattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1090_3: santi saṅghassa karaṇīya”nti vuttattā bhagavato āṇaṃ karontena “chandaṃ dammī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1090_7: aññassa dātabbo chando”tiādivacanato puna attano chandadānaparissamavinodanatthaṃ “chandaṃ me harā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1090_12: chandahārakassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā dukkaṭato taṃ mocetuṃ “chandaṃ me ārocehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1090_13: Kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā viññāpetabboti manasāva acintetvā kāyappayogaṃ karontena yena kenaci aṅgapaccaṅgena vā,
tika-vin08t0:1090_14: vācaṃ pana nicchāretuṃ sakkontena tatheva vācāya vā,
tika-vin08t0:1090_17: “Ayamattho”tivacanato pana yāya kāyacipi bhāsāya viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1091_1: taṃ pana dentena paṭhamaṃ santī āpatti desetabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1091_5: “Santi saṅghassa karaṇīyānī”ti vattabbe vacanavipallāsena “santi saṅghassa karaṇīya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1091_6: Tesañca attano ca chandapārisuddhiṃ detīti ettha chando ca pārisuddhi ca chandapārisuddhi ca chandapārisuddhi,
tika-vin08t0:1091_9: Biḷālasaṅkhalikā chandapārisuddhīti ettha biḷālasaṅkhalikā nāma biḷālabandhanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1091_10: Tattha hi saṅkhalikāya paṭhamavalayaṃ dutiyavalayaṃyeva pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:1091_15: Biḷālasaṅkhalikāggahaṇañcettha yāsaṃ kāsañci saṅkhalikānaṃ upalakkhaṇamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1092_5: Tattha chandahārake saṅghassa hatthaṃ upagatamatteyeva āgatā hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1092_6: Idha pana evaṃ dinnāya pavāraṇāya pavāraṇāhārakena saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ pavāretabbaṃ “tisso, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1092_10: sutā kho panāyasmantehīti ettha ‘evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti vatvā uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1092_11: sutā kho panāyasmantehi cattāro pārājikā dhammā”tiādinā vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1093_0: 174. Nidānuddese aniṭṭhite pātimokkhaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ nāma na hotīti āha “dutiyādīsu uddesesū”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1094_2: Ettha ca atthaṃ bhaṇitukāmatāya vā bhaṇāpetukāmatāya vā suttassa otāraṇaṃ osāraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1094_4: Kevalaṃ pāṭhasseva sarena bhaṇanaṃ sarabhaññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1094_6: Osāretvā pana kathentenāti sayameva pāṭhaṃ vatvā pacchā atthaṃ kathentena.
tika-vin08t0:1095_1: Viññāpetīti ettha manasā cintetvā kāyavikārakaraṇameva viññāpananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1095_2: Pāḷiyaṃ aññassa dātabbā pārisuddhīti pārisuddhidāyakena puna aññassa bhikkhuno santike dātabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1095_3: “Bhūtaṃ eva sāmaṇerabhāvaṃ ārocetī”ti vuttattā ūnavīsativassakāle upasampannassa,
tika-vin08t0:1095_6: Yadā pana te attano sāmaṇerādibhāvaṃ paṭijānanti,
tika-vin08t0:1095_12: āhaṭā hoti pārisuddhī”ti vuttattā paṇḍakādīnaṃ bhikkhupaṭiññāya vattamānakālesu pana chandapārisuddhiyāva āgamanaṃ siddhameva.
tika-vin08t0:1095_14: Ummattakakhittacittavedanāṭṭānaṃ pana pakatattā antarāmagge ummattakādibhāve paṭiññātepi tesaṃ saṅghappattamatteneva chandādi āgacchatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1096_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ hatthapāsanti iminā gaṇapuggalesu chandapārisuddhiyā anāgamanaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1096_2: Saṅghasannipātato paṭhamaṃ kātabbaṃ pubbakaraṇaṃ saṅghasannipāte kātabbaṃ pubbakiccanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1096_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti ettha asañcicca assatiyā anāpatti.
tika-vin08t0:1096_9: Paññattaṃ hotīti iminā na sāpattikena uposatho kātabboti visuṃ paṭikkhepābhāvepi yathāvuttasuttasāmatthiyato paññattamevāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1096_13: yaṃ tathāgato aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ kareyya,
tika-vin08t0:1096_14: pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyā”tiādisuttanayatova alajjīhi saddhiṃ uposathakaraṇampi paṭikkhittameva alajjīniggahatthattā sabbasikkhāpadānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1096_15: Pārisuddhidānapaññāpanenāti iminā sāpattikena pārisuddhipi na dātabbāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1097_1: Ubhopi dukkaṭanti ettha sabhāgāpattibhāvaṃ ajānitvā kevalaṃ āpattināmeneva desentassa paṭiggaṇhantassa ca acittakameva dukkaṭaṃ hotīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1097_2: Yathā saṅgho sabhāgāpattiṃ āpannoti ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1097_5: ime bhikkhū sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ āpannā”tiādinā vuttanayānusāreneva gaṇañattiṃ ṭhapetvā dvīhi aññamaññaṃ ārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1097_6: Ekena pana sāpattikena dūraṃ gantvāpi paṭikātumeva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1097_9: Kenaci karaṇīyena gantvāti sīmāparicchedato bahibhūtaṃ gāmaṃ vā araññaṃ vā gantvāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1097_10: Eteneva uposathañattiyā ṭhapanakāle samaggā eva te ñattiṃ ṭhapesunti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1098_0: Sace pana vuḍḍhataro hotīti pavāraṇadāyako bhikkhu vuḍḍhataro hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1098_1: Evañhi tena tassatthāya pavāritaṃ hotīti ettha evaṃ tena appavāritepi tassa saṅghappattamattena saṅghassa
tika-vin08t0:1098_4: Bahūpi samānavassikā ekato pavāretuṃ labhantīti ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare laddhupasampadatāya samānupasampadavassā sabbe ekato pavāretuṃ labhantīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1099_0: Ettha pana paṇḍitehi cintetabbaṃ vicāretabbaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1106_0: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti;
tika-vin08t0:1108_0: Imā gāthāyo dhammajjhesakena pāṭhaṃyeva bhaṇāpetvā pātimokkhuddesako atthaṃ katheti.
tika-vin08t0:1108_1: Tato pubbakaraṇapubbakiccāni sammā niṭṭhāpetvā “desitāpattikassa samaggassa bhikkhusaṅghassa anumatiyā
tika-vin08t0:1108_2: pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ ārādhanaṃ karomā”ti imaṃ vākyaṃ pāṭhameva ajjhesakena bhaṇāpetvā atthaṃ avatvāva
tika-vin08t0:1108_5: “Pavāraṇāya etānī”ti ca “pavāraṇaṃ kātu”nti ca imāni padāniyeva visiṭṭhāni.
tika-vin08t0:1109_4: evaṃ sati gāthāttayaṃ vatvā tāsaṃ atthampi so eva kathetvā etāni pubbakaraṇāni ca etāni pubbakiccāni ca saṅghena katāni,
tika-vin08t0:1109_12: vuccatī”ti gāthaṃ vatvā iti “aṭṭhakathācariyehi vuttāni etāni pubbakaraṇāni katānī”ti pucchitvā dhammajjhesakena “āma,
tika-vin08t0:1109_14: vuccatī”ti gāthaṃ vatvā iti “aṭṭhakathācariyehi vuttāni etāni pubbakiccāni katānī”ti pucchitvā “āma,
tika-vin08t0:1109_16: vuccatī”ti gāthaṃ vatvā iti “aṭṭhakathācariyehi vuttaṃ idaṃ pattakallaṃ samānīta”nti pucchitvā “āma bhante”ti
tika-vin08t0:1109_17: vutte “pubbakaraṇapubbakiccāni sammā niṭṭhāpetvā pattakalle samānīte samaggassa bhikkhusaṅghassa anumatiyā
tika-vin08t0:1109_18: pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ ārādhanaṃ mayaṃ karomā”ti pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin08t0:1109_19: evaṃ sati ajjhesakaajjhesitabbānaṃ vacanaṃ asaṅkarato jānitabbaṃ bhaveyyāti.
tika-vin08t0:1110_0: Ettha ca gāthāttayassa aṭṭhakathācariyehi vuttabhāvo aṭṭhakathāyameva āgato.
tika-vin08t0:1119_0: Vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ tathā. Mūlasikkhāpakaraṇeyeva tathā vuttaṃ, tasmā ācariyānaṃ attanomati bhaveyya.
tika-vin08t0:1120_0: Tattha “pubbakaraṇapubbakiccāni sammā niṭṭhāpetvā”ti iminā purimagāthādvayassa atthameva kathetvā tatiyagāthāya attho na kathito.
tika-vin08t0:1120_3: Āpattiyā desitabhāve ca sabhāgāpattiyā desitabhāvoyeva pattakallasmiṃ antogadho, na itaro.
tika-vin08t0:1120_6: “Pubbakaraṇapubbakiccāni sammā niṭṭhāpetvā desitāpattikassa samaggassa bhikkhusaṅghassa anumatiyā pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1120_7: uddisituṃ ārādhanaṃ karomā”ti ettakeyeva vutte avasesāni tīṇi pattakallaṅgāni.
tika-vin08t0:1120_10: vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na hontīti.
tika-vin08t0:1120_23: tasmā uposathadivasesu saṅghe sannipatite sace pubbeva sammato dhammajjhesako atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1120_25: ekaṃ byattaṃ paṭibalaṃ bhikkhuṃ saṅghena sammannāpetvā tena dhammajjhesakena pātimokkhuddesakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin08t0:1120_26: ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo – saṅgho, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1120_33: uddisatu thero pātimokkhanti tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā tato pātimokkhuddesakena –
tika-vin08t0:1126_1: kiṃ tāni katānī”ti pucchite dhammajjhesakena “āma bhante”ti vutte puna pātimokkhuddesakena –
tika-vin08t0:1129_0: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti;
tika-vin08t0:1131_2: bhante”ti vutte puna pātimokkhuddesako “pubbakaraṇapubbakiccāni sammā niṭṭhāpetvā pattakallaṅge samānīte
tika-vin08t0:1131_3: saṅghassa anumatiyā pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmā”ti vatvā “sādhu sādhū”ti bhikkhusaṅghena sampaṭicchite “suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1131_4: saṅgho”tiādinā pātimokkhuddesako pātimokkhaṃ uddisatīti ayamamhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin08t0:1132_9: “Ajjhesanā cettha saṅghena sammatadhammajjhesakāyattā vā saṅghattherāyattā vā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā. “Saṅgho, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1132_11: thero pātimokkha”nti ayaṃ ajjhesanākāro kuto labbhatīti? Pāḷito.
tika-vin08t0:1133_6: Pāḷiyañhi “eteneva upāyena yāva saṅghanavakaṃ ajjhesanti uddisatu āyasmā pātimokkha”nti āgato.
tika-vin08t0:1133_12: aṭṭhakathāyampi “kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakiccanti saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyāti…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1133_13: evaṃ dvīhi nāmehi navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1134_1: atha kasmā pātimokkhuddesakena pubbabhāge vattabbanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1134_3: Aṭṭhakathāyañhi imā gāthāyo sammajjanādīnaṃ pubbakaraṇādibhāvañāpakabhāveneva vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:1134_6: evaṃ sante kimatthaṃ bhaṇantīti cintāyaṃ antonidāne “kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakicca”nti vuttapucchānulomena
tika-vin08t0:1134_8: Vuttañhi “evaṃ vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ pubbakaraṇaṃ katvāva uposatho kātabbo”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1134_9: tasmā pāḷiaṭṭhakathānulomato iminā anukkamena kate sati dhammajjhesako paññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:1134_14: tāni niṭṭhāpetvā pātimokkhuddesakassa pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ paṭiññā paññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:1134_15: evaṃ imesaṃ gāthāvākyānaṃ vacane payojanaṃ paññāyatīti katvā paṇḍitehi vinayaññūhi cirapaṭicchanno ayaṃ kathāmaggo paṭipajjitabboti.
tika-vin08t0:1137_0: Punappunaṃ cintayitvā, yuttaṃ ce dhārayantu taṃ;
tika-vin08t0:1143_1: Evaṃ uposathapavāraṇāvinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni vassūpanāyikavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “vassūpanāyikāti ettha”tyādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1143_9: tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti vassūpanāyikā. Kā sā?
tika-vin08t0:1143_11: Atha vā upanayati etāyāti upanāyikā majjhe dīghavasena.
tika-vin08t0:1143_13: sā eva pure bhavā purimā bhavatthe ima-
tika-vin08t0:1144_0: Assatiyā pana vassaṃ na upetīti “imasmiṃ vihāre imaṃ temāsaṃ vassaṃ upemī”ti vacībhedaṃ katvā na upeti. “Na,
tika-vin08t0:1144_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacībhedaṃ katvā vassūpagamanaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhepo,
tika-vin08t0:1144_6: Pāḷiyaṃ pana avisesena vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyañca dutiyapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “vassaṃ upagacchantena hi
tika-vin08t0:1144_7: nālakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannenapi pañcannaṃ chadanānaṃ aññatarena channeyeva sadvārabandhe senāsane upagantabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1144_13: na tveva asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba”nti daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā asenāsanikassa nāvādiṃ vinā aññattha
tika-vin08t0:1144_14: ālayamattena upagantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin08t0:1144_18: asati vā senāsane vassūpagamanassa visuṃ anuññātattā “na,
tika-vin08t0:1144_21: Tattha na labhatīti asati senāsane ālayavasenapi nāvādīsu upagamanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1145_0: Ṭaṅkitamañcādibhedā kuṭīti ettha ṭaṅkitamañco nāma dīghe mañcapāde majjhe vijjhitvā aṭaniyo pavesetvā kato mañco,
tika-vin08t0:1145_5: catunnaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ upari pāsāṇaṃ attharitvā kataṃ gehampi “ṭaṅkitamañco”ti vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:1146_0: “Idha vassaṃ upemī”ti tikkhattuṃ vattabbanti satthassa avihārattā “imasmiṃ vihāre”ti avatvā “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti ettakameva vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1146_1: Satthe pana vassaṃ upagantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti kuṭikādīnaṃ abhāvena “idha vassaṃ upemī”ti vacībhedaṃ katvā upagantuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1146_4: Tīsu ṭhānesu natthi vassacchede āpattīti tehi saddhiṃ gacchantasseva natthi āpatti,
tika-vin08t0:1147_2: na pakkamitabbāti iminā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāya anantare pāṭipadadivase purimavassaṃ upagantvā vassānautuno catūsu
tika-vin08t0:1147_3: māsesu sabbapacchimamāsaṃ ṭhapetvā purimaṃ temāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1147_4: Sāvaṇapuṇṇamiyā anantare pāṭipadadivase pacchimavassaṃ upagantvā sabbapaṭhamamāsaṃ ṭhapetvā pacchimaṃ temāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1147_5: Evaṃ avasitvā purimikāya vassaṃ upagatena bhikkhunā mahāpavāraṇāya anto aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā pacchimikāya
tika-vin08t0:1147_6: upagatena cātumāsinipavāraṇāya anto aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā antarā cārikaṃ pakkameyya,
tika-vin08t0:1147_7: upacārasīmātikkameyeva tassa bhikkhuno dukkaṭāpatti hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1147_10: Yadi evaṃ vassaṃ upagantvā sati karaṇīye pakkamantassa sabbathāpi āpattiyeva siyāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “vassaṃ upagantvā panā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1147_11: Evaṃ sante tadaheva sattāhakaraṇīyena pakkamantasseva anāpatti siyā,
tika-vin08t0:1147_12: na dvīhatīhaṃ vasitvā pakkamantassāti āha “ko pana vādo”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1148_6: bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā sikkhamānāya sāmaṇerassa sāmaṇeriyā upāsakassa upāsikāyā”ti ekaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1148_11: bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā sikkhamānāya sāmaṇerassa sāmaṇeriyā mātuyā ca pitussa cā”ti ekaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1148_12: “sace pana bhikkhuno bhātā vā añño vā ñātako gilāno hotī”ti ekaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1148_13: “ekasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasanto bhikkhubhattiko”ti ekaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1148_15: anabhirati vā kukkuccaṃ vā diṭṭhigataṃ vā uppannaṃ hotī”ti ekaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1148_16: “koci bhikkhu garudhammaṃ ajjhāpanno hoti parivāsāraho”ti ekaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1148_21: “bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā vā saṅgho kammaṃ kattukāmo tajjanīyaṃ vā”ti ekaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1148_25: saṅghakaraṇīyena gantu”nti ekanti ekādasa ṭhānāni honti.
tika-vin08t0:1148_26: Tattha paṭhamatatiyacatutthavasena tīsu ṭhānesu pahite eva gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1148_31: Ettha ca anupāsakehipi sāsanabhāvaṃ ñātukāmehi pahite tesaṃ pasādavaḍḍhisampattehipi sattāhakaraṇīyena gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1148_33: So pana yasmā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasati,
tika-vin08t0:1149_2: ettha etasmiṃ sattāhakaraṇīyavinicchaye apica aparo ayaṃ īdiso pāḷimuttakanayo vassūpanāyikakkhandhakapāḷito mutto nayo veditabboti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:1149_4: Tathā hi vimativinodaniyaṃ “ratticchedavinicchayoti sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā bahiddhā aruṇuṭṭhāpanasaṅkhātassa ratticchedassa vinicchayo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1149_6: Animantitena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha animantitattā sattāhakiccaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gacchantassapi vassacchedo ceva dukkaṭañca hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1149_7: Yathāvuttañhi ratticchedakāraṇaṃ vinā tirovihāre vasitvā āgamissāmīti gacchato vassacchedaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1149_8: Gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti antoupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhiteneva sattāhakaraṇīyanimittaṃ sallakkhetvā iminā nimittena gantvā
tika-vin08t0:1149_10: Purimakkhaṇe ābhogaṃ katvā gamanakkhaṇe visaritvā gatepi doso natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1149_11: “sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti vuttattā sabbathā ābhogaṃ akatvā gatassa vassacchedoti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1149_12: Yo pana sattāhakaraṇīyanimittābhāvepi “sattāhabbhantare āgamissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā gantvā sattāhabbhantare āgacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1150_3: vaṭṭatīti ettha “ajjeva āgamissāmī”ti sāmantavihāraṃ gantvā puna āgacchantassa antarāmagge sace aruṇuggamanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1150_6: tadaheva āgamane saussāhattā vassacchedo vā āpatti vā na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1150_7: Ācariyaṃ passissāmīti pana gantuṃ labhatīti “agilānampi ācariyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1150_8: upajjhāyaṃ vā passissāmī”ti sattāhakaraṇīyena gantuṃ labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1150_11: Sace naṃ ācariyo “ajja mā gacchā”ti vadati,
tika-vin08t0:1150_12: vaṭṭatīti evaṃ sattāhakaraṇīyena āgatānaṃ antosattāheyeva puna āgacchantaṃ sace ācariyo,
tika-vin08t0:1150_13: upajjhāyo vā “ajja mā gacchā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1150_15: Vassacchedo pana hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ sattāhassa bahiddhā vītināmitattā.
tika-vin08t0:1151_0: Sace dūraṃ gato sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabboti iminā vassacchedakāraṇe sati sattāhakaraṇīyena gantumpi vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:1151_1: Ettha cha divasāni bahiddhā vītināmetvā sattame divase purāruṇā eva antoupacārasīmāyaṃ pavisitvā aruṇaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1151_2: uṭṭhāpetvā punadivase sattāhaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gantabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1151_3: Keci pana “sattame divase āgantvā aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā tadaheva divasabhāgepi gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1151_5: Sattame divase tattha aruṇuṭṭhāpanameva hi sandhāya pāḷiyaṃ “sattāhaṃ sannivatto kātabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1151_6: Aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā gacchanto ca anto appavisitvā bahiddhāva sattāhaṃ vītināmento ca samucchinnavasso eva bhavissati aruṇassa bahi eva uṭṭhāpitattā.
tika-vin08t0:1151_8: “Sattāhavārena antovihāre pavisitvā aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā gantabba”nti vattabbato aññesu ca ṭhānesu aruṇuṭṭhāpanameva vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:1151_9: Vakkhati hi cīvarakkhandhake “ekasmiṃ vihāre vasanto itarasmiṃ sattāhavārena aruṇameva uṭṭhāpetī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1152_0: Athāpi yaṃ te vadeyyuṃ “sattame divase yadā kadāci paviṭṭhena taṃdivasanissito atītāruṇo uṭṭhāpito nāma
tika-vin08t0:1152_3: Na hi uṭṭhite aruṇe pacchā paviṭṭho tassa payojako uṭṭhāpako bhavitumarahati.
tika-vin08t0:1152_5: “vassaṃ upagantvā pana aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā tadaheva sattāhakaraṇīyena pakkamantassā”pīti ettha “aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā”ti vacanaṃ virujjheyya.
tika-vin08t0:1152_6: Tenapi taṃdivasanissitassa aruṇassa uṭṭhāpitattā āraññakassapi bhikkhuno sāyanhasamaye aṅgayuttaṃ araññaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1152_7: gantvā tadā eva nivattantassa aruṇo uṭṭhāpito dhutaṅgañca visodhitaṃ siyā,
tika-vin08t0:1152_8: na cetaṃ yuttaṃ aruṇuggamanakāle eva aruṇuṭṭhāpanassa vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:1152_9: Vuttañhi “kālasseva pana nikkhamitvā aṅgayutte ṭhāne aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1152_13: Tathā pārivāsikādīnampi aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā vattaṃ nikkhipantānaṃ ratticchedo vutto.
tika-vin08t0:1152_15: Sahaseyyasikkhāpadepi anupasampannehi saha nivutthabhāvaparimocanatthaṃ “purāruṇā nikkhamitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1152_16: Evaṃ cīvaravippavāsādīsu ca sabbattha rattipariyosāne āgāmiaruṇavaseneva aruṇuṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1152_18: tasmā vuttanayenevettha aruṇuṭṭhāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ aññathā vassacchedattā.
tika-vin08t0:1153_0: Yaṃ pana vassaṃ upagatassa tadaheva aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā sakaraṇīyassa pakkamanavacanaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1153_1: taṃ vassaṃ upagatakālato paṭṭhāya yadā kadāci nimitte sati gamanassa anuññātattā yuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1153_2: na pana sattāhavārena gatassa aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā tadahevagamanaṃ “aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:1153_6: bhikkhu taṃ āvāsaṃ na vā āgaccheyyā”tiādinā pacchimasattāhe anāgamane anuññātepi aññasattāhesu taṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1153_7: Evaṃ paṭhamasattāhe aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā gamane anuññātepi tato paresu sattāhesu āgatassa aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin08t0:1153_8: gamanaṃ na vaṭṭati evāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1154_0: Sace pavāritakāle vassāvāsikaṃ dentītiādinā vassāvāsikacīvarampi kathinacīvaraṃ viya vassaṃvutthavihārapaṭibaddhanti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1154_2: gahetabba”nti pana vuttattā sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā sattāhabbhantare āgatā labhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1154_3: Kathinānisaṃsacīvaraṃ pana saṅghaṃ anāpucchā te na labhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1154_4: Vakkhati hi “sattāhakaraṇīyena gatāpi bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ labhantūti vā evarūpaṃ adhammikavattaṃ na kātabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1154_5: Idha āhaṭanti vihārato bahi āgataṭṭhāne ānītaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1155_1: gaṇhantipi paripātentipīti ettha gaṇhantīti gahetvā khādanti.
tika-vin08t0:1155_4: Imesu “gāḷehi ubbāḷhā hontī”tiādīsu saṅghabhedapariyantesu vatthūsu kevalaṃ anāpatti hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1155_6: Sace panātiādīsu yasmā nānāsīmāyaṃ dvīsu āvāsesu vassaṃ upagacchantassa “dutiye vasissāmī”ti upacārato
tika-vin08t0:1155_10: bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyatī”ti paṭhamaṃ senāsanaggāhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1155_12: tattheva temāsaṃ vasanto purimavassaṃvuttho eva hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1155_13: Tato vā pana dutiyadivasādīsu “paṭhamasenāsane vasissāmī”ti upacārātikkame purimikāpi na paññāyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1156_0: Paṭissavassa visaṃvādanapaccayā hontampi dukkaṭaṃ satiyeva paṭissave hotīti āha “tassa tassa paṭissavassa visaṃvāde dukkaṭa”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1156_3: Pāḷiyaṃ “so sattāhānāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamatī”ti vuttattā pavāraṇādivasepi sattāhakaraṇīyaṃ vinā gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1156_4: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne “navamito paṭṭhāya gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ kacci uposathadivasato upanidhāya navamī icchitabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1156_9: Bhaddapadamāsassa hi kāḷapakkhauposathadivasaṃ mariyādaṃ katvā tadanantarapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya gaṇiyamāne sati yo divaso navamo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1156_12: tato navamito paṭṭhāya anāgatasattāhe pavāraṇā hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1157_0: Sattāhaṃ anāgatāya assāti sattāhānāgatā. Kā sā? Pavāraṇā.
tika-vin08t0:1157_1: Assayujamāsassa sukkapakkhanavamiyaṃ sattāhakaraṇīyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchanto bhikkhu antovassassa sattāhamattāvasiṭṭhattā
tika-vin08t0:1157_9: tasmā pavāraṇādivasassa pariyosānabhūtaaruṇasmiṃ uggate vutthavasso hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1157_10: tasmā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ bhagavā dhammassāmī “so sattāhānāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamati,
tika-vin08t0:1157_13: bhikkhu taṃ āvāsaṃ na vā āgaccheyya, tassa,
tika-vin08t0:1157_17: Sattāhānāgatāya komudiyā cātumāsiniyāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t0:1157_22: tasmā kumudā ettha pupphantīti komudīti vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:1158_1: Antovassavattakathāyaṃ nibaddhavattaṃ ṭhapetvāti sajjhāyamanasikārādīsu nirantarakaraṇīyesu kattabbaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā.
tika-vin08t0:1159_0: Evarūpaṃ adhammikavattaṃ na kātabbanti nānāverajjakā hi bhikkhū sannipatanti,
tika-vin08t0:1159_1: tattha keci dubbalā appathāmā evarūpaṃ vattaṃ anupāletuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-vin08t0:1159_2: tasmā idha āgatañca catutthapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgataṃ āvāsaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā sīmaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1159_4: taṃ ‘arahā’ti jānissāmā”ti katāya katikāya yo “maṃ ‘arahā’ti jānantū”ti tamhā ṭhānā paṭhamaṃ pakkamati,
tika-vin08t0:1159_6: Yo pana ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vā kiccena mātāpitūnaṃ vā kenacideva karaṇīyena bhikkhācāravattaṃ vā uddesaparipucchādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1159_7: atthāya aññena vā tādisena karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā gacchati, anāpatti.
tika-vin08t0:1159_8: Sacepissa evaṃ gatassa pacchā icchācāro uppajjati “na dānāhaṃ tattha gamissāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1160_0: Yopi kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā sajjhāyamanasikārādivasena aññavihito vā hutvā corādīhi vā
tika-vin08t0:1160_1: anubaddho meghaṃ vā uṭṭhitaṃ disvā anovassakaṃ pavisitukāmo taṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamati, anāpatti,
tika-vin08t0:1160_2: yānena vā iddhiyā vā gacchantopi pārājikaṃ nāpajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1160_5: tehi saddhiṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ gacchanto nāpajjati.
tika-vin08t0:1160_6: Evaṃ gacchantā hi sabbepi aññamaññaṃ rakkhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1160_7: Sacepi maṇḍaparukkhamūlādīsu kiñci ṭhānaṃ paricchindanti “yo ettha nisīdati vā caṅkamati vā,
tika-vin08t0:1160_11: taṃ ‘arahā’ti jānissāmā”tiādinā nayena katikā katā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1160_13: Sacepi upāsakena antarāmagge vihāro vā kato hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1160_17: tatrāpi icchācāravasena vasantassa vā tāni vā gaṇhantassa pārājikameva,
tika-vin08t0:1160_20: aññaṃ vā evarūpaṃ “imasmiṃ temāsabbhantare sabbeva āraññakā hontu piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgādiavasesadhutaṅgadharā vā,
tika-vin08t0:1160_21: atha vā sabbeva khīṇāsavā hontū”ti evamādi.
tika-vin08t0:1160_23: Tattha keci dubbalā appathāmā evarūpaṃ vattaṃ anupāletuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-vin08t0:1160_29: bahisīmaṭṭhassapi saṅghalābho dātabbo”ti evamādikampi na kattabbameva.
tika-vin08t0:1161_1: Sodhetvā pabbājethāti bhabbe ācārakulaputte upaparikkhitvā pabbājetha.
tika-vin08t0:1161_2: Bhasse mattaṃ jānitvāti vacane pamāṇaṃ ñatvā.
tika-vin08t0:1161_3: Dasakathāvatthu nāma appicchākathā santuṭṭhikathā pavivekakathā asaṃsaggakathā vīriyārambhakathā sīlakathā
tika-vin08t0:1162_1: Caturārakkhaṃ ahāpentāti buddhānussati mettā asubhaṃ maraṇānussatīti imaṃ caturārakkhaṃ ahāpentā.
tika-vin08t0:1162_4: tena sāmaṇerādīhi āharitvā bhikkhūnaṃ yathāsukhaṃ bhuñjanatthāya dantakaṭṭhamāḷake nikkhittesu dantakaṭṭhesu
tika-vin08t0:1162_7: padhānaghare vasitvā dhammassavane vā uposathagge vā dissati,
tika-vin08t0:1162_8: tena pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā cattāri pañca dantakaṭṭhāni attano vasanaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā khāditabbāni.
tika-vin08t0:1162_9: Tesu khīṇesu sace punapi dantakaṭṭhamāḷake bahūni hontiyeva,
tika-vin08t0:1162_19: Maggaṃ gacchantenapi ekaṃ vā dve vā thavikāya pakkhipitvā gantabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:1163_1: na kathetabbāti ettha catūsu paccayesu cīvare ca piṇḍapāte ca viññattipi na vaṭṭati nimittobhāsaparikathāpi.
tika-vin08t0:1163_5: Evaṃ santepi ājīvaṃ sodhentehi bhikkhūhi suṭṭhu rakkhitabbāti.
tika-vin08t0:1163_10: Iti catupārisuddhisīlapaṭisaṃyuttā evarūpā niyyānikakathā bahukāpi vattabbāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1164_0: Imasmiṃ vassūpanāyikavisaye tesu tesu nagaresu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ rājakāle apariyantā vivādakathā hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1164_1: Vassūpanāyikakkhandhake “tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhitukāmo bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1164_2: santike dūtaṃ pāhesi ‘yadi panāyyā āgame juṇhe vassaṃ upagaccheyyu’nti.
tika-vin08t0:1164_6: rājūnaṃ anuvattitu”’nti vacanaṃ nissāya bhagavatā adhimāsaṃ paññattanti maññamānā vedasamayena saṃsanditvā gayhamānā anekavihitaṃ vivādaṃ karonti.
tika-vin08t0:1164_7: Vedasamaye kira dve adhimāsāni yācādhimāsañca pattādhimāsañca.
tika-vin08t0:1164_8: Tattha kaliyugagaṇane ekūnavīsatigaṇanena bhājite dvepañcaṭṭhadasaterasasoḷasaṭṭhārasavasena sattadhā seso hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1164_9: tesaṃ vasena cammādhimāsa pañcādhimāsa pasvādhimāsa dasādhimāsa terasādhimāsa soḷasādhimāsa aṭṭhārasādhimāsāti voharanti.
tika-vin08t0:1164_11: Tesu pasusoḷasāni apatteyeva adhimāsapatanakaliyuge saṃvaccharamāsādivisamabhayena yācitvā māsassa ākaḍḍhitabbato yācādhimāsanti voharanti,
tika-vin08t0:1164_12: sesāni pana pañcamatteyeva adhimāsapatanakaliyuge māsassa ākaḍḍhitabbato pattādhimāsanti.
tika-vin08t0:1164_14: tathato ajānantā pāḷiyā saṃsanditvā bimbisāraraññā bhagavato yācitādhimāsattā yācādhimāsaṃ nāma bhavati,
tika-vin08t0:1164_15: tasmā dvīsu eva yācādhimāsesu divasena saha māso ākaḍḍhitabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1164_17: aññe pana pañcasu pattādhimāsesu eva saha divasena māso ākaḍḍhitabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1165_4: māsagatāya āsāḷhiyā pacchimikā upagantabbā”ti tasmiṃyeva vassūpanāyikakkhandhake āgatāya pāḷiyā atthaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1165_5: ayoniso gahetvā tithinakkhattayoge eva vassūpagamanaṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1165_6: tasmā āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya anantarabhūto pāṭipadadivaso puṇṇātithiyā ca yutto hotu,
tika-vin08t0:1165_7: pubbāsāḷhauttarāsāḷhasaṅkhātesu dvīsu nakkhattesu ekekena yutto ca,
tika-vin08t0:1165_8: evaṃbhūto kālo yadi vinā divasena māsakaḍḍhane sampajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1165_12: ayaṃ piṭakena ca vedena ca anulomo vinicchayoti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1166_1: “mā iti cando vuccati tassa gatiyā divasassa minitabbato,
tika-vin08t0:1166_2: so ettha sabbakalāpāripūriyā puṇṇoti puṇṇamā”tiādinā vinayatthamañjūsādīsu āgamanato puṇṇātithiyogopi puṇṇamiyā eva icchitabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1166_7: evaṃ sante uposathadivaseyeva candaggāho ca sūriyaggāho ca bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1166_12: tumhādisānaṃ vādīnaṃ vacanena pubbe ākaḍḍhitabbadivasānaṃ anākaḍḍhitattā divasapuñjabhāvena evaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1166_13: saccato pana uposathadivaseyeva candaggāho sūriyaggāho ca icchitabboti. Hotu,
tika-vin08t0:1166_16: evaṃ bhūtapubbo sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane atthīti? Atthi.
tika-vin08t0:1166_17: Gandhārajātake hi uposathadivase candaggāho dvikkhattuṃ āgato.
tika-vin08t0:1166_21: Evaṃ vutte purimakā paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ na sakkuṇeyyunti.
tika-vin08t0:1167_1: na adhikadivasā sāratthadīpaniyaṃ ‘yaṃ pana vuttaṃ tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu aṭṭhārasannaṃyeva vassānaṃ adhikamāse
tika-vin08t0:1167_2: gahetvā gaṇitattā sesavassadvayassapi adhikāni divasāni honteva,
tika-vin08t0:1167_3: tāni adhikadivasāni sandhāya nikkaṅkhā hutvāti vuttanti,
tika-vin08t0:1167_5: Na hi dvīsu vassesu adhikadivasā nāma visuṃ upalabbhanti tatiye vasse vassukkaḍḍhanavasena adhikamāse pariccatteyeva adhikamāsasambhavato,
tika-vin08t0:1167_6: tasmā dvīsu vassesu atirekadivasā nāma visuṃ na sambhavantī’ti vacanato”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1167_8: piṭakattaye adhikadivasāti āgatā atthi vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “avasesānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassānaṃ adhikadivasāni honteva,
tika-vin08t0:1167_13: Amhākaṃ pana vedasamaye hatthagatagaṇanavaseneva jānitabbanti alamatipapañcena.
tika-vin08t0:1167_14: Atthikehi tivassādhikasahassakaliyuge dhammarājena pucchitattā kataṃ adhimāsapakaraṇaṃ oloketvā jānitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1168_1: Paṭhamadutiyavādesu na bimbisārarājā bhagavantaṃ adhimāsapaññāpanaṃ yācati,
tika-vin08t0:1168_3: na “tasmiṃ vasse idaṃ nāma adhimāsaṃ hotī”ti vā “māsamattaṃ vā sahadivasaṃ vā ākaḍḍhitabba”nti vā pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ca atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1168_4: rājā pana upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya vedasamaye vassukkaḍḍhanasambhavato bhikkhūnaṃ paṭhamaāsāḷhamāse
tika-vin08t0:1168_5: vassaṃ anupagantvā dutiyaāsāḷhamāse upagamanatthaṃ “yadi panāyyā āgame juṇhe vassaṃ upagaccheyyu”nti
tika-vin08t0:1168_9: Bhikkhū pana rañño pahitasāsanaṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1168_10: Bhagavā pana vassukkaḍḍhane bhikkhūnaṃ guṇaparihāniyā abhāvato “anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1168_13: Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anujānāmi bhikkhave rājūnaṃ anuvattitunti ettha vassukkaḍḍhanabhikkhūnaṃ kāci
tika-vin08t0:1168_16: tasmā yācādhimāso vā hotu pattādhimāso vā,
tika-vin08t0:1168_17: yasmiṃ yasmiṃ kāle anuvattanena bhikkhūnaṃ sīlādiguṇampi parihāni natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1169_2: Yadi anuvattante pubbe upavutthadivasato idāni upavasitabbauposathadivaso cātuddaso vā pannaraso vā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1169_4: Yadi pana terasamo vā soḷasamo vā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1169_6: Anuvattanto hi anuposathe uposathakato hoti, tato “na,
tika-vin08t0:1169_14: rājūnaṃ anuvattitunti vacanato panettha lokiyānaṃ tithiṃ anuvattantehipi attano uposathakkamena cātuddasiṃ pannarasiṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:1169_16: na pana soḷasamadivasaṃ vā terasamadivasaṃ vā uposathadivasaṃ karontehī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1170_3: Tato tāsaṃ dvinnaṃ vassūpanāyikānaṃ upagamanakālaṃ dassetuṃ “aparajjugatāya āsāḷhiyā purimikā upagantabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1170_8: Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tasmā āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya anantare pāṭipadadivase,
tika-vin08t0:1170_9: āsāḷhipuṇṇamito vā aparāya puṇṇamāya anantare pāṭipadadivaseyeva vihāraṃ paṭijaggitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1170_10: upaṭṭhāpetvā sabbaṃ cetiyavandanādisāmīcikammaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā ‘imasmiṃ vihāre imaṃ temāsaṃ vassaṃ upemī’ti
tika-vin08t0:1170_11: sakiṃ vā dvattikkhattuṃ vā vācaṃ nicchāretvā vassaṃ upagantabba”nti,
tika-vin08t0:1170_14: vimativinodaniyampi “aparasmiṃ divaseti dutiye pāṭipadadivase”ti evaṃ pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu pāṭipadadivaseyeva vassūpagamanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1170_16: tasmā pāṭipadadivase pāto aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya sakaladivasaṃ sakalaratti yāva dutiyaaruṇuggamanā yathārucite kāle vassaṃ upagantabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1170_18: uttarāsāḷhanakkhattena yogo hotūti vadantānaṃ vacanaṃ vinayaviruddhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1170_19: taṃ vacanaṃ gahetvā puṇṇātithiyogaṃ uttarāsāḷhanakkhattayogañca āgametvā vassaṃ upagantvāpi tathāgatena apaññattaṃ paññapeti nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1171_0: Evaṃ pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ca puṇṇātithiyoge eva vassaṃ upagantabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1171_1: na ekāya tithiyā yutteti vā uttarāsāḷhanakkhattayogeyeva,
tika-vin08t0:1171_2: na sāvaṇanakkhattayogeti vā anāgatameva chāyaṃ gahetvā tathāgatena paññattaṃ viya potthakesu likhitvā
tika-vin08t0:1171_3: kehici ṭhapitattā sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ apassantā vedasāmayikā taṃ vacanaṃ saddahitvā vassūpagamanakāle
tika-vin08t0:1171_4: puṇṇātithiuttarāsāḷhayogameva gavesantā māsadivasena saha ākaḍḍhitabbakālepi māsamattameva ākaḍḍhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1171_6: tasmā evaṃvādino bhikkhū “apaññattaṃ tathāgatena paññattaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpetī”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjanti,
tika-vin08t0:1171_7: tasmā bhagavati gāravasahitā lajjino paṇḍitā evaṃ na gaṇhantīti.
tika-vin08t0:1171_8: Tithinakkhattayogo pana uposathadivaseyeva bahudhā piṭakattaye āgato,
tika-vin08t0:1171_10: kadāci pana vohārakālo tithiyā nakkhattena ca visamo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1171_11: tasmā taṃ sametuṃ adhimāsapatanakāle māsampi divasampi ākaḍḍhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1171_12: tasmā aññasmiṃ kāle visamepi ākaḍḍhanakāle samāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1171_13: Evaṃ sati māsautusaṃvaccharānaṃ samabhāvo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1172_0: Pañcamachaṭṭhavādesu adhimāsoti aṭṭhārasavassato adhikamāsaṃ gahetvā vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1172_1: tasmā “adhiko māso adhimāso”ti kammadhārayasamāsattā pulliṅgaṃ katvā vutto.
tika-vin08t0:1172_2: Pubbe pana māsapuñjato adhikaghaṭiyo gahetvā vutto,
