tika-vin08t0:1172_3: tasmā “māsato adhikaṃ adhimāsa”nti abyayībhāvasamāsattā napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1172_4: Idha pana “porāṇakattherā ekūnavīsativassaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsiṃ atikkamma pāṭipadadivase upasampādenti,
tika-vin08t0:1172_7: iti vīsatiyā vassesu cattāro māsā parihāyanti,
tika-vin08t0:1172_8: rājāno tatiye tatiye vasse vassaṃ upakaḍḍhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1172_9: iti aṭṭhārasasu vassesu cha māsā vaḍḍhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1172_10: tato uposathavasena parihīne cattāro māse apanetvā dve māsā avasesā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1172_11: te dve māse gahetvā vīsati vassāni paripuṇṇāni hontīti nikkaṅkhā hutvā nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsiṃ atikkamma
tika-vin08t0:1172_12: pāṭipade upasampādentī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacane “nikkaṅkhā hutvāti adhikamāsehi saddhiṃ paripuṇṇavīsativassattā
tika-vin08t0:1173_2: taṃ kathanti codanaṃ sandhāya “yaṃ pana vuttaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1173_4: tathāpi taṃ gaṇṭhipadesu vuttavacanaṃ na gahetabbanti attho,
tika-vin08t0:1173_10: apariccatte asambhavato na upalabbhantīti byatirekavasena hetuphalayojanā.
tika-vin08t0:1174_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana gaṇṭhipadesu vuttameva gahetvā vadati.
tika-vin08t0:1174_3: tasmā imāni āharitvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchituṃ na sakkonti.
tika-vin08t0:1174_4: Bhikkhū pana bahūnaṃ sannipāte kiñci pāṭhaṃ āharitvā kathetuṃ samattho sobhatīti katvā īdisaṃ pāṭhaṃ āharanti.
tika-vin08t0:1174_5: Sutasannicayapaṇḍitā pana icchitatthassa asādhakattā evarūpaṃ na āharanti.
tika-vin08t0:1175_6: tasmā yadā pathavissaro rājā sadivasaṃ māsaṃ ākaḍḍhitukāmo “jeṭṭhamāsakāḷapakkhauposathaṃ pannarasiyaṃ karontū”ti yācissati,
tika-vin08t0:1175_7: tadā “sakiṃ pakkhassa cātuddase vā pannarase vā”ti vacanato pannarasiyaṃ uposathakaraṇe doso natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1175_9: evaṃ sati pakatiyāpi jeṭṭhamāsakāḷapakkhuposatho cātuddasoyevāti katvā doso natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1175_12: Tato paraṃ paṭhamāsāḷhamāsassa juṇhapakkhepi kāḷapakkhepi dutiyāsāḷhamāsassa juṇhapakkhepi pannarasīuposathaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1175_13: katvā pāṭipadadivase tithiyogaṃ vā nakkhattayogaṃ vā anoloketvā pāto aruṇuggamanānantarato paṭṭhāya yāva
tika-vin08t0:1175_14: puna aruṇuggamanā sakaladivasarattiyaṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ vassaṃ upagacchanto sūpagatova hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1175_18: Vuttañhetaṃ senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ “sace pātova gāhite senāsane añño vitakkacāriko bhikkhu āgantvā senāsanaṃ yācati, ‘gahitaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1184_1: Evaṃ vassūpanāyikavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni upajjhāyavattādivattakathaṃ kathetuṃ “vattanti etthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1184_13: Ito aññānipi pañcasattati sekhiyavattāni dveasīti mahāvattāni ca vattameva.
tika-vin08t0:1184_17: Tesu upajjhāyavattaṃ paṭhamaṃ dassento “tattha upajjhāyavattaṃ tāva evaṃ veditabba”ntyādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1185_7: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena dasavassena vā atirekadasavassena vā upasampādetu”ntiādivacanato byattibalasampanno
tika-vin08t0:1185_8: upasampadato paṭṭhāya dasavasso vā atirekadasavasso vā bhikkhu upajjhāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1185_10: saddhivihārikānaṃ khuddakaṃ vajjaṃ vā mahantaṃ vajjaṃ vā bhuso cintetīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1185_11: Kathaṃ gahito hoti upajjhāyoti saddhivihārikena ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “upajjhāyo me, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1185_12: hohī”ti tikkhattuṃ vutte sace upajjhāyo “sāhū”ti vā “lahū”ti vā “opāyika”nti vā “patirūpa”nti vā “pāsādikena
tika-vin08t0:1185_13: sampādehī”ti vā imesu pañcasu padesu yassa kassaci padassa vasena kāyena vā vācāya vā kāyavācāhi vā “gahito
tika-vin08t0:1186_0: Kena vattitabbaṃ upajjhāyavattanti gahitaupajjhāyena saddhivihārikena vattitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1186_2: tattha kālasseva uṭṭhāya upāhanā omuñcitvāti sacassa paccūsakāle caṅkamanatthāya vā dhotapādapariharaṇatthāya vā paṭimukkā upāhanā pādagatā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1186_4: Tādisameva mukhadhovanodakaṃ dātabbanti utumpi sarīrasabhāve ca ekākāre tādisameva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1187_0: Saguṇaṃ katvāti uttarāsaṅgaṃ saṅghāṭiñcāti dve cīvarāni ekato katvā tā dvepi saṅghāṭiyo dātabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1187_3: Padavītihārehīti ettha padaṃ vītiharati etthāti padavītihāro,
tika-vin08t0:1187_5: Dutavilambitaṃ akatvā samagamanena dvinnaṃ padānaṃ antare muṭṭhiratanamattaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1187_6: Padānaṃ vā vītiharaṇaṃ abhimukhaṃ haritvā nikkhepo padavītihāroti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1187_7: Na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassa antarantarā kathā opātetabbāti antaraghare vā aññatra vā bhaṇamānassa aniṭṭhite
tika-vin08t0:1187_8: tassa vacane aññā kathā na samuṭṭhāpetabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1187_9: Ito paṭṭhāyāti “na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassā”ti ettha na-
tika-vin08t0:1187_13: Sabbattha dukkaṭāpattīti āpadāummattakhittacittavedanāṭṭatādīhi vinā paṇṇattiṃ ajānitvāpi vadantassa gilānassa ca dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin08t0:1187_14: Āpadāsu hi antarantarā kathā vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1187_18: Sabbattha dukkaṭāpatti veditabbāti “īdisesu gilānopi na muccatī”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1187_19: Aññampi hi yathāvuttaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ anādariyena akarontassa agilānassa vattabhede sabbattha dukkaṭameva,
tika-vin08t0:1187_20: teneva vakkhati “agilānena hi saddhivihārikena saṭṭhivassenapi sabbaṃ upajjhāyavattaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1187_22: kārapaṭisaṃyuttesu pana padesu gilānassapi paṭikkhittakiriyaṃ karontassa dukkaṭamevā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1187_25: Āpattiyā āsannavācanti ca āpattijanakameva vacanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin08t0:1188_0: Cīvarena pattaṃ veṭhetvāti ettha “uttarāsaṅgassa ekena kaṇṇena veṭhetvā”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1188_1: Heṭṭhāpīṭhaṃ vā parāmasitvāti idaṃ pubbe tattha ṭhapitapattādinā asaṅghaṭṭanatthāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1188_2: Cakkhunā oloketvāpi aññesaṃ abhāvaṃ ñatvāpi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t0:1188_3: Caturaṅgulaṃ kaṇṇaṃ ussāretvāti kaṇṇaṃ caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ atirekaṃ katvā evaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅgharitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1188_4: Obhoge kāyabandhanaṃ kātabbanti kāyabandhanaṃ saṅgharitvā cīvarabhoge pakkhipitvā ṭhapetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1188_5: Sace piṇḍapāto hotīti ettha yo gāmeyeva vā antaraghare vā paṭikkamane vā bhuñjitvā āgacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1188_8: gāme abhuttassa pana laddhabhikkhassa vā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1188_10: Tattha gāmeti gāmapariyāpanne tādise kismiñci padese.
tika-vin08t0:1188_15: udakaṃ datvā attanā laddhatopi piṇḍapāto upanetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1188_17: ādimhi majjhe anteti evaṃ tikkhattuṃ pucchitabboti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1189_1: Jantāgharañhi nāma himapātabahukesu desesu tappaccayarogapīḷādinivāraṇatthaṃ sarīrasedatāpanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1189_2: Tattha kira andhakārapaṭicchannatāya bahūpi ekato pavisitvā cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā aggitāpaparihārāya mattikāya
tika-vin08t0:1189_3: mukhaṃ limpitvā sarīraṃ yāvadatthaṃ sedetvā cuṇṇādīhi ubbaṭṭetvā nahāyanti.
tika-vin08t0:1189_10: Ullokā paṭhamaṃ ohāretabbanti ullokato paṭhamaṃ ullokaṃ ādiṃ katvā avaharitabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1189_14: abbhantarabāhiravātapānakavāṭakāni ca gabbhassa ca cattāro koṇā sammajjitabbāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1190_0: Aññattha netabboti yattha vihārato sāsane anabhirati uppannā,
tika-vin08t0:1190_2: Na ca acchinne theve pakkamitabbanti rajitacīvarato yāva appamattakampi rajanaṃ gaḷati,
tika-vin08t0:1190_4: Na upajjhāyaṃ anāpucchā ekaccassa patto dātabbotiādi sabbaṃ upajjhāyassa visabhāgapuggalānaṃ vasena kathitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1190_5: Ettha ca visabhāgapuggalānanti lajjino vā alajjino vā upajjhāyassa avaḍḍhikāme sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1190_6: Sace pana upajjhāyo alajjī ovādampi na gaṇhāti,
tika-vin08t0:1190_8: tattha upajjhāyaṃ vihāya lajjīheva saddhiṃ āmisādiparibhogo kātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1190_12: Upacārasīmato bahi gantukāmena anāpucchā gantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1190_13: Vuṭṭhānamassa āgametabbanti gelaññato vuṭṭhānaṃ assa āgametabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1193_9: dasavassaṃ nissāya vatthuṃ dasavassena nissayaṃ dātu”ntiādivacanato byattibalasampanno dasavasso vā atirekadasavasso vā bhikkhu ācariyo.
tika-vin08t0:1193_10: Kenaṭṭhena ācariyoti antevāsikena ābhuso caritabboti ācariyo,
tika-vin08t0:1193_13: Tattha nissayaṃ gahetvā taṃ nissāya vatthabbo nissayācariyo.
tika-vin08t0:1193_17: Kathaṃ gahito hoti ācariyoti antevāsikena ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ācariyo me, bhante, hohi,
tika-vin08t0:1193_18: āyasmato nissāya vacchāmī”ti tikkhattuṃ vutte ācariyo “sāhū”ti vā “lahū”ti vā “opāyika”nti vā “patirūpa”nti
tika-vin08t0:1194_0: Kena vattitabbaṃ ācariyavattanti antevāsikena vattitabbaṃ ācariyavattaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1194_1: Byattena bhikkhunā pañca vassāni nissāya vatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1194_3: Ettha sacāyaṃ bhikkhu vuḍḍhataraṃ ācariyaṃ na labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1194_4: upasampadāya saṭṭhivasso vā sattativasso vā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1194_5: navakatarassapi byattassa santike ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ācariyo me, āvuso, hohi,
tika-vin08t0:1194_6: āyasmato nissāya vacchāmī”ti evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vatvā nissayo gahetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1194_7: Gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchantenapi ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchāmi ācariyā”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1194_9: Katamaṃ taṃ vattanti ettha upajjhāyavattato aññaṃ natthīti āha “idameva ca…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1194_12: atha kasmā idameva “ācariyavatta”nti vuccatīti āha “ācariyassa kattabbattā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1194_13: Yathā ekopi bhikkhu mātubhātābhūtattā “mātulo”ti ca dhamme sikkhāpakattā “ācariyo”ti ca vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:1194_14: evaṃ ekameva vattaṃ upajjhāyassa kattabbattā “upajjhāyavatta”nti ca ācariyassa kattabbattā “ācariyavatta”nti ca vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1194_15: Evaṃ santepi nāme bhinne attho bhinno siyāti āha “nāmamattameva hettha nāna”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1194_16: Yathā “indo sakko”tiādīsu nāmamattameva bhinnaṃ, na attho,
tika-vin08t0:1195_0: Idāni tasmiṃ vatte saddhivihārikaantevāsikānaṃ vasena labbhamānaṃ kañci visesaṃ dassento “tattha yāva cīvararajana”ntyādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1198_4: Tattha ko saddhivihārikoti upasampanno vā hotu sāmaṇero vā,
tika-vin08t0:1198_7: Kenaṭṭhena saddhivihārikoti upajjhāyena saddhiṃ vihāro etassa atthīti saddhivihārikoti atthena.
tika-vin08t0:1198_16: tathāpi vattakkhandhake visuṃ visuṃ āgatattā visuṃ visuṃyeva kathayāma.
tika-vin08t0:1199_0: Saṅgahetabbo anuggahetabboti uddesādīhissa saṅgaho ca anuggaho ca kātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1199_6: Apica otiṇṇe vā anotiṇṇe vā paṭhamaṃ vacanaṃ ovādo,
tika-vin08t0:1199_8: Sace upajjhāyassa patto hotīti sace atirekapatto hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1199_11: Idha ussukkaṃ nāma dhammiyena nayena uppajjamānaupāyapariyesanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1199_12: Ito paraṃ dantakaṭṭhadānaṃ ādiṃ katvā ācamanakumbhiyā udakasiñcanapariyosānaṃ vattaṃ gilānasseva saddhivihārikassa kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1199_14: Cīvaraṃ rajantenāti “evaṃ rajeyyāsī”ti upajjhāyato upāyaṃ sutvā rajantena.
tika-vin08t0:1199_16: Saṅgahetabbo anuggahetabbotiādīsu anādariyaṃ paṭicca dhammāmisehi asaṅgaṇhantānaṃ ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ vattabhedattā.
tika-vin08t0:1202_5: Tattha ko antevāsikoti upasampanno vā hotu sāmaṇero vā,
tika-vin08t0:1202_7: yo vā ācariyassa ovādaṃ gahetvā pabbajati,
tika-vin08t0:1202_9: yo vā tassa santike dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:1202_17: Kenaṭṭhena antevāsikoti ante vasatīti antevāsiko aluttasamāsavasena.
tika-vin08t0:1203_0: Kena vattitabbaṃ antevāsikavattanti catubbidhehi ācariyehi antevāsikesu vattitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1203_5: Katamaṃ taṃ vattanti yaṃ bhagavatā vattakkhandhake vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1203_8: Idha pana attho saddhivihārikavatte vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1203_10: etesu pabbajjantevāsiko ca upasampadantevāsiko ca ācariyassa yāvajīvaṃ bhāro,
tika-vin08t0:1203_11: nissayantevāsiko ca dhammantevāsiko ca yāva samīpe vasanti, tāvadeva,
tika-vin08t0:1203_13: Ācariyantevāsikesu hi yo yo na sammā vattati,
tika-vin08t0:1206_4: tasmā upacārasīmāsamīpaṃ patvā upāhanāomuñcanādi sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1206_6: Upāhanapuñchanacoḷakaṃ pucchitvā upāhanā puñchitabbāti “katarasmiṃ ṭhāne upāhanapuñchanacoḷaka”nti āvāsike bhikkhū pucchitvā.
tika-vin08t0:1206_9: abhivādāpetabboti tassa vasse pucchite yadi daharo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1206_13: Bahi ṭhitenāti bahi nikkhamantassa ahino vā amanussassa vā maggaṃ ṭhatvā ṭhitena nilloketabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1209_3: Tattha āvāsikena bhikkhunā āgantukaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuḍḍhataraṃ disvā āsanaṃ paññapetabbantiādi pāḷiyaṃ āgatañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatañca gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1209_8: Senāsanaṃ paññapetabbanti ettha “kattha mayhaṃ senāsanaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti pucchitena senāsanaṃ paññapetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1209_9: “etaṃ senāsanaṃ tumhākaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti evaṃ ācikkhitabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1209_11: Etena mañcapīṭhādiṃ papphoṭetvā pattharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā dānampi senāsanapaññāpanamevāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1209_12: Mahāāvāsepi attano santikaṃ sampattassa āgantukassa vattaṃ akātuṃ na labbhati.
tika-vin08t0:1212_6: Taṃ sabbaṃ aggisālāyaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ vā guttaṭṭhāne paṭisāmetvā gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1212_8: Senāsanaṃ āpucchitvā pakkamitabbanti ettha yaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu vā katasenāsanaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1212_11: Catūsu pāsāṇesūtiādi upacikānaṃ uppattiṭṭhāne paṇṇasālādisenāsane kattabbākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1212_12: Appeva nāma aṅgānipi seseyyunti ayaṃ ajjhokāse ṭhapitamhi ānisaṃso.
tika-vin08t0:1212_13: Ovassakagehe pana tiṇesu ca mattikāpiṇḍesu ca upari patantesu mañcapīṭhānaṃ aṅgānipi vinassanti.
tika-vin08t0:1215_5: idha pana vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇe gamikavattato bhattaggavattaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1215_6: anumodanavattaṃ pana visuṃ avatvā bhattaggavatteyeva antogadhaṃ katvā pacchā vuttaṃ bhattaggaṃ gantvā bhatte bhutteyeva anumodanākaraṇato,
tika-vin08t0:1215_9: bhikkhunā anumodanavattaṃ paññāpessāmī”ti visuṃ vattabhāvena anāgatattā bhattaggavatteyeva antogadhanti ācariyassa adhippāyo siyā.
tika-vin08t0:1215_10: Imassa ca vinayālaṅkārapakaraṇassa tassā vaṇṇanābhūtattā saṃvaṇṇetabbakkameneva saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kathayissāma.
tika-vin08t0:1216_3: puratoggaṃ vare tīsū”ti abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ āgatepi “rājagganti rājārahaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1216_4: salākagganti salākaggahaṇaṭṭhāna”ntiādīsu aññatthesupi pavattanato bhattassa aggaṃ bhattaggaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1216_7: Tattha ārāme kālo ārocito hotīti “kālo bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1216_9: Timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentenāti dve jāṇumaṇḍalāni nābhimaṇḍalañca paṭicchādentena.
tika-vin08t0:1216_12: adho jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentena jāṇumaṇḍalassa heṭṭhā jaṅghaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ nivāsanaṃ otāretvā nivāsetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1216_14: yathānisinnassa jāṇumaṇḍalato heṭṭhā caturaṅgulamattaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hotīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1216_15: Kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvāti tassa nivāsanassa upari kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā “na,
tika-vin08t0:1216_21: “Gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvāti pāsake gaṇṭhikaṃ pavesetvā antogāmo vā hotu vihāro vā,
tika-vin08t0:1216_22: manussānaṃ parivisanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantena cīvaraṃ pārupitvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā gamanameva vaṭṭatī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1216_23: Ettha ca manussānaṃ parivisanaṭṭhānanti yattha antovihārepi manussā saputtadārā āvasitvā bhikkhū netvā bhojenti.
tika-vin08t0:1217_1: atha kho gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā anuvātantena gīvaṃ paṭicchādetvā ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā paṭisaṃharitvā yāva maṇibandhā paṭicchādentena.
tika-vin08t0:1217_2: Susaṃvutenāti hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā akīḷāpentena,
tika-vin08t0:1217_5: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento bhiyyo taṃ taṃ disābhāgaṃ pāsādaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ vīthiṃ olokento gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1217_7: Ekasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā hatthiassādiparissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1217_9: Dvādasahatthe gehe ādimhi saṅghatthero majjhe dutiyatthero ante tatiyattheroti evaṃ nisinnesu saṅghatthero dutiyena saddhiṃ manteti,
tika-vin08t0:1218_2: ekato vā ubhato vā ukkhittacīvaro hutvāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1218_4: Nisinnakāle pana dhamakaraṇaṃ nīharantenapi cīvaraṃ anukkhipitvāva nīharitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1218_7: Na kāyappacālakanti kāyaṃ acāletvā kāyaṃ paggahetvā niccalaṃ katvā ujukena kāyena samena iriyāpathena.
tika-vin08t0:1218_8: Na bāhuppacālakanti bāhuṃ acāletvā bāhuṃ paggahetvā niccalaṃ katvā.
tika-vin08t0:1218_9: Na sīsappacālakanti sīsaṃ acāletvā sīsaṃ paggahetvā niccalaṃ ujuṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin08t0:1218_10: Na khambhakatoti khambhakato nāma kaṭiyaṃ hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā katakhambho.
tika-vin08t0:1218_11: Na ukkuṭikāyāti ettha ukkuṭikā vuccati paṇhiyo ukkhipitvā aggapādehi vā aggapāde ukkhipitvā paṇhehiyeva vā bhūmiṃ phusantassa gamanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1218_16: Na there bhikkhū anupakhajjāti there bhikkhū atiallīyitvā na nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1218_17: Na saṅghāṭiṃ ottharitvāti na saṅghāṭiṃ attharitvā nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1219_2: Samasūpako nāma yattha bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo sūpo hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1219_5: āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha thūpīkato nāma pattassa antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṃ atikkamitvā kato,
tika-vin08t0:1219_8: “Yaṃ kañci yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā phalāphalaṃ vā āmisajātikaṃ samatitthikameva gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1219_12: Yaṃ pana dvīsu pattesu bhattaṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ pūretvā vihāraṃ pesetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1219_13: Yaṃ patte pakkhipiyamānaṃ pūvaucchukhaṇḍaphalāphalādi heṭṭhā orohati,
tika-vin08t0:1219_17: Pupphavaṭaṃsakatakkolakaṭukaphalādivaṭaṃsake pana ṭhapetvā dinnaṃ thūpīkataṃ na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1219_18: Bhattassa upari thālakaṃ vā pattaṃ vā ṭhapetvā pūretvā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin08t0:1219_20: Kurundiyampi vuttaṃ “thālake vā patte vā pakkhipitvā taṃ pattamatthake ṭhapetvā denti,
tika-vin08t0:1220_1: Sapadānanti tattha tattha odhiṃ akatvā anupaṭipāṭiyā.
tika-vin08t0:1220_5: Na sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vātiādi pākaṭameva.
tika-vin08t0:1220_14: Sabbo hatthoti ettha hatthasaddo tadekadesesu aṅgulīsu daṭṭhabbo “hatthamuddo”tiādīsu viya samudāye pavattavohārassa avayave pavattanato.
tika-vin08t0:1220_16: Na sakabaḷenāti ettha dhammaṃ kathento harītakaṃ vā laṭṭhimadhukaṃ vā mukhe pakkhipitvā katheti,
tika-vin08t0:1221_2: Avagaṇḍakārakanti makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe katvā katvā.
tika-vin08t0:1221_9: Bhuñjantena hi aṅgulimattampi nillehituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1221_10: ghanayāguphāṇitapāyāsādike pana aṅgulīhi gahetvā aṅguliyo mukhe pavesetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1221_14: oṭṭhamaṃsehi eva pana gahetvā anto pavesetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1222_0: Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakoti etaṃ paṭikūlavasena paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1222_1: tasmā saṅghikampi puggalikampi gihisantakampi attano santakampi saṅkhampi sarāvampi āmisamakkhitaṃ na gahetabbameva,
tika-vin08t0:1222_3: Sace pana hatthassa ekadeso āmisamakkhito na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1222_5: Na sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍetabbanti ettha uddharitvā vāti sitthāni ekato uddharitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne rāsiṃ katvā udakaṃ chaḍḍeti.
tika-vin08t0:1222_10: Na tāva therena udakanti idaṃ hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1222_12: pana gale vilaggāmisena vā pānīyaṃ pivitvā na dhovitabbāti.
tika-vin08t0:1225_0: Anumodanavatte anu punappunaṃ modiyate pamodiyateti anumodanā. Kā sā?
tika-vin08t0:1228_8: Yasmā pavisananikkhamanadvāraṃ asallakkhetvā sahasā pavisanto visabhāgārammaṇaṃ vā passeyya,
tika-vin08t0:1228_16: tena manussānaṃ agāravo vā appasādo vā bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1228_20: atilahukaṃ nivattanto dātukāmānaṃ puññahāni ca bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1228_26: Tattha kammaṃ vā nikkhipatīti kappāsaṃ vā suppaṃ vā musalaṃ vā yañca gahetvā kammaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1228_30: Ṭhapeti vāti “tiṭṭhatha bhante”ti vadantī ṭhapeti nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1228_31: Avakkārapātīti atirekapiṇḍapātaṃ apanetvā ṭhapanatthāya ekā samuggapāti.
tika-vin08t0:1228_32: Ettha ca samuggapāti nāma samuggapuṭasadisā pāti.
tika-vin08t0:1231_0: 190. Āraññikavatte na ramanti janā etthāti araññaṃ. Vuttañhi –
tika-vin08t0:1234_3: kālasseva uṭṭhāyāti araññasenāsanassa gāmato dūrattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1234_4: teneva kāraṇena “pattaṃ gahetvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā gacchanto parissamo hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1234_5: Pattaṃ thavikāya pakkhipitvā aṃse laggetvā cīvaraṃ khandhe karitvā araññamaggo na dussodhano hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1234_7: Araññaṃ nāma yasmā corādīnaṃ vicaraṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1234_8: tasmā “dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā dvāravātapānaṃ thaketvā vasanaṭṭhānato nikkhamitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1234_10: Gāmato nikkhamitvā sace bahigāme udakaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1234_13: bhattakiccaṃ katvā pattaṃ dhovitvā vodakaṃ katvā thavikāya pakkhipitvā cīvaraṃ saṅgharitvā aṃse karitvā upāhanā ārohitvā gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1235_1: aggi upaṭṭhāpetabbotiādi vāḷamigasarīsapādibāhiraparissayakāle ca vātapittādiajjhattapaassayakāle ca icchitabbattā.
tika-vin08t0:1235_2: Bahūnaṃ pana vasanaṭṭhāne tādisāni sulabhāni hontīti āha “gaṇavāsino pana tena vināpi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1235_4: tasmā araññe viharantena avassaṃ icchitabboti vuttaṃ “kattaradaṇḍo upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1235_7: kena nakkhattena cando yutto”ti pucchitesu “na jānāmā”ti vutte kujjhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1235_8: tasmā vuttaṃ “nakkhattapadāni uggahetabbāni sakalāni vā ekadesāni vā”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1238_9: idha pana attanā vutthavihāroti ayameva viseso.
tika-vin08t0:1238_10: Na vuḍḍhaṃ anāpucchāti ettha tassa ovarake tadupacāre ca āpucchitabbanti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1238_11: Bhojanasālādīsupi evameva paṭipajjitabbanti bhojanasālādīsupi uddesadānādi āpucchitvāva kātabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1241_1: Jantāgharavatte jāyatīti jaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Sarīraṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1241_2: Jaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti jantā, kā sā? Tikicchā.
tika-vin08t0:1244_5: idha ca vattakkhandhake ācamanavattaṃ paṭhamaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1244_7: Imasmiṃ pana pakaraṇe paṭhamaṃ vaccaṃ katvā pacchā ācamatīti adhippāyena vaccakuṭivattaṃ paṭhamaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1244_9: Dantakaṭṭhaṃ khādantenāti ayaṃ vaccakuṭiyāpi sabbattheva paṭikkhepo.
tika-vin08t0:1244_11: Puggalikaṭṭhānaṃ vāti attano vihāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1251_1: Evaṃ upajjhāyādivattasaṅkhātāni cuddasa khandhakavattāni kathetvā idāni catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ bhājanaṃ kathento “catupaccayabhājana”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1251_3: Paṭicca eti sītapaṭighātādikaṃ phalaṃ etasmāti paccayo, cīvarādi,
tika-vin08t0:1251_9: Tattha tasmiṃ catupaccayabhājane samabhiniviṭṭhe cīvarabhājane tāva paṭhamaṃ cīvarapaṭiggāhako…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1252_11: Kathaṃ chandāgatiṃ gacchatīti āha “tattha pacchā āgatānampī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1253_0: Imāya kammavācāya vā apalokanena vāti idaṃ imassa sammutikammassa lahukakammattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1253_1: Tathā hi vuttaṃ parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ “avasesā terasa sammutiyo senāsanaggāhamatakacīvaradānādisammutiyo
tika-vin08t0:1253_2: cāti etāni lahukakammāni apaloketvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭantī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1253_3: Antovihāre sabbasaṅghamajjhepi khaṇḍasīmāyampi sammannituṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha antovihāreti baddhasīmavihāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1253_4: Na hi abaddhasīmavihāre apalokanādicatubbidhakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati dubbisodhanattā.
tika-vin08t0:1254_1: Bhaṇḍāgārasammutiyaṃ vihāramajjheyevāti avippavāsasīmāsaṅkhātamahāsīmā vihārassa majjheyeva sammannitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1254_2: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne imaṃ pana bhaṇḍāgāraṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ gantvā khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ nisinnehi sammannituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1254_5: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ vihāraṃ bhaṇḍāgāraṃ sammanneyyā”tiādinā nayena “kammavācāya vā apalokanena vā sammannitabba”nti
tika-vin08t0:1254_6: vacanaṃ nissāya ñattidutiyakammaṃ upacārasīmāyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti gahetvā kathinadānakammampi abaddhasīmābhūte
tika-vin08t0:1254_8: ekacce ñattikammampi tatheva gahetvā abaddhasīmavihāre upacārasīmāmatteyeva uposathapavāraṇaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1255_3: Imaṃ kira pāṭhaṃ amanasikarontā idāni kālacīvarampi sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhapaṭivīsaṃ denti.
tika-vin08t0:1255_5: yattakena vinayāgatena sammuñjanībandhanādihatthakammena vihārassa ūnatā na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1255_7: Sabbesanti tatruppādavassāvāsikaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇerānañca.
tika-vin08t0:1255_11: Virajjhitvā karontīti kattabbakālesu akatvā yathārucitakkhaṇe karonti.
tika-vin08t0:1255_12: Samapaṭivīso dātabboti karissāmāti yācantānaṃ paṭiññāmattenapi samako koṭṭhāso dātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1256_4: Sabbesu dasagghanakavasena kuse pātite yassa bhikkhuno dvādasagghanako kuso pātito,
tika-vin08t0:1256_5: so “ettakena mama cīvaraṃ pahotī”ti tena atirekabhāgena gantukāmo hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1256_6: Ettha ca ettakena mama cīvaraṃ pahotīti dvādasagghanakena mama cīvaraṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1256_7: na tato ūnenāti sabbaṃ gahetukāmoti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1256_9: taṃ sutvā bhagavā “saṅghike ca gaṇasantake ca appakaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1256_14: Tattha anukkhepo nāma yaṃ kiñci anukkhipitabbaṃ anuppadātabbaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1256_16: tattake agghanake yasmiṃ kismiñci kappiyabhaṇḍe dinneti atthoti imamatthaṃ saṅkhepena dassetuṃ “sace dasa bhikkhū honti”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1257_0: Vikalake tosetvāti ettha cīvaravikalakaṃ puggalavikalakanti dve vikalakā.
tika-vin08t0:1257_1: Tattha cīvaravikalakaṃ nāma sabbesaṃ pañca pañca vatthāni pattāni,
tika-vin08t0:1257_5: Chindantehi ca aḍḍhamaṇḍalādīnaṃ vā upāhanathavikādīnaṃ vā pahonakāni khaṇḍāni katvā dātabbāni,
tika-vin08t0:1257_6: heṭṭhimaparicchedena caturaṅgulavitthārampi anuvātappahonakāyāmaṃ khaṇḍaṃ katvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1257_7: Aparibhogaṃ pana na kātabbanti evamettha cīvarassa appahonakabhāvo cīvaravikalakaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1257_10: sacepi ekassa bhikkhuno koṭṭhāse ekaṃ vā dve vā vatthāni nappahonti,
tika-vin08t0:1257_11: tattha aññaṃ sāmaṇakaṃ parikkhāraṃ ṭhapetvā yo tena tussati,
tika-vin08t0:1257_12: tassa taṃ bhāgaṃ datvā pacchā kusapāto kātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1258_0: Puggalavikalakaṃ nāma dasa dasa bhikkhū gaṇetvā vaggaṃ karontānaṃ eko vaggo na pūrati,
tika-vin08t0:1258_2: tesaṃ aṭṭha vā nava vā koṭṭhāsā “tumhe ime gahetvā visuṃ bhājethā”ti dātabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1258_4: Visuṃ dinne pana taṃ tositaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1258_6: Atha vā vikalake tosetvāti yo cīvaravibhāgo ūnako,
tika-vin08t0:1258_7: taṃ aññena parikkhārena samaṃ katvā kusapāto kātabboti imamatthaṃ dasseti “sace sabbesaṃ pañca pañca vatthānī”tiādinā.
tika-vin08t0:1259_1: Ito paraṃ tesu tesu vatthūsu āgatavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttesu vinicchayesu santesupi tesaṃ vinicchayānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1259_2: aṭṭhamātikāvinicchayato avimuttattā aṭṭhamātikāvinicchayesveva pakkhipitvā dassetuṃ “idāni aṭṭhimā,
tika-vin08t0:1259_4: Yā tā aṭṭha mātikā bhagavatā vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:1259_5: tāsaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ vasena vinicchayo idāni veditabboti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:1259_6: Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānena paricchinnāti iminā aparikkhittassa vihārassa dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānādito paṭhamaleḍḍupātassa anto upacārasīmāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1259_7: Idāni dutiyaleḍḍupātassa antopi upacārasīmāyevāti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1259_9: “Evaṃ sante tiyojane ṭhitā lābhaṃ gaṇhissantī”tiādinā ime lābhaggahaṇādayo upacārasīmāvaseneva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1259_11: tena ca imāni lābhaggahaṇādīniyeva upacārasīmāyaṃ kattabbāni,
tika-vin08t0:1259_15: vidhānanti idaṃ sabbaṃ imissāyeva upacārasīmāya vasena veditabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1260_1: Loke gāmasīmādayo viya lābhasīmā nāma visuṃ pasiddhā natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1260_11: Upacārasīmādīsu pana abaddhasīmāsu heṭṭhāpathaviyaṃ sabbattha ṭhitānaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:1260_12: kūpādipavesārahaṭṭhāne ṭhitānaññeva pāpuṇātīti heṭṭhā sīmakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva taṃtaṃsīmaṭṭhabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1260_13: Cakkavāḷasīmāya dinnaṃ pathavīsandhārakaudakaṭṭhānepi ṭhitānaṃ pāpuṇāti sabbattha cakkavāḷavohārattāti.
tika-vin08t0:1260_15: “avippavāsasīmāya dammī”ti dinnaṃ gāmaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1261_5: Tehi vattabbanti yesaṃ sammukhe esa deti,
tika-vin08t0:1262_1: Dutiyabhāge pana therāsanaṃ āruḷheti yāva saṅghanavakaṃ ekavāraṃ sabbesaṃ bhāgaṃ datvā cīvare aparikkhīṇe
tika-vin08t0:1262_2: puna sabbesaṃ dātuṃ dutiyabhāge therassa dinneti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1262_3: Pubbe vuttanayenāti “tuyheva bhikkhu tāni cīvarānī”ti bhagavatā vuttanayena.
tika-vin08t0:1262_6: therānaṃ demā”ti vuttattā “paṃsukūlikānampi vaṭṭatī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1262_7: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana paṃsukūlikānampi vaṭṭatīti ettha “tuyhaṃ demā”ti avuttattāti kāraṇaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1262_11: saṅghassa demā”ti vacanato bhedo na dissati,
tika-vin08t0:1263_2: tato upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1263_6: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañca dammī”ti vutte pana na majjhe bhinditvā dātabbanti ettha yasmā bhikkhunipakkhe
tika-vin08t0:1263_7: saṅghassa paccekaṃ aparāmaṭṭhattā bhikkhunīnaṃ gaṇanāya bhāgo dātabboti dāyakassa adhippāyoti sijjhati,
tika-vin08t0:1263_8: tathā dānañca bhikkhūpi gaṇetvā dinne eva yujjati.
tika-vin08t0:1263_11: tasmā “bhikkhusaṅghassā”ti vuttavacanampi “bhikkhūna”nti vuttavacanasadisamevāti āha “bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca gaṇetvā dātabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1263_14: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañca tuyhañcā”ti vutte pana puggalo visuṃ na labhatīti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1263_16: Tathā hi “ubhatosaṅghassa ca tuyhañca dammī”ti vutte sāmaññavisesavacanehi saṅgahitattā yathā puggalo visuṃ labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1263_17: evamidhāpi “bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tuyhañcā”ti sāmaññavisesavacanasabbhāvato bhavitabbameva visuṃ puggalapaṭivīsenāti viññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:1263_19: Pāpuṇanaṭṭhānato ekameva labhatīti attano vassaggena pattaṭṭhānato ekameva koṭṭhāsaṃ labhati.
tika-vin08t0:1263_22: bhikkhusaṅghaggahaṇeneva puggalassapi gahitattāti adhippāyoti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1264_1: puggalassa pana “tuyhañcā”ti visuṃ gahitattā ca tatthassa aggahitattā daṭṭhabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1264_6: taṃ na sundaraṃ tassa visuṃ lābhaggahaṇe kāraṇavacanattā.
tika-vin08t0:1264_7: Tathā hi “visuṃ saṅghaggahaṇena gahitattā”ti visuṃ puggalassapi bhāgaggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1264_9: evaṃ upari “bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tuyhañcā”tiādīsupi visuṃ saṅghādisaddehi puggalassa aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1264_11: saṅghatopi visumpīti bhāgadvayaṃ labheyya ubhayattha gahitattāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1264_12: Pūjetabbantiādi gihikammaṃ na hotīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1264_13: Bhikkhusaṅghassa harāti idaṃ piṇḍapātaharaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1264_15: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa harā”ti vuttepi haritabbanti īdisaṃ gihiveyyāvaccaṃ na hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1265_1: Antohemanteti iminā anatthate kathine vassānaṃ pacchime māse dinnaṃ purimavassaṃvutthānaññeva pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:1265_2: tato paraṃ hemante dinnaṃ pacchimavassaṃvutthānampi vutthavassattā pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:1265_3: hemantato pana paraṃ piṭṭhisamaye “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassā”ti evaṃ paricchinditvā dinnaṃ anantare vasse
tika-vin08t0:1265_4: vā tato paresu vā yattha katthaci tasmiṃ bhikkhubhāve vutthavassānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin08t0:1265_11: sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātīti yattha katthaci vutthavassānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1265_12: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi “sace pana bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhito ‘vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa dammī’ti vadati,
tika-vin08t0:1265_13: yattha katthaci vutthavassānaṃ sabbesaṃ sampattānaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1265_14: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “vassāvāsassa ananurūpe padese ṭhatvā vuttattā vassaṃvutthānañca avutthānañca sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1265_16: Na hi “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa dammī”ti vutte avutthavassānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin08t0:1265_17: Sabbesampīti tasmiṃ bhikkhubhāve vutthavassānaṃ sabbesampīti attho daṭṭhabbo “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:1266_1: Idāni “ādissa detī”ti padaṃ vibhajanto “ādissa detīti etthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1266_3: bhesajje vā ādisitvā paricchinditvā dento dāyako ādissa deti nāmāti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:1267_1: Idāni “puggalassa detī”ti padaṃ vibhajanto āha “puggalassa deti etthā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1267_2: Saṅghato ca gaṇato ca vinimuttassa attano kulūpakādipuggalassa dento dāyako puggalassa deti nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1267_3: Taṃ pana puggalikadānaṃ parammukhā vā hoti sammukhā vā.
tika-vin08t0:1267_4: Tattha parammukhā dento “idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti nāmaṃ uddharitvā deti,
tika-vin08t0:1267_5: sammukhā dento ca bhikkhuno pādamūle cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā “idaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1267_7: tadubhayathāpi dento puggalassa deti nāmāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1267_8: Na kevalaṃ ekasseva dento puggalassa deti nāma,
tika-vin08t0:1267_9: atha kho antevāsikādīhi saddhiṃ dentopi puggalassa deti nāmāti dassetuṃ “sace panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1267_10: Tattha uddesaṃ gahetuṃ āgatoti tassa santike uddesaṃ aggahitapubbassapi uddesaṃ gaṇhissāmīti āgatakālato paṭṭhāya antevāsikabhāvūpagamanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1267_12: Vattaṃ katvā uddesaparipucchādīni gahetvā vicarantānanti idaṃ “uddesantevāsikāna”nti imasseva visesanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1267_13: Tena uddesakāle āgantvā uddesaṃ gahetvā gantvā aññattha nivasante anibaddhacārike nivatteti.
tika-vin08t0:1268_0: Evaṃ cīvarakkhandhake āgataaṭṭhamātikāvasena cīvaravibhajanaṃ dassetvā idāni tasmiṃyeva cīvarakkhandhake
tika-vin08t0:1268_1: majjhe āgatesu vatthūsu āgatanayaṃ nivattetvā dassento “sace koci bhikkhū”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1268_2: Tattha kiṃ kātabbanti pucchāya tasseva tāni cīvarānīti vissajjanā,
tika-vin08t0:1268_5: Vaḍḍhiṃ payojetvā ṭhapitaupanikkhepatoti vassāvāsikatthāya veyyāvaccakarehi vaḍḍhiṃ payojetvā ṭhapitaupanikkhepato.
tika-vin08t0:1268_7: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “idaṃ idha vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa demāti vā vassāvāsikaṃ demāti vā vatvā dinnaṃ taṃ
tika-vin08t0:1268_9: taṃ vassāvāsikalābhavasena uppanne labbhamānavisesaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1268_11: saddaṃ vinā “vassaṃvutthasaṅghassa demā”ti vuttepi so eva nayo.
tika-vin08t0:1268_12: Anatthatakathinassapi pañca māse pāpuṇātīti vassāvāsikalābhavasena uppannattā anatthatakathinassapi vutthavassassa pañca māse pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:1268_13: tato paraṃ pana uppannavassāvāsikaṃ pucchitabbaṃ “kiṃ atītavasse idaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1269_0: Ṭhitikā pana na tiṭṭhatīti ettha aṭṭhitāya ṭhitikāya puna aññasmiṃ cīvare uppanne sace eko bhikkhu āgacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1269_2: Ṭhitāya pana ṭhitikāya puna aññasmiṃ cīvare uppanne sace navakataro āgacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1269_10: “Pātite kuse”ti ekakoṭṭhāse kusadaṇḍake pātitamatte sacepi bhikkhusahassaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1269_13: tattha gahitameva nāmāti “imassa idaṃ patta”nti kiñcāpi na viditaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1269_14: te pana bhāgā atthato tesaṃ pattāyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1270_0: Sattāhavārena aruṇameva uṭṭhāpetīti idaṃ nānāsīmavihāresu kattabbanayena ekasmimpi vihāre dvīsu senāsanesu nivutthabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1270_3: Antoupacārasīmāya hi yattha katthaci aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpento attanā gahitasenāsanaṃ appaviṭṭhopi vutthavasso eva hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1270_4: Gahitasenāsane pana nivuttho nāma na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1270_7: Etena ca itarasmiṃ sattāhavārenapi aruṇuṭṭhāpane sati eva appataraṃ nivasati nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1270_10: Nānālābhehītiādīsu nānā visuṃ visuṃ lābho etesūti nānālābhā,
tika-vin08t0:1270_13: Nānā visuṃ visuṃ pākārādīhi paricchinno upacāro etesanti nānūpacārā,
tika-vin08t0:1270_15: Ekasīmavihārehīti ekasīmāyaṃ dvīhi vihārehīti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1270_18: Ekasīmavihārehīti dvinnaṃ vihārānaṃ ekena pākārena parikkhittattā ekāya upacārasīmāya antogatehi dvīhi vihārehīti vimativinodaniyaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1271_3: Pāḷiyaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākānaṃ cīvaradāne sāmaṇerānaṃ ticīvarādhiṭṭhānābhāvā “cīvarañca pattañcā”tiādi sabbattha vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1272_7: Tattha tattha saṅghassevāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vihāre saṅghasseva.
tika-vin08t0:1272_8: Bhikkhuno kālakataṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya “idhā”ti vattabbe “tatthā”ti vuttattā vicchāvacanattā ca parikkhārassa ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1272_9: Pāḷiyaṃ avissajjikaṃ avebhaṅgikanti āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghasseva santakaṃ hutvā kassaci avissajjikaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1272_11: “Sante patirūpe gāhake”ti vuttattā gāhake asati adatvā bhājitepi subhājitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1272_12: Dakkhiṇodakaṃ pamāṇanti ettha sāratthadīpaniyaṃ tāva “yattha pana dakkhiṇodakaṃ pamāṇanti bhikkhū yasmiṃ
tika-vin08t0:1272_13: raṭṭhe dakkhiṇodakapaṭiggahaṇamattenapi deyyadhammassa sāmino hontīti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1272_14: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “dakkhiṇodakaṃ pamāṇanti ettakāni cīvarāni dassāmīti paṭhamaṃ udakaṃ pātetvā pacchā denti,
tika-vin08t0:1273_0: “Matakacīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātī”ti ettha maggaṃ gacchanto tassa kālakiriyaṃ sutvā avihāraṭṭhāne ce dvādasahatthabbhantare
tika-vin08t0:1273_1: aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāvaṃ ñatvā “idaṃ cīvaraṃ mayhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti adhiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin08t0:1273_3: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bahubhaṇḍo bahuparikkhāro kālakato hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1273_15: taṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa avissajjikaṃ avebhaṅgika”nti iminā pāṭhena bhagavā sabbaññū bhikkhūnaṃ āmisadāyajjaṃ vicāresi.
tika-vin08t0:1274_4: Iminā ito tividhabhaṇḍato aññaṃ bhikkhubhaṇḍaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1274_5: imehi tividhehi puggalehi añño dāyādo nāma natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1274_6: Idāni pana vinayadharā “bhikkhūnaṃ akappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gihibhūtā ñātakā labhantī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1274_8: “Ye tassa dhane issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā,
tika-vin08t0:1274_15: tasmā ñātakā vā hontu aññātakā vā,
tika-vin08t0:1274_22: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “gilānupaṭṭhāko nāma gihī vā hotu pabbajito vā,
tika-vin08t0:1275_0: Atha vā yo bhikkhu attano jīvamānakāleyeva sabbaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ nissajjitvā kassaci ñātakassa vā
tika-vin08t0:1275_1: aññātakassa vā gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā adāsi,
tika-vin08t0:1275_2: koci ca ñātako vā aññātako vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā vissāsaṃ aggahesi,
tika-vin08t0:1275_3: tādise sandhāya “ye tassa dhanassa issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā,
tika-vin08t0:1275_6: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace pana so jīvamānoyeva sabbaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ nissajjitvā kassaci adāsi,
tika-vin08t0:1275_14: Tampi “gihiñātakānaṃ dātabba”nti pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā ṭīkāsu vā natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1278_2: Tattha senāsanakkhandhake senāsanabhājaneyeva paṭhamaṃ āgatepi catupaccayabhājanavinicchayattā paccayānukkamena piṇḍapātabhājanaṃ paṭhamaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1278_3: Piṇḍapātabhājane pana saṅghabhattādīsu ayaṃ vinicchayoti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:1278_4: Kathaṃ etāni saṅghabhattādīni bhagavatā anuññātānīti āha “anujānāmi…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1278_6: Saṅghassa atthāya ābhataṃ bhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ yathā “āgantukassa ābhataṃ bhattaṃ āgantukabhatta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1278_7: Saṅghato uddissa uddisitvā dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1278_12: Pāṭipade uposathadivasato dutiyadivase dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ pāṭipadabhattanti viggaho.
tika-vin08t0:1278_13: Ṭhitikā nāma natthīti saṅghattherato paṭṭhāya vassaggena gāhaṇaṃ ṭhitikā nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1279_0: Attano vihāradvāreti vihārassa dvārakoṭṭhakasamīpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1279_3: Dinnaṃ panāti vatvā yathā so dāyako vadati,
tika-vin08t0:1279_6: Antoupacāragatānanti ettha gāmadvāravīthicatukkesu dvādasahatthabbhantaraṃ upacāro nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1280_0: Antaragharassa upacāre pana labbhamānavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “gharūpacāro cetthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1280_3: Lajjī pesalo agatigamanaṃ vajjetvā medhāvī ca upaparikkhitvā uddisatīti āha “pesalo lajjī medhāvī icchitabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1280_5: vuḍḍhatare niddāyante navakassa gāhitaṃ suggāhitanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1280_6: Ticīvaraparivāraṃ vāti ettha “udakamattalābhī viya aññopi uddesabhattaṃ alabhitvā vatthādianekappakārakaṃ labhati ce,
tika-vin08t0:1280_8: Attano rucivasena yaṃ kiñci vatvā āharituṃ vissajjitattā vissaṭṭhadūto nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1280_9: Yaṃ icchatīti “uddesabhattaṃ dethā”tiādīni vadanto yaṃ icchati.
tika-vin08t0:1281_0: “Ekā kūṭaṭṭhitikā nāma hotī”ti vatvā tameva ṭhitikaṃ vibhāvento “rañño vā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1281_1: Aññehi uddesabhattādīhi amissetvā visuṃyeva ṭhitikāya gahetabbattā “ekacārikabhattānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1281_4: Sabbaṃ pattassāmikassa hotīti cīvarādikampi sabbaṃ pattassāmikasseva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1281_6: na cīvarādi”nti vatvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1281_7: Manussānaṃ vacanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttā gacchantīti manussānaṃ vacanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti tena bhikkhunā vuttā gacchanti.
tika-vin08t0:1281_10: Sabbo saṅgho paribhūñjatūti vutteti ettha “paṭhamameva ‘sabbasaṅghikabhattaṃ dethā’ti vatvā pacchā ‘sabbo
tika-vin08t0:1281_11: saṅgho paribhuñjatū’ti avuttepi bhājetvā paribhuñjitabba”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1281_12: Kiṃ āharīyatīti avatvāti “katarabhattaṃ tayā āharīyatī”ti dāyakaṃ apucchitvā.
tika-vin08t0:1284_1: “Ettake bhikkhū saṅghato uddisitvā dethā”tiādīni avatvā “ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ dethā”ti vatvā dinnaṃ saṅghikaṃ nimantanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1285_1: Saṅghato aṭṭha bhikkhūti ettha ye mātikaṃ āruḷhā,
tika-vin08t0:1285_4: vā sayaṃ vā saṅghato uddisāpetvā gahetvā gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1285_6: Mātikaṃ āropetvāti “saṅghato gaṇhāmī”tiādinā vuttamātikābhedaṃ dāyakassa viññāpetvāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1285_11: yattakā pana bhikkhū tasmiṃ āvāse vasanti, te sabbe.
tika-vin08t0:1285_12: Ekasmiṃ divase gahitabhikkhū aññadā aggahetvā yāva ekavāraṃ sabbe bhikkhū bhojitā hontīti jānāti ce,
tika-vin08t0:1285_15: Paṭibaddhakālato paṭṭhāyāti tattheva vāsassa nibaddhakālato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin08t0:1288_3: Bahūni salākabhattānīti tiṃsaṃ vā cattārīsaṃ vā bhattāni.
tika-vin08t0:1288_6: Niggahena datvāti dūraṃ gantuṃ anicchantassa niggahena sampaṭicchāpetvā.
tika-vin08t0:1288_7: Puna vihāraṃ āgantvāti ettha vihāraṃ anāgantvā bhattaṃ gahetvā pacchā vihāre attano pāpetvā bhuñjitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1289_2: Saṭṭhito vā paṇṇāsato vāti daṇḍakammatthāya udakaghaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1289_6: Dūrattā niggahetvāpi vārena gahetabbo gāmo vāragāmo.
tika-vin08t0:1289_10: Phātikammameva bhavantīti vihārarakkhaṇatthāya saṅghena dātabbā atirekalābhā honti.
tika-vin08t0:1289_11: Ekasseva pāpuṇantīti divase divase ekekasseva pāpitānīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1289_12: Saṅghanavakena laddhakāleti divase divase ekekassa pāpitāni dve tīṇi ekacārikabhattāni teneva niyāmena
tika-vin08t0:1290_0: Yassa kassaci sammukhībhūtassa pāpetvāti ettha “yebhuyyena ce bhikkhū bahisīmagatā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1290_1: sammukhībhūtassa yassa kassaci pāpetabbaṃ sabhāgattā ekena laddhaṃ sabbesaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1290_2: tasmimpi asati attano pāpetvā dātabba”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1290_4: Salākavasena pana gāhitattā na sāditabbāti idaṃ asāruppavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1290_9: saṅghato nirāmisasalākāpi vihāre pakkabhattampi vaṭṭatiyevāti sādhāraṇaṃ katvā visuddhimagge vuttattā,
tika-vin08t0:1290_11: evaṃ na sāditabba”nti visesetvā avuttattā ca “bhesajjādisalākāyo cettha kiñcāpi piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin08t0:1290_12: salākavasena pana gāhitattā na sāditabbā”ti ettha adhippāyo vīmaṃsitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1290_13: Yadi hi bhesajjādisalākā salākavasena gāhitā na sāditabbā siyā,
tika-vin08t0:1290_15: “atirekalābho saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhatta”ntiādivacanato ca “atirekalābhaṃ paṭikkhipāmī”ti salākavasena gāhetabbaṃ bhattameva paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1290_17: Saṅghabhattādīni hi cuddasa bhattāniyeva tena na sāditabbānīti vuttāni.
tika-vin08t0:1290_18: Khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ vā matena idha evaṃ vuttanti gahetabbanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1290_21: Laddhā vā aladdhā vā svepi gaṇheyyāsīti laddhepi appamattatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1291_0: Salākabhattaṃ nāma vihāreyeva uddisīyati vihārameva sandhāya dīyamānattāti āha “vihāre apāpitaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1291_2: Vihāraṃ ānetvā gāhetabbanti tathā vatvā tasmiṃ divase dinnabhattaṃ vihārameva ānetvā ṭhitikāya gāhetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1291_4: Taṃ gahetvāti taṃ vāragāmasalākaṃ attanā gahetvā.
tika-vin08t0:1291_5: Tenāti yo attano pattavāragāme salākaṃ disāgamikassa adāsi, tena.
tika-vin08t0:1291_6: Anatikkamanteyeva tasmiṃ tassa salākā gāhetabbāti yasmā upacārasīmaṭṭhasseva salākā pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:1291_7: tasmā tasmiṃ disaṃgamike upacārasīmaṃ anatikkanteyeva tassa disaṃgamikassa pattasalākā attano pāpetvā gāhetabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1292_0: Devasikaṃ pāpetabbāti upacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitassa yassa kassaci vassaggena pāpetabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1292_1: Evaṃ etesu anāgatesu āsannavihāre bhikkhūnaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1292_3: Anāgatadivaseti ettha kathaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgatānāgatabhāvo viññāyatīti ce?
tika-vin08t0:1292_4: Yasmā tato tato āgatā bhikkhū tasmiṃ gāme āsanasālāya sannipatanti,
tika-vin08t0:1292_7: Bhuñjituṃ āgacchantīti “mahāthero ekakova vihāre ohīno avassaṃ sabbasalākā attano pāpetvā ṭhito”ti maññamānā āgacchanti.
tika-vin08t0:1295_1: Abhilakkhitesu catūsu pakkhadivasesu dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1295_5: Sve pakkhoti ajjapakkhikaṃ na gāhetabbanti aṭṭhamiyā bhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1295_9: Sve lūkhanti ajja āvāhamaṅgalādikaraṇato atipaṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ karīyati,
tika-vin08t0:1295_13: Pakkhikabhattato uposathikabhattassa bhedaṃ dassento āha “uposathaṅgāni samādiyitvā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1298_2: Gamiko āgantukabhattampīti gāmantarato āgantvā avūpasantena gamikacittena vasitvā puna aññattha gacchantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1298_4: “Lesaṃ oḍḍetvā”ti vuttattā lesābhāvena yāva gamanaparibandho vigacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1301_2: Pattaṃ pūretvā thaketvā dinnanti “guḷakabhattaṃ demā”ti dinnaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1304_1: Ito paraṃ paccayānukkamena senāsanabhājanakathāya vattabbāyapi tassā mahāvisayattā,
tika-vin08t0:1304_3: piṇḍapātabhājanīyakathāya anulomattā ca tadanantaraṃ taṃ dassetumāha “gilānapaccayabhājanīyaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1304_6: Ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvātiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā ca pākaṭattā ca suviññeyyameva.
tika-vin08t0:1304_8: bhājetabbanti idaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1304_9: Kumbhaṃ pana āvajjetvāti kumbhaṃ disāmukhaṃ katvā.
tika-vin08t0:1304_10: Sace thinaṃ sappi hotīti kakkhaḷaṃ sappi hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1304_11: Thokaṃ thokampi pāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti evaṃ kate ṭhitikāpi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin08t0:1304_12: Siṅgiveramaricādibhesajjampi avasesapattathālakādisamaṇaparikkhāropīti iminā na kevalaṃ bhesajjameva gilānapaccayo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1304_13: atha kho avasesaparikkhāropi gilānapaccaye antogadhoyevāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1307_2: Tattha utukāle senāsanaggāho ca vassāvāse senāsanaggāho cāti kālavasena senāsanaggāho nāma duvidho hotīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:1307_6: akālo nāma natthi dāyakehi “āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa dammī”ti dinnasaṅghikasenāsanattā.
tika-vin08t0:1307_7: Ekekaṃ pariveṇanti ekekassa bhikkhussa ekekaṃ pariveṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1307_12: Adātuṃ na labhatīti iminā sañcicca adentassa paṭibāhane pavisanato dukkaṭanti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:1307_13: Jambudīpe panāti ariyadese bhikkhū sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1308_1: Na gocaragāmo ghaṭṭetabboti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “na tattha manussā vattabbā”tiādinā.
tika-vin08t0:1308_2: Vitakkaṃ chinditvāti “iminā nīhārena gacchantaṃ disvā nivāretvā paccaye dassantī”ti evarūpaṃ vitakkaṃ anuppādetvā.
tika-vin08t0:1308_3: Tesu ce ekoti tesu manussesu eko paṇḍitapuriso.
tika-vin08t0:1308_6: Suddhacittattāva anavajjanti idaṃ pucchitakkhaṇe kāraṇācikkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ na hoti asuddhacittassapi pucchitapañhavissajjane dosābhāvā.
tika-vin08t0:1308_7: Evaṃ pana gate maṃ pucchissantīti saññāya agamanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1309_1: Muṇḍavedikāyāti cetiyassa hammiyavedikāya ghaṭākārassa upari caturassavedikāya.
tika-vin08t0:1309_2: Kattha pucchitabbanti pucchāya yato pakatiyā labbhati,
tika-vin08t0:1309_8: Upanikkhepanti khettaṃ vā nāḷikerādiārāmaṃ vā kahāpaṇādīni vā ārāmikānaṃ niyyātetvā “ito uppannā vaḍḍhi vassāvāsikatthāya hotū”ti dinnaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1309_9: Vattaṃ katvāti tasmiṃ senāsane kattabbavattaṃ katvā.
tika-vin08t0:1309_10: Iti saddhādeyyeti evaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena saddhāya dātabbe vassāvāsikalābhavisayeti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1310_1: tañca “tato catupaccayaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti dinnakhettādito uppannattā kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe “kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1310_4: Puggalavaseneva kātabbanti parato vakkhamānanayena bhikkhū cīvarena kilamanti,
tika-vin08t0:1310_5: ettakaṃ nāma taṇḍulabhāgaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaraṃ kātuṃ ruccatītiādinā puggalaparāmāsavaseneva kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1310_6: “saṅgho cīvarena kilamatī”tiādinā pana saṅghaparāmāsavasena na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1310_7: Kappiyabhaṇḍavasenāti sāmaññato vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “cīvarataṇḍulādivaseneva cā”ti vuttaṃ. Ca-
tika-vin08t0:1310_10: Puggalavaseneva kappiyabhaṇḍavasena ca apalokanappakāraṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ pana evaṃ kattabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1311_0: Cīvarapaccayaṃ sallakkhetvāti saddhādeyyatatruppādavasena tasmiṃ vassāvāse labbhamānacīvarasaṅkhātaṃ paccayaṃ “ettaka”nti paricchinditvā.
tika-vin08t0:1311_6: Sammatasenāsanaggāhāpakassa āṇattiyā aññena gahitopi gāho ruhatiyevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1311_7: Aṭṭhapi soḷasapi jane sammannituṃ vaṭṭatīti visuṃ visuṃ sammannituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1311_11: Niggahakammameva hi saṅgho saṅghassa na karoti.
tika-vin08t0:1311_12: Sammutidānaṃ pana bahūnampi ekato kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1311_13: Teneva sattasatikakkhandhake ubbāhikasammutiyaṃ aṭṭhapi janā ekato sammatāti.
tika-vin08t0:1312_1: Mahālābhapariveṇakathāyaṃ labhantīti tatra vāsino bhikkhū labhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1312_4: Pakkhipitvāti ettha pakkhipanaṃ nāma tesu vasantānaṃ ito uppannavassāvāsikadānaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1312_5: Pavisitabbanti aññehi bhikkhūhi tasmiṃ mahālābhe pariveṇe vasitvā cetiye vattaṃ katvāva lābho gahetabboti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1313_3: Pādamūle ṭhapetvā sāṭakaṃ dentīti paccayadāyakā denti.
tika-vin08t0:1313_4: Etena gahaṭṭhehi pādamūle ṭhapetvā dinnampi paṃsukūlikānampi vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1313_5: Atha vassāvāsikaṃ demāti vadantīti ettha “paṃsukūlikānaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti ajjhāharitvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1313_7: Upanibandhitvā gāhetabbanti “imasmiṃ rukkhe vā maṇḍape vā vasitvā cetiye vattaṃ katvā gaṇhathā”ti evaṃ upanibandhitvā gāhetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1314_1: Antarāmuttakaṃ pana pāṭipadaṃ atikkamitvāpi gāhetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1314_4: kattha vā paccaye labhissāmī”ti evaṃ uppannena vitakkena caratīti vitakkacāriko.
tika-vin08t0:1314_5: Idāni yaṃ dāyakā pacchimavassaṃvutthānaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ deti,
tika-vin08t0:1314_7: Āgantuko ce bhikkhūti cīvare gāhite pacchā āgato āgantuko bhikkhu.
tika-vin08t0:1314_9: Paṭhamavassūpagatāti āgantukassa āgamanato puretarameva pacchimikāya vassūpanāyikāya vassūpagatā.
tika-vin08t0:1314_10: Laddhaṃ laddhanti punappunaṃ dāyakānaṃ santikā āgatāgatasāṭakaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1315_0: Sādiyantāpi hi teneva vassāvāsikassa sāminoti chinnavassattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1315_1: Paṭhamameva katikāya katattā “neva adātuṃ labhantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1315_3: Tesameva dātabbanti vassūpagatesu aladdhavassāvāsikānaṃ ekaccānameva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1315_4: Bhatiniviṭṭhanti bhatiṃ katvā viya niviṭṭhaṃ pariyiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1315_7: Tattha saṅghikaṃ pana apalokanakammaṃ katvā gāhitanti tatruppādaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1315_8: Tattha apalokanakammaṃ katvā gāhitanti “chinnavassāvāsikañca idāni uppajjanakavassāvāsikañca imesaṃ dātuṃ
tika-vin08t0:1315_9: ruccatī”ti anantare vuttanayena apalokanaṃ katvā gāhitaṃ saṅghena dinnattā vibbhantopi labhateva,
tika-vin08t0:1315_11: Paccayavasena gāhitaṃ pana temāsaṃ vasitvā gahetuṃ attanā dāyakehi ca anumatattā bhatiniviṭṭhampi chinnavassopi
tika-vin08t0:1315_12: vibbhantopi na labhatīti keci ācariyā vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1315_14: teneva vassūpanāyikadivase evaṃ dāyakehi dinnaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ gahitabhikkhuno vassacchedaṃ akatvā vāsova heṭṭhā vihito,
tika-vin08t0:1315_18: tasmā vassaggena gāhitaṃ chinnavassādayo na labhantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1316_5: Saṅghikaṃ hotīti etena vutthavassānampi vassāvāsikabhāgo saṅghikato amocito tesaṃ vibbhamena saṅghiko hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1316_7: Labhatīti “mama pattabhāvaṃ etassa dethā”ti dāyake sampaṭicchāpenteneva saṅghikato viyojitaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1317_2: Tattha aparopīti pubbe vuttasenāsanaggāhadvayato aññopīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1317_3: Nanu ca “ayaṃ senāsanaggāho nāma duvidho hoti utukāle ca vassāvāse cā”ti vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1317_4: atha kasmā “ayamaparopī”tyādi vuttoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “divasavasena hī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1317_5: Aparajjugatāya āsāḷhiyāti paṭhamavassūpanāyikadivasabhūtaṃ āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyā pāṭipadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1318_1: Utukāle paṭibāhituṃ na labhatīti hemantagimhesu aññe sampattabhikkhū paṭibāhituṃ na labhati.
tika-vin08t0:1318_5: Ekaṃ mañcaṭṭhānaṃ datvāti ekaṃ mañcaṭṭhānaṃ puggalikaṃ datvā.
tika-vin08t0:1318_7: Evaṃ vissajjanampi thāvarena thāvaraṃ parivattanaṭṭhāneyeva pavisati,
tika-vin08t0:1318_9: Sace saddhivihārikādīnaṃ dātukāmo hotīti sace so saṅghassa bhaṇḍaṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ vā aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vā dātuṃ na icchati,
tika-vin08t0:1318_11: tādisassa “tuyhaṃ puggalikameva katvā jaggāhī”ti na sabbaṃ dātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1318_13: Evañhītiādimhi cayānurūpaṃ tatiyabhāge vā upaḍḍhabhāge vā gahite taṃ bhāgaṃ dātuṃ labhatīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1318_14: Yenāti tesu dvīsu tīsu bhikkhūsu yena.
tika-vin08t0:1318_15: So sāmīti tassā bhūmiyā vihārakaraṇe sova sāmī,
tika-vin08t0:1318_16: taṃ paṭibāhitvā itarena na kātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1319_2: Cayaṃ vā pamukhaṃ vāti saṅghikasenāsanaṃ nissāya tato bahi bandhitvā ekaṃ senāsanaṃ vā.
tika-vin08t0:1322_1: Catupaccayasādhāraṇakathāyaṃ sammatena appamattakavissajjakenāti ñattidutiyakammavācāya vā apalokanakammena
tika-vin08t0:1322_3: Avibhattaṃ saṅghikabhaṇḍanti pucchitabbakiccaṃ natthīti ettha avibhattaṃ saṅghikabhaṇḍanti kukkuccuppattiākāradassanaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1322_7: Ettakassa saṅghikabhaṇḍassa vissajjanatthāyeva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā katasammutikammattā.
tika-vin08t0:1328_0: Idāni catupaccayantogadhattā vihārassa catupaccayabhājanakathānantaraṃ vihāravinicchayakathā ārabhīyate.
tika-vin08t0:1337_0: Tattha ko vihāroti catūsu paccayesu senāsanasaṅkhāto catūsu senāsanesu vihārasenāsanasaṅkhāto bhikkhūnaṃ nivāsabhūto patissayaviseso.
tika-vin08t0:1337_2: iriyāpathadibbabrahmaariyasaṅkhātehi catūhi vihārehi ariyā ettha viharantītyattho.
tika-vin08t0:1337_4: Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa bhikkhūnaṃ dinnaṃ vihāraṃ vā pariveṇaṃ vā
tika-vin08t0:1337_5: āvāsaṃ vā mahantampi khuddakampi abhiyuñjato abhiyogo na ruhati,
tika-vin08t0:1337_8: Na hettha sabbe cātuddisā bhikkhū dhuranikkhepaṃ karontīti.
tika-vin08t0:1337_10: ekapuggalassa vā santakaṃ abhiyuñjitvā gaṇhanto sakkoti te dhuraṃ nikkhipāpetuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1337_11: tasmā tattha ārāme vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1337_12: Iminā dāyakasantako vihāro nāma natthīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:1338_0: Kena so dātabboti khattiyena vā brāhmaṇena vā yena kenaci so vihāro dātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1338_1: Kassa dātabboti saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā dātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1338_8: Ko tassa issaroti yadi saṅghassa deti,
tika-vin08t0:1338_14: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dīghabhāṇakādikassa pana gaṇassa ekapuggalassa vā santaka”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1339_0: Kena so gāhitoti senāsanaggāhāpakena so vihāro gāhito.
tika-vin08t0:1339_10: yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin08t0:1341_2: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno senāsanaggāhāpakassa sammuti,
tika-vin08t0:1343_0: Kassa so gāhitoti bhikkhūnaṃ so vihāro gāhito.
tika-vin08t0:1343_6: Anuṭṭhāpaniyā katīti cattāro anuṭṭhāpanīyā vuḍḍhataro gilāno bhaṇḍāgāriko saṅghato laddhasenāsanoti.
tika-vin08t0:1343_7: Vuttañhetaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “vuḍḍho hi attano vuḍḍhatāya anuṭṭhāpanīyo,
tika-vin08t0:1343_9: saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharagaṇavācakācariyānaṃ vā bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca
tika-vin08t0:1343_10: sallakkhetvā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sallakkhetvā sammannitvā deti,
tika-vin08t0:1344_0: Katihaṅgehi yuttassa dhuvavāsāya dīyateti ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena dvīhi aṅgehi yuttassa dhuvavāsatthāya vihāro dīyate.
tika-vin08t0:1344_6: Tena bahūpakārattepi guṇavisiṭṭhattābhāve guṇavisiṭṭhattepi bahūpakārattābhāve dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti dassetī”ti vinayatthamañjūsāyaṃ vacanato.
tika-vin08t0:1345_0: Senāsanaggāho pana duvidho utukāle ca vassāvāse cāti kālavasena.
tika-vin08t0:1345_1: Atha vā tayo senāsanaggāhā purimako pacchimako antarāmuttakoti.
tika-vin08t0:1345_3: “Utukāle senāsanaggāho antarāmuttako ca taṅkhaṇapaṭisallāno cāti dubbidho.
tika-vin08t0:1345_4: Vassāvāse senāsanaggāho purimako ca pacchimako cāti dubbidhoti cattāro senāsanaggāhā”ti ācariyā vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1345_5: taṃ vacanaṃ pāḷiyampi aṭṭhakathāyampi na āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1345_9: aṭṭhakathāyampi “tīsu senāsanaggāhesu purimako ca pacchimako cāti ime dve gāhā thāvarā,
tika-vin08t0:1346_0: Idāni pana ekacce ācariyā “imasmiṃ kāle sabbe vihārā saṅghikāva,
tika-vin08t0:1346_2: Vihāradāyakānaṃ vihāradānakāle kulūpakā ‘imaṃ vihāraṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa demā’ti vacībhedaṃ kārāpenti,
tika-vin08t0:1346_4: Ekaccesu vihāresu evaṃ avatvā dentesupi ‘tasmiṃ jīvante puggaliko hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1346_5: mate saṅghikoyevā’ti vuttattā porāṇakavihārāpi saṅghikāva hontī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1346_7: vacībhedaṃ kārāpetvā dinnavihāresupi dāyakā saṅghaṃ uddissa karontā nāma appakā,
tika-vin08t0:1346_8: “imaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ imaṃ nāma theraṃ vasāpessāmī”ti cintetvā puttadāramittāmaccādīhi sammantetvā patiṭṭhāpenti,
tika-vin08t0:1346_10: Atha pana kulūpakā dānakāle sikkhāpetvā vadāpenti,
tika-vin08t0:1346_11: evaṃ vadantāpi dāyakā appakā saṅghaṃ uddissa denti,
tika-vin08t0:1346_13: Evaṃ sante kulūpakānaṃ vacanaṃ navasu adhammikadānesu “puggalassa pariṇataṃ saṅghassa pariṇāmetī”ti vuttaṃ ekaṃ adhammikadānaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin08t0:1346_15: mate saṅghiko”ti ayaṃ pāṭho mūlapuggalikavisaye na āgato,
tika-vin08t0:1346_17: tasmā navavihārāpi puggalaṃ uddissa dinnā santiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:1346_18: Porāṇakavihārāpi mūle puggalikavasena dinnā saddhivihārikādīnaṃ puggalikavaseneva dīyamānāpi tasmiṃ jīvanteyeva
tika-vin08t0:1347_0: Aññe pana ācariyā “imasmiṃ kāle saṅghikavihārā nāma na santi,
tika-vin08t0:1347_2: Navavihārāpi patiṭṭhāpanakāle dānakāle ca kulūpakabhikkhuṃyeva uddissa katattā puggalikāva,
tika-vin08t0:1347_3: porāṇakavihārāpi sissānusissehi vā aññehi vā puggalehi eva pariggahitattā,
tika-vin08t0:1347_4: na kadāci saṅghena pariggahitattā puggalikāva honti,
tika-vin08t0:1347_7: navavihārepi patiṭṭhānakālepi dānakālepi ekacce saṅghaṃ uddissa karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1347_9: Pubbeva puggalaṃ uddissa katepi atthakāmānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā puggalikadānato saṅghikadānameva
tika-vin08t0:1347_10: mahapphalataranti saddahitvā saṅghike karontāpi dāyakā santi,
tika-vin08t0:1347_11: puggalikavasena paṭiggahite porāṇakavihārepi keci bhikkhū maraṇakāle saṅghassa niyyātenti.
tika-vin08t0:1347_14: Savatthukamahāvihāre pana karontā rājarājamahāmattādayo “pañcavassasahassaparimāṇaṃ sāsanaṃ yāva tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin08t0:1347_15: tāva mama vihāre vasitvā saṅgho cattāro paccaye paribhuñjatū”ti paṇidhāya cirakālaṃ saṅghassa paccayuppādakaraṃ
tika-vin08t0:1347_17: vihārassāti ca vihāre vasanakasaṅghassa uddissa denti,
tika-vin08t0:1348_4: Vihāradāyake asantepi tassa puttadhītunattapanattādayo yāva kulaparamparā tassa vihārassa issarāva honti.
tika-vin08t0:1348_7: so vihārasāmiko’ti āgatattā ca ‘tassa vā kule yo koci āpucchitabbo’ti ca vacanato vihārassāmibhūto dāyako vā tassa vaṃse uppanno vā vicāretuṃ issaro.
tika-vin08t0:1348_9: so acchinditvā puna deti cittalapabbate bhikkhunā nīhaṭaṃ udakavāhakaṃ aḷanāgarājamahesī viya,
tika-vin08t0:1348_10: evampi vaṭṭatī’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato vihāradāyakassa kulavaṃse pacchinnepi tassa janapadassa issaro
tika-vin08t0:1348_11: rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā yo koci issaro vā vihāraṃ vicāretuṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1349_5: Yathā hi jetassa rājakumārassa vanaṃ uyyānaṃ jetavananti viggahe kate yadipi anāthapiṇḍikena kiṇitvā
tika-vin08t0:1349_6: vihārapatiṭṭhāpanakālato paṭṭhāya rājakumāro tassa uyyānassa issaro na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1349_7: tathāpi anāthapiṇḍikena kiṇitakālato pubbe issarabhūtapubbattā pubbavohāravasena sabbadāpi jetavanantveva voharīyati.
tika-vin08t0:1349_8: Yathā ca pattassa sāmiko pattassāmikoti viggahe kate yadipi dāyakehi kiṇitvā bhikkhussa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya kammāro pattassa issaro na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1349_9: tathāpi dāyakena kiṇitakālato pubbe issarabhūtapubbattā pubbavohāravasena pattassāmikotveva voharīyati,
tika-vin08t0:1349_10: evaṃ yadipi bhikkhussa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya dāyako vihārassa issaro na hoti vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā dānassa,
tika-vin08t0:1349_11: tathāpi dānakālato pubbe issarabhūtapubbattā pubbavohāravasena vihārassāmikotveva voharīyati,
tika-vin08t0:1349_13: tasmā saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā dinnakālato paṭṭhāya saṅghādayo paṭiggāhakā eva vicāretuṃ issarā,
tika-vin08t0:1350_3: pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannitu”ntiādinā saṅghena sammataṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ anujānitvā,
tika-vin08t0:1350_6: seyyaggena gāhetu”ntiādinā senāsanaggāhāpakasseva vicāretuṃ issarabhāvassa vacanato ca “dve bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1350_7: bhūmiṃ gahetvā sodhetvā saṅghikaṃ senāsanaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1350_10: soyeva sāmī”ti ca “yo pana saṅghikaṃ vallimattampi aggahetvā āharimena upakaraṇena saṅghikāya bhūmiyā puggalikavihāraṃ kāreti,
tika-vin08t0:1350_11: upaḍḍhaṃ saṅghikaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ puggalika”nti ca saṅghapuggalānaṃyeva sāmibhāvassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā ca viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1351_0: “Tassa vā kule yo koci āpucchitabbo”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanampi tesaṃ vihārassa issarabhāvadīpakaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1351_1: atha kho gamiko bhikkhu disaṃ gantukāmo vihāre āpucchitabbabhikkhusāmaṇeraārāmikesu asantesu te āpucchitvā gantabbabhāvameva dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:1351_2: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “imaṃ pana dasavidhampi seyyaṃ saṅghike vihāre santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā pakkamantena āpucchitvā pakkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1351_3: āpucchantena ca bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu āpucchitabbo…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1351_7: tassa vā kule yo koci āpucchitabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1351_8: Evaṃ ārāmikassapi āpucchitabbato olokanatthāya vattasīseneva āpucchitabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1352_0: “Pacchinne kulavaṃse”tyādivacanañca akappiyavasena katānaṃ akappiyavohārena paṭiggahitānaṃ khettavatthutaḷākādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1352_1: akappiyattā bhikkhūhi pariccattānaṃ kappiyakaraṇatthāya rājādīhi gahetvā puna tesaṃyeva bhikkhūnaṃ dānameva dīpeti,
tika-vin08t0:1352_2: na tesaṃ rājādīnaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi aññesaṃ saṅghagaṇapuggalacetiyānaṃ dānaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1352_5: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “nava adhammikāni dānāni saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin08t0:1352_6: cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin08t0:1352_7: puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmetī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1352_10: Nava paṭiggahaparibhogāti etesaṃyeva dānānaṃ paṭiggahā ca paribhogā cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1352_11: Tasmā yadi rājādayo issarāti gahetvā aññassa deyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1352_13: taṃ dānaṃ paṭiggahā ca adhammikapaṭiggahā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1352_14: taṃ dānaṃ paribhuñjantā ca adhammikaparibhogā hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1353_1: aggaṃ buddhena vaṇṇitantiādīsu ‘saṅghassā’ti ayaṃ saddo ‘dāna’nti ettha sāmisambandho na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1353_9: Dānakāle hi dāyako attano vatthubhūtaṃ vihāraṃ saṅghassa pariccajitvā deti,
tika-vin08t0:1353_10: tasmā tasmiṃ samaye dāyako sāmī hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1353_12: dinnakāle pana saṅghova sāmī hoti vihārassa paṭiggahitattā,
tika-vin08t0:1353_19: atthato pana cīvarādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ dānakāleyeva dāyakasantakabhāvo dinnakālato paṭṭhāya paṭiggāhakasantakabhāvo sabbesaṃ pākaṭo,
tika-vin08t0:1353_20: tasmā idampi vacanaṃ dāyakasantakabhāvasādhakaṃ na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1354_1: tathāpi “sace bhikkhūhi pariccattabhāvaṃ ñatvā sāmiko vā tassa puttadhītaro vā añño vā koci vaṃse uppanno puna kappiyavohārena deti,
tika-vin08t0:1354_2: vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā vihārassāmikabhūtadāyakassa vā tassa puttadhītādīnaṃ vaṃse uppannānaṃ vā dātuṃ issarabhāvo siddhoyevāti.
tika-vin08t0:1354_6: tasmā akappiyattā bhikkhūhi pariccattameva kappiyakaraṇatthāya dāyakādīhi puna kappiyavohārena deti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1354_7: Yathā appaṭiggahitattā bhikkhūhi aparibhuttameva khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ bhikkhusantakaṃyeva āpattimocanatthaṃ dāyakādayo paṭiggahāpeti,
tika-vin08t0:1354_9: yathā ca bījagāmapariyāpannaṃyeva bhikkhusantakaṃ bījagāmabhūtagāmabhāvato parimocanatthaṃ kappiyakārakādayo kappiyaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1354_11: evaṃ akappiyaṃ bhikkhūhi pariccattaṃyeva taḷākādikaṃ kappiyakaraṇatthaṃ dāyakādayo puna denti,
tika-vin08t0:1355_0: Tathāpi evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “jātibhūmiyaṃ jātibhūmikā upāsakā āyasmantaṃ dhammikattheraṃ sattahi jātibhūmikavihārehi
tika-vin08t0:1355_1: pabbājayiṃsūti vacanato dāyako vihārassa issaroti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1355_2: Issarattāyeva hi te theraṃ pabbājetuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:1355_7: tasmā tasmiṃ dese vasantā bahavo upāsakā āyasmantaṃ dhammikattheraṃ ayuttacārittā sakalasattavihārato pabbājayiṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:1355_11: Evaṃ yadā dāyako vihāraṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā deti,
tika-vin08t0:1355_12: tassa muñcacetanaṃ patvā dinnakālato paṭṭhāya so vā tassa vaṃse uppanno vā janapadassāmikarājādayo vā issarā bhavituṃ vā vicāretuṃ vā na labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1355_13: paṭiggāhakabhūto saṅgho vā gaṇo vā puggalo vā soyeva issaro bhavituṃ vā vicāretuṃ vā labhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1356_0: Tattha dāyakādīnaṃ issaro bhavituṃ alabhanabhāvo kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce?
tika-vin08t0:1356_2: pathavādivatthupariccāgena ca puna gahaṇassa ayuttattā”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ vacanato “anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1356_10: dāyakehīti vacanena panettha parasantakābhāvo dīpito”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā ca viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1356_11: Saṅghādīnaṃ issaro bhavituṃ labhanabhāvo kathaṃ ñātabboti ce?
tika-vin08t0:1356_12: Saṅghiko nāma vihāro saṅghassa dinno hoti pariccatto,
tika-vin08t0:1356_14: attano puggalike anāpattī”ti pācittiyapāḷiyaṃ āgamanato ca “antamaso caturaṅgulapādakaṃ gāmadārakehi
tika-vin08t0:1356_15: paṃsvāgārakesu kīḷantehi katampi saṅghassa dinnato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ hotī”ti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vacanato
tika-vin08t0:1356_16: ca “abhiyogepi cettha cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa bhikkhūnaṃ dinnaṃ vihāraṃ vā pariveṇaṃ vā āvāsaṃ vā
tika-vin08t0:1356_17: mahantampi khuddakampi abhiyuñjato abhiyogo na ruhati,
tika-vin08t0:1356_20: Na hettha sabbe cātuddisā bhikkhū dhuranikkhepaṃ karontīti.
tika-vin08t0:1356_21: Dīghabhāṇakādibhedassa pana gaṇassa ekapuggalassa vā santakaṃ abhiyuñjitvā gaṇhanto sakkoti te dhuraṃ
tika-vin08t0:1357_0: Kathaṃ dāyakādīnaṃ vicāretuṃ alabhanabhāvo viññāyatīti ce?
tika-vin08t0:1357_3: pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannitu”nti bhikkhusseva senāsanaggāhāpakasammutianujānato
tika-vin08t0:1357_4: ca bhaṇḍanakārakesu kosambakabhikkhūsu sāvatthiṃ āgatesu anāthapiṇḍikena ca visākhāya mahāupāsikāya ca
tika-vin08t0:1357_6: tesu bhikkhūsu paṭipajjāmī”ti evaṃ jetavanavihāradāyakapubbārāmavihāradāyakabhūtesu ārocitesupi tesaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1357_7: senāsanavicāraṇaṃ avatvā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena “kathaṃ nu kho, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1357_8: tesu bhikkhūsu senāsane paṭipajjitabba”nti ārocite “tena hi,
tika-vin08t0:1357_10: vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ dātabba”nti vatvā “sace pana, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1357_12: kathaṃ paṭipajjitabba”nti vutte “tena hi vivittaṃ katvāpi dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1357_15: kenaci pariyāyena vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno senāsanaṃ paṭibāhitabbanti vadāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1357_17: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti therasseva senāsanassa vicāraṇassa anuññātattā ca viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1358_0: Kathaṃ pana saṅghādīnaṃ senāsanaṃ vicāretuṃ labhanabhāvo viññāyatīti? “Evañca,
tika-vin08t0:1358_4: yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin08t0:1360_0: Evaṃ saṅghena senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannāpetvā puna tena saṅghasammatena senāsanaggāhāpakena senāsanaggāhakavidhānaṃ anujānituṃ anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1360_4: seyyā gaṇetvā seyyaggena gāhetu”nti vacanato saṅghikasenāsanassa saṅghena vicāretuṃ labhanabhāvo viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1361_0: “Dīghabhāṇakādibhedassa pana gaṇassa ekapuggalassa vā dinnavihārādiṃ acchinditvā gaṇhante dhuranikkhepasambhavā
tika-vin08t0:1361_1: pārājika”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgamanato ca “attano puggalike anāpattī”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgamanato ca “yasmiṃ pana
tika-vin08t0:1361_3: tassa santakaṃ attano puggalikamiva hotīti mahāpaccariādīsu vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato ca gaṇassa dinno gaṇasantakavihāro gaṇeneva vicārīyate,
tika-vin08t0:1361_7: Evaṃ vinayapāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ca vihārassa saṅghikagaṇasantakapuggalikavasena tividhasseva vacanato
tika-vin08t0:1361_8: ca tesaṃyeva saṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ vihāravicāraṇassa anuññātattā ca dāyakasantakassa vihārassa visuṃ avuttattā
tika-vin08t0:1361_9: ca dāyakānaṃ vihāravicāraṇassa ananuññātattā ca saṅghādayo eva vihārassa issarā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1362_1: tesu paṭiggāhakabhūtesu saṅghagaṇapuggalesu so vihāro kassa santako hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1362_3: saṅghikavihāre tāva “āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa dammī”ti dinnattā paṭiggāhakesu kālakatesupi
tika-vin08t0:1362_4: tadañño cātuddisasaṅgho ca anāgatasaṅgho ca issaro,
tika-vin08t0:1362_7: Gaṇasantake pana tasmiṃ gaṇe yāva ekopi atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1362_10: Sabbesu kālakatesu yadi sakalagaṇo vā taṃgaṇapariyāpannaavasiṭṭhapuggalo vā jīvamānakāleyeva yassa kassaci dinno,
tika-vin08t0:1362_13: Sacepi sakalagaṇo jīvamānakāleyeva aññagaṇassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā deti,
tika-vin08t0:1362_15: Puggalikavihāre pana so vihārassāmiko attano jīvamānakāleyeva saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā deti,
tika-vin08t0:1362_17: Yo vā pana tassa jīvamānasseva vissāsaggāhavasena gaṇhāti,
tika-vin08t0:1363_1: Saṅghike vihārassa garubhaṇḍattā avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgikaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1363_3: Gaṇasantakapuggalikesu pana tesaṃ sāmikattā dānavissāsaggāhā ruhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1363_4: “tasmā so jīvamānoyeva sabbaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ nissajjitvā kassaci adāsi,
tika-vin08t0:1363_8: tasseva hotī”ti ca “dvinnaṃ santakaṃ hoti avibhattaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1363_10: bahūnampi santake eseva nayo”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1364_0: Evaṃ pana vissajjetvā adinnaṃ “mamaccayena asukassa hotū”ti dānaṃ accayadānattā na ruhati.
tika-vin08t0:1364_1: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace hi pañcasu sahadhammikesu yo koci kālaṃ karonto ‘mamaccayena mayhaṃ parikkhāro upajjhāyassa hotu,
tika-vin08t0:1364_10: Na hi pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ accayadānaṃ ruhati,
tika-vin08t0:1364_12: Ettha ca ekacce pana vinayadharā “gihīnanti padaṃ sampadānanti gahetvā bhikkhūnaṃ santakaṃ accayadānavasena gihīnaṃ dadante ruhati,
tika-vin08t0:1364_13: pañcannaṃ pana sahadhammikānaṃ dento na ruhatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1364_14: Evaṃ sante mātāpitūnaṃ dadantopi ruheyya tesaṃ gihibhūtattā.
tika-vin08t0:1364_18: tesaṃ na hotī”ti vacanato na ruhatīti viññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:1364_21: Tena gihīnaṃ pana santakaṃ accayadānaṃ ruhatīti sambandho kātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1365_1: “sace hi pañcasu sahadhammikesu yo koci kālaṃ karonto mamaccayena mayhaṃ parikkhāro”ti ārabhitvā “na hi pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ accayadānaṃ ruhati,
tika-vin08t0:1365_2: gihīnaṃ pana ruhatī”ti vuttattā sāmyatthe chaṭṭhībahuvacanaṃ samatthitaṃ bhavati.
tika-vin08t0:1365_3: Yadi evaṃ “gihīna”nti padassa asampadānatte sati katamaṃ sampadānaṃ hotīti?
tika-vin08t0:1365_9: Evaṃ jīvamānakāleyeva datvā matesu vinicchayo amhehi ñāto,
tika-vin08t0:1365_10: kassaci adatvā matesu vinicchayo kathaṃ ñātabboti?
tika-vin08t0:1365_11: Tatthāpi saṅghike tāva heṭṭhā vuttanayena saṅghova issaro,
tika-vin08t0:1365_15: Puggalike pana vihārassa garubhaṇḍattā avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgikaṃ saṅghikameva hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1366_11: taṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgika”nti tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena vuttattā viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1372_0: Iti dāyako vihāraṃ katvā kulūpakabhikkhussa deti,
tika-vin08t0:1372_1: tassa muñcacetanuppattito pubbakāle dāyako vihārassāmiko hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1372_4: paribhuñjituṃ vā aññesaṃ dātuṃ vā issaro.
tika-vin08t0:1372_5: So puggalo attano jīvamānakkhaṇeyeva saddhivihārikādīnaṃ nissajjitvā deti,
tika-vin08t0:1372_7: paribhuñjituṃ vā aññassa vā dātuṃ issarā.
tika-vin08t0:1372_8: Yadi pana kassaci adatvāva kālaṃ karoti,
tika-vin08t0:1372_9: tadā saṅghova tassa vihārassa sāmiko hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1373_0: Evaṃ mūlatoyeva saṅghassa dinnattā saṅghikabhūtavihāro vā mūle gaṇapuggalānaṃ dinnattā gaṇasantakapuggalikabhūtopi
tika-vin08t0:1373_1: tesaṃ gaṇapuggalānaṃ aññassa nissajjanavasena adatvā kālakatattā pacchā saṅghikabhāvaṃ pattavihāro vā
tika-vin08t0:1373_3: Saṅghenapi bhagavato anumatiyā senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannitvā gāhāpetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1373_4: Vuttañhetaṃ senāsanakkhandhake “atha kho bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi ‘kena nu kho senāsanaṃ gāhetabba’nti.
tika-vin08t0:1374_7: etaṃ pāḷiyā ca aṭṭhakathāya ca asamentaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin08t0:1374_8: Pāḷiyañhi “atha kho bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi ‘kati nu kho senāsanaggāho’ti.
tika-vin08t0:1374_14: aparajjugatāya pavāraṇāya āyatiṃ vassāvāsatthāya antarāmuttako gāhetabbo. Ime kho,
tika-vin08t0:1374_17: aṭṭhakathāyampi “tīsu senāsanaggāhesu purimako ca pacchimako cāti ime dve gāhā thāvarā.
tika-vin08t0:1374_19: ayaṃ tāva antovasse vassūpanāyikādivasena pāḷiyaṃ āgatasenāsanaggāhakathā,
tika-vin08t0:1374_20: ayaṃ pana senāsanaggāho nāma duvidho hoti utukāle ca vassāvāse cā”ti evaṃ āgato,
tika-vin08t0:1375_2: Tattha utukālo nāma hemantautugimhautuvasena aṭṭha māsā,
tika-vin08t0:1375_5: tesaṃ tadā bhikkhū uṭṭhāpetvā senāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1375_8: Vassāvāse senāsanaggāho pana “purimako pacchimako antarāmuttako”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena tividho hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1375_9: Antarāmuttakopi hi āyatiṃ vassāvāsatthāya gāhitattā vassāvāse senāsanaggāhameva pavisati,
tika-vin08t0:1375_11: Vuttañhi bhagavatā “aparajjugatāya pavāraṇāya āyatiṃ vassāvāsatthāya antarāmuttako gāhetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1375_12: Taṅkhaṇapaṭisallānavasena senāsanaggāhoti ca neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ visuṃ āgato,
tika-vin08t0:1375_13: utukāle senāsanaggāhoyeva tadaṅgasenāsanaggāhotipi taṅkhaṇapaṭisallānavasena senāsanaggāhotipi vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1375_14: tasmā utukālavasena senāsanaggāhopi “antarāmuttakavasena senāsanaggāho taṅkhaṇapaṭisallānavasena senāsanaggāhoti dubbidho”ti na vattabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1376_0: Athāpi vadanti “yathāvuttesu pañcasu senāsanaggāhesu cattāro senāsanaggāhā pañcaṅgasamannāgatena senāsanaggāhāpakasammutiladdhena
tika-vin08t0:1376_1: bhikkhunā antoupacārasīmaṭṭhena hutvā antosīmaṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yathāvinayaṃ vicāretabbā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1376_2: te pana vicāraṇā yāvajjakālā thāvarā hutvā na tiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1376_3: dhuvavāsavasena vicāraṇameva yāvajjakālā thāvaraṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1376_4: tampi tathā na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1376_6: Dhuvavāsavasena vicāraṇañca sammutiladdhena senāsanaggāhāpakena vicāretabbaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1376_7: atha kho samaggena saṅghena apalokanakammavasena duvaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhussa anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā dānameva,
tika-vin08t0:1376_8: tasmā samaggo saṅgho bahūpakāratāguṇavisiṭṭhatāsaṅkhātehi dvīhi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ apalokanakammavasena
tika-vin08t0:1376_9: sammannitvā tassa phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ dhuvavāsavasena anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā deti,
tika-vin08t0:1376_10: taṃ yāvajjakālā thāvaraṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatīti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1377_1: na senāsanaggāhāpakoti ayamattho kathaṃ ñātabboti ce?
tika-vin08t0:1377_2: “Saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharādīnaṃ vā gaṇavācakaācariyassa vā bahūpakārataṃ
tika-vin08t0:1377_3: guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhento dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sammannitvā detī”ti “saṅgho pana bahussutassa
tika-vin08t0:1377_4: uddesaparipucchādīhi bahūpakārassa bhāranitthārakassa phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā detī”ti ca
tika-vin08t0:1377_5: “saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharagaṇavācakācariyānaṃ vā bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca
tika-vin08t0:1377_6: sallakkhetvā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sallakkhetvā sammannitvā detī”ti ca “bahussutassa saṅghabhāranitthārakassa
tika-vin08t0:1377_7: bhikkhuno anuṭṭhāpanīyasenāsanampī”ti ca “apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakaṃ saṅghaṃ sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1377_8: chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā kattabbaṃ kamma”nti ca aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-vin08t0:1378_1: “Bahussutassa saṅghabhāranitthārakassa bhikkhuno anuṭṭhāpanīyasenāsanampi saṅghakiccaṃ karontānaṃ kappiyakārakādīnaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1378_2: bhattavetanampi apalokanakammena dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ kammavagge āgatattā viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1378_3: Kathaṃ pana duvaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhunoyeva dātabbabhāvo viññāyatīti?
tika-vin08t0:1378_7: guṇavisiṭṭhattepi bahūpakārattābhāve dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassetī”ti vinayatthamañjūsāyaṃ vuttattā viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1379_0: Kasmā pana senāsanaggāhāpakena vicāretabbo senāsanaggāho yāvajjakālā na tiṭṭhatīti?
tika-vin08t0:1379_2: nānādesavāsīnaṃ nānācariyakulasambhavānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekasambhogaparibhogassa dukkarattā ca imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi na tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin08t0:1379_11: Aṭṭhakathāyampi “evarūpena hi sabhāgapuggalena ekavihāre vā ekapariveṇe vā vasantena attho natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1379_12: Kasmā pana dhuvavāsatthāya dānavicāro yāvajjakālā tiṭṭhatīti?
tika-vin08t0:1379_13: Pañcaṅgasamannāgatābhāvepi sīmaṭṭhakassa samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā kattabbattā.
tika-vin08t0:1379_14: Vuttañhi “apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakaṃ saṅghaṃ sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa
tika-vin08t0:1379_15: saṅghassa anumatiyā tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā kattabbaṃ kamma”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1380_0: Utukāle saṅghikasenāsane vasantena āgato bhikkhu na paṭibāhetabbo aññatra anuṭṭhāpanīyā.
tika-vin08t0:1380_10: Tattha vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu tasmiṃ vihāre antosīmaṭṭhakabhikkhūsu attanā vuḍḍhatarassa aññassa abhāvā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ kenaci anuṭṭhāpanīyo.
tika-vin08t0:1380_11: Bhaṇḍāgāriko saṅghena sammannitvā bhaṇḍāgārassa dinnatāya saṅghassa bhaṇḍaṃ rakkhanto gopento vasati,
tika-vin08t0:1380_13: Gilāno gelaññābhibhūto attano laddhasenāsane vasanto kenaci anuṭṭhāpanīyo.
tika-vin08t0:1380_14: Saṅghato laddhasenāsano samaggena saṅghena dinnasenāsanattā kenaci anuṭṭhāpanīyo.
tika-vin08t0:1380_15: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “cattāro hi na vuṭṭhāpetabbā vuḍḍhataro,
tika-vin08t0:1380_18: Tattha vuḍḍhataro attano vuḍḍhatāya navakatarena na vuṭṭhāpetabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1380_21: saṅgho pana bahussutassa uddesaparipucchādīhi bahūpakārassa bhāranitthārakassa phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā deti,
tika-vin08t0:1380_22: tasmā so upakārakatāya ca saṅghato laddhatāya ca na vuṭṭhāpetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1380_23: Ṭhapetvā ime cattāro avasesā vuṭṭhāpanīyāva honti.
tika-vin08t0:1381_0: Aparasmiṃ bhikkhumhi āgate vuṭṭhāpetvā senāsanaṃ dāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1381_1: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “utukāle tāva keci āgantukā bhikkhū purebhattaṃ āgacchanti,
tika-vin08t0:1381_2: keci pacchābhattaṃ paṭhamayāmaṃ vā majjhimayāmaṃ vā pacchimayāmaṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:1381_4: tesaṃ tadāva bhikkhū uṭṭhāpetvā senāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1381_6: Etarahi pana saddhā pasannā manussā vihāraṃ katvā appekacce paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti
tika-vin08t0:1381_7: ñatvā cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ ārabbha “imaṃ vihāraṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa demā”ti vatvā denti,
tika-vin08t0:1381_8: appekacce attanā pasannaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha vihāraṃ katvāpi dānakāle tena uyyojitā hutvā cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ ārabbha vuttanayena denti,
tika-vin08t0:1381_9: appekacce karaṇakālepi dānakālepi attano kulūpakabhikkhumeva ārabbha pariccajanti,
tika-vin08t0:1381_10: tathāpi dakkhiṇodakapātanakāle tena sikkhāpitā yathāvuttapāṭhaṃ vacībhedaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1382_0: Imesu tīsu dānesu paṭhamaṃ pubbakālepi dānakālepi saṅghaṃ uddissa pavattattā sabbasaṅghikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1382_1: Dutiyaṃ pubbakāle puggalaṃ uddissa pavattamānampi dānakāle saṅghaṃ uddissa pavattattā saṅghikameva.
tika-vin08t0:1382_2: Tatiyaṃ pana pubbakālepi dānakālepi kulūpakapuggalameva uddissa pavattati,
tika-vin08t0:1382_5: Evaṃ sante “kiṃ ayaṃ vihāro cittavasena puggaliko hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1382_6: vacībhedavasena saṅghiko”ti cintāyaṃ ekacce evaṃ vadeyyuṃ –
tika-vin08t0:1384_0: Manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
tika-vin08t0:1386_2: tathā paṭipajjitabbanti vacanato vacībhedavasena saṅghiko hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1387_1: idaṃ dānaṃ pubbe puggalassa pariṇataṃ pacchā saṅghassa pariṇāmitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1387_2: tasmā “saṅghiko”ti vutte navasu adhammikadānesu “puggalassa pariṇataṃ saṅghassa pariṇāmetī”ti vuttaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ adhammikadānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1387_3: tassa dānassa paṭiggahāpi paribhogāpi adhammikapaṭiggahā adhammikaparibhogā honti.
tika-vin08t0:1387_4: “Puggaliko”ti vutte tīsu dhammikadānesu “puggalassa dinnaṃ puggalasseva detī”ti vuttaṃ tatiyadhammikadānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1387_5: tassa paṭiggahāpi paribhogāpi dhammikapaṭiggahā dhammikaparibhogā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1387_7: Appekacce suttantikādigaṇe pasīditvā vihāraṃ kāretvā gaṇassa denti “imaṃ vihāraṃ āyasmantānaṃ dammī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1387_8: Appekacce puggale pasīditvā vihāraṃ katvā puggalassa denti “imaṃ vihāraṃ āyasmato dammī”ti.
