tika-vin08t0:1387_9: Ete pana gaṇasantakapuggalikā vihārā dānakālato paṭṭhāya paṭiggāhakasantakāva honti,
tika-vin08t0:1387_11: Tesu gaṇasantako tāva ekaccesu matesu avasesānaṃ santako,
tika-vin08t0:1387_14: Kassaci adatvā sabbesu matesu saṅghiko hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1388_0: Puggalikavihāropi yadi so paṭiggāhakapuggalo attano jīvamānakāleyeva saddhivihārikādīnaṃ deti,
tika-vin08t0:1388_1: koci vā tassa vissāsena taṃ vihāraṃ aggahesi,
tika-vin08t0:1388_4: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “so jīvamānoyeva sabbaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ nissajjitvā kassaci adāsi,
tika-vin08t0:1388_19: taṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgika”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1389_0: Saṅghike pana pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ “purimako pacchimako antarāmuttako cā”ti vuttānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ senāsanaggāhānañca
tika-vin08t0:1389_1: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatānaṃ “utukāle ca vassāvāse cā”ti vuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ senāsanaggāhānañca etarahi asampajjanato
tika-vin08t0:1389_2: anuṭṭhāpanīyapāḷiyaṃ āgatassa attano sabhāvena anuṭṭhāpanīyassa dhuvavāsatthāya saṅghena dinnatāya anuṭṭhāpanīyassa
tika-vin08t0:1389_4: Vuḍḍhataragilānā hi attano sabhāvena anuṭṭhāpanīyā honti.
tika-vin08t0:1389_5: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vuḍḍhataro attano vuḍḍhatāya navakatarena na vuṭṭhāpetabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1389_7: Bhaṇḍāgārikadhammakathikādayo dhuvavāsatthāya saṅghena dinnatāya anuṭṭhāpanīyā honti.
tika-vin08t0:1389_8: Vuttañhi “saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharādīnaṃ vā…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1389_13: etarahi saṅghikavihāresu saṅghattheresu yathākammaṅgatesu tasmiṃ vihāre yo bhikkhu vuḍḍhataro,
tika-vin08t0:1389_21: Evaṃdvidhā vā tidhā vā catudhā vā bhinnesu mahantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1390_2: kenaci pariyāyena vuḍḍhatarassa āsanaṃ paṭibāhitabbanti vadāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1390_5: “vuḍḍhataro attano vuḍḍhatāya navakatarena na vuṭṭhāpetabbo”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanañca gahetvā “ahameva ettha vuḍḍhataro,
tika-vin08t0:1390_7: tasmā ahameva imasmiṃ vihāre vasitumanucchaviko”ti saññī hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1390_11: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena dasavassena vā atirekadasavassena vā upasampādetuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1390_12: nissayaṃ dātu”ntiādipāḷivacanañca gahetvā “ahameva ettha byatto paṭibalo,
tika-vin08t0:1390_14: tasmā ahameva imassa vihārassa anucchaviko”ti saññī.
tika-vin08t0:1390_17: mayā ca bahuṃ dhanaṃ cajitvā ayaṃ vihāro kārito,
tika-vin08t0:1390_20: Saṅghopi “saṅghiko nāma vihāro saṅghassa dinno hoti pariccatto”tiādipāḷivacanañca,
tika-vin08t0:1390_21: antamaso caturaṅgulapādakaṃ gāmadārakehi paṃsvāgārakesu kīḷantehi katampi saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t0:1390_22: garubhaṇḍaṃ hotī”tiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanañca gahetvā “ayaṃ vihāro saṅghiko saṅghasantako,
tika-vin08t0:1391_1: bhikkhave”tyādivacanaṃ tesu tesu āsanasālādīsu aggāsanassa vuḍḍhatarārahattā bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā nisinnopi
tika-vin08t0:1391_2: bhikkhu vuḍḍhatare āgate vuṭṭhāya āsanaṃ dātabbaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1391_4: “Vuḍḍhataro attano vuḍḍhatāya”tyādivacanañca yathāvuḍḍhaṃ senāsane dīyamāne vuḍḍhatare āgate navakataro vuṭṭhāpetabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1391_6: vuḍḍhataro pana navakatarena na vuṭṭhāpetabbo. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1391_7: “Attano vuḍḍhataratāyā”ti utukāle yathāvuḍḍhaṃ senāsanadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1392_0: Byattavacanepi “bahussutassa saṅghabhāranitthārakassa”tyādivacanañca na bahussutamattena saṅghikavihārassa issarabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1392_1: atha kho tassa bhikkhussa bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhetvā saṅghena phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1392_2: katvā dinne so bhikkhu kenaci tamhā vihārā anuṭṭhāpanīyo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1392_5: bhikkhave”tyādivacanañca nissayācariyānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pakāsetuṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1393_2: Yathā hi puthujjanakāle rūpādīsu sañjanassa bhūtapubbattā bhūtapubbagatiyā arahāpi “satto”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1393_3: evaṃ dānakālato pubbe tassa vihārassa sāmibhūtapubbattā dāyako “vihārasāmiko”ti vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:1393_5: Na hi sakale vinayapiṭake aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ca “vissajjetvā dinnassa vihārassa dāyako issaro”ti vā “dāyakena
tika-vin08t0:1394_0: Saṅghassa vacanepi “saṅghiko nāma vihāro”tyādivacanaṃ saṅghasantakabhāvaṃ saṅghena vicāretabbabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin08t0:1394_1: saṅgho pana vicārento pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ senāsanaggāhāpakaṃ sammannitvā tena yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vicāretabbo vā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1394_2: samaggena saṅghena duvaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhuno apalokanakammena dhuvavāsatthāya dātabbo vā.
tika-vin08t0:1394_3: Tesu pañcaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhuno dullabhattā senāsanaggāhāpakasammutiyā abhāve sati duvaṅgasamannāgato bhikkhu pariyesitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1394_4: Evaṃ pana apariyesitvā bhaṇḍāgārikatādibahaūpakāratāyuttassa bahussutatādiguṇavisiṭṭhatāvirahassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin08t0:1394_5: āmisagarukatādivasena saṅghena vihāro dātabbo na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1395_1: Tattha saṅghassa issarattā saṅgho pucchitabbo “ko puggalo tumhehi abhirucito”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1395_2: pucchitvā “eso”ti vutte “kasmā abhirucito”ti pucchitvā “eso puggalo amhe cīvarādipaccayehi anuggahetā,
tika-vin08t0:1395_10: tasmā amhehi abhirucito”ti vutte “na ettāvatā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāro dātabbo”ti paṭikkhipitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1395_11: Atha “eso puggalo sabbehi amhehi vuḍḍhataro aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ arahati,
tika-vin08t0:1395_12: dhuvavāsatthāya vihāro pana tassa dātabboti aṭṭhakathācariyehi na vutto”ti vatvā paṭikkhipitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1395_18: “Saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharādīnaṃ vā gaṇavācakaācariyassa vā bahūpakārataṃ
tika-vin08t0:1395_19: guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhento dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sammannitvā detī”ti vacanato viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1396_0: Idha pana sādhakapāṭhe “bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā”ti vijjamāne kasmā sādhyavacane bhaṇḍāgāriko na vuttoti?
tika-vin08t0:1396_3: so bhaṇḍāgāravihāre nisinno saṅghassa pattacīvararakkhaṇādikaṃ upakāraṃ kareyya,
tika-vin08t0:1396_4: tassa bahūpakārataṃ sallakkhento saṅgho bhaṇḍāgārikassa phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ etarahipi dhuvavāsatthāya dadeyya,
tika-vin08t0:1396_6: Ettha sādhakapāṭhe “dhammakathikavinayadharādīnaṃ vā”tiādisaddena bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo
tika-vin08t0:1396_7: mātikādharo paṇḍito byatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmoti vuttaguṇavante saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:1396_8: Athāpi “eso puggalo bahussuto uddesaparipucchādīhi bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakāro saṅghabhāranitthārako”ti vadati,
tika-vin08t0:1396_10: anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāro etassapi dātabbo”ti vatvā anumoditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1396_12: “Saṅgho pana bahussutassa uddesaparipucchādīhi bahūpakārassa bhāranitthārakassa phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā detī”ti vacanato viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1397_0: Athāpi “ayaṃ puggalo dhammakathiko vinayadharo gaṇavācakācariyo saṅghassa bahūpakāro visiṭṭhaguṇayutto”ti vadati,
tika-vin08t0:1397_1: “sādhu etassapi puggalassa dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sallakkhetvā sammannitvāva dātabbo”ti vatvā anumoditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1397_3: “Saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharādīnaṃ vā gaṇavācakācariyassa vā bahūpakārataṃ
tika-vin08t0:1397_4: guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhetvā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sammannitvā detī”ti vacanato viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1398_1: “sādhu etassapi anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā dātabbo”ti vatvā anumoditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1398_3: “Bahussutassa saṅghabhāranitthārakassa bhikkhuno anuṭṭhāpanīyasenāsanampī”ti parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1398_4: Tato “evaṃ duvaṅgasampanno puggalo antosīmaṭṭho vā bahisīmaṭṭho vā”ti pucchitvā “antosīmaṭṭho”ti vutte
tika-vin08t0:1399_0: Atha “duvaṅgasamannāgate antosīmaṭṭhe asati ekaṅgasamannāgato antosīmaṭṭho atthī”ti pucchitvā “atthī”ti
tika-vin08t0:1399_3: “Bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhentoti bhaṇḍāgārikassa bahūpakārataṃ dhammakathikādīnaṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca
tika-vin08t0:1399_6: bahisīmaṭṭhova atthī”ti vutte “āgantvā antosīme ṭhitassa dātabbo”ti vattabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1399_8: “Asampattānampi upacārasīmaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ antevāsikādīsu gaṇhantesu dātabbamevā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1400_0: Sace pana ekaṅgayuttabhāvena vā duvaṅgayuttabhāvena vā samānā dve tayo bhikkhū antosīmāyaṃ vijjamānā bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1400_8: Sace pana antosīmāyaṃ ekaṅgayutto vā duvaṅgayutto vā bhikkhu natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1400_11: Yo taṃ vihāraṃ āgacchati āgantuko bhikkhu,
tika-vin08t0:1400_12: so ce lajjī hoti pesalo bahussuto sikkhākāmo,
tika-vin08t0:1400_13: so tehi āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi aññattha agamanatthaṃ saṅgahaṃ katvā so āvāso dātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1401_3: aññatarasmiṃ āvāse sambahulā bhikkhū viharanti bālā abyattā,
tika-vin08t0:1401_4: te na jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā.
tika-vin08t0:1401_5: Tattha añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito byatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo, tehi,
tika-vin08t0:1401_7: bhikkhūhi so bhikkhu saṅgahetabbo anuggahetabbo upalāpetabbo upaṭṭhāpetabbo cuṇṇena mattikāya dantakaṭṭhena mukhodakena.
tika-vin08t0:1401_8: No ce saṅgaṇheyyuṃ anuggaṇheyyuṃ upalāpeyyuṃ upaṭṭhāpeyyuṃ cuṇṇena mattikāya dantakaṭṭhena mukhodakena,
tika-vin08t0:1401_16: Atha vā catūhi paccayehi saṅgahetabbo ceva anuggahetabbo ca,
tika-vin08t0:1401_20: Āpatti dukkaṭassāti sace sakalopi saṅgho na karoti,
tika-vin08t0:1401_26: Tena pana mahātherānaṃ pariveṇasammajjanadantakaṭṭhadānādīni na sāditabbāni.
tika-vin08t0:1401_27: Evampi sati mahātherehi sāyaṃpātaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1401_28: Tena pana tesaṃ āgamanaṃ ñatvā paṭhamataraṃ mahātherānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1401_33: tasmiṃyeva pana vihāre eko vā dve vā vattasampannā vadanti ‘mayhaṃ therassa kattabbaṃ karissāma,
tika-vin08t0:1401_36: Evaṃ tādisaṃ bahisīmato antosīmamāgataṃ lajjīpesalabahussutasikkhākāmabhūtaṃ bhikkhuṃ antosīmāya dhuvanivāsatthāya
tika-vin08t0:1401_37: phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā dātabboti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1402_5: atha kasmā nissīmato āgatassa dhuvavāsatthāya vihāro dātabboti? Vuccate –
tika-vin08t0:1402_7: tasmā nissīme ṭhitaṃyeva senāsanaṃ na gāhetabbanti attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1402_8: na nissīme ṭhitassa tassa bhikkhussa antosīmaṃ paviṭṭhassapi senāsanaṃ na gāhetabbanti attho,
tika-vin08t0:1402_9: tasmā pubbe bahisīmāyaṃ ṭhitepi idāni antosīmaṃ paviṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya catupaccayabhāgo labbhati.
tika-vin08t0:1402_10: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “asukavihāre kira bahuṃ cīvaraṃ uppannanti sutvā yojanantarikavihāratopi bhikkhū āgacchanti,
tika-vin08t0:1402_12: Antosīmaṭṭhesu pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ asakkontesu yattha pātimokkhuddesako atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1402_14: Antovassepi pātimokkhuddesakena vinā vassaṃ vasituṃ na labhati.
tika-vin08t0:1402_17: tasmā bahisīmato āgatopi lajjīpesalabahussutasikkhākāmabhikkhu saṅgahetabbo hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1403_2: aññatarasmiṃ āvāse tadahuposathe sambahulā bhikkhū viharanti bālā abyattā,
tika-vin08t0:1403_3: te na jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā. Tehi,
tika-vin08t0:1403_5: bhikkhūhi eko bhikkhu sāmantā āvāsā sajjukaṃ pāhetabbo ‘gacchāvuso saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā pātimokkhaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā āgacchā’ti.
tika-vin08t0:1403_10: bhikkhūhi sabbeheva yattha jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:1403_16: aññatarasmiṃ āvāse sambahulā bhikkhū vassaṃ vasanti bālā abyattā,
tika-vin08t0:1403_17: te na jānanti uposathaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā pātimokkhaṃ vā pātimokkhuddesaṃ vā. Tehi,
tika-vin08t0:1403_19: bhikkhūhi eko bhikkhu sāmantā āvāsā sajjukaṃ pāhetabbo ‘gacchāvuso saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā pātimokkhaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā āgacchā’ti.
tika-vin08t0:1403_23: eko bhikkhu sattāhakālikaṃ pāhetabbo ‘gacchāvuso saṃkhittena vā vitthārena vā pātimokkhaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā āgacchā’ti.
tika-vin08t0:1403_28: tehi bhikkhūhi tasmiṃ āvāse vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1404_0: Evaṃ bahisīmato āgatassapi saṅghassa upakāraṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa visiṭṭhaguṇayuttassa dātabbabhāvo viññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:1404_3: amhākaṃ sandiṭṭhasambhatto na hotī”tiādīni vatvā na paṭikkhipitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1404_7: Tathā hi ukkhittānuvattakānaṃ laddhinānāsaṃvāsakānampi laddhivissajjanena tividhaukkhepanīyakammakatānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1404_8: kammanānāsaṃvāsakānampi osāraṇaṃ katvā sāmaggikaraṇena saṃvāso bhagavatā anuññāto.
tika-vin08t0:1404_9: Alajjiṃ pana bahussutampi saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1404_14: So hi pakkhaṃ labhitvā saṅghampi bhindeyya.
tika-vin08t0:1404_16: sakalasaṅghārāmato nikkaḍḍhituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1405_0: Vuḍḍhāpacāyanādisāmaggirasarahitaṃ visabhāgapuggalampi saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin08t0:1405_1: Vuttañhi “evarūpena hi visabhāgapuggalena ekavihāre vā ekapariveṇe vā vasantena attho natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1405_3: tasmā āvāsiko vā hotu āgantuko vā,
tika-vin08t0:1409_0: Ayaṃ antosīmaṭṭhena saṅghena bahūpakāratāguṇavisiṭṭhatāsaṅkhātehi guṇehi yuttassa saṅghabhāranitthārakassa
tika-vin08t0:1409_1: bhikkhuno phāsukaṃ āvāsaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā dāne vinicchayo.
tika-vin08t0:1410_0: Yadā pana saṅghatthero jarādubbalatāya vā rogapīḷitatāya vā vivekajjhāsayatāya vā gaṇaṃ apariharitukāmo aññassa dātukāmo,
tika-vin08t0:1410_1: attano accayena vā kalahavivādābhāvamicchanto saddhivihārikādīnaṃ niyyātetukāmo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1410_4: tasmā saṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ācikkhitvā bahūpakāratāguṇavisiṭṭhatāyuttapuggalo vicināpetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1410_5: Tato saṅgho cattāri agatigamanāni anupagantvā bhagavato ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ lajjīpesalabahussutasikkhākāmabhūtaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1410_6: puggalaṃ vicinitvā “ayaṃ bhikkhu imassa vihārassa anucchaviko”ti āroceti.
tika-vin08t0:1410_10: attano bhārabhūtaṃ vuttappakāraaṅgaviyuttaṃ puggalaṃ dātukāmo hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1410_11: Evaṃ sante saṅgho chandādiagatiṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1411_0: Sace pana saṅgho yaṃ kañci āmisaṃ labhitvā yathāvuttaguṇaviyuttassa bhikkhuno dātukāmo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1411_1: puggalo pana bhagavato ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vuttappakāraaṅgayuttabhūtasseva bhikkhussa dātukāmo,
tika-vin08t0:1411_2: tadā puggalopi saṅghapariyāpannoyevāti katvā dhammakammakārakassa puggalasseva anumatiyā vihāro dātabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1411_4: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace saṅgho kiñci labhitvā āmisagarukatāya na nivāreti,
tika-vin08t0:1411_7: Saṅghikesu hi kammesu yo dhammakammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin08t0:1420_0: Yadā pana theropi kiñci avatvā yathākammaṅgato,
tika-vin08t0:1420_2: evaṃ saṅghikavihāre abhikkhuke suññe vattamāne tasmiṃ dese yena kenaci sāsanassa vuddhimicchantena ācariyena
tika-vin08t0:1420_3: antosīmaṭṭhakā bhikkhū evaṃ samussāhetabbā “mā tumhe āyasmanto evaṃ akattha,
tika-vin08t0:1420_5: vicinitvā labhantā tassa puggalassa samaggena saṅghena dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā detha,
tika-vin08t0:1420_8: Bahisīmaṭṭhakesu bhikkhūsu vicinitvā yathāvuttaaṅgayuttapuggale labbhamāne taṃ puggalaṃ antosīmaṃ pavesetvā
tika-vin08t0:1420_9: antosīmaṭṭhakassa saṅghassa anumatiyā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sammannitvā anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ katvā detha.
tika-vin08t0:1420_10: Evaṃ karontā hi tumhe āyasmanto appicchakathā-
tika-vin08t0:1420_23: Yassa lajjino pesalassa bahussutassa sikkhākāmassa bhikkhuno bhikkhaṃ anusikkhamānā saddhāya vaḍḍhissanti,
tika-vin08t0:1420_40: Evaṃ samussāhetvā dhammakathaṃ katvā antosīmaṭṭhakasaṅgheneva dhuvavāsavihāro dāpetabboti.
tika-vin08t0:1426_1: Evaṃ catupaccayabhājanavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni kathinavinicchayaṃ kathetumāha “kathinanti ettha panā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1426_4: Na hi paramatthato kathinaṃ nāma eko dhammo atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1426_8: dhammena samena uppannacīvarantiādīsu yesu nāmarūpesu samuppajjamānesu tesaṃ nāmarūpadhammānaṃ samūhasamavāyasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1426_11: “Tesaññeva dhammānaṃ saṅgaho samavāyo nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpo,
tika-vin08t0:1426_13: “tesaññeva dhammānanti yesu rūpādidhammesu sati kathinaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1426_15: Nāmaṃ nāmakammantiādinā pana ‘kathina’nti idaṃ bahūsu dhammesu nāmamattaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1426_16: na paramatthato eko dhammo atthīti dassetī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattā ca,
tika-vin08t0:1426_20: dhammena samena samuppannaṃ cīvaranti evamādīsu yesu rūpārūpadhammesu.
tika-vin08t0:1426_23: Tenāha na paramatthato eko dhammo atthīti dassetī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ āgatattā ca jānitabboti.
tika-vin08t0:1427_9: Pañcānisaṃse aññattha gantuṃ adatvā saṅgaṇhāti saṅkhipitvā gaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:1427_10: Vuttañhi vinayatthamañjūsāyaṃ “pañcānisaṃse aññattha gantuṃ adatvā saṅgaṇhanaṭṭhena kathina”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1428_1: saddo kāya dhātuyā kena paccayena sijjhatīti?
tika-vin08t0:1428_3: tasmā ayaṃ saddo ruḷhīsuddhanāmabhūto anipphannapāṭipadikasaddoti vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:1428_6: Pañcānisaṃse antokaraṇasamatthatāyāti pana thiratā cassa hetupadameva.
tika-vin08t0:1428_9: Katha saṅgahaṇetimassa laddhadhātusaññādissa pañcānisaṃse aññattha gantuṃ adatvā saṅgaṇhātīti atthe “ina
tika-vin08t0:1428_10: sabbatthā”ti yogavibhāgena vā “supato cā”ti ettha ca-
tika-vin08t0:1428_11: saddena vā inapaccayaṃ katvā parakkharaṃ netvā kathinasaddato syuppattādimhi kate rūpaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1428_14: Atha vā kaṭha kicchajīvaneti dhātuto inapaccayaṃ katvā sijjhati.
tika-vin08t0:1429_0: Bahū pana paṇḍitā imaṃ pāṭhaṃyeva gahetvā “kathina-
tika-vin08t0:1429_2: na dantajo”ti vadanti ceva likhanti ca,
tika-vin08t0:1429_4: Abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkāyaṃ kakkhaḷapariyāyaṃ guṇasaddabhūtaṃ kaṭhinasaddaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1429_7: Anekesu pana pāḷiaṭṭhakathādipotthakesu jinasāsanavohārato nāmasaddabhūto kathina-
tika-vin08t0:1429_9: teneva ca kāraṇena abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkāyampi vaṇṇavipariyāye kathinantipi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1429_10: Atha vā kattha silāghāyanti dhātuto inapaccayaṃ katvā sasaṃyogatthakāraṃ nisaṃyogaṃ katvā sijjhati.
tika-vin08t0:1429_13: Idañca vacanaṃ “idañhi kathinavattaṃ nāma buddhappasattha”nti aṭṭhakathāvacanena sameti.
tika-vin08t0:1429_14: Ācariyā pana “kaṭhadhātu inapaccayo”ti vikappetvā “kaṭha samatthane”ti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1429_15: taṃ ṭīkāsu “thiranti attho”ti vacanaṃ anapekkhitvā “pañcānisaṃse antokaraṇasamatthatāyā”ti hetumeva atthabhāvena gahetvā vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-vin08t0:1433_2: Atha vā pañcānisaṃse aññattha gantuṃ adatvā kathati saṅgaṇhātīti kathinaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1433_4: Atha vā kaṭhati kicchena jīvatīti kathino, rukkho,
tika-vin08t0:1433_11: Ayaṃ nayo “kaṭha kicchajīvane”ti dhātvatthasaṃvaṇṇanāya ca “pañcānisaṃse antokaraṇasamatthatāya thiranti attho”ti ṭīkāvacanena ca sametīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1433_12: Atha vā kathīyate silāghate pasaṃsīyate buddhādīhīti kathinaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1433_13: ayaṃ nayo “kattha silāghāya”nti dhātvatthasaṃvaṇṇanāya ca “idañhi kathinavattaṃ nāma buddhappasattha”nti aṭṭhakathāvacanena ca sametīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1434_0: Ettha pana saṅkheparucittā ācariyassa saddalakkhaṇaṃ avicāretvā atthameva pucchaṃ katvā vissajjetuṃ “kathinaṃ attharituṃ ke labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1434_2: Tattha ke labhantīti ke sādhentīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1434_3: Pañca janā labhantīti pañca janā sādhenti.
tika-vin08t0:1434_4: Kathinadussassa hi dāyakā pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro honti,
tika-vin08t0:1434_7: yvāyaṃ catuvaggo bhikkhusaṅgho ṭhapetvā tīṇi kammāni upasampadaṃ pavāraṇaṃ abbhāna”nti campeyyakkhandhake
tika-vin08t0:1434_9: Paṭhamappavāraṇāya pavāritāti idaṃ vassacchedaṃ akatvā vassaṃvutthabhāvasandassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ antarāyena
tika-vin08t0:1434_11: Teneva “appavāritā vā”ti avatvā “chinnavassā vā pacchimikāya upagatā vā na labhantī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1434_12: Aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi na labhantīti nānāsīmāya aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassā imasmiṃ vihāre kathinatthāraṃ na labhantīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1434_16: Ekaṃ atthatacīvaraṃyeva hi kathinacīvaraṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1434_17: avasesāni cīvarāni vā sāṭakā vā kathinānisaṃsāyeva nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1435_2: ānisaṃsañca labhatīti iminā sāmaṇerānaṃ vassūpagamanaṃ anuññātaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1435_3: So hi purimikāya vassūpagatattā ānisaṃsaṃ labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1435_5: Sace purimikāya upagatā kathinatthārakusalā na hontītiādinā “aṭṭhadhammakovido bhikkhu,
tika-vin08t0:1435_6: kathinatthāramarahatī”ti vinayavinicchaye āgatattā sayaṃ ce aṭṭhadhammakusalo,
tika-vin08t0:1435_9: evaṃ akatvā kathinaṃ attharituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1435_10: Kathinaṃ attharāpetvāti sakāritavacanena tehi bāhirato āgatattherehi sayaṃ kathinaṃ na attharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1435_11: sabbapubbakiccādikaṃ saṃvidahitvā te purimikāya vassūpagatā antosīmaṭṭhabhikkhūyeva attharāpetabbāti dasseti,
tika-vin08t0:1436_0: Kathinacīvaraṃ demāti dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ettha “saṅghassa kathinacīvaraṃ demā”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1436_1: Evañhi sati “idaṃ saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppanna”nti kammavācāya sameti.
tika-vin08t0:1436_2: Atha ca pana pubbe kataparicayattā “saṅghassā”ti avuttepi sampadānaṃ pākaṭanti katvā avuttaṃ siyāti.
tika-vin08t0:1436_3: Ettheke ācariyā vadanti “saṅghassāti avuttepi kāle dinnaṃ saṅghikaṃ hotī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1436_4: tatrevaṃ vattabbaṃ “na kāle dinnaṃ sabbaṃ saṅghikaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1436_7: puggalassa vā idaṃ tuyhaṃ dammītiādinā nayena dinnaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1436_8: etaṃ akālacīvaraṃ nāmā”ti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ āgatattā puggalikampi hotīti viññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:1436_9: tasmā parammukhāpi nāmaṃ vatvā sammukhāpi pādamūle ṭhapetvā dinnaṃ puggalikameva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1436_11: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “puggalassa detīti ‘imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī’ti evaṃ parammukhā vā,
tika-vin08t0:1436_13: tumhākaṃ dammī’ti evaṃ sammukhā vā detī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1436_14: Evaṃ puggalike sati taṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghassa bhājetabbaṃ hoti vā na hoti vāti?
tika-vin08t0:1436_15: So puggalo attano saddhivihārikaantevāsikabhūtassa saṅghassa vā aññassa sahadhammikasaṅghassa vā bhājetukāmo bhājeyya,
tika-vin08t0:1436_18: “Na hi puggalassa ādissa dinnaṃ kenaci bhājanīyaṃ hotī”ti ṭīkāsu āgamanato viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1436_19: Atheke ācariyā evaṃ vadanti “kathinassa ekaṃ mūlaṃ saṅghoti vuttattā puggalaṃ uddissa dinnepi saṅghāyattaṃ saṅghikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1436_21: senāsanassa dammī’ti vuttepi taṃ dānaṃ saṅghikaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1436_22: yathā ca ‘kathinacīvaraṃ dammī’ti vutte saṅghikaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1437_1: “kathinassa ekaṃ mūlaṃ saṅgho”ti vacanaṃ kathinassa mūlaṃ kathinassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1437_2: Yathā hi mūle vijjamāne rukkho tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin08t0:1437_8: tasmā saṅgho kathinassa mūlaṃ kathinassa kāraṇaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1437_10: Sabbantimena paricchedena catuvaggabhūtena saṅghena atthārārahassa bhikkhuno ñattidutiyakammavācāya kathinacīvare
tika-vin08t0:1437_11: dinneyeva tena cīvarena atthataṃ kathinaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1437_13: tasmā catuvaggasaṅghe alabbhamāne sahassakkhattuṃ “kathinaṃ dammī”ti vuttepi kathinaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1437_14: tasmā upacārasīmāya paricchinne vihāre eko vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā bhikkhū viharanti,
tika-vin08t0:1437_15: tattha kathinacīvare uppanne aññato pariyesitvā catuvaggasaṅgho eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pūraṇe sati kathinaṃ attharituṃ labhati, nāsati,
tika-vin08t0:1437_16: evaṃ saṅghe vijjamāneyeva kathinaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1437_18: tasmā saṅghassa kathinassa mūlabhūtataṃ kāraṇabhūtataṃ sandhāya “kathinassa ekaṃ mūlaṃ saṅgho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1437_20: no puggalikanti adhippāyo etasmiṃ pāṭhe na labbhati.
tika-vin08t0:1437_21: Yathā kiṃ “kiccādhikaraṇassa ekaṃ mūlaṃ saṅgho”ti ettha apalokanakammañattikammañattidutiyakammañatticatutthakammasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1437_24: tasmā saṅghassa kiccādhikaraṇassa mūlabhūtataṃ kāraṇabhūtataṃ sandhāya “kiccādhikaraṇassa ekaṃ mūlaṃ saṅgho”ti vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:1438_1: senāsanassa dammī’tiādīsu taṃ dānaṃ saṅghāyattameva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1438_2: tathā ‘kathina dammī’ti vutte puggalaṃ uddissa dinnepi saṅghāyattameva saṅghikameva hotī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1438_5: senāsanassa dammī”tiādīsu sīmā ca senāsanañca dānapaṭiggāhakā na honti,
tika-vin08t0:1438_6: tasmā sīmaṭṭhassa ca senāsanaṭṭhassa ca saṅghassa āyattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1438_8: tasmā “imaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dammī”ti parammukhā vā tassa bhikkhuno pādamūle ṭhapetvā
tika-vin08t0:1438_9: sammukhā vā dinnaṃ kathaṃ saṅghāyattaṃ saṅghasantakaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1438_10: evaṃ saṅghassa apariṇataṃ puggalikacīvaraṃ saṅghassa pariṇāmeyya,
tika-vin08t0:1438_12: tassa cīvarassa paṭiggahopi navasu adhammikapaṭiggahesu eko bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1438_13: tassa cīvarassa paribhogopi navasu adhammikaparibhogesu eko bhaveyya.
tika-vin08t0:1438_15: Nava adhammikāni dānānīti saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin08t0:1438_16: cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin08t0:1438_17: puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin08t0:1438_18: “nava adhammikā paribhogā”ti āgataṃ parivārapāḷiñca “nava paṭiggahaparibhogāti etesaṃyeva dānānaṃ paṭiggahā
tika-vin08t0:1438_19: ca paribhogā cā”ti āgataṃ aṭṭhakathañca oloketvā viññāyatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1439_1: dāyako saṅghattherassa vā ganthadhutaṅgavasena abhiññātassa vā bhattuddesakassa vā pahiṇati “amhākaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1439_4: ime tayo janā pucchituṃ na labhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1439_6: saṅghato aṭṭha bhikkhū uddisāpetvā attanavamehi gantabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1439_7: Bhikkhusaṅghassa hi ete bhikkhū nissāya lābho uppajjatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1439_8: Ganthadhutaṅgādīhi pana anabhiññāto āvāsikabhikkhu pucchituṃ labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1439_11: tehi saddhiṃ āgacchāmī”ti mātikaṃ āropetvā yathā dāyakā vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1439_13: īdisesu ṭhānesu “saṅghassa lābho puggalaṃ upanissāya uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ upanidhāya “saṅghassa lābho puggalaṃ nissāya uppajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1439_14: puggalassa pattalābho saṅghaṃ āmasitvā dento saṅghāyatto hotī”ti viññāyatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1440_1: tasmiṃ tu nimantane na puggalaṃyeva nimanteti,
tika-vin08t0:1440_3: Tattha tu “saṅgha”nti avatvā “aṭṭha bhikkhū”ti vuttattā “kiṃ saṅghato gaṇhāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1440_5: tehi saddhiṃ āgacchāmī”ti anabhiññāto puggalo pucchituṃ labhati.
tika-vin08t0:1440_6: Saṅghattherassa pana saṅghaṃ pariharitvā vasitattā “aṭṭha bhikkhū”ti vutte saṅghaṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ gahaṇakāraṇaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1440_7: ganthadhutaṅgavasena abhiññātapuggalopi saṅghassa puññanissitattā “aṭṭha bhikkhū”ti vutte saṅghatoyeva gaṇhāti,
tika-vin08t0:1440_8: bhattuddesakassapi devasikaṃ saṅghasseva bhattavicāraṇattā “aṭṭha bhikkhū”ti vutte saṅghaṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ gahaṇakāraṇaṃ natthi.
tika-vin08t0:1440_9: Evaṃ “aṭṭha bhikkhū gahetvā āgacchathā”ti saha saṅghena nimantitattā “ime tayo janā pucchituṃ na labhantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1440_10: na “tvaṃ āgacchāhī”ti puggalasseva nimantane satipi saṅghaṃ gahetvā āgantabbatoti.
tika-vin08t0:1440_11: Evaṃ “aṭṭha bhikkhū gahetvā āgacchathā”ti sasaṅghasseva puggalassa nimantitattā saṅgho gahetabbo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1440_13: tasmā “puggalassa lābho saṅghāyatto”ti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1440_14: aṭṭhakathādīsu pakaraṇesupi “puggalaṃ nissāya saṅghassa lābho uppajjati” icceva vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1440_16: Cīvaralābhakhettabhūtāsu aṭṭhasu mātikāsu ca “saṅghassa detī”ti ca visuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1440_18: Puggalassa detīti “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti evaṃ parammukhā vā,
tika-vin08t0:1440_19: pādamūle ṭhapetvā “imaṃ bhante tumhākaṃ dammī”ti evaṃ sammukhā vā detīti.
tika-vin08t0:1441_0: Idāni pana cīvaraṃ dātukāmā upāsakā vā upāsikāyo vā sayaṃ anāgantvā puttadāsādayo āṇāpentāpi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin08t0:1441_1: itthannāmassa therassa dethā”ti vatvā puggalasseva dāpenti,
tika-vin08t0:1441_2: sāmaṃ gantvā dadantāpi pādamūle ṭhapetvā vā hatthe ṭhapetvā vā hatthena phusāpetvā vā dadanti “imaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1441_3: cīvaraṃ tumhe uddissa ettakaṃ dhanaṃ pariccajitvā kataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1441_5: tasmā tumhe nivāsatha pārupatha paribhuñjathā”tiādīni vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1441_9: Evaṃ puggalameva uddissa dinnacīvarassa saṅghena āyattakāraṇaṃ natthi.
tika-vin08t0:1441_10: “Sace pana ‘idaṃ tumhākañca tumhākaṃ antevāsikānañca dammī’ti evaṃ vadati,
tika-vin08t0:1441_11: therassa ca antevāsikānañca pāpuṇātī”ti āgamanato evaṃ vatvā dente pana ācariyantevāsikānaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:1441_13: “Uddesaṃ gahetuṃ āgato gahetvā gacchanto ca atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1441_14: tassapi pāpuṇātī”ti āgamanato bahisīmaṭṭhassa dhammantevāsikassapi pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin08t0:1441_15: “Tumhehi saddhiṃ nibaddhacārikabhikkhūnaṃ dammīti vutte uddesantevāsikānaṃ vattaṃ katvā uddesaparipucchādīni
tika-vin08t0:1441_16: gahetvā vicarantānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti āgamanato evaṃ vatvā dente dhammantevāsikānaṃ vattapaṭipattikārakānañca
tika-vin08t0:1441_18: Evaṃ dāyakānaṃ vacanānurūpameva dānassa pavattanato “yathā dāyakā vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1442_0: Evaṃ idāni dāyakā yebhuyyena puggalasseva denti,
tika-vin08t0:1442_1: satesu sahassesu ekoyeva paṇḍito bahussuto dāyako saṅghassa dadeyya,
tika-vin08t0:1442_2: puggalikacīvarañca saṅghikabhavanatthāya akariyamānaṃ na ñattiyā kammavācāya ca arahaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1442_6: Ñattiyā kammavācāya ca “idaṃ saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppanna”nti kathinacīvarassa saṅghikabhāvo vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1442_7: idāni pana taṃ cīvaraṃ “puggalassa dinnaṃ puggalika”nti vacanatthānurūpato puggalikaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1442_9: “Saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyya kathinaṃ attharitu”nti ettha ca saṅghoti dhātuyā kattā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1442_11: idha pana saṅghassa tasmiṃ kathinacīvare anissarabhāvato saṅgho kattā na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1442_14: Dāyakena pana saṅghassa pariccattattā saṅghikabhūtaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ yasmiṃ kāle saṅgho kathinaṃ attharituṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhuno deti,
tika-vin08t0:1442_15: tasmiṃ kāle ñattidutiyakammavācaṃ idāni manussā “ñattī”ti voharanti,
tika-vin08t0:1442_20: Ñattiladdhakālato pana paṭṭhāya taṃ cīvaraṃ puggalikaṃ hoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1443_0: Athāpi vadanti “dinnanti pāṭhañca ‘sādhentī’ti pāṭhañca ‘ānisaṃsaṃ labhantī’ti pāṭhañca upanidhāya ayamattho viññāyatī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1443_5: imassa kathinacīvarassa saṅghikattā saṅghena dinnaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1443_7: “Kathinatthāraṃ ke labhantīti ettha ke labhantīti ke sādhentīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1443_11: Ānisaṃsaṃ labhantīti ettha ca saṅghikattā sabbe sīmaṭṭhakabhikkhū ānisaṃsaṃ labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1444_1: pubbedāyakā cattāropi paccaye yebhuyyena saṅghasseva denti,
tika-vin08t0:1444_4: tasmā saṅghassa dinnaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ saṅghena atthārakassa puggalassa dinnaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1444_6: paṭiggāhako ekoti pañca janā kathinadānakammaṃ sādhentīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1444_7: Ānisaṃsaṃ labhantīti idañca atthārakassa ca anumodanānañca bhikkhūnaṃ ānisaṃsalābhameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1444_8: na etehi pāṭhehi “kathina”nti vutte saṅghikaṃ hotīti attho viññātabbo hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1444_9: Saṅghassa uppannacīvaraṃ saṅghena atthārakassa dinnabhāvo kathaṃ viññāyatīti?
tika-vin08t0:1444_11: saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno deti kathinaṃ attharitu”nti vuttaṃ pāḷipāṭhañca “saṅgho
tika-vin08t0:1444_13: ayaṃ nicayasannidhī”ti vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāṭhañca disvā viññāyatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1444_16: puggalo sampadānaṃ bhavituṃ arahabhāvo ca yathāvuttapāḷipāṭhameva upanidhāya viññāyatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1445_0: Evaṃ sante puggalassa dinnaṃ puggalikacīvaraṃ saṅghikaṃ kātuṃ kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti?
tika-vin08t0:1445_1: Sace so paṭiggāhakapuggalo dāyakānaṃ evaṃ vadati “upāsaka dānaṃ nāma puggalassa dinnato saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphalataraṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1445_3: saṅghassa datvā puna saṅghena atthārārahassa bhikkhuno kammavācāya datvā tena puggalena yathāvinayaṃ atthateyeva kathinaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1445_4: na puggalassa datvā puggalena sāmaṃyeva atthate,
tika-vin08t0:1445_5: tasmā saṅghassa dehī”ti uyyojetvā saṅghassa dāpitepi taṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghikaṃ hoti kathinatthārārahaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1445_9: evaṃ sati puggalikavaseneva sampaṭicchitvā tena puggalena taṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghassa dinnampi saṅghikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1446_0: Yadi evaṃ samaṇeneva samaṇassa dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ kathaṃ kathinatthārārahaṃ bhaveyyāti?
tika-vin08t0:1446_3: Yena kenaci devena vā manussena vā pañcannaṃ vā sahadhammikānaṃ aññatarena dinnaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1446_4: Atha kasmā paramparabhūtehi ācariyehi ñattiladdhacīvarato avasesāni cīvarāni saṅghassa bhājetvā eva paribhuñjitānīti? Vuccate –
tika-vin08t0:1446_6: keci bahūnaṃ kiriyaṃ disvā diṭṭhānugativasena paṭipajjanti,
tika-vin08t0:1446_7: bahussutāpi keci therā aruccantāpi paveṇibhedabhayena paṭipajjanti,
tika-vin08t0:1446_8: apare rucivasena atthañca adhippāyañca pariṇāmetvā gaṇhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1446_9: pakaraṇamevānugatabhikkhū pana yathāpakaraṇāgatameva atthaṃ gahetvā saṅghikañca puggalikañca amissaṃ katvā,
tika-vin08t0:1446_17: Bhagavato hi dharamānakāle vā tato pacchā vā pubbe dāyakā yebhuyyena cattāro paccaye saṅghasseva denti,
tika-vin08t0:1446_18: tasmā saṅghikasenāsanassa saṅghikacīvarassa ca bāhullato pubbācariyā saṅghassa bhājetvā eva paribhuñjiṃsu.
tika-vin08t0:1447_0: Idāni pana dāyakā yebhuyyena cattāro paccaye puggalasseva denti,
tika-vin08t0:1447_1: tasmā senāsanampi abhinavabhūtaṃ puggalikameva bahulaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1447_3: Daliddāpi suttakantanakālato paṭṭhāya “imaṃ cīvaraṃ kathinakāle itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dassāmī”ti cintetvā ca tatheva vatvā ca sabbakiccāni karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1447_4: mahaddhanā ca sāṭakassa kīṇitakālato paṭṭhāya tatheva cintetvā kathetvā karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1447_5: dānakāle ca “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dehī”ti puttadāsādayo vā pesenti,
tika-vin08t0:1447_6: sāmaṃ vā gantvā cīvaraṃ tassa bhikkhussa pādamūle vā hatthe vā ṭhapetvā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ tuyhaṃ dammī”ti vatvā vā cintetvā vā denti,
tika-vin08t0:1447_7: satesu vā sahassesu vā eko paṇḍitapuriso “puggalassa dinnadānato saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti ñatvā
tika-vin08t0:1447_8: “imaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ saṅghassa dammī”ti vatvā vā cintetvā vā deti,
tika-vin08t0:1447_10: Sace pana dāyako puggalassa dātukāmo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1447_12: vibhaṅgasuttādidhammadesanāya puggalikadānato saṅghikadānassa mahapphalabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā “imaṃ tava cīvaraṃ saṅghassa dehī”ti uyyojeti,
tika-vin08t0:1447_13: dāyakopi tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā “imaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ saṅghassa dammī”ti vatvā vā cintetvā vā deti,
tika-vin08t0:1448_0: Yadi pana bhikkhunā uyyojitopi duppañño dāyako tassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā puggalasseva deti,
tika-vin08t0:1448_2: Atha pana so puggalo sayaṃ sampaṭicchitvā puna saṅghassa pariccajati,
tika-vin08t0:1448_7: evaṃ sante taṃ cīvaraṃ puggalikaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1448_8: na kathinakālamattena vā kathinavacanamattena vā saṅghikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1448_9: Idāni pana iminā nayena puggalikacīvaraṃyeva bahulaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1448_10: Evaṃ santepi ācariyaparamparā paveṇiṃ abhinditukāmā saṅghikaṃ viya katvā bhājetvā paribhuñjiṃsu.
tika-vin08t0:1448_12: saṅghena dinnato paraṃ ekasūcimattampi puggalo adhikaṃ gaṇhituṃ na labheyya.
tika-vin08t0:1449_2: ekacce bhikkhū mukhyasaṅghikanti maññamānā abhājetukāmampi puggalaṃ abhibhavitvā bhājāpenti,
tika-vin08t0:1449_3: tassa puggalassa mātā pitā ñātakā upāsakādayo “amhākaṃ puttassa dema,
tika-vin08t0:1449_6: aññepi saddhā pasannā dāyakā “itthannāmassa puggalassa demā”ti vicāretvā parammukhāpi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa
tika-vin08t0:1449_7: dammī”ti vatvā sammukhāpi pādamūle vā hatthe vā ṭhapetvā denti,
tika-vin08t0:1449_9: saṅghaṃ āmasitvā avuttattā saṅghāyattaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1449_10: “kathinaṃ dassāmī”ti vā “kathinaṃ dātuṃ gato”ti vā “kathinacīvara”nti vā pubbāparakālesu vacanaṃ pana
tika-vin08t0:1449_11: mukhyakathinabhūtassa saṅghikacīvarassa kāle dinnattā tadupacārato vohāramattaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1449_13: “Uposathika”nti vuttaṃ bhattaṃ cuddasasu saṅghikabhattesu antogadhaṃ mukhyasaṅghikaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1449_14: samādinnauposathā dāyakā sāyaṃ bhuñjitabbabhattabhāgaṃ saṅghassa denti,
tika-vin08t0:1449_15: taṃ saṅgho salākabhattaṃ viya ṭhitikaṃ katvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin08t0:1449_17: Idāni pana dāyakā attano attano kulūpakassa vā ñātibhikkhussa vā uposathadivasesu bhattaṃ denti,
tika-vin08t0:1449_18: taṃ saṅghassa adinnattā saṅghikaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1449_19: Evaṃ santepi uposathadivase dinnattā mukhyavasena pavattauposathabhattaṃ viya tadupacārena “uposathabhatta”nti voharīyati,
tika-vin08t0:1450_0: Evaṃ imasmiṃ kāle yebhuyyena puggalasseva dinnattā puggalikabhūtaṃ cīvaraṃ ñattikammavācārahaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1450_4: saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotī”tiādinā niyojetvā dāpetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1450_6: Evaṃ pariccajitattā saṅghikabhūtaṃ cīvaraṃ ñattikammavācārahañca hoti pañcānisaṃsanipphādakañca.
tika-vin08t0:1450_8: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā”ti bhagavatā vuttavacanaṃ anugataṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1451_0: Parikammaṃ karontānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāgubhattañca dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti idaṃ pucchitattā doso natthīti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1451_1: apucchite pana evaṃ kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1451_6: Sūciādīni cīvarakammupakaraṇāni sajjetvā bahūhi bhikkhūhi saddhinti idaṃ pana sibbanassa upakaraṇanidassanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1451_8: Dāyakassa hatthato sāṭakaṃ laddhadivaseyeva saṅghena atthārakassa bhikkhuno dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1452_0: Aññāni ca bahūni ānisaṃsavatthāni detīti iminā attharitabbasāṭakoyeva kathinasāṭako nāma,
tika-vin08t0:1452_1: tato aññe sāṭakā bahavopi kathinānisaṃsāyeva nāmāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1452_2: Etena ca “kathinānisaṃso”ti vatthāniyeva vuttāni na agghoti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:1452_5: evaṃ pana avatvā “bahūni kathinānisaṃsavatthāni detī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1452_10: Tathā tathā ovaditvā saññāpetabboti “upāsaka dānaṃ nāma saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1452_11: atthāro pana bhikkhūnaṃ upakāratthāya bhagavatā anuññāto,
tika-vin08t0:1452_12: tasmā ñattiladdhampi aladdhampi mahapphalamevā”ti vā “upāsaka ayampi dāyako saṅghasseva deti,
tika-vin08t0:1457_0: Vuttaṃ, tasmā saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya mahapphalamevā”ti vā itiādīni vatvā saññāpetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1462_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ āharitvā kathinadānakammavācāya paṭhamaṃ kathinacīvarassa paṭiggahaṇañca sappāyapucchanañca karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1466_0: Vinayavinicchayappakaraṇe ca āgatesu aṭṭhasu aṅgesu anāgatattā ca “pubbakaraṇaṃ sattahi dhammehi saṅgahitaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1466_1: dhovanena vicāraṇena chedanena bandhanena sibbanena rajanena kappakaraṇenā”ti parivārapāḷiyañca,
tika-vin08t0:1469_0: Vinayavinicchayappakaraṇe ca vuttesu sattasu pubbakaraṇesu anāgatattā ca.
tika-vin08t0:1470_1: atha kho yuttipi na dissati. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1470_2: Paṭiggahaṇaṃ nāma “yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhāreyya aññatra udakadantaponā,
tika-vin08t0:1470_3: pācittiya”nti yāvakālikādīsu ajjhoharitabbesu catūsu kālikavatthūsu bhagavatā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1470_5: taṃ pana pādamūle ṭhapetvā dinnampi parammukhā dinnampi labbhateva.
tika-vin08t0:1470_6: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammīti evaṃ parammukhā vā pādamūle ṭhapetvā ‘imaṃ tumhāka’nti evaṃ sammukhā vā detī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1470_8: dāyakena cīvare dinne saṅghassa cittena sampaṭicchanamattameva pamāṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1471_1: ekena bhikkhunā “bhonto saṅghā saṅghassa kathine sampatte kassa puggalassa sappāyārahaṃ hotī”ti pucchite
tika-vin08t0:1471_2: eko bhikkhu nāmaṃ vatvā “itthannāmassa therassa sappāyārahaṃ hotī”ti vadati,
tika-vin08t0:1471_4: Etasmiṃ vacane saddato ca atthato ca adhippāyato ca yutti gavesitabbā hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1471_11: Idañca cīvaraṃ saṅgho kathinaṃ attharituṃ puggalassa deti,
tika-vin08t0:1471_13: Vuttañhi pāḷiyaṃ “saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno deti kathinaṃ attharitu”nti,
tika-vin08t0:1471_15: “Paṭiggahaṇañca sappāya”ntiādigāthāpi katthaci pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāṭīkādīsu ca na dissati,
tika-vin08t0:1472_1: vuḍḍhassa dātabbanti idaṃ kathinacīvarassa saṅghikattā “na ca,
tika-vin08t0:1472_6: Eteneva nayena sabbesu balavacīvaresu santesupi vuḍḍhasseva dātabbanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1472_10: Navakatarenapi hi karaṇasannidhiṃ mocetvā kathine atthate anumodanaṃ karontassa saṅghassa pañcānisaṃsalābho hotīti.
tika-vin08t0:1472_13: kathinadussaṃ labhitvā saṅghe sīmāya sannipatite ekena bhikkhunā “bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1472_15: saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ kathannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyya kathinaṃ attharitu”nti vutte aññena “yo jiṇṇacīvaro,
tika-vin08t0:1472_17: tato purimena “bahū jiṇṇacīvarā”ti vā “natthi idha jiṇṇacīvarā”ti vā vutte aparena “tena hi vuḍḍhassā”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1472_18: puna purimena “ko ettha vuḍḍho”ti vutte itarena “itthannāmo bhikkhū”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1472_19: puna purimena “so bhikkhu tadaheva cīvaraṃ katvā attharituṃ sakkotī”ti vutte itarena “so sakkotī”ti vā
tika-vin08t0:1472_21: puna purimena “so mahāthero aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgato”ti vutte itarena “āma samannāgato”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1472_22: tato “sādhu suṭṭhu tassa dātabba”nti vutte byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1473_4: saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyya kathinaṃ attharitu”nti imāya ñattipāḷiyā sameti.
tika-vin08t0:1473_8: “So mahāthero aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato”tiādi “aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharitu”ntiādikāya
tika-vin08t0:1473_12: Iminā imassa kathinadānakammassa garukattā na apalokanamattena dātabbanti imamatthaṃ pakāseti.
tika-vin08t0:1474_0: Evaṃ dinne pana kathine paccuddharitabbā adhiṭṭhātabbā vācā bhinditabbāti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:1474_1: Sace taṃ kathinadussaṃ niṭṭhitaparikammameva hotīti iminā kathinadussaṃ nāma na kevalaṃ pakatisāṭakameva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1474_3: tasmā niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ dinne sattavidhapubbakiccakaraṇena attho natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1474_12: sūcikammapariyosānaṃ nāma yaṃ kiñci sūciyā kattabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1474_14: Idañhi kathinavattaṃ nāma buddhappasatthanti “atthatakathinānaṃ vo bhikkhave pañca kappissantī”tiādinā pasatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1478_0: Vuttāni sattavidhapubbakaraṇāni katvā pariyosāpitaṃ kathinacīvaraṃ gahetvā.
tika-vin08t0:1478_1: Atthārakena bhikkhunā paccuddharitabbā adhiṭṭhātabbā vācā bhinditabbāti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:1478_2: Saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharitukāmo bhikkhu pubbe ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitaṃ porāṇikaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ “imaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1478_4: tato anadhiṭṭhitaṃ navaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1478_5: tato attharaṇakāle tameva adhiṭṭhitasaṅghāṭiṃ “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1478_9: Tathā hi vuttaṃ vinayatthamañjūsāyaṃ “attharitabbanti attharaṇaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1479_0: Tattha paccuddhāro tividho “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmī”ti saṅghāṭiyā paccuddhāro,
tika-vin08t0:1479_3: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “paccuddhāro tīhi dhammehi saṅgahito saṅghāṭiyā uttarāsaṅgena antaravāsakenā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1479_4: Adhiṭṭhānaṃ tividhaṃ “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti saṅghāṭiyā adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1479_7: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “adhiṭṭhānaṃ tīhi dhammehi saṅgahitaṃ saṅghāṭiyā uttarāsaṅgena antaravāsakenā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1480_0: Atha vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ duvidhaṃ kāyena adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1480_2: Tattha porāṇikaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmī”ti paccuddharitvā navaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ hatthena gahetvā
tika-vin08t0:1480_3: “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti cittena ābhogaṃ katvā kāyavikārakaraṇena kāyena vā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1480_5: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tattha yasmā dve cīvarassa adhiṭṭhānāni kāyena vā adhiṭṭheti,
tika-vin08t0:1480_9: Tattha yadi cīvaraṃ hatthapāse ṭhitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1480_11: atha antogabbhe vā sāmantavihāre vā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1480_12: ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā “etaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vacībhedaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1480_13: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tatra duvidhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ sace hatthapāse hotī”tiādi,
tika-vin08t0:1481_6: tañca kho tathāvacībhedakaraṇamevāti daṭṭhabba”nti vinayatthamañjūsāvacanena ca viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1481_8: Tattha yadi saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1482_1: kiṃ pana “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmī”ti visesaṃ katvāva paccuddharitabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1482_3: Parikkhāracoḷādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitaṃ cīvaraṃ “imaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti sāmaññato paccuddharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1482_4: na “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmī”ti visesato paccuddharitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1482_6: Ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitaṃ pana cīvaraṃ visesatoyeva paccuddharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1482_9: Idha pana kathinādhikāre pubbeva ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitattā visesatoyeva paccuddharitabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1482_10: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre kathinādhikāre “paccuddhāro tīhi dhammehi saṅgahito saṅghāṭiyā uttarāsaṅgena antaravāsakenā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1482_11: Kiṃ pana niccatecīvarikoyeva kathinaṃ attharituṃ labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1482_15: tecīvarikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā dhāraṇato sabbakālameva dhāreti.
tika-vin08t0:1482_16: Vinayatecīvariko pana yadā ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhahitvā dhāretukāmo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1482_18: Yadā pana parikkhāracoḷādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhahitvā dhāretukāmo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1482_20: tasmā ticīvarādhiṭṭhānassa dupparihārattā sabbadā dhāretuṃ asakkonto hutvā parikkhāracoḷavasena dhārentopi
tika-vin08t0:1482_21: taṃ paccuddharitvā āsanne kāle ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhahantopi kathinaṃ attharituṃ labhatiyevāti
tika-vin08t0:1483_0: Kacci nu bho kathinadānakammavācābhaṇanasīmāyameva kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1483_3: evaṃ sati tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale attharaṇaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1483_7: Tena ca tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale adhiṭṭhahitvā attharitvā saṅgho anumodāpetabbo”ti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ āgatattā viññāyatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1483_8: Yadi evaṃ “tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale”icceva ṭīkāyaṃ vuttattā “yasmiṃ kismiñci sīmamaṇḍale kammavācaṃ bhaṇitvā
tika-vin08t0:1483_10: na “kathinadānakammavācābhaṇanabaddhasīmā vassūpanāyikakhettabhūtaupacārasīmāya anto ṭhitā”ti visesaṃ katvā vattabbanti?
tika-vin08t0:1483_14: upacārasīmā ca nāma baddhasīmaṃ avattharitvāpi gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1483_15: tasmā sā sīmā baddhasīmā ca hoti upacārasīmā cāti tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale kathinadānakammavācaṃ bhaṇitvā tattheva attharaṇaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1483_16: na yasmiṃ kismiñci sīmamaṇḍale kammavācaṃ bhaṇitvā tattheva attharaṇaṃ kattabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1483_20: Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vassūpanāyikakhettabhūtāya eva upacārasīmāya kathinatthāraṃ kātuṃ labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1483_22: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi na labhantīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1484_5: kathinatthārasīmāyaṃ tāva upacārasīmābhūtabhāvo “sace pana ekasīmāya bahū vihārā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1484_6: sabbe bhikkhū sannipātetvā ekattha kathinaṃ attharitabba”nti imissā aṭṭhakathāya atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “ekasīmāyāti
tika-vin08t0:1484_7: ekaupacārasīmāyāti attho yujjatī”ti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ āgatattā viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1484_8: Kammavācābhaṇanasīmāya baddhasīmābhūtabhāvo pana “te ca kho hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ekasīmāyaṃ ṭhitā.
tika-vin08t0:1484_9: Sīmā ca nāmesā baddhasīmā abaddhasīmāti duvidhā hotī”ti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ āgatattā ca “sīmā ca nāmesā katamā,
tika-vin08t0:1484_10: yattha hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ṭhitā kammappattā nāma hontīti anuyogaṃ sandhāya sīmaṃ dassento vibhāgavantānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1484_11: sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti ‘sīmā ca nāmesā’tiādimāhā”ti vinayatthamañjūsāyaṃ āgatattā
tika-vin08t0:1485_5: “Evaṃ ekādasa vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā tividhasampattiyuttā nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā sammatā sīmā baddhasīmāti veditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1485_7: Abaddhasīmā pana gāmasīmā sattabbhantarasīmā udakukkhepasīmāti tividhā”ti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ āgatattā viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1485_9: tīsu abaddhasīmāsūti chasuyeva sīmāsu kammappattasaṅghassa catuvaggakaraṇīyādikammassa kattabbabhāvavacanato
tika-vin08t0:1485_11: Antoupacārasīmāya baddhasīmāya sati taṃ baddhasīmaṃ avattharitvāpi upacārasīmāya gamanato sā baddhasīmā
tika-vin08t0:1485_12: kammavācābhaṇanārahā ca hoti kathinatthārārahā cāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1486_0: Nanu ca pannarasavidhā sīmā aṭṭhakathāsu āgatā,
tika-vin08t0:1486_2: tāsu pana pannarasasu sīmāsu upacārasīmā saṅghalābhavibhajanādiṭṭhānameva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1486_3: lābhasīmā tatruppādagahaṇaṭṭhānameva hotīti imā dve sīmāyo saṅghakammakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ na honti,
tika-vin08t0:1486_4: nigamasīmā nagarasīmā janapadasīmā raṭṭhasīmā rajjasīmā dīpasīmā cakkavāḷasīmāti imā pana sīmāyo gāmasīmāya
tika-vin08t0:1486_5: samānagatikā gāmasīmāyameva antogadhāti na visuṃ vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1486_6: Ettha ca upacārasīmāya baddhasīmaṃ avattharitvā gatabhāvo kathaṃ jānitabboti?
tika-vin08t0:1486_8: aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānena paricchinnā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā parikkhepaparikkhepārahaṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1486_9: anto baddhasīmāya vijjamānāya taṃ avattharitvā upacārasīmā gatā.
tika-vin08t0:1486_10: Tathā hi “imissā upacārasīmāya ‘saṅghassa dammī’ti dinnaṃ pana khaṇḍasīmasīmantarikāsu ṭhitānampi pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1486_11: Tena ñāyati “upacārasīmāya anto ṭhitā baddhasīmā upacārasīmāpi nāma hotī”ti. Hotu,
tika-vin08t0:1486_12: evaṃ sati antoupacārasīmāyaṃ baddhasīmāya sati tattheva kathinadānakammavācaṃ vācāpetvā tattheva kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1486_14: Antoupacārasīmāyaṃ baddhasīmāya avijjamānāya bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ vijjamānabaddhasīmaṃ vā udakukkhepalabhanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1486_15: vā gantvā kammavācaṃ vācāpetvā puna vihāraṃ āgantvā vassūpanāyikakhettabhūtāya upacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā
tika-vin08t0:1487_0: Nanu ca bho evaṃ sante aññissā sīmāya ñatti,
tika-vin08t0:1487_2: evaṃ sante “pariniṭṭhitapubbakaraṇameva ce dāyako saṅghassa deti,
tika-vin08t0:1487_4: Tena ca tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale adhiṭṭhahitvā attharitvā saṅgho anumodāpetabbo”ti vuttena vajirabuddhiṭīkāvacanena virujjhatīti?
tika-vin08t0:1487_8: Tattha pubbe yebhuyyena baddhasīmavihārattā samaggaṃ saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā kammavācaṃ vācāpetvā upacārasīmabaddhasīmabhūte
tika-vin08t0:1487_10: Baddhasīmavihāre ahontepi antoupacārasīmāyaṃ baddhasīmāya vijjamānāya tattheva sīmamaṇḍale kammavācaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1487_12: Yadi pana na ceva baddhasīmavihāro hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1487_14: evarūpe vihāre kammavācaṃ vācāpetuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1487_15: aññaṃ baddhasīmaṃ vā udakukkhepaṃ vā gantvā kammavācaṃ vācāpetvā attano vihāraṃ āgantvā vassūpanāyikakhettabhūtāya
tika-vin08t0:1487_17: Evameva paramparabhūtā bahavo ācariyavarā karontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1488_0: Apare pana ācariyā “baddhasīmavirahāya suddhaupacārasīmāya sati tassaṃyeva upacārasīmāyaṃ ñattikammavācāpi vācetabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1488_5: “kathinatthatasīmāyanti upacārasīmaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ kathinatthāraṭṭhānabhūtāya sīmāya upacārasīmābhāvo vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1488_6: tassaṃyeva ṭīkāyaṃ pubbe niddiṭṭhapāṭhe “tasmiṃyeva sīmamaṇḍale adhiṭṭhahitvā attharitvā saṅgho anumodāpetabbo”ti
tika-vin08t0:1488_10: tassaṃyeva upacārasīmāyaṃ kammavācaṃ sāvetvā tasmiṃyeva atthāro kātabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1488_11: upacārasīmato bahi ṭhitaṃ baddhasīmaṃ gantvā attharaṇakiccaṃ natthīti.
tika-vin08t0:1489_1: idaṃ bhāsantaresu “ñattī”ti kathitaṃ kathinadānakammaṃ catūsu saṅghakammesu ñattidutiyakammaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1489_4: yadi “upacārasīmāyaṃ cattāri saṅghakammāni kātabbānī”ti pakaraṇesu āgataṃ abhavissā,
tika-vin08t0:1489_5: evaṃ sante tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ vacanānurūpato upacārasīmāyaṃ kathinadānañattikammavācaṃ vācetabbaṃ abhavissā,
tika-vin08t0:1489_6: na pana pakaraṇesu “upacārasīmāyaṃ cattāri saṅghakammāni kātabbānī”ti āgataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1489_12: bhikkhunīnaṃ ārāmappavisanaāpucchanaṃ iccevamādīni eva upacārasīmāya kattabbānī”ti āgataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1489_13: tasmā kathinadānañattidutiyakammavācā kevalāyaṃ upacārasīmāyaṃ na vācetabbāti siddhā.
tika-vin08t0:1489_16: evaṃ sante tiyojane ṭhitā lābhaṃ gaṇhissanti,
tika-vin08t0:1489_17: tiyojane ṭhatvā āgantukavattaṃ pūretvā ārāmaṃ pavisitabbaṃ bhavissati,
tika-vin08t0:1489_20: pārivāsikena tiyojanaṃ atikkamitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapetabbaṃ bhavissati,
tika-vin08t0:1489_21: bhikkhuniyā tiyojane ṭhatvā ārāmappavisanaṃ āpucchitabbaṃ bhavissati,
tika-vin08t0:1490_1: “upacārasīmā ñattidutiyakammavācāya ṭhānaṃ na hotī”ti tumhehi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1490_4: dhārayāmīti imāya kammavācāya vā apalokanena vā antovihāre sabbasaṅghamajjhepi khaṇḍasīmāyapi sammannituṃ
tika-vin08t0:1490_5: vaṭṭatiyevā”ti upacārasīmāyaṃ ñattidutiyakammavācāya nipphādetabbabhāvo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgato.
tika-vin08t0:1490_6: Bhaṇḍāgārassa pana “imaṃ pana bhaṇḍāgāraṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ gantvā khaṇḍasīmāya nisinnehi sammannituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1490_9: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ vihāraṃ bhaṇḍāgāraṃ sammanneyyā’tiādinā nayena kammavācāya vā apalokanena vā sammannitabba”nti
tika-vin08t0:1491_1: sacepi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ “antovihāre”ti pāṭho “vihāramajjhe”ti pāṭho ca upacārasīmaṃ sandhāya vuttoti maññamānā tumhe āyasmanto evaṃ avacuttha,
tika-vin08t0:1491_2: te pana pāṭhā upacārasīmaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathācariyehi na vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:1491_3: atha kho avippavāsasīmāsaṅkhātaṃ mahāsīmaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:1491_6: Khaṇḍasīmāya hi mahāsīmā eva paṭiyogī hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1491_8: “Imaṃ pana samānasaṃvāsakasīmaṃ sammannantehi pabbajjūpasampadādīnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ sukhakaraṇatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ khaṇḍasīmā sammannitabbā…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1491_9: evaṃ baddhāsu pana sīmāsu khaṇḍasīmāya ṭhitā bhikkhū mahāsīmāya kammaṃ karontānaṃ na kopenti,
tika-vin08t0:1491_10: mahāsīmāya vā ṭhitā khaṇḍasīmāya kammaṃ karontānaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1491_11: Sīmantarikāya pana ṭhitā ubhinnampi na kopentī”ti vuttaaṭṭhakathāpāṭhavasena jānitabboti.
tika-vin08t0:1491_12: Atha vā tehi āyasmantehi ābhatabhaṇḍāgārasammutipāṭhavasenapi ayamattho viññāyati. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1491_13: Cīvarapaṭiggāhakādipuggalasammutiyo pana antovihāre sabbasaṅghamajjhepi khaṇḍasīmāyampi sammannituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1492_1: “aññissā sīmāya vatthu aññissā kammavācā”ti vattabbadosaparihāratthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1492_2: Puggalasammutiyo hi puggalassa vatthuttā yadi mahāsīmabhūte antovihāre kattukāmā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1492_3: sabbasaṅghamajjhe taṃ vatthubhūtaṃ puggalaṃ hatthapāse katvā kareyyuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1492_5: taṃ vatthubhūtaṃ puggalaṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ ānetvā tattha sannipatitakammappattasaṅghassa hatthapāse katvā kareyyuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1492_7: bhaṇḍāgārasammuti pana bhaṇḍāgārassa vihārattā khaṇḍasīmaṃ ānetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:1492_8: tasmā yadi taṃ sammutiṃ khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā kareyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1492_11: tasmiñca dose sati vatthuvipannattā kammaṃ vipajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1492_12: tasmā mahāsīmabhūtavihāramajjheyeva sā sammuti kātabbāti aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ mati,
tika-vin08t0:1493_0: Athāpi evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “vihārasaddena avippavāsasīmabhūtā mahāsīmāva vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:1493_1: na upacārasīmā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ kathaṃ paccetabbanti?
tika-vin08t0:1493_4: upacārasīmā nāma baddhasīmaṃ avattharitvāpi pavattā āvāsesu vā bhikkhūsu vā vaḍḍhantesu aniyamavasena vaḍḍhati,
tika-vin08t0:1493_5: tasmā khaṇḍasīmaṃ avattharitvā pavattanato vihārena saha khaṇḍasīmā ekasīmāyeva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1493_6: evaṃ sati vihāre ṭhitaṃ bhaṇḍāgāraṃ khaṇḍasīmāya ṭhatvā sammannituṃ sakkā bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1493_7: na pana sakkā “khaṇḍasīmāya nisinnehi sammannituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭisiddhattā.
tika-vin08t0:1493_8: Tena ñāyati “imasmiṃ ṭhāne vihārasaddena avippavāsasīmabhūtā mahāsīmā vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:1493_13: Apica bhikkhūnaṃ dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānato vā pariyante ṭhitabhojanasālato vā nibaddhavasanakaāvāsato vā
tika-vin08t0:1493_14: thāmamajjhimassa purisassa dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ anto upacārasīmā veditabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1493_18: tasmā sace vihāre sannipatitabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekābaddhā hutvā yojanasatampi pūretvā nisīdanti,
tika-vin08t0:1494_0: Yadi evaṃ upacārasīmāya kathinatthatabhāvo kasmā vuttoti?
tika-vin08t0:1494_7: Nanu ca bho “kathinaṃ attharituṃ ke labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1494_9: Gaṇanavasena tāva pacchimakoṭiyā pañca janā labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1494_11: pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā na labhantī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1494_16: puggalo kathinaṃ attharatī”ti parivāre vuttattā ca apalokanakammādīnaṃ catunnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ ṭhānesu apaviṭṭhattā ca.
tika-vin08t0:1494_17: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kathinatthārassa upacārabhūtaṃ kathinadānakammavācābhaṇanakālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1494_22: “Catunnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ ñattidutiyakammassa navasu ṭhānesu kathinadāna”nti āgatattā,
tika-vin08t0:1494_24: idaṃ saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppanna”ntiādinā vuttattā cāti.
tika-vin08t0:1495_0: Apare pana ācariyā “bhāsantaresu ñattīti vuttā kathinadānakammavācā atthārakiriyāya pavisati,
tika-vin08t0:1495_6: kathinaṃ attharitabba”nti ārabhitvā “byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo…pe… evaṃ kho,
tika-vin08t0:1495_8: atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti kathinadānañattikammavācāto paṭṭhāya yāva anumodanā pāṭho āgato,
tika-vin08t0:1495_9: parivārapāḷiyañca “kathinatthāro jānitabbo”ti uddesassa niddese “sace saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1495_12: anumodakena kathaṃ paṭipajjitabba”nti pucchaṃ nīharitvā “saṅghena ñattidutiyena kammena kathinatthārakassa bhikkhuno dātabbaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1495_13: anumodāmā”ti ñattito paṭṭhāya yāva anumodanā pāṭho āgato,
tika-vin08t0:1495_14: tasmā ñattito paṭṭhāya yāva anumodanā sabbo vidhi kathinatthārakiriyāyaṃ pavisati,
tika-vin08t0:1495_15: tato kathinatthārakiriyāya upacārasīmāyaṃ kattabbāya sati ñattisaṅkhātakathinadānakammavācāpi upacārasīmāyaṃ kattabbāyevāti.
tika-vin08t0:1496_1: atthārakiriyāya visuṃ anāgatāya sati “sabbo vidhi atthārakiriyāyaṃ pavisatī”ti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1496_2: atha ca pana mahāvaggapāḷiyañca parivārapāḷiyañca atthārakiriyā visuṃ āgatāyeva,
tika-vin08t0:1496_3: tasmā ñattisaṅkhātā kathinadānakammavācā atthārakiriyāyaṃ na pavisati,
tika-vin08t0:1496_4: kevalaṃ atthārakiriyāya upacārabhūtattā pana tato paṭṭhāya anukkamena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1496_10: evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti nimittakittanena saha sīmāsammutikammavācā desitā,
tika-vin08t0:1496_13: tathāpi sīmāsammutikammavācāya upacārabhāvato saha nimittakittanena sīmāsammutikammavācā desitā.
tika-vin08t0:1496_14: Yathā ca upasampadākammavidhiṃ desento “paṭhamaṃ upajjhaṃ gāhāpetabbo…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1496_15: evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti upajjhāyagāhāpanādinā saha upasampadākammaṃ desitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1496_18: tathāpi upasampadākammassa samīpe bhūtattā upajjhāyagāhāpanādinā saha ñatticatutthakammavācā desitā,
tika-vin08t0:1496_20: tathāpi atthārakiriyāya upacārabhūtattā kathinadānañattidutiyakammavācāya saha kathinatthārakiriyā desitā,
tika-vin08t0:1496_21: tasmā kathinadānakammavācā atthārakiriyāyaṃ na pavisatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1497_0: Atha vā ñattidutiyakammavācā ca atthāro cāti ime dve dhammā atulyakiriyā atulyakattāro atulyakammā atulyakālā ca honti,
tika-vin08t0:1497_1: tena viññāyati “bhāsantaresu ñattīti vuttā ñattidutiyakammavācā atthārakiriyāyaṃ na pavisatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1497_18: Atha vā atthāro “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”tiādinā vacībhedasaṅkhātena ekena dhammena saṅgahito,
tika-vin08t0:1497_20: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “atthāro ekena dhammena saṅgahito vacībhedenā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1497_21: Imināpi kāraṇena jānitabbaṃ “na ñatti atthāre paviṭṭhā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1498_3: Gaṇanavasena tāva pacchimakoṭiyā pañca janā labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1498_5: pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā na labhantī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattā “heṭṭhimantato pañca bhikkhū kathinatthāraṃ labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1498_7: “Pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatīti pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro kathinadussassa dāyakā,
tika-vin08t0:1498_8: eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kaṅkhāvitaraṇīṭīkāyaṃ āgatattā tasmiṃ vākye “vaṭṭatī”ti kiriyāya kattā “so kathinatthāro”ti vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:1498_9: tasmā atthāroti iminā “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vuttaattharaṇakiriyā na adhippetā,
tika-vin08t0:1498_10: catūhi bhikkhūhi atthārakassa bhikkhuno ñattiyā dānaṃ adhippetanti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1498_12: uddhaṃ satasahassanti idaṃ atthārakassa bhikkhuno saṅghassa kathinadussadānakammaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vinayavinicchayaṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1498_13: Tasmimpi pāṭhe ñattiyā dinnaṃyeva sandhāya “pañca janā atthāraṃ labhantī”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyehi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1498_14: “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”tiādi puggalassa attharaṇaṃ sandhāya na vuttanti ṭīkācariyassa adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1498_16: vinayavinicchayaṭīkākārakehi ācariyehi “ñattidutiyakammaṃ atthāro nāmā”ti vinicchitattā upacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1499_5: “Chinnavassā vā pacchimikāya upagatā vā na labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1499_6: aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi na labhantīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatattā “te chinnavassādayo
tika-vin08t0:1499_9: evaṃ sati te bhikkhū ñattidutiyakammepi gaṇapūrakabhāvena appaviṭṭhā siyuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1499_10: Atha ca pana “purimikāya upagatānaṃ pana sabbe gaṇapūrakā hontī”ti aṭṭhakathāya vuttattā te ñattidutiyakamme paviṭṭhāva honti,
tika-vin08t0:1499_11: tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyo pañcānisaṃsahetubhūtaṃ “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”tiādikaṃ vacībhedaṃyeva “atthāro”ti vadati,
tika-vin08t0:1499_13: tasmā te chinnavassādayo pañcānisaṃsahetubhūtaṃ kathinatthāraṃ na labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1499_15: Punapi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sace purimikāya upagatā cattāro vā honti tayo vā dve vā eko vā,
tika-vin08t0:1499_17: Evaṃ alabbhamānakathinatthāreyeva chinnavassādayo gaṇapūrake katvā ñattidutiyakammavācāya kathinadussaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1499_18: dāpetvā purimikāya upagatehi kathinassa attharitabbabhāvato “ñattidutiyakammaṃyeva atthāro nāmāti ṭīkācariyā
tika-vin08t0:1500_0: Nanu ca bho imasmimpi aṭṭhakathāvacane “itare gaṇapūrake katvā kathinaṃ attharitabba”nti vacanena catuvaggasaṅghena
tika-vin08t0:1500_3: Pubbe hi chinnavassādīnaṃ kathinaṃ attharituṃ alabbhamānabhāvo vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1500_4: idha “ñattidutiyakammaṃ atthāro”ti vutte tesampi labbhamānabhāvo vutto bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1500_6: tasmā “katvā”ti padaṃ “attharitabba”nti padena sambajjhantena samānakālavisesanaṃ akatvā pubbakālavisesanameva katvā sambandhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1500_7: evaṃ sati pubbavacanenāparavacanaṃ gaṅgodakena yamunodakaṃ viya saṃsandati,
tika-vin08t0:1500_8: pacchāpi ca “kammavācaṃ sāvetvā kathinaṃ attharāpetvā dānañca bhuñjitvā gamissantī”ti visuṃ kammavācāsāvanaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1500_10: tasmā ñattidutiyakammaṃ atthāro nāma na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1500_11: kevalaṃ atthārassa kāraṇameva upacārameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1500_15: puggalo kathinaṃ attharatī”ti parivāravacanena ayamattho jānitabboti.
tika-vin08t0:1501_1: vinayavinicchayaṭīkāsu āgatapāṭhānaṃ adhippāyo kathaṃ bhāsitabbo bhaveyya.
tika-vin08t0:1501_2: Nanu kaṅkhāvitaraṇīṭīkāyaṃ “vaṭṭatī”ti imissā kiriyāya kattā “so kathinatthāro”ti vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1501_6: Evaṃ ṭīkāsu nītatthato āgatapāṭhesu santesu “ñattidutiyakammaṃyeva atthāro nāmāti ṭīkācariyā na vadeyyu”nti na vattabbanti?
tika-vin08t0:1501_7: Yenākārena aṭṭhakathāvacanena ṭīkāvacanañca pubbāparaaṭṭhakathāvacanañca aviruddhaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1501_9: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇīaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “so sabbantimena paricchedena pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āgato,
tika-vin08t0:1501_10: tasmiṃ aṭṭhakathāvacane codakena codetabbassa atthitāya taṃ pariharituṃ “pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatīti pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro kathinadussassa dāyakā,
tika-vin08t0:1501_11: eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pāṭho ṭīkācariyena vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1501_13: Bho aṭṭhakathācariya “so sabbantimena paricchedena pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1501_14: evaṃ sati pañcannaṃ kathinatthārakānaṃ eva so kathinatthāro vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1501_18: puggalo kathinaṃ attharatī”ti āgatapāḷiyā virujjhanato āgamavirodho āpajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1501_19: taṃ codanaṃ pariharanto “pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatīti pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro kathinadussassa dāyakā,
tika-vin08t0:1501_20: eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pāṭho ṭīkācariyena vutto.
tika-vin08t0:1501_22: bho codakācariya aṭṭhakathācariyena kathinatthārakāle pañcannaṃ atthārakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena “so sabbantimena
tika-vin08t0:1501_23: paricchedena pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pāṭho na vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1501_24: atha kho saṅghena atthārakassa kathinadussadānakāle pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro kathinadussassa dāyakā,
tika-vin08t0:1501_25: eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcannaṃ dāyakapaṭiggāhakapuggalānaṃ atthitāya so pacchā kattabbo atthāro vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1502_2: Gaṇanavasena tāva pacchimakoṭiyā pañca janā labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1502_4: pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā na labhantī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacane parehi pucchitabbassa atthitāya taṃ pucchaṃ vissajjetuṃ
tika-vin08t0:1502_5: “idaṃ atthārakassa bhikkhuno saṅghassa kathinadussadānakammaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti pāṭho ṭīkācariyena vutto.
tika-vin08t0:1502_7: Bho aṭṭhakathācariya “heṭṭhimakoṭiyā pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ kiṃ pañcānisaṃsassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1502_11: Bho bhadramukha “heṭṭhimakoṭiyā pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ pañcānisaṃsassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ “imāya
tika-vin08t0:1502_12: saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”tiādikaṃ atthārakiriyaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathācariyena na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1502_13: atha kho atthārassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ kathinadānakammaṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
tika-vin08t0:1502_15: saṅghena atthārakassa dinnadussena eva kathinatthāro sambhavati,
tika-vin08t0:1502_16: na ṭhitikāya laddhacīvarena vā puggalikacīvarena vā sambhavati,
tika-vin08t0:1502_18: eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcasu bhikkhūsu vijjamānesuyeva sampajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1502_19: na tato ūnesūti pacchimakoṭiyā pañcannaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1502_21: teneva ca kāraṇena “kathinadussadānakammaṃ vutta”nti mukhyavasena avatvā “sandhāya vutta”nti upacāravasenāha.
tika-vin08t0:1502_23: aṭṭhakathāvacanena ca ṭīkāvacanaṃ viruddhaṃ na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1502_24: “apalokanādisaṅghakammakaraṇatthaṃ baddhasīmā bhagavatā anuññātā”ti iminā vinayalakkhaṇena ca sameti.
tika-vin08t0:1503_0: “Imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”tiādikā pana atthārakiriyā apalokanādīsu catūsu saṅghakammesu appaviṭṭhā,
tika-vin08t0:1503_1: adhiṭṭhānādayo viya pañcānisaṃsalābhakāraṇabhūtā puggalakiriyāva hotīti vassūpanāyikakhettabhūtāya antoupacārasīmāya kātabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1503_2: tasmā antoupacārasīmāyaṃ baddhasīmāya avijjamānāya bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ baddhasīmaṃ vā udakukkhepasattabbhantaralabhamānaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1503_3: vā gantvā ñattidutiyakammena kathinadussaṃ dāpetvā puna vihāraṃ āgantvā antoupacārasīmāyameva kathinattharaṇaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1503_6: Evaṃ aggahetvā suddhaupacārasīmāyameva ñattidutiyakammaṃ kātabbanti gayhamāne sati tesaṃ āyasmantānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1503_7: diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjamānā sissānusissā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāradānādiapalokanakammaṃ vā uposathapavāraṇādiñattikammaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1503_8: vā sīmāsammannanādiñattidutiyakammaṃ vā upasampadādiñatticatutthakammaṃ vā upacārasīmāyameva kareyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1503_9: evaṃ karontā bhagavato sāsane mahantaṃ jaṭaṃ mahantaṃ gumbaṃ mahantaṃ visamaṃ kareyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1503_10: tasmā tamakaraṇatthaṃ yuttito ca āgamato ca anekāni kāraṇāni āharitvā kathayimhāti.
tika-vin08t0:1505_0: Mayā kataṃ vinicchayaṃ, sammā cintentu sādhavo.
tika-vin08t0:1506_0: Punappunaṃ vicintetvā, yuttaṃ ce hoti gaṇhantu;
tika-vin08t0:1507_0: No ce yuttaṃ mā gaṇhantu, sammāsambuddhasāvakāti.
tika-vin08t0:1508_2: upacārasīmāya catunnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ kataṭṭhānabhāvo pubbe vuttova,
tika-vin08t0:1508_3: tasmā taṃ vacanaṃ manasi katvā saṃsayaṃ akatvā dhāretabboti.
tika-vin08t0:1509_0: “Imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbāti kiṃ ettakena vacībhedena kathinaṃ atthataṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1509_3: Ettakeneva hi vacībhedena atthataṃ hoti, kathinaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1509_4: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “atthāro ekena dhammena saṅgahito vacībhedenā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1510_0: Evaṃ kathinatthāraṃ dassetvā anumodāpanaanumodane dassento “tena kathinatthārakenā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1510_1: Tattha yena bhikkhunā “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”tiādinā vacībhedena kathinaṃ atthataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1510_2: tena “kathinassa atthārā pannarasa dhammā jāyantī”ti parivāre āgatattā kathinatthārena saheva pañca ānisaṃsā āgatā,
tika-vin08t0:1510_4: Kiñcāpi atthārakassa bhikkhuno pañca ānisaṃsā āgatā,
tika-vin08t0:1510_6: tasmā saṅghassa ca āgamanatthaṃ saṅghaṃ anumodāpeti,
tika-vin08t0:1510_8: evaṃ kate ubhinnampi ānisaṃsā āgatā honti.
tika-vin08t0:1510_9: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ atthārakassa ca anumodakassa cā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1510_10: Ettha ca kathinatthārakabhikkhuto vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu tasmiṃ saṅghe atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1510_13: Yadi pana kathinatthārako bhikkhu sabbesaṃ vuḍḍhataro hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1510_18: Imesu pana saṅghapuggalesu ye tasmiṃ vihāre purimikāya vassaṃ upagantvā paṭhamapavāraṇāya pavāritā,
tika-vin08t0:1510_20: chinnavassā vā pacchimikāya upagatā vā aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassā vā na labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1511_0: Evaṃ kathinatthāraṃ dassetvā idāni cīvaravibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ atthate pana kathine”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1511_1: Tattha sace kathinacīvarena saddhiṃ ābhataṃ ānisaṃsanti iminā ekaṃ atthatacīvarameva kathinacīvaraṃ nāma,
tika-vin08t0:1511_2: tato aññaṃ tena saddhiṃ ābhataṃ sabbaṃ cīvaraṃ kathinānisaṃsacīvaraṃ nāmāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1511_4: Tena ñāyati “vatthameva idha ānisaṃso nāma, na aggho,
tika-vin08t0:1511_5: kathinasāṭakena saddhiṃ ābhatānaṃ aññasāṭakānaṃ bahulavasena attharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1511_14: Balavavatthānīti attharitabbakathinasāṭakaṃyeva ahataṃ vā ahatakappaṃ vā dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1511_15: ānisaṃsacīvaraṃ pana yathāsatti yathābalaṃ purāṇaṃ vā abhinavaṃ vā dubbalaṃ vā balavaṃ vā dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1511_16: tasmā tesu dubbalavatthe ṭhitikāya dinne laddhabhikkhussa upakārakaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1511_18: Vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya dātabbānīti yattakā bhikkhū vassāvāsikacīvaraṃ labhiṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:1511_19: te ṭhapetvā tesaṃ heṭṭhato paṭṭhāya yathākkamaṃ dātabbāni.
tika-vin08t0:1511_20: Therāsanato paṭṭhāyāti yattakā bhikkhū tissaṃ kathinatthatasīmāyaṃ santi,
tika-vin08t0:1511_22: Āsanaggahaṇaṃ pana yathāvuḍḍhaṃ nisinne sandhāya kataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1511_24: Garubhaṇḍaṃ na bhājetabbanti kathinasāṭakena saddhiṃ ābhatesu mañcapīṭhādikaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ na bhājetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1512_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne vattabbaṃ atthi. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1512_1: Idāni bhikkhū kathinānisaṃsacīvaraṃ kusapātaṃ katvā vibhajanti,
tika-vin08t0:1512_5: ṭhitikāya abhāve therāsanato paṭṭhāya dātabbānī”ti vacanatoti.
tika-vin08t0:1512_13: evaṃ ṭhapitesu cīvarapaṭivīsesu kuso pātetabbo”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā,
tika-vin08t0:1512_14: tasmā imissaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva bhājetabbanti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin08t0:1513_0: Ekacce pana bhikkhū ekekassa ekekasmiṃ cīvare appahonte cīvaraṃ parivattetvā akappiyavatthuṃ gahetvā bhājenti,
tika-vin08t0:1513_2: Aññepi ekaccānaṃ cīvarānaṃ mahagghatāya ekaccānaṃ appagghatāya samagghaṃ kātuṃ na sakkāti tatheva karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1513_4: Tattha hi akappiyavatthunā parivattanepi tassa vicāraṇepi bhāgaggahaṇepi āpattiyeva hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1513_5: Eke “kathinaṃ nāma dubbicāraṇīya”nti vatvā attharaṇaṃ na karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1513_7: taṃ pana yadi dāyakehi puggalasseva dinnaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1513_9: evaṃ sati attano santakattā yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin08t0:1513_10: Yadi pana saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā dinnaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1513_11: puggalassa dinnepi saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā pariccajitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1513_12: evaṃ sante saṅghagaṇānaṃ santakattā ayuttaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin08t0:1513_13: Apare pana kathinavasena paṭiggahite vicāretuṃ dukkaranti maññamānā “na mayaṃ kathinavasena paṭiggaṇhāma,
tika-vin08t0:1513_16: Vassāvāsikampi hi saṅghassa dinnaṃ saṅghikaṃ hotiyeva,
tika-vin08t0:1513_20: āgatañca taṃ disvā ‘tumhākaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ demā’ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1513_22: Sace tāni kulāni saṅghassa dātuṃ na icchanti,
tika-vin08t0:1513_25: paṃsukūlikassa panetaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:1514_4: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “mahāpadumatthero panāha na evaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1514_5: Manussā hi attano āvāsapaṭijagganatthāya paccayaṃ denti,
tika-vin08t0:1514_9: tesaṃ paccayaṃ avassāvāsike senāsane gāhetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ca.
tika-vin08t0:1514_10: Tatruppādavassāvāsikaṃ nāma kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe kappiyavatthupaabhuñjanatthāya dinnavatthuto nibbattaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1514_11: Vuttampi cetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kappiyakārakānañhi hatthe ‘kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ paribhuñjathā’ti dinnavatthuto yaṃ yaṃ kappiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1514_13: Evaṃ vassāvāsikacīvarampi pubbe yebhuyyena saṅghasseva denti,
tika-vin08t0:1515_0: Kiñci avatvā hatthe vā pādamūle vā ṭhapetvā gate kiṃ kātabbanti?
tika-vin08t0:1515_1: Tattha sace “idaṃ vatthu cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā parapuggalassa vā atthāya pariṇata”nti jāneyya,
tika-vin08t0:1515_7: attano hatthe vā pādamūle vā kiñci avatvā ṭhapitaṃ tasseva puggalikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1515_8: Na hi cetiyādīnaṃ atthāya pariṇataṃ kiñci avatvā bhikkhussa hatthe vā pādamūle vā ṭhapetīti.
tika-vin08t0:1515_9: Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “puggalassa detīti ‘imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī’ti evaṃ parammukhā vā pādamūle ṭhapetvā ‘imaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1515_10: tumhākaṃ dammī’ti evaṃ sammukhā vā detī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1516_2: “Avasesakathinānisaṃse balavavatthāni vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya dātabbānī”ti vuttattā ye bhikkhū imasmiṃ vasse vassāvāsikaṃ na labhiṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:1516_3: tesaṃ heṭṭhato paṭṭhāya ekekaṃ cīvaraṃ vā sāṭakaṃ vā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1516_4: Atha cīvarānaṃ vā sāṭakānaṃ vā avasiṭṭhesu santesu puna therāsanato paṭṭhāya dutiyabhāgo dātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1516_5: Tato cīvaresu vā sāṭakesu vā khīṇesu ye labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1516_7: Na kevalaṃ tasmiṃ kathinatthatadivase dinnadussāni eva kathinānisaṃsāni nāma honti,
tika-vin08t0:1516_8: atha kho yāva kathinassa ubbhārā saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnacīvarānipi saṅghikena tatruppādena ārāmikehi ābhatacīvarānipi kathinānisaṃsāniyeva honti.
tika-vin08t0:1516_9: Tasmā tādisesu cīvaresu uppajjamānesu yathāvuttasallakkhitavassassa bhikkhuno heṭṭhato paṭṭhāya punappunaṃ gāhetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1516_10: “Ṭhitikāya abhāve therāsanato paṭṭhāya dātabbānī”ti vacanato tasmiṃ vasse vassāvāsikacīvarānaṃ anuppajjanato
tika-vin08t0:1516_11: vā uppajjamānesupi ṭhitikāya agāhāpanato vā vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya abhāve sati laddhabbakathinānisaṃse
tika-vin08t0:1516_12: tassaṃ upacārasīmāyaṃ sabbe bhikkhū paṭipāṭiyā nisīdāpetvā therāsanato paṭṭhāya ṭhitikaṃ katvā ekekassa
tika-vin08t0:1516_13: bhikkhuno ekekaṃ cīvaraṃ vā sāṭakaṃ vā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1516_17: ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ datvā pacchā ṭhitikāya dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1516_18: Dutiyabhāge pana therāsanaṃ āruḷhe pacchā āgatānaṃ paṭhamabhāgo na pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:1517_0: Nanu ca bho ekaccāni kathinānisaṃsacīvarāni mahagghāni,
tika-vin08t0:1517_2: kathaṃ ekekassa ekekasmiṃ dinne agghasamattaṃ bhaveyyāti? Vuccate –
tika-vin08t0:1517_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ cīvarakkhandhake “tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa bhaṇḍāgāre cīvaraṃ ussannaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1517_9: atha kho cīvarabhājakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi ‘kathaṃ nu kho cīvaraṃ bhājetabba’nti.
tika-vin08t0:1517_13: paṭhamaṃ uccinitvā tulayitvā vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ katvā bhikkhū gaṇetvā vaggaṃ bandhitvā cīvarapaṭivīsaṃ ṭhapetu”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1517_24: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ katvāti sace sabbesaṃ ekekameva dasadasaagghanakaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:1517_27: yaṃ nava vā aṭṭha vā agghati,
tika-vin08t0:1517_28: taṃ aññena ekaagghanakena ca dviagghanakena ca saddhiṃ bandhitvā etena upāyena same paṭivīse ṭhapetvāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1517_29: Bhikkhū gaṇetvā vaggaṃ bandhitvāti sace ekekassa dīyamāne divaso na pahoti,
tika-vin08t0:1517_30: dasa dasa bhikkhū gaṇetvā dasa dasa cīvarapaṭivīse ekavaggaṃ bandhitvā ekaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā evaṃ cīvarapaṭivīsaṃ ṭhapetuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1517_31: Evaṃ ṭhapitesu cīvarapaṭivīsesu kuso pātetabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1518_0: Imasmiṃ pana kathinānisaṃsacīvarabhājane agghasamattaṃ na icchitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1518_2: Tathā hi vuttaṃ kathinakkhandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “evaṃ atthate pana kathine sace kathinacīvarena saddhiṃ
tika-vin08t0:1518_3: ābhataṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dāyakā ‘yena amhākaṃ kathinaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1518_8: tasmā sace kathinatthārakassa sesacīvarānipi dubbalāni honti,
tika-vin08t0:1518_9: saṅghena apaloketvā tesampi atthāya vatthāni dātabbāni,
tika-vin08t0:1518_12: Ṭhitikāya abhāve therāsanato paṭṭhāya dātabbāni”icceva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1518_13: na vuttaṃ “agghaparicchedaṃ katvā”ti vā “kusapāto kātabbo”ti vā.
tika-vin08t0:1518_14: Tena ñāyati “kathinānisaṃsacīvarāni vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya vā vuḍḍhatarato vā paṭṭhāyeva dātabbāni,
tika-vin08t0:1519_0: Idāni pana vassāvāsikabhāvena adinnattā vassāvāsikaṭhitikāya akatattā ca kathinatthatacīvarato ca kathinatthārakassa
tika-vin08t0:1519_1: avasesacīvaratthāya dinnavatthato ca avasesakathinānisaṃse balavavatthāni vuḍḍhatarato paṭṭhāya ekassa
tika-vin08t0:1519_3: tesu pana varaṃ varaṃ vuḍḍhassa dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1519_5: “Pacchimavassūpanāyikadivase pana sace kālaṃ ghosetvā sannipatite saṅghe koci dasahatthaṃ vatthaṃ āharitvā vassāvāsikaṃ deti,
tika-vin08t0:1519_9: sammatena bhikkhunā saṅghatthero vattabbo ‘sace, bhante, icchatha,
tika-vin08t0:1519_12: Sace pana pubbe gāhitaṃ muñcitvā gaṇhāti, dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1519_13: Eteneva upāyena dutiyattherato paṭṭhāya parivattetvā pattaṭṭhāne āgantukassa dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1519_14: Sace paṭhamavassūpagatā dve tīṇi cattāri pañca vā vatthāni alatthuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1519_15: laddhaṃ laddhaṃ eteneva upāyena vissajjāpetvā yāva āgantukassa samakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1519_17: Tena pana samake laddhe avasiṭṭho anubhāgo therāsane dātabbo”ti senāsanakkhandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato
tika-vin08t0:1519_18: taṃsaṃvaṇṇanābhūtāyaṃ vimativinodaniyañca “āgantuko sace bhikkhūti cīvare gāhite pacchā āgato āgantuko bhikkhu.
tika-vin08t0:1519_20: Paṭhamavassūpagatāti āgantukassa āgamanato puretarameva pacchimikāya vassūpanāyikāya vassūpagatā.
tika-vin08t0:1519_21: Laddhaṃ laddhanti dāyakānaṃ santikā āgatāgatasāṭaka”nti vacanato,
tika-vin08t0:1519_22: vajirabuddhiṭīkāyañca “paṭhamabhāgaṃ muñcitvāti idaṃ ce paṭhamagāhitavatthuto mahagghaṃ hotīti likhita”nti vacanato ca viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1519_23: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ṭīkāsu ca vassāvāsikadāne pacchā ābhataṃ mahagghavatthaṃ mahātherato paṭṭhāya parivattetvā
tika-vin08t0:1519_24: tehi anicchitaṃyeva vassaggena pattassa pacchā āgatassa bhikkhuno dātabbabhāvassa vuttattā varaṃ varaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1520_0: “Sace paṭhamavassūpagatā dve tīṇi cattāri pañca vā vatthāni alatthu”nti vatthagaṇanāya eva vuttattā,
tika-vin08t0:1520_1: agghagaṇanāya avuttattā ca kathinānisaṃsavatthassa ca vassāvāsikagatikabhāvassa vacanato kathinānisaṃsavatthāni vatthagaṇanāvaseneva bhājetabbāni,
tika-vin08t0:1520_3: teneva ca kāraṇena “yo bahūni kathinānisaṃsavatthāni deti,
tika-vin08t0:1520_5: Bahūni hi kathinānisaṃsavatthāni vibhajanakāle saṅghassa upakārakāni hontīti.
tika-vin08t0:1523_0: Cintayitvā punappunaṃ, yuttaṃ ce dhārayantu taṃ;
tika-vin08t0:1525_1: so nesaṃ bhavissatī”ti cīvarasseva atthatakathinānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santakabhāvassa bhagavatā vuttattā cīvarato
tika-vin08t0:1525_2: aññāni saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnāni piṇḍapātādīni vatthūni upacārasīmaṃ paviṭṭhassa āgatāgatassa saṅghassa
tika-vin08t0:1525_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kathinaṃ attharāpetvā dānañca bhuñjitvā gamissanti,
tika-vin08t0:1525_8: sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhapaṭivīsaṃ dātu”nti pāṭhaṃ upanissāya kathinānisaṃsacīvarampi sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhapaṭivīsaṃyeva denti,
tika-vin08t0:1525_10: Bhaṇḍāgāre ṭhapitañhi akālacīvarameva sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhapaṭivīsaṃ katvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1525_12: Vuttañhetaṃ cīvarakkhandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhapaṭivīsanti ettha ye sāmaṇerā attissarā bhikkhusaṅghassa kattabbakammaṃ na karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1525_16: Ye pana purebhattañca pacchābhattañca bhikkhusaṅghasseva kattabbakiccaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1525_18: Idañca piṭṭhisamaye uppannena bhaṇḍāgāre ṭhapitena akālacīvareneva kathitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1526_0: Kacci nu kho sāmaṇerā vassaṃ upagatā,
tika-vin08t0:1526_8: ānisaṃsañca labhatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vacanato vajirabuddhiṭīkāyañca “pacchimikāya upasampanno paṭhamapavāraṇāya pavāretumpi labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1526_10: ānisaṃsañca labhatīti sāmaṇerānaṃ vassūpagamanaṃ anuññātaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1527_0: Tatruppādesu kathinānisaṃsesu yadi ārāmikā taṇḍulādīhi vatthāni cetāpenti,
tika-vin08t0:1527_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “tatruppādena taṇḍulādinā vatthūsu cetāpitesu atthatakathinānameva tāni vatthāni pāpuṇanti.
tika-vin08t0:1527_5: Vatthehi pana taṇḍulādīsu cetāpitesu sabbesaṃ tāni pāpuṇantīti vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1527_6: “Sace pana ekasīmāyaṃ bahū vihārā hontī”ti ettha katarasīmā adhippetāti?
tika-vin08t0:1527_10: upacārasīmaṭṭhassa matakacīvarādibhāgiyatāya baddhasīmāya tatruppādābhāvato viññeyyametaṃ ‘upacārasīmāva adhippetā’ti”.
tika-vin08t0:1528_0: Evaṃ kathinatthāraṃ dassetvā saṅghe rucitāya mātikāpalibodhaubbhāre adassetvāva ante ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ “atthatakathinānaṃ vo bhikkhave”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1528_9: Tattha atthatakathino bhikkhu katapariyositaṃ cīvaraṃ ādāya “imaṃ vihāraṃ na paccessāmī”ti pakkamati,
