tika-vin08t0:1528_12: Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro pakkamanamevassa antabhūtattā pakkamanantiko nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1529_0: Atthatakathino bhikkhu aniṭṭhitameva attano bhāgabhūtaṃ cīvaraṃ ādāya aññaṃ vihāraṃ gato,
tika-vin08t0:1529_1: tassa bahiupacārasīmagatassa evaṃ hoti “imasmiṃyeva vihāre imaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1529_4: tassa bhikkhuno tasmiṃ cīvare niṭṭhite kathinubbhāro hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1529_5: Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro cīvaraniṭṭhānamevassa antoti niṭṭhānantiko nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1530_1: tassa bahiupacārasīmagatassa evaṃ hoti “imaṃ cīvaraṃ neva kāressāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1530_3: tassa bhikkhuno tena sanniṭṭhānena kathinubbhāro hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1530_4: Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro sanniṭṭhānamevassa antoti sanniṭṭhānantiko nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1531_0: Atthatakathino bhikkhu akatameva cīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati,
tika-vin08t0:1531_1: bahisīmagatassa tassa evaṃ hoti “idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1531_6: Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro nāsanamevassa antoti nāsanantiko nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1532_0: Atthatakathino bhikkhu akatacīvaramādāya “imaṃ vihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti cintetvā pakkamati,
tika-vin08t0:1532_1: tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti “idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressāmī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1532_2: so katacīvaro suṇāti “vihāre kira saṅghena kathinaṃ ubbhata”nti,
tika-vin08t0:1532_4: Ayaṃ kathinabbhāro savanamevassa antoti savanantiko nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1533_1: tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti “idha bahisīmāyameva cīvarapaccāsaṃ payirupāsāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1533_4: so taṃ cīvarapaccāsaṃ alabhamāno cīvarāsā pacchijjati,
tika-vin08t0:1534_0: Atthatakathino bhikkhu akatacīvaraṃ ādāya “imaṃ vihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti cintetvā pakkamati,
tika-vin08t0:1534_2: so katacīvaro “vihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti cintento bahiupacārasīmāyameva kathinubbhārakālaṃ vītināmeti,
tika-vin08t0:1534_4: Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro cīvarakālassa antimadivasasaṅkhātāya sīmāya atikkantattā sīmātikkantiko nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1535_0: Atthatakathino bhikkhu cīvaraṃ ādāya “imaṃ vihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti cintetvā pakkamati,
tika-vin08t0:1535_1: so katacīvaro “vihāraṃ paccessāmī”ti cintento paccāgantvā vihāre kathinubbhāraṃ pappoti,
tika-vin08t0:1535_2: tassa bhikkhuno vihāre bhikkhūhi saha kathinubbhāro bhavati.
tika-vin08t0:1535_3: Ayaṃ kathinubbhāro vihāre bhikkhūhi saha katattā sahubbhāro nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1535_4: Ayaṃ aṭṭhavidho kathinubbhāro aṭṭha mātikā nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1535_7: mātikā kathinassa ubbhārāya pakkamanantikā niṭṭhānantikā sanniṭṭhānantikā nāsanantikā savanantikā āsāvacchedikā sīmātikkantikā sahubbhārāti.
tika-vin08t0:1537_0: Savanamāsā ca sīmā ca, sahubbhāroti aṭṭhimā”ti. ;
tika-vin08t0:1538_3: tasmiṃ vasissāmī”ti aññattha gacchantopi “puna taṃ vihāraṃ āgacchissāmī”ti sāpekkho hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1538_5: Tassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ akataṃ vā hoti apariyositaṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:1538_6: “aññato cīvaraṃ lacchāmī”ti āsā vā anupacchinnā hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1538_22: bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ akataṃ vā hoti vippakataṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:1539_1: Tattha bahiupacārasīmagatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena vuttā satta kathinubbhārā ca bahiupacārasīmaṃ gantvā
tika-vin08t0:1539_2: nivattetvā kathinatthatavihāre antarubbhāraṃ patvā bhikkhūhi saha antarubbhārassa katattā sahubbhārasaṅkhāto
tika-vin08t0:1539_3: eko kathinubbhāro cāti ime aṭṭha kathinubbhārā aṭṭhamātikāya paviṭṭhattā aṭṭhamātikāubbhāro nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1539_4: Bahisīmaṃ agantvā tasmiṃyeva vihāre nisīditvā kathinubbhāraṃ ñattidutiyakammavācāya kathinubbhāro aṭṭhamātikāya
tika-vin08t0:1539_5: appaviṭṭho hutvā kālaparicchedaṃ appatvā antarāyeva katattā antarubbhāro nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1540_2: Antarubbhāro bahisīmaṃ agantvā antosīmāyameva ṭhitehi bhikkhūhi kato.
tika-vin08t0:1540_3: Sahubbhāro bahisīmaṃ gatena bhikkhunā paccāgantvā taṃ antarubbhāraṃ patvā tehi antosīmaṭṭhehi bhikkhūhi saha katoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-vin08t0:1540_4: Pakkamanantikādayo satta kathinubbhārā na kammavācāya katā,
tika-vin08t0:1540_5: kevalaṃ dvinnaṃ palibodhānaṃ upacchedena pañcahi ānisaṃsehi vigatattā kathinubbhārā nāma honti.
tika-vin08t0:1543_1: Pakkamanantikādayo satta mātikā bahisīmaṃ gantvā antarubbhāraṃ sampattassa vasena vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:1543_2: sahubbhāro imāsaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ vasena ca.
tika-vin08t0:1543_3: Antarubbhāratopi vāti bahisīmaṃ agantvā tattheva vasitvā kathinubbhārakammena ubbhatakathinānaṃ vasena
tika-vin08t0:1543_4: labbhanato antarubbhāroti mahesinā kathinassa ubbhārā duve vuttāti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:1543_6: bahisīmaṃ agatānaṃ vasena antarubbhāroti ekoyeva ubbhāro dvidhā vutto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1544_0: Kasmā pana antarubbhāravasena kammavācāya kathinaṃ ubbhatanti?
tika-vin08t0:1544_1: Mahādānaṃ dātukāmehi upāsakehi āgatassa saṅghassa akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmehi yācitattā.
tika-vin08t0:1544_2: Vuttañhi bhikkhunīvibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ “tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena saṅghaṃ uddissa vihāro kārāpito hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1544_3: so tassa vihārassa mahe ubhatosaṅghassa akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmo hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1544_4: Tena kho pana samayena ubhatosaṅghassa kathinaṃ atthataṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1544_5: Atha kho so upāsako saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṃ yācī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1545_0: Etena ca kathinubbhārena pubbe kataṃ kathinadussadānañattidutiyakammavācaṃ ubbhatanti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1545_4: tāya kammavācāya kathinadussadānassa sijjhanato imāya kathinubbhārakammavācāya taṃ pubbe dinnadussaṃ puna āharāpetabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin08t0:1545_6: Yasmā pana imāya kathinubbhārakammavācāya pañcānisaṃsavigamanameva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1545_8: Tena viññāyati “pañcānisaṃsalābhakāraṇaṃ attharaṇakammameva imāya kathinabbhārakammavācāya uddharīyati,
tika-vin08t0:1545_10: tasmā kathinubbhārakammavācākaraṇato pacchā saṅghassa uppannaṃ cīvaraṃ akālacīvaraṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1545_12: cīvaraṃ sabbasaṅghikaṃ hutvā āgatāgatassa saṅghassa bhājanīyaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1545_13: Ayamattho kathinadussadānañattidutiyakammavācāya ca kathinubbhārakammavācāya ca atthañca adhippāyañca
tika-vin08t0:1546_13: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kīdiso kathinuddhāro dātabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1547_0: Ānisaṃsakathāyaṃ pañcāti idāni vuccamānā anāmantacārādayo pañca kiriyā.
tika-vin08t0:1547_4: Yo hi dāyakehi bhattena nimantito hutvā sabhatto samāno vihāre santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāmantetvā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1547_6: sā āpatti atthatakathinassa na hotīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1547_7: Tattha cārittasikkhāpadaṃ nāma “yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1547_8: vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya aññatra samayā,
tika-vin08t0:1547_12: Cīvaravippavāsoti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatarena vā sabbena vā vinā hatthapāse akatvā aruṇuṭṭhāpanaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1547_13: evaṃ karotopi dutiyakathinasikkhāpadena āpatti na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1547_14: Tattha ca dutiyakathinasikkhāpadaṃ nāma “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ pana bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekarattampi
tika-vin08t0:1547_15: ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā,
tika-vin08t0:1548_0: Gaṇabhojananti etena gaṇabhojanasikkhāpadena anāpatti vuttāti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:1548_1: Tattha gaṇabhojanaṃ nāma “amhākaṃ bhattaṃ dethā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ viññattiyā vā “amhākaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin08t0:1548_2: dāyakānaṃ nimantanena vā akappiyavohārena cattāro vā atirekā vā bhikkhū ekato paṭiggaṇhitvā ekato bhuñjanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1548_4: Tatthāyaṃ samayo gilānasamayo cīvaradānasamayo cīvarakārasamayo addhānagamanasamayo nāvābhiruhanasamayo mahāsamayo samaṇabhattasamayo,
tika-vin08t0:1548_5: ayaṃ tattha samayo”ti āgataṃ bhojanavagge dutiyasikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1548_6: Anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ vaṭṭatīti paṭhamakathinasikkhāpadena āpatti na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1548_7: Tattha paṭhamakathinasikkhāpadaṃ nāma “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ pana bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1548_8: taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti āgataṃ nissaggiyesu paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1548_13: taṃ tesaṃ bhavissatīti iminā cīvarameva kathinatthārakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1548_14: tato aññaṃ piṇḍapātabhesajjādikaṃ āgatāgatassa saṅghassa santakaṃ hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1555_1: Evaṃ kathinavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni garubhaṇḍādivinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ “garubhaṇḍānīti etthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1557_0: Garu tīsu mahante ca, dujjarālahukesu cā”ti. –
tika-vin08t0:1558_2: bhaṇḍaṃ mūladhanepi cā”ti ettha bhājanādiparikkhārattho hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1558_3: Vacanattho pana garanti uggacchanti uggatā pākaṭā hontīti garūni,
tika-vin08t0:1558_5: garūni ca tāni bhaṇḍāni cāti garubhaṇḍāni,
tika-vin08t0:1558_7: Iti ādinā nayena senāsanakkhandhake bhagavatā dassitāni imāni pañca vatthūni garubhaṇḍāni nāmāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1559_0: Mañcesu masārakoti mañcapāde vijjhitvā tattha aṭaniyo pavesetvā kato.
tika-vin08t0:1559_1: Bundikābaddhoti aṭanīhi mañcapāde ḍaṃsāpetvā pallaṅkasaṅkhepena kato.
tika-vin08t0:1559_5: Āhaccapādakoti ayaṃ pana “āhaccapādako nāma mañco aṅge vijjhitvā kato hotī”ti evaṃ parato pāḷiyaṃyeva vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1559_6: tasmā aṭaniyo vijjhitvā tattha pādasikhaṃ pavesetvā upari āṇiṃ datvā katamañco āhaccapādakoti veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1560_0: Uṇṇabhisiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ aññatarāti uṇṇabhisi coḷabhisi vākabhisi tiṇabhisi paṇṇabhisīti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ bhisīnaṃ aññatarā.
tika-vin08t0:1560_3: Tattha uṇṇaggahaṇena na kevalaṃ eḷakalomameva gahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1560_4: ṭhapetvā pana manussalomaṃ yaṃ kiñci kappiyākappiyamaṃsajātīnaṃ pakkhicatuppadānaṃ lomaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1560_7: channaṃ anulomacīvarānañca aññatarena bhisicchaviṃ katvā taṃ sabbaṃ pakkhipitvā bhisiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1560_8: Eḷakalomāni pana apakkhipitvā kambalameva catugguṇaṃ vā pañcaguṇaṃ vā pakkhipitvā katāpi uṇṇabhisisaṅkhameva gacchati.
tika-vin08t0:1560_9: Coḷabhisiādīsu yaṃ kiñci navacoḷaṃ vā purāṇacoḷaṃ vā saṃharitvā vā anto pakkhipitvā vā katā coḷabhisi,
tika-vin08t0:1560_10: yaṃ kiñci vākaṃ pakkhipitvā katā vākabhisi,
tika-vin08t0:1560_11: yaṃ kiñci tiṇaṃ pakkhipitvā katā tiṇabhisi,
tika-vin08t0:1560_12: aññatra suddhatamālapattaṃ yaṃ kiñci paṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā katā paṇṇabhisīti veditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1560_16: mañcabhisi pīṭhabhisi bhūmattharaṇabhisi caṅkamanabhisi pādapuñchanabhisīti etāsaṃ anurūpato sallakkhetvā attano rucivasena pamāṇaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1560_20: Etena masūrakaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1561_0: Bimbohane tīṇi tūlāni rukkhatūlaṃ latātūlaṃ poṭakītūlanti.
tika-vin08t0:1561_1: Tattha rukkhatūlanti simbalirukkhādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci rukkhānaṃ tūlaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1561_2: Latātūlanti khīravalliādīnaṃ yāsaṃ kāsañci latānaṃ tūlaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1561_3: Poṭakītūlanti poṭakītiṇādīnaṃ yesaṃ kesañci tiṇajātikānaṃ antamaso ucchunaḷādīnampi tūlaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1561_6: Rukkhavallitiṇajātiyo hi muñcitvā añño bhūtagāmo nāma natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1561_7: tasmā yassa kassaci bhūtagāmassa tūlaṃ bimbohane vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1561_8: bhisiṃ pana pāpuṇitvā sabbampetaṃ “akappiyatūla”nti vuccati na kevalañca bimbohane etaṃ tūlameva,
tika-vin08t0:1561_11: Piyaṅgupupphabakuḷapupphādi pana yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1561_17: yesu kaṭito paṭṭhāya yāva sīsaṃ upadahanti ṭhapenti.
tika-vin08t0:1561_19: sīsappamāṇaṃ nāma yassa vitthārato tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇānaṃ antaraṃ miniyamānaṃ vidatthi ceva caturaṅgulañca hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1561_21: dīghato pana diyaḍḍharatanaṃ vā dviratanaṃ vāti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1561_25: Tattha “tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇāna”nti pāṭhaṃ upanidhāya bimbohanassa ubhosu antesu ṭhapetabbacoḷakaṃ tikoṇameva karonti ekacce.
tika-vin08t0:1562_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “sīsappamāṇaṃ nāma yattha gīvāya saha sakalaṃ sīsaṃ ṭhapetuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:1562_4: taṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā katvā sibbitaṃ yathā koṭito koṭi vitthārato puthulaṭṭhānaṃ muṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1562_7: Taṃ pana antesu ṭhapitacoḷaṃ koṭiyā koṭiṃ āhacca diguṇaṃ kataṃ tikaṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1562_8: tesu tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇānaṃ antaraṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1562_9: majjhaṭṭhānaṃ koṭito koṭiṃ āhacca muṭṭhiratanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1562_10: idamassa ukkaṭṭhappamāṇa”nti vuttattā bimbohanassa ubhosu antesu ṭhapetabbacoḷakaṃ pakatiyāyeva tikaṇṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1562_11: atha kho koṭiyā koṭiṃ āhacca diguṇakatakāleyeva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1562_12: tasmā taṃ coḷakaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā hotu caturassaṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:1562_15: tassa ca coḷakassa majjhaṭṭhānaṃ muṭṭhiratanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1562_16: tasseva coḷakassa pamāṇena bimbohanassa majjhaṭṭhānampi muṭṭhiratanaṃ hotīti viññāyatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1563_1: uṇṇabhisisaṅkhameva gacchatīti sāmaññato vuttattā gonakādiakappiyampi uṇṇamayattharaṇaṃ bhisiyaṃ pakkhipitvā sayituṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1563_3: cammamayaṃ pana bimbohanaṃ tūlapuṇṇampi na vaṭṭatī”ti ca vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1563_4: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “sīsappamāṇanti yattha galavāṭakato paṭṭhāya sabbasīsaṃ upadahanti,
tika-vin08t0:1563_6: tañca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato tiriyaṃ muṭṭhiratanaṃ hotīti dassetuṃ ‘yattha vitthārato tīsu kaṇṇesū’tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1563_7: Majjhaṭṭhānaṃ muṭṭhiratanaṃ hotīti bimbohanassa majjhaṭṭhānaṃ tiriyato muṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1563_10: vaṭṭacāṭi viya hutvā thokaṃ dīghamukho majjhe paricchedaṃ dassetvā katoti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1564_0: Dvisaṅgahāni dve hontīti dve paṭhamadutiyaavissajjiyāni “ārāmo ārāmavatthū”ti ca “vihāro vihāravatthū”ti ca vuttadvedvevatthusaṅgahāni honti.
tika-vin08t0:1564_1: Tatiyaṃ avissajjiyaṃ “mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi bimbohana”nti vuttacatuvatthusaṅgahaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1564_2: Catutthaṃ avissajjiyaṃ “lohakumbhī lohabhāṇakaṃ lohavārako lohakaṭāhaṃ vāsi pharasu kuṭhārī kudālo nikhādana”nti vuttanavakoṭṭhāsavantaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1564_3: Pañcamaṃ avissajjiyaṃ “valli veḷu muñjaṃ pabbajaṃ tiṇaṃ mattikā dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍa”nti vuttaaṭṭhabhedanaṃ aṭṭhapabhedavantaṃ hotīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:1565_0: Senāsanakkhandhake avissajjiyaṃ kīṭāgirivatthusmiṃ avebhaṅgiyanti ettha “senāsanakkhandhake gāmakāvāsavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin08t0:1565_9: Sāmaññādhāro pana taṃsaṃvaṇṇanābhāvato avuttopi sijjhatīti na vuttoti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1566_2: garubhaṇḍena ca garubhaṇḍanti ettha pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu purimadvayaṃ thāvaraṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1566_4: Samakameva detīti ettha ūnakaṃ dentampi vihāravatthusāmantaṃ gahetvā dūrataraṃ dukkhagopaṃ vissajjetuṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1566_9: Nanu tumhākaṃ bahutaraṃ rukkhāti vattabbanti idaṃ sāmikesu attano bhaṇḍassa mahagghataṃ ajānitvā dentesu
tika-vin08t0:1566_10: taṃ ñatvā theyyacittena gaṇhato avahāro hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1566_11: Vihārena vihāro parivattetabboti savatthukena aññesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ katapāsādādinā,
tika-vin08t0:1566_13: avatthukaṃ pana avatthukeneva parivattetabbaṃ kevalaṃ pāsādassa bhūmito athāvarattā.
tika-vin08t0:1567_0: “Kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbāti iminā suvaṇṇādivicittaṃ akappiyamañcaṃ ‘saṅghassā’ti vuttepi sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1567_2: na puggalassa khettādi viyāti daṭṭhabba”nti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1567_3: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbāti ‘saṅghassa demā’ti dinnaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1567_7: parivattetuṃ vaṭṭantīti iminā athāvarena thāvarampi athāvarampi parivattetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1567_8: Thāvarena athāvarameva hi parivattetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1567_9: “Akappiyaṃ vā mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vāti ettha akappiyaṃ nāma suvaṇṇamayamañcādi akappiyabhisibimbohanāni ca.
tika-vin08t0:1567_14: Mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vāti suvaṇṇādivicittaṃ kappiyavohārena dinna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1568_2: bhājetabbo”ti vuttattā vaṭṭakaṃsalohamayampi bhājanaṃ puggalikampi sampaṭicchitumpi pariharitumpi vaṭṭati
tika-vin08t0:1568_4: taṃ upari “kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohabhājanavikati saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭā vā vaṭṭatī”tiādikena mahāpaccarivacanena virujjhati.
tika-vin08t0:1568_5: Imassa hi “vaṭṭalohakaṃsalohānaṃ yena kenaci kato sīhaḷadīpe pādaggaṇhanako bhājetabbo”ti vuttassa mahāaṭṭhakathāvacanassa
tika-vin08t0:1568_7: tasmā vaṭṭalohakaṃsalohamayaṃ yaṃ kiñci pādaggaṇhanakavārakampi upādāya abhājanīyameva,
tika-vin08t0:1568_8: gihīhi dīyamānampi puggalassa sampaṭicchitumpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1568_9: Pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭatīti pattādiparikkhāraṃ viya sayameva paṭisāmetvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1568_10: Gihisantakaṃ viya ārāmikādayo ce sayameva gopetvā viniyogakāle ānetvā paṭidenti,
tika-vin08t0:1570_0: Anāmāsampīti suvaṇṇādimayampi, sabbaṃ taṃ āmasitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1572_0: “Aḍḍhabāhūti kapparato paṭṭhāya yāva aṃsakūṭa”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1572_2: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyampi “aḍḍhabāhūti kapparato paṭṭhāya yāva aṃsakūṭanti likhita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1574_3: Sattaṅgo nāma tīsu disāsu apassayaṃ katvā katamañco,
tika-vin08t0:1574_7: Eḷakapādapīṭhaṃ nāma dārupaṭikāya uparipāde ṭhapetvā bhojanaphalakaṃ viya katapīṭhaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:1575_0: “Ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ nāma yattha ṭhapetvā rajitacīvaraṃ hatthena ghaṭṭenti.
tika-vin08t0:1575_1: Ghaṭṭanamuggaro nāma anuvātādighaṭṭanatthaṃ katoti vadantī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1575_2: Vimativinodaniyaṃ “ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ ghaṭṭanamuggaroti idaṃ rajitacīvaraṃ ekasmiṃ maṭṭhe daṇḍamuggare
tika-vin08t0:1575_3: veṭhetvā ekassa maṭṭhaphalakassa upari ṭhapetvā upari aparena maṭṭhaphalakena nikkujjitvā eko upari akkamitvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin08t0:1575_4: dve janā upariphalakaṃ dvīsu koṭīsu gahetvā aparāparaṃ ākaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhanaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1575_6: Hatthe ṭhapāpetvā hatthena paharaṇaṃ pana niṭṭhitarajanassa cīvarassa allakāle kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1575_7: idaṃ pana phalakamuggarehi ghaṭṭanaṃ sukkhakāle thaddhabhāvavimocanatthanti daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1575_9: Rajanadoṇīti yattha pakkarajanaṃ ākiritvā ṭhapentī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1576_1: Paccattharaṇagatikanti iminā mañcapīṭhepi attharituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:1576_9: Eteneva suttena aññathā atthaṃ vatvā pāvārādipaccattharaṇaṃ na garubhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1576_13: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti akappiyacammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1576_15: Paccattharaṇagatikanti iminā mañcādīsu attharitabbaṃ mahācammaṃ eḷakacammaṃ nāmāti dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1577_1: ārāmo nāma pupphārāmo vā phalārāmo vā.
tika-vin08t0:1577_2: Ārāmavatthu nāma tesaṃyeva ārāmānaṃ atthāya paricchinditvā ṭhapitokāso.
tika-vin08t0:1577_3: Tesu vā ārāmesu vinaṭṭhesu tesaṃ porāṇakabhūmibhāgo.
tika-vin08t0:1577_6: Mañco nāma masārako bundikābaddho kuḷīrapādako āhaccapādakoti imesaṃ pubbe vuttānaṃ catunnaṃ mañcānaṃ aññataro.
tika-vin08t0:1577_7: Pīṭhaṃ nāma masārakādīnaṃyeva catunnaṃ pīṭhānaṃ aññataraṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1577_8: Bhisi nāma uṇṇabhisiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ bhisīnaṃ aññataraṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1577_10: Lohakumbhī nāma kāḷalohena vā tambalohena vā yena kenaci katakumbhī.
tika-vin08t0:1577_15: Vāsiādīsu valliādīsu ca duviññeyyaṃ nāma natthi…pe….
tika-vin08t0:1578_0: Tattha thāvarena thāvaranti vihāravihāravatthunā ārāmaārāmavatthuṃ vihāravihāravatthuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1578_6: Kappiyaparivattanena parivattetunti yathā akappiyaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1578_9: Itarena itaraparivattane pana mañcapīṭhaṃ mahantaṃ vā hotu,
tika-vin08t0:1578_11: antamaso caturaṅgulapādakaṃ gāmadārakehi paṃsvāgārakesu kīḷantehi katampi saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1578_12: satagghanakena vā sahassagghanakena vā mañcena aññaṃ mañcasatampi labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1579_1: Tīṇi hi kittimalohāni kaṃsalohaṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ hārakūṭanti.
tika-vin08t0:1579_7: Sārakoti majjhe makuḷaṃ dassetvā mukhavaṭṭivitthataṃ katvā piṭṭhito nāmetvā kātabbaṃ ekaṃ bhājanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1579_10: Tāni hi khuddakānipi garubhaṇḍāneva gihiupakaraṇattā. Pi-
tika-vin08t0:1579_20: Puggalikaparibhogena na vaṭṭatīti āgantukānaṃ adatvā attano santakaṃ viya gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1579_25: Yathā tathā ghanakataṃ lohanti lohavaṭṭi lohaguḷo lohapiṇḍi lohacakkalikanti evaṃ ghanakataṃ lohaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1580_1: saddena pageva saṅghikaparibhogena vā puggalikaparibhogena vāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1581_3: Nikhādanaṃ caturassamukhaṃ vā hotu doṇimukhaṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā ujukaṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:1581_7: Tenāha “kudālo daṇḍabandhanikhādanaṃ vā agarubhaṇḍaṃ nāma natthī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1581_9: sikharaṃ pana daṇḍabandhanikhādanaṃ anulometīti āha “sikharampi nikhādaneneva saṅgahita”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1582_3: tīṇi pipphalikaṃ anulomantīti āha “ayaṃ pana viseso”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1583_3: ārakkhasaṃvidhānena rakkhitattā rakkhitā ca sā mañjūsādīsu pakkhittaṃ viya yathā taṃ na nassati,
tika-vin08t0:1583_5: Tatthajātakāpi pana arakkhitā garubhaṇḍameva na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1583_6: Saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kateti iminā saṅghasantakena cetiyasantakaṃ rakkhituṃ parivattituñca vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:1584_0: Aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattoti antamaso dīghaso aṭṭhaṅgulamatto pariṇāhato sīhaḷa-
tika-vin08t0:1584_4: Na vāretabbāti “mā gaṇhitvā gacchathā”ti na nisedhetabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1585_0: Avasesañca chadanatiṇanti muñjapabbajehi avasesaṃ yaṃ kiñci chadanatiṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1585_6: Anuññātavāsi nāma yā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharituṃ sakkāti vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:1585_12: Phātikammaṃ katvāti antamaso taṃagghanakavālikāyapi thāvaraṃ vaḍḍhikammaṃ katvā.
tika-vin08t0:1590_1: Evaṃ garubhaṇḍavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni codanādivinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “codanādivinicchayoti ettha panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1590_9: ko na labhatī”ti idaṃ anuddhaṃsanādhippāyaṃ vināpi codanālakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1590_10: Sīlasampannoti idaṃ dussīlassa vacanaṃ appamāṇanti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1590_11: Bhikkhunīnaṃ pana bhikkhuṃ codetuṃ anissarattā ‘bhikkhunimevā’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1590_12: Satipi bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu anissarabhāve tāhi katacodanāpi codanārahattā codanāyevāti adhippāyena “pañcapi sahadhammikā labhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1590_13: Bhikkhussa sutvā codetītiādinā codako yesaṃ sutvā codeti,
tika-vin08t0:1590_14: tesampi vacanaṃ pamāṇamevāti sampaṭicchitattā tesaṃ codanāpi ruhatevāti dassetuṃ “thero suttaṃ nidassesī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1590_15: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “amūlakacodanāpasaṅgena samūlakacodanālakkhaṇādiṃ dassetuṃ ‘codetuṃ pana ko labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1590_17: ‘Bhikkhussa sutvā codetī’tiādisuttaṃ yasmā ye codakassa aññesaṃ vipattiṃ pakāsenti,
tika-vin08t0:1590_18: tepi tasmiṃ khaṇe codakabhāve ṭhatvāva pakāsenti,
tika-vin08t0:1590_19: tesañca vacanaṃ gahetvā itaropi yasmā codetuñca asampaṭicchantaṃ tehi titthiyasāvakapariyosānehi paṭhamacodakehi sampaṭicchāpetuñca labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1590_20: tasmā idha sādhakabhāvena uddhaṭanti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1591_3: “Antavā loko anantavā loko”tiādikā antaṃ gaṇhāpakadiṭṭhi antaggāhikā nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1591_4: Ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channanti ājīvahetupi āpajjitabbānaṃ uttarimanussadhamme pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1591_10: sūpodanaviññattiyā dukkaṭanti imesaṃ parivāre vuttānaṃ channaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1591_11: Na hetā āpattiyo ājīvahetu eva paññattā sañcarittādīnaṃ aññathāpi āpajjitabbato.
tika-vin08t0:1591_12: Ājīvahetupi etāsaṃ āpajjanaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1591_14: Diṭṭhivipattiājīvavipattīhi codentopi tammūlikāya āpattiyā eva codeti.
tika-vin08t0:1592_1: asakyaputtiyosī”ti avandanakāraṇassa vuttattā antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno na vanditabboti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1592_2: Codetukāmatāya eva avanditvā attanā vattabbassa vuttamatthaṃ ṭhapetvā avandiyabhāve taṃ kāraṇaṃ na hotīti cūḷagaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1592_3: Antimavatthuajjhāpannassa avandiyesu avuttattā tena saddhiṃ sayantassa sahaseyyāpattiyā abhāvato,
tika-vin08t0:1592_4: tassa ca paṭiggahaṇassa ruhanato tadeva yuttataranti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1592_8: tadā na vanditabboti ayamettha viseso veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1592_9: Antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassa hi bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānantasseva bhikkhubhāvo,
tika-vin08t0:1592_12: Yasmā āmisaṃ dento attano icchitaṭṭhāneyeva deti,
tika-vin08t0:1592_13: tasmā paṭipāṭiyā nisinnānaṃ yāgubhattādīni dentena ekassa codetukāmatāya adinnepi codanā nāma na hotīti āha “na tāva tā codanā hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1593_7: Ubbāhikāyāti ubbahanti viyojenti etāya alajjīnaṃ tajjaniṃ vā kalahaṃ vāti ubbāhikā,
tika-vin08t0:1593_10: Alajjussannāya hi parisāya samathakkhandhake āgatehi dasahaṅgehi samannāgatā dve tayo bhikkhū tattheva vuttāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya sammannitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1594_2: bhikkhūhi tasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti,
tika-vin08t0:1594_9: pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu,
tika-vin08t0:1594_11: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1594_12: tathārūpassa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā,
tika-vin08t0:1594_13: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso,
tika-vin08t0:1594_14: vinaye kho pana cheko hoti asaṃhīro,
tika-vin08t0:1594_15: paṭibalo hoti ubho atthapaccatthike assāsetuṃ saññāpetuṃ nijjhāpetuṃ pekkhetuṃ passituṃ pasādetuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1594_23: imehi dasahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ ubbāhikāya sammannituṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1595_4: yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin08t0:1596_1: amhākaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti,
tika-vin08t0:1596_4: saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhuṃ sammanneyya ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1597_1: amhākaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti,
tika-vin08t0:1597_3: Saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhuṃ sammannati ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1597_4: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa ca itthannāmassa ca bhikkhuno sammuti ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1598_0: “Sammato saṅghena itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhu ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1599_0: Tehi ca sammatehi visuṃ vā nisīditvā tassā eva vā parisāya “aññehi na kiñci kathetabba”nti sāvetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1600_1: Kimhi nampi na jānāsīti kimhi nanti vacanampi na jānāsi.
tika-vin08t0:1600_2: Nāssa anuyogo dātabboti nāssa pucchā paṭipucchā dātabbā”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1600_6: Kimhi naṃ nāmāti idaṃ “katarāya vipattiyā etaṃ codesī”ti yāya kāyaci viññāyamānāya bhāsāya vuttepi codakassa
tika-vin08t0:1600_7: vinaye apakataññutāya “sīlācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattīsu katarāyāti maṃ pucchatī”ti viññātuṃ asakkontassa pucchā,
tika-vin08t0:1600_9: Na hi anuvijjako codakaṃ bālaṃ aparicitabhāsāya “kimhi na”nti pucchati.
tika-vin08t0:1600_10: Kimhi nampi na jānāsīti idampi vacanamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1600_11: “Kataravipattiyā”ti vutte “asukāya vipattiyā”ti vattumpi “na jānāsī”ti vacanassa adhippāyameva sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1601_1: “Tassa nayo dātabbo”ti vatvā ca “kimhi naṃ codesīti sīlavipattiyā”tiādi adhippāyappakāsanameva nayadānaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1601_4: Na hi bālo “kataravipattiyaṃ naṃ codesī”ti imassa vacanassa atthe ñātepi vipattippabhedaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1601_8: Aññena vā yena kenaci ākārena aviññutaṃ pakāsetvā vissajjetabbova.
tika-vin08t0:1601_15: Alajjissa paṭiññāya eva kātabbanti vacanapaṭivacanakkameneva dose āvibhūtepi alajjissa “asuddho aha”nti
tika-vin08t0:1601_17: Keci pana “alajjissa etaṃ natthīti suddhapaṭiññāya eva anāpattiyā kātabbanti ayamettha attho saṅgahito”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1601_20: Dosopagamapaṭiññā eva hi idha paṭiññāti adhippetā,
tika-vin08t0:1602_0: Tadatthadīpanatthanti alajjissa dose āvibhūtepi tassa dosopagamapaṭiññāya eva kātabbatādīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1602_2: Saññaṃ datvāti tesaṃ kathāpacchedatthaṃ abhimukhakaraṇatthañca saddaṃ katvā.
tika-vin08t0:1602_3: Vinicchinituṃ ananucchavikoti asuddhoti saññāya codakapakkhe paviṭṭhattā anuvijjakabhāvato bahibhūtattā anuvijjituṃ asakkuṇeyyattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1602_4: Sandehe eva hi sati anuvijjituṃ sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:1602_5: asuddhaladdhiyā pana sati cuditakena vuttaṃ sabbaṃ asaccatopi paṭibhāti,
tika-vin08t0:1603_0: Tathā nāsitakova bhavissatīti iminā vinicchayampi adatvā saṅghato viyojanaṃ nāma liṅganāsanā viya ayampi eko nāsanappakāroti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1603_1: Ekasambhogaparibhogāti idaṃ attano santikā tesaṃ vimocanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1604_0: Viraddhaṃ hotīti sañcicca āpattiṃ āpanno hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1604_1: Ādito paṭṭhāya alajjī nāma natthīti idaṃ “pakkhānaṃ anurakkhaṇatthāya paṭiññaṃ na detī”ti imassa alajjīlakkhaṇasambhavassa karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1604_4: Paṭiññaṃ na detīti “sace mayā katadosaṃ vakkhāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1604_5: mayhaṃ anuvattakā bhijjissantī”ti paṭiññaṃ na deti.
tika-vin08t0:1604_6: Ṭhāne na tiṭṭhatīti lajjiṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin08t0:1604_9: pubbe pakkhikānaṃ paṭiññāya vūpasamitassapi adhikaraṇassa duvūpasantatāya ayampi tathā nāsitakova bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1605_1: Adinnādānavatthuṃ vinicchinantena pañcavīsati avahārā sādhukaṃ sallakkhetabbāti ettha pañcavīsati avahārā nāma pañca pañcakāni,
tika-vin08t0:1605_2: tattha pañca pañcakāni nāma nānābhaṇḍapañcakaṃ ekabhaṇḍapañcakaṃ sāhatthikapañcakaṃ pubbapayogapañcakaṃ theyyāvahārapañcakanti.
tika-vin08t0:1605_3: Tathā hi vuttaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “te pana avahārā pañca pañcakāni samodhānetvā sādhukaṃ sallakkhetabbā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1605_7: ṭhānā cāveyyā”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ vasena labbhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1610_8: Hareyyāti aññassa bhaṇḍaṃ haranto sīse bhāraṃ theyyacitto āmasati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1610_13: Avahareyyāti upanikkhittaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ “dehi me bhaṇḍa”nti vuccamāno “nāhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti bhaṇati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1610_18: Iriyāpathaṃ vikopeyyāti “sahabhaṇḍahārakaṃ nessāmī”ti paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti,
tika-vin08t0:1610_22: Ṭhānā cāveyyāti thalaṭṭhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ theyyacitto āmasati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1610_28: Sassāmikassa pana dāsassa vā tiracchānagatassa vā yathāvuttena abhiyogādinā nayena ādiyanaharaṇa avaharaṇa
tika-vin08t0:1616_0: Tattha sāhatthiko nāma parassa bhaṇḍaṃ sahatthā avaharati.
tika-vin08t0:1616_1: Āṇattiko nāma “asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpeti.
tika-vin08t0:1616_2: Nissaggiyo nāma suṅkaghātaparikappitokāsānaṃ anto ṭhatvā bahi pātanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1616_5: Tattha sace paro anantarāyiko hutvā taṃ avaharati,
tika-vin08t0:1616_7: Parassa vā pana telakumbhiyā pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ avassaṃ pivanakāni upāhanādīni pakkhipati,
tika-vin08t0:1616_10: Tāvakālikabhaṇḍadeyyāni adentassapi eseva nayoti idaṃ sāhatthikapañcakaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1620_2: khilādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena ca sahapayogo veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1620_3: Saṃvidāvahāro nāma “asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ avaharissāmā”ti saṃvidahitvā sammantayitvā avaharaṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1620_4: Evaṃ saṃvidahitvā gatesu hi ekenapi tasmiṃ bhaṇḍe ṭhānā cāvite sabbesaṃ avahāro hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1620_6: Sace hi purebhattādīsu yaṃ kiñci kālaṃ paricchinditvā “asukasmiṃ kāle itthannāmaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti vutto saṅketato apacchā apure taṃ avaharati,
tika-vin08t0:1620_9: Sace hi evaṃ katanimittato apacchā apure “yaṃ avaharā”ti vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1624_0: Tattha yo sandhicchedādīni katvā adissamāno avaharati,
tika-vin08t0:1624_3: Yo pana pasayha balakkārena paresaṃ santakaṃ gaṇhāti gāmaghātakādayo viya,
tika-vin08t0:1624_4: attano pattabalito vā vuttanayeneva adhikaṃ gaṇhāti rājabhaṭādayo viya,
tika-vin08t0:1625_5: na gaṇhissāmī”ti parikappetvā andhakāre pasibbakaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:1625_9: Bahi nīharitvā muñcitvā “sutta”nti ñatvā puna āharitvā ṭhapeti,
tika-vin08t0:1625_21: Sāmikesu nivattantesu sayaṃ disvā paṃsukūlasaññāya “pagevetaṃ mayā gahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1625_27: ekacco pana parapariveṇādīni paviṭṭho kiñci lobhaneyyabhaṇḍaṃ disvā gabbhadvārapamukhaheṭṭhā pāsādadvārakoṭṭhakarukkhamūlādivasena
tika-vin08t0:1625_32: tassa taṃ ādāya parikappitaparicchedaṃ atikkantamatte avahāro hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1625_35: Evamimesaṃ dvinnaṃ parikappānaṃ vasena parikappetvā gaṇhato avahāro parikappāvahāroti veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1626_2: yo bhikkhu uyyānādīsu paresaṃ omuñcitvā ṭhapitaṃ aṅgulimuddikādiṃ disvā “pacchā gaṇhissāmī”ti paṃsunā vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin08t0:1626_3: tassa ettāvatā uddhāro natthīti na tāva avahāro hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1626_4: Yadā pana sāmikā vicinantā apassitvā “sve jānissāmā”ti sālayāva gatā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1626_6: “Paṭicchannakāleyeva etaṃ mama santaka”nti sakasaññāya vā “gatādāni te,
tika-vin08t0:1626_7: chaḍḍitabhaṇḍaṃ ida”nti paṃsukūlasaññāya vā gaṇhantassa pana bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1626_8: Tesu dutiyatatiyadivase āgantvā vicinitvā adisvā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā gatesupi gahitaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyameva.
tika-vin08t0:1626_9: Pacchā ñatvā codiyamānassa adadato sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepe avahāro hoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1626_10: Yasmā tassa payogena tehi na diṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1626_11: Yo pana tathārūpaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhitaṃyeva appaṭicchādetvā theyyacitto pādena akkamitvā kaddame vā vālikāya vā paveseti,
tika-vin08t0:1627_0: Kusaṃ saṅkāmetvā pana avaharaṇaṃ kusāvahāro nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1627_2: yo bhikkhu vilīvamayaṃ vā tālapaṇṇamayaṃ vā katasaññāṇaṃ yaṃ kiñci kusaṃ pātetvā cīvare bhājiyamāne attano
tika-vin08t0:1627_3: koṭṭhāsassa samīpe ṭhitaṃ samagghataraṃ vā mahagghataraṃ vā samasamaṃ vā agghena parassa koṭṭhāsaṃ haritukāmo
tika-vin08t0:1627_4: attano koṭṭhāse patitaṃ kusaṃ parassa koṭṭhāse pātetukāmatāya uddharati,
tika-vin08t0:1627_7: Yadā pana tasmiṃ patite parassa koṭṭhāsato parassa kusaṃ uddharati,
tika-vin08t0:1627_9: Sace paṭhamataraṃ parassa koṭṭhāsato kusaṃ uddharati,
tika-vin08t0:1627_12: Attano koṭṭhāsato pana attano kusaṃ uddharato uddhāreyeva rakkhati,
tika-vin08t0:1627_13: taṃ uddharitvā parakoṭṭhāse pātentassa hatthato muttamatte avahāro hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1629_0: Sāmīcīti vattaṃ, āpatti pana natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1630_2: “Idañca kāsāvaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā etasseva bhikkhuno dehī”ti kiṃ kāraṇā evamāha?
tika-vin08t0:1630_4: tasmā tassa adinnaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1630_5: Avahārakopi vippaṭisārassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya cīvarassāmikaṃ pariyesanto vicarati “dassāmī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1630_6: cīvarassāmikena ca “mameta”nti vutte etenapi avahārakena ālayo pariccatto,
tika-vin08t0:1630_8: Yadi evaṃ cīvarassāmikoyeva “attano santakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti kasmā na vuttoti?
tika-vin08t0:1630_12: itarassa “mayā paṭhamaṃ dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā pacchā adinnaṃ gahita”nti kukkuccaṃ uppajjeyyāti.
tika-vin08t0:1632_1: Mayi santetiādi sabbaṃ raññā pasādena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1633_0: Ekadivasaṃ dantakaṭṭhacchedanādinā yā ayaṃ agghahāni vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:1633_1: sā bhaṇḍassāminā kiṇitvā gahitameva sandhāya vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:1634_0: “Dhāreyya atthaṃ vicakkhaṇo”ti imasseva vivaraṇaṃ “āpattiṃ vā anāpattiṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1634_1: “Sikkhāpadaṃ samaṃ tenā”ti ito pubbe ekā gāthā –
tika-vin08t0:1637_0: Tāya saddhiṃ ghaṭetvā adutiyena parājitakilesena jinena dutiyaṃ yaṃ idaṃ pārājikapadaṃ pakāsitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1637_1: idha tena samaṃ anekanayavokiṇṇaṃ gambhīratthavinicchayaṃ aññaṃ kiñci sikkhāpadaṃ na vijjatīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:1637_2: Tattha parājitakilesenāti santāne puna anuppattidhammatāpādane catūhi maggañāṇehi saha vāsanāya samucchinnasabbakilesena.
tika-vin08t0:1638_5: Vatthumhi otiṇṇeti codanāvasena vā attanāva attano vītikkamārocanavasena vā saṅghamajjhe adinnādānavatthusmiṃ otiṇṇe.
tika-vin08t0:1638_9: Kappiyepi ca vatthusminti attanā gahetuṃ kappiye mātupituādisantakepi vatthusmiṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1639_3: Taṃ vinicchinantena cha ṭhānāni sodhetabbānīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:1639_11: Tattha ettāvatāti ettakena byākaraṇavacanamattena na sakkāro kātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1639_13: Imesu chasu ṭhānesu sodhanatthaṃ evaṃ vattabboti yathā nāma jātarūpapatirūpakampi jātarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti
tika-vin08t0:1639_15: evameva idāneva vuttesu chasu ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā sodhanatthaṃ vattabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1640_0: Sabbesañhi attanā adhigatamaggena pahīnā kilesā pākaṭā hontīti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1640_1: Kassaci hi attanā adhigatamaggavajjhakilesesu sandeho uppajjatiyeva mahānāmassa sakkassa viya.
tika-vin08t0:1640_2: So hi sakadāgāmī samānopi “tassa mayhaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1640_4: ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīno,
tika-vin08t0:1640_5: yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1640_7: mohadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
tika-vin08t0:1640_8: Ayaṃ kira rājā sakadāgāmimaggena lobhadosamohā niravasesā pahīyantīti saññī ahosīti.
tika-vin08t0:1641_6: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “na sujjhatīti pucchiyamāno paṭipattikkamaṃ ullaṅghitvā kathesi.
tika-vin08t0:1641_7: Apanetabboti tayā vuttakkamenāyaṃ dhammo na sakkā adhigantunti adhigatamānato apanetabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1641_9: Paññāyatīti etthāpi “yadī”ti padaṃ ānetvā yadi so bhikkhu tāya paṭipadāya paññāyatīti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:1641_10: Catūsu paccayesu alaggattā “ākāse pāṇisamena cetasā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1641_12: Tattha vuttasadisanti tassa bhikkhuno byākaraṇaṃ imasmiṃ sutte vuttena sadisaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1641_14: Khīṇāsavassa paṭipattisadisā paṭipatti hotīti dīgharattaṃ suvikkhambhitakilesattā,
tika-vin08t0:1641_20: puthujjanassa pana appahīnavipallāsattā jīvitanikantisabbhāvato ca appamattakenapi hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1641_22: ambilādidassane kheḷuppādādinā ca na sakkā vīmaṃsituṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1642_0: Ayaṃ bhikkhu sampannaveyyākaraṇoti idaṃ na kevalaṃ abhāyanakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ ekaccassa sūrajātikassa puthujjanassapi abhāyanato,
tika-vin08t0:1642_1: rajjanīyārammaṇānaṃ badarasāḷavādiambilamaddanādīnaṃ upayojanepi kheḷuppādāditaṇhuppattirahitaṃ sabbathā suvisodhitameva sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1643_7: suttānulomaṃ na jānātī”tiādipāḷito suttaṃ suttānulomañca nīhariṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:1643_8: “anāpatti evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho paripucchāti bhaṇatī”ti evamādito ācariyavādaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1643_9: “āyasmā upāli evamāha ‘anāpatti āvuso supinantenā”ti evamādito attanomatiṃ nīhariṃsu.
tika-vin08t0:1643_10: Sā ca therassa attanomati suttena saṅgahitattā suttaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1643_14: sāṭṭhakathaṃ sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ suttādīsu catūsu padesesu pakkhipitvā catudhā vibhajitvā vinayaṃ pakāsesuṃ tabbinimuttassa abhāvāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1643_16: tāya hi attanomatiyā thero etadaggaṭṭhapanaṃ labhati.
tika-vin08t0:1643_17: Apica vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā ‘anupasampannena paññattena vā apaññattena vā vuccamāno…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1644_2: bhagavatā kaṇṭhādivaṇṇuppattiṭṭhānaṃ āhacca visesetvā bhāsitaṃ padaṃ āhaccapadaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1644_5: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “kaṇṭhādivaṇṇuppattiṭṭhānakaraṇādīhi nīharitvā attano vacīviññattiyāva bhāsitaṃ vacanaṃ āhaccapada”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1644_6: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “aṭṭha vaṇṇaṭṭhānāni āhacca vuttena padanikāyenāti attho,
tika-vin08t0:1644_9: idaṃ na kappatī”ti evaṃ avisesetvā “yaṃ bhikkhave mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1644_12: taṃ vo na kappatī”tiādinā vuttasāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ idha rasoti adhippetanti āha “rasoti suttānuloma”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1644_15: Rasoti vā lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivatthukaṃ anuddharitvā lakkhaṇānulomena vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:1644_19: Dhammasaṅgāhakapabhutiācariyaparamparato ānītā aṭṭhakathātanti idha “ācariyavaṃso”ti adhippetāti āha “ācariyavaṃsoti ācariyavādo”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1644_20: ācariyavādo “ācariyavaṃso”ti vutto pāḷiyaṃ vuttānaṃ ācariyānaṃ paramparāya ābhatova pamāṇanti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1646_5: Atthato pana ‘yaṃ bhikkhave’tiādinā vuttāsādhippāyā pāḷiyeva mahāpadesāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1646_8: tasmā tesaṃ vinicchayakathā tattheva āvi bhavissatīti idha na vuccatī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1646_10: te atthato ‘yaṃ bhikkhavetiādipāḷivasena akappiyānulomato kappiyānulomato ca puggalehi nayato tathā tathā gayhamānā atthanayā eva.
tika-vin08t0:1646_11: Te hi bhagavatā sarūpato avuttesupi paṭikkhittānulomesu anuññātānulomesu ca sesesu kiccesu nivattipavattihetutāya mahāgocarāti ‘mahāpadesā’ti vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:1646_12: na pana ‘yaṃ bhikkhave mayā idaṃ na kappatī’tiādinā vuttā sādhippāyā pāḷiyeva tassā sutte paviṭṭhattā.
tika-vin08t0:1646_15: Na hesā sādhippāyā pāḷi sutte otāretabbā,
tika-vin08t0:1646_18: tasmā imaṃ pāḷiadhippāyaṃ nissāya puggalehi gahitā yathāvuttaatthāva suttānulomaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1646_19: taṃpakāsakattā pana ayaṃ pāḷipi suttānulomanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1646_21: ‘Yaṃ bhikkhave’tiādipāḷinayena hi puggalehi gahitabbā ye akappiyānulomādayo atthā vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:1647_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyampi “parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ idha ca kiñcāpi ‘suttānulomaṃ nāma cattāro mahāpadesā’ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1647_1: atha kho mahāpadesanayasiddhaṃ paṭikkhittāpaṭikkhittaṃ anuññātānanuññātaṃ kappiyākappiyanti atthato vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1647_2: Tattha yasmā ‘ṭhānaṃ okāso padesoti kāraṇavevacanāni ‘aṭṭhānametaṃ, ānanda,
tika-vin08t0:1647_4: ‘niggahaṭṭhāna’nti ca ‘asandiṭṭhiṭṭhāna’nti ca ‘asandiṭṭhi ca pana padeso’ti ca lokato,
tika-vin08t0:1647_7: mahantabhāvo pana tesaṃ mahāvisayattā mahābhūtānaṃ viya.
tika-vin08t0:1647_13: Tattha dhammanti ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭakaṃ avasesaṃ piṭakadvayaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1648_0: Yadi sāpi tattha tattha bhagavatā pavattitā pakiṇṇakadesanāva aṭṭhakathā,
tika-vin08t0:1648_1: sā pana dhammasaṅgāhakehi paṭhamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa atthavaṇṇanānurūpeneva vācanāmaggaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1648_2: āropitattā “ācariyavādo”ti vuccati “ācariyā vadanti saṃvaṇṇenti pāḷiṃ etenā”ti katvā.
tika-vin08t0:1648_5: Tisso hi saṅgītiyo āruḷhoyeva buddhavacanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhūto kathāmaggo mahāmahindattherena tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ ābhato,
tika-vin08t0:1648_6: pacchā tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapito nikāyantaraladdhisaṅkarapariharaṇatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1648_7: Bhagavato pakiṇṇakadesanābhūtā ca suttānulomabhūtā ca aṭṭhakathā yasmā dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi pāḷivaṇṇanākkamena saṅgahetvā vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:1648_9: Etena ca aṭṭhakathā suttasuttānulomesu atthato saṅgayhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1648_12: Na hi bhagavato vacanaṃ vacanānulomañca anissāya aggasāvakādayopi attano ñāṇabalena suttābhidhammavinayesu
tika-vin08t0:1648_14: tasmā sabbampi vacanaṃ sutte suttānulome ca saṅgayhati.
tika-vin08t0:1648_15: Visuṃ pana aṭṭhakathādīnaṃ saṅgahitattā tadavasesaṃ suttasuttānulomato gahetvā catudhā vinayo niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin08t0:1649_1: tathāpi sā na suttādīsu visesato niddiṭṭhāti āha “suttasuttānulomaācariyavāde muñcitvā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1649_4: Attanomatiṃ sāmaññato paṭhamaṃ dassetvā idāni tameva visesetvā dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1649_5: Tattha “suttantābhidhammavinayaṭṭhakathāsū”ti vacanato piṭakattayassapi sādhāraṇā esā kathāti veditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1649_7: Idāni tattha paṭipajjitabbākāraṃ dassento āha “taṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1649_8: Tattha atthenāti attanā nayato gahitena atthena.
tika-vin08t0:1649_9: Pāḷinti attano gāhassa nissayabhūtaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷiṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1649_15: Otarati ceva sameti cāti attanā uddhaṭehi saṃsandanavasena otarati,
tika-vin08t0:1649_17: Sabbadubbalāti asabbaññupuggalassa dosavāsanāya yāthāvato atthasampaṭipattiabhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1650_0: Pamādapāṭhavasena ācariyavādassa suttānulomena asaṃsandanāpi siyāti āha “itaro na gahetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1650_2: evarūpāva atthā mahāpadesato uddharitabbāti dasseti tathā tathā uddhaṭaatthānaṃyeva suttānulomattā.
tika-vin08t0:1650_4: Atha vā suttānulomassa suttekadesattepi sutte viya “idaṃ kappati,
tika-vin08t0:1650_5: idaṃ na kappatī”ti paricchinditvā āhaccabhāsitaṃ kiñci natthīti āha “suttā…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1650_11: Sutte hi paṭibāhite buddhova paṭibāhito hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1650_12: “Sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā kathetīti sakavādī attano suttaṃ gahetvā voharati.
tika-vin08t0:1650_13: Paravādī suttānulomanti aññanikāyavādī attano nikāye suttānulomaṃ gahetvā kathetī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1651_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā kathetītiādīsu yo yathābhūtamatthaṃ gahetvā kathanasīlo,
tika-vin08t0:1651_3: Paravādīti mahāvihāravāsī vā hotu aññanikāyavāsī vā,
tika-vin08t0:1651_6: Suttānulomanti saṅgītittayāruḷhaṃ vā anāruḷhaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci vipallāsato vā vañcanāya vā ‘saṅgītittayāgatamida’nti dassiyamānaṃ suttānulomaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1651_8: taṃ na yuttaṃ sakavādīparavādīnaṃ ubhinnampi saṅgītittayāruḷhasuttādīnameva gahetabbato.
tika-vin08t0:1651_9: Tathā hi vakkhati ‘tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:1651_11: Na hi sakavādī aññanikāyasuttādiṃ pamāṇato gaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:1651_12: Yena tesu suttādīsu dassitesu tattha ṭhātabbaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1651_13: vakkhati ca ‘paro tassa akappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1651_15: tasmā paravādināpi saṅgītittaye anāruḷhampi anāruḷhamicceva dassīyati,
tika-vin08t0:1651_16: kevalaṃ tassa tassa suttādino saṅgītittaye anāgatassa kūṭatā,
tika-vin08t0:1651_17: āgatassa ca byañjanacchāyāya aññathā adhippāyayojanā ca visesā,
tika-vin08t0:1651_21: taṃ tassa viparītatādassanatthaṃ tadaññena suttādinā saṃsandanā karīyati.
tika-vin08t0:1651_22: Yo pana paravādinā gahito adhippāyo suttantādinā saṃsandati,
tika-vin08t0:1651_23: so sakavādināpi attano gāhaṃ vissajjetvā gahetabboti ubhinnampi saṅgītittayāgatameva suttaṃ pamāṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1651_24: Teneva kathāvatthupakaraṇe ‘sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcā’ti,
tika-vin08t0:1652_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “paravādīti amhākaṃ samayavijānanako aññanikāyikoti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1652_3: tadanulomato nāḷikeraphalassa udakampi udakameva hotīti paravādī ca.
tika-vin08t0:1655_0: Evaṃ paravādinā vutte sakavādī dhaññaphalassa gatikattā,
tika-vin08t0:1655_1: āhāratthassa ca pharaṇato ‘yāvakālikameva ta’nti vadanto paṭikkhipatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1655_2: Khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvāti “kiṃ iminā”ti khepaṃ paṭikkhepaṃ chaḍḍanaṃ vā “kimesa bālo vadati,
tika-vin08t0:1655_3: kimesa bālo jānātī”ti garahaṃ nindaṃ vā akatvā.
tika-vin08t0:1655_6: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “sutte otāretabbanti yassa suttassa anulomanato idaṃ suttānulomaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1655_7: tadanurūpe vā aññatarasmiṃ sutte attanā gahitaṃ suttānulomaṃ atthato saṃsandanavasena otāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1655_8: ‘Iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena imasmiṃ sutte saṃsandatī’ti saṃsandetvā dassetabbanti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1655_12: Ācariyavādo sutte otāretabboti yassa suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāvasena ayaṃ ācariyavādo pavatto, tasmiṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1655_13: tādise ca aññasmiṃ sutte pubbāparaatthasaṃsandanavasena otāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1656_1: paro ācariyavādanti “suṅkaṃ pariharatīti ettha upacāraṃ okkamitvā kiñcāpi pariharati,
tika-vin08t0:1656_2: avahāro evā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato “tathā karonto pārājikamāpajjatī”ti paravādinā vutte sakavādī “suṅkaṃ pariharati,
tika-vin08t0:1656_3: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti suttaṃ tattheva āgatamahāaṭṭhakathāvacanena saddhiṃ dassetvā paṭisedheti.
tika-vin08t0:1656_5: Paro attanomatinti ettha “purebhattaṃ parasantakaṃ avaharāti purebhattameva harissāmīti vāyamantassa pacchābhattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1656_7: tasmā mūlaṭṭho na muccatīti tumhākaṃ theravādattā mūlaṭṭhassa pārājikamevā”ti paravādinā vutte sakavādī
tika-vin08t0:1656_8: “taṃ saṅketaṃ pure vā pacchā vā taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati,
tika-vin08t0:1657_0: Paro suttanti “aniyatahetudhammo sammattaniyatahetudhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti suttaṃ paṭṭhāne
tika-vin08t0:1657_1: likhitaṃ dassetvā “ariyamaggassa na nibbānamevārammaṇa”nti paravādinā vutte sakavādī ārammaṇattikādisuttānulomena
tika-vin08t0:1657_3: Suttānulome otarantaṃyeva hi suttaṃ nāma, netaraṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1657_4: Tena vuttaṃ “pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyatī”ti ettakenapi siddhe “tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ paññāyatī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1657_7: pamādo maccuno pada”nti vacanato dinnabhojane bhuñjitvā parissayāni parivajjitvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā viharanto nicco hotīti.
tika-vin08t0:1657_8: Evarūpassa atthassa āruḷhampi suttaṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1657_9: Tena vuttaṃ “no ce tathā paññāyatī”ti siddhepi “no ce tathā paññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:1657_11: Bāhirakasuttaṃ vā”ti vuttattā attano suttampi atthena asamentaṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1657_12: Paro ācariyavādantiādīsu dvīsu nayesu pamādalekhavasena tattha tattha āgataṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ theravādehi saddhiṃ yojetvā veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1658_1: paro suttanti paravādinā “mūlabījaṃ nāma haliddi siṅgiveraṃ vacā…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1658_2: bīje bījasaññī chindati vā chedāpeti vā bhindati vā…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1658_3: āpatti pācittiyassā”ti tumhākaṃ pāṭhattā “haliddigaṇṭhiṃ chindantassa pācittiya”nti vutte sakavādī “yāni vā panaññāni atthi mūle jāyanti,
tika-vin08t0:1658_4: mūle sañjāyantī”tiādiṃ dassetvā tassa aṭṭhakathāsaṅkhātena ācariyavādena paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin08t0:1658_6: Paro suttānulomanti paravādinā “anāpatti evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho”ti vacanassānulomato “amhākaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1658_7: porāṇabhikkhū ekapāsāde gabbhaṃ thaketvā anupasampannena sayituṃ vaṭṭatīti tathā katvā āgatā,
tika-vin08t0:1658_8: tasmā amhākaṃ vaṭṭatīti tumhesu eva ekaccesu vadantesu “tumhākaṃ na kiñci vattuṃ sakkā”ti vutte sakavādī
tika-vin08t0:1658_9: “suttaṃ suttānulomañca uggahitakānaṃyeva ācariyānaṃ uggaho pamāṇa”ntiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā paṭisedheti.
tika-vin08t0:1658_10: Paro attanomatinti “dvāraṃ vivaritvā anāpucchā sayitesu ke muccantī”ti ettha pana dvepi janā muccanti –
tika-vin08t0:1658_12: yo ca bandhitvā nipajjāpitoti tumhākaṃ theravādattā aññe sabbepi yathā tathā vā nipannādayopi muccantīti paṭisedheti.
tika-vin08t0:1659_1: paro suttanti “āpattiṃ āpajjantī”ti paravādinā vutte sakavādī “divā kilantarūpo mañce nisinno pāde bhūmito amocetvāva niddāvasena nipajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1659_2: tassa anāpattī”tiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā ekabhaṅgena nipannādayopi muccantīti paṭisedheti.
tika-vin08t0:1660_1: paro suttānulomanti “domanassampāhaṃ devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi asevitabbampītiādivacanehi
tika-vin08t0:1660_3: tena vuttaṃ ‘puttadārassa saṅgaho”ti paravādinā vutte “kiñcāpi sakavādī bahussuto na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1660_4: atha kho rāgasahiteneva akusalena bhavitabba”nti paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin08t0:1660_5: Sesesupi iminā nayena aññathāpi anurūpato yojetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1660_9: tāni sakavādī attano suttādimhi otāretvā sace sameti, gaṇhāti. No ce,
tika-vin08t0:1661_0: Nanu ca “suttānulomato suttameva balavatara”nti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1661_1: idha pana “suttaṃ suttānulome otāretabba”ntiādi kasmā vuttanti?
tika-vin08t0:1661_3: “suttānulomato suttameva balavatara”nti idañhi sakamateyeva suttaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1661_4: Tattha hi sakamatipariyāpannameva suttādiṃ sandhāya “attanomati sabbadubbalā,
tika-vin08t0:1661_8: Idha pana paravādinā ānītaṃ aññanikāye suttaṃ sandhāya “suttānulome suttaṃ otāretabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1661_9: tasmā paravādinā ānītaṃ suttādi attano suttānulomaācariyavādaattanomatīsu otāretvā samentaṃyeva gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1661_10: itaraṃ na gahetabbanti ayaṃ nayo idha vuccatīti na koci pubbāparavirodhoti ayaṃ sāratthadīpaniyāgato nayo.
tika-vin08t0:1661_11: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “yaṃ kiñci kūṭasuttaṃ bāhirakasuttādivacanaṃ na gahetabbanti dassetuṃ suttaṃ suttānulome otāretabbantiādi vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1662_0: Bāhirakasuttanti tisso saṅgītiyo anāruḷhaguḷhavessantarādīni ca mahāsaṅghikanikāyavāsīnaṃ suttāni.
tika-vin08t0:1662_4: “Attanomatiyameva ṭhātabba”nti iminā aññanikāyato ānītasuttatopi sakanikāye attanomatiyeva balavatarāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1662_6: paravādī suttamevā”ti evamādinā samānajātikānaṃ vasena vāro na vutto.
tika-vin08t0:1662_7: Suttassa sutteyeva otāraṇaṃ bhinnaṃ viya hutvā na paññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:1663_0: Idāni sakavādīparavādīnaṃ kappiyākappiyādibhāvaṃ sandhāya vivāde uppanne tattha paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ
tika-vin08t0:1663_1: dassento āha “atha panāyaṃ kappiyanti gahetvā kathetī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1663_2: Atha vā evaṃ suttasuttānulomādimukhena sāmaññato vivādaṃ dassetvā idāni visesato vivādavatthuṃ tabbinicchayamukhena
tika-vin08t0:1663_4: Tattha sutte ca suttānulome ca otāretabbanti sakavādinā attanoyeva sutte ca suttānulome ca otāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1663_5: Paro kāraṇaṃ na vindatīti paravādī kāraṇaṃ na labhati.
tika-vin08t0:1663_6: Suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dassetīti paravādī attano suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca āharitvā dasseti,
tika-vin08t0:1663_7: “sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā akappiyeyeva ṭhātabba”nti iminā attano nikāye suttādīni alabhantena sakavādinā paravādīvacaneyeva ṭhātabbanti vadati.
tika-vin08t0:1663_8: Sutte ca suttānulome cāti ettha ca-
tika-vin08t0:1663_12: Tattha kāraṇanti suttādinayaṃ nissāya attanomatiyā uddhaṭaṃ hetuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1664_0: Dvinnampi kāraṇacchāyā dissatīti sakavādīparavādīnaṃ ubhinnampi kappiyākappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakacchāyā dissati.
tika-vin08t0:1664_2: “akappiya”nti gāhassa ca nimittabhūtena kicchena paṭipādanīyaṃ avibhūtakāraṇaṃ kāraṇacchāyā,
tika-vin08t0:1664_6: “Vinayaṃ patvā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassento āha “kappiyākappiyavicāraṇaṃ āgammā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1664_7: Rundhitabbantiādīsu dubbiññeyyavinicchaye kappiyākappiyabhāve sati “kappiya”nti gahaṇaṃ rundhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1664_11: Atha vā rundhitabbanti kappiyasaññāya vītikkamakāraṇaṃ rundhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1665_0: Bahūhi suttavinicchayakāraṇehīti bahūhi suttehi ceva tato ānītavinicchayakāraṇehi ca.
tika-vin08t0:1665_1: Atha vā suttena aṭṭhakathāvinicchayena ca laddhakāraṇehi.
tika-vin08t0:1665_2: Attano gahaṇaṃ na vissajjetabbanti sakavādinā attano “akappiya”nti gahaṇaṃ na vissajjetabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1666_2: Keci pana “sakavādīsuyeva yo koci idhādhippeto”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1666_3: evaṃ sante “atha panāyaṃ kappiyanti gahetvā kathetī”tiādīsu sabbattha ubhopi sakavādinoyeva siyuṃ heṭṭhā
tika-vin08t0:1666_6: Atirekakāraṇaṃ labhatīti ettha suttādīsu purimaṃ purimaṃ atirekakāraṇaṃ nāma,
tika-vin08t0:1666_7: yo vā suttādīsu catūsu bahutaraṃ kāraṇaṃ labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1667_8: Ettha ca “suttaṃ nāma sakalaṃ vinayapiṭaka”nti vuttattā puna suttatoti tadatthapaṭipādakaṃ suttābhidhammapāḷivacanaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1667_9: Anubyañjanasoti imassa vivaraṇaṃ “paripucchato ca aṭṭhakathāto cā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1667_10: Pāḷiṃ anugantvā atthassa byañjanato pakāsanato “anubyañjana”nti hi paripucchā aṭṭhakathā ca vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:1667_11: Ettha ca aṭṭhakathāya visuṃ gahitattā “paripucchā”ti theravādo vutto.
tika-vin08t0:1667_12: Atha vā paripucchāti ācariyassa santikā pāḷiyā atthasavanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1667_14: Tadubhayampi pāḷiṃ anugantvā atthassa byañjanato “anubyañjana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1668_2: Tattha patiṭṭhānaṃ nāma sañcicca āpattiyā anāpajjanādinā hotīti āha “lajjibhāvena patiṭṭhito”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1668_4: Vinayadharassa lakkhaṇe vattabbe kiṃ iminā lajjibhāvenāti āha “alajjī hī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1668_6: Lābhagarukatāyāti iminā vinaye ṭhitatāya abhāve paṭhamalakkhaṇayogā kiccakaro na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1668_7: atha kho akiccakaro anatthakaro evāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1668_9: Kukkuccakoti aṇumattesupi vajjesu bhayadassanavasena kukkuccaṃ uppādento.
tika-vin08t0:1669_3: Santiṭṭhituṃ na sakkotīti ekasmiṃyeva atthe patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-vin08t0:1669_6: Sakavādaṃ chaḍḍetvā paravādaṃ gaṇhātīti “ucchumhi kasaṭaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1669_8: tadubhayavinimutto ca ucchu nāma visuṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1669_9: tasmā ucchupi vikāle vaṭṭatī”ti paravādinā vutte tampi gaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:1670_2: yathā ācariyo ca ācariyācariyo ca pāḷiñca paripucchañca vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1670_4: Na hi ācariyānaṃ nāmamattato paramparajānane payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-vin08t0:1670_10: Dve tayo parivaṭṭāti dve tayo paramparā.
tika-vin08t0:1671_0: Imehi ca pana tīhi lakkhaṇehīti ettha paṭhamena lakkhaṇena vinayassa suṭṭhu uggahitabhāvo vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1671_1: dutiyena tattha lajjibhāvena ceva acalatāya ca suppatiṭṭhitatā,
tika-vin08t0:1671_2: tatiyena pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu sarūpena anāgatānampi tadanulomato ācariyehi dinnanayato vinicchinituṃ samatthatā.
tika-vin08t0:1671_3: Otiṇṇe vatthusminti codanāvasena vītikkamavatthusmiṃ saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇe.
tika-vin08t0:1671_4: Codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbeti evaṃ otiṇṇavatthuṃ nissāya codakena “diṭṭhaṃ suta”ntiādinā,
tika-vin08t0:1671_7: Vatthu oloketabbanti tassa tassa sikkhāpadassa vatthu oloketabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1671_10: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hidaṃ nissaggiye aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadassa vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1672_0: Thullaccayadubbhāsitāpattīnaṃ mātikāya anāgatattā “pañcannaṃ āpattīnaṃ aññatara”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1673_0: Antarāpattinti ettha tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade āgatavatthuvītikkamaṃ vinā aññasmiṃ vatthuvītikkame nidānato
tika-vin08t0:1673_2: Idha pana “vatthuṃ oloketī”ti visuṃ gahitattā tadavasesā antarāpattīti gahitā.
tika-vin08t0:1673_4: tattha ḍayhamānaṃ alātaṃ aggikapālādito bahi patitaṃ avijjhātameva paṭiukkhipati,
tika-vin08t0:1674_0: Anāpattinti ettha antarantarā vuttā anāpattipi atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1675_0: Pārājikāpattīti na vattabbanti idaṃ āpannapuggalena lajjidhamme ṭhatvā yathābhūtaṃ āvikaraṇepi dubbinicchayaṃ adinnādānādiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1675_4: Yo pana alajjitāya paṭiññaṃ adatvā vikkhepaṃ karoti,
tika-vin08t0:1675_5: tassa āpatti na sakkā oḷārikāpi vinicchinituṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1675_9: Sukhumāti attanopi duviññeyyasabhāvassa lahuparivattino cittassa sīghaparivattitāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1675_13: Atha vā cittaṃ lahu sīghaparivatti etesanti cittalahukā.
tika-vin08t0:1675_15: Taṃvatthukanti te adinnādānamanaussaviggahavītikkamā vatthu adhiṭṭhānaṃ kāraṇametassāti taṃvatthukaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1676_1: taṃ karohītiādi sabbaṃ lajjīpesalaṃ kukkuccakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1676_2: Yo yāthāvato pakāsetvā suddhimeva gavesati, tenapi.
tika-vin08t0:1676_3: Pārājikosīti na vattabboti anāpattikoṭiyāpi saṅkiyamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1676_6: taṃ amanasikaritvā avasesasīlāni sodhetvā”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1676_7: vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “sīlāni sodhetvāti yasmiṃ vītikkame pārājikāsaṅkā vattati,
tika-vin08t0:1676_8: tattha pārājikābhāvapakkhaṃ gahetvā desanāvuṭṭhānagāminīnaṃ āpattīnaṃ sodhanavasena sīlāni sodhetvā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1676_9: Pākaṭabhāvato sukhavalañjatāya ca “dvattiṃsākāraṃ tāva manasi karohī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1676_11: Aññasmiṃ kammaṭṭhāne kataparicayena tameva manasi kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1676_12: Yaṃ kiñci vā abhirucitaṃ manasi kātuṃ vaṭṭateva.
tika-vin08t0:1676_13: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭayatīti antarantarā khaṇḍaṃ adassetvā cittena saddhiṃ ārammaṇabhāvena cirakālaṃ ghaṭayati.
tika-vin08t0:1676_14: Saṅkhārā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti vipassanākammaṭṭhāniko ce,
tika-vin08t0:1677_1: tassa satipi asaritukāmatāya vippaṭisāravatthuvasena punappunaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhahatīti cittekaggataṃ na vindati.
tika-vin08t0:1677_3: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ghaṭayatīti cittakkhobhādibahulassa suddhasīlassapi cittaṃ na samādhiyati,
tika-vin08t0:1677_5: Katapāpamūlakena vippaṭisārenevettha cittassa asamādhiyanaṃ sandhāya “kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ghaṭayatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1677_7: Attanāti cittena karaṇabhūtena puggalo kattā jānāti,
tika-vin08t0:1677_10: Aññā ca devatā jānantīti ārakkhadevatāhi aññā paracittaviduniyo devatā jānanti.
tika-vin08t0:1678_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne paṇḍitehi vicāretabbaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthi. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1678_1: Idāni ekacce vinayadharā paṭhamapārājikavisaye vatthumhi otiṇṇe itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā
tika-vin08t0:1678_2: pabbajitena vā codiyamāne cuditakaṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchitvā paṭiññāya adīyamānāya taṃ bhikkhuṃ susāne ekakameva
tika-vin08t0:1678_4: evaṃ sayāpiyamāno so bhikkhu sace bhayasantāsavirahito sabbarattiṃ tasmiṃ susāne sayituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā sakkoti,
tika-vin08t0:1678_6: Sace pana bhayasantāsappatto sabbarattiṃ sayituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā na sakkoti,
tika-vin08t0:1678_11: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dutiyatatiyapārājikavisaye eva tathārūpo vicāro vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1678_13: Vuttañhi tattha “methunadhammavītikkamo hi uttarimanussadhammavītikkamo ca oḷāriko,
tika-vin08t0:1678_18: Ṭīkāyañca vuttaṃ “taṃvatthukanti te adinnādānamanussaviggahavītikkamā vatthu adhiṭṭhānaṃ kāraṇametassāti taṃvatthuka”nti,
tika-vin08t0:1679_0: Tatthāpi aññe paṇḍitepi vinicchināpetvā tesampi pārājikacchāyādissaneyeva tathā vinicchayo kātabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1679_6: tato dullabhatarā pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca,
tika-vin08t0:1679_10: Vuttañhi tattha “vivittaṃ okāsaṃ sammajjitvā divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā”tiādi, idamekaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1679_13: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “divasaṃ atikkantampi na jānāti,
tika-vin08t0:1679_14: so divasātikkame upaṭṭhānaṃ āgato evaṃ vattabbo”ti, idamekaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1680_0: Īdisaṃ vidhānaṃ sayaṃ ārocite eva vidhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1680_2: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “evaṃ katavītikkamena bhikkhunā sayameva āgantvā ārocite paṭipajjitabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1680_4: Gihīnaṃ asakkhikaaṭṭakaraṇe udake nimujjāpanaṃ viya maññamānā evaṃ karonti.
tika-vin08t0:1680_5: Tampi māyākusalā manussā vividhehi upāyehi vitathaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1680_8: Teneva ca kāraṇena mahosadhapaṇḍitādayo bodhisattā asakkhikampi aṭṭaṃ udakanimujjāpanādinā na vinicchinanti,
tika-vin08t0:1680_9: ubhinnaṃ vacanaṃ parisaṃ gāhāpetvā tesaṃ vacanañca kiriyañca pariggahetvā saccañca vitathañca ñatvāva vinicchinanti.
tika-vin08t0:1680_13: rattikāle pana ativiya bhayānakaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
tika-vin08t0:1680_14: evaṃbhūte susāne rattiyaṃ eko asahāyo hutvā nipajjāpiyamāno bhīrukajātiko bhikkhu parisuddhasīlopi samāno kiṃ na bhāyeyya,
tika-vin08t0:1680_15: kathaṃ sabbarattiṃ sayituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā sakkuṇeyya,
tika-vin08t0:1680_16: tathārūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ “aparisuddho”ti vadanto kathaṃ kiccakaro bhavissati.
tika-vin08t0:1681_0: Alajjī pana sūrajātiko attano vajjaṃ paṭicchādetukāmo bhāyantopi abhāyanto viya hutvā “sace vikāraṃ dassessāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1681_1: anatthaṃ me karissantī”ti anatthabhayena adhivāsetvā sayituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā sakkuṇeyya,
tika-vin08t0:1681_2: evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ “parisuddho”ti vadanto kathaṃ suvinicchito bhavissatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1682_1: yathā udake nimujjāpitamanussānaṃ asaccavādīnaṃ devatānubhāvena kumbhīlādayo āgantvā gaṇhantā viya upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin08t0:1682_5: evaṃ tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ aparisuddhasīlānaṃ devatānubhāvena sīhabyagghādayo āgatā viya paññāyanti,
tika-vin08t0:1682_6: tasmā te sabbarattiṃ sayituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā na sakkonti.
tika-vin08t0:1682_8: tasmā te sabbarattiṃ devatāhi rakkhitā hutvā bhayasantāsarahitā susāne sayituṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā sakkonti,
tika-vin08t0:1682_9: evaṃ devatā sakkhiṃ katvā vinicchitattā suvinicchitameva hotīti,
tika-vin08t0:1682_10: tampi tathā na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1682_12: Aṭṭhakathāyañhi “vivittaṃ okāsaṃ sammajjitvā divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā sīlāni sodhetvā ‘dvattiṃsākāraṃ tāva manasikarohī’ti vattabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1682_13: Sace tassa arogaṃ sīlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭayati,
tika-vin08t0:1682_21: tattapāsāṇe nisinno viya taṅkhaṇaññeva vuṭṭhātī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1683_0: Ṭīkāyampi “kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭayatīti antarantarā khaṇḍaṃ adassetvā cittena saddhiṃ ārammaṇabhāvena cirakālaṃ ghaṭayati.
tika-vin08t0:1683_4: tassa satipi asaritukāmatāya vippaṭisāravatthuvasena punappunaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhahatīti cittekaggataṃ na vindatī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1684_0: Vimativinodaniyampi “kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭayatīti vippaṭisāramūlakena vikkhepena antarantarā khaṇḍaṃ adassetvā pabandhavasena cittena saṅghaṭayati.
tika-vin08t0:1684_2: Sāpattikassa hi paguṇampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ na suṭṭhu upaṭṭhāti.
tika-vin08t0:1684_4: Tassa hi vippaṭisāraninnatāya cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1684_5: Ekassa pana vitakkavikkhepādibahulassa suddhasīlassapi cittaṃ na samādhiyati,
tika-vin08t0:1684_7: Katapāpamūlakena vippaṭisārenevettha cittassa asamādhiyanaṃ sandhāya ‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ghaṭayatī’tiādi vutta”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1684_9: tasmā yadi buddhasāsane sagāravo sikkhākāmo bhikkhu dutiyatatiyapārājikavisaye attano kañci vītikkamaṃ disvā “pārājikaṃ āpanno nu kho ahaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1684_10: na nu kho”ti saṃsayapakkhando vinayadharaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ vītikkamaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhitvā puccheyya,
tika-vin08t0:1684_11: tato vinayadharena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva “sabbaṃ pubbavidhānaṃ katvā vivittaṃ okāsaṃ sammajjitvā
tika-vin08t0:1684_12: divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā sīlāni sodhetvā dvattiṃsākāre tāva manasikarohī”ti ettakameva vattabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1684_14: Āgatakālepi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayeneva pucchitvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayenevassa suddhāsuddhabhāvo vattabboti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1685_1: evaṃ sante idāni paṭhamapārājikavisaye codentānaṃ kathaṃ vinicchayo kātabboti?
tika-vin08t0:1685_3: no”ti evaṃ vatthuṃ upaparikkhitvā bhūtena vatthunā codetvā sāretvā ñattisampadāya anussāvanasampadāya taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1685_8: Evampi alajjissa paṭiññāya eva āpattiyā kāretabbaṃ yathā taṃ tipiṭakacūḷābhayattherenāti.
tika-vin08t0:1685_9: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “evaṃ lajjinā codiyamāno alajjī bahūsupi vatthūsu uppannesu paṭiññaṃ na deti,
tika-vin08t0:1685_13: Sace panassa aññampi tādisaṃ vatthu uppajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1686_5: Yā sā pubbe vuttappabhedā codanā atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1686_6: tassāyeva sampattivipattijānanatthaṃ ādimajjhapaayosānādīnaṃ vasena vinicchayo veditabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1687_8: no dosantaroti etassapi parato “codanāya imā pañca bhūmiyo.
tika-vin08t0:1687_28: Vuttañhetaṃ upālipañcake “codakenupāli bhikkhunā paraṃ codetukāmena evaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ –
tika-vin08t0:1687_31: mettaṃ nu kho me cittaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ sabrahmacārīsu…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1687_33: ubhayāni kho me pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1688_1: Iminā karuṇā ca karuṇāpubbabhāgo ca dassito.
tika-vin08t0:1688_5: Vatthuṃ codetvā sāretvā paṭiññaṃ āropetvā yathāpaṭiññāya kammakaraṇaṃ vinayapurekkhāratā nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1688_6: Amūlakampi samūlakampi “mūla”nti gahetvā vadantīti āha “dve mūlānī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1688_7: Kālena vakkhāmītiādīsu eko ekaṃ okāsaṃ kāretvā codento kālena vadati nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1688_9: upaṭṭhākehi parivāritakkhaṇe vā codento akālena vadati nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1688_10: Tacchena vatthunā codento bhūtena vadati nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1688_12: “Ambho mahallaka parisāvacara paṃsukūlika dhammakathika patirūpaṃ tava ida”nti vadanto pharusena vadati nāma. “Bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1688_13: mahallakā parisāvacarā paṃsukūlikā dhammakathikā patirūpaṃ tumhākaṃ ida”nti vadanto saṇhena vadati nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1688_14: Kāraṇanissitaṃ katvā vadanto atthasañhitena vadati nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1688_18: Sacce ca akuppe cāti vacīsacce ca akuppatāya ca.
tika-vin08t0:1689_1: anuvijjakena yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati,
tika-vin08t0:1689_8: Codakena pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya paro codetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1689_16: Cuditakena dvīsu dhammesu patiṭṭhātabbaṃ sacce ca akuppe ca.
tika-vin08t0:1689_22: Anuvijjakena yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati,
tika-vin08t0:1690_0: Aṭṭhakathāyampi “codanāya ko ādītiādipucchānaṃ vissajjane sacce akuppe cāti ettha sacce patiṭṭhātabbaṃ akuppe ca,
tika-vin08t0:1690_3: na codake vā anuvijjake vā saṅghe vā kopo uppādetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1690_4: Otiṇṇānotiṇṇaṃ jānitabbanti otiṇṇañca anotiṇṇañca vacanaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1690_16: Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammatīti ettha dhammoti bhūtaṃ vatthu.
tika-vin08t0:1690_19: Etena hi dhammena ca vinayena ca satthusāsanena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati,
tika-vin08t0:1690_20: tasmā anuvijjakena bhūtena vatthunā codetvā āpattiṃ sāretvā ñattisampadāya ceva anussāvanasampadāya ca taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1691_0: Evaṃ ekadesena codanākaṇḍanayaṃ dassetvā idāni ekadeseneva mahāsaṅgāmanayaṃ dassento “anuvijjakena codako pucchitabbo”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1691_4: pāḷiyaṃ pana pavāraṇaṭṭhapanavasena codanaṃ sandhāya “yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin08t0:1692_0: Evaṃ ekadesena mahāsaṅgāmanayaṃ dassetvā idāni ekadeseneva cūḷasaṅgāmanayaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1692_1: Tattha saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunāti saṅgāmo vuccati adhikaraṇavinicchayatthāya saṅghasannipāto.
tika-vin08t0:1692_2: Tatra hi attapaccatthikā ceva sāsanapaccatthikā ca uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpentā samosaranti vesālikā vajjiputtakā viya.
tika-vin08t0:1692_3: Yo bhikkhu tesaṃ paccatthikānaṃ laddhiṃ madditvā sakavādadīpanatthāya tattha avacarati,
tika-vin08t0:1692_6: tena saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamantena nīcacittena saṅgho upasaṅkamitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1692_9: yathā rajoharaṇassa saṃkiliṭṭhe vā asaṃkiliṭṭhe vā pāde puñchiyamāne neva rāgo na doso,
tika-vin08t0:1692_11: Yathāpatirūpe āsaneti yathāpatirūpaṃ āsanaṃ ñatvā attano pāpuṇanaṭṭhāne therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ piṭṭhiṃ adassetvā nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1693_0: Anānākathikenāti nānāvidhaṃ taṃ taṃ anatthakathaṃ akathentena.
tika-vin08t0:1693_2: Sāmaṃ vā dhammo bhāsitabboti saṅghasannipātaṭṭhāne kappiyākappiyasannissitā vā rūpārūpaparicchedasamathacāravipassanācāraṭṭhānanisajjavattādinissitā
tika-vin08t0:1693_6: Yo bhikkhu tathārūpiṃ kathaṃ kathetuṃ pahoti,
tika-vin08t0:1693_9: Ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo nātimaññitabboti ariyā tuṇhī nisīdantā na bālaputhujjanā viya nisīdanti,
tika-vin08t0:1693_11: Iti kammaṭṭhānamanasikāravasena tuṇhībhāvo ariyo tuṇhībhāvo nāma,
tika-vin08t0:1693_14: attano patirūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva nisīditabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1694_0: Na upajjhāyo pucchitabboti “ko nāma tuyhaṃ upajjhāyo”ti na pucchitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1694_2: Na jātīti “khattiyajātiyo tvaṃ brāhmaṇajātiyo”ti evaṃ jāti na pucchitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1694_3: Na āgamoti “dīghabhāṇako tvaṃ majjhimabhāṇako”ti evaṃ āgamo na pucchitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1694_5: Atrassa pemaṃ vā doso vāti tatra puggale etesaṃ kāraṇānaṃ aññataravasena pemaṃ vā bhaveyya doso vā.
tika-vin08t0:1695_0: No parisakappikenāti parisakappakena parisānuvidhāyakena na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1695_2: tadeva cetetvā kappetvā na kathetabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1695_3: Na hatthamuddā dassetabbāti kathetabbe ca akathetabbe ca saññājananatthaṃ hatthavikāro na kātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1696_2: imasmiṃ vinicchaye idaṃ vakkhāmī”ti evaṃ paritulayantena nisīditabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1696_3: Na ca āsanā vuṭṭhātabbanti na āsanā vuṭṭhāya sannipātamaṇḍale vicaritabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1696_4: Vinayadhare hi uṭṭhite sabbā parisā vuṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin08t0:1696_7: Na kummaggo sevitabboti na āpatti dīpetabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1696_8: Asāhasikena bhavitabbanti na sahasā kārinā bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1696_11: Hitaparisakkināti hitesinā hitagavesinā karuṇā ca karuṇāpubbabhāgo ca upaṭṭhāpetabboti ayaṃ padadvayepi adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1696_15: Attā pariggahetabboti “vinicchinituṃ vūpasametuṃ sakkhissāmi nu kho,
tika-vin08t0:1696_18: Paro pariggahetabboti “lajjiyā nu kho ayaṃ parisā sakkā saññāpetuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1697_3: “nanu tvaṃ kulaputto”ti uttejetvā anuyogavattaṃ kathāpetvā tassa anuyogo gaṇhitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1697_4: Bhīru assāsetabboti yassa saṅghamajjhaṃ vā gaṇamajjhaṃ vā anosaṭapubbattā sārajjaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1697_7: mayaṃ te upatthambhā bhavissāmā”ti vatvāpi anuyogavattaṃ kathāpetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1697_9: Asuci vibhāvetabboti alajjiṃ pakāsetvā āpattiṃ desāpetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1697_10: Ujumaddavenāti yo bhikkhu uju sīlavā kāyavaṅkādirahito,
tika-vin08t0:1697_12: Dhammesu ca puggalesu cāti ettha yo dhammagaruko hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1697_14: ayameva dhammesu ca puggalesu ca majjhattoti veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1703_1: Evaṃ codanādivinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni garukāpattivuṭṭhānavinicchayaṃ kathetuṃ “garukāpattivuṭṭhāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1703_2: Tattha garu alahukaṃ paṭikaraṇaṃ etissā āpattiyāti garukā,
tika-vin08t0:1703_4: garukā ca sā āpatti cāti garukāpatti,
tika-vin08t0:1703_6: garukāpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ garukāpatti vuṭṭhānaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1703_10: appaṭicchannaparivāso pana idha nādhippetoti āha “tividho parivāso”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1703_11: Tathā hi vuttaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “tattha catubbidho parivāso –
tika-vin08t0:1703_15: aññopi aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1703_17: tassa cattāro māse parivāso dātabbo’ti evaṃ mahākhandhake vutto titthiyaparivāso appaṭicchannaparivāso nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1703_21: Ito paraṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva suviññeyyoti tasmā dubbiññeyyaṭṭhāneyeva vaṇṇayissāma.
tika-vin08t0:1704_2: tassa tassa nāmaṃ gahetvā kammavācā kātabbāti etena pāḷiyaṃ sabbasādhāraṇavasena “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin08t0:1704_3: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhū”ti ca “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1704_4: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno”ti ca āgatepi kammavācābhaṇanakāle tathā abhaṇitvā “ayaṃ buddharakkhito
tika-vin08t0:1704_5: bhikkhū”ti ca “imassa buddharakkhitassa bhikkhuno”ti ca evaṃ sakasakanāmaṃ uddharitvāva kammavācā kātabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1705_4: māḷakasīmāya sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekassapi anārocane sati ratticchedasambhavato ca.
tika-vin08t0:1705_6: vattaṃ samādiyāmīti imesu dvīsu padesu ekekena vā ubhohi padehi vā samādātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1705_12: na tattha anārocetvā aññattha gantabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1705_14: ekassapi bhikkhuno anārocetvā aruṇuṭṭhāpane sati ratticchedakarattā.
tika-vin08t0:1706_2: saṅgho dhāretū”ti ettakameva vatvā yācane viya “dutiyampi tatiyampī”ti avuttattā accāyikakaraṇe sati ekavāraṃ ārocitepi upapannamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1706_4: vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretūti ettha “vediyāmīti cittena sampaṭicchitvā sukhaṃ anubhavāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1706_5: na tappaccayā ahaṃ dukkhitoti adhippāyo”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1706_6: Ettha ca “sukhaṃ vedemi vedana”ntiādīsu viya pi-
tika-vin08t0:1706_10: na tappaccayā ahaṃ dukkhitoti adhippāyoti likhita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1706_11: Ettha pana “dīpaṅkaro lokavidū”tiādīsu viya ñāṇattho anubhavanattho ca.
tika-vin08t0:1708_0: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na naṃ vāretumussahe”ti. –
tika-vin08t0:1710_2: Keci pana “tadaheva puna vattaṃ samādiyitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetukāmassa ratticchedaparihāratthampī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1710_8: “Sabhāgā bhikkhū vasantī”ti vuttattā visabhāgānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne vattaṃ asamādiyitvā bahi eva kātumpi vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1710_9: Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāti idaṃ vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyādisaddasavanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1710_10: mahāmaggato okkammāti idaṃ maggapaṭipannānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ savanūpacārātikkamanatthaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1710_12: Sopi kenaci kammena purearuṇe eva gacchatīti iminā ārocanāya katāya sabbesu bhikkhūsu bahivihāraṃ gatesupi
tika-vin08t0:1710_13: ūnegaṇecaraṇadoso vā vippavāsadoso vā na hoti ārocanatthattā sahavāsassāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1710_17: tattha nikkhittavattassāti vattaṃ nikkhipitvā parivasantassāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1710_19: vattaṃ nikkhipitvā parivasantassa upacāragatānaṃ sabbesaṃ ārocanakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1711_1: Kukkuccavinodanatthāyāti imesu paṭicchannadivasappamāṇena parivasitadivasesu “siyuṃ nu kho tividharatticchedakāraṇayuttāni kānici divasāni,
tika-vin08t0:1711_2: evaṃ sati aparipuṇṇaparivāsadivasattā na mānattāraho bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1711_3: asati ca mānattārahabhāve mānattaṃ dinnampi adinnaṃyeva bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1711_4: evañca sati āpannāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ na bhaveyyā”ti imassa vinayakukkuccassa vinodanatthāya.
tika-vin08t0:1711_5: Ekena vā dvīhi vā tīhi vā divasehi adhikatarāni divasāni parivasitvā nanu cāyaṃ parivutthaparivāso,
tika-vin08t0:1711_7: atha kasmā vattaṃ samādiyitvā mānattaṃ yācitabbanti āhāti codanaṃ manasi karontena vuttaṃ “ayañhi vatte samādinne”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1711_8: Hi yasmā ayaṃ bhikkhu vatte samādinne eva mānattāraho hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1711_10: iti tasmā vattaṃ samādiyitvā mānattaṃ yācitabbanti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:1711_11: Nanu ca kammavācāyaṃ “so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ mānattaṃ yācati”icceva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1711_13: atha kasmā “vatte samādinne eva mānattāraho hotī”ti vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “nikkhittavattena parivutthattā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1711_14: Yasmā ayaṃ bhikkhu nikkhittavattena hutvā parivuttho hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1711_16: tasmā nikkhittavattena hutvā parivutthattā ayaṃ bhikkhu vatte samādinne eva mānattāraho hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1711_18: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “anikkhittavattassa pana puna samādānakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin08t0:1712_0: Catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhinti ūnegaṇecaraṇadosā vimuccanatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1712_1: Parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepatotiādi kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1712_2: atha kho aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ vacanena tathā eva paṭipajjitabbanti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1712_4: anikkhittavattānaṃ upacārasīmāya āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsādikaṃ veditabbanti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1712_5: ‘Nikkhipantena ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ payojanaṃ atthī’ti ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1712_6: na pana taṃ payojanaṃ dassita”nti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1713_1: Abbhānaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti katampi akatameva hotīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1713_2: “Tenāpi vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetvā abbhānaṃ yācitabba”nti vuttattā abbhānayācanatthaṃ mānattassa samādiyanakālepi ārocetabbameva.
tika-vin08t0:1713_3: Pubbe mānattacāritakāle ārocitamevāti anārocetvā abbhānaṃ na yācitabbanti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1713_4: Evaṃ mānattayācanakālepi parivāsaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetabbamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1714_1: Ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu abbhetabboti ciṇṇamānattassa ca abbhānārahassa ca ninnānākaraṇattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1714_3: Ukkhepanīyakammakatopi attano laddhiggahaṇavasena sabhāgabhikkhumhi sati tassa anārocāpetuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin08t0:1715_2: “Sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassa pana santike āvi kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti pasaṅgato idheva pakāsitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1715_4: Tattha ñattiyā āvi katvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ anuññātattā lahukasabhāgaṃ āvi kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1715_5: Sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ pana ñattiyā ārocanaṃ na vaṭṭatīti kira.
tika-vin08t0:1715_6: “Tassa santike taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissatīti vuttattā lahukassevāyaṃ samanuññātā.
tika-vin08t0:1715_7: Na hi sakkā suddhassa ekassa santike saṅghādisesassa paṭikaraṇaṃ kātu”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1715_8: Lahukesupi sabhāgaṃ āvi kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1715_9: Tasmā eva hi ñattiyā āvikaraṇaṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1715_12: tato na vaṭṭatīti dīpanatthameva ñattiyā āvikaraṇamanuññātaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1715_15: tesaṃ santike sesehi sabhāgāpattiyo desetabbā”ti vacanena kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyampi pakāsitova.
tika-vin08t0:1715_16: Saṅghādisesaṃ pana ñattiyā ārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1715_28: “Nāmañceva āpatti cāti tena tena vītikkamenāpannāpatti āpatti.
tika-vin08t0:1715_30: Ārocetvā nikkhipitabbanti ettha ārocanaṃ vattabhedadukkaṭapariharaṇappayojananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1716_2: Antarāyikassa pana antarāyikasaññāya vā anantarāyikasaññāya vā chādayato acchannāvā”tipi pāṭho.
tika-vin08t0:1716_7: Sukkavissaṭṭhīti vatthu ceva gottañcāti “sukkavissaṭṭhī”ti idaṃ asucimocanalakkhaṇassa vītikkamassa pakāsanato vatthu ceva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1716_8: sajātiyasādhāraṇavijātiyavinivattasabhāvāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā eva pakāsanato gottañca hotīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1716_10: Saṅghādisesoti nāmañceva āpatti cāti saṅghādisesoti tena tena vītikkamena āpannassa āpattinikāyassa nāmapakāsanato nāmañceva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1717_4: Divasādīhi paricchinditvā vasanaṃ parivāso. Ko so?
tika-vin08t0:1720_5: suddhanto ca so parivāso cāti suddhantaparivāso,
tika-vin08t0:1720_6: suddhakālaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā asuddhakālappamāṇena paricchinditvā kataparivāso.
tika-vin08t0:1723_2: nānākālikā nānāvatthukā āpattiyo agghādivasena samodhānaṃ ekīkaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1723_4: Kammavācāyaṃ “paṭikassito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanā,
tika-vin08t0:1723_7: evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti ettha gatyatthadhātuyā kammani ca nayanatthadhātuyā kammani ca tadatthasampadāne
tika-vin08t0:1723_8: ca vibhattipariṇāme cāti imesu catūsu ṭhānesu āyādesassa vuttattā,
tika-vin08t0:1723_9: paṭipubbakasadhātuyā ca nayanatthattā “mūlāyā”ti idaṃ “paṭikassito”ti ettha kammaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1723_12: na “mūlāyapaṭikassanā”ti evaṃ maññamānā saddaviduno “paṭikassanā”ti idaṃ adhikanti vā vadeyyuṃ makkheyyuṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:1723_14: Navapāṭhesuyeva ayaṃ pāṭho saddalakkhaṇayutto vā ayutto vāti cintetabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1723_16: Tesu pana kathaṃ yojiyamāno ayaṃ pāṭho saddayuttiyā ca atthayuttiyā ca samannāgato bhaveyyāti yojanākāroyeva cintetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1723_18: tasmā “mūlāyapaṭikassanā”ti idaṃ karaṇavasena vipariṇāmetvā “mūlāyapaṭikassanāya paṭikassito”ti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1724_2: Vuttañhi vimativinodaniyaṃ “pāḷiyaṃ paṭikassito saṅghena udāyi bhikkhu antarā ekissā āpattiyā…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1724_3: mūlāyapaṭikassanāti idaṃ karaṇavasena vipariṇāmetvā mūlāyapaṭikassanāya paṭikassitoti yojetabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1724_4: Atha vā “mūlāya paṭikassanā mūlāyapaṭikassanā”ti aluttasamāsavasena uttarapadena samāsaṃ katvā saṅghena
