tika-vin08t0:1724_5: itthannāmo bhikkhu antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ hetu paṭikassito.
tika-vin08t0:1724_7: Tathā hi vuttaṃ tattheva “atha vā mūlāyapaṭikassanā khamati saṅghassāti uttarapadena saha paccattavaseneva yojetumpi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1725_0: Taṃ dentena paṭhamaṃ mūlāya paṭikassitvā pacchāparivāso dātabboti ettha taṃ odhānasamodhānaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1725_1: dentena paṭhamaṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ mūlāya paṭikassitvā mūladivase ākaḍḍhitvā tassa antarāpattiyā samodhānaparivāso
tika-vin08t0:1725_3: Yathā kiṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1725_4: mūlāya paṭikassitvāti ettha antarā ekissā āpattiyā hetubhūtāya udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ mūlāya paṭikassitvā mūladivase
tika-vin08t0:1725_5: ākaḍḍhitvā tassā antarāpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ detūti yojanā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1725_6: Mahāsumattheravāde āvikārāpetvā vissajjetabboti tassa atekicchabhāvaṃ teneva saṅghassa pākaṭaṃ kāretvā
tika-vin08t0:1728_2: āpannāsu sambahulāsu āpattīsu yā āpattiyo ciratarappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin08t0:1728_3: tāsaṃ agghena samodhāya tāsaṃ rattiparicchedavasena avasesānaṃ ūnatarappaṭicchannānaṃ āpattīnaṃ parivāso dīyati,
tika-vin08t0:1728_5: Sataṃ āpattiyoti kāyasaṃsaggādivasena ekadivase āpannā sataṃ āpattiyo.
tika-vin08t0:1728_8: “Agghasamodhāno nāma sabhāgavatthukāyo sambahulā āpattiyo āpannassa bahurattiṃ paṭicchāditāpattiyaṃ nikkhipitvā dātabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1728_9: itaro nānāvatthukānaṃ vasenāti ayametesaṃ viseso”ti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1730_1: Liṅgaparivattanakakathāyaṃ yadi kassaci bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātu bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1730_5: udāhu ito paṭṭhāyāti pucchāya sati taṃ pariharitumāha “sace”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1730_6: Evaṃ sante sā bhikkhunī bhikkhūnaṃ majjheyeva vasitabbaṃ bhaveyyāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “appatirūpa”ntiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1730_7: Evaṃ sante bhikkhubhūtakāle āpajjitāpattiyo kathaṃ kātabbāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “yā desanāgāminiyo vā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1730_10: Hotu bhagavato anuññātavasena liṅge parivatte asādhāraṇāpattīhi vuṭṭhitabhāvo,
tika-vin08t0:1730_11: puna pakatiliṅge uppanne puna āpatti siyāti āsaṅkaṃ pariharituṃ “puna pakatiliṅge”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1730_14: idha pana garukāpattivuṭṭhānakathābhūtattā sāyeva kathā vuccate.
tika-vin08t0:1731_1: Tattha bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇāya paṭicchannāya āpattiyāti sañcarittādiāpattiyā,
tika-vin08t0:1731_5: na puna parivāso dātabbo bhikkhunibhāve aparivāsārahattāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1731_10: Akusalavipāke parikkhīṇeti purisindriyassa antaradhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1732_0: “Ayaṃ pana viseso”ti vatvā taṃ visesaṃ dassetumāha “sace”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1732_4: Bhikkhukāle channāyeva hi āpatti parivāsārahā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1734_0: Idāni saṅghādisesāpatti yasmā sāvasesagarukāpatti hoti satekicchā,
tika-vin08t0:1734_1: tasmā yathā nāma rogāturo puggalo kiñci attano hitasukhakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin08t0:1734_2: tamenaṃ kāruṇiko tikicchako karuṇāsañcodito tikicchaṃ katvā gelaññato vuṭṭhāpetvā hitasukhaṃ janeti,
tika-vin08t0:1734_3: evaṃ saṅghādisesāpattisamaṅgī puggalo āṇāvītikkamantarāyikabhāvato saggamokkhamaggaṃ sodhetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin08t0:1734_4: tamenaṃ mahākāruṇiko bhagavā mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānaso anekehi nayehi āpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ katvā saggamokkhasukhe patiṭṭhapeti,
tika-vin08t0:1734_5: bhagavato adhippāyaññuno aṭṭhakathācariyāpi anekehi kāraṇehi bhagavato vacanassa atthaṃ pakāsetvā visuddhakāmānaṃ nayaṃ denti,
tika-vin08t0:1734_7: Evaṃ dinne pana naye yoniso manasi kātuṃ sakkontā paṇḍitā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanti,
tika-vin08t0:1734_8: asakkontā aññathā atthaṃ gahetvā na yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanti,
tika-vin08t0:1734_9: tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ anugacchantā sissādayopi tatheva karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1734_10: tasmā bhagavato vacanañca pubbenāparaṃ saṃsanditvā aṭṭhakathāṭīkādivacanañca sammā tulayitvā tathato
tika-vin08t0:1734_11: bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ñatvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjantehi garukāpattito vuṭṭhahanatthaṃ yogo karaṇīyo.
tika-vin08t0:1735_0: Tasmā yadā bhikkhū āgacchanti vinayadharassa santikaṃ “garukāpattivuṭṭhānaṃ karissāmā”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1735_2: “Saṅghādisesaṃ āpanno”ti vutte “katarasaṅghādisesa”nti pucchitvā “imaṃ nāmā”ti vutte sukkavissaṭṭhiyaṃ mocetukāmacetanā, upakkamo,
tika-vin08t0:1735_38: Aññabhāgiye aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kañcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādiyanatā,
tika-vin08t0:1735_49: evaṃ idha chandādīhi pāpananti cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin08t0:1735_50: Iti imāni aṅgāni sodhetvā sace aṅgapāripūrī hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1735_55: tasmā patirūpassa bhikkhussa santike desehī”ti vatvā desāpetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1736_4: na chādesī”ti pucchitvā “na chādemī”ti vutte “tena hi tvaṃ na parivāsāraho,
tika-vin08t0:1736_7: udāhu aññakāraṇenā”ti pucchitvā “dasasu aññatarakāraṇenā”ti vutte “evampi mānattāraho hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1736_11: udāhu ajānanto”ti pucchitvā “ajānanto paṭicchādemī”ti vutte ca “āpattiāpannabhāvaṃ saranto paṭicchādesi,
tika-vin08t0:1736_12: udāhu visaritvā paṭicchādesī”ti pucchitvā “visaritvā paṭicchādemī”ti vutte ca “āpattiāpannabhāve vematiko hutvā paṭicchādesi,
tika-vin08t0:1736_13: udāhu nibbematiko hutvā”ti pucchitvā “vematiko hutvā”ti vutte ca “na tvaṃ parivāsāraho,
tika-vin08t0:1737_0: Atha “jānanto paṭicchādemī”ti vutte ca “saranto paṭicchādemī”ti vutte ca “nibbematiko hutvā paṭicchādemī”ti vutte ca “tvaṃ parivāsāraho”ti vattabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1738_1: tīsu parivāsesu kataraparivāsāraho”ti cintetvā “bhikkhu tvaṃ kati āpattiyo chādesī”ti pucchitvā “ekaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1738_2: āpatti”nti vā “dve tīṇi tatuttari vā āpattiyo chādemī”ti vā vutte “katīhaṃ tvaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādesī”ti
tika-vin08t0:1738_3: pucchitvā “ekāhamevāhaṃ paṭicchādemī”ti vā “dvīhaṃ tīhaṃ tatuttari vā paṭicchādemī”ti vā vutte “yāvatīhaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1738_9: tasmā paṭicchannaparivāsāraho”ti ñatvā tadanurūpā kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1739_1: rattipariyantapucchanaṃ pana tadatthañceva suddhantaparivāsassa ananurūpabhāvadassanatthañca hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1739_3: duvidhopi cesa rattiparicchedaṃ sakalaṃ vā ekaccaṃ vā ajānantassa ca asarantassa ca tattha vematikassa ca dātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1739_4: Āpattipariyantaṃ pana ‘ahaṃ ettakā āpattiyo āpanno’ti jānātu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin08t0:1740_0: Tattha appabhikkhuke vihāre sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne upacārasīmāparicchinno antovihāro anikkhittavattena nisīditabbaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1740_1: Upacārasīmaṃ atikkamma mahāmaggato okkamma gumbavatipaṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ nikkhittavattena nisīditabbaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1740_6: vuttanayeneva vattaṃ nikkhipitvā paccūsasamaye ekena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ mānattavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
tika-vin08t0:1740_7: upacārasīmaṃ atikkamitvā mahāmaggā okkamma paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditvā antoaruṇeyeva vuttanayeneva vattaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1740_13: vuttanayeneva vattaṃ nikkhipitvā paccūsasamaye catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepato,
tika-vin08t0:1740_14: aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggato okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā
tika-vin08t0:1740_15: vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditabba”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1741_0: Tattha appabhikkhuko vihāro hotīti idaṃ bahubhikkhuke vihāre aññe bhikkhū gacchanti,
tika-vin08t0:1741_4: Sabhāgā bhikkhū vasantīti idaṃ visabhāgānaṃ verībhikkhūnaṃ santike vattaṃ ārocento pakāsetukāmo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1741_7: Yo pana visabhāgo hoti sutvā pakāsetukāmo,
tika-vin08t0:1741_9: tasmā visabhāgānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne vattaṃ asamādiyitvā bahiyeva kātumpi vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1741_15: Atha na sakkā sodhetunti bahubhikkhukattā vā vihārassa visabhāgānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānattā vā ratticchedavattābhedakāraṇānipi sodhetuṃ na sakkā.
tika-vin08t0:1741_18: Tathā hi vakkhati “antoaruṇeyeva vuttanayena vattaṃ samādiyitvā tassa bhikkhuno parivāso ārocetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1741_19: Ekena bhikkhunā saddhinti vippavāsaratticchedavimuccanatthaṃ vinā pakatattena sabhikkhukaāvāsaabhikkhukaanāvāsagamanasaṅkhātavattabhedavimuccanatthañca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1741_22: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sabhikkhukā āvāsā abhikkhuko anāvāso gantabbo aññatra pakatattena aññatra antarāyā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1742_1: aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā”ti vuttanayena.
tika-vin08t0:1742_6: tathāpi vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyādisaddasavanasabbhāvato suvidūrātikkamo vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1742_7: idha pana upacārasīmato atikkamamattopi atikkamoyevāti katvā vutto.
tika-vin08t0:1742_9: Tathā hi vuttaṃ vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepatotiādi kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1742_10: atha kho aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ vacanena tathā eva paṭipajjitabbanti ca vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1743_0: Mānattavaṇṇanāyaṃ catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhinti idaṃ pana ūnegaṇecaraṇaratticchedavimuccanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1743_1: Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvātiādi aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ savanūpacāradassanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1743_2: Tenevāha ṭīkācariyo “dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāti idaṃ vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyādisaddasavanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1743_5: Tasmā yathāvuttaṃ duvidhaṃ ṭhānaṃ parivasantamānattacārikabhikkhūhi nisīditabbaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1743_6: Tesu ca yadi antovihāreyeva nisīditvā parivasati,
tika-vin08t0:1743_11: Vuttañhi vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vasantassa upacārasīmagatānaṃ sabbesaṃ ārocanakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1743_14: Idaṃ vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vasantassa lakkhaṇanti vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1743_15: Idañca vattaṃ anikkhipitvā vasantassa antovihāreyeva rattipariggahassa ca nikkhipitvā vasantassa upacārasīmaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1743_16: atikkamitvā vattasamādānassa ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1743_17: Upacāro pana antosīmāya ṭhitānaṃ sakalaupacārasīmā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1743_19: Teneva hi uddesabhattādisaṅghalābho yadi antosīmāya uppajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1743_24: Tathā hi vuttaṃ vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāti dvādasahatthe upacāre sallakkhetvā anikkhittavattānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1743_25: upacārasīmāya āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsādikaṃ veditabbanti ca vutta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1744_0: Evaṃ anikkhittavattānaṃ hutvā parivasantānaṃ antovihāreyeva vasanassa,
tika-vin08t0:1744_1: nikkhittavattānaṃ hutvā parivasantānaṃ vihārato bahi dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā vasanassa ca aṭṭhakathādīsu
tika-vin08t0:1744_3: Idāni pana ācariyā anikkhittavattassa ca ratticchedavattabhedadose pariharituṃ atidukkarattā,
tika-vin08t0:1744_4: nikkhittavattassa ca devasikaṃ paccūsasamaye bahisīmagamanassa dukkhattā,
tika-vin08t0:1744_6: manasi karontā nikkhittavattāpi samānā antovihāreyeva parivāsavasanañca mānattacaraṇañca karonti.
tika-vin08t0:1745_0: Ekacce ācariyā bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ patirūpaṭṭhāne pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanasālaṃ kārāpetvā pārivāsikabhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1745_1: nipajjanamañcaṃ sabbato channaparicchinnaṃ sadvārabandhanaṃ suguttaṃ kārāpetvā taṃ padesaṃ vatiyā parikkhipāpetvā
tika-vin08t0:1745_2: sāyanhasamaye tattha gantvā upaṭṭhākasāmaṇerādayo nivattāpetvā purimayāme vā majjhimayāme vā samantato
tika-vin08t0:1745_3: saddachijjanakāle pakatattabhikkhū sālāyaṃ nipajjāpetvā pārivāsikabhikkhū vattaṃ samādāpetvā ārocāpetvā
tika-vin08t0:1745_4: attano attano mañcakesu nipajjāpetvā pacchimayāmakāle uṭṭhāpetvā aruṇe uṭṭhite ārocāpetvā vattaṃ nikkhipāpenti.
tika-vin08t0:1745_5: Esa nayo pakaraṇesu anāgatattā ācariyānaṃ matena katattā ācariyanayo nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1745_6: Esa nayopi yathārutato pakaraṇesu anāgatopi pakaraṇānulomavasena ratticchedavattabhedadose pariharitvā
tika-vin08t0:1745_7: lajjipesalehi bahussutehi sikkhākāmehi vinaye pakataññūhi vicārito samāno sundaro pasatthova hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1746_0: Nanu ca anikkhittavattānaṃyeva antovihāre vasanaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1746_1: atha kasmā nikkhittavattāpi samānā vasantīti? Saccaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1746_2: tattha pana appabhikkhukattā sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānattā ca ratticchedavattabhedadose ca pariharituṃ
tika-vin08t0:1746_3: sakkuṇeyyabhāvato sakalarattindivampi vattaṃ anikkhipitvā vasanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1746_4: idha pana tathā asakkuṇeyyabhāvato divā vattaṃ nikkhipitvā rattiyaṃ samādiyanto āgantukānaṃ anāgamanakālabhāvato,
tika-vin08t0:1746_5: saddachijjanakālabhāvato ca ratticchedādidose pariharituṃ sakkuṇeyyattā tadanulomoyeva hotīti mantvā ācariyā evaṃ karontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1747_1: bahiupacārasīmāya vasantānaṃ paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīdanameva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1747_4: tathāpi pakatattasālākaraṇaṃ pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pakatattehi bhikkhūhi vippavāsaratticchedavattabhedadosapariharaṇatthaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1747_11: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1747_13: na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabba”nti vuttapāṭhañca yathāvuttapāṭhañca anulometi. Ādi-
tika-vin08t0:1747_15: Tesu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paccūsasamaye gamane eva vuttepi sāyanhasamaye gamanaṃ rattigamanassa bahuparissayattā parissayavinodanatthaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1747_16: taṃ “antarāyato parimuccanatthāya gantabbamevā”ti vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāṭhaṃ anulometi.
tika-vin08t0:1747_18: taṃ “yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya,
tika-vin08t0:1747_20: Purimayāme vā majjhimayāme vā samantato saddachijjanakāle pakatattabhikkhū sālāyaṃ nipajjāpetvā pārivāsikabhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1748_0: Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ antoaruṇeyeva vattasamādāpanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1748_3: hiyyoaruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya hi yāva ajjaaruṇuggamanā eko rattindivo ajjaaruṇassa anto nāma,
tika-vin08t0:1748_4: ajjaaruṇato paṭṭhāya pacchākālo aruṇassa bahi nāma,
tika-vin08t0:1748_5: tasmā purimamajjhimayāmesu katavattasamādānampi aruṇodayato pure katattā antoaruṇe kataṃyeva hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1748_6: Vattaṃ asamādiyitvā nipajjane ca sati niddāvasena aruṇuggamanakālaṃ ajānitvā vattasamādānaṃ atikkantaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1748_7: tasmā puretarameva samādānaṃ katvā nipajjanaṃ ñāyāgataṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1749_4: ayaṃ pana bhikkhu divā vattaṃ nikkhipitvā nisinno,
tika-vin08t0:1749_6: tasmā māḷakasīmāya ārocitampi puna ārocetabbaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1749_7: Idampi “antoaruṇeyeva vuttanayeneva vattaṃ samādiyitvā tassa bhikkhuno parivāso ārocetabbo”ti pāṭhaṃ anulometi.
tika-vin08t0:1749_8: Atha “attano attano mañcakesu nipajjāpetvā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1749_9: nanu aññamaññassa mañcesu nipajjamānāpi pakatattasālato nibbodakapatanaṭṭhānato bahi nipajjamānā sahavāsaratticchedadosato muttāyevāti?
tika-vin08t0:1749_11: Na hi pārivāsiko pakatattabhikkhūheva ekacchanne nipanno sahavāsaratticchedappatto hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1749_13: Vuttañcetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “sace hi dve pārivāsikā ekato vaseyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1749_14: te aññamaññassa ajjhācāraṃ ñatvā agāravā vā vippaṭisārino vā hutvā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ vā āpattiṃ āpajjeyyuṃ vibbhameyyuṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:1749_16: “Pacchimayāmakāle uṭṭhāpetvā aruṇe uṭṭhite ārocāpetvā vattaṃ nikkhipāpentī”ti ettha aruṇe anuṭṭhiteyeva vattanikkhipane kariyamāne ratticchedo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1749_18: tasmā paṭhamaparicchede vuttaṃ aruṇakathāvinicchayaṃ oloketvā aruṇuggamanabhāvo suṭṭhu jānitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1750_3: tathāpi pārivāsikavattasamādānakāle ārocitesu bhikkhūsu ekacce nikkhipanakāle gacchanti,
tika-vin08t0:1750_6: tathā ca sati abhinavāgatānaṃ sabbhāvā ārocetabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1750_8: Evaṃ santepi ārocane dosābhāvato puna ārocanaṃ ñāyāgataṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1750_9: mānattacaraṇakāle pana samādāne ārocitepi nikkhipane avassaṃ ārocetabbameva. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1750_13: tasmā nikkhipane ārocanakiccaṃ natthīti ce? Na,
tika-vin08t0:1750_18: tasmā tasmiṃ divase aruṇe uṭṭhite vattanikkhipanato pureyeva ārocetabbanti no mati,
tika-vin08t0:1750_20: Evaṃ pakaraṇāgatanayena vā pakaraṇānulomaācariyanayena vā sammāsambuddhassa āṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpentena vinayakovidena
tika-vin08t0:1750_21: bahussutena lajjīpesalabhūtena vinayadharena visuddhikāmānaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlavisuddhatthāya
tika-vin08t0:1751_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne lajjībhikkhūnaṃ parivāsādikathāya kusalatthaṃ nānāvādanayo vuccate –
tika-vin08t0:1751_1: keci bhikkhū “pakatattasālaṃ kurumānena tassā sālāya majjhe thambhaṃ nimittaṃ katvā tato dvādasahatthamattaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1751_2: padesaṃ sallakkhetvā yathā paññatte pārivāsikānaṃ mañce nipannassa bhikkhussa gīvā tassa padesassa upari hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1751_4: Evaṃ kate sukataṃ hotī”ti vadanti karonti ca.
tika-vin08t0:1751_5: Ekacce “mañce nipannassa bhikkhussa kaṭi tassa padesassa upari hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1751_7: evaṃ kate sukataṃ hotī”ti vadanti karonti ca,
tika-vin08t0:1751_12: “dvādasahatthaṃ pana upacāraṃ muñcitvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavacanañca “atha dvādasahatthaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1751_15: vattabhedo pana natthī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanañca “adiṭṭhaassutānampi antodvādasahatthagatānaṃ ārocetabba”nti
tika-vin08t0:1751_17: ‘idaṃ vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vasantassa lakkhaṇa’nti vutta”nti vuttavajirabuddhiṭīkāvacanañca “atthibhāvaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1751_19: anikkhittavattānaṃ upacārasīmāya āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsādikaṃ veditabba”nti vuttaṃ vajirabuddhiṭīkāvacanañca
tika-vin08t0:1751_20: passitvā ayoniso atthaṃ gahetvā sabbattha dvādasahatthameva pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1751_22: tasmā yathāvuttanayena majjhe thambhato dvādasahatthamatte padese nipannassa bhikkhussa gīvā vā kaṭi vā hotu,
tika-vin08t0:1751_24: tato sahavāsato vā vippavāsato vā ratticchedavattabhedadosā na hontīti.
tika-vin08t0:1752_2: pakatattabhikkhumhi chamāya nisinne yadi pārivāsikabhikkhu āsane nisīditukāmo,
tika-vin08t0:1752_3: pakatattassa bhikkhuno nisinnaṭṭhānato dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ muñcitvāva nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1752_5: Etena dvīsupi chamāya nisinnesu dvādasahatthabbhantarepi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1752_6: dvādasahatthappadesato bahi nisīdanto āsanepi nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1752_7: Tenāha “na chamāya nisinneti pakatatte bhūmiyaṃ nisinne itarena antamaso tiṇasantharepi uccatare vālikatalepi vā na nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1752_8: dvādasahatthaṃ pana upacāraṃ muñcitvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1752_9: Iti pakatatte chamāya nisinne pārivāsikena nisīditabbaṭṭhānadīpako ayaṃ pāṭho,
tika-vin08t0:1752_11: taṃ pubbāparaparipuṇṇaṃ sakalaṃ pāṭhaṃ anoloketvā ekadesamattameva passitvā parikappavasena ayoniso adhippāyaṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1753_1: bahi upacārasīmāya paṭicchannaṭṭhāne vattaṃ samādiyitvā nisinne bhikkhusmiṃ tassa nisinnaṭṭhānato dvādasahatthaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1753_2: upacāraṃ okkamitvā tassa ajānantasseva añño bhikkhu gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1753_9: Etena bahiupacārasīmāya upacāro dvādasahatthappamāṇo hoti ārocanakkhettabhūtoti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1753_10: Tenāha “gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1753_12: Sace añño koci bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1753_17: Atha dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1754_1: kiṃ bahiupacārasīmāya vattasamādānaṭṭhānaṃ āgatabhikkhūnaṃ diṭṭharūpānaṃ sutasaddānaṃyeva ārocetabbanti
tika-vin08t0:1754_2: pucchāya sati adiṭṭhaassutānampi antodvādasahatthagatānaṃ ārocetabbanti vissajjetabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:1754_5: diṭṭhasutānaṃ pana antodvādasahatthagatānampi bahidvādasahatthagatānampi ākāsādigatānampi ārocetabbamevāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1754_7: vattaṃ nikkhipitvā parivasantassa upacāragatānaṃ sabbesaṃ ārocanakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1755_1: atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāti ettha etasmiṃ aṭṭhakathāvacane nikkhittavattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ attano nisinnaṭṭhānato
tika-vin08t0:1755_2: dvādasahatthe upacāre aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā anikkhittavattānaṃ upacārasīmāya aññesaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1755_3: bhikkhūnaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsādikaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ādi-
tika-vin08t0:1755_5: Ayañca yasmā gaṇassa ārocetvā bhikkhūnañca atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā vasi,
tika-vin08t0:1755_6: tasmā nikkhittavattānaṃ bahiupacārasīmāya samādinnattā attano nisinnaṭṭhānato dvādasahatthe upacāre aññesaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1755_7: bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā anikkhittavattānaṃ antovihāre samādinnattā upacārasīmāya aññesaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1755_10: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayañca yasmā gaṇassa ārocetvā bhikkhūnañca atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāva vasi,
tika-vin08t0:1755_11: tenassa ūnegaṇecaraṇadoso vā vippavāso vā na hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1755_12: Iti ayañca pāṭho pakatattabhikkhūsu gatesupi vattaṃ ārocetvā bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā vasitattā dosābhāvameva dīpeti,
tika-vin08t0:1755_14: Iti imesaṃ pāṭhānaṃ ayoniso adhippāyaṃ gahetvā “sabbattha dvādasahatthameva pamāṇa”nti maññamānā vicāriṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:1755_15: tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjamānā sissānusissādayopi tatheva karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1756_1: Yaṃ tattha pakatattasālāya majjhe thambhaṃ nimittaṃ katvā dvādasahatthaṃ miniṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:1756_3: Na hi thambhena vā sālāya vā sahavāso vā vippavāso vā vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1756_5: Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “tattha sahavāsoti yvāyaṃ pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchannetiādinā nayena vutto ekato vāso.
tika-vin08t0:1756_7: Yañhi tato dvādasahatthamattaṭṭhāne bhikkhussa gīvāṭṭhapanaṃ vā kaṭiṭṭhapanaṃ vā vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1756_9: Bahiupacārasīmāya hi parivasantassa bhikkhussa sakalasarīraṃ pakatattabhikkhūnaṃ antodvādasahatthe upacāre ṭhapetabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1757_1: dvādasahatthappadesato sakalasarīrassa antokaraṇe sati sahavāso bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1757_3: tena upaḍḍhaṃ anto upaḍḍhaṃ bahi hotūti,
tika-vin08t0:1757_9: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1757_11: na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1757_12: Aṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “ekacchanne āvāse”tiādīsu āvāso nāma vasanatthāya katasenāsanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1757_13: Anāvāso nāma cetiyagharaṃ bodhigharaṃ sammuñjaniaṭṭako dāruaṭṭako pānīyamāḷo vaccakuṭi dvārakoṭṭhakoti evamādi.
tika-vin08t0:1757_15: ‘etesu yattha katthaci ekacchanne chadanato udakapatanaṭṭhānaparicchinne okāse ukkhittako vasituṃ na labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1757_16: pārivāsiko pana antoāvāseyeva na labhatī’ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1757_18: Kurundiyaṃ ‘etesu ettakesu pañcavaṇṇachadanabaddhaṭṭhānesu pārivāsikassa ca ukkhittakassa ca pakatattena saddhiṃ udakapātena vārita’nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1757_20: Sace panettha tadahupasampannepi pakatatte paṭhamaṃ pavisitvā nipanne saṭṭhivassopi pārivāsiko pacchā pavisitvā jānanto nipajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1757_24: Sace pana tasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ nipanne pacchā pakatatto pavisitvā nipajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1757_30: tasmā sālāyapi vihārepi chadanato udakapatanaṭṭhānato muttamatteyeva sahavāsadoso na vijjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1758_0: Ekacce pana majjhimatthambhato dvādasahatthāyāmena daṇḍakena cakkaṃ bhamitvā samantato bāhire lekhaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1758_1: evaṃ kate sā bāhiralekhā āvaṭṭato dvāsattatihatthamattā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1758_2: tato taṃ padesaṃ dvādasahatthena daṇḍakena minitvā bhājiyamānaṃ chabhāgameva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1758_3: tato tesaṃ chabhāgānaṃ sīmāya ekekasmiṃ mañce paññapiyamāne chaḷeva mañcaṭṭhānāni honti,
tika-vin08t0:1758_4: tasmā ekasmiṃ vaṭṭamaṇḍale cha bhikkhūyeva apubbaṃ acarimaṃ vasituṃ labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1758_9: pārivāsiko pakatattassa bhikkhuno dvādasahatthabbhantare sayamāno sahavāso siyā,
tika-vin08t0:1758_12: Evaṃ karontānaṃ pana nesaṃ sakaadhippāyopi na sijjhati,
tika-vin08t0:1759_1: Pārivāsiko bhikkhu pakatattabhikkhūnañca aññamaññassa ca dvādasahatthamatte padese hotūti nesamadhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1759_2: Atha pana majjhimatthambhaṃ nimittaṃ katvā miniyamānā samantato bāhiralekhā thambhatoyeva dvādasahatthamattā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1759_4: Te hi thambhato bahi ekaratanadvitiratanādiṭṭhāne ṭhitā,
tika-vin08t0:1759_7: So hi dviratanamattenapi tiratanamattenapi lekhāya antopi hoti bahipi.
tika-vin08t0:1759_9: na tassūpari paññattamañco vā tattha nipannabhikkhu vā.
tika-vin08t0:1759_10: Mañco hi ekaratanamattena vā dviratanamattena vā sīmaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhito,
tika-vin08t0:1759_11: bhikkhūpi sayamānā na sīmāya upariyeva sayanti,
tika-vin08t0:1759_12: vidatthimattena vā ratanamattena vā sīmaṃ atikkamitvā vā appatvā vā sayanti,
tika-vin08t0:1759_13: tasmā te pārivāsikā bhikkhū pakatattabhikkhūnampi aññamaññassapi dvādasahatthamattaṭṭhāyino na honti,
tika-vin08t0:1760_1: yadi appabhikkhukādiaṅgasampannattā vihārassa vattaṃ anikkhipitvā antovihāreyeva parivasati,
tika-vin08t0:1760_2: evaṃ sati pakatattena bhikkhunā na ekacchanne āvāse vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1760_3: Yadi tādisaāvāse vā anāvāse vā chadanato udakapatanaṭṭhānassa anto sayeyya,
tika-vin08t0:1760_14: pārivāsikassa bhikkhuno ratticchedā sahavāso vippavāso anārocanā”ti ca “na,
tika-vin08t0:1760_16: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pārivāsikena vuḍḍhatarena saddhiṃ na ekacchanne āvāse vatthabba”nti ca “vuḍḍhatarenāti ettha…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1760_17: sace hi dve pārivāsikā ekato vaseyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1760_18: te aññamaññassa ajjhācāraṃ ñatvā agāravā vā vippaṭisārino vā hutvā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ vā āpattiṃ āpajjeyyuṃ vibbhameyyuṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:1760_19: tasmā nesaṃ sahaseyyā sabbappakārena paṭikkhittā”ti ca imehi pāḷiaṭṭhakathāpāṭhehi pakāsetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1760_20: Vippavāsepi pārivāsikena abhikkhuke āvāse na vatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1760_21: pakatattena vinā abhikkhuko āvāso na gantabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1760_22: bahisīmāyaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānato dvādasahatthappamāṇassa upacārassa anto nisīditabbanti bhagavato adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1761_2: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sabhikkhukā āvāsā abhikkhuko āvāso gantabbo aññatra pakatattena aññatra antarāyā”tiādi ca “tayo kho, upāli…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1761_7: ūnegaṇecaraṇa”nti ca “vippavāsoti ekakasseva vāso”ti ca “ayañca yasmā gaṇassa ārocetvā bhikkhūnañca atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāva vasi,
tika-vin08t0:1761_8: tenassa ūnegaṇecaraṇadoso vā vippavāso vā na hotī”ti ca “atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāti dvādasahatthe upacāre sallakkhetvā,
tika-vin08t0:1761_9: anikkhittavattānaṃ upacārasīmāya āgatabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sahavāsādikaṃ veditabba”nti ca āgatehi pāḷiyaṭṭhakathā-
tika-vin08t0:1761_11: tasmā vihāre parivasantassa upacārasīmāya abbhantare yattha katthaci vasantassa natthi vippavāso,
tika-vin08t0:1761_12: bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ parivasantassa bhikkhūnaṃ nisinnapariyantato dvādasahatthabbhantare vasantassa ca natthi vippavāsoti,
tika-vin08t0:1761_13: tañca parivāsakāle “ekena bhikkhunā saddhi”nti vacanato ekassapi bhikkhuno,
tika-vin08t0:1761_14: mānattacaraṇakāle “catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhi”nti vacanato ca catunnaṃ pañcannampi bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1762_0: Vattaṃ samādiyitvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocitakālato pana paṭṭhāya kenaci karaṇīyena tesu bhikkhūsu gatesupi
tika-vin08t0:1762_2: Tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “sopi kenaci kammena purearuṇe eva gacchatīti iminā ārocanāya katāya
tika-vin08t0:1762_3: sabbesupi bhikkhūsu bahivihāraṃ gatesu ūnegaṇecaraṇadoso vā vippavāsadoso vā na hoti ārocitattā sahavāsassāti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1762_5: Apare pana ācariyā “bahisīmāya vattasamādānaṭṭhāne vatiparikkhepopi pakatattabhikkhūheva kātabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1762_7: Yathā loke bandhanāgārādi daṇḍakārakehi eva kattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1762_13: Tathā hi vuttaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāneti dassanūpacāravijahanattha”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1762_15: Ito paraṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva parivāsadānañca mānattadānañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1763_1: pārivāsiko bhikkhu vuḍḍhataropi samāno vatte samādinne navakaṭṭhāne ṭhito.
tika-vin08t0:1763_2: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “yattha pana nisīdāpetvā parivisanti,
tika-vin08t0:1763_4: bhikkhūnaṃ saṅghanavakena hutvā nisīditabba”nti tasmā ārocitakālādīsu “ahaṃ bhante”icceva vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1763_11: pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pañca yathāvuḍḍhaṃ uposathaṃ pavāraṇaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ oṇojanaṃ bhatta”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1763_13: pakatatto bhikkhu āsanena nimantetabbo”ti etissā pāḷiyā saṃvaṇṇanāya “vuṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1763_15: vuṭṭhāya ca ‘ahaṃ iminā sukhanisinno vuṭṭhāpito’ti parammukhena na gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1763_17: ettha nisīdathā’ti evaṃ nimantetabboyevā”ti ettheva “ācariyā”ti ālapanaviseso vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1763_23: tasmā na tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sārato paccetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1763_24: Imasmiṃ pana vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇe “ārocentena sace navakataro hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1763_28: idañca “ekena bhikkhunā saddhi”nti heṭṭhā vuttattā taṃ paṭiggāhakabhūtaṃ pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1764_0: Bahavo pana bhikkhū pārivāsikaṃ bhikkhuṃ saṅghamajjhe nisīdāpetvā vattaṃ yācāpetvā kammavācāpariyosāne
tika-vin08t0:1764_1: samādāpetvā ārocanamakāretvā saṅghamajjhato nikkhamāpetvā parisapariyante nisīdāpetvā tattha nisinnena
tika-vin08t0:1764_4: ayaṃ bhikkhu vatte asamādinne vuḍḍhaṭṭhāniyopi hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1764_5: tasmā yācanakāle ca kammavācāsavanakāle ca vattasamādānakāle ca saṅghamajjhe nisīdanāraho hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1764_10: ayaṃ bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe nisīdamāno āsanaṃ gahetvā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ nisinno na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1764_11: atha kho kammārahabhāvena āsanaṃ aggahetvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā ukkuṭikameva nisinno hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1764_12: kammāraho ca nāma saṅghamajjheyeva ṭhapetabbo hoti, no bahi,
tika-vin08t0:1764_13: tasmā “saṅghamajjhe nisīdanāraho na hotī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ tasmiṃ kāle,
tika-vin08t0:1764_14: nikkhamāpite ca vattārocanavattanikkhipanānaṃ aniṭṭhitattā aññamaññaṃ āhacca suṭṭhu nisinnaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharitumasakkuṇeyyattā,
tika-vin08t0:1764_16: ārocanakiriyañca vattanikkhipanañca saṅghamajjheyeva kattabbaṃ pariyante nisīditvā karonto aṭṭhakathāvirodho hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1764_17: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vattaṃ samādiyitvā tattheva saṅghassa ārocetabbaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1764_20: Samādānaṭṭhāneyeva ārocāpetvā tattheva nikkhipāpetvā niṭṭhitasabbakiccameva nikkhamāpetvā attano āsane nisīdāpento ñāyāgatoti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin08t0:1765_0: Tathā sāyaṃ vattārocanakāle bahūsu pārivāsikesu vuḍḍhataraṃ paṭhamaṃ samādāpetvā ārocāpetvā anukkamena
tika-vin08t0:1765_2: pāto nikkhipanakāle pana navakataraṃ paṭhamaṃ ārocāpetvā nikkhipāpenti,
tika-vin08t0:1765_3: tato anukkamena vuḍḍhataraṃ sabbapacchā ārocāpetvā nikkhipāpenti.
tika-vin08t0:1765_5: yadā dasa bhikkhū pakatattā dasa bhikkhū pārivāsikā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1765_6: tadā vuḍḍhatarena paṭhamaṃ samādiyitvā ārocite tassa ārocanaṃ avasesā ekūnavīsati bhikkhū suṇanti,
tika-vin08t0:1765_8: tatiyassa sattarasāti anukkamena hāyitvā sabbanavakassa ārocanaṃ dasa pakatattā suṇanti sesānaṃ apakatattabhāvato.
tika-vin08t0:1765_9: Tato nikkhipanakāle sabbanavako pubbe attanā ārocitānaṃ dasannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetvā nikkhipati,
tika-vin08t0:1765_11: tatiyo dvādasannanti anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā sabbajeṭṭhako attanā pubbe ārocitānaṃ ekūnavīsatibhikkhūnaṃ ārocetvā nikkhipati,
tika-vin08t0:1765_13: Sabbajeṭṭhake pana paṭhamaṃ nikkhitte sati pubbe attanā ārocitānaṃ navannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tadā apakatattabhāvato ārocitānaṃ santike nikkhipanaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1765_17: tasmā yathāvuttanayena sabbanavakato paṭṭhāya anukkamena nikkhipitabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:1766_0: Evaṃvādīnaṃ pana tesamāyasmantānaṃ vāde pakatattāyeva bhikkhū ārocetabbā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1766_2: Pubbe ārocitānaṃyeva santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1766_4: Evaṃ pana pakatattāyeva bhikkhū ārocetabbā na honti,
tika-vin08t0:1766_5: atha kho apakatattāpi “sace dve pārivāsikā gataṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ passanti,
tika-vin08t0:1766_7: Pubbe ārocitānampi anārocitānampi santike ārocetvā nikkhipitabbameva “sace so bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkanto hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1766_10: tasmā tathā akarontepi sabbesaṃ ārocitattā natthi doso.
tika-vin08t0:1766_11: Appekacce bhikkhū “pakatattassevāyaṃ ārocanā”ti maññamānā sāyaṃ vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetvā
tika-vin08t0:1766_12: attano sayanaṃ pavisitvā dvārajagganasayanasodhanādīni karontā aññesaṃ ārocitaṃ na suṇanti.
tika-vin08t0:1766_13: Appekacce pāto sayaṃ ārocetvā nikkhipitvā aññesaṃ ārocanaṃ vā nikkhipanaṃ vā anāgametvā bhikkhācārādīnaṃ atthāya gacchanti,
tika-vin08t0:1766_14: evaṃ karontānaṃ tesaṃ ārocanaṃ ekaccānaṃ asutabhāvasambhavato sāsaṅko hoti pārivāsikānaṃ aññamaññārocanassa pakaraṇesu āgatattā.
tika-vin08t0:1766_16: atha kho vajirabuddhiṭīkāyampi “sace dve pārivāsikā gataṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ passanti,
tika-vin08t0:1767_0: Tathā appekacce pakatattā bhikkhū pārivāsikesu bhikkhūsu sāyaṃ vattasamādānatthaṃ pakatattasālato nikkhamitvā
tika-vin08t0:1767_4: Appekacce pāto vattanikkhipanakāle pārivāsikabhikkhūsu vattārocanavattanikkhipanāni karontesupi niddāpasutā hutvā na suṇanti.
tika-vin08t0:1767_5: Evaṃ karontānampi tesaṃ ekaccānaṃ assutasambhavato vattārocanaṃ sāsaṅkaṃ hotīti.
tika-vin08t0:1767_7: suṇantānaṃ assutasambhavepi ārocakānaṃ sammāārocanena vattassa paripuṇṇattā ko dosoti ce?
tika-vin08t0:1767_8: Ārocakānaṃ sammā ārocitattā vatte paripuṇṇepi vattabhedadukkaṭatova vimutto siyā,
tika-vin08t0:1767_10: Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “sace vāyamantopi sampāpuṇituṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
tika-vin08t0:1768_0: Athaññe bhikkhū vattaṃ samādiyitvā rattiṃ nipannā niddābhāvena manussasaddampi suṇanti,
tika-vin08t0:1768_3: te tena saddena āsaṅkanti “bhikkhūnaṃ nu kho aya”nti,
tika-vin08t0:1768_4: te tena kāraṇena ratticchedaṃ maññanti. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1768_5: “Ayañca nesaṃ chattasaddaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddaṃ vā khipitasaddaṃ vā sutvā āgantukabhāvaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin08t0:1768_14: Vuttañhi tattheva “yepi antovihāraṃ appavisitvā upacārasīmaṃ okkamitvā gacchantī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1768_19: ayaṃ bhikkhūhi pājitasakaṭanāvādisaddo”ti nisinnaṭṭhānato jānantoyeva ratticchedakaro hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1769_0: Divā dūre gacchantaṃ janakāyaṃ disvāpi “ime bhikkhū nu kho”ti parikappentā ratticchedaṃ maññanti,
tika-vin08t0:1769_3: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nadīādīsu nāvāya gacchantampi paratīre ṭhitampi ākāse gacchantampi pabbatathalaaraññādīsu
tika-vin08t0:1769_4: dūre ṭhitampi bhikkhuṃ disvā sace ‘bhikkhū’ti vavatthānaṃ atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1769_5: nāvādīhi vā gantvā mahāsaddaṃ katvā vā vegena anubandhitvā vā ārocetabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1769_7: Abhikkhuṃ pana “bhikkhū”ti vavatthāne santepi vā asantepi vā kiṃ vattabbaṃ atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1769_8: bahavo pana bhikkhū idaṃ rūpadassanaṃ saddasavanañca āsaṅkantā “pabhāte sati taṃ dvayaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1769_9: tasmā manussānaṃ gamanakālasaddakaraṇakālato pubbeyeva vattaṃ nikkhipitabba”nti maññamānā anuggateyeva aruṇe vattaṃ nikkhipanti,
tika-vin08t0:1770_0: Atha pana vinayadharena “kittakā te āpattiyo, chādesi,
tika-vin08t0:1770_7: rattipariyante vematiko”ti vutte “ayaṃ bhikkhu suddhantaparivāsāraho”ti ñatvā tassapi duvidhattā cūḷasuddhantamahāsuddhantavasena
tika-vin08t0:1770_8: “tesu ayaṃ bhikkhu imassa araho”ti ñāpanatthaṃ upasampadato paṭṭhāya anulomakkamena vā ārocitadivasato
tika-vin08t0:1770_9: paṭṭhāya paṭilomakkamena vā “kittakaṃ kālaṃ tvaṃ ārocanaāvikaraṇādivasena suddho”ti pucchitvā “āma bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1770_10: ettakaṃ kālaṃ ahaṃ suddhomhī”ti vutte “ayaṃ bhikkhu ekaccaṃ rattipariyantaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin08t0:1770_11: tasmā cūḷasuddhantāraho”ti ñatvā tassa suddhakālaṃ apanetvā asuddhakālavasena pariyantaṃ katvā cūḷasuddhantaparivāso dātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1770_14: Yo pana anulomavasena vā paṭilomavasena vā pucchiyamāno “sakalampi rattipariyantaṃ ahaṃ na jānāmi nassarāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1770_15: vematiko homī”ti vutte “ayaṃ bhikkhu sakalampi rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti,
tika-vin08t0:1770_16: tasmā mahāsuddhantāraho”ti ñatvā tassa upasampadato paṭṭhāya yāva vattasamādānā ettakaṃ kālaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā mahāsuddhantaparivāso dātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1770_18: Ito parampi vidhānaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayeneva daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1771_1: ayaṃ mahāsuddhantāraho”ti avicinantā antokammavācāyaṃ “āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti,
tika-vin08t0:1771_6: rattipariyante vematiko”ti avisesavacanameva manasi karontā “imāya kammavācāya dinnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1771_7: gahetvā pañcāhamattaṃ vā dasāhamattaṃ vā parivasitvā apariyantarattipaṭicchāditāhi apariyantāhi āpattīhi
tika-vin08t0:1771_8: mokkho hotī”ti maññantā pañcāhamattaṃ vā dasāhamattaṃ vā parivasitvā mānattaṃ yācanti,
tika-vin08t0:1771_9: evaṃ karontā te bhikkhū sahassakkhattuṃ parivasantāpi āpattito na mucceyyuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1771_14: Parivutthaparivāsena bhikkhunā uttari chārattaṃ bhikkhumānattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1771_15: Ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho,
tika-vin08t0:1771_17: tasmā paṭicchannadivasamattaṃ aparivasitvā mānattāraho nāma na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1771_21: anabbhito bhikkhu āpattimutto pakatatto na hotīti ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1772_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana cūḷasuddhante “taṃ gahetvā parivasantena yattakaṃ kālaṃ attano suddhiṃ jānāti,
tika-vin08t0:1772_1: tattakaṃ apanetvā avasesaṃ māsaṃ vā dvimāsaṃ vā parivasitabba”nti,
tika-vin08t0:1772_5: na pañcāhadasāharattippamāṇamattaṃ parivasantoti ayaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1772_6: Teneva ca kāraṇena desanāārocanādīhi sabbakālaṃ āpattiṃ sodhetvā vasantānaṃ lajjīpesalānaṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1772_8: desanāārocanādīhi āpattiṃ asodhetvā pamādavasena cirakālaṃ vasantānaṃ janapadavāsikādīnaṃ dātuṃ yuttarūpoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1773_2: kati rattiyo te chāditā”ti puṭṭho “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin08t0:1773_4: tenāhaṃ saṅghaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yācitvā saṅghena dinne pakkhaparivāse parivasitvā anikkhittavattova hutvā
tika-vin08t0:1773_5: antarā saṅghādisesāpattiṃ āpajjitvā pañcāhamattaṃ chāditā”ti vutte “ayaṃ bhikkhu samodhānaparivāsāraho,
tika-vin08t0:1773_6: tīsu ca samodhānaparivāsesu odhānasamodhānāraho”ti ñatvā “tena hi bhikkhu tvaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho”ti
tika-vin08t0:1773_7: vatvā taṃ mūlāya paṭikassitvā parivutthadivase adivase katvā antarā paṭicchanne pañca divase mūlāpattiyā
tika-vin08t0:1773_9: Ito parāni odhānasamodhāne vattabbavacanāni pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
tika-vin08t0:1774_3: sambahulā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti vutte “ayaṃ bhikkhu agghasamodhānāraho”ti ñatvā tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo ciratarappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin08t0:1774_15: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pañcadasa divasāni paṭicchannāya ‘pakkhappaṭicchanna’nti vatvā yojanā kātabbā…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1774_17: atirekasaṭṭhisaṃvaccharappaṭicchannanti vā tato vā bhiyyopi vatvā yojanā kātabbā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1774_18: Mahāpadumattherenapi vuttaṃ “ayaṃ samuccayakkhandhako nāma buddhānaṃ ṭhitakālasadiso,
tika-vin08t0:1774_19: āpatti nāma paṭicchannā vā hotu appaṭicchannā vā samakaūnataraatirekappaṭicchannā vā,
tika-vin08t0:1774_21: tasmā pakkhappaṭicchannādīnaṃ kammavācākaraṇe kukkuccaṃ na kātabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:1775_1: evampi pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā katāya kammavācāya tato uddhaṃ āpatti natthīti kathaṃ jāneyyāti?
tika-vin08t0:1775_2: Idāni sikkhākāmā bhikkhū devasikampi desanārocanāvikaraṇāni karonti ekāhikadvīhikādivasenapi,
tika-vin08t0:1775_3: kiccapasutā hutvā tathā asakkontāpi uposathadivasaṃ nātikkamanti,
tika-vin08t0:1775_5: tasmā tadatikkantabhāve sati atirekapakkhappaṭicchannamāsappaṭicchannādivasena vaḍḍhetvā kammavācaṃ kareyya,
tika-vin08t0:1776_3: tattha imināyeva anukkamena mayā paṭicchāditā āpattiyo hontīti kathaṃ jāneyya,
tika-vin08t0:1776_4: ajānane ca sati “yā ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin08t0:1776_9: Tattha hi āpattiyā āpannabhāvaṃ ajānanto hutvā paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin08t0:1776_10: tasmā “āpatti ca hoti āpattisaññī cā”ti vuttaāpattisaññitābhāvā appaṭicchannameva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1776_11: tasmā appaṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ adhammikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1776_12: Idha pana “ettakā rattiyo mayā chāditā”ti channakālameva na jānāti,
tika-vin08t0:1776_14: Teneva ca kāraṇena suddhantaparivāse “āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti,
tika-vin08t0:1776_19: rattipariyante vematiko”ti rattipariyantassa ajānanaasaraṇavematikabhāve satipi parivāsadānaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1776_20: tasmā chāditakālaṃ tathato ajānantopi “sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1776_21: sambahulā āpattiyo pakkhappaṭicchannāyo”ti ettha appaviṭṭhassa abhāvā sampajjatiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1777_2: sambahulā āpattiyo pakkhappaṭicchannāyo”ti vutte tesu divasesu āpattiyo atthi paṭicchannāyopi,
tika-vin08t0:1777_8: sabbā tā āpattiyo eteneva padena saṅgahitā siyunti?
tika-vin08t0:1777_11: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aññasmiṃ pana āpattivuṭṭhāne idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ –
tika-vin08t0:1777_18: Ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā ‘sambahulā’ti karontassapi vuṭṭhāti ekaṃ vinā sambahulānaṃ abhāvato.
tika-vin08t0:1777_19: Sambahulā pana āpajjitvā ‘ekaṃ āpajji’nti karontassa na vuṭṭhātī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1777_20: tasmā etehi padehi sabbāsaṃ paṭicchannāpattīnaṃ saṅgahitattā tāhi āpattīhi vuṭṭhānaṃ sambhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1778_1: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1778_13: ekaṃ kuladūsaka”nti vutte “ayaṃ bhikkhu missakasamodhānaparivāsāraho”ti ñatvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayena parivāso dātabbo. Etthāha –
tika-vin08t0:1778_16: agghasamodhānaparivāso acirappaṭicchannā āpattiyo cirappaṭicchannāyaṃ āpattiyaṃ samodhānetvā tassā cirappaṭicchannāya āpattiyā agghavasena dīyati,
tika-vin08t0:1778_17: missakasamodhānaparivāso nānāvatthukā āpattiyo samodhānetvā tāsaṃ missakavasena dīyati,
tika-vin08t0:1778_19: Atha vā agghasamodhāno sabhāgavatthūnaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānavasena hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1778_21: Tenevāha ācariyavajirabuddhitthero “agghasamodhāno nāma sabhāgavatthukāyo sambahulā āpattiyo āpannassa
tika-vin08t0:1779_0: Atha siyā “evaṃ cirappaṭicchannāyo ca acirappaṭicchannāyo ca nānāvatthukāyo āpattiyo āpajjantassa ko
tika-vin08t0:1779_1: parivāso dātabbo agghasamodhāno vā missakasamodhāno vā,
tika-vin08t0:1779_5: cirappaṭicchannāhi ca acirappaṭicchannāhi ca sabhāgavatthukāhi āpattīhi vuṭṭhito bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1779_6: cirappaṭicchannāhi ca acirappaṭicchannāhi ca no visabhāgavatthukāhi.
tika-vin08t0:1779_11: “ekasmiṃ kamme dve parivāsā dātabbā”ti neva pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1779_13: idañhi sabbampi parivāsādikaṃ vinayakammaṃ vatthuvasena vā gottavasena vā nāmavasena vā āpattivasena vā kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin08t0:1780_2: Tattha “sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ kāyasaṃsagga”ntiādivacanenāpi “nānāvatthukāyo”ti vacanenapi vatthu ceva gottañca gahitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1780_3: “saṅghādiseso”ti vacanenapi “āpattiyo”ti vacanenapi nāmañceva āpatti ca gahitā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1780_5: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji”ntiādivacaneneva vatthussa ca gottassa ca nāmassa ca āpattiyā
tika-vin08t0:1780_6: ca gahitattā cirappaṭicchannāhi acirappaṭicchannāhi ca sabhāgavatthukāhi ca visabhāgavatthukāhi ca sabbāhi
tika-vin08t0:1780_8: Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “ettha ca ‘saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ nānāvatthukāyo’tipi ‘saṅghādisesā
tika-vin08t0:1780_9: āpattiyo āpajji’ntipi evaṃ pubbe vuttanayena vatthuvasenapi gottavasenapi nāmavasenapi āpattivasenapi
tika-vin08t0:1780_10: yojetvā kammavācaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyevāti ayaṃ missakasamodhāno”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1780_11: imasmiñca vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇe tatheva vatvā “tasmā na idha visuṃ kammavācaṃ yojetvā dassayissāma,
tika-vin08t0:1780_12: pubbe sabbāpattisādhāraṇaṃ katvā yojetvā dassitāya eva kammavācāya nānāvatthukāhipi āpattīhi vuṭṭhānasambhavato sāyevettha kammavācā ala”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1781_0: Yadi evaṃ ācariyavajirabuddhittherena dvinnaṃ viseso na vattabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1781_2: Tīsu samodhānaparivāsesu odhānasamodhāno mūlāyapaṭikassanāya odhūnitakāleyeva dātabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1781_4: “Evaṃ dinne etesaṃ ko viseso”ti cintāyaṃ visesasambhavamattadassanatthaṃ vutto.
tika-vin08t0:1781_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana parivāsādikammassa lakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “vatthuvasena vā”tiādimāha,
tika-vin08t0:1781_6: tasmā lakkhaṇavaseneva sabhāgavatthukāhipi āpattīhi vuṭṭhānaṃ sambhavati.
tika-vin08t0:1781_7: Teneva ca kāraṇena sāratthadīpanināmikāyaṃ vinayaṭīkāyañca vimativinodanināmikāyaṃ vinayaṭīkāyañca na koci viseso vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1782_0: Yadi evaṃ missakasamodhānakammavācāyapi cirappaṭicchannāhi acirappaṭicchannāhipi āpattīhi vuṭṭhānaṃ sambhaveyya.
tika-vin08t0:1782_2: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ nānāvatthukāyo”tipi “ekā sukkavissaṭṭhi…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1782_4: Evaṃ sati “sambahulā”tipi “saṅghādisesā āpattiyo”tipi vatthugottanāmāpattīhi kittanasambhavato cirappaṭicchannāhipi
tika-vin08t0:1782_8: Evaṃ gaṇhantepi paṭicchannakālassa akathitattā “ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ parivasitabba”nti na paññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:1782_9: tasmiṃ apaññāyamāne tena pamāṇena parivāso na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1782_10: tasmiṃ asati āpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ na sambhavati,
tika-vin08t0:1782_11: tasmā missakasamodhānakammavācāya cirappaṭicchannāhipi acirappaṭicchannāhipi āpattīhi vuṭṭhānaṃ na sambhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1785_0: Mānattakathāyampi mānattaṃ nāma appaṭicchannamānattaṃ paṭicchannamānattaṃ pakkhamānattaṃ samodhānamānattanti catubbidhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1785_1: Tattha yo bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā taṃ divasameva āroceti,
tika-vin08t0:1785_3: tassa parivāsaṃ adatvāva dinnaṃ mānattaṃ appaṭicchannamānattaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1785_4: Yo āpajjitvā dasahi ākārehi vinā taṃ divasaṃ nāroceti,
tika-vin08t0:1785_6: tattha yathāpaṭicchannadivasaṃ parivāsaṃ datvā parivutthaparivāsassa dinnaṃ mānattaṃ paṭicchannamānattaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1785_7: Āpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchannāya vā appaṭicchannāya vā bhikkhuniyā pakkhamattameva dinnaṃ mānattaṃ pakkhamānattaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1785_8: Bhikkhu pana paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivasitvā anikkhittavattakāleyeva puna āpajjitvā na paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin08t0:1785_9: tassa mūlāya paṭikassitvā parivutthadivase adivase katvā appaṭicchāditattā samodhānaparivāsaṃ adatvā dinnaṃ mānattaṃ samodhānamānattaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1785_11: Tesu tīṇi mānattāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena suviññeyyattā na vuttāni.
tika-vin08t0:1786_0: Yāni pana parivāsamānattāni anavaṭṭhitattā puthujjanassa gihiādivasena parivattane sati puna dātabbādātabbabhāve saṅkitabbāni,
tika-vin08t0:1786_1: tāni dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ anekehi pakārehi vitthārato vuttāni.
tika-vin08t0:1786_2: Tesu bhikkhūnaṃ saṃsayavinodanatthāya ekadesaṃ dassetuṃ “sace kocī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1786_5: Sāmaṇero hotīti upasampannabhāvaṃ jahitvā sāmaṇerabhāvaṃ upagacchati.
tika-vin08t0:1786_6: Tattha pārājikappattabhāvena vā “gihīti maṃ dhārethā”tiādinā sikkhāpaccakkhānena vā gihī hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1786_7: Tesu paṭhamena puna upasampadāya abhabbattā puna parivāso na ruhatiyeva,
tika-vin08t0:1786_8: dutiyena pana puna upasampadāya bhabbattā “so ce puna upasampajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1786_9: Itaro pana pārājikappattabhāvena sāmaṇero na hoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1786_11: Vuttañhi vimativinodaniyaṃ “upasampannānampi pārājikasamaāpattiyā saraṇagamanādisāmaṇerabhāvassapi vinassanato senāsanaggāho ca paṭippassambhati,
tika-vin08t0:1786_13: gihī pana hutvā puna sāmaṇerabhāvamattaṃ laddhabbaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1786_14: “Sāmaṇeroti maṃ dhārethā”tiādinā pana sikkhāpaccakkhāne kate siyā sāmaṇerabhāvo,
tika-vin08t0:1786_15: tatopi puna upasampajjitukāmatāya sati siyā upasampannabhāvo.
tika-vin08t0:1786_16: “Gihīti maṃ dhārethā”tiādinā sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ katvā gihibhāvaṃ upagatepi puna sāmaṇerapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā sāmaṇero hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1786_17: Tato puna upasampajjituṃ laddhabbattā “puna upasampajjatī”ti vutto.
tika-vin08t0:1786_18: Tesaṃ bhikkhubhāve parivāse aniṭṭhitepi gihisāmaṇerabhāvaṃ pattattā parivāso na ruhati upasampannānameva parivāsassa bhagavatā paññattattāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1787_0: Evaṃ sante puna upasampajjantassa kiṃ parivāso puna dātabboti āha “so ce puna upasampajjatī”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1787_2: so vibbhantako so vā sāmaṇero puna upasampannabhāvaṃ upagacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1787_3: purimaṃ pubbe bhikkhubhūtakāle dinnaṃ parivāsadānaṃ eva idāni parivāsadānaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1787_12: pubbe bhikkhukāle pakkhappaṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsaṃ gahetvā dasadivasamattaṃ parivasitvā aniṭṭhiteyeva
tika-vin08t0:1787_13: parivāse vibbhamitvā sāmaṇero vā hutvā puna upasampannena avasesapañcadivase parivasitvā parivāso niṭṭhāpetabboti.
tika-vin08t0:1787_15: Ummattakādīsupi tasmiṃ kāle ajānantattā “parivāso na ruhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1787_16: Tiṇṇampi ukkhittakānaṃ kammanānāsaṃvāsakattā tehi sahasaṃvāsoyeva natthīti ukkhittakānaṃ parivāso na ruhatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1788_0: Sace puna osārīyatīti ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena samānasaṃvāsakabhāvaṃ pavesīyati.
tika-vin08t0:1788_1: “Sace kassaci bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhavatī”tiādīsu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva attho suviññeyyo hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1788_5: Taṃ pana paṭicchannāyapi appaṭicchannāyapi āpattiyā aḍḍhamāsamattameva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1788_6: Vuttañhetaṃ “garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabba”nti.
tika-vin08t0:1788_7: Taṃ pana bhikkhunīhi attano sīmaṃ sodhetvā vihārasīmāya vā vihārasīmaṃ sodhetuṃ asakkontīhi khaṇḍasīmāya
tika-vin08t0:1788_8: vā sabbantimena paricchedena catuvaggagaṇaṃ sannipātāpetvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1788_11: sace dve vā tisso vā sambahulā vā ekavatthukā vā nānāvatthukā vā,
tika-vin08t0:1788_12: tāsaṃ tāsaṃ vasena vatthugottanāmaāpattīsu yaṃ yaṃ icchati,
tika-vin08t0:1789_1: tāya āpannāya bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1789_2: pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo “ahaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin08t0:1789_4: ayya,e ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ yācāmī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1789_5: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo “suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho,
tika-vin08t0:1789_6: ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji gāmantaraṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1789_7: sā saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ yācati.
tika-vin08t0:1789_9: saṅgho itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ dadeyya,
tika-vin08t0:1789_17: Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1790_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne vattaṃ samādiyitvā bhikkhumānattakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva saṅghassa ārocetvā nikkhittavattaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1790_1: vasitukāmāya tatheva saṅghassa majjhe vā pakkantāsu bhikkhunīsu ekabhikkhuniyā vā dutiyikāya vā santike
tika-vin08t0:1790_3: Aññissā pana āgantukāya santike ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1791_0: Puna samādiyitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapentiyā pana bhikkhunīnaṃyeva santike vasituṃ na labbhati.
tika-vin08t0:1791_2: tasmā assā ācariyupajjhāyāhi vihāraṃ gantvā saṅgāhakapakkhe ṭhito eko mahāthero vā dhammakathiko vā bhikkhu
tika-vin08t0:1791_4: tatra no ayyā cattāro bhikkhū pesethā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1791_7: Catūhi pakatattabhikkhunīhi mānattacāriniṃ bhikkhuniṃ gahetvā antoaruṇeyeva nikkhipitvā gāmūpacārato
tika-vin08t0:1791_8: dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā maggā okkamma gumbavatiādīhi paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1791_11: gantvā pana bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ na ekaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1791_13: Kurundimahāpaccarīsu pana “bhikkhunīhi byattaṃ ekaṃ vā dve vā upāsikāyo bhikkhūhipi ekaṃ vā dve vā upāsake
tika-vin08t0:1791_15: Kurundiyaṃyeva ca “bhikkhunupassayassa ca vihārassa ca upacāraṃ muñcituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1792_0: Evaṃ nisinnesu pana bhikkhunīsu ca bhikkhūsu ca tāya bhikkhuniyā “mānattaṃ samādiyāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1792_1: vattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti vattaṃ samādiyitvā bhikkhunisaṅghassa tāva evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ “ahaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin08t0:1792_3: sāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1792_4: tassā me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā gāmantarāya pakkhamānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin08t0:1793_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa santikaṃ gantvā evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ “ahaṃ, ayyā,
tika-vin08t0:1793_4: Idhāpi yāya kāyaci bhāsāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1793_10: Sace añño bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā taṃ ṭhānaṃ eti,
tika-vin08t0:1793_14: Sace ajānantiyā eva upacāraṃ okkamitvā gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1793_17: Sace bhikkhuniyo upajjhāyādīnaṃ vattakaraṇatthaṃ pageva gantukāmā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1793_19: tāya aruṇe uṭṭhite tassā santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1793_20: Etenupāyena akhaṇḍā pañcadasa rattiyo mānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1794_0: Anikkhittavattāya pana pārivāsikakkhandhake vuttanayeneva sammā vattitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1794_2: “āgantukassa ārocetabba”nti ettha yattakā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā taṃ gāmaṃ bhikkhū vā bhikkhuniyo vā āgacchanti,
tika-vin08t0:1794_5: Sacepi rattiṃ koci bhikkhu taṃ gāmūpacāraṃ okkamitvā gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1794_9: taṃ pārivāsikavattādīnaṃ upacārasīmāya paricchinnattā yuttataraṃ dissati.
tika-vin08t0:1794_13: Sace bhikkhūnaṃ tasmiṃ gāme bhikkhācāro sampajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1794_16: aññatra caritvāpi tatra āgantvā attānaṃ dassetvā gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1794_17: bahigāme vā saṅketaṭṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne amhe passissatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1794_21: Sace sabbesaṃ sakkā na hoti ārocetuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1794_25: upāsake ca upāsikāyo ca gahetvā gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1794_28: tasmāssā ekā pakatattā bhikkhunī sammannitvā dātabbā ekacchanne vasanatthāya.
tika-vin08t0:1795_0: Evaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ mānattaṃ caritvā vīsatigaṇe bhikkhunisaṅghe vuttanayeneva abbhānaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1795_2: mūlāya paṭikassitvā tassā āpattiyā mānattaṃ dātabba”nti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1795_4: Idaṃ pana pakkhamānattaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ pāḷimuttavinayavinicchayabhāvena āgatampi imasmiṃ vinayasaṅgahappakaraṇe ācariyena anuddhaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1795_6: idaṃ pakkhamānattaṃ bhikkhuniyoyeva sandhāya bhagavatā visuṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1795_9: tasmā ganthassa lahubhāvatthaṃ idampi aññampi īdisaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:1795_10: Amhehi pana bhikkhunisaṅghe avijjamānepi “bhikkhusaṅgho bhikkhunīhi samādātabbavattaṃ jānissati.
tika-vin08t0:1795_11: ‘Dubbalajātikā hi bhīrukajātikā bhikkhuniyo bhagavato āṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpentiyo evarūpaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ vattaṃ samādayiṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:1795_12: kimaṅgaṃ pana maya’nti manasi karontā bhagavato āṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpentā parivāsādivattaṃ samādiyissantī”ti
tika-vin08t0:1795_13: mantvā ācariyena anuddhaṭampi imasmiṃ vinayālaṅkārappakaraṇe uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1795_14: tasmā sammāsambuddhe sañjātasaddhāpemagāravādiyuttehi satthusāsanakarehi bhikkhūhi sammā sikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1797_1: Pārivāsikavattakathāyaṃ navakataraṃ pārivāsikanti attanā navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1797_2: Pārivāsikassa hi attanā navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ ṭhapetvā aññe mūlāyapaṭikassanāraha mānattāraha mānattacārika
tika-vin08t0:1797_8: pārivāsikā ca tesaṃ pakatattaṭṭhāne eva tiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1797_18: Vattaṃ karontīti ettakamattasseva vuttattā saddhivihārikādīhipi abhivādanādiṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1797_19: “Mā maṃ gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchathā”ti vutte anāpucchāpi gāmaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1798_0: Yo yo vuḍḍhoti pārivāsikesu bhikkhūsu yo yo vuḍḍho.
tika-vin08t0:1798_2: “Pārisuddhiuposathe kariyamāne”ti idaṃ pavāraṇadivasesu saṅghe pavārente anupagatachinnavassādīhi kariyamānaṃ pārisuddhiuposathampi sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1798_4: Attano pāḷiyā pavāretabbanti attano vassaggena pattapāḷiyā pavāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1799_1: taṃ pana pārivāsikena pāpitassa attanā sampaṭicchitasseva punadivasādiatthāya vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1799_4: Yadi pana na gaṇhāti na vissajjetīti yadi purimadivase attano na gaṇhāti,
tika-vin08t0:1800_4: Ito parampi pārivāsikavattaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1800_5: Tattha pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayeneva attho suviññeyyo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1801_0: “Na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti ettha dubbidhaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ dassetuṃ “añño”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1801_1: “Na bhikkhuniyo ovaditabbā”ti ettha laddhasammutikena āṇattopi garudhammehi aññehi vā ovadituṃ na labhatīti
tika-vin08t0:1801_5: Jeṭṭhakaṭṭhānaṃ na kātabbanti padhānaṭṭhānaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1802_0: Rajehi hatā upahatā bhūmi etissāti rajohatabhūmi,
tika-vin08t0:1802_3: Ekapasse ṭhatvāti pāḷiṃ vihāya bhikkhūnaṃ pacchato ṭhatvā.
tika-vin08t0:1802_4: Senāsanaṃ na labhatīti seyyapariyantabhāgitāya vassaggena gaṇhituṃ na labhati.
tika-vin08t0:1802_7: āgantukassa ārocetabba”nti avisesena vuttattā sace dve pārivāsikā gataṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ passanti,
tika-vin08t0:1802_9: Yathā bahi disvā ārocitassa bhikkhuno vihāraṃ āgatena puna ārocanakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1802_10: evaṃ aññavihāraṃ gatenapi tattha pubbe ārocitassa puna ārocanakiccaṃ natthīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1802_11: Avisesenāti pārivāsikassa ca ukkhittakassa ca avisesena.
tika-vin08t0:1803_1: Sahavāsoti vuttappakāre channe bhikkhunā saddhiṃ sayanameva adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1804_3: Kammanti pārivāsikakammavācāti etena “kammabhūtā vācā kammavācā”ti kammavācāsaddassa atthopi siddhoti veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1804_6: attano vacanena attano pavattanakammanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1804_7: “mā pakkamāhī”ti vā “ehi vinayadharānaṃ sammukhībhāva”nti vā evaṃ attano āṇāya pavattanakakammaṃ na kātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1804_8: Evañhi kenaci savacanīye kate anādarena atikkamituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1804_9: buddhassa saṅghassa āṇā atikkantā nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1804_12: Senāsanaṃ na labhatīti vassaggena na labhati.
tika-vin08t0:1804_14: Sace vāyamantopīti ettha avisayabhāvaṃ ñatvā avāyamantopi saṅgayhati.
tika-vin08t0:1804_19: Mañce vā pīṭhe vāti ettha vāsaddo samuccayattho.
tika-vin08t0:1804_20: Tena taṭṭikācammakhaṇḍādīsu dīghāsanesupi nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1804_21: Na vattabhedadukkaṭanti vuḍḍhatarassa jānantassapi vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1804_22: Vattaṃ nikkhipāpetvāti idampi parivāsādimeva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1805_3: Samavassāti etena apacchā apurimaṃ nipajjane dvinnampi vattabhedāpattibhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:1805_5: Paṭhamaṃ saṅghamajjhe parivāsaṃ gahetvā nikkhittavattena puna ekassapi santike samādiyituṃ nikkhipituñca vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1805_8: Paṭhamaṃ ādinnavattaṃ ekassa santike yathā nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1805_9: tathā samādiyitumpi vaṭṭatīti porāṇagaṇṭhipade”ti vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ vuttanti.
tika-vin08t0:1806_0: Idaṃ ettha yaṃ vattaṃ “catunavutipārivāsikavatta”nti pārivāsikakkhandhakapāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1806_1: samantapāsādikāyampi ettakāya pāḷiyā vaṇṇanaṃ vatvā “pārivāsikavattakathā niṭṭhitā”ti āha.
tika-vin08t0:1806_2: Imasmiṃ vinayasaṅgahapakaraṇe pana “na chamāyaṃ caṅkamante caṅkame caṅkamitabba”nti imassānantaraṃ “pārivāsikacatuttho ce,
tika-vin08t0:1806_5: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sāditabba”ntiādīni paṭhamaṃ paññattapadāni gahetvā tesaṃ padānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ katvā
tika-vin08t0:1806_7: so pāḷiyā ca aṭṭhakathāya ca na sameti.
tika-vin08t0:1806_14: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sāditabba”ntiādīni pana pārivāsikabhikkhūnaṃ sammāvattitabbavattāniyeva honti,
tika-vin08t0:1806_16: Amhehi pana pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu āgatānukkamena paṭhamaṃ paññattavattānaṃ atthaṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetvā pacchā
tika-vin08t0:1811_1: Evaṃ garukāpattivuṭṭhānavinicchayakathaṃ kathetvā idāni kammākammavinicchayakathaṃ kathetuṃ “kammākammanti ettha panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1811_2: Tattha samaggena saṅghena karīyate tanti kammaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1811_11: Atha vā kammanti catūsupi etesu lahukakammaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1811_13: Kammākammanti ettha pana vinicchayo evaṃ veditabboti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:1811_15: garukāpattivuṭṭhānavinicchayakathāpakkhato añño kammākammavinicchayakathāpakkho veditabboti vā mayā vuccateti vā attho.
tika-vin08t0:1812_1: Tena vinayakammāni nāma cattāri eva honti,
tika-vin08t0:1813_0: Evaṃ cattāri kammāni uddisitvā parivāre kammavagge āgatanayeneva tesaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ vipattikāraṇāni
tika-vin08t0:1813_1: pucchitvā vissajjetuṃ “imāni cattāri kammāni katihākārehi vipajjanti?
tika-vin08t0:1813_7: Tāniyeva hi pañca sabbesaṃ vinayakammānaṃ vipattikāraṇāni honti.
tika-vin08t0:1814_0: Tato taṃ kammavipattikāraṇabhūtaṃ vatthuṃ pāḷinayena vitthāretuṃ “sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ kammaṃ asammukhā karoti,
tika-vin08t0:1814_2: Tattha sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ paṭipucchākaraṇīyaṃ paṭiññāyakaraṇīyanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ atathākaraṇena,
tika-vin08t0:1814_3: sativinayo amūḷhavinayo tassapāpiyasikā tajjanīyakammaṃ niyasakammaṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1814_4: ukkhepanīyakammaṃ parivāso mūlāyapaṭikassanā mānattaṃ abbhānaṃ upasampadanti imesaṃ terasakammānaṃ aññakammārahassa
tika-vin08t0:1814_6: uposatho pavāraṇāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ adivase karaṇena,
tika-vin08t0:1814_7: paṇḍako theyyasaṃvāsako titthiyapakkantako tiracchānagato mātughātako pitughātako arahantaghātako lohituppādako
tika-vin08t0:1814_8: saṅghabhedako bhikkhunidūsako ubhatobyañjanako ūnavīsativasso antimavatthuajjhāpannapubboti imesaṃ terasannaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1814_9: puggalānaṃ upasampadākammakaraṇena iti imāni ekatiṃsa kammāni vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1814_11: anussāvanato pañcāti imāni dasa kāraṇāni antokammavācāyameva labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1814_13: parisato dvādasa kāraṇāni catuvaggapañcavaggadasavaggavīsativaggasaṅkhātesu catūsu saṅghesu ekekasmiṃ
tika-vin08t0:1815_0: Evaṃ kammavipattikāraṇāni dassetvā puna catuvaggasaṅghādīsu sannisinnānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ visesanāmaṃ dassetuṃ “catuvaggakaraṇe kamme”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1816_1: Tato paraṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ ṭhānaṃ saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “apalokanakammaṃ kati ṭhānāni gacchatī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1817_1: Tato tāniyeva kammāni tesu ṭhānesu pavattāni vitthārato pakāsetukāmo “ayaṃ tāva pāḷinayo.
tika-vin08t0:1817_3: Tattha tassaṃ vinicchayakathāyaṃ catūsu kammesu katamaṃ apalokanakammaṃ nāmāti pucchāyaṃ taṃ dassetumāha “apalokanakammaṃ nāmā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1817_4: Tattha sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvāti avippavāsasaṅkhātamahāsīmaṭṭhakaṃ saṅghaṃ sodhetvā.
tika-vin08t0:1817_5: Na hi khaṇḍasīmāya sannipatite saṅghe sodhetabbakiccaṃ atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1817_6: avippavāsasīmāsaṅkhātāya mahāsīmāya pana vitthārattā bahūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānattā samaggabhāvatthaṃ sodhetabbaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1817_7: Chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvāti tissaṃ sīmāyaṃ catuvaggādigaṇaṃ pūretvā hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ṭhitehi
tika-vin08t0:1817_8: bhikkhūhi aññesaṃ hatthapāsaṃ anāgatānaṃ pakatattabhikkhūnaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā.
tika-vin08t0:1817_9: Vuttañhi “catuvaggakaraṇe kamme cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā,
tika-vin08t0:1817_11: Samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyāti chandassa āharitattā hatthapāsaṃ āgatāpi anāgatāpi sabbe bhikkhū samaggāyeva honti,
tika-vin08t0:1817_16: tatiyampi ruccati saṅghassā”ti tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā kattabbakammaṃ apalokanakammaṃ nāmāti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:1817_19: chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā”ti idaṃ dvayaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin08t0:1818_0: Tattha tesu catūsu kammesu kiṃ aññakammaṃ itarakammavasena kātabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tatra”iccādi.
tika-vin08t0:1818_2: evaṃ sante avisesena sabbampi kammaṃ aññavasena kattabbanti āha “ñattidutiyakammaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1818_8: Yadi evaṃ akkharaparihīnādīsu santesu kammakopo siyāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “sace panā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1818_9: Tattha akkharaparihīnanti “suṇātu me”tiādīsu su- kāra ṇā- kāra tu-
tika-vin08t0:1819_0: Idāni punappunavacane payojanaṃ dassento “idaṃ akuppakamme daḷhikammaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1819_4: Daḷhikammaṃ hotīti thiratarakammaṃ hoti ekāya rajjuyā bandhitabbabhāre dutiyatatiyādirajjūhi bandhanaṃ viya.
tika-vin08t0:1819_6: Kammaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatīti punappunaṃ vutte sati tesaṃ akkharaparihīnādīnaṃ sodhitattā parisuddhakammaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin08t0:1819_8: Puretaraṃ katakammasmiṃ akuppakamme sati pacchā idaṃ punappunaṃ vuttakammaṃ daḷhikammaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1819_9: purekatakammasmiṃ kuppakamme sati idaṃ punappunaṃ vuttakammaṃ akuppaṃ ṭhānārahaṃ parisuddhakammaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1819_10: Imaṃ pāṭhaṃ nissāya ācariyavarā ekapuggalampi anekakkhattuṃ upasampadakammaṃ karonti.
tika-vin08t0:1819_11: Kasmā pana te bhikkhū lajjīpesalabahussutasikkhākāmabhūtānaṃ attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike sikkhaṃ gaṇhantīti?
tika-vin08t0:1819_12: Na te attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santikā laddhasikkhaṃ paccakkhāya aññaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1819_13: atha kho tāya eva saddhiṃ diguṇatiguṇaṃ karonti.
tika-vin08t0:1819_17: saddahantāpi te bhikkhū punappunakaraṇe yuttitopi āgamatopi ādīnavaṃ apassantā ānisaṃsameva passantā karontīti.
tika-vin08t0:1820_1: Yathā hi loke abhisittampi rājānaṃ punappunābhisiñcane ādīnavaṃ na passanti,
tika-vin08t0:1820_2: atha kho abhisekānubhāvena rājiddhippattatādīhi kāraṇehi ānisaṃsameva passanti,
tika-vin08t0:1820_3: yathā ca sāsane cetiyaṃ vā paṭimaṃ vā niṭṭhitasabbakiccaṃ “anekajātisaṃsāra”ntiādīhi bhagavato vacanehi
tika-vin08t0:1820_4: abhisekamaṅgalaṃ karontāpi punappunakaraṇe ādīnavaṃ apassantā atirekataraṃ mahiddhikatāmahānubhāvatādiānisaṃsameva
tika-vin08t0:1820_6: evameva kataupasampadakammaṃ bhikkhuṃ punadeva kammavācābhaṇane ādīnavaṃ apassantā pubbe katakammasmiṃ
tika-vin08t0:1820_7: vatthuādīsu pañcasu aṅgesu ekasmimpi aṅge aparipuṇṇe sati kammakopasambhavato idāni katakammena paripuṇṇaaṅge
tika-vin08t0:1820_8: sati kammasampattisambhavañca pubbeva kammasampattisambhavepi daḷhikammathiratarasambhavañca ānisaṃsaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1820_11: Yathāvuttaparivāraṭṭhakathāpāṭhavinayasaṅgahapāṭhesu duruttapadassa sodhanatthaṃ punappunaṃ vattabbabhāvassa upalakkhaṇanayena vacanato.
tika-vin08t0:1820_13: Teneva ca kāraṇena ayampi pacchimapāṭho ācariyena vutto.
tika-vin08t0:1820_15: Iti pubbe katakammassa kopasambhavepi idāni katakammena sampajjanasaṅkhātaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ āgamato passantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1821_0: Keci pana ācariyā imaṃ “punappunaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti pāṭhaṃ tasmiṃyeva paṭhamakammakaraṇakāle duruttasodhanatthaṃ vattabbataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1821_6: Apica tasmiṃ khaṇe punappunaṃ vacanatopi aparabhāge vacanaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1821_7: Tasmiñhi kāle punappunaṃ bhaṇane ñattidosaanussāvanadosāni pacchimabhaṇane suṭṭhu bhaṇanto sodhetuṃ sakkuṇeyya,
tika-vin08t0:1821_13: Aparabhāge karonto pana pubbe aparipuṇṇavīsativassabhāvena vatthuvipattibhūtepi idāni paripuṇṇavīsativassattā vatthusampatti hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1821_14: pubbe sīmasaṅkarādibhāvena sīmavipattisambhavepi idāni tadabhāvatthāya suṭṭhu sodhitattā sīmasampatti hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1821_15: pubbe vaggakammādivasena parisavipattisambhavepi idāni tadabhāvatthāya suṭṭhu sodhitattā parisasampatti hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1821_16: evaṃ pañca vipattiyo sodhetvā pañca sampattiyo sampādetvā kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyato paṭhamakāle punappunaṃ bhaṇanatopi
tika-vin08t0:1821_17: aparabhāge bhaṇanaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1822_3: Evaṃ santepi purekatakammassa sampajjanabhāvena tiṭṭhante sati tāya ṭhitattā adaharo siyā.
tika-vin08t0:1822_4: Purimakammassa asampajjanabhāvena idāni katakammeyeva upasampadabhāvena tiṭṭhante sati kasmā daharo na bhaveyyāti?
tika-vin08t0:1822_6: Evaṃ daharo samāno purimasikkhāya vassaṃ gaṇetvā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanādīni sampaṭicchanto mahāsāvajjo bhaveyyāti?
tika-vin08t0:1822_7: Evaṃ purimasikkhāya aṭṭhitabhāvaṃ pacchimasikkhāya eva laddhupasampadabhāvaṃ tathato jānanto evaṃ karonto sāvajjo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1822_8: evaṃ pana ajānanto “purimasikkhāyameva ṭhito”ti maññitvā evaṃ karonto anavajjoti veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1822_10: “Anāpatti ūnavīsativassaṃ paripuṇṇasaññīti ettha kiñcāpi upasampādentassa anāpatti,
tika-vin08t0:1822_12: Sace pana so dasavassaccayena aññaṃ upasampādeti,
tika-vin08t0:1822_18: Ñatvā pana puna upasampajjitabba”nti samantapāsādikāyaṃ āgatattā viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1822_19: Evaṃ vatthuvipannattā kammakopato anupasampannassa puggalassa upajjhāyo bhavituṃ yuttakāle puna upasampajjanena
tika-vin08t0:1822_21: kammakopato pubbe anupasampannabhūtaṃ puggalampi aparabhāge vuḍḍhippattikālepi pañca vipattidosāni sodhetvā
tika-vin08t0:1822_23: Sopi puggalo pubbakammakāle anupasampanno hutvāpi aparakammakāle upasampanno hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1823_0: Ekacce pana bhikkhū porāṇasikkhaṃ paccakkhāya navasikkhameva gaṇhiṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:1823_1: te pana bhikkhū navasikkhāvasena daharāva bhavanti,
tika-vin08t0:1823_2: evaṃ karaṇañca ativiya guṇavisiṭṭhaṃ attano navakataraṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā tasmiṃ puggale payirupāsitukāmo
tika-vin08t0:1823_3: taṃ puggalaṃ attanā vuḍḍhataraṃ kātukāmo attānaṃ daharaṃ kātukāmo hutvā dhammagāravena karonto yutto bhaveyya.
tika-vin08t0:1823_4: Atha pana sikkhāsampannaṃ kattukāmo evaṃ kareyya,
tika-vin08t0:1823_10: Purimasikkhāya ṭhitāya sati vibbhamitukāmoyeva paccakkhānaṃ kareyya,
tika-vin08t0:1823_13: tasmā porāṇasikkhāya paccakkhānaṃ ayuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin08t0:1823_14: Tato porāṇasikkhaṃ paccakkhāya navasikkhāgahaṇato punappunaṃ karaṇaṃyeva yuttataraṃ dissati. Kasmā?
tika-vin08t0:1823_15: Porāṇasikkhaṃ paccakkhāya navasikkhāgahaṇe purimakammaṃ asampajjitvā pacchimakammasampajjane sati kiñcāpi purimasikkhā natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1824_5: evaṃ sati pubbe ṭhitaporāṇasikkhāpi paccakkhānena patitā.
tika-vin08t0:1824_6: Pacchimasikkhāpi pacchimakammassa pañcannaṃ vipattīnaṃ aññatarena yogato na sampajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1824_7: tasmā purimasikkhāya ca patitattā pacchimasikkhāya ca aladdhattā ubhato bhaṭṭhattā ayuttova hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1824_8: Porāṇasikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya navasikkhāgahaṇe pana sati purimakammaṃ sampannaṃ hutvā pacchimakammaṃ asampannaṃ hontampi purimasikkhāya patiṭṭhitoyeva,
tika-vin08t0:1824_9: purimaṃ asampannaṃ hutvā pacchimaṃ sampannampi pacchimasikkhāya ṭhito eva.
tika-vin08t0:1824_10: Purimapacchimakammadvayampi pañcahaṅgehi sampannampi daḷhikammathiratarabhūtāya purimasikkhāya ṭhitoyeva so bhikkhu hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1824_11: tasmā purimasikkhaṃ paccakkhāya navasikkhāgahaṇato purimasikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya punappunaṃ navasikkhāgahaṇaṃ yuttataraṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1825_0: Imaṃ pana punappunaṃ karontānaṃ ācariyānaṃ vādaṃ amanasikarontā aññe ācariyā anekappakāraṃ anicchitakathaṃ kathenti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1825_1: Ekacce therā evaṃ vadanti “kiṃ ime bhikkhū evaṃ karontā pārājikappattaṃ bhikkhuṃ puna sikkhāya patiṭṭhāpessāmāti maññantī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1825_2: Te therā punappunaṃ kammavācaṃ bhaṇante bhikkhū disvā “ime bhikkhū iminā kāraṇena evaṃ karontī”ti cintetvā evamāhaṃsu.
tika-vin08t0:1825_3: Ekacce pana therā “kasmā ime bhikkhū punappunaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1825_4: yathā nāma asani ekavārameva patantī satte jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpeti,
tika-vin08t0:1825_5: evameva bhagavato āṇābhūtā kammavācā ekavāraṃ bhaṇamānā kammaṃ sijjhāpeti,
tika-vin08t0:1825_8: Bahavo pana bhikkhū punappunaṃ karonte disvā evaṃ vadanti “ime bhikkhū ācariyupajjhāyehi dinnasikkhaṃ asaddahantā evaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1825_10: Te “pubbasikkhaṃ asaddahitvā punappunaṃ karontī”ti maññantā evamāhaṃsu.
tika-vin08t0:1826_0: Apare pana therā “paṭhamaṃ upasampadakammavācābhaṇanakāleyeva punappunaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1826_3: Aññe evamāhaṃsu “ñattidutiyakammavācāyameva punappunaṃ vattabbanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1826_5: atha ca panime bhikkhū ñatticatutthakammabhūtāya upasampadakammavācāya punappunaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1826_8: Neyyatthato pana iminā nayena catūsupi kammesu punappunaṃ kātabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1826_11: Teneva hi ñatticatutthakammavācāya upasampannaṭṭhāneyeva pubbe anupasampannassa puggalassa pacchā upasampajjitabbabhāvo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoti.
tika-vin08t0:1827_0: Paṭipucchākaraṇīyādīsupīti ettha ādisaddena paṭiṃññāya karaṇīyādayo saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:1827_1: Tattha paṭipucchāya karaṇīyaṃ appaṭipucchā karotīti pucchitvā codetvā sāretvā kātabbaṃ apucchitvā acodetvā asāretvā karoti.
tika-vin08t0:1827_2: Paṭiññāya karaṇīyaṃ appaṭiññāya karotīti paṭiññaṃ āropetvā yathādinnāya paṭiññāya kātabbaṃ apaṭiññāya
tika-vin08t0:1827_11: Ukkhepanīyakammārahassāti channabhikkhusadisassa āpattiṃ apassantassa āpattiṃ adesentassa ariṭṭhabhikkhusadisassa micchādiṭṭhiṃ avissajjentassa.
tika-vin08t0:1828_0: Anuposathe uposathaṃ karotīti anuposathadivase uposathaṃ karoti.
tika-vin08t0:1828_1: Uposathadivaso nāma ṭhapetvā kattikamāsaṃ avasesesu ekādasasu māsesu bhinnassa saṅghassa sāmaggidivaso ca yathāvuttā cātuddasapannarasā ca,
tika-vin08t0:1828_2: etaṃ tippakārampi uposathadivasaṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ divase uposathaṃ karonto anuposathe uposathaṃ karoti nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1828_3: Yatra hi pattacīvarādiatthāya appamattakena kāraṇena vivadantā uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapenti,
tika-vin08t0:1828_4: tattha tasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchite “samaggā jātamhā”ti antarā sāmaggīuposathaṃ kātuṃ na labhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1828_5: karontehi anuposathe uposatho kato nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1829_1: Pavāraṇadivaso nāma ekasmiṃ kattikamāse bhinnassa saṅghassa sāmaggidivaso ca paccukkaḍḍhitvā ṭhapitadivaso ca dve ca puṇṇamāsiyo,
tika-vin08t0:1829_2: etaṃ catubbidhaṃ pavāraṇadivasaṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ divase pavārento appavāraṇāya pavāreti nāma.
tika-vin08t0:1829_3: Idhāpi appamattakassa vivādassa vūpasame sāmaggīpavāraṇaṃ kātuṃ na labhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1829_4: Karontehi appavāraṇāya pavāraṇā katā hotīti ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāṭho.
tika-vin08t0:1830_0: “Ummattakassa bhikkhuno ummattakasammuti ummattakena yācitvā kate asammukhāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1830_2: Asammukhā kate pana dosābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘asammukhā kataṃ sukataṃ hotī’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1830_3: Dūtena upasampadā pana sammukhā kātuṃ na sakkā kammavācānānattasambhavato.
tika-vin08t0:1830_10: Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena saṅgho kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin08t0:1830_14: Satthusāsanaṃ nāma ñattisampadā ceva anussāvanasampadā ca.
tika-vin08t0:1830_18: Paccukkaḍḍhitvā ṭhapitadivaso cāti kāḷapakkhe cātuddasiṃ pannarasiṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1830_19: Dve puṇṇamāsiyoti paṭhamapacchimavassūpagatānaṃ vasena vutta”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1831_0: “Ṭhapitauposathapavāraṇānaṃ kattikamāse sāmaggiyā katāya sāmaggīpavāraṇaṃ muñcitvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti āha ‘ṭhapetvā kattikamāsa’nti.
tika-vin08t0:1831_1: Sace pana tesaṃ nānāsīmāsu mahāpavāraṇāya visuṃ pavāritānaṃ kattikamāsabbhantare sāmaggī hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1831_3: na pavāraṇā ekasmiṃ vasse katapavāraṇānaṃ puna pavāraṇāya avihitattā.
tika-vin08t0:1831_4: Sāmaggīdivaso hotīti anuposathadivase sāmaggīkaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1831_5: Sace pana cātuddasiyaṃ pannarasiyaṃ vā saṅgho sāmaggiṃ karoti,
tika-vin08t0:1831_9: Paccukkaḍḍhitvā ṭhapitadivaso cāti bhaṇḍanakārakehi upaddutā vā kenacideva karaṇīyena pavāraṇasaṅgahaṃ vā katvā ṭhapito kāḷapakkhacātuddasīdivaso ca.
tika-vin08t0:1831_10: Dve ca puṇṇamāsiyoti pubbakattikapuṇṇamā pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā cāti dve puṇṇamāsiyo.
tika-vin08t0:1831_11: Etaṃ catubbidhanti puṇṇamāsidvayena saddhiṃ sāmaggīpavāraṇaṃ cātuddasīpavāraṇañca sampiṇḍetvā,
tika-vin08t0:1831_13: Tathārūpapaccaye pana sati ubhinnaṃ puṇṇamāsīnaṃ purimā dve cātuddasiyo,
tika-vin08t0:1831_14: kāḷapakkhacātuddasiyā anantarā pannarasīpīti imepi tayo divasā pavāraṇādivasā evāti imaṃ sattavidhampi
tika-vin08t0:1831_15: pavāraṇādivasaṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ divase pavāretuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1832_0: Evaṃ vatthuvipattivinicchayaṃ dassetvā idāni ñattivipattivinicchayaṃ anussāvanavipattivinicchayañca dassento “ñattito vipattiyaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1832_1: Tattha pañcamañattivipattiyaṃ “pacchā vā ñattiṃ ṭhapetī”ti etassa saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ anussāvanakammaṃ katvāti
tika-vin08t0:1832_2: paṭhamaṃ anussāvanaṃ sāvetvā “esā ñattī”ti anussāvanānantarameva sakalaṃ ñattiṃ vatvā,
tika-vin08t0:1833_2: Dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedoti ettha dasadhā dasavidhena byañjanānaṃ pabhedoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1833_4: Yathādhippetatthabyañjanato byañjanasaṅkhātānaṃ akkharānaṃ janikā buddhi byañjanabuddhi,
tika-vin08t0:1834_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “ṭhānakaraṇāni sithilāni katvā uccāretabbamakkharaṃ sithilaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1834_1: tāniyeva dhanitāni asithilāni katvā uccāretabbamakkharaṃ dhanitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1834_4: Dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedoti evaṃ sithilādivasena byañjanabuddhiyā akkharuppādakacittassa dasappakārena pabhedo.
tika-vin08t0:1834_5: Sabbāni hi akkharāni cittasamuṭṭhānāni yathādhippetatthabyañjanato byañjanāni ca.
tika-vin08t0:1834_7: Na saṃyogaparo asaṃyogaparo ‘āyasmato buddharakkhitatherassa yassa na khamatī’ti ettha ta- kāra na-
tika-vin08t0:1835_0: Puna vimativinodaniyaṃ “tattha āyasmatotiādīsu sarānantaritāni sa- kāra ma-
tika-vin08t0:1835_2: Yo saṃyogo paro yassa a- kārādino,
tika-vin08t0:1835_6: Asaṃyogaparanti ‘yassa na khamatī’tiādīsu sa- kāra na-
tika-vin08t0:1835_9: kāraṃ akatvā ‘suṇātu me’tiādiṃ avatvā vaggantare sithilameva katvā ‘suṇāṭu me’tiādiṃ vadantopi duruttaṃ karotiyeva ṭhapetvā anurūpaṃ ādesaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1835_10: Yañhi ‘saccikatthaparamatthenā’ti vattabbe ‘saccikaṭṭhaparamaṭṭhenā’ti ca ‘atthakathā’ti ca vattabbe ‘aṭṭhakathā’ti ca tattha tattha vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:1835_11: tādisaṃ pāḷiaṭṭhakathādīsu diṭṭhapayogaṃ tadanurūpañca vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1835_15: vā ‘nakkhamatī’ti vattabbe ‘na khamatī’ti vā ‘upasampadāpekkho’ti vattabbe ‘upasampadāpekho’ti vā evaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1835_17: na pana ‘nāgo’ti vattabbe ‘nago’ti vā ‘saṅgho’ti vattabbe ‘sagho’ti vā ‘tisso’ti vattabbe ‘tiso’ti vā
tika-vin08t0:1835_19: Sambandhaṃ pana vavatthānañca sabbathāpi vaṭṭatīti gahetabba”nti āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1836_1: Sīmavipattivinicchayo pana heṭṭhā sīmakathāyaṃ sabbena kathito,
tika-vin08t0:1837_1: Anissāritāti uposathaṭṭhapanādinā vā laddhinānāsaṃvāsakabhāvena vā na bahikatā.
tika-vin08t0:1837_2: Aṭṭhakathāyañhi “apakatattassāti ukkhittakassa vā yassa vā uposathapavāraṇā ṭhapitā hontī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin08t0:1837_5: Parivāsādikammesu pana garukaṭṭhāpi apakatattā evāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1837_7: chandārahāva hontīti hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhite sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1837_8: avijahitvā ṭhitā pana chandārahā na honti,
tika-vin08t0:1837_9: tepi catuvaggādito adhikā hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvāva chandārahā honti,
tika-vin08t0:1837_10: tasmā saṅghato hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhiteneva chando vā pārisuddhi vā dātabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1838_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “anukkhittā pārājikaṃ anāpannā ca pakatattāti āha ‘pakatattā anukkhittā’tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1838_3: Na tesaṃ chando vā pārisuddhi vā etīti tīsu dvīsu vā nisinnesu ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā chandapārisuddhi āhaṭāpi anāhaṭāva hotīti adhippāyo”ti āgato.
tika-vin08t0:1838_4: Evaṃ pāḷiyañca aṭṭhakathāya ca catunnampi kammānaṃ sampatti ca vipatti ca āgatā,
tika-vin08t0:1838_6: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva cattāri kammāni kattabbāni,
tika-vin08t0:1847_0: Imasmiñhi kammavagge apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṭṭhānaṃ ekādasavipattisīmavimuttaṃ baddhasīmabhūtaṃyeva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1847_1: “ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjantī”ti vacanato na abaddhaupacārasīmabhūtaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1847_3: Aṭṭhakathāyampi “apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa
tika-vin08t0:1847_4: saṅghassa anumatiyā tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā kattabbaṃ kamma”nti apalokanakammassāpi baddhasīmāyameva kattabbabhāvo vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1847_6: Na hi tattha sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghasodhanañca chandārahānañca atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1847_8: tasmā “ñattikammabhūtaṃ uposathapavāraṇākammaṃ abaddhasīmavihārepi kattabba”nti gaṇhantānaṃ ācariyānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1847_9: vādopi “ñattidutiyakammabhūtaṃ kathinadānakammaṃ upacārasīmāyameva kattabba”nti gaṇhantānaṃ ācariyānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1847_10: vādopi pāḷivirodho aṭṭhakathāvirodho ca hotīti veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1847_13: atthikehi tattha suṭṭhu oloketvā saṃsayo vinodetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1848_0: Idāni sabbe bhikkhū lekhakārehi paricayavasena sabbaganthānaṃ ādimhi likhitaṃ mahānamakkārapāṭhaṃ saraṇagamanassa,
tika-vin08t0:1848_1: kammavācāya ca ārambhakāle mahatā ussāhena bhaṇanti,
tika-vin08t0:1848_5: tasmiṃ abhaṇitepi na saraṇagamanassa vā kammavācāya vā hāni atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1848_7: tasmā pakaraṇācariyā saraṇagamanārambhepi kammavācārambhepi tassa mahānamakkārapāṭhassa vaṇṇanaṃ na vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1848_8: vadanto pana “bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa” iti padānaṃ attho visuddhimaggasamantapāsādikāsāratthadīpanīādippakaraṇesu
tika-vin08t0:1848_9: “bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho” itipadānaṃ attho viya vitthārena vattabbo siyā,
tika-vin08t0:1848_10: evaṃ santepi bhagavato yathābhūtaguṇadīpanavasena pavattattā sabbepi ācariyā sabbesu ganthārambhesu tikkhattuṃ maṅgalatthaṃ bhaṇanti.
tika-vin08t0:1848_11: Bhaṇantehi ca pana na- kāra mo-
tika-vin08t0:1848_12: kārādīnaṃ ṭhānakaraṇādisampadaṃ ahāpentena sithiladhanitadīgharassādivisesaṃ manasi karontena samaṇasāruppena
tika-vin08t0:1851_2: byañjane aḍḍhamattaṃ sampiṇḍetvā diyaḍḍhamattakālaṃ pamāṇaṃ katvā uccārīyate. Mo-
tika-vin08t0:1851_5: kārādibyañjane aḍḍhamattaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aḍḍhateyyamattākālaṃ pamāṇaṃ katvā uccārīyate,
tika-vin08t0:1853_0: Plutā timattikā vuttā, sabbete nettha gayhare”ti. –
tika-vin08t0:1858_0: Idāni pana bhikkhū mahānamakkārabhaṇane balavaussāhaṃ katvā bhaṇantā rassaṭṭhānesu dvitimattākālaṃ dīghaṭṭhānesu
tika-vin08t0:1858_3: Apare paṭhamavāre bhaṇitvā “sammāsambuddhassā”ti pariyosānapadaṃ patvāpi tattha aṭṭhapetvā puna “namo tassā”ti bhaṇitvā sa-
tika-vin08t0:1858_4: kāre ṭhapetvā thokaṃ vissamitvā dutiyavāre “bhagavato”ti idaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva pariyosānaṃ bhaṇitvā ṭhapenti.
tika-vin08t0:1858_5: Tatiyavāre pana ādito paṭṭhāya pariyosāne ṭhapenti.
