tika-vin08t0:1858_9: Yathā ñatticatutthakamme kariyamāne tīṇi anussāvanāni saddato ca atthato ca abhinnāni aññamaññaṃ saṅkaravirahitāni katvā bhaṇitabbāni,
tika-vin08t0:1858_10: evaṃ mahānamakkārapāṭhe tikkhattuṃ bhaññamāne tayo vārā saddato ca atthato ca abhinne katvā saṅkaravirahite
tika-vin08t0:1858_11: katvā ādito ārabhitvā pariyosāne ṭhapetabbā hontīti.
tika-vin08t0:1859_1: yathā nāma javena gacchantassa ṭhātabbaṭṭhānaṃ patvāpi sahasā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin08t0:1859_3: evaṃ ādito bhaṇantassa balavaussāhattā pariyosāne pattepi ṭhapetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin08t0:1859_6: Tadā pana dutiyavāre thokaṃ vissamitattā laddhassāso hutvā sakkotīti.
tika-vin08t0:1859_7: Evaṃ te āyasmanto sayameva attānaṃ vighātaṃ pāpenti.
tika-vin08t0:1859_8: Na hi “mahānamakkāraṃ bhaṇantena paṭhamavāre balavaussāhena bhaṇitabbo”ti bhagavatā paññatto,
tika-vin08t0:1859_10: Evaṃ sante yathā pātimokkhuddesakena pātimokkhaṃ uddisantena yattakā bhikkhū pātimokkhaṃ suṇanti,
tika-vin08t0:1859_11: tesaṃ savanappamāṇena yāva pariyosānā uddisituṃ attano sarappamāṇaṃ gahetvā pātimokkho uddisitabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1859_12: evaṃ kammavācaṃ bhaṇantenapi sīmamaṇḍale nisinnabhikkhūnaṃ savanappamāṇena yāva pariyosānā attano sarappamāṇaṃ gahetvā bhaṇitabbāti.
tika-vin08t0:1860_2: kārantapadesu aññesaṃ padānaṃ atirekena sarena dvattikkhattuṃ anukaraṇasaddaṃ anubandhāpayamānā bhaṇanti,
tika-vin08t0:1860_3: tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ tādisaṃ bhaṇanaṃ sutvā paricayappattā aññe bhikkhū vā gahaṭṭhā vā aññesaṃ ācariyānaṃ kammavācaṃ na garuṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1860_4: tāya kammavācāya upasampadā alabhitabbā viya maññanti,
tika-vin08t0:1860_5: tādisaṃ pana bhaṇanaṃ tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ sissānusissā eva tathā bhaṇanti,
tika-vin08t0:1860_7: Te pana porāṇācariyānaṃ sarasampannānaṃ anukaraṇasaddarahitampi sahitaṃ viya khāyamānaṃ suṇantānaṃ atimanorathaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1860_8: saddaṃ sutvā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantā evaṃ karonti maññe.
tika-vin08t0:1860_9: Na hi vinaye vā saddasatthesu vā tathā bhaṇitabbanti atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1861_0: Bahū pana bhikkhū “sithilaṃ dhanitañca dīgharassa”ntiādinā vinaye kathitavinicchayañca “ettha pañcasu
tika-vin08t0:1861_1: vaggesū”tiādinā saddasatthesu katavinicchayañca ajānantā piṭakattayakovidānaṃ vinayadharabahussutattherānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1861_2: santikā aladdhopadesā hutvā tattha tattha upasampadaṃ karontānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vacanameva gahetvā heyyopādeyyaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1861_3: ajānantā pubbe paradesato āgatānaṃ puññavantānaṃ sarasampannānaṃ mahātherānaṃ anosarena bhaṇamānānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1861_4: saraṃ sutvā tesaṃ theravarānaṃ matiṃ apucchitvāva yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāsutaṃ likhitvā ṭhapentā anukkamena
tika-vin08t0:1861_5: paṇḍitehi hasitabbaṃ ayuttaṃ kathaṃ dīpentā “imasmiṃ ṭhāne byagghiyā saddasadisaṃ saddaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1861_6: imasmiṃ ṭhāne sakuṇiyā saddasadisaṃ saddaṃ karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1861_10: imasmiṃ ṭhāne vilāsaṃ kurumānā bhaṇantī”tiādīni vatvā tadeva saddahantā rukkhamūlaumaṅgaleṇādīsu nisīditvā
tika-vin08t0:1861_11: tameva vacanaṃ anusikkhantā tadanurūpaṃ kammavācaṃ bhaṇantā “ahaṃ kammavācākusalo”ti vatvā bālajane saññāpetvā
tika-vin08t0:1862_0: Athāparepi bhikkhū gāmakāvāsādīsu vasantā paṇḍitānaṃ santike apayirupāsamānā vatthusampattimpi vatthuvipattimpi
tika-vin08t0:1862_1: ñattianussāvanasīmaparisasampattimpi vipattimpi tathato ajānantā bahavo sisse ṭhapetvā pabbajjañca upasampadañca
tika-vin08t0:1862_4: tasmā bhagavato āṇaṃ karontehi lajjīpesalehi bahussutehi sikkhākāmehi sappurisabhikkhūhi evarūpānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1865_0: Imaṃ silokaṃ upanissāya saraṇagamanepi “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti pāṭhaṃ “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti paṭhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1865_1: Kammavācāyampi “paṭhamaṃ upajjhaṃ gāhāpetabbo”tiādipāṭhaṃ “paṭhamaṃ upajjhaṃ gāhāpetabbo”tiādinā paṭhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1866_12: Saṃyogakkharavasena na pubbakkharā sutiṃ labhantā saravisesaṃ pāpuṇanti,
tika-vin08t0:1866_14: kārena saddasatthakārācariyā “saṃyoge pare rassatta”nti ca “saṃyogapubbā e- kāro-
tika-vin08t0:1866_16: Evaṃ sante kathaṃ asamānaṭṭhānikena asamānakaraṇena asamānavaggena saṃyogakkharena laddhasutikā akkharā
tika-vin08t0:1866_17: tato aññena asamānaṭṭhānikena asamānakaraṇena asamānavaggena saṃyogakkharena laddhasamānasutikā bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1866_18: Na kevalañca ete akkharā asamānaṭṭhānikā asamānakaraṇā asamānavaggāva honti,
tika-vin08t0:1866_19: atha kho anāsannaṭṭhānikā anāsannakaraṇā anāsannavaggā ca honti.
tika-vin08t0:1866_20: Yathā ca vīṇaṃ vādentānaṃ dūre tantissarena tato dūre tantissaro asamāno hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1866_21: evaṃ dūraṭṭhānikena akkharena dūrakaraṇena tato dūraṭṭhāniko dūrakaraṇo samānasutiko kathaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1866_22: vaggakkharānañca aññamaññaṃ asaṅkaravasena asamānasutivasena pavattanato “vaggantaṃ vā vagge”ti sutte
tika-vin08t0:1866_23: niggahitassa vaggantakaraṇe sati aññavaggasmiṃ pare aññavaggantaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin08t0:1866_24: “vagge ghosāghosānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā”ti suttena ca asadisadvebhāvakaraṇe aññavagge aññavaggadvebhāvo na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1867_6: tathā pana alikhitvā payogānurūpaṃ paṭhamakkharassa sadisadvebhāvaṭṭhāne “kacco kaccāyano”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1867_16: kārena samānaṭṭhānikattā samānakaraṇattā ca vaggaavaggavasena bhinnepi avaggakkharānaṃ vaggakkharehi
tika-vin08t0:1867_17: sādhāraṇattā ca avaggakkharānaṃ vaggakkharānaṃ viya visuṃ sutiyā abhāvato ca sa-
tika-vin08t0:1867_20: kāropi hi dantajo, ta- kāropi, sa-
tika-vin08t0:1867_22: tasmā samānaṭṭhānikānaṃ samānakaraṇānaṃ akkharānaṃ samānasutibhāvo yutto. Ña-
tika-vin08t0:1871_3: Tattha kuto pabhavoti bhagavantasmā vā dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi vā aṭṭhakathācariyehi vā pabhavo.
tika-vin08t0:1871_4: Kattha āgatoti vinaye vā suttante vā abhidhamme vā pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāya vā ṭīkādīsu vā āgato.
tika-vin08t0:1871_5: Kena kāritoti nettiniruttipeṭakopadesakaccāyanappakaraṇakārakena āyasmatā mahākaccāyanattherena vā mukhamattadīpanikārakena
tika-vin08t0:1871_6: vajirabuddhācariyena vā padarūpasiddhikārakena buddhapiyācariyena vā saddanītippakaraṇakārakena aggavaṃsācariyena
tika-vin08t0:1871_7: vā tadaññasatthakārakehi mahātherehi vā kāritoti evaṃ āgamacintāyaṃ sati ayaṃ siloko bhagavantasmā pabhavo
tika-vin08t0:1871_8: dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi vā aṭṭhakathācariyehi vāti na paññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:1871_9: “Vinaye vā suttante vā abhidhamme vā pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāya vā ṭīkāsu vā āgato”ti hi na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1871_10: Kaccāyanācariyādīhi saddasatthakārakehi ācariyehi katotipi na dissati.
tika-vin08t0:1871_11: Evaṃ sante appāṭihīrakataṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin08t0:1872_4: teneva rāmaññadesiyā bhikkhū “sacca”iti imaṃ pāṭhaṃ vadantā “satca”iti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1872_8: kārantaṃ yathāpāṭhaṃ vattumasakkontehi tehi bhikkhūhi sakabhāsānurūpato ayaṃ siloko kārito bhavissatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1872_11: kārantapadānaṃ sutivisesavasena visuṃ paññāyanato marammadesiyā bhikkhū taṃ silokaṃ anuvattitvā “buddhaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1872_12: saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vā “paṭhamaṃ upatjhaṃ gāhāpetabbo”ti vā “hetupatcayo ārammaṇapatcayo”ti vā vattuṃ
tika-vin08t0:1872_23: kārantapadānaṃ visuṃ sutivasena yathāpāṭhameva kathetabbānīti no mati.
tika-vin08t0:1877_1: Evaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ sampattivipattiṃ dassetvā idāni tesaṃ kammānaṃ ṭhānappabhedaṃ dassento “apalokanakammaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1877_5: “Etarahi sacepi sāmaṇero”tiādīsu buddhādīnaṃ avaṇṇabhāsanampi akappiyādiṃ kappiyādibhāvena dīpanampi diṭṭhivipattiyaṃyeva pavisati,
tika-vin08t0:1877_12: Sassatucchedagāhassa sāmaṇerānaṃ liṅganāsanāya kāraṇattena heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyameva vuttattā idha ca daṇḍakammanāsanāya eva adhippetattā.
tika-vin08t0:1878_0: Tassāpi dātabboti vijjamānaṃ mukharādibhāvaṃ nissāya appaṭipucchitvāpi paṭiññaṃ aggahetvāpi āpattiṃ anāropetvāpi
tika-vin08t0:1878_5: dinnabrahmadaṇḍe pana tasmiṃ saddhiṃ tajjanīyakammādikatehi paṭikkhittampi kātuṃ na vaṭṭati “neva vattabbo”tiādinā ālāpasallāpamattassapi na-
tika-vin08t0:1878_7: Tañhi disvā bhikkhū gīvaṃ parivattetvā olokanamattampi na karonti,
tika-vin08t0:1878_8: evaṃ vivajjetabbaṃ nimmadanakaraṇatthameva tassa daṇḍassa anuññātattā.
tika-vin08t0:1878_9: Teneva channattheropi ukkhepanīyādikammakatopi abhāyitvā brahmadaṇḍe dinne “saṅghenāhaṃ sabbathā vivajjito”ti mucchito papati.
tika-vin08t0:1878_10: Yo pana brahmadaṇḍakatena saddhiṃ ñatvā saṃsaṭṭho avivajjetvā viharati,
tika-vin08t0:1878_15: evameva tato adhikampi saṅghaṃ ārādhentena sammā vattitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1879_0: Yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā avandiyakammaṃ anuññātanti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:1879_1: “Tassa bhikkhuno daṇḍakammaṃ kātu”nti sāmaññato anuññātappakāraṃ dassetvā puna visesato anuññātappakāraṃ
tika-vin08t0:1879_3: Imassa apalokanakammassa ṭhānaṃ hotīti apalokanakammasāmaññassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1879_4: Visesabyatirekena avijjamānampi tadaññattha appavattiṃ dassetuṃ visesanissitaṃ viya voharīyati.
tika-vin08t0:1879_5: “Kammaññeva lakkhaṇa”nti iminā osāraṇādivasena gahitāvasesānaṃ sabbesaṃ apalokanakammasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena
tika-vin08t0:1879_7: idañca vuttāvasesānaṃ kammānaṃ niṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanādīni viya vuttāvasesakhandhāyatanānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1879_10: evaṃ upari ñattikammādīsupi kammalakkhaṇaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1879_12: Osāraṇanissāraṇabhaṇḍukammādayo viya kammañca hutvā aññañca nāmaṃ na labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1879_13: kammameva hutvā upalakkhīyatīti kammalakkhaṇanti vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1879_14: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “imassa apalokanakammassa ṭhānaṃ hotīti evampi apalokanakammaṃ pavattatīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1879_16: Osāraṇanissāraṇabhaṇḍukammādayo viya kammañca hutvā aññañca nāmaṃ na labhati,
tika-vin08t0:1879_17: kammameva hutvā upalakkhīyatīti kammalakkhaṇaṃ upanissayo viya.
tika-vin08t0:1879_18: Hetupaccayādilakkhaṇavimutto hi sabbo paccayaviseso tattha saṅgayhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1879_22: Saṅghena kataṃ katikaṃ ñatvā maddanaṃ viya hi saṅghasammutiṃ anādarena atikkamantassa āpatti eva hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1880_1: Bhikkhusaṅghassapi panetaṃ labbhatiyevāti avandiyakammassa upalakkhaṇamattena gahitattā bhikkhusaṅghassapi kammalakkhaṇaṃ labbhati eva.
tika-vin08t0:1880_4: Etesupi hi ṭhānesu sabbo saṅgho uposathe viya sannipatito,
tika-vin08t0:1880_6: “mayametaṃ na jānimhā”ti pacchā khīyantāpi na honti,
tika-vin08t0:1880_8: Saṅghikapaccayañhi acchinnacīvarādīnaṃ dātuṃ apalokentehi upacārasīmaṭṭhānaṃ sabbesaṃ anumatiṃ gahetvāva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1880_9: Yo pana visabhāgapuggalo dhammikaṃ apalokanaṃ paṭibāhati,
tika-vin08t0:1880_10: taṃ upāyena bahiupacārasīmagataṃ vā katvā khaṇḍasīmaṃ vā pavisitvā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1880_15: Nāḷi vā upaḍḍhanāḷi vāti divase divase apaloketvā dātabbassa pamāṇadassanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1880_18: Ekadivasaṃyeva vātiādi dasavīsatidivasānaṃ ekasmiṃ divaseyeva dātabbaparicchedadassanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1880_19: Tena “yāvajīva”nti vā “yāvarogā vuṭṭhahatī”ti vā evaṃ apaloketuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1880_21: Tañca iṇāyikehi palibuddhassa lajjīpesalassa sāsanupakārakassa pamāṇayuttameva kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ niyametvā bhikkhūhi apaloketvā dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1880_22: na pana sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā mahāiṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1880_23: Tādisañhi bhikkhācariyavattena sabbehi bhikkhūhi tādisassa bhikkhuno pariyesitvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1881_0: “Chattaṃ vā vedikaṃ vāti ettha vedikāti cetiyassa upari caturassacayo vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:1881_1: Chattanti tato uddhaṃ valayāni dassetvā kato aggacayo vuccatī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1881_2: Cetiyassa upanikkhepatoti cetiyassa paṭijagganatthāya vaḍḍhiyā payojetvā kappiyakārakehi ṭhapitavatthuto.
tika-vin08t0:1881_3: Saṅghikenapīti na kevalañca tatruppādato paccayadāyakehi catupaccayatthāya saṅghassa dinnavatthunāpīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1881_4: Saṅghabhattaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti mahādānaṃ dadantehipi kariyamānaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ viya kāretuṃ na vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1881_5: “Yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ ruccatī”ti vuttattā attano attano paribhogapahonakaṃ appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1882_1: yasmiṃ kismiñci divasepi kataṃ sukatameva hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1882_3: yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti evaṃ katikā kātabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1882_4: Tathā dvīhi tīhipi “āyasmantānaṃ ruccatī”ti vacanameva hettha viseso.
tika-vin08t0:1882_6: Sā eva katikāti visuṃ katikā na kātabbāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1883_2: Purimavihāreti purime yathāsukhaṃ paribhogatthāya katakatike vihāre.
tika-vin08t0:1883_3: Pariveṇāni katvā jaggantīti yattha arakkhiyamāne phalāphalāni rukkhā ca vinassanti,
tika-vin08t0:1883_5: tattha saṅghassa katikā na pavattatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1883_6: Yehi pana rukkhabījāni ropetvā ādito paṭṭhāya paṭijaggitā,
tika-vin08t0:1884_3: Dīghā katikāti aparicchinnakālā yathāsukhaṃ paribhogatthāya katikā.
tika-vin08t0:1884_5: Khīyanamattameva tanti tena khīyanena bahuṃ khādantānaṃ doso natthi attano paribhogappamāṇasseva gahitattā,
tika-vin08t0:1884_6: khīyantepi attano pahonakaṃ gahetvā khāditabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1885_0: Gaṇhathāti na vattabbāti tathā vutte teneva bhikkhunā dinnaṃ viya maññeyyuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1885_4: dentena ca “ettakaṃ dātuṃ saṅgho anuññāsī”ti evaṃ attānaṃ parimocetvā yathā te saṅghe eva pasīdanti,
tika-vin08t0:1885_6: Apaccāsīsantenāti gilānagamikissarādīnaṃ anuññātapuggalānampi attano santakaṃ dentena apaccāsīsanteneva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1885_7: Ananuññātapuggalānaṃ pana apaccāsīsantenapi dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin08t0:1885_9: Attano santakampi paccayadāyakādayo sayameva vissāsena gaṇhanti,
tika-vin08t0:1885_12: Pubbe vuttamevāti “kuddho hi so rukkhepi chindeyyā”tiādinā tuṇhībhāve kāraṇaṃ pubbe vuttameva,
tika-vin08t0:1885_13: tehi kataanatthābhāvepi kāruññena tuṇhī bhavituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1886_1: na dātabbanti jīvarukkhānaṃ ārāmaṭṭhāniyattā dārūnañca gehasambhārānupagatattā “sabbaṃ tvameva gaṇhāti dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1886_2: Akatāvāsaṃ vā katvāti pubbe avijjamānaṃ senāsanaṃ katvā.
tika-vin08t0:1892_0: Evaṃ kammākammavinicchayakathaṃ kathetvā idāni pakiṇṇakavinicchayakathaṃ kathetuṃ “idāni pakiṇṇakakathā veditabbā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:1892_2: divāseyyāti kathā viya visuṃ visuṃ appavattitvā ekasmiṃyeva paricchede karaṇavasena pavattā gaṇabhojanakathādayo.
tika-vin08t0:1923_0: Piṭṭhaṃ kasāva paṇṇañca, phalañca jatu loṇakaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1935_7: Gaṇabhojane pācittiyaṃ hotīti ettha janakahetumhi bhummavacanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1935_9: Imassa sikkhāpadassa viññattiṃ katvā bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattattā viññattito gaṇabhojanaṃ vatthuvaseneva
tika-vin08t0:1935_11: nimantitā bhuñjantī”ti nimantanavasenevassa padabhājane gaṇabhojanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1935_12: Kiñci pana sikkhāpadaṃ vatthuanurūpampi siyāti “padabhājane vuttanayeneva gaṇabhojanaṃ hotī”ti kesañci
tika-vin08t0:1935_13: āsaṅkā bhaveyyāti tannivattanatthaṃ “gaṇabhojanaṃ dvīhi ākārehi pasavatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1935_14: Ekato gaṇhantīti ettha aññamaññassa dvādasahatthaṃ amuñcitvā ṭhitā ekato gaṇhanti nāmāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1935_15: “Amhākaṃ catunnampi bhattaṃ dehī’ti vā viññāpeyyu”nti vacanato,
tika-vin08t0:1935_17: tvaṃ dvinnanti evaṃ viññāpetvā”ti vacanato ca attano atthāya aññena viññattampi sādiyantassa gaṇabhojanaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1935_18: Evaṃ viññattito pasavatīti ettha viññattiyā sati gaṇantassa ekato hutvā gahaṇe iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti,
tika-vin08t0:1936_0: Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvāti ettha “bhojanaṃ gaṇhathāti vuttepi gaṇabhojanaṃ hotiyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1936_3: bhuñjathā’ti vutte yasmā kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhiṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:1936_4: tasmā ‘bhuñjathā’ti vuttepi gaṇabhojanaṃ hotiyevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1936_5: “Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā nimantetī”ti vuttattā pana “odanaṃ bhuñjathā”ti vā “bhattaṃ bhuñjathā”ti
tika-vin08t0:1936_6: vā bhojananāmaṃ gahetvāva vutte gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1936_8: bhuñjathā”ti etthāpi “odana”nti vā “bhatta”nti vā vatvāva te evaṃ nimantesunti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1936_9: Gaṇavasena vā nimantitattā te bhikkhū apakataññutāya kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhiṃsūti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin08t0:1936_11: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “yena kenaci vevacanenāti vuttattā ‘bhojanaṃ gaṇhathā’tiādisāmaññanāmenapi gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1936_12: Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ addhānagamanādivatthūsu ‘idheva bhuñjathā’ti vuttavacanassa kukkuccāyanaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1936_13: tampi odanādināmaṃ gahetvā vuttattā eva katanti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1937_4: Valetīti daṇḍake vā hatthe vā āvaṭṭeti.
tika-vin08t0:1937_6: purāṇacīvare sūcikammaṃ cīvarakammaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1937_7: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “āgantukapaṭṭanti acchinditvā anvādhiṃ āropetvā karaṇacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1937_8: Ṭhapetīti ekaṃ antaṃ cīvare bandhanavasena ṭhapeti.
tika-vin08t0:1937_9: Paccāgataṃ sibbatīti tasseva dutiyaantaṃ parivattitvā āhataṃ sibbati.
tika-vin08t0:1937_10: Āgantukapaṭṭaṃ bandhatīti cīvarena laggaṃ karonto punappunaṃ tattha tattha suttena bandhati.
tika-vin08t0:1937_13: Valetīti anekaguṇasuttaṃ hatthena vā cakkadaṇḍena vā vaṭṭeti ekattaṃ karoti.
tika-vin08t0:1937_15: Yasmiṃ suttaguḷaṃ pavesetvā veḷunāḷikādīsu ṭhapetvā paribbhamāpetvā suttakoṭito paṭṭhāya ākaḍḍhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1937_20: Parivattananti suttaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ suttaparivattanaṃ karoti,
tika-vin08t0:1938_4: “catutthe āgate na yāpentīti vacanato sace añño koci āgacchanto natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1938_5: cattāroyeva ca tattha nisinnā yāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-vin08t0:1938_9: Gaṇo bhijjatīti gaṇo āpattiṃ na āpajjatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1938_11: Gaṇo bhijjatīti nimantitasaṅgho na hotīti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1939_1: bhuñjantī”ti imāya pāḷiyā saṃsandanato “itaresaṃ pana gaṇapūrako hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1939_2: Avisesenāti “gilāno vā cīvarakārako vā”ti avisesetvā sabbasādhāraṇavacanena.
tika-vin08t0:1940_0: Adhivāsetvā gatesūti ettha akappiyanimantanādhivāsanakkhaṇe pubbapayoge dukkaṭampi natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1940_1: viññattito pasavane pana viññattikkhaṇe itarasikkhāpadehi dukkaṭaṃ hotīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1940_2: Bhutvā gatesūti ettha āgatesupi bhojanakicce niṭṭhite gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1940_3: Tāni ca tehi ekato na gahitānīti yehi bhojanehi visaṅketo natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1940_4: tāni bhojanāni tehi bhikkhūhi ekato na gahitāni ekena pacchā gahitattā.
tika-vin08t0:1940_7: Yānīti kummāsādīni tehi bhikkhūhi ekena pacchā gahitattā ekato na gahitāni.
tika-vin08t0:1940_9: mocetabbāti etena bhattuddesakena akappiyanimantane sādite sabbesampi sāditaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1940_10: ekato gaṇhantānaṃ gaṇabhojanāpatti ca hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1940_11: Dūtassa dvāre āgantvā puna “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vacanabhayena “gāmadvāre aṭṭhatvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1940_12: Tattha tattha gantvāti antaravīthiādīsu tattha tattha ṭhitānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā.
tika-vin08t0:1940_13: Bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya gharadvāre ṭhapetvā dīyamānepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t0:1940_14: Nivattathāti vutte pana nivattituṃ vaṭṭatīti “nivattathā”ti vicchinditvā pacchā “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttattā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1942_1: Paramparabhojanakathāyaṃ pana parassa parassa bhojanaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
tika-vin08t0:1942_3: Paramparabhojanaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ viya viññattito ca nimantanato ca na pasavatīti āha “paramparabhojanaṃ panā”tiādi. Pana-
tika-vin08t0:1942_5: Vikappanāvaseneva taṃ bhattaṃ asantaṃ nāma hotīti anupaññattivasena vikappanaṃ aṭṭhapetvā yathāpaññattasikkhāpadameva ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1942_6: Parivāre pana vikappanāyaṃ anujānanampi anupaññattisadisanti katvā “catasso anupaññattiyo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1942_7: mahāpaccariyādīsu vuttanayaṃ pacchā vadanto pāḷiyā saṃsandanato parammukhāvikappanameva patiṭṭhāpeti.
tika-vin08t0:1942_8: Keci pana “tadā attano santike ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ aññassa abhāvato thero sammukhāvikappanaṃ nākāsi,
tika-vin08t0:1942_9: bhagavatā ca visuṃ sammukhāvikappanā na vuttā,
tika-vin08t0:1942_11: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi “yo bhikkhu pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa ‘mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ
tika-vin08t0:1942_12: dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ sammukhā vā ‘itthannāmassa dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ parammukhā
tika-vin08t0:1942_13: vā paṭhamanimantanaṃ avikappetvā pacchā nimantitakule laddhabhikkhato ekasitthampi ajjhoharati,
tika-vin08t0:1943_0: Pañcahi bhojanehi nimantitassa yena yena paṭhamaṃ nimantito,
tika-vin08t0:1943_1: tassa tassa bhojanato uppaṭipāṭiyā avikappetvā vā parassa parassa bhojanaṃ paramparabhojananti āha “sace pana mūlanimantanaṃ heṭṭhā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1943_4: Hatthaṃ anto pavesetvā sabbaheṭṭhimaṃ gaṇhantassa majjhe ṭhitampi antohatthagataṃ hotīti āha “hatthaṃ pana…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1943_6: Khīrassa rasassa ca bhattena amissaṃ hutvā upari ṭhitattā “khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā pivato anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1944_1: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘āpattī’ti vacanena kurundiyaṃ ‘vaṭṭatī’ti vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin08t0:1944_2: Dvinnampi adhippāyo mahāpaccariyaṃ vibhāvito”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1945_1: “Paramparabhojanaṃ nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantito,
tika-vin08t0:1945_2: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati,
tika-vin08t0:1945_3: etaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttattā satipi bhikkhācariyāya paṭhamaṃ laddhabhāve “piṇḍāya caritvā laddhaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjati,
tika-vin08t0:1946_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vāti pañcabhojanāmissaṃ bhattato upari ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1946_12: yathādhammo kāretabbo’ti vacanato ca nimantetvā vā pavedetu animantetvā vā,
tika-vin08t0:1946_13: paṭhamagahitanimantitassa bhikkhuno paṭhamanimantanabhojanato aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci parasantakaṃ bhojanaṃ paramparabhojanāpattiṃ karoti.
tika-vin08t0:1946_16: nimantanato paṭhamaṃ nibaddhattā pana niccabhattādiparasantakampi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1948_1: Anāpucchākathāyaṃ “pakativacanenāti ettha yaṃ dvādasahatthabbhantare ṭhitena sotuṃ sakkā bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1948_3: Āpucchitabboti ‘ahaṃ itthannāmassa gharaṃ gacchāmī’ti vā ‘cārittakaṃ āpajjāmī’ti vā īdisena vacanena āpucchitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1948_9: samayassa vā āpadānaṃ vā abhāvoti imāni panettha pañca aṅgānī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1948_10: vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “pariyesitvā ārocanakiccaṃ natthīti vuttattā yo apariyesitabbo upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhāne dissati,
tika-vin08t0:1948_11: so sacepi pakativacanassa savanūpacāraṃ atikkamma ṭhito,
tika-vin08t0:1948_16: Anāpattivāre cettha antarārāmādīnaññeva vuttattā vihārato gāmavīthiṃ anuññātakāraṇaṃ vinā atikkamantassāpi āpatti hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1948_21: tathāpi aññassa gharūpacāraṃ anokkamitvā vīthimajjheneva gantvā icchiticchitagharadvārābhimukhe ṭhatvā manusse oloketvā gacchantassapi pācittiyameva.
tika-vin08t0:1948_22: Tattha keci ‘vīthiyaṃ atikkamantassa gharūpacāragaṇanāya āpattiyo’ti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1948_30: Vikālagāmappavesanepi “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro adinnādāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo”ti iminā dutiyaleḍḍupāto idha upacāroti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1948_34: vikāle gāmappavesananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin08t0:1951_1: Visabhāgasarīrattā accāsannena na bhavitabbanti āha “sīse vā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1951_2: Vaṭṭatīti visabhāgasarīrepi attanāva vuttavidhiṃ kātuṃ sāṭakañca gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1951_10: ‘Sīse vā’tiādi adhakkhake ubbhajāṇumaṇḍale padese cittavikārappattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1951_12: Matasarīrampi hi yena kenaci ākārena sañcicca phusantassa anāmāsadukkaṭamevāti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1951_14: Na hi apārājikavatthukepi cittādiitthirūpe bhavantaṃ dukkaṭaṃ pārājikavatthubhūte matitthisarīre nivattatī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ vutta.
tika-vin08t0:1952_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne ācariyena avuttāpi paṃsukūlakathā paṃsukūlasāmaññena veditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:1952_1: Sā hi cīvarakkhandhake evaṃ āgatā “tena kho pana samayena ye te bhikkhū gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyanti,
tika-vin08t0:1952_2: te kukkuccāyantā paṃsukūlaṃ na sādiyanti ‘ekaṃyeva bhagavatā cīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1952_12: na dveti te ‘kira itarītarena cīvarenā’ti etassa ‘gahapatikena vā paṃsukūlena vā’ti evaṃ atthaṃ sallakkhiṃsu.
tika-vin08t0:1952_13: Tattha pana itarītarenapīti appagghenapi mahagghenapi yena kenacīti attho”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1952_14: tasmā dhutaṅgaṃ asamādiyitvā vinayapaṃsukūlamattasādiyakena bhikkhunā gahapaticīvarampi sāditabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1952_15: paṃsukūladhutaṅgadharassa pana gahapaticīvaraṃ na vaṭṭati “gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipāmi,
tika-vin08t0:1953_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
tika-vin08t0:1953_3: Ye te bhikkhū susānaṃ okkamiṃsu paṃsukūlāya,
tika-vin08t0:1953_15: Tattha nāgamesunti yāva te susānato āgacchanti,
tika-vin08t0:1953_18: Nākāmā bhāgaṃ dātunti na anicchāya dātuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1954_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.

tika-vin08t0:1955_1: Ekacce bhikkhū paṭhamaṃ susānaṃ okkamiṃsu paṃsukūlāya,
tika-vin08t0:1955_3: Ye te bhikkhū paṭhamaṃ susānaṃ okkamiṃsu paṃsukūlāya,
tika-vin08t0:1956_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
tika-vin08t0:1957_5: Yadi pana manussā “idhāgatā eva gaṇhantū”ti denti,
tika-vin08t0:1957_11: Sadisā susānaṃ okkamiṃsūti sabbe samaṃ okkamiṃsu,
tika-vin08t0:1958_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu janapadesu addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
tika-vin08t0:1958_1: Te katikaṃ katvā susānaṃ okkamiṃsu paṃsukūlāya.
tika-vin08t0:1958_13: katikaṃ katvā okkantānaṃ akāmā bhāgaṃ dātunti.
tika-vin08t0:1958_14: Tattha te katikaṃ katvāti “laddhaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ sabbe bhājetvā gaṇhissāmā”ti bahimeva katikaṃ katvā.
tika-vin08t0:1958_15: Chaḍḍetvā gatāti kiñci avatvāyeva chaḍḍetvā gatā.
tika-vin08t0:1958_16: Etena “bhikkhū gaṇhantū”ti chaḍḍite eva akāmā bhāgadānaṃ vihitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1958_17: kevalaṃ chaḍḍite pana katikāya asati ekato bahūsu paviṭṭhesu yena gahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1958_18: tena akāmā bhāgo na dātabboti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1958_19: Samānā disā puratthimādibhedā etesanti sadisāti āha “ekadisāya vā okkamiṃsū”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1960_2: Sesaparikkhārānaṃ saddhivihārikehi gahitattā nivāsanapārupanameva avasiṭṭhanti āha “nivāsanapārupanamattaṃyeva haritvā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1960_3: Saddhivihārikānaṃ tāva āgamanassa vā anāgamanassa vā ajānanatāya vuttaṃ “therehi neva tāva…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1960_5: Paresampi atthāya labhantīti attano cīvaraṃ dadamānā sayaṃ sākhābhaṅgena paṭicchādentīti tesaṃ atthāyapi bhañjituṃ labhanti.
tika-vin08t0:1960_6: “Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabba”nti vacanato īdisesu bhūtagāmapātabyatāpi anuññātāyeva
tika-vin08t0:1960_8: Na tesaṃ dhāraṇe dukkaṭanti tesaṃ titthiyadhajānaṃ dhāraṇepi dukkaṭaṃ natthi.
tika-vin08t0:1961_0: Yāni ca nesaṃ vatthāni dentīti sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:1961_7: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti iminā antarāmagge paviṭṭhavihārato nikkhamitvā aññattha attano abhirucitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1961_8: iminā ca “yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ upagacchatī”ti vuttaṃ antarāmagge ṭhitavihārampi sace naggo hutvā gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:1961_10: Yadi evaṃ tattha kasmā na vuttanti ce?
tika-vin08t0:1961_15: cīvaraṃ viññāpetu”nti iminā sambandhena saṅghikampi cīvaraṃ nivāsetuṃ pārupituñca anujānanto “yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1961_17: tasmā tattha anokāsattā dukkaṭaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1962_5: ṭhapetabbanti ettha sesena gahetvā āgatattā ṭhapentena ca saṅghikaparibhogavaseneva ṭhapitattā aññasmiṃ
tika-vin08t0:1962_6: senāsane niyamitampi aññattha ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1963_0: Paribhogajiṇṇanti yathā tena cīvarena sarīraṃ paṭicchādetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin08t0:1963_4: Attano dhanena hi viññāpanaṃ nāma parivattanamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1963_5: Saṅghavasena pavāritānaṃ viññāpane vattaṃ dasseti “pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1963_6: Saṅghavasena hi pavārite sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇattā adhikaṃ viññāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1963_7: Yaṃ yaṃ pavāretīti yaṃ yaṃ cīvarādiṃ dassāmīti pavāreti.
tika-vin08t0:1963_8: Viññāpanakiccaṃ natthīti vinā viññattiyā dīyamānattā viññāpetvā kiṃ karissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1963_9: Aññassatthāyāti etthapi “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti idaṃ anuvattatiyevāti āha “attano ñātakapavārite”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1963_13: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin08t0:1964_0: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ dhammanimantanāti samaṇesu vattabbācāradhammamattavasena nimantanā,
tika-vin08t0:1965_0: “Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabba”nti iminā bhūtagāmavikopanaṃ anuññātanti āha “nevabhūtagāmapātabyatāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1965_1: Paṭhamaṃ suddhacittena liṅgaṃ gahetvā pacchā laddhiṃ gaṇhantopi titthiyapakkantako evāti āha “nivāsetvāpi laddhi na gahetabbā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1966_0: Yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ upagacchatīti etthapi vihāracīvarādiatthāya pavisantenapi tiṇādīhi paṭicchādetvāva gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1966_1: “na tveva naggena āgantabba”nti sāmaññato dukkaṭassa vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:1966_4: Paribhogajiṇṇanti yathā taṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjiyamānaṃ obhaggavibhaggatāya asāruppaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:1967_0: Aññassatthāyāti etthapi “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti idaṃ anuvattatevāti āha “attano ñātakapavārite”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:1967_1: Idha pana aññassa acchinnanaṭṭhacīvarassa atthāya aññātakaappavārite viññāpentassa nissaggiyena anāpattīti attho gahetabbo,
tika-vin08t0:1967_2: itarathā “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti iminā viseso na bhaveyya,
tika-vin08t0:1967_5: taṃ pāḷiyā na sametī”ti ca “yasmā panidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃyeva paññattaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1967_10: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin08t0:1968_0: “Tañce aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā bahūhi cīvarehi abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya,
tika-vin08t0:1968_1: santaruttaraparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1968_3: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti imasmiṃ taduttarisikkhāpade abhihaṭṭhunti ettha abhīti upasaggo,
tika-vin08t0:1968_7: icchaṃ ruciṃ uppādeyya vadeyya nimanteyyāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1968_11: Atha vā yathā “nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato”ti ettha disvāti attho,
tika-vin08t0:1968_12: evamidhapi abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyyāti abhiharitvā pavāreyyāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1968_14: Kāyena vā hi vatthādīni abhiharitvā pādamūle ṭhapetvā “yattakaṃ icchasi,
tika-vin08t0:1969_0: Santaruttaraparamanti saantaraṃ uttaraṃ paramaṃ assa cīvarassāti santaruttaraparamaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1969_1: nivāsanena saddhiṃ pārupanaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo assāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1969_2: Tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbanti tato abhihaṭacīvarato ettakaṃ cīvaraṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1969_4: Yasmā pana acchinnasabbacīvarena tecīvarikeneva bhikkhunā evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1969_6: tasmā taṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “sace tīṇi naṭṭhāni hontī”tiādinā nayenassa padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1970_3: ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā aññaṃ sabhāgaṭṭhānato pariyesissati.
tika-vin08t0:1970_16: Bhikkhuniyā pana pañcasupi naṭṭhesu dve sāditabbāni,
tika-vin08t0:1970_19: ko pana vādo dvīsu vā ekasmiṃ vā.
tika-vin08t0:1970_21: tato uttari na labbhatīti idamettha lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1971_0: Sesakaṃ āharissāmīti dve cīvarāni katvā sesaṃ puna āharissāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1971_8: Yasmā panidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃyeva paññattaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1972_5: Daṭṭhu khematoti ettha gāthābandhavasena anunāsikalopo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1972_9: Acchinnasabbacīvarenāti acchinnāni sabbāni tīṇi cīvarāni assāti acchinnasabbacīvaro,
tika-vin08t0:1972_11: Yassa hi acchindanasamaye tīṇi cīvarāni sannihitāni honti,
tika-vin08t0:1972_14: Tecīvarikenāti hi acchindanasamaye ticīvarassa sannihitabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1972_17: Evaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti “santaruttaraparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabba”nti vuttavidhinā paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1972_19: Yassa tīsu cīvaresu ekaṃ vā dve vā cīvarāni acchinnāni honti,
tika-vin08t0:1972_22: Yassa hi tīsu dve cīvarāni acchinnāni honti,
tika-vin08t0:1972_24: ekasmiṃ acchinne na sāditabbanti na tassa santaruttaraparamasādiyanaṃ sambhavati.
tika-vin08t0:1973_0: Keci pana “tecīvarikenāti vuttattā ticīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷavasena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjato tasmiṃ naṭṭhe bahūnipi gahetuṃ labhatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1973_2: Padabhājanassa hi adhippāyaṃ dassentena yasmā pana “acchinnasabbacīvarena…pe…
tika-vin08t0:1973_4: padabhājane ca na tādiso attho upalabbhati,
tika-vin08t0:1973_6: Yampi mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “yassa adhiṭṭhitaticīvarassa tīṇi naṭṭhānī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1973_8: na pana ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitacīvarassevāti evamattho gahetabbo pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca tathā atthassāsambhavato.
tika-vin08t0:1973_9: Na hi ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitacīvarasseva idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1973_10: Purimasikkhāpadena hi acchinnacīvarassa aññātakaviññattiyā anuññātattā pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā viññāpanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin08t0:1973_11: pamāṇato sādiyanaṃ anujānantena bhagavatā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1973_12: tasmā parikkhāracoḷikassa bahumpi sādituṃ vaṭṭatīti ayamattho neva pāḷiyā sameti,
tika-vin08t0:1974_1: tena dve sāditabbānīti ettha yassa ticīvarato adhikampi cīvaraṃ aññattha ṭhitaṃ atthi,
tika-vin08t0:1974_2: tadā tassa cīvarassa alabbhanīyabhāvato tenapi sādituṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1974_3: Pakatiyāva santaruttarena caratīti sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavasena vā avippavāsasammutivasena vā tatiyassa alābhena vā carati.
tika-vin08t0:1974_5: Ekaṃ sādiyanteneva samo bhavissatīti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ dvīsu naṭṭhesu ekaṃ sādiyantena samo bhavissati ubhinnampi santaruttaraparamatāya avaṭṭhānato.
tika-vin08t0:1974_6: Yassa ekaṃyeva hotīti aññena kenaci kāraṇena vinaṭṭhasesacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1975_1: sesakaṃ āharissāmā”ti vatvā gahetvā gamanasamayepi “sesakampi tumhākaṃyeva hotū”ti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1975_4: Pāḷiyā na sametīti santaruttaraparamato uttari sādiyane anāpattidassanatthaṃ “anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti vuttattā na sameti.
tika-vin08t0:1975_6: sati ca sikkhāpadena āpattippasaṅge anāpatti yuttā dassetunti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:1975_7: Keci pana “pamāṇameva vaṭṭatīti idaṃ sallekhadassanatthaṃ vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:1976_2: “aññassatthāyā”ti vuccamāne aññesaṃ atthāya pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvāpi gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti āpajjati,
tika-vin08t0:1976_3: tañca aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattattā vatthunā saṃsandiyamānaṃ na sameti.
tika-vin08t0:1976_4: Na hi yaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1976_6: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi “imassa sikkhāpadassa attano sādiyanapaṭibaddhatāvasena pavattattā ‘aññassatthāyā’ti vattuṃ okāsoyeva natthi,
tika-vin08t0:1976_8: Idha “aññassatthāyā”ti avuttattā aññesaṃ atthāya ñātakapavāritesu adhikaṃ viññāpentassa āpattīti ce? Na,
tika-vin08t0:1976_13: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin08t0:1977_1: Tañhi vāṇijakehi dussāni paggahetvā dassanaṭṭhānatāya ‘paggāhikasālā’ti vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:1977_3: Tecīvarikenāti iminā acchinnaticīvarato aññassa vihārādīsu nihitassa cīvarassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:1977_7: Tāvakālikampi alabhantassa bhūtagāmavikopanaṃ katvā tiṇapaṇṇehi chadanaṃ viya viññāpanampi vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t0:1977_10: Pāḷiyā na sametīti ‘anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna’nti imāya pāḷiyā na sameti tatuttari viññāpanaāpattippasaṅge eva vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:1977_11: Aññassatthāyāti na vuttanti idaṃ aññassatthāya tatuttari viññāpane nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ hotīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:1977_18: Tasmā aññassatthāya viññāpentassapi nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ na dissati.
tika-vin08t0:1977_19: Pāḷiyaṃ pana imassa sikkhāpadassa attano sādiyanapaṭibaddhatāvasena pavattattā ‘aññassatthāyā’ti anāpattivāre na vuttanti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:1977_25: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgānī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1978_0: Idaṃ tatuttarisikkhāpadavinicchayaṃ ācariyena avuttampi acchinnacīvarādhikāreyeva pavattattā amhehi gahitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1978_1: aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadassa samayesu acchinnacīvarakāle aññātakānaṃ viññāpetabbabhāvo bhagavatā vutto,
tika-vin08t0:1978_2: tehi dinnacīvarassa mattaso gahitabhāvo tatuttarisikkhāpadena vutto.
tika-vin08t0:1980_1: tattha yampi tyāhanti yampi te ahaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1980_2: So kira “mama pattacīvaraupāhanapaccattharaṇāni vahanto mayā saddhiṃ cārikaṃ pakkamissatī”ti adāsi.
tika-vin08t0:1981_1: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti ekaṃ cīvaraṃ ekābaddhāni ca bahūni acchindato ekā āpatti,
tika-vin08t0:1981_2: ekato abaddhāni visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitāni bahūni acchindato,
tika-vin08t0:1981_4: uttarāsaṅgaṃ āharā”ti evaṃ āharāpayato ca vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo.
tika-vin08t0:1981_5: “Mayā dinnāni sabbāni āharā”ti vadatopi ekavacaneneva sambahulā āpattiyo.
tika-vin08t0:1982_6: uttarāsaṅgaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadato vācāya vācāya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1982_7: “Mayā dinnāni sabbāni gaṇhā”ti vadato ekavācāya sambahulā āpattiyo.
tika-vin08t0:1983_0: Aññaṃ parikkhāranti vikappanupagapacchimaṃ cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ kiñci antamaso sūcimpi.
tika-vin08t0:1983_3: Gāḷhaṃ katvā baddhāsu pana ekameva dukkaṭanti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1983_5: Thavikāya pakkhipitvā sithilabaddhagāḷhabaddhesu tikaṭukādīsu bhesajjesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin08t0:1984_1: tumhākaṃyeva idaṃ sāruppa”nti evaṃ vā deti.
tika-vin08t0:1984_12: Disāpakkantaṃ vā pana daharaṃ “nivattetha na”nti bhaṇati,
tika-vin08t0:1984_14: “Cīvaraṃ gahetvā rundhathā”ti evaṃ ce nivattati, sādhu.
tika-vin08t0:1984_18: Vibbhantaṃ vā disvā “mayaṃ tuyhaṃ ‘vattaṃ karissatī’ti pattacīvaraṃ adamhā,
tika-vin08t0:1984_29: vibbhamantassa na demī”ti evaṃ pana dātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:1984_32: Cajitvā dinnaṃ acchinditvā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1985_2: “mayā saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ pakkamissatīti yaṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāya ahaṃ te, āvuso,
tika-vin08t0:1985_4: taṃ na karosī”ti kupito anattamano acchindīti.
tika-vin08t0:1985_6: Tattha “mayā saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ pakkamissatīti yampi te ahaṃ cīvaraṃ adāsiṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1985_7: taṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti kupito anattamano acchindīti sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1986_1: ekaṃ pācittiyanti “cīvaraṃ gaṇhā”ti āṇattiyā ekacīvaravisayattā ekameva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1986_2: Vācāya vācāya dukkaṭanti ettha acchinnesu vatthugaṇanāya pācittiyāni.
tika-vin08t0:1986_3: Ekavācāya sambahulā āpattiyoti idaṃ acchinnesu vatthugaṇanāya āpajjitabbaṃ pācittiyāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1987_1: Eseva nayoti sithilaṃ gāḷhañca pakkhittāsu āpattiyā bahuttaṃ ekattañca atidisati.
tika-vin08t0:1988_0: Āvuso mayantiādīsu gaṇhitukāmatāya evaṃ vuttepi teneva dinnattā anāpatti.
tika-vin08t0:1988_1: Amhākaṃ santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhissatīti idaṃ sāmaṇerassapi dānaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin08t0:1988_2: tasmā kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ “bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1988_3: tathāpi anupasampannakāle datvāpi upasampannakāle acchindantassa pācittiyamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1988_5: Detīti tuṭṭho vā kupito vā deti.
tika-vin08t0:1988_7: Evaṃ pana dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha evaṃ dinnaṃ na tāva “tassa santaka”nti anadhiṭṭhahitvāva paribhuñjitabbanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1988_8: Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatīti evaṃ dinnaṃ bhatisadisattā āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1988_9: Cajitvā dinnanti vuttanayena adatvā anapekkhena hutvā tasseva dinnaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1988_10: Bhaṇḍagghena kāretabboti sakasaññāya vinā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā āpattiyā kāretabbo.
tika-vin08t0:1988_15: kodhavasena acchindanaṃ vā acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin08t0:1989_1: acchindīti ettha yaṃ te ahaṃ cīvaraṃ adāsiṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1989_3: na aññathāti kupito acchindīti evaṃ ajjhāharitvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1989_4: Ekaṃ dukkaṭanti yadi āṇatto avassaṃ acchindati,
tika-vin08t0:1989_8: Ekavācāya sambahulāpattiyoti yadi āṇatto anantarāyena acchindati,
tika-vin08t0:1989_9: āṇattikkhaṇeyeva vatthugaṇanāya pācittiyāpattiyo payogakaraṇakkhaṇeyeva āpattiyā āpajjitabbato,
tika-vin08t0:1989_15: tena ca sāmaṇerakāle datvā upasampannakāle acchindatopi pācittiyaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:1989_16: “Bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā”ti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1989_17: Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatīti kamme akate bhatisadisattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1989_22: kodhavasena acchindanaṃ vā acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1991_1: Paṭibhānacittakathāyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva suviññeyyanti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ na kiñci vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:1991_2: vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “karohīti vattuṃ na vaṭṭatīti āṇattiyā eva paṭikkhittattā dvārapālaṃ ‘kiṃ na karosī’tiādinā pariyāyena vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:1991_3: Jātakapakaraṇanti jātakapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ itthipurisādi yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1991_4: ‘Parehi kārāpetu’nti vuttattā buddharūpampi sayaṃ kātuṃ na labhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1993_1: Vippakatabhojanakathāyampi sāratthadīpanī vimativinodanī vajirabuddhiṭīkāsu na kiñci vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:1993_7: Rittahatthampi uṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha kāraṇamāha “vippakatabhojanoyeva hi so hotī”ti,
tika-vin08t0:1993_8: yāgukhajjakādīsupi pītesu khāditesupi bhattassa abhuttattā aniṭṭhitabhojanakicco hoti.
tika-vin08t0:1993_10: tena vattabboti pavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena bhuñjituṃ alabhamānattā attano santike udake asante vattabboti attho.
tika-vin08t0:1997_8: Tenāha vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “tivassantarenāti tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ anto ṭhitenā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1997_10: Ime sabbeti sabbe tividhā ime samānāsanikā.

tika-vin08t0:1999_3: Tenāha sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “dīghāsanaṃ nāma mañcapīṭhavinimuttaṃ yaṃ kiñci tiṇṇannaṃ ekato sukhaṃ nisīdituṃ pahotī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:1999_5: nanu dvinnaṃ pahonakāsanampi dīghamevāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “anujānāmi…pe…

tika-vin08t0:1999_9: Yadi evaṃ paṇḍakādīhipi saha nisīdituṃ vaṭṭeyyāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t0:2001_4: Samānācariyakoti ettha “sacepi ekassa ācariyassa eko antevāsiko hoti,

tika-vin08t0:2001_10: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “bhūmiyaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ akāsīti gilānena nipannabhūmiyaṃ kiliṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ dhovitvā haritūpalittaṃ kāresīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2001_11: Bhesajjaṃ yojetuṃ asamatthoti parehi vuttavidhimpi kātuṃ asamattho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2003_1: Maraṇavaṇṇakathāyaṃ maraṇatthikāva hutvāti imassa kāyassa bhedena saggapāpanādhippāyattā atthato maraṇatthikāva hutvā.
tika-vin08t0:2003_2: Maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ ajānantāti “evaṃ adhippāyino maraṇatthikā nāma hontī”ti attano maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ ajānantā.
tika-vin08t0:2003_3: Na hi te attano cittappavattiṃ na jānanti.
tika-vin08t0:2003_5: maraṇādhippāyassa sanniṭṭhāpakacetanākkhaṇe karuṇāya abhāvato kāruññena pāse baddhasūkaramocanaṃ viya na hotīti adhippāyo.

tika-vin08t0:2004_1: kāruññena pāse baddhasūkaramocanaṃ viya na hotīti adhippāyo.

tika-vin08t0:2004_4: “Evaṃadhippāyino maraṇatthikā nāma hontī”ti attano maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ ajānantā āpannā pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2004_5: Na hi te attano cittappavattiṃ na jānantīti vuccanti.
tika-vin08t0:2006_4: Upacchindatīti visesādhigamassa vikkhepo mā hotūti āhāraṃ upacchindati.
tika-vin08t0:2006_8: na vaṭṭatīti yasmā sabhāgānaṃ lajjībhikkhūnaṃyeva ariyā attanā adhigatavisesaṃ tādise kāraṇe sati ārocenti,
tika-vin08t0:2006_9: te ca bhikkhū appatirūpāya anesanāya paccayaṃ na pariyesanti,
tika-vin08t0:2006_10: tasmā tehi pariyesitapaccaye kukkuccaṃ uppādetvā āhāraṃ upacchindituṃ na vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2006_14: na vaṭṭatī’ti imassa kāraṇaṃ dassentena vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2006_15: Atha vā visesādhigamaṃ byākaritvāti idaṃ visesassa adhigatabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2006_16: adhigamantarāyaṃ āsaṅkanteneva ca āhārupacchedo kātabboti anuññātattā adhigatena na kātabboti dassetuṃ
tika-vin08t0:2006_19: Kiṃ pana ariyā attanā adhigatavisesaṃ aññesaṃ ārocentīti imissā codanāya “sabhāgānañhi lajjībhikkhūnaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2007_5: Adhigatavisesā hi diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanatthaṃ lajjībhikkhūnaṃ avassaṃ adhigamaṃ byākaronti,
tika-vin08t0:2007_6: adhigatavisesena pana abyākaritvāpi āhāraṃ upacchindituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2007_7: adhigamantarāyavinodanatthameva āhārupacchedassa anuññātattā tadadhigame so na kātabbova.
tika-vin08t0:2007_8: Kiṃ panādhigamaṃ ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha sabhāgānañhītiādī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2007_11: visesādhigamaṃ byākaritvā tappabhavaṃ sakkāraṃ lajjāyanto āhāraṃ upacchindati sabhāgānaṃ byākatattā.
tika-vin08t0:2009_2: Uddhaṃ vā adho vā saṅkamantīti pacchā āgatānaṃ okāsadānatthaṃ nisinnapāḷiyā uddhaṃ vā adho vā gacchanti.
tika-vin08t0:2009_3: Paṭivekkhaṇakiccaṃ natthīti pacchā āgatehi upaparikkhaṇakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin08t0:2009_4: Heṭṭhā kismiñci vijjamāne sāṭakaṃ valiṃ gaṇhātīti āha “yasmiṃ vali na paññāyatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2009_6: Vimativinodaniyampi “heṭṭhā kismiñci vijjamāne sāṭakaṃ valiṃ gaṇhātīti āha ‘yasmiṃ vali na paññāyatī’ti.
tika-vin08t0:2009_7: Paṭivekkhaṇañcetaṃ gihīnaṃ santake evāti daṭṭhabba”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2009_9: Heṭṭhimabhāge hi kismiñci vijjamāne vali paññāyatī”ti ettakameva.
tika-vin08t0:2011_3: dhātu pavaṭṭanatthoti āha “hasādhippāyena pāsāṇo na pavaṭṭetabbo”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2011_4: Silāsaddassa pāsāṇavācakattā so eva na paṭivijjhitabboti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “na kevalañcā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:2011_5: Yadi evaṃ sabbesampi atthāya na vaṭṭeyyāti āha “cetiyādīnaṃ atthāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:2011_7: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “bhaṇḍakaṃ vā dhovantāti cīvaraṃ vā dhovantā.
tika-vin08t0:2013_2: pācittiyanti sukkhaṭṭhānepi aggiṃ pātetvā iminā adhippāyena ālimpentassa pācittiyameva.
tika-vin08t0:2013_3: Dukkaṭanti sukkhaṭṭhāne vā sukkhaṃ “asukkha”nti avavatthapetvā vā aggiṃ pātentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2013_8: Sayaṃ vā uṭṭhitanti vāteritānaṃ veḷuādīnaṃ aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanena samuṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2013_10: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “khiḍḍādhippāyenapi dukkaṭanti sukkhatiṇādīsu aggikaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2013_15: Taṃ dentena dūratova āgacchantaṃ dāvaggiṃ disvā vihārassa samantato ekakkhaṇe akatvā ekadesato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin08t0:2013_16: vihārassa samantato saṇikaṃ jhāpetvā yathā mahantopi aggi vihāraṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin08t0:2013_17: evaṃ vihārassa samantā abbhokāsaṃ katvā paṭaggi dātabbo.

tika-vin08t0:2017_1: Gopakadānakathāyaṃ paresaṃ santakaṃ gopeti rakkhatīti gopako,
tika-vin08t0:2017_4: Tattha paṇṇaṃ āropetvāti “ettakeheva rukkhehi ettakameva gahetabba”nti paṇṇaṃ āropetvā,
tika-vin08t0:2017_10: Sabbatthapi gihīnaṃ gopakadāne yattakaṃ gopakā denti,
tika-vin08t0:2017_12: Saṅghike pana yathāparicchedameva gahetabbanti dīpitattā “atthato eka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2017_13: Vimativinodaniyampi “paṇṇaṃ āropetvāti ‘ettake rukkhe rakkhitvā tato ettakaṃ gahetabba’nti paṇṇaṃ āropetvā.
tika-vin08t0:2017_15: Dārakāti tesaṃ puttanattādayo ye keci gopenti,
tika-vin08t0:2017_18: Adhippāyaṃ ñatvāti ettha yassa dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhantaṃ bhikkhuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2017_19: bhāgaṃ vā sāmikā na rakkhanti na daṇḍenti,
tika-vin08t0:2017_20: tassa dānaṃ appaṭicchādetvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti idha sanniṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2018_3: Bhājetvā khādantīti āgantukānampi sampattānaṃ bhājetvā khādantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:2018_4: Catūsu paccayesu sammā upanentīti ambaphalādīni vikkiṇitvā cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu sammā upanenti.
tika-vin08t0:2018_5: Cīvaratthāya niyametvā dinnāti “imesaṃ rukkhānaṃ phalāni vikkiṇitvā cīvaresuyeva upanetabbāni,
tika-vin08t0:2018_6: na bhājetvā khāditabbānī”ti evaṃ niyametvā dinnā.
tika-vin08t0:2018_7: Tesupi āgantukā anissarāti paccayaparibhogatthāya niyametvā dinnattā bhājetvā khādituṃ anissarā.
tika-vin08t0:2018_9: ṭhātabbanti ettha āgantukehi heṭṭhā vuttanayena bhājetvā khāditabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:2018_10: Tesaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbanti “bhājetvā na khāditabba”nti vā “ettakesu rukkhesu phalāni gaṇhissāmā”ti vā
tika-vin08t0:2018_11: “ettakāni phalāni gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “ettakānaṃ divasānaṃ abbhantare gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “na kiñci gaṇhissāmā”ti
tika-vin08t0:2018_12: vā evaṃ katāya āvāsikānaṃ katikāya āgantukehi ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2018_13: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anissarā”ti vacanena dīpitoyeva attho mahāpaccariyaṃ “catunnaṃ paccayāna”ntiādinā vitthāretvā dassito.
tika-vin08t0:2019_5: Mūlavatthucchedaṃ pana katvā na upanetabbanti iminā kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti?
tika-vin08t0:2019_6: Tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu tāva idaṃ vuttaṃ “sabbāni senāsanāni na vissajjetabbānīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2019_7: Lāmakakoṭiyā vissajjantehipi senāsanabhūmiyo na vissajjetabbāti ayamattho vutto hotīti no khanti.
tika-vin08t0:2020_1: buddhasantakena vā dhammapūjaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati na vaṭṭatīti?
tika-vin08t0:2020_3: adhivacanaṃ dhammakāyo itipī”ti ca “yo kho, vakkali,
tika-vin08t0:2020_5: so maṃ passatī”ti ca vacanato vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:2020_9: so gilānaṃ upaṭṭhaheyyā’ti vacanato buddhasantakena gilānassapi bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ yuttanti āpajjeyya,
tika-vin08t0:2020_15: so gilānaṃ upaṭṭhaheyyā”ti iminā attano ca gilānassa ca ekasadisatā,
tika-vin08t0:2020_21: Bhagavato ca gilānassa ca upaṭṭhānaṃ ekasadisanti evaṃ panettha attho na gahetabbo,
tika-vin08t0:2020_23: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
tika-vin08t0:2020_24: so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti vacanato “ahañca kho panidāni ekakova ovadāmi anusāsāmi,
tika-vin08t0:2020_25: mayi parinibbute imāni caturāsīti buddhasahassāni tumhe ovadissanti anusāsissantī”ti vuttattā ca bahussutaṃ bhikkhuṃ pasaṃsantena ca “yo bahussuto,
tika-vin08t0:2020_27: buddho nāma esa cundā”ti vuttattā dhammagarukattā ca tathāgatassa pubbanayo eva pasatthataroti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin08t0:2020_30: Tesupi āgantukā anissarāti senāsane nirantaraṃ vasantānaṃ cīvaratthāya dāyakehi,
tika-vin08t0:2020_31: bhikkhūhi vā niyametvā dinnattā bhājetvā khādituṃ anissarā.
tika-vin08t0:2020_32: Āgantukehipi icchantehi tasmiṃ vihāre vassānādīsu pavisitvā cīvaratthāya gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2020_33: Tesaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbanti sabbāni phalāphalāni abhājetvā ‘ettakesu rukkhesu phalāni bhājetvā paribhuñjissāma,
tika-vin08t0:2020_34: aññesu phalāphalehi senāsanāni paṭijaggissāmā’ti vā ‘piṇḍapātādipaccayaṃ sampādessāmā’ti vā ‘kiñcipi
tika-vin08t0:2020_35: abhājetvā catupaccayatthāyeva upanemā’ti vā evaṃ sammā upanentānaṃ āvāsikānaṃ katikāya āgantukehi ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2020_44: ‘Ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni ṭhapetvā’ti vuttamevatthaṃ puna byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ ‘mūlavatthucchedaṃ pana katvā na upanetabba’nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2020_45: senāsanasaṅkhātavatthuno mūlacchedaṃ katvā sabbāni senāsanāni na vissajjetabbānīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2020_46: Keci panettha ‘ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni ṭhapetvā lāmakato paṭṭhāya vissajjantehipi senāsanabhūmiyo
tika-vin08t0:2020_48: tampi yuttameva imassapi atthassa avassaṃ vattabbato,
tika-vin08t0:2020_49: itarathā keci saha vatthunāpi vissajjetabbaṃ maññeyyu”nti.
tika-vin08t0:2021_1: Mūlavatthucchedanti ‘sabbasenāsanānaṃ ete issarā’ti vacanato itare anissarāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2021_2: Ayameva bhikkhu issaroti yattha so icchati,
tika-vin08t0:2023_2: Tesaṃ anatthakāmatāyāti ‘coro’ti vuttaṃ mama vacanaṃ sutvā keci daṇḍissanti,
tika-vin08t0:2023_4: Etena kevalaṃ bhayena vā parikkhāraggahaṇatthaṃ vā sahasā ‘coro’ti vutte daṇḍitepi na dosoti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:2023_7: pana ārāmikādīnaṃ vā sammukhā ‘asuko coro evamakāsī’ti kenaci vuttavacanaṃ nissāya ārāmikādīsu rājapurisānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2023_8: vatvā daṇḍāpentesupi bhikkhussa na gīvā rājapurisānaṃ avuttattā,
tika-vin08t0:2023_11: ‘Tvaṃ etassa santakaṃ acchindā’ti āṇattopi hi sace aññena acchindāpeti,
tika-vin08t0:2023_15: mā cassa daṇḍaṃ karohī’ti uddissa vadantassapi daṇḍe gahitepi na gīvā eva daṇḍaggahaṇassa paṭikkhittattā
tika-vin08t0:2023_16: ‘asukabhaṇḍaṃ avaharā’ti āṇāpetvā vippaṭisāre uppanne puna paṭikkhipane viya.
tika-vin08t0:2023_17: Dāsādīnaṃ sampaṭicchane viya tadatthāya aḍḍakaraṇe bhikkhūnampi dukkaṭanti āha ‘kappiyaaḍḍo nāma,
tika-vin08t0:2023_19: Kenaci pana bhikkhunā khettādiatthāya vohārikānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā aḍḍe katepi taṃ khettādisampaṭicchane
tika-vin08t0:2023_20: viya sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ na hoti pubbe eva saṅghasantakattā.
tika-vin08t0:2023_22: Dāsādīnampi pana atthāya rakkhaṃ yācituṃ vohārikena puṭṭhena saṅghassa uppannaṃ kappiyakkamaṃ vattuṃ ārāmikādīhi ca aḍḍaṃ kārāpetuṃ vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t0:2023_23: Vihāravatthādikappiyaaḍḍaṃ pana bhikkhunā sayampi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ āgato.
tika-vin08t0:2024_2: Kārāpetvā dātabbāti ettha sace āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2026_5: chaḍḍanaṃ vā chaḍḍāpanaṃ vāti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni,
tika-vin08t0:2026_6: navame haritūpari chaḍḍane sabbesanti bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā ca.
tika-vin08t0:2026_7: Idha khettapālakā ārāmādigopakā ca sāmikā evā”ti ettakameva sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2026_13: tattha harite vaccādiṃ kātumpi vaṭṭati eva.
tika-vin08t0:2026_15: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “sāmike apaloketvāva chaḍḍetīti katthaci potthake natthi,
tika-vin08t0:2026_18: Idha khettapālakā ārāmādigopakā ca sāmikā eva.
tika-vin08t0:2026_19: ‘Saṅghassa khette ārāme ca tattha kacavaraṃ na chaḍḍetabbanti katikā ce natthi,
tika-vin08t0:2026_24: Evaṃ santepi sāruppavaseneva kātabbanti vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2027_0: Bhikkhuvibhaṅge pana sekhiyavaṇṇanāyaṃ “asañciccāti paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa sahasā uccāro vā passāvo vā nikkhamati,
tika-vin08t0:2027_2: Na hariteti ettha yampi jīvarukkhassa mūlaṃ pathaviyaṃ dissamānaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin08t0:2027_8: Appaharite katoti appaharitaṃ alabhantena tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ vā palālaṇḍupakaṃ vā ṭhapetvā katopi pacchā haritaṃ ottharati,
tika-vin08t0:2027_11: Na udaketi etaṃ paribhogaudakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2027_15: Mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ etādise kāle anudakaṭṭhānaṃ alabhantena kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2027_16: Tassaṃ vaṇṇanāyaṃ vimativinodaniyañca “kheḷena cettha siṅghāṇikāpi saṅgahitāti ettha udakagaṇḍusakaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2027_17: katvā ucchukacavarādiñca mukheneva harituṃ udakesu chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2028_2: evaṃ sante nadījātassarādīsu āpatti vā anāpatti vāti.
tika-vin08t0:2028_13: Tena ñāyati “ādisaddena aparibhogāni candanikādiudakāni eva gahitāni,
tika-vin08t0:2028_15: Tena ca vaccakuṭisamuddādiudakāni aparibhogattā anāpattikarāni honti,
tika-vin08t0:2028_17: Kathaṃ pana “aparibhogesū”ti imassa padassa hetumantapadabhāvo jānitabboti?
tika-vin08t0:2028_22: Byabhicāre hi sambhave eva sati visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ siyā.
tika-vin08t0:2028_31: tasmā manussānaṃ paribhogesu nadījātassarataḷākapokkharaṇiyādiudakesu uccārapassāvādikaraṇaṃ na vaṭṭatīti jānitabbametaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2028_34: Mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ etādise kāle anudakaṭṭhānaṃ alabhantena kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2028_35: āgatattā mahantesu nadījātassarādīsu nāvādīhi gatakāle tādise kāraṇe sati “tīraṃ upanehī”ti vatvā “upanetuṃ
tika-vin08t0:2030_8: Puthupāṇikanti muṭṭhiṃ akatvā vikasitahatthatalehi piṭṭhiparikammaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:2030_10: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “puthupāṇinā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ puthupāṇikamma”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2031_0: Evaṃ pāḷianusāreneva nahāne kattabbākattabbaṃ dassetvā idāni nahānatitthe nahāyantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nahānavidhiṃ
tika-vin08t0:2031_3: gihipurisānaṃ kammaṃ viyāti garahitabbabhāvato ca vuttaṃ “yattha vā tattha vā…pe…
tika-vin08t0:2031_5: Aññesu sammukhībhūtesu anudakasāṭakena nahāyituṃ dukkarattā “sabbadisā pana oloketvā vivittabhāvaṃ ñatvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2031_6: Evampi khāṇugumbalatādīhi paṭicchannāpi hutvā tiṭṭheyyunti āha “khāṇu…pe…
tika-vin08t0:2031_11: Tato udakasāṭikāya sati taṃ nivāsetvā otaritabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin08t0:2031_12: tāya asatiyā kiṃ kātabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “sace”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:2031_13: Tattha pubbe “ṭhitakeneva na otaritabba”nti ahirikākārassa paṭisiddhattā idha hirimantākāraṃ dasseti udakante ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā nivāsanaṃ mocetvāti.
tika-vin08t0:2031_15: samaṭṭhāne vā pasārite sati vā tena aññattha gaccheyyāti āha “sace ninnaṭṭhāna”ntiādi.
tika-vin08t0:2032_0: Otarantena kiṃ kātabbanti pucchaṃ sandhāya “otarantena saṇika”ntyādi.
tika-vin08t0:2032_2: Atigambhīraṃ gacchanto udakoghataraṅgavātādīhi paharanto calitakāyo siyā,
tika-vin08t0:2032_3: atiuttāne nisīdanto appaṭicchannakāyo siyāti vuttaṃ “nābhippamāṇamattaṃ otaritvā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2032_5: saddañca karonto uddhaṭacapalabhāvo siyāti vuttaṃ “vīciṃ anuṭṭhapentena saddaṃ akarontena nivattitvā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2032_6: Nivattitvā kiṃ kātabbanti āha āgatadisābhimukhena nimujjitabba”nti,
tika-vin08t0:2032_14: tasmā thokaṃ kālaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ cīvaraṃ ubhohi hatthehi ante gahetvā purato katvā ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2032_15: Tato kāyassa sukkhabhāvaṃ ñatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā yathāruci gantabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:2036_4: Ettha ca dumāsassa vā dvaṅgulassa vā atikkantabhāvaṃ ajānantassapi kesamassugaṇanāya acittakāpattiyo hontīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:2036_5: Kocchenāti usīrahīrādīni bandhitvā samakaṃ chinditvā gahitakocchena.
tika-vin08t0:2037_0: Upari pana pāḷiyaṃ “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū massuṃ kappāpenti.
tika-vin08t0:2037_8: Manussā ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti ‘seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino’ti.
tika-vin08t0:2037_23: Golomikanti hanukamhi dīghaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ eḷakamassu vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:2037_27: Āpatti dukkaṭassāti massukappāpanādīsu sabbattha āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2038_0: Puna pāḷiyaṃ “tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sakkharikāyapi madhusitthakenapi nāsikālomaṃ gāhāpenti,
tika-vin08t0:2038_5: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū palitaṃ gāhāpenti.
tika-vin08t0:2038_6: Manussā ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti ‘seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino’ti.
tika-vin08t0:2038_13: anurakkhaṇatthaṃ pana saṇḍāso anuññāto”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Na,
tika-vin08t0:2038_15: palitaṃ gāhāpetabbanti ettha bhamukāya vā nalāṭe vā dāṭhikāya vā uggantvā bībhacchaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2038_16: tādisaṃ lomaṃ palitaṃ vā apalitaṃ vā gāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2040_1: Ādāsādikathāyaṃ ādāso nāma maṇḍanapakatikānaṃ manussānaṃ attano mukhacchāyādassanatthaṃ kaṃsalohādīhi kato bhaṇḍaviseso.
tika-vin08t0:2040_3: Kaṃsapattādīnīti ādāsabhāvena akatāni parisuddhabhāvena ālokakarāni vatthūni. Ādi-
tika-vin08t0:2040_12: taṃ olokento kenākārena olokeyyāti pucchāyamāha “jiṇṇo nu khomhi noti eva”nti.
tika-vin08t0:2040_14: mama attabhāvo jiṇṇo nu kho vā,
tika-vin08t0:2040_15: no jiṇṇo nu kho vāti evaṃ iminā manasikārena kammaṭṭhānasīsena oloketuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2040_17: no vā”ti evaṃ pavattena attasinehavasena oloketuṃ na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin08t0:2041_0: Na mukhaṃ ālimpitabbanti vippasannachavivaṇṇakarehi mukhalepanehi na limpitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2041_3: Na manosilikāya mukhaṃ lañjetabbanti manosilāya tilakādilañjanāni na kātabbāni.
tika-vin08t0:2043_9: tatopi adhikamattāyuttaṃ katvā kathanaṃ vikārakathanaṃ nāma,
tika-vin08t0:2043_10: tathā akatvā kathanameva lakkhaṇanti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2043_11: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “sādhugītaṃ nāma parinibbutaṭṭhāne gītanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2045_5: Bīje hi chinne opakkamikapaṇḍako nāma abhabbo hotīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:2045_7: kamena purisindriyādike antarahite paṇḍako nāma abhabbo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2045_9: Tādisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ uppādentassāti muṭṭhippahārādīhi attano dukkhaṃ uppādentassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2047_4: Tīhi daṇḍehi kato pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2047_5: Bhūmiyaṃ pana nikkujjitvā ekameva ṭhapetabbanti ettha ‘dve ṭhapentena upari ṭhapitapattaṃ ekena passena
tika-vin08t0:2047_8: Parivattetvā tattheva patiṭṭhātīti ettha ‘parivattetvā tatiyavāre tattheva miḍḍhiyā patiṭṭhātī’ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2047_9: Paribhaṇḍanteti ettha paribhaṇḍaṃ nāma gehassa bahikuṭṭapādassa thirabhāvatthaṃ katā tanukamiḍḍhikā vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:2047_14: ādhāraka’nti hi vacanato miḍḍhādīsu yattha katthaci ādhārakaṃ ṭhapetvā tattha pattaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati ādhārake ṭhapanokāsassa aniyamitattāti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:2047_15: ‘Pattamāḷo nāma vaṭṭetvā pattānaṃ agamanatthaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā iṭṭhakādīhi parikkhipitvā kato’ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2047_17: Tāvakālikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti sakideva gahetvā tena āmisaṃ paribhuñjitvā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:2047_19: Pāḷiyaṃ abhuṃ meti ettha bhavatīti bhū, vaḍḍhi.
tika-vin08t0:2047_25: Abhedepi vā tadupacāravasenevāyaṃ vohāro ‘silāputtakassa sarīra’ntiādīsu viya.
tika-vin08t0:2047_27: Ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvāti vāmahattheneva pattaṃ ukkhipitvā mukhena gaṇḍusaṃ gahetvā.
tika-vin08t0:2047_31: Etesu sabbesu paṇṇattiṃ jānātu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin08t0:2048_1: Pāḷiyaṃ na acchupiyantīti na phussitāni honti.
tika-vin08t0:2048_4: Etassa valayādhārakassa anucchavitāya ṭhapitā pattā na parivattantīti ‘tayo patte ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2048_6: Dāruādhārakadaṇḍādhārakesūti ekadārunā kataādhārake ca bahūhi daṇḍakehi kataādhārake ca,
tika-vin08t0:2048_7: ete ca uccatarā honti pattehi saha patanasabhāvā,
tika-vin08t0:2048_11: Tādisassa dāruādhārakassa avitthiṇṇatāya ṭhapitopi patto patatīti ‘anokāso’ti vutto.
tika-vin08t0:2048_16: Sabbattha pana hatthappamāṇato abbhantare ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2048_18: Aññena pana bhaṇḍakenāti aññena bhārabhaṇḍena bhaṇḍakena.
tika-vin08t0:2048_19: ‘Bandhitvā olambitu’nti ca vuttattā pattatthavikāya aṃsabaddhako yathā laggitaṭṭhānato na parigaḷati,
tika-vin08t0:2048_21: Bandhitvāpi upari ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ‘upari nisīdantā ottharitvā bhindantī’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2048_25: Pariharitunti divase divase piṇḍāya caraṇatthāya ṭhapetuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2048_26: Pattaṃ alabhantena pana ekadivasaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjitvā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2048_31: ‘Paṭiggahaṃ katvā’ti vuttattā ucchiṭṭhahatthena udakaṃ gahetvā pattaṃ paripphositvā dhovanaghaṃsanavasena hatthaṃ dhovituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2048_32: Ettakena hi pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ katvā hattho dhovito nāma na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2048_33: Ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvāti pattaṃ aphusitvā tattha udakameva ucchiṭṭhahatthena ukkhipitvā gaṇḍusaṃ katvā,
tika-vin08t0:2048_34: vāmahattheneva vā pattaṃ ukkhipitvā mukhena gaṇḍusaṃ gahetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2048_35: Bahi udakena vikkhāletvāti dvīsu aṅgulīsu āmisamattaṃ vikkhāletvā bahi gahetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2048_36: Paṭikhāditukāmoti ettha sayaṃ na khāditukāmopi aññesaṃ khādanārahaṃ ṭhapetuṃ labhati.
tika-vin08t0:2048_38: Luñcitvāti tato maṃsameva niravasesaṃ uppaṭṭetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2049_1: Parivattetvā tatthevāti ettha ‘parivattetvā tatiyavāre tattheva miḍḍhikāya patiṭṭhātī’ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2049_2: Paribhaṇḍaṃ nāma gehassa bahikuṭṭapādassa thirabhāvatthaṃ katā tanukamiḍḍhikā vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:2049_3: ettha ‘parivattetvā patto bhijjatīti adhikaraṇabhedāsaṅkāraabhāve ṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2049_4: Pattamāḷo vattetvā pattānaṃ apatanatthaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā iṭṭhakādīhi parikkhipitvā māḷakacchannena kato.
tika-vin08t0:2049_6: Miḍḍhante ādhārake ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati pattasandhāraṇatthaṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:2049_7: Mañce ādhārakepi na vaṭṭati nisīdanapaccayā vāritattā.
tika-vin08t0:2049_9: ‘Aṃsakūṭe laggetvāti vacanato aggahatthe laggetvā aṅke ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti keci vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:2049_11: Na kevalaṃ yassa pattotiādi yadi hatthena gahitapatte bhedasaññā,
tika-vin08t0:2049_22: Etesu sabbesu paṇṇattiṃ jānātu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin08t0:2051_1: Sabbapaṃsukūlādikathāyaṃ paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvena ulati pavattatīti paṃsukūlaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2051_3: pattacīvarādikaṃ sabbaṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ paṃsukūlaṃyeva katvā dhāraṇasīloti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2051_4: Samaṇaparikkhāresu katamaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ katvā dhāretuṃ vaṭṭatīti pucchaṃ sandhāyāha “ettha pana cīvarañca mañcapīṭhañca paṃsukūlaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2051_5: Tattha ca cīvaraṃ vinayavasena ca dhutaṅgasamādānavasena ca vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2051_7: Katamaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ na vaṭṭatīti āha “ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ pana dinnameva gahetabba”nti,
tika-vin08t0:2051_10: Ettha ca “ajjhoharaṇīya”nti vacanena piṇḍapātagilānapaccayabhesajjapaakkhāravasena ubhopi paccaye dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:2053_2: tattakaṃ maggaṃ parissāvanaṃ aggahetvā gacchantopi aññena aparissāvanakena bhikkhunā yāciyamāno hutvā adentopi na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2053_10: kaṭacchuparissāvana”nti vuttattā pakatiparissāvanato kaṭacchuparissāvanaṃ khuddakanti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:2053_12: kaṭacchuparissāvanassa pana vidhānaṃ “kaṭacchuparissāvanaṃ nāma tīsu daṇḍakesu vinandhitvā kata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2053_17: dhamakaraṇa”nti vuttattā kaṭacchuparissāvanatopi dhamakaraṇo khuddakataroti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:2053_24: daṇḍaparissāvana”nti (cūḷava 259) vuttattā pakatiparissāvanatopi daṇḍaparissāvanaṃ mahantataranti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:2053_29: ottharaka”nti vacanato daṇḍaparissāvanatopi ottharakaṃ mahantataranti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:2053_30: Tesaṃ pana dvinnampi parissāvanānaṃ vidhānaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatameva.
tika-vin08t0:2055_1: Naggakathāyaṃ na naggena naggo abhivādetabboti naggena navakatarena bhikkhunā naggo vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu na abhivādetabbo na vanditabbo. Kasmā? “Na,
tika-vin08t0:2055_5: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti bhagavatā vacanato na abhivādetabboti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:2055_6: Ettha pana vadi abhivādanathutīsūti dhātussa curādigaṇattā ṇe-
tika-vin08t0:2058_2: Na naggena abhivādetabbanti ettha tu naggena bhikkhunā na abhivādetabbanti ettakameva yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:2061_1: imissā ca dhātuyā sakammattā kammaṃ ajjhāharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2063_0: Bhāvepi taṃ yathā gehe, devadattena paccate”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2064_0: Yathā ākhyātapaccayasaṅkhātā vibhattiyo sakammakadhātuto bhavantāpi kammavacanicchāya asati kammaṃ avatvā bhāvatthameva vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:2064_1: evaṃ kiccapaccayāpi sakammakadhātuto bhavantāpi kammavacanicchāyābhāvato kammaṃ avatvā bhāvatthameva vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:2064_5: Ettha hi “ayaṃ nāma puggalo abhivādetabbo”ti acintetvā sāmaññato kattārameva gahetvā ṭhapitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:2065_0: Na naggena naggo abhivādāpetabboti ettha pana naggena vuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā naggo navakataro bhikkhu na abhivādāpetabbo,
tika-vin08t0:2065_3: dhātuyā ca sakammakattā navakataro bhikkhu dhātukattā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2065_5: puna kāritasambandhe vuḍḍhataro bhikkhu kāritakattā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2068_0: Na naggena abhivādāpetabbanti ettha tu naggena vuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā na abhivādāpetabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2068_2: etthāpi kammavacanicchāyābhāvato vuttanayena bhāveyeva kiccapaccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin08t0:2070_0: Taṃ yathānudarā kaññā, samuddo kuṇḍikāti cā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2071_0: Itaresupi suviññeyyameva. Paṭicchādenti aṅgamaṅgāni etāhīti paṭicchādiyo.
tika-vin08t0:2073_1: Gandhapupphakathāyaṃ “gandhagandhaṃ pana gahetvā kavāṭe pañcaṅguliṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vacanato gandhe dinne paṭiggahituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2073_3: Idāni pana manussā bhikkhū bhojetvā hatthadhovanāvasāne hatthavāsatthāya gandhavilepanaṃ denti,
tika-vin08t0:2073_4: taṃ bhikkhū paṭiggahetvā ekacce hatthameva limpenti,
tika-vin08t0:2073_9: “Kavāṭe pañcaṅgulikaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vihāre kavāṭadhūpanamattasseva vuttattā kāyadhūpanassa avuttattā,
tika-vin08t0:2073_10: “mālāgandhavilepanadhāraṇamaṇḍanavibhūsanaṭṭhānā veramaṇī”ti vacanassānulomato ca na vaṭṭatīti dissati,
tika-vin08t0:2073_12: “Pupphaṃ gahetvā vihāre ekamantaṃ nikkhipitu”nti vacanato pupphe dinne gahetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2073_14: Idāni pana bhikkhūsu gandhapupphesu laddhesu “surabhigandhaṃ vatidaṃ puppha”ntiādīni vatvā pahaṭṭhākāraṃ katvā siṅghanti,
tika-vin08t0:2073_17: Tampi vihāreyeva ekamantaṃ ṭhapanassa vuttattā siṅghitabbādibhāvassa avuttattā,
tika-vin08t0:2073_18: mālāgandhādipāṭhassa anulomato ca na vaṭṭatīti dissati,
tika-vin08t0:2073_20: “Ekamantaṃ nikkhipitu”nti vacanassa pana sāmatthiyato cetiyapaṭimāpūjanādīni ca kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti viññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:2075_1: Āsittakūpadhānakathāyaṃ manussānaṃ bharaṇasīlataṃ sandhāya “tambalohena vā rajatena vā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2075_3: saddena hiraññena vā suvaṇṇena vātiādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin08t0:2075_4: Paṭikkhittattā panāti bhagavatā pana āsittakūpadhānassa sāmaññavasena paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin08t0:2075_5: Na kevalaṃ ratanapeḷā eva na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2077_3: maḷorika”nti gilāno bhikkhu bhuñjamāno na sakkoti hatthena pattaṃ sandhāretuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2077_7: Daṇḍādhārako vuccatīti daṇḍādhārako padhānato maḷorikoti vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:2079_1: Ekabhājanādikathāyaṃ ekatobhuñjanaṃ nāma ekabhājanasmiṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva sahabhuñjanaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2079_4: Tasmiṃ apagate tassa apagatattā itarassa sesakaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2079_9: Tasmiṃ khīṇe tassa khaṇattā paṭhamaṃ gahitavatthussa khīṇattā puna gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2080_0: Na ekamañce nipajjitabbaṃ satipi nānāattharaṇe “na ekamañce tuvaṭṭitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2080_3: Na ekattharaṇe nipajjitabbaṃ satipi nānāmañce “na ekattharaṇā tuvaṭṭitabba”nti vacanato,
tika-vin08t0:2080_5: Yadi evaṃ nānāmañcanānāattharaṇesu asantesu kathaṃ anāpatti siyāti cintāyamāha “vavatthānaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:2080_6: Ekattharaṇapāvuraṇehīti ettha pana ayaṃ ekattharaṇapāvuraṇasaddo na catthasamāso hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2080_7: atha kho bāhiratthasamāsoti āha “ekaṃ attharaṇañceva pāvuraṇañca etesanti ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā”ti,
tika-vin08t0:2080_9: Kesametamadhivacanantyāha “ekaṃ antaṃ attharitvā ekaṃ pārupitvā nipajjantānametaṃ adhivacana”nti,
tika-vin08t0:2080_10: evaṃ nipajjantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etaṃ ekattharaṇapāvuraṇapadaṃ adhivacanaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:2082_4: akkamissati me bhagavā celapaṭika’nti iminā ajjhāsayena santhari,
tika-vin08t0:2082_8: pacchā puttaṃ alabhanto ‘nāyaṃ sabbaññū’ti diṭṭhiṃ gaṇheyya,
tika-vin08t0:2082_10: Yasmā pana bhikkhūpi ye ajānantā akkameyyuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2082_12: tasmā bhikkhū paribhavato mocetuṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi,
tika-vin08t0:2083_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “bhagavā tuṇhī ahosīti ‘kissa nu kho atthāya rājakumārena ayaṃ mahāsakkāro kato’ti āvajjento puttapatthanāya katabhāvaṃ aññāsi.
tika-vin08t0:2083_2: sutañcānena ahosi ‘buddhānaṃ kira adhikāraṃ katvā manasā icchitaṃ labhantī’ti,
tika-vin08t0:2083_7: Atha bhagavā ‘nibbattissati nu kho etassa putto’ti āvajjetvā ‘na nibbattissatī’ti addasa.
tika-vin08t0:2083_8: Pubbe kira so ekasmiṃ dīpe vasamāno bhariyāya samānacchando anekasakuṇapotake khādi.
tika-vin08t0:2083_11: ubhohi pana samānacchandehi hutvā pāpakammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2083_13: Dusse pana akkante ‘buddhānaṃ adhikāraṃ katvā patthitaṃ labhantīti loke anussavo,
tika-vin08t0:2083_19: etarahi ca akkamantesu bahū bhikkhū paracittaviduno,
tika-vin08t0:2083_30: ime pana paṭipattiṃ pūretuṃ na sakkontī’ti manussā vippaṭisārino bhavissantīti imehi tīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā akkamituṃ anicchanto tuṇhī ahosi.
tika-vin08t0:2083_31: Pacchimaṃ janataṃ tathāgato anukampatīti idaṃ pana thero vuttesu kāraṇesu tatiyakāraṇaṃ sandhāyāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2084_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “yāciyamānena celapaṭikaṃ akkamitu”nti vacanato yāciyamānena eva akkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2084_4: tatthapi “gihīna”nti vacanato gihīnaṃ eva celasantharaṃ akkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2084_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yā kāci itthī apagatagabbhā vā hotu,
tika-vin08t0:2084_8: saddena vacanato na kevalaṃ imā dveyeva gahetabbā,
tika-vin08t0:2084_9: atha kho “patiṭṭhitagabbhā vā vijātiputtā vā”tiādinā yā kāci maṅgalikāyo itthiyopi purisāpi gahetabbā.
tika-vin08t0:2084_11: atha kho taṃsadisesu yesu kesuci maṅgalaṭṭhānesu yesaṃ kesañci gihīnaṃ maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānānaṃ celasantharaṃ akkamituṃ vaṭṭatīti sijjhati,
tika-vin08t0:2084_16: aṭṭhakathāyañca “taṃ akkamituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti avisesena vuttattā dhotapādakaṃ ayāciyamānenapi bhikkhunā akkamitabbanti siddhaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2084_17: “dhotehi pādehi akkamanatthāyā”ti pana vuttattā adhotehi akkamituṃ na vaṭṭatīti ca,
tika-vin08t0:2086_1: Pādaghaṃsanīyakathāyaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva akappiyapādaghaṃsaniṃ dassetuṃ “katakaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
tika-vin08t0:2086_2: Katakaṃ nāma kīdisanti pucchāya sati vuttaṃ “katakaṃ nāma padumakaṇṇikākāra”ntiādi.
tika-vin08t0:2088_1: Bījanīkathāyaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva akappiyabījaniṃ dassetuṃ “camarīvālehi katabījanī na vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
tika-vin08t0:2088_12: Tālavaṇṭanti tālapattādīhi kataṃ maṇḍalikabījani”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2090_1: Chattakathāyaṃ chattaṃ nāma tīṇi chattāni setacchattaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2090_7: Maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhanti idaṃ pana tiṇṇampi chattānaṃ pañjaradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2090_8: Tāni hi maṇḍalabaddhāni ceva honti salākabaddhāni ca.
tika-vin08t0:2090_12: Tatthajātakadaṇḍakena katanti tālapaṇṇaṃ saha daṇḍakena chinditvā tameva chattadaṇḍaṃ karonti gopālakādayo viya,
tika-vin08t0:2090_15: Maṇḍalabaddhānīti dīghasalākāsu tiriyaṃ valayākārena salākaṃ ṭhapetvā suttehi baddhāni dīghañca tiriyañca
tika-vin08t0:2090_16: ujukameva salākāyo ṭhapetvā daḷhabaddhāni ceva tiriyaṃ ṭhapetvā dīghadaṇḍakeheva saṅkocārahaṃ katvā sutteheva
tika-vin08t0:2090_18: Tatthajātakadaṇḍakena katanti saha daṇḍakena chinnatālapaṇṇādīhi kata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2090_20: tasmā agilānassa bhikkhuno chattaṃ dhāretuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2094_1: Manussā ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti vatthusmiṃ uppanne “na,
tika-vin08t0:2094_7: ābādhapaccayā sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpetu”nti vacanato ābādhapaccayā bhesajjapatiṭṭhāpanatthāya sambādhe lomaṃ harāpentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin08t0:2094_18: Gāhetuṃ na vaṭṭati “mā me jarābhāvo hotū”ti manasi katattā.
tika-vin08t0:2094_20: Palitaṃ vā apalitaṃ vāti paṇḍaraṃ vā apaṇḍaraṃ vā.
tika-vin08t0:2096_3: Atha vā akāyabandhanenāti abandhitakāyabandhano hutvāti itthambhūtatthe karaṇavacanaṃ yathā “bhinnena
tika-vin08t0:2096_17: Tasmā paṭikkhittāni akappiyakāyabandhanāni nāma cattāri honti, paṭṭikaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2096_18: sūkarantakanti imāni dve kāyabandhanāni bhagavatā anuññātāni kappiyakāyabandhanāni nāma,
tika-vin08t0:2096_19: tassa pakativītā vā macchakaṇṭakavāyimā vā paṭṭikā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2096_24: Imehi pana dvīhi saddhiṃ aṭṭha kāyabandhanāni honti.
tika-vin08t0:2096_27: murajaṃ maddavīṇa”nti idaṃ dasāsuyeva anuññātanti pāmaṅgadasā cettha catunnaṃ upari na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2096_30: Evaṃ sibbitā hi anto thirā hontīti vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:2096_32: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “muddikakāyabandhanaṃ nāma caturassaṃ akatvā sajjitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2096_37: Akāyabandhanena sañcicca vā asañcicca vā gāmappavesane āpatti.
tika-vin08t0:2098_1: Nivāsanapārupanakathāyaṃ hatthisoṇḍādivasena gihinivatthaṃ na nivāsetabbanti ettha hatthisoṇḍakaṃ nāma
tika-vin08t0:2098_2: nābhimūlato hatthisoṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ olambakaṃ katvā nivatthaṃ coḷikaitthīnaṃ nivāsanaṃ viya.
tika-vin08t0:2098_3: Macchavāḷakaṃ nāma ekato dasantaṃ ekato pāsantaṃ olambitvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2098_5: heṭṭhato dveti evaṃ cattāro kaṇṇe dassetvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2098_6: Tālavaṇṭakaṃ nāma tālavaṇṭākārena sāṭakaṃ olambitvā nivāsanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2098_7: Satavalikaṃ nāma dīghasāṭakaṃ anekakkhattuṃ obhujitvā ovaṭṭikaṃ karontena nivatthaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2098_8: vāmadakkhiṇapassesu vā nirantaraṃ valiyo dassetvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2098_9: Sace pana jāṇuto paṭṭhāya ekaṃ vā dve vā valiyo paññāyanti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2098_10: Saṃvelliyaṃ nivāsentīti mallakammakārādayo viya kacchaṃ bandhitvā nivāsenti,
tika-vin08t0:2098_11: evaṃ nivāsetuṃ gilānassapi maggappaṭipannassapi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2098_12: Setapaṭapārutādivasena na gihipārutaṃ pārupitabbanti ettha yaṃ kiñci setapaṭapārutaṃ paribbājakapārutaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2098_13: ekasāṭakapārutaṃ soṇḍapārutaṃ antepurikapārutaṃ mahājeṭṭhakapārutaṃ kuṭipavesakapārutaṃ brāhmaṇapārutaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2098_14: pāḷikārakapārutanti evamādi parimaṇḍalalakkhaṇato aññathā pārutaṃ sabbametaṃ gihipārutaṃ nāma,
tika-vin08t0:2098_16: yathā ca ekacce paribbājakā uraṃ vivaritvā dvīsu aṃsakūṭesu pāvuraṇaṃ ṭhapenti,
tika-vin08t0:2098_17: yathā ca ekasāṭakā manussā nivatthasāṭakassa ekena antena piṭṭhiṃ pārupitvā ubho kaṇṇe ubhosu aṃsakūṭesu ṭhapenti,
tika-vin08t0:2098_18: yathā ca surāsoṇḍādayo sāṭakena gīvaṃ parikkhipitvā ubho ante ure vā olambenti,
tika-vin08t0:2098_20: yathā ca antepurikāyo akkhitārakamattaṃ dassetvā oguṇṭhikaṃ pārupanti,
tika-vin08t0:2098_21: yathā ca mahājeṭṭhā dīghasāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā tasseva ekena antena sakalasarīraṃ pārupanti,
tika-vin08t0:2098_22: yathā ca kassakā khettakuṭiṃ pavisantā sāṭakaṃ paliveṭhetvā upakacchake pakkhipitvā tasseva ekena antena sarīraṃ pārupanti,
tika-vin08t0:2098_23: yathā ca brāhmaṇā ubhinnaṃ upakacchakānaṃ antare sāṭakaṃ pavesetvā aṃsakūṭesu pārupanti,
tika-vin08t0:2098_24: yathā ca pāḷikārako bhikkhu ekaṃsapārupanena pārutaṃ vāmabāhuṃ vivaritvā cīvaraṃ aṃsakūṭe āropeti.
tika-vin08t0:2098_25: Evaṃ apārupitvā sabbepi ete aññe ca evarūpe pārupanadose vajjetvā nibbikāraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2098_26: Tathā apārupitvā ārāme vā antaraghare vā anādarena yaṃ kiñci vikāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2100_1: Kājakathāyaṃ muṇḍaveṭhīti yathā rañño kuhiñci gacchanto parikkhārabhaṇḍaggahaṇamanussāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin08t0:2100_2: Ubhatokājanti ekasmiṃyeva kāje purato ca pacchato ca ubhosu bhāgesu laggetvā vahitabbabhāraṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2102_2: khādane pañcānisaṃse ca dassetvā bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2102_8: Tattha acakkhussanti cakkhūnaṃ hitaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2102_12: Tato dīghadantakaṭṭhakhādane ca atimadāhakadantakaṭṭhakhādane ca dukkaṭaṃ paññapetvā aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ caturaṅgulapacchimaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2102_13: Tattha aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ paramaṃ etassa dantakaṭṭhassāti aṭṭhaṅgulaparamaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2102_14: Caturaṅgulaṃ pacchimaṃ pamāṇaṃ etassa dantakaṭṭhassāti caturaṅgulapacchimaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2103_0: Ettha ca pamāṇaṅgulenāti idaṃ pakatiaṅgulenāti gahetvā manussānaṃ pakatiaṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulato adhikappamāṇaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:2103_4: Tasmā yaṃ vaḍḍhakihatthato aṅgulaṃ pamāṇaṃ katvā manussā gehādīni minanti,
tika-vin08t0:2103_5: tena manussānaṃ pamāṇaṅgulabhūtena vaḍḍhakiaṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulaparamanti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:2103_10: Na hi pakatiaṅgulena caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ kaṇṭhe avilaggaṃ khādituṃ sakkā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2105_1: Rukkhārohanakathāyaṃ puriso pamāṇo yassa rukkhassāti poriso,
tika-vin08t0:2105_2: uddhaṃ ukkhipitahatthena saddhiṃ manussakāyappamāṇo pañcahatthamattaucco rukkhapadeso,
tika-vin08t0:2105_7: Yāva attho atthi etasmiṃ rukkheti yāvadattho, rukkho, attha-
tika-vin08t0:2105_9: Yāva tasmiṃ rukkhe bhikkhussa attho payojanaṃ atthi,
tika-vin08t0:2107_6: Atha vā sakkaritabbā pūjitabbāti sakkaṭā manussānaṃ hitasukhāvahanato,
tika-vin08t0:2107_9: sakkaṭā ca sā bhāsā cāti sakkaṭabhāsā.
tika-vin08t0:2114_1: Lokāyatakathāyaṃ lokiyanti patiṭṭhahanti puññāpuññāni tabbipāko cāti loko,
tika-vin08t0:2114_3: Ābhuso yatanti vīriyaṃ karonti etthāti āyataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2114_9: Sabbaṃ anucchiṭṭhaṃ imassa avasesabhojanassa kenaci aparibhuttapubbattā.
tika-vin08t0:2114_21: Na tiracchānavijjā pariyāpuṇitabbāti ettha tiracchānavijjā nāma yā kāci bāhirakā anatthasañhitā.
tika-vin08t0:2116_7: Yasmiṃ kismiñci puggale khipite bhikkhunā “jīvā”ti vacanaṃ na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2116_8: bhikkhusmiṃ khipite gihinā “jīvatha bhante”ti vuccamāne sati “ciraṃ jīvā”ti bhikkhunā vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:2116_9: “Vuccamāne”ti ettha pana lakkhaṇassa kammavācakattā tena samānādhikaraṇaṃ kammabhūtaṃ “bhikkhusmi”nti
tika-vin08t0:2116_10: lakkhaṇavantakammaṃ ajjhāharitabbaṃ yathā kiṃ “gosu duyhamānāsu puriso āgato”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2116_11: Apare pana ācariyā īdisesu ṭhānesu “santesū”ti padaṃ ajjhāharitvā idameva lakkhaṇapadaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2116_12: “gosu duyhamānāsū”ti padadvayaṃ pana “santesū”ti ettha pakativikativasena kattā evāti vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:2118_3: Magadharaṭṭhe jātalasuṇameva hi idha lasuṇanti adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2118_6: Kurundiyaṃ pana ‘jātidesaṃ avatvā ‘māgadhakaṃ nāma bhaṇḍikalasuṇa’nti vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2118_7: Sace dve tayo bhaṇḍike ekatoyeva saṅkharitvā ajjhoharati,
tika-vin08t0:2118_9: Bhinditvā ekekaṃ miñjaṃ khādantiyā pana payogagaṇanāya pācittiyāni,
tika-vin08t0:2119_0: Palaṇḍukādīnaṃ vaṇṇena vā miñjāya vā nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2119_1: Vaṇṇena tāva palaṇḍuko nāma paṇḍuvaṇṇo hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2119_4: miñjāya pana palaṇḍukassa ekā miñjā hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2119_14: Tañhi paccamānesu muggasūpādīsu vā macchamaṃsavikatiyā vā telādīsu vā badarasāḷavādīsu vā ambilapākādīsu
tika-vin08t0:2119_15: vā uttaribhaṅge vā yattha katthaci antamaso yāgupattepi pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2119_17: Badarasāḷavaṃ nāma badaraphalāni sukkhāpetvā cuṇṇetvā kattabbā khādanīyavikatī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2121_3: Tatheva vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭatīti aññehi āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi paribhuttanīhārena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2121_10: Tatheva vaḷañjetuṃ vaṭṭatīti iminā nevāsikehi dhotapādādīhi vaḷañjanaṭṭhāne sañcicca adhotapādādīhi vaḷañjantasseva āpatti paññattāti dasseti,
tika-vin08t0:2121_11: ‘dvārampī’tiādinā sāmaññato vuttattā dvāravātapānādayo aparikammakatāpi na apassayitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:2121_12: Ajānitvā apassayantassapi idha lomagaṇanāya āpattī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2121_13: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “nevāsikā pakatiyā anatthatāya bhūmiyā ṭhapenti ce,
