tika-vin08t0:2121_15: dvāravātapānādayo aparikammakatāpi na apassayitabbāti likhita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2123_1: Avandiyavandiyakathāyaṃ idha pakaraṇācariyena senāsanakkhandhakapāḷivasena dasa avandiyā,
tika-vin08t0:2123_5: Parivārapāḷiyaṃ pana upālipañcake pañcapañcakavasena pañcavīsati avandiyā,
tika-vin08t0:2124_7: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vandiyo. Ime kho, upāli,
tika-vin08t0:2125_4: Ekāvattoti ekato āvatto sapattapakkhe ṭhito verī visabhāgapuggalo vuccati,
tika-vin08t0:2125_13: Ādito paṭṭhāya ca vuttesu avandiyesu naggañca ukkhittakañca vandantasseva hoti āpatti,
tika-vin08t0:2125_14: itaresaṃ pana asāruppaṭṭhena ca antarā vuttakāraṇena ca vandanā paṭikkhittā.
tika-vin08t0:2125_15: Ito paraṃ pacchāupasampannādayo dasapi āpattivatthubhāveneva avandiyā.
tika-vin08t0:2125_17: Iti imesu pañcasu pañcakesu terasa jane vandantassa anāpatti,
tika-vin08t0:2125_19: Ācariyo vandiyoti pabbajjācariyo upasampadācariyo nissayācariyo uddesācariyo ovādācariyoti ayaṃ pañcavidhopi ācariyo vandiyo”ti āgato.
tika-vin08t0:2126_0: “Antarā vuttakāraṇenāti tañhi vandantassa mañcapādādīsu nalāṭaṃ paṭihaññeyyātiādinā vuttakāraṇenā”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2126_1: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “mañcapādādīsupi nalāṭaṃ paṭihaññeyyāti andhakāre cammakhaṇḍaṃ paññapetvā vandituṃ
tika-vin08t0:2126_2: onamantassa nalāṭaṃ vā akkhi vā mañcādīsu paṭihaññati.
tika-vin08t0:2126_3: Etena vandatopi āpattiabhāvaṃ vatvā vandanāya sabbathā paṭikkhepābhāvañca dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:2126_10: Vanditabbesu uddesācariyo nissayācariyo ca yasmā navakāpi honti,
tika-vin08t0:2126_11: tasmā ‘te vuḍḍhā eva vandiyā’ti vanditabbā”ti āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2126_19: Antarā vuttakāraṇenāti kiccappasutattā asamannāharanto ‘nalāṭaṃ paṭihaññeyyā’tiādivuttakāraṇenā”ti āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2127_0: Dutiyagāthāsaṅgaṇikaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dasa puggalā nābhivādetabbāti senāsanakkhandhake vuttā dasa janā.
tika-vin08t0:2127_1: Añjalisāmīcena cāti sāmīcikammena saddhiṃ añjali ca tesaṃ na kātabbo.
tika-vin08t0:2127_4: Dasannaṃ dukkaṭanti tesaṃyeva dasannaṃ evaṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ hotī”ti āgataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2128_1: bhikkhunā vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno pāde vandantena kati dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā pādā vanditabbāti?
tika-vin08t0:2128_3: bhikkhunā vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno pāde vandantena pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā pādā vanditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:2128_6: bhikkhunā vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno pāde vandantena ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā ubhohi
tika-vin08t0:2128_7: pāṇitalehi pādāni parisambāhantena pemañca gāravañca upaṭṭhāpetvā pādā vanditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:2128_9: bhikkhunā vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno pāde vandantena ime pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā pādā vanditabbā”ti
tika-vin08t0:2128_10: imasmiṃ ṭhāne sammāsambuddhena āyasmato upālissa vandanānayova ācikkhito.
tika-vin08t0:2129_0: Pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvāti ettha pañcasarūpañca kathitaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:2129_1: Vuḍḍhatarassa pāde vandantena ubho aṃse vivaritvā vanditabbā,
tika-vin08t0:2129_2: na ca ubho aṃse pārupitvā vanditabbā,
tika-vin08t0:2129_3: atha kho ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vanditabbāti.
tika-vin08t0:2129_4: Etena saṅghāṭi pana ekaṃsaṃ katāpi akatāpi natthi dosoti pakāsito hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2129_6: na hatthatalapakāsanamattena vā na hatthamuṭṭhipakāsanādinā vā vanditabbā”ti ca “na ekena hatthena cīvarakaṇṇachupanādimattena vanditabbā,
tika-vin08t0:2129_7: atha kho ubhohi pāṇitalehi pādāni parisambāhantena vanditabbā”ti ca “evaṃ vandantehi na duṭṭhacittañca anādarañca upaṭṭhāpetvā vanditabbā,
tika-vin08t0:2129_8: atha kho pemañca gāravañca upaṭṭhāpetvā pādā vanditabbā”ti ca evaṃ vandanānayo ācikkhito hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2130_7: Tenāha “pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā pādā vanditabbā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2130_8: Evaṃ sakalalokassa hitasukhakārakena dhammassāminā kāyapaṇāmamanopaṇāmavasena mahato hitasukhassa pavattanatthaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2130_9: āyasmato upālittherassa ācikkhitena vandanānayena vandituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2131_0: Idāni pana ācariyā abhinavaāgatānaṃ daharānañca sāmaṇerānañca vandanānayaṃ sikkhantā na imaṃ āhaccabhāsitaṃ pāḷiṃ gahetvā sikkhanti,
tika-vin08t0:2131_1: atha kho paveṇīāgatanayaṃyeva gahetvā sikkhanti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:2131_3: dve pādatalāni samaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā dve hatthatalāni samaṃ phusāpetvā nalāṭe patiṭṭhāpetvā vanditabbābhimukhaṃ onamitvā vandathāti,
tika-vin08t0:2131_4: ayaṃ nayo “evaṃ mahāsatto suvaṇṇakadali viya bārāṇasinagarābhimukhaṃ onamitvā mātāpitaro vanditvā”ti
tika-vin08t0:2131_5: imaṃ jātakaṭṭhakathāvacanañca “dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā”tiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanañca
tika-vin08t0:2131_11: paṭhamaṃ dve pādatalāni bhūmiyaṃ samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā dve jāṇumaṇḍalāni samaṃ ussāpetvā dve kapparāni
tika-vin08t0:2131_12: dvinnaṃ jāṇūnaṃ upari samaṃ ṭhapetvā dve hatthatalāni samaṃ phusitāni katvā añjalisaṅkhātaṃ karapuṭaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2131_14: Tato onamitvā dve jāṇumaṇḍalāni ca dve kapparāni ca bhūmiyaṃ samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā dve hatthatalāni pasāretvā
tika-vin08t0:2131_15: samaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā sīsaṃ ubhinnaṃ hatthapiṭṭhīnaṃ upari katvā bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vandathāti.
tika-vin08t0:2131_16: Ettha tu dve pādatalāni ekaṃ katvā,
tika-vin08t0:2132_0: Samīpaṃ gantvā pādānaṃ vandanakāle pana ekacce paṭhamaṃ attano sīsaṃ hatthena parāmasitvā tena hatthadvayena
tika-vin08t0:2132_2: Ekacce paṭhamaṃ therānaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ sacīvaraṃyeva parāmasitvā teneva hatthadvayena attano sīsaṃ parāmasanti.
tika-vin08t0:2132_5: Rāmaññadesiyā pana bhikkhū evaṃ samīpaṃ gantvā vandanakāle therānaṃ pādaggaṃ apassantāpi pariyesitvā
tika-vin08t0:2132_6: cīvarato nīharitvā pādaggameva punappunaṃ hatthena sambāhitvā sīsena pavaṭṭetvā cumbitvā lehitvā cirappavāsāgatapiyamanāpaupajjhāyaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2132_7: vā ācariyaṃ vā passantā viya katvā vandanti.
tika-vin08t0:2132_8: Taṃ kiriyaṃ parivārapāḷiyaṃ “ubhohi pāṇitalehi pādāni parisambāhantena pemañca gāravañca upaṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin08t0:2132_9: pādā vanditabbā”ti āgatapāḷiyā saṃsandati viya dissati.
tika-vin08t0:2132_12: tasmā sabbesaṃ hitatthaṃ pāḷinayo amhehi uddhaṭo.
tika-vin08t0:2132_14: tasmā bhagavato āṇaṃ garuṃ karontehi sappurisehi pāḷinayo samāsevitabboti amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin08t0:2134_4: Āyatacaturassā pana sattaṅgapañcaṅgāpi uccapādā na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t0:2134_7: Uddhaṃ pādaṃ katvā pavesanakālañhi sandhāya “uparī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2134_8: Eḷakassa pacchimapādadvayaṃ viya vaṅkākārena ṭhitattā panetaṃ “eḷakapādapīṭha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2136_4: ‘Caturaṅgulādhikāni kira tassa lomānī’ti vacanato caturaṅgulato heṭṭhā vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin08t0:2136_7: Pakatitūlikāti rukkhatūlalatātūlapoṭakītūlasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tūlānaṃ aññatarapuṇṇā tūlikā.
tika-vin08t0:2136_14: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ panettha ‘ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni na vaṭṭantī’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2136_15: Tattha ‘ṭhapetvā tūlika’nti etena ratanaparisibbanarahitāpi tūlikā na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin08t0:2136_16: ‘Ratanaparisibbitāni na vaṭṭantī’ti iminā pana yāni ratanaparisibbitāni,
tika-vin08t0:2136_17: tāni bhūmattharaṇavasena yathānurūpaṃ mañcādīsu ca upanetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2136_18: Ettha ca vinayapariyāyaṃ patvā garuke ṭhātabbattā idha vuttanayenevettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin08t0:2136_19: Suttantikadesanāya pana gahaṭṭhānampi vasena vuttattā tesaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ ‘ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ…pe…
tika-vin08t0:2137_9: Ettha ca kiñcāpi dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘alohitakāni dvepi vaṭṭantiyeva,
tika-vin08t0:2137_11: Dātumasakkonto mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā uparipaccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi labhatī’ti avisesena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2137_12: senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana ‘agilānassa sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti dvayameva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2137_13: Gilānassa bimbohanāni santharitvā upari ca paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi vaṭṭatī’ti vuttattā gilānoyeva
tika-vin08t0:2137_14: mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2137_15: Abhinissāya nisīditunti apassāya nisīditu”nti ettako vinicchayo sāratthadīpaniyaṃ āgato.
tika-vin08t0:2138_3: Caturaṅgulato hi ūnāni kira uddalomīādīsu pavisanti.
tika-vin08t0:2138_4: Vānacitro uṇṇāmayattharaṇoti nānāvaṇṇehi uṇṇāmayasuttehi bhitticchedādivasena vāyitvā katacittattharaṇo.
tika-vin08t0:2138_10: Koseyyakaṭṭissamayanti kosiyasuttānaṃ antarā suvaṇṇamayasuttāni pavesetvā vītaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2138_11: suvaṇṇasuttaṃ kira kaṭṭissaṃ kasaṭanti ca vuccati.
tika-vin08t0:2139_0: Ajinamigacammānaṃ atisukhumattā dupaṭṭatipaṭṭāni katvā sibbantīti vuttaṃ “ajinappaveṇī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2139_2: Yaṃ pana nānāvaṇṇaṃ vānacittaṃ vā lepacittaṃ vā,
tika-vin08t0:2139_5: Citraṃ vāti idaṃ pana sabbathā kappiyattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2139_11: Sace pamāṇayuttantiādi aññassa pamāṇātikkantassa bimbohanassa paṭikkhittabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2139_13: taṃ pana upadhānaṃ uposathikānaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2139_14: Uccāsayanamahāsayanameva hi tadā tesaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2139_15: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathādīsu kiñcāpi “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni na vaṭṭantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2139_16: vinayaṭṭhakathā eva pana kappiyākappiyabhāve pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2141_0: Pāsādaparibhogakathāyaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vajirabuddhiṭīkāyañca na kiñci vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2141_2: Puggalikaṃ pana suvaṇṇādivicitraṃ bhikkhussa sampaṭicchitumeva na vaṭṭati ‘na kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabba’nti vuttattā.
tika-vin08t0:2141_3: Tenevettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘saṅghikavihāre vā puggalikavihāre vā’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2141_4: Gonakādiakappiyabhaṇḍavisaye eva vuttaṃ ekabhikkhussapi tesaṃ gahaṇe dosābhāvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2143_5: Sesamettha pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca suviññeyyamevā”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2143_11: Yaṃ pana cammassa duggandhāpanayanatthaṃ kāḷarattādirajanehi rañjitattā kāḷarattādivaṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2143_12: taṃ coḷādīhi apanetuṃ na sakkā cammagatikameva,
tika-vin08t0:2143_14: Khallakanti sabbapaṇhipidhānacammaṃ aparigaḷanatthaṃ paṇhiyā uparibhāge apidhāya āropanabandhanamattaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2143_16: na vaṇṇato sabbaso apanetabbesu khallakādīsu paviṭṭhattā.
tika-vin08t0:2143_19: Uṇṇāhi katapādukāti ettha uṇṇāmayakambalehi katapādukā saṅgayhanti.
tika-vin08t0:2143_21: Cammaṃ na vaṭṭatīti nisīdanattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2144_3: Cammaṃ na vaṭṭatīti yena pariyāyena cammaṃ vaṭṭissati,
tika-vin08t0:2144_11: sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu cammāni attharaṇānī’ti ettha anumatippasaṅgabhayā vuttanti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2146_7: hatthavaṭṭakanti evaṃ paccekaṃ vākyaparisamāpanaṃ adhippetanti āha “purisayuttaṃ itthisārathi vā…pe…
tika-vin08t0:2146_14: Sabbampi yānaṃ upāhanenapi gantuṃ asamatthassa gilānassa anuññāta”nti vimativinodaniyaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2148_9: Aggaḷaṃ tunnanti ettha uddharitvā allīyāpanakhaṇḍaṃ aggaḷaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2148_13: Daḷīkammanti anuddharitvāva upassayaṃ katvā allīyāpanakaṃ vatthakhaṇḍa”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2148_16: Uddharitvā allīyāpanakhaṇḍanti dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ apanetvā allīyāpanavatthakhaṇḍa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2150_0: Chinnacīvarakathāyaṃ tīsu pana cīvaresu dve vā ekaṃ vā chinditvā kātabbanti ettha “anujānāmi,
tika-vin08t0:2150_2: chinnakaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ chinnakaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ chinnakaṃ antaravāsaka”nti vacanato pañcakhaṇḍasattakhaṇḍādivasena chinditvāva kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2150_5: āgantukapaṭṭaṃ dātabbanti ettha yadi chinditvā kate tiṇṇampi cīvarānaṃ atthāya sāṭako nappahoti,
tika-vin08t0:2150_8: Dvīsu cīvaresu chinditvā katesu sāṭako nappahoti,
tika-vin08t0:2150_11: Ekasmimpi cīvare chinditvā kate sāṭako nappahoti,
tika-vin08t0:2150_12: evaṃ sati acchinditvā āgantukapaṭṭaṃ dātabbanti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2150_14: Tattha anvādhikampi āropetunti evaṃ appahonte sati āgantukapaṭṭampi āropetuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2152_0: Akappiyacīvarakathāyaṃ “naggiyaṃ kusacīraṃ phalakacīraṃ kesakambalaṃ vāḷakambalaṃ ulūkapakkhikaṃ ajinakkhipa”nti
tika-vin08t0:2152_10: Tāni titthiyaddhajabhūtāni acīvarabhāvena pākaṭānīti ācariyena idha na vuttāni.
tika-vin08t0:2152_11: Potthako pana apākaṭoti taṃ vatvā sabbanīlakādīni dukkaṭavatthukāni vuttāni.
tika-vin08t0:2152_12: “Tipaṭṭacīvarassa vā majjhe dātabbānī”ti vuttattā tipaṭṭacīvaraṃ dhāretuṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2152_13: Tipaṭṭādīnañca bahupaṭṭacīvarānaṃ antare īdisāni asāruppavaṇṇāni paṭapilotikāni kātabbānīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:2154_4: Yatra hi nāma mayā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānissati,
tika-vin08t0:2154_15: satthalūkhaṃ samaṇasāruppaṃ paccatthikānañca anabhicchita”nti vacanato “passasi tvaṃ, ānanda,
tika-vin08t0:2154_16: magadhakhettaṃ acchibaddhaṃ pāḷibaddhaṃ mariyādabaddhaṃ siṅghāṭakabaddha”nti bhagavato saṃkhittena vuttavacanaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2154_17: sutvā āyasmā ānando bhagavato ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃvidahi.
tika-vin08t0:2155_1: Pāḷibaddhanti āyāmato ca vitthārato ca dīghamariyādabaddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2155_3: Siṅghāṭakabaddhanti mariyādāya mariyādaṃ vinivijjhitvā gataṭṭhāne siṅghāṭakabaddhaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2155_6: Kusimpi nāmātiādīsu kusīti āyāmato ca vitthārato ca anuvātādīnaṃ dīghapaṭṭānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2155_8: Maṇḍalanti pañcakhaṇḍikassa cīvarassa ekekasmiṃ khaṇḍe mahāmaṇḍalaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2155_10: Vivaṭṭanti maṇḍalañca aḍḍhamaṇḍalañca ekato katvā sibbitaṃ majjhimakhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2155_11: Anuvivaṭṭanti tassa ubhosu passesu dve khaṇḍāni.
tika-vin08t0:2155_14: Gīvāṭṭhāne ca jaṅghaṭṭhāne ca paṭṭānametaṃ nāmanti.
tika-vin08t0:2155_17: Atha vā anuvivaṭṭanti vivaṭṭassa ekapassato dvinnaṃ ekapassato dvinnanti catunnampi khaṇḍānametaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2155_18: Bāhantanti suppamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ pārupantena saṃharitvā bāhāya upari ṭhapitā ubho antā bahimukhā tiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin08t0:2155_20: Ayameva hi nayo mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgato.
tika-vin08t0:2157_1: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū tattha tattha khīlaṃ nikkhanitvā sambandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbenti,
tika-vin08t0:2158_12: daṇḍakathinaṃ bidalakaṃ salākaṃ vinandhanarajjuṃ vinandhanasuttakaṃ vinandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbetunti.
tika-vin08t0:2159_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū adhotehi pādehi kathinaṃ akkamanti,
tika-vin08t0:2160_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū allehi pādehi kathinaṃ akkamanti,
tika-vin08t0:2161_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū saupāhanā kathinaṃ akkamanti,
tika-vin08t0:2162_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvaraṃ sibbantā aṅguliyā paṭiggaṇhanti,
tika-vin08t0:2163_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāvace paṭiggahe dhārenti suvaṇṇamayaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2163_1: Manussā ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti “seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2164_0: Tena kho pana samayena sūciyopi satthakāpi paṭiggahāpi nassanti.
tika-vin08t0:2165_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū abbhokāse cīvaraṃ sibbantā sītenapi uṇhenapi kilamanti.
tika-vin08t0:2165_30: ogumphetvā ullittāvalittaṃ kātuṃ setavaṇṇaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ gerukaparikammaṃ mālākammaṃ latākammaṃ makaradantakaṃ pañcapaṭikaṃ cīvararajjunti.
tika-vin08t0:2166_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cīvaraṃ sibbetvā tatheva kathinaṃ ujjhitvā pakkamanti,
tika-vin08t0:2167_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kuṭṭepi thambhepi kathinaṃ ussāpetvā pakkamanti,
tika-vin08t0:2168_2: Kathinarajjunti yāya dupaṭṭacīvaraṃ sibbantā kathine cīvaraṃ vibandhanti.
tika-vin08t0:2168_3: Kathinaṃ nappahotīti dīghassa bhikkhuno pamāṇena kataṃ kathinaṃ ittarassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ patthariyamānaṃ nappahoti,
tika-vin08t0:2168_6: Daṇḍakathinanti tassa majjhe ittarassa bhikkhuno pamāṇena aññaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2168_7: Bidalakanti daṇḍakathinappamāṇena kaṭasārakassa pariyante paṭisaṃharitvā duguṇakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2168_9: Vinandhanarajjunti mahānisseṇiyā saddhiṃ khuddakanisseṇiṃ vinandhituṃ rajjuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2168_11: Vinandhitvā cīvaraṃ sibbitunti tena suttakena tattha cīvaraṃ vinandhitvā sibbetuṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2168_15: Moghasuttakanti vaḍḍhakīnaṃ dārūsu kāḷasuttena viya haliddisuttena saññākaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2168_19: Uccavatthukanti paṃsuṃ ākiritvā uccavatthukaṃ kātuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2168_20: Ogumphetvā ullittāvalittaṃ kātunti chadanaṃ odhunitvā ghanadaṇḍakaṃ katvā anto ceva bahi ca mattikāya limpitunti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2168_21: Goghaṃsikāyāti veḷuṃ vā rukkhadaṇḍakaṃ vā anto katvā tena saddhiṃ saṃharitunti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2168_22: Bandhanarajjunti tathā saṃharitassa bandhanarajju”nti ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāpāṭho.
tika-vin08t0:2169_3: Yena kilañjādinā mahantaṃ kathinaṃ atthataṃ, tassa.
tika-vin08t0:2169_4: Tañhi daṇḍakathinappamāṇena pariyante saṃharitvā duguṇaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2169_8: Nīcavatthukaṃ cinitunti bahikuṭṭassa samantato nīcavatthukaṃ katvā cinitu”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2170_0: “Nisseṇimpīti catūhi daṇḍehi cīvarappamāṇena āyatacaturassaṃ katvā baddhapaṭalampi.
tika-vin08t0:2170_1: Ettha hi cīvarakoṭiyo samakaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ yathāsukhaṃ sibbanti.
tika-vin08t0:2170_2: Tattha attharitabbanti tassā nisseṇiyā upari cīvarassa upatthambhanatthāya attharitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2170_3: Kathinasaṅkhātāya nisseṇiyā cīvarassa bandhanakarajju kathinarajjūti majjhimapadalopī samāsoti āha “yāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:2170_4: Tattha yasmā dvinnaṃ paṭalānaṃ ekasmiṃ adhike jāte tattha valiyo honti,
tika-vin08t0:2170_5: tasmā dupaṭṭacīvarassa paṭaladvayampi samakaṃ katvā bandhanakarajju kathinarajjūti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2170_6: Pāḷiyaṃ kathinassa anto jīratīti kathine baddhassa cīvarassa pariyanto jīratī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2171_2: Yena kilañjādinā mahantaṃ kathinaṃ atthataṃ, tassa.
tika-vin08t0:2171_3: Tañhi daṇḍakathinappamāṇena pariyante saṃharitvā diguṇaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2171_4: aññathā khuddakacīvarassa anuvātaparibhaṇḍādividhānakaraṇe hatthassa okāso na hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2171_5: Salākāya sati dvinnaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ ñatvā sibbitāsibbitaṃ sukhaṃ paññāyati.
tika-vin08t0:2171_6: Daṇḍakathine kate na bahūhi sahāyehi payojanaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2171_9: ‘haliddisuttena saññākaraṇa’nti vuttattā ‘haliddisuttena cīvaraṃ sibbetumpi vaṭṭatī’ti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2173_9: santuṭṭhiṃ vaṇṇemī”ti vacanato asamādinnadhutaṅgo yo bhikkhu paṃsukūlaṃ dhāretuṃ icchati,
tika-vin08t0:2173_11: Yo pana gihīhi dinnaṃ gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyituṃ icchati,
tika-vin08t0:2173_14: paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti adhiṭṭhahanato gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2173_16: Itarītarenapīti appagghenapi mahagghenapi yena kenacīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2174_1: saddo pana aniyamavacano dvikkhattuṃ vuccamāno yaṃkiñci-
tika-vin08t0:2174_2: saddehi samānattho hotīti vuttaṃ appagghenapi mahagghenapi yena kenacī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2174_17: “Mahāpiṭṭhi kojavanti hatthipiṭṭhīsu attharitabbatāya ‘mahāpiṭṭhiya’nti laddhasamaññaṃ caturaṅgulapupphaṃ kojava”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2174_18: Vimativinodaniyampi “mahāpiṭṭhiyakojavanti hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ attharitabbatāya ‘mahāpiṭṭhiya’nti laddhasamaññaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2174_19: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ pana “mahāpiṭṭhiyakojavaṃ nāma atirekacaturaṅgulapupphaṃ kirā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2174_22: kambala”nti vacanato aḍḍhakāsiyādīni mahagghānipi kambalāni vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t0:2176_2: cha cīvarāni khomaṃ kappāsikaṃ koseyyaṃ kambalaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅga”nti vacanato khomādīni cha cīvarāni dukūlādīni cha anulomacīvarāni ca vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t0:2176_11: Dukūlaṃ paṭṭuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭaṃ cīnapaṭaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnanti imāni pana cha cīvarāni etesaṃyeva anulomānīti visuṃ na vuttāni.
tika-vin08t0:2176_16: Paṭṭuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā.
tika-vin08t0:2176_18: taṃ khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃ eva anulomaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2176_20: Kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jāliniyā devakaññāya anuruddhattherassa dinnavatthasadisaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2176_21: tampi khomādīnaṃyeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2177_8: Dukūlaṃ paṭṭuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭaṃ cīnapaṭaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnanti imāni cha cīvarāni etesaññeva anulomānīti visuṃ na vuttāni.
tika-vin08t0:2177_12: Paṭṭuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā.
tika-vin08t0:2177_15: devadinnañca khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃ sabbesaṃ anulomānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2179_2: cha rajanāni mūlarajanaṃ khandharajanaṃ tacarajanaṃ pattarajanaṃ puppharajanaṃ phalarajana”nti vacanato
tika-vin08t0:2179_3: imesu chasu rajanesu ekakena cīvaraṃ rajitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2179_4: na chakaṇena vā paṇḍumattikāya vā rajitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2179_11: rajanaṃ pacituṃ cullaṃ rajanakumbhi”nti vacanato sītudakāya cīvaraṃ na rajitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2179_16: uttarāḷumpaṃ bandhitu”nti vacanato uttarāḷumpaṃ bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2179_18: rajanakumbhiyā majjhe ṭhapetvā taṃ ādhārakaṃ parikkhipitvā rajanaṃ pakkhipituṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2179_20: Tattha “rajanakumbhiyā majjhe ṭhapetvāti antorajanakumbhiyā majjhe ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin08t0:2179_21: Evaṃ vaṭṭādhārake antorajanakumbhiyā pakkhitte majjhe udakaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin08t0:2179_24: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “evañhi kateti vaṭṭādhārassa anto rajanodakaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2179_26: Na uttaratīti kevalaṃ udakato pheṇuṭṭhānābhāvā na uttaratī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2180_2: udake vā nakhapiṭṭhikāya vā thevakaṃ dātu”nti vacanato tathā katvā rajanassa pakkāpakkabhāvo jānitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:2180_3: Tattha udake vā nakhapiṭṭhikāya vāti sace paripakkaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2180_4: udakapātiyā dinno thevo sahasā na visarati,
tika-vin08t0:2180_8: rajanuḷuṅkaṃ daṇḍakathālaka”nti vacanato rajanassa olokanakāle kumbhiyā rakkhaṇatthaṃ uḷuṅkadaṇḍakathālikāni icchitabbāni.
tika-vin08t0:2180_18: rajanadoṇika”nti vacanato pātiyampi patte cīvare maddante cīvarassa paribhijjanato cīvararakkhaṇatthaṃ rajanadoṇikā icchitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:2180_21: tiṇasantharaka”nti vacanato chamāya cīvare patthariyamāne cīvarassa paṃsukitattā tato rakkhaṇatthaṃ tiṇasantharaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2180_24: cīvaravaṃsaṃ cīvararajju”nti vacanato tiṇasanthārake upacikādīhi khajjamāne cīvaravaṃse vā cīvararajjuyā
tika-vin08t0:2180_25: vā cīvaraṃ pattharitabbaṃ majjhena cīvare laggite rajanassa ubhato gaḷitattā.
tika-vin08t0:2181_2: kaṇṇe bandhitu”nti vacanato kaṇṇe bandhitabbaṃ cīvarassa kaṇṇe bandhiyamāne kaṇṇassa jiṇṇattā.
tika-vin08t0:2181_5: kaṇṇasuttaka”nti vacanato kaṇṇasuttakena bandhitabbaṃ evaṃ bandhante rajanassa ekato gaḷitattā.
tika-vin08t0:2181_9: na ca acchinne theve pakkamitu”nti vacanato tathā rajitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2181_14: udake osāretu”nti vacanato patthinnaṃ cīvaraṃ udake osāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2181_17: Rajane pana nikkhante taṃ udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā cīvaraṃ madditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2181_20: pāṇinā ākoṭetu”nti vacanato pharusaṃ cīvaraṃ pāṇinā ākoṭetabbaṃ. “Na,
tika-vin08t0:2181_24: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato acchinnakāni cīvarāni dantakāsāvāni na dhāretabbāni.
tika-vin08t0:2181_25: Tattha dantakāsāvānīti ekaṃ vā dve vā vāre rajitvā dantavaṇṇāni dhārenti.
tika-vin08t0:2183_4: yathādhammo kāretabbo”ti vacanato niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ ubbhatasmiṃ kathine dasāhato paraṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhārentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2183_7: dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretu”nti vacanato ubbhatepi kathine dasāhabbhantare dhārentassa atthatakathinānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2183_8: anubbhatepi kathine pañcamāsabbhantare tato parampi dasāhabbhantare anatthatakathinānampi dasāhabbhantare
tika-vin08t0:2183_12: atirekacīvaraṃ vikappetu”nti vacanato dasāhato paraṃ vikappetvā atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2183_16: āyāmena aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ sugataṅgulena caturaṅgulavitthataṃ pacchimaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetu”nti vacanato sabbantimena
tika-vin08t0:2183_17: paricchedena sugataṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulāyāmaṃ caturaṅgulavitthāraṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2183_18: Tattha sugataṅgulaṃ nāma majjhimapurisaṅgulasaṅkhātena vaḍḍhakīaṅgulena tivaṅgulaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2183_20: tasmā dīghato vaḍḍhakīhatthena ekahatthaṃ pakatihatthena diyaḍḍhahatthaṃ vitthārato vaḍḍhakīhatthena
tika-vin08t0:2183_21: vidatthippamāṇaṃ pakatihatthena chaḷaṅgulādhikavidatthippamāṇaṃ pacchimaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2185_2: vassikasāṭikaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ gamikabhattaṃ gilānabhattaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ gilānabhesajjaṃ dhuvayāguṃ
tika-vin08t0:2185_3: bhikkhunisaṅghassa udakasāṭika”nti vacanato imāni aṭṭha dānāni sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2185_4: Tattha nikkhittacīvarā hutvā kāyaṃ ovassantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ naggiyaṃ asuci jegucchaṃ paṭikūlaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2185_10: gamiko bhikkhu attano bhattaṃ pariyesamāno satthā vā vihāyissati,
tika-vin08t0:2185_15: Gilānassa bhikkhuno sappāyāni bhojanāni alabhantassa ābādho vā abhivaḍḍhissati,
tika-vin08t0:2185_18: Gilānupaṭṭhāko bhikkhu attano bhattaṃ pariyesamāno gilānassa ussūre bhattaṃ nīharissati,
tika-vin08t0:2185_20: Gilānassa bhikkhuno sappāyāni bhesajjāni alabhantassa ābādho vā abhivaḍḍhissati,
tika-vin08t0:2185_23: Yasmā bhagavatā andhakavinde dasānisaṃse sampassamānena yāgu anuññātā,
tika-vin08t0:2185_25: Yasmā mātugāmassa naggiyaṃ asuci jegucchaṃ paṭikūlaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2187_2: kāyaguttiyā cīvaraguttiyā senāsanaguttiyā nisīdana”nti vacanato kāyādīnaṃ asucimuccanādito gopanatthāya nisīdanaṃ dhāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2187_7: tāvamahantaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ kātu”nti vacanato atikhuddakena nisīdanena senāsanassa agopanattā mahantampi paccattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2187_10: yassa kaṇḍu vā pīḷakā vā assāvo vā thullakacchu vā ābādho,
tika-vin08t0:2187_11: kaṇḍupaṭicchādi”nti vacanato īdisesu ābādhesu santesu cīvarādiguttatthāya kaṇḍupaṭicchādi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2187_19: parikkhāracoḷaka”nti vacanato ticīvare paripuṇṇe parissāvanathavikādīhi atthe sati parikkhāracoḷaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2187_23: vassikasāṭikaṃ vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2187_26: kaṇḍupaṭicchādiṃ yāva ābādhā adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetuṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2187_28: parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti vacanato vuttanayena adhiṭṭhānañca vikappanā ca kātabbā.
tika-vin08t0:2189_3: dukkaṭassāti idaṃ “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū saṅghamajjhe adhammakammaṃ karonti.
tika-vin08t0:2189_8: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti imaṃ uposathakkhandhake āgatapāṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2189_14: Tattha karontiyevāti paññattampi sikkhāpadaṃ madditvā adhammakammaṃ karontiyevāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2189_16: paṭikkositu”nti evaṃ adhammakamme kayiramāne sati “pesalehi bhikkhūhi taṃ adhammakammaṃ akataṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2189_17: kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabba”nti evaṃ paṭikkositabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2189_19: Iti vacanatoti idaṃ pana pubbapāṭhaṃ gahetvā iti vacanato.
tika-vin08t0:2189_20: Adhammakammaṃ na kātabbanti aparapāṭhaṃ gahetvā iti vacanato kayiramānañca adhammakammaṃ bhikkhūhi nivāretabbanti dvidhā yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin08t0:2190_0: Nivārentehi cātiādi pana “tena kho pana samayena pesalā bhikkhū chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi adhammakamme kayiramāne paṭikkosanti,
tika-vin08t0:2190_7: diṭṭhimpi āvikātu”nti pāṭhañca “tesaṃyeva santike diṭṭhiṃ āvikaronti,
tika-vin08t0:2190_16: ekena adhiṭṭhātuṃ na metaṃ khamatī”ti ime pāṭhe sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2190_17: Vacanatoti idaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ tīṇi sampadānāni gahetvā tīhi kiriyāpadehi visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2190_23: Tena vuttaṃ vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “tesaṃ anupaddavatthāyāti saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ na karoti,
tika-vin08t0:2192_3: anokāsakatotiādi “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā codenti.
tika-vin08t0:2192_13: ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo”ti idaṃ pāṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2192_23: Iti paraṃ codentānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adhippāyabhedo anekavidho hotīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2192_24: Purimesu catūsu adhippāyesūti cāvanādhippāyaakkosādhippāyakammādhippāyavuṭṭhānādhippāyesu okāsaṃ akārāpentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2193_0: “Ṭhapanakkhettaṃ pana jānitabba”nti vatvā taṃ dassento “suṇātu me”tiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:2193_1: Anuvijjakassa anuvijjanādhippāyena vadantassa okāsakammaṃ natthīti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:2193_2: Dhammakathikassa anodissa kammaṃ kathentassa okāsakammaṃ natthi.
tika-vin08t0:2195_10: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato dāyakehi saddhāya bhikkhussa dinnaṃ vinipātetvā gihīnaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati. “Na ca,
tika-vin08t0:2195_13: Mātāpitaro pana sace rajje ṭhitāpi patthayanti,
tika-vin08t0:2195_14: dātabba”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā bhātubhaginīādīnaṃ ñātakānampi dātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2197_0: Labbhaṃ pitūnaṃ sesānaṃ, ñātīnampi na labbhatī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2198_0: Kayavikkayasamāpattisikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyampi “mātaraṃ pana pitaraṃ vā ‘imaṃ dehī’ti vadato viññatti na hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2198_4: ‘Iminā imaṃ dehī’ti kayavikkayaṃ āpajjato nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2198_5: Tattha “sesañātakesu saddhādeyyavinipātasambhavato tadabhāvaṭṭhānampi dassetuṃ ‘mātaraṃ pana pitaraṃ vā’ti vutta”nti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2200_4: “antare vāsako antaravāsako”ti vattabbe “rūpabhavo rūpa”ntiādīsu viya uttarapadalopīsamāsavasena “antaro”ti vutto.
tika-vin08t0:2200_11: Atha vā saha antarena ca uttarena ca yo vattatīti santaruttaro,
tika-vin08t0:2200_13: Saṅghāṭiṃ ṭhapetvā antaravāsakauttarāsaṅgamattadharo hutvā gāmo na pavisitabboti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2200_15: tasmā antaravāsakaṃ timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā saṅghāṭiñca
tika-vin08t0:2200_16: uttarāsaṅgañca diguṇaṃ katvā pārupitvā gāmo pavisitabbo.
tika-vin08t0:2202_5: saṅghāṭiṃ aggahetvā vihāre ṭhapetvā gamanāya pañca kāraṇāni hontīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2202_6: Gilāno vā hotīti gahetvā gantuṃ asamattho gilāno vā hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2202_7: Vassikasaṅketaṃ vā hotīti “vassikakālo aya”nti saṅketaṃ vā kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2202_8: Nadīpāragataṃ vā hotīti nadiyā pāraṃ gantvā bhuñjitabbaṃ hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2202_9: Aggaḷaguttivihāro vā hotīti aggaḷaṃ datvāpi dātabbo suguttavihāro vā hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2202_10: Atthatakathinaṃ vā hotīti tasmiṃ vihāre kathinaṃ atthataṃ vā hoti atthatakathinānaṃ asamādānacārasambhavato.
tika-vin08t0:2202_12: Āraññikassa pana vihāro na sugutto hotīti appabhikkhukattā corādīnaṃ gamanaṭṭhānato ca.
tika-vin08t0:2204_1: Satthakammavatthikammakathāyaṃ satthakammaṃ vā vatthikammaṃ vāti ettha yena kenaci satthādinā chindanādi satthakammaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2204_2: Yena kenaci cammādinā vatthipīḷanaṃ vatthikammaṃ nāma.
tika-vin08t0:2204_4: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “vatthipīḷananti yathā vatthigatatelādi antosarīre ārohanti,
tika-vin08t0:2205_1: bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā ca passāvamaggepi anulomato dahanaṃ paṭikkhepābhāvā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2205_9: Tena sambādhassa sāmantā dvaṅgulaṃ paṭikkhipitabbaṃ nāma satthavatthikammato uddhaṃ natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:2205_15: Ettha ‘satthaṃ nāma satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyā’tiādīsu viya yena chindati,
tika-vin08t0:2205_18: Khārudānaṃ panettha bhikkhunīvibhaṅge pasākhe pamukhe anuññātanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2205_19: eke pana ‘satthakammaṃ vā’ti pāṭhaṃ vikappetvā vatthikammaṃ karonti.
tika-vin08t0:2205_22: tāya chindanaṃ vatthikammaṃ nāmāti ca atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti,
tika-vin08t0:2205_23: te ‘satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyā’ti imassa padabhājanīyaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā.
tika-vin08t0:2207_2: pubbe nahāpito hutvā idāni bhikkhubhūtoti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2207_14: tasmā nahāpitapubbena vā anahāpitapubbena vā pabbajitena nāma akappiyasamādapanaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2207_15: Nahāpitapubbena pana bhikkhunā khurena abhilakkhitaṃ khurabhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2207_20: pabbajitena akappiye samādapetabbanti vuttattā anupasampannassapi na kevalaṃ dasasu eva sikkhāpadesu,
tika-vin08t0:2207_21: atha kho yaṃ bhikkhussa na kappati,
tika-vin08t0:2209_3: Bhāgaṃ datvāti mūlabhāgasaṅkhātaṃ dasamabhāgaṃ bhūmisāmikānaṃ datvā.
tika-vin08t0:2209_4: Paribhuñjitabbānīti tesaṃ bījānaṃ phalāni ropakehi paribhuñjitabbānīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2209_6: Idaṃ kira jambudīpe porāṇakacārittanti ādikappakāle paṭhamakappikā manussā bodhisattaṃ mahāsammataṃ nāma
tika-vin08t0:2209_7: rājānaṃ katvā sabbepi attano attano taṇḍulaphalasālikhettato pavattataṇḍulaphalāni dasa koṭṭhāse katvā
tika-vin08t0:2209_8: ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ bhūmisāmikabhūtassa mahāsammatarājino datvā paribhuñjiṃsu.
tika-vin08t0:2209_9: Tato paṭṭhāya jambudīpikānaṃ manussānaṃ cāritattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2209_10: Teneva sāratthadīpanīnāmikāyampi vinayaṭīkāyaṃ “dasabhāgaṃ datvāti dasamabhāgaṃ datvā.
tika-vin08t0:2209_11: Tenevāha ‘dasa koṭṭhāse katvā eko koṭṭhāso bhūmisāmikānaṃ dātabbo’ti” vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2211_2: bhikkhave”tiādi bhaddiyanagare amitaparibhogabhūtena meṇḍakaseṭṭhinā abhiyācito hutvā anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2211_5: pañca gorase khīraṃ dadhiṃ takkaṃ navanītaṃ sappi”nti pañca gorasā anuññātā.
tika-vin08t0:2211_6: Tato paraṃ seṭṭhino abhiyācanānurūpaṃ vatvā anujānituṃ “santi,
tika-vin08t0:2211_10: Tathā alabhantena aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato yācitvāpi gahetabbanti etena evarūpesu kālesu viññattipaccayā doso natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:2211_11: “Ekadivasena gamanīye magge ekabhattatthāya pariyesitabba”nti vuttattā pana tato upari yācanaṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassitaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2211_12: “Dīghe addhāne”tiādinā sace māsagamanīye magge sattāhagamanīyo eva kantāro hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2211_14: tato paraṃ piṇḍacārikādivasena subhikkhasulabhapiṇḍamaggattā na pariyesitabbanti.
tika-vin08t0:2214_4: Paṭṭuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā.
tika-vin08t0:2214_6: taṃ khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃyeva anulomaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2214_8: taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jāliniyā devakaññāya anuruddhattherassa dinnavatthasadisaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2214_9: tampi khomādīnaṃyeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato.
tika-vin08t0:2214_10: Dve paṭāni desanāmena vuttānīti tesaṃ sarūpadassanamattametaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2214_15: Kilañjacchattanti veḷuvilīvehi vāyitvā katachatta”nti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2215_1: Āmāni pana anupasampannehi sītudake madditvā parissāvetvā dinnapānaṃ pacchābhattampi kappati eva.
tika-vin08t0:2215_2: Ayañca attho mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sarūpato avuttoti āha ‘kurundiyaṃ panā’tiādi.
tika-vin08t0:2215_3: Ucchuraso nikasaṭoti idaṃ pātabbatāsāmaññena yāmakālikakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2215_5: Ime cattāro rasāti phalapattapupphaucchurasā cattāro”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2217_0: Saṃsaṭṭhakathāyaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ kāle kappatītiādi sabbaṃ sambhinnarasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2217_1: Sace hi challimpi apanetvā sakaleneva nāḷikeraphalena saddhiṃ pānakaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2217_12: taṃ taṃ ekato paṭiggahitampi yathā suddhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2217_13: tathā dhovitvā vā tacchetvā vā tassa tassa kālassa vasena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2218_2: Yāvakālikañhi attanā saddhiṃ sambhinnarasāni tīṇipi yāmakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti.
tika-vin08t0:2218_3: Yāmakālikaṃ dvepi sattāhakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti.
tika-vin08t0:2218_4: Sattāhakālikaṃ attanā saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ attano sabhāvaññeva upaneti,
tika-vin08t0:2218_5: tasmā tena tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhiṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā purepaṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ sattāhaṃ kappati,
tika-vin08t0:2218_10: yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahita”nti avatvā “paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhaṃ kappatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2219_1: Imesu ca pana catūsu kālikesu yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikanti idameva dvayaṃ antovutthakañceva sannidhikārakañca hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2221_2: tāni pañca bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāgupi pītā uggacchati,
tika-vin08t0:2221_4: te tena kisā honti lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā.
tika-vin08t0:2221_11: tāni bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2221_17: Āhāratthañca phareyyāti āhāratthaṃ sādheyyā”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2221_18: Vimativinodaniyaṃ “pittaṃ koṭṭhabbhantaragataṃ hotīti bahisarīre byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ abaddhapittaṃ koṭṭhabbhantaragataṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2221_19: tena pittaṃ kupitaṃ hotīti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2222_0: Vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ “yaṃ bhesajjañceva assāti parato ‘tadubhayena bhiyyosomattāya kisā hontī’tiādinā
tika-vin08t0:2222_7: na ca oḷāriko āhāro paññāyeyyā’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2222_8: Tathā hi kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitunti ettha ca kālaparicchedo na kato,
tika-vin08t0:2222_9: kutoyeva pana labbhā tadaññāpekkhādhippāyo bhagavatā mūlabhesajjādīni tāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvanti kālaparicchedo.
tika-vin08t0:2222_12: tāni bhesajjāni kāle paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjitu’nti vacanaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2222_13: taṃ ‘sannidhiṃ katvā aparāparasmiṃ divase kāle eva paribhuñjituṃ anujānāmī’ti adhippāyato vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2222_14: Aññathā atisayattā bhagavato ‘yaṃ bhesajjañceva assā’tiādivitakkuppādo na sambhavati.
tika-vin08t0:2222_15: Paṇītabhojanānumatiyā pasiddhattā ābādhānurūpasappāyāpekkhāya vuttānīti ce? Tañca na,
tika-vin08t0:2222_18: tathā navanītaṃ upādāya sappīti vattabbato navanītaṃ visuṃ na vattabbanti ce?
tika-vin08t0:2222_20: Yathā phāṇitaggahaṇena siddhepi parato ucchuraso visuṃ anuññāto ucchusāmaññato guḷodakaṭṭhāne ṭhapanādhippāyato,
tika-vin08t0:2222_21: tathā navanīte visesavidhidassanādhippāyato navanītaṃ visuṃ anuññātanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2222_23: Vuttañhi tattha ‘pacitvā sappiṃ katvā paribhuñjitukāmena adhotampi pacituṃ vaṭṭatī’ti.
tika-vin08t0:2224_2: tāni pañca bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā kālepi vikālepi paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato “tāni pañca bhesajjāni kāle
tika-vin08t0:2224_3: paṭiggahetvā kāle paribhuñjantānaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yānipi tāni pākatikāni lūkhāni bhojanāni,
tika-vin08t0:2224_6: Te tena ceva sāradikena ābādhena phuṭṭhā iminā ca bhattācchādakena tadubhayena bhiyyosomattāya kisā hontī”ti
tika-vin08t0:2224_7: imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ kālepi vikālepīti anuññātattā vikālepi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2224_12: ṭīkāsu pana “nacchādentīti ruciṃ na uppādentī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2224_13: mahāvibhaṅge pana “yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjāni.
tika-vin08t0:2224_17: taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti vacanato imesaṃ pañcabhesajjānaṃ sattāhakālikabhāvo veditabbo,
tika-vin08t0:2226_2: vasāni bhesajjāni acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ susukāvasaṃ sūkaravasaṃ gadrabhavasaṃ kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle
tika-vin08t0:2226_21: Tattha “kāle paṭiggahitantiādīsu majjhanhike avītivatte paṭiggahetvā pacitvā parissāvetvā cāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2226_22: Telaparibhogena paribhuñjitunti sattāhakālikatelaparibhogena paribhuñjitu”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2226_23: ṭīkāsu pana “susukāti samudde bhavā ekā macchajāti,
tika-vin08t0:2228_3: haliddiṃ siṅgiveraṃ vacaṃ vacattaṃ ativisaṃ kaṭukarohiṇiṃ usīraṃ bhaddamuttakaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2228_4: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
tika-vin08t0:2230_2: nisadaṃ nisadapotaka”nti vacanato pisitehi cuṇṇakatehi mūlabhesajjehi atthe sati nisadañca nisadapotakañca pariharituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2230_3: Tattha nisadaṃ nisadapotakanti pisanasilā ca pisanapoto ca.
tika-vin08t0:2230_4: Nisadanti pisanti cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karonti mūlabhesajjādayo etthāti nisadaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2230_6: Nisadanti pisanti cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karonti mūlabhesajjādayo etenāti nisadaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2232_2: kasāvāni bhesajjāni nimbakasāvaṃ kuṭajakasāvaṃ paṭolakasāvaṃ phaggavakasāvaṃ nattamālakasāvaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2232_3: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi kasāvāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
tika-vin08t0:2232_7: asati paccaye paribhuñjantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato tānipi kasāvabhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2232_11: “Kasāvehīti tacādīni udake tāpetvā gahitaūsarehī”ti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2234_2: paṇṇāni bhesajjāni nimbapaṇṇaṃ kuṭajapaṇṇaṃ paṭolapaṇṇaṃ nattamālapaṇṇaṃ phaggavapaṇṇaṃ sulasipaṇṇaṃ kappāsapaṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2234_3: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi paṇṇāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
tika-vin08t0:2234_7: asati paccaye paribhuñjantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato khādanīyabhojanīyatthaṃ apharantāni tānipi paṇṇāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2234_11: tasmā idha yaṃ yaṃ pubbe avuttaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2236_2: phalāni bhesajjāni biḷaṅgaṃ pippaliṃ maricaṃ harītakaṃ vibhītakaṃ āmalakaṃ goṭṭhaphalaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2236_3: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi phalāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
tika-vin08t0:2236_7: asati paccaye paribhuñjantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato khādanīyabhojanīyatthaṃ apharantāni tāni phalāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2238_2: jatūni bhesajjāni hiṅguṃ hiṅgujatuṃ hiṅgusipāṭikaṃ takaṃ takapattiṃ takapaṇṇiṃ sajjulasaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2238_3: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi jatūni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
tika-vin08t0:2238_7: asati paccaye paribhuñjantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato tāni jatūni bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2239_8: Sati paccayeti ettha satipaccayatā gilānāgilānavasena dvidhā veditabbā.
tika-vin08t0:2239_9: Vikālabhojanasikkhāpadassa hi anāpattivāre yāmakālikādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi avisesena satipaccayatā vuttā.
tika-vin08t0:2241_2: loṇāni bhesajjāni sāmuddikaṃ kāḷaloṇaṃ sindhavaṃ ubbhidaṃ bilaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2241_3: yāni vā panaññānipi atthi loṇāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti,
tika-vin08t0:2241_7: asati paccaye paribhuñjantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato tāni loṇāni paṭiggahetvā yāvajīvaṃ pariharituṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2241_9: Tattha sāmuddanti samuddatīre vālukaṃ viya santiṭṭhati.
tika-vin08t0:2243_2: yassa kaṇḍu vā pīḷakā vā assāvo vā thullakacchu vā ābādho kāyo vā duggandho cuṇṇāni bhesajjāni,
tika-vin08t0:2243_7: “Kāyo vā duggandhoti kassaci assādīnaṃ viya kāyagandho hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2243_8: tassapi sirīsakosumbādicuṇṇāni vā gandhacuṇṇāni vā sabbāni vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t0:2243_11: pākatikacuṇṇampi koṭṭetvā udakena temetvā nhāyituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2243_15: Tena ṭhapetvā gandhacuṇṇaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2243_21: Tena ṭhapetvā gandhacuṇṇaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2243_24: cuṇṇacālini”nti vacanato gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cuṇṇehi bhesajjehi cālitehi atthe sati cuṇṇacālinī vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2243_27: dussacālini”nti vacanato saṇhehi cuṇṇehi atthe sati dussacālinī vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2245_2: amanussikābādhe āmakamaṃsaṃ āmakamaṃsalohita”nti vacanato yassa bhikkhuno āmakamaṃsaṃ khāditassa āmakalohitaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2245_6: āmakalohitañca pivīti na taṃ bhikkhu khādi, na pivi,
tika-vin08t0:2245_7: amanusso khāditvā ca pivitvā ca pakkanto.
tika-vin08t0:2247_2: añjanaṃ kāḷañjanaṃ rasañjanaṃ sotañjanaṃ gerukaṃ kapalla”nti vacanato bhikkhūnaṃ cakkhuroge sati añjanādīni vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t0:2247_13: candanaṃ tagaraṃ kāḷānusāriyaṃ tālīsaṃ bhaddamuttaka”nti vacanato añjanūpapisanehi atthe sati imāni candanādīni vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t0:2247_18: Na hi kiñci añjanūpapisanaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ṭīkāyaṃ pana “añjanūpapisananti añjanatthāya upapisitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci cuṇṇajātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2247_19: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “pāḷiyaṃ añjanūpapisananti añjane upanetuṃ pisitabbabhesajja”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2248_9: aṭṭhimayaṃ dantamayaṃ visāṇamayaṃ naḷamayaṃ veḷumayaṃ kaṭṭhamayaṃ jatumayaṃ lohamayaṃ saṅkhanābhimaya”nti vacanato etāni kappiyāni.
tika-vin08t0:2249_5: suttakena bandhitvā añjaniyā bandhitu”nti vacanato apidhānaṃ suttakena bandhitvā añjaniyā bandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2249_8: suttakena sibbetu”nti vacanato apatanatthāya añjanīsuttakena sibbetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2249_24: taṃ susiradaṇḍakaṃ vā thavikaṃ vā anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2249_30: aṃsabaddhakaṃ bandhanasuttaka”nti vacanato añjanitthavikāya aṃse lagganatthāya aṃsabaddhakampi bandhanasuttakampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2251_2: muddhani telaka”nti vacanato sīsābhitāpassa bhikkhuno muddhani telaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2251_5: natthukamma”nti vacanato nakkhamanīye sati natthukammaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2251_8: natthukaraṇi”nti vacanato natthuyā agaḷanatthaṃ natthukaraṇī vaṭṭati. “Na,
tika-vin08t0:2251_19: yamakanatthukaraṇi”nti vacanato natthu visamaṃ āsiñcayanti ce,
tika-vin08t0:2251_21: Tattha yamakanatthukaraṇinti samaso tāhi dvīhi panāḷikāhi ekaṃ natthukaraṇiṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2253_2: dhūmaṃ pātu”nti vacanato yamakanatthukaraṇiyā nakkhamanīye sati dhūmaṃ pātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2253_5: dhūmanetta”nti vacanato tameva vaṭṭiṃ ālimbetvā pivanapaccayā kaṇṭhe dahantena dhūmanettadhūmo pivitabbo. “Na,
tika-vin08t0:2253_13: saṅkhanābhimaya”nti vacanato etāni eva dhūmanettāni dhāretabbāni.
tika-vin08t0:2253_19: yamakatthavika”nti vacanato ekato ghaṃsiyamāne sati yamakatthavikaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2253_22: aṃsabaddhakaṃ bandhanasuttaka”nti vacanato dhūmanettatthavikassa aṃsabaddhabandhanasuttaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2255_2: telapāka”nti vacanato vātābādhe sati telapāko vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2255_5: telapākanti yaṃ kiñci bhesajjapakkhittaṃ sabbaṃ anuññātameva hoti. “Na,
tika-vin08t0:2255_12: yasmiṃ telapāke majjassa na vaṇṇo na gandho na raso paññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:2255_13: evarūpaṃ majjapakkhittaṃ telaṃ pātu”nti vacanato yasmiṃ telapāke pakkhittassa majjassa vaṇṇo vā gandho vā raso vā na paññāyati,
tika-vin08t0:2255_19: abbhañjanaṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti vacanato atipakkhittamajjattā apivitabbe tele sati abbhañjanaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2255_22: tīṇi tumbāni lohatumbaṃ kaṭṭhatumbaṃ phalatumba”nti vacanato telapakkabhājanāni imāni tīṇi tumbāni vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t0:2257_2: sedakamma”nti vacanato aṅgavāte sati sedakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2257_7: sambhāraseda”nti vacanato sedakammena nakkhamanīye sati sambhārasedaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2257_12: mahāseda”nti vacanato sambhārasedanakkhamanīye sati mahāsedaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2257_14: porisappamāṇaṃ āvāṭaṃ aṅgārānaṃ pūretvā paṃsuvālikādīhi pidahitvā tattha nānāvidhāni vātaharaṇapaṇṇāni
tika-vin08t0:2257_15: santharitvā telamakkhitena gattena tattha nipajjitvā samparivattantena sarīraṃ sedetuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2257_19: bhaṅgodaka”nti vacanato mahāsedena nakkhamanīye sati bhaṅgodakaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2257_21: tehi paṇṇehi ca udakena ca siñcitvā siñcitvā sedetabbo.
tika-vin08t0:2257_25: udakakoṭṭhaka”nti vacanato bhaṅgodakena nakkhamanīye sati udakakoṭṭhakaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2257_26: Tattha udakakoṭṭhakanti udakakoṭṭhe cāṭiṃ vā doṇiṃ vā uṇhodakassa pūretvā tattha pavisitvā sedakammakaraṇaṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2259_2: lohitaṃ mocetu”nti vacanato pabbavāte sati lohitaṃ mocetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2259_3: Tattha pabbavāto hotīti pabbe pabbe vāto vijjhati.
tika-vin08t0:2261_2: pādabbhañjana”nti vacanato pādesu phalitesu pādabbhañjanaṃ pacitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2261_6: pajjaṃ abhisaṅkharitu”nti vacanato pādabbhañjanatelena nakkhamanīye sati pajjaṃ abhisaṅkharitabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2261_7: Tattha pajjaṃ abhisaṅkharitunti yena phalitapādā pākatikā honti,
tika-vin08t0:2261_8: taṃ nāḷikerādīsu nānābhesajjāni pakkhipitvā pajjaṃ abhisaṅkharituṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2263_2: satthakamma”nti vacanato gaṇḍābādhe sati satthakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2263_5: kasāvodaka”nti vacanato kasāvodakena atthe sati kasāvodakaṃ dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2263_8: tilakakka”nti vacanato tilakakkena atthe sati tilakakkaṃ dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2263_10: “Anujānāmi bhikkhave kabaḷika”nti vacanato kabaḷikāya atthe sati kabaḷikā dātabbā.
tika-vin08t0:2263_14: vaṇabandhanacoḷa”nti vacanato vaṇabandhanacoḷena atthe sati vaṇabandhanacoḷaṃ dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2263_17: sāsapakuṭṭena phositu”nti vacanato sace vaṇo kuṇḍavatī,
tika-vin08t0:2264_2: dhūmaṃ kātu”nti vacanato yadi vaṇo kilijjittha,
tika-vin08t0:2264_6: loṇasakkharikāya chinditu”nti vacanato yadi vaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin08t0:2264_8: Tattha vaḍḍhamaṃsanti adhikamaṃsaṃ āṇī viya uṭṭhahati.
tika-vin08t0:2264_12: vaṇatela”nti vacanato yadi vaṇo na ruhati,
tika-vin08t0:2264_16: vikāsikaṃ sabbaṃ vaṇapaṭikamma”nti vacanato yadi telaṃ gaḷati,
tika-vin08t0:2264_20: Sabbaṃ vaṇapaṭikammanti yaṃ kiñci vaṇapaṭikammaṃ nāma atthi,
tika-vin08t0:2265_0: Sāmaṃ gahetvāti idaṃ na kevalaṃ sappadaṭṭhasseva,
tika-vin08t0:2265_1: aññasmimpi daṭṭhavise sati sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2267_2: gūthaṃ pāyetu”nti vacanato pītavisaṃ bhikkhuṃ gūthaṃ pāyetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2267_7: na puna paṭiggahetabbo”ti vacanato tadeva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2267_8: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana na puna paṭiggahetabboti sace bhūmippatto,
tika-vin08t0:2269_2: sītāloḷiṃ pāyetu”nti vacanato gharadinnakābādhassa bhikkhuno sītāloḷiṃ pāyetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2269_4: Ṭīkāyaṃ pana “gharadinnakābādho nāma vasīkaraṇatthāya gharaṇiyā dinnabhesajjasamuṭṭhito ābādho.
tika-vin08t0:2269_6: saddo cettha abhedena gharaṇiyā vattamāno adhippeto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2269_7: Vimativinodaniyampi “gharadinnakābādho nāma gharaṇiyā dinnavasīkaraṇabhesajjasamuṭṭhito ābādho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2269_8: Sītāloḷinti naṅgalena kasantassa phāle laggamattikaṃ udakena āloḷetvā pāyetuṃ anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2271_2: āmisakhāraṃ pāyetu”nti vacanato duṭṭhagahaṇikassa bhikkhuno āmisakhāraṃ pāyetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2271_5: Āmisakhāranti sukkhodanaṃ jhāpetvā tāya chārikāya paggharitaṃ khārodakaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2271_6: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “tāya chārikāya paggharitaṃ khārodakanti parissāvane taṃ chārikaṃ pakkhipitvā
tika-vin08t0:2271_7: udake abhisiñcite tato chārikato heṭṭhā paggharitaṃ khārodaka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2273_2: muttaharītakaṃ pāyetu”nti vacanato paṇḍurogābādhassa bhikkhuno muttaharītakaṃ pāyetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2275_2: gandhālepaṃ kātu”nti vacanato chavidosābādhassa bhikkhuno gandhālepaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2277_2: virecanaṃ pātu”nti vacanato abhisannakāyassa bhikkhuno virecanaṃ pātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2277_14: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana vimativinodaniyañca “akaṭayūsenāti anabhisaṅkhatena muggayūsenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2277_20: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vimativinodaniyañca “kaṭākaṭenāti mugge pacitvā acāletvāva parissāvitena muggayūsenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2279_3: agilānassa udakasambhinnaṃ pānaparibhogena paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato gilānena bhikkhunā loṇasovīrakaṃ pātabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2280_0: Tattha loṇasovīrakaṃ nāma sabbarasābhisaṅkhataṃ ekaṃ bhesajjaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2280_1: taṃ kira karonto harītakāmalakavibhītakakasāve sabbadhaññāni sabbaaparaṇṇāni sattannampi dhaññānaṃ odanaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2280_2: kadaliphalādīni sabbaphalāni vettaketakakhajjūrikaḷīrādayo sabbakaḷīre macchamaṃsakhaṇḍāni anekāni ca
tika-vin08t0:2280_3: madhuphāṇitasindhavaloṇatikaṭukādīni bhesajjāni pakkhipitvā kumbhimukhaṃ limpitvā ekaṃ dve tīṇi saṃvaccharāni ṭhapenti,
tika-vin08t0:2280_5: vātakāsakuṭṭhapaṇḍubhagaṇḍalādīnaṃ siniddhabhojanabhuttānañca uttarapānaṃ bhattajīraṇakabhesajjaṃ tādisaṃ natthi,
tika-vin08t0:2281_0: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana “pānaparibhogenāti vuttattā loṇasovīrakaṃ yāmakālika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2281_2: Evaṃ pana vuttattā loṇasovīrakaṃ yāmakālikanti keci vadanti,
tika-vin08t0:2281_4: agilānānaṃ pana udakasambhinna’nti vuttattā guḷaṃ viya sattāhakālika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2283_0: Antovutthādikathāyaṃ “tena kho pana samayena bhagavato udaravātābādho hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2283_1: atha kho āyasmā ānando ‘pubbepi bhagavato udaravātābādho tekaṭulayāguyā phāsu hotī’ti sāmaṃ tilampi taṇḍulampi
tika-vin08t0:2283_2: muggampi viññāpetvā anto vāsetvā anto sāmaṃ pacitvā bhagavato upanāmesi ‘pivatu bhagavā tekaṭulayāgu’nti.
tika-vin08t0:2283_10: Dvīhi ākārehi buddhā bhagavanto bhikkhū paṭipucchanti ‘dhammaṃ vā desessāma,
tika-vin08t0:2284_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi ‘kutāyaṃ, ānanda, yāgū’ti.
tika-vin08t0:2284_1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
tika-vin08t0:2284_13: vigarahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi – na,
tika-vin08t0:2284_15: anto vutthaṃ anto pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakkaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2284_51: upasampannena sāmaṃ pakkatāti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ aṅgānaṃ sambhave sati tisso āpattiyo,
tika-vin08t0:2284_53: ekassa aṅgassa sambhave ekā āpattīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2285_1: Sāmaṃ pakkanti ettha yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ bhikkhuno pacituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2285_2: Sacepissa uṇhayāguyā sulasipaṇṇāni vā siṅgiveraṃ vā loṇaṃ vā pakkhipanti,
tika-vin08t0:2285_6: Sace pana manussā pidahitvāva denti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2285_10: puna pākaṃ pacitu”nti vacanato pubbe anupasampannehi pakkaṃ puna pacituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2285_11: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “khīratakkādīsu pana sakiṃ kuthitesu aggiṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati punapākassa anuññātattā”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2285_14: anto vāsetu”nti vacanato dubbhikkhasamaye taṇḍulādīni anto vāsetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2285_17: anto pacitu”nti vacanato dubbhikkhasamaye anto pacituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2285_20: sāmaṃ pacitu”nti vacanato dubbhikkhasamaye sāmampi pacituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2285_23: anto vutthaṃ anto pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakka”nti vacanato dubbhikkhasamaye tīṇipi vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin08t0:2287_4: sāmaṃ gahetvā haritvā kappiyakārake passitvā bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipitvā paṭiggahāpetvā paribhuñjituṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2287_7: uggahitaṃ paṭiggahitu”nti vacanato tathā katvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2289_5: tato nīhaṭaṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato yasmiṃ dāne nimantitā hutvā bhikkhū bhuñjanti,
tika-vin08t0:2289_6: tato dānato nīhaṭaṃ bhojanaṃ pavāritena bhikkhunā bhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2289_8: Vuttañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tato nīhaṭanti yattha nimantitā bhuñjanti,
tika-vin08t0:2291_5: purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato purebhattaṃ paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin08t0:2291_6: nikkhipitaṃ pavāritena bhikkhunā atirittaṃ akatvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin08t0:2293_0: Vanaṭṭhapokkharaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tena kho pana samayena āyasmato sāriputtassa kāyaḍāhābādho hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2293_1: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami,
tika-vin08t0:2293_7: atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassa bhise ca muḷālikāyo ca paribhuttassa kāyaḍāhābādho paṭippassambhi…pe…
tika-vin08t0:2293_13: vanaṭṭhaṃ pokkharaṭṭhaṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato vanaṭṭhaṃ pokkharaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2293_16: Tattha vanaṭṭhaṃ pokkharaṭṭhanti vane ceva paduminigacche ca jātaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2295_2: abījaṃ nibbaṭṭabījaṃ akatakappaṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato abījañca nibbaṭṭabījañca phalaṃ aggisatthanakhehi
tika-vin08t0:2295_6: Nibbaṭṭabījanti bījaṃ nibbaṭṭetvā apanetvā paribhuñjitabbakaṃ ambapanasādi,
tika-vin08t0:2295_7: tāni phalāni kappiyakārake asati kappaṃ akatvāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2310_0: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ imāhi gāthāhi anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
tika-vin08t0:2310_1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi –
tika-vin08t0:2310_4: yāguñca madhugoḷakañcā”ti vacanato yāguñca madhugoḷakañca sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2310_5: Anumodanāgāthāya “patthayataṃ icchata”nti padānaṃ “alameva dātu”nti iminā sambandho.
tika-vin08t0:2310_11: yathādhammo kāretabbo”ti vacanato tathā bhuñjantassa paramparabhojanasikkhāpadena āpatti hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2312_3: agilānassa guḷodaka”nti vacanato gilāno bhikkhu guḷapiṇḍaṃ vikālepi khādituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2312_4: Agilāno pana udakasambhinnaṃ katvā guḷodakaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin08t0:2312_5: “Gilānassa guḷanti tathārūpena byādhinā gilānassa pacchābhattaṃ guḷaṃ anujānāmīti attho”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin08t0:2312_6: “Tathārūpena byādhinā”ti vuttattā yathārūpena byādhinā gilānassa guḷo paribhuñjitabbo hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2312_7: tathārūpena eva byādhinā gilānassāti vuttaṃ viya dissati,
tika-vin08t0:2313_0: Ettakāsu kathāsu yā yā saṃvaṇṇetabbappakaraṇe na dissati,
tika-vin08t0:2313_1: sā sā amhehi pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kosallatthaṃ pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca gahetvā ṭīkācariyānaṃ vacanehi alaṅkaritvā ṭhapitā,
tika-vin08t0:2315_2: Tattha mahante atthe upadissati etehīti mahāpadesā,
tika-vin08t0:2315_3: mahantā vā atthā padissanti paññāyanti etthāti mahāpadesā,
tika-vin08t0:2315_4: mahantānaṃ vā atthānaṃ padeso pavattidesoti mahāpadesā. Ke te?
tika-vin08t0:2315_8: Suttaṃ gahetvāti “ṭhapetvā dhaññaphalarasa”ntiādikaṃ suttaṃ gahetvā upadhārento.
tika-vin08t0:2316_0: “Sāli vīhi ca kudrūso, godhumo varako yavo;
tika-vin08t0:2317_0: Kaṅgūti satta dhaññāni, nīvārādī tu tabbhidā”ti –.
tika-vin08t0:2318_2: Aṭṭha pānānīti ambapānaṃ jambupānaṃ cocapānaṃ mocapānaṃ sālukapānaṃ muddikapānaṃ madhukapānaṃ phārusakapānañca.
tika-vin08t0:2319_2: Pāḷiñca aṭṭhakathañca anapekkhitvāti pāḷiyaṃ nītatthato āgatameva aggahetvā.
tika-vin08t0:2319_4: Etena mahāpadesā nāma na kevalaṃ yathāvuttā eva,
tika-vin08t0:2319_5: atha kho anekāni nānappakārāni vinayadharassa ñāṇānubhāvappakāsitānīti dasseti.
tika-vin08t0:2321_6: na aññapariyattiṃ vā paṭipattiādayo vā mūlaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-vin08t0:2321_11: “Katame”tiādinā tesaṃ pañcānisaṃsādīnaṃ sarūpaṃ pucchitvā “attano”tiādinā vissajjetvā taṃ vacanaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin08t0:2322_0: Evaṃ pañcānisaṃsānaṃ sarūpaṃ dassetvā idāni teyeva vitthārato dassetuṃ “kathamassā”tiādinā pucchitvā “idhekacco”tiādinā vissajjeti.
tika-vin08t0:2322_1: Tattha attano sīlakkhandhasuguttabhāvo nāma āpattianāpajjanabhāveneva hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2322_2: no aññathāti āpattiāpajjanakāraṇaṃ dassetvā tadabhāvena anāpajjanaṃ dassetuṃ “āpattiṃ āpajjanto chahākārehi āpajjatī”tiādimāha. Tattha –
tika-vin08t0:2327_0: Vuttena alajjīlakkhaṇena na lajjati na hirīyatīti alajjī,
tika-vin08t0:2327_10: kappiyaṃ iti saññā yassa so kappiyasaññī,
tika-vin08t0:2328_4: vesālikā ca te vajjiputtā cāti vesālikavajjiputtā,
tika-vin08t0:2328_5: ariṭṭhabhikkhu ca kaṇṭakasāmaṇero ca vesālikavajjiputtā ca ariṭṭhabhikkhukaṇṭakasāmaṇeravesālikavajjiputtakā.
tika-vin08t0:2328_6: Parūpahāro ca aññāṇañca kaṅkhāvitaraṇañca parūpahāraaññāṇakaṅkhāvitaraṇā. Ke te? Vādā.
tika-vin08t0:2328_9: parūpahāraaññāṇakaṅkhāvitaraṇādayo vādā etesanti parū…pe… vādā. Ke te?
tika-vin08t0:2328_13: vādā ca mahāsaṅghikādayo ca sāsanapaccatthikā nāmāti samuccayadvandavasena yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin08t0:2334_0: Nigamagāthāsu paṭhamagāthāyaṃ saddhammaṭṭhitikāmena sāsanujjotakārinā parakkamabāhunā narindena ajjhesito so ahaṃ vinayasaṅgahaṃ akāsinti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:2335_0: Dutiyatatiyagāthāyaṃ teneva parakkamabāhunarindeneva kārite ramme ramaṇīye pāsādasatamaṇḍite pāsādānaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2335_1: satena paṭimaṇḍite nānādumagaṇākiṇṇe bhāvanābhiratālaye bhāvanāya abhiratānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ālayabhūte sītalūdakasampanne
tika-vin08t0:2335_2: jetavane jetavananāmake vihāre vasaṃ vasanto hutvā,
tika-vin08t0:2335_3: atha vā vasaṃ vasanto sohaṃ so ahaṃ yogīnaṃ hitaṃ hitabhūtaṃ sāraṃ sāravantaṃ imaṃ īdisaṃ vinayasaṅgahaṃ akāsinti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:2336_0: Sesagāthāsu iminā ganthakaraṇena yaṃ puññaṃ mayhaṃ siddhaṃ,
tika-vin08t0:2336_1: aññaṃ ito ganthakaraṇato aññabhūtaṃ yaṃ puññaṃ mayā pasutaṃ hoti,
tika-vin08t0:2336_2: etena puññakammena dutiye attasambhave tāvatiṃse pamodento sīlācāraguṇe rato pañcakāmesu alaggo devaputto
tika-vin08t0:2336_3: hutvā paṭhamaṃ paṭhamabhūtaṃ phalaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ patvāna antime attabhāvamhi lokaggapuggalaṃ nāthaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2336_4: nāthabhūtaṃ sabbasattahite rataṃ metteyyaṃ metteyyanāmakaṃ munipuṅgavaṃ muniseṭṭhaṃ disvāna tassa dhīrassa
tika-vin08t0:2336_5: saddhammadesanaṃ sutvā aggaṃ phalaṃ arahattaphalaṃ adhigantvā labhitvā jinasāsanaṃ sobheyyaṃ sobhāpeyyanti
tika-vin08t0:2337_0: Etissāya pana yojanāya sati ācariyavarassa vacanaṃ na sampaṭicchanti paṇḍitā. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin08t0:2337_1: Ettha hi ito dutiyabhave tāvatiṃsabhavane devaputto hutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā antimabhave metteyyassa
tika-vin08t0:2337_2: bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā arahattaphalaṃ labheyyanti ācariyassa patthanā,
tika-vin08t0:2337_4: Sotāpannassa hi sattabhavato uddhaṃ paṭisandhi natthi,
tika-vin08t0:2337_5: tāvatiṃsānañca devānaṃ bhavasatenapi bhavasahassenapi bhavasatasahassenapi metteyyassa bhagavato uppajjanakālo appattabbo hoti.
tika-vin08t0:2337_6: Athāpi vadeyya “antarā brahmaloke nibbattitvā metteyyassa bhagavato kāle manusso bhaveyyā”ti,
tika-vin08t0:2337_8: Na hi brahmalokagatānaṃ ariyānaṃ puna kāmabhavūpapatti atthi.
tika-vin08t0:2337_9: Vuttañhi abhidhamme yamakappakaraṇe “rūpadhātuyā cutassa kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassa satteva anusayā anusentī”ti.
tika-vin08t0:2337_11: tathā ca ācariyassa vacane na dissati,
tika-vin08t0:2337_13: Na hi bhikkhubhūto sāsanaṃ sobhāpetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-vin08t0:2340_1: Athāpi vadeyya “antarā dīghāyuko bhummadevo hutvā tadā manusso bhaveyyā”ti,
tika-vin08t0:2340_2: evampi ekassa buddhassa sāvakabhūto ariyapuggalo puna aññassa buddhassa sāvako na bhaveyyāti,
tika-vin08t0:2340_3: ācariyo pana sabbapariyattidharo anekaganthakārako anekesaṃ ganthakārakānaṃ therānaṃ ācariyapācariyabhūto,
tika-vin08t0:2340_4: tena na kevalaṃ idheva imā gāthāyo ṭhapitā,
tika-vin08t0:2340_5: atha kho sāratthadīpanīnāmikāya vinayaṭīkāya avasāne ca ṭhapitā,
tika-vin08t0:2341_1: devaputto hutvā paṭhamaṃ tāva phalaṃ yathāvuttaṃ tāvatiṃse pamodanasīlācāraguṇe rataṃ pañcakāmesu alaggabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2341_6: saddhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā tato paraṃ aggaphalaṃ arahattaphalaṃ adhigantvā jinasāsanaṃ sobheyyanti yojanā.
tika-vin08t0:2341_7: Yathā amhākaṃ bhagavato dhammacakkappavattanasuttantadhammadesanaṃ sutvā aññātakoṇḍaññatthero sotāpattiphalaṃ
tika-vin08t0:2341_8: patvā pacchā arahattaphalaṃ adhigantvā jinasāsanaṃ sobhesi,
tika-vin08t0:2341_10: Ito aññānipi nayāni yathā therassa vacanānukūlāni,
tika-vin08t0:2357_0: Tassa kāle brahāraññe, tiriyo nāma pabbato;
